atk-s0513a4:7_0: Catudvāramidaṃ nagaranti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ dubbacabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:7_2: Idha pana satthā taṃ bhikkhuṃ “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu dubbaco”ti pucchitvā “saccaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:7_3: bhante”ti vutte “pubbepi tvaṃ bhikkhu dubbacatāya paṇḍitānaṃ vacanaṃ akatvā khuracakkaṃ āpādesī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:8_0: Atīte kassapadasabalassa kāle bārāṇasiyaṃ asītikoṭivibhavassa seṭṭhino eko putto mittavindako nāma ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:8_3: Atha naṃ aparabhāge pitari kālakate mātā kuṭumbaṃ vicārentī āha – “tāta,
atk-s0513a4:8_12: Evaṃ vadantampi naṃ ekadivasaṃ puṇṇamuposathadivase mātā āha – “tāta,
atk-s0513a4:8_14: ajja uposathaṃ samādiyitvā vihāraṃ gantvā sabbarattiṃ dhammaṃ sutvā ehi,
atk-s0513a4:8_16: So “sādhū”ti dhanalobhena uposathaṃ samādiyitvā bhuttapātarāso vihāraṃ gantvā divasaṃ vītināmetvā rattiṃ yathā ekampi dhammapadaṃ kaṇṇaṃ na paharati,
atk-s0513a4:8_17: tathā ekasmiṃ padese nipajjitvā niddaṃ okkamitvā punadivase pātova mukhaṃ dhovitvā gehaṃ gantvā nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:9_0: Mātā panassa “ajja me putto dhammaṃ sutvā pātova dhammakathikattheraṃ ādāya āgamissatī”ti yāguṃ khādanīyaṃ
atk-s0513a4:9_1: bhojanīyaṃ paṭiyādetvā āsanaṃ paññapetvā tassāgamanaṃ paṭimānentī taṃ ekakaṃ āgataṃ disvā “tāta,
atk-s0513a4:9_2: dhammakathiko kena na ānīto”ti vatvā “na mayhaṃ dhammakathikena attho”ti vutte “tena hi yāguṃ pivā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:9_9: So yāguṃ pivitvā sahassabhaṇḍikaṃ gahetvā vohāraṃ karonto na cirasseva vīsasatasahassaṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0513a4:9_20: na sakkā maṃ nivāretu”nti vatvā “ahaṃ taṃ, tāta,
atk-s0513a4:9_21: vāressāmī”ti mātarā hatthe gahito hatthaṃ vissajjāpetvā mātaraṃ paharitvā pātetvā antaraṃ katvā gantvā nāvāya samuddaṃ pakkhandi.
atk-s0513a4:10_0: Nāvā sattame divase mittavindakaṃ nissāya samuddapiṭṭhe niccalā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:10_1: Kāḷakaṇṇisalākā kariyamānā mittavindakasseva hatthe tikkhattuṃ pati.
atk-s0513a4:10_2: Athassa uḷumpaṃ datvā “imaṃ ekaṃ nissāya bahū mā nassantū”ti taṃ samuddapiṭṭhe khipiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:10_4: Sopi uḷumpe nipajjitvā ekaṃ dīpakaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a4:10_8: So tāhi saddhiṃ sattāhaṃ dibbasampattiṃ anubhavi.
atk-s0513a4:10_12: tāva anukkaṇṭhamāno idheva vasā”ti vatvā agamaṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:10_13: So taṇhāvasiko hutvā tasmiṃyeva phalake nipajjitvā puna samuddapiṭṭhena gacchanto aparaṃ dīpakaṃ patvā
atk-s0513a4:10_14: tattha rajatavimāne aṭṭha vemānikapetiyo disvā eteneva upāyena aparasmiṃ dīpake maṇivimāne soḷasa,
atk-s0513a4:10_15: aparasmiṃ dīpake kanakavimāne dvattiṃsa vemānikapetiyo disvā tāhi saddhiṃ dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā
atk-s0513a4:10_16: tāsampi dukkhaṃ anubhavituṃ gatakāle puna samuddapiṭṭhena gacchanto ekaṃ pākāraparikkhittaṃ catudvāraṃ
atk-s0513a4:10_19: bahūnaṃ nerayikasattānaṃ kammakaraṇānubhavanaṭṭhānaṃ mittavindakassa alaṅkatapaṭiyattanagaraṃ viya hutvā upaṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:11_0: So “imaṃ nagaraṃ pavisitvā rājā bhavissāmī”ti cintetvā khuracakkaṃ ukkhipitvā sīse paccamānaṃ nerayikasattaṃ addasa.
atk-s0513a4:11_1: Athassa taṃ tassa sīse khuracakkaṃ padumaṃ viya hutvā upaṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:11_2: Ure pañcaṅgikabandhanaṃ uracchadapasādhanaṃ hutvā sīsato galantaṃ lohitaṃ lohitacandanavilepanaṃ viya
atk-s0513a4:11_3: hutvā paridevanasaddo madhurasaro gītasaddo viya hutvā upaṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:11_11: imināpi mayā viya mātaraṃ paharitvā āgatena bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:11_14: gaṇha ima”nti vatvā khuracakkaṃ tassa sīse khipi,
atk-s0513a4:11_16: Tasmiṃ khaṇe mittavindako tassa khuracakkabhāvaṃ ñatvā “tava khuracakkaṃ gaṇha,
atk-s0513a4:11_19: Tadā bodhisatto rukkhadevatā hutvā mahantena parivārena ussadacārikaṃ caramāno taṃ ṭhānaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a4:11_21: idaṃ maṃ cakkaṃ saṇhakaraṇiyaṃ viya tilāni pisamānaṃ otarati,
atk-s0513a4:11_22: kiṃ nu kho mayā pāpaṃ pakata”nti pucchanto dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:18_3: Oruddhapaṭiruddhosmīti anto katvā samantā pākārena ruddho,
atk-s0513a4:18_5: Kiṃ pāpaṃ pakatanti kiṃ nu kho mayā pāpakammaṃ kataṃ.
atk-s0513a4:18_7: Yathā dijoti pañjare pakkhitto sakuṇo viya.
atk-s0513a4:19_0: Athassa devarājā kāraṇaṃ kathetuṃ cha gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:31_0: Ye ca taṃ anugijjhanti, te honti cakkadhārino.
atk-s0513a4:36_0: “Kammaṃ samekkhe vipulañca bhogaṃ, icchaṃ na seveyya anatthasaṃhitaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:37_0: Kareyya vākyaṃ anukampakānaṃ, taṃ tādisaṃ nātivatteyya cakka”nti.
atk-s0513a4:38_1: atirekāni vīsatīti tvaṃ uposathaṃ katvā mātu santikā sahassaṃ gahetvā vohāraṃ karonto satasahassāni ca atirekāni vīsatisahassāni labhitvā.
atk-s0513a4:38_2: Nākarīti tena dhanena asantuṭṭho nāvāya samuddaṃ pavisanto samudde ādīnavañca kathetvā mātuyā vāriyamānopi anukampakānaṃ ñātīnaṃ vacanaṃ na karosi,
atk-s0513a4:38_3: sotāpannaṃ mātaraṃ paharitvā antaraṃ katvā nikkhantoyevāsīti dīpeti.
atk-s0513a4:39_3: Catubbhi aṭṭhāti atha naṃ nissāya ṭhitāya nāvāya phalakaṃ datvā samudde khittopi tvaṃ mātaraṃ nissāya
atk-s0513a4:39_4: ekadivasaṃ katassa uposathakammassa nissandena phalikavimāne catasso itthiyo labhitvā tato rajatavimāne aṭṭha,
atk-s0513a4:39_7: Aticchaṃ cakkamāsadoti atha tvaṃ yathāladdhena asantuṭṭho “atra uttaritaraṃ labhissāmī”ti evaṃ laddhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:39_8: laddhaṃ atikkamanalobhasaṅkhātāya aticchāya samannāgatattā aticcho pāpapuggalo tassa uposathakammassa
atk-s0513a4:39_9: khīṇattā dvattiṃsa itthiyo atikkamitvā imaṃ petanagaraṃ āgantvā tassa mātupahāradānaakusalassa nissandena
atk-s0513a4:39_15: Bhamatīti tassa te icchāhatassa posassa idaṃ cakkaṃ matthakaṃ pisamānaṃ idāni kumbhakāracakkaṃ viya matthake bhamatīti attho.
atk-s0513a4:40_0: Ye ca taṃ anugijjhantīti taṇhā nāmesā gacchantī uparūpari visālā hoti,
atk-s0513a4:40_3: taṃ evarūpaṃ taṇhaṃ ye ca anugijjhanti giddhā gadhitā hutvā punappunaṃ allīyanti.
atk-s0513a4:40_4: Te honti cakkadhārinoti te evaṃ paccantā khuracakkaṃ dhārenti.
atk-s0513a4:40_6: Magganti gantabbaṃ appasiddhikaṃ samuddamaggaṃ apaccavekkhitvā yathā tvaṃ paṭipanno,
atk-s0513a4:40_8: te yathā tvaṃ tatheva taṇhāvasikā hutvā dhanaṃ pahāya gamanamaggaṃ anapekkhitvā paṭipannā cakkadhārino honti.
atk-s0513a4:40_9: Kammaṃ samekkheti tasmā paṇḍito puriso attanā kattabbakammaṃ “sadosaṃ nu kho,
atk-s0513a4:40_11: Vipulañca bhoganti attano dhammaladdhaṃ dhanarāsimpi samekkheyya.
atk-s0513a4:40_12: Nātivatteyyāti taṃ tādisaṃ puggalaṃ idaṃ cakkaṃ na ativatteyya nāvatthareyya.
atk-s0513a4:41_0: Taṃ sutvā mittavindako “iminā devaputtena mayā katakammaṃ tathato ñātaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:43_0: “Kīvaciraṃ nu me yakkha, cakkaṃ sirasi ṭhassati;
atk-s0513a4:44_0: Kati vassasahassāni, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito”ti.
atk-s0513a4:48_0: Cakkaṃ te sirasi māviddhaṃ, na taṃ jīvaṃ pamokkhasī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:49_7: tassa pana na sakkā vassagaṇanāya vipāko paññāpetunti aparimāṇaṃ atimahantaṃ vipākadukkhaṃ sarissasi paṭipajjissasīti atisaro.
atk-s0513a4:49_8: Tena te “ettakāni vassasahassānī”ti vattuṃ na sakkomi.
atk-s0513a4:49_9: Sirasimāviddhanti yaṃ pana te idaṃ cakkaṃ sirasmiṃ āviddhaṃ kumbhakāracakkamiva bhamati.
atk-s0513a4:49_10: Na taṃ jīvaṃ pamokkhasīti taṃ tvaṃ yāva te kammavipāko na khīyati,
atk-s0513a4:49_12: kammavipāke pana khīṇe idaṃ cakkaṃ pahāya yathākammaṃ gamissasīti.
atk-s0513a4:50_0: Idaṃ vatvā devaputto attano devaṭṭhānameva gato, itaropi mahādukkhaṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0513a4:51_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a4:55_0: Kaṇho vatāyaṃ purisoti idaṃ satthā kapilavatthuṃ upanissāya nigrodhārāme viharanto sitapātukammaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:55_1: Tadā kira satthā sāyanhasamaye nigrodhārāme bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto jaṅghavihāraṃ anucaṅkamamāno aññatarasmiṃ padese sitaṃ pātvākāsi.
atk-s0513a4:55_5: pucchissāmi tāvā”ti añjaliṃ paggayha sitakāraṇaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0513a4:55_8: so imasmiṃ bhūmippadese vihāsi jhāyī jhānarato,
atk-s0513a4:55_9: tassa sīlatejena sakkassa bhavanaṃ kampī”ti sitakāraṇaṃ vatvā tassa vatthuno apākaṭattā therena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:56_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bārāṇasiyaṃ ekena asītikoṭivibhavena aputtakena brāhmaṇena
atk-s0513a4:56_1: sīlaṃ samādiyitvā putte patthite bodhisatto tassa brāhmaṇiyā kucchimhi nibbatti.
atk-s0513a4:56_3: So soḷasavassakāle maṇipaṭimā viya sobhaggappatto hutvā pitarā sippuggahaṇatthāya pesito takkasilāyaṃ sabbasippāni uggahetvā paccāgacchi.
atk-s0513a4:56_4: Atha naṃ pitā anurūpena dārena saṃyojesi.
atk-s0513a4:56_5: So aparabhāge mātāpitūnaṃ accayena sabbissariyaṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0513a4:56_6: Athekadivasaṃ ratanakoṭṭhāgārāni viloketvā varapallaṅkamajjhagato suvaṇṇapaṭṭaṃ āharāpetvā “ettakaṃ dhanaṃ asukena uppāditaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:56_7: ettakaṃ asukenā”ti pubbañātīhi suvaṇṇapaṭṭe likhitāni akkharāni disvā cintesi “yehi imaṃ dhanaṃ uppāditaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:56_10: ekopi idaṃ dhanaṃ gahetvā gato nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a4:56_11: na kho pana sakkā dhanabhaṇḍikaṃ bandhitvā paralokaṃ gantuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:56_12: Pañcannaṃ verānaṃ sādhāraṇabhāvena hi asārassa dhanassa dānaṃ sāro,
atk-s0513a4:56_13: bahurogasādhāraṇabhāvena asārassa sarīrassa sīlavantesu abhivādanādikammaṃ sāro,
atk-s0513a4:56_14: aniccābhibhūtabhāvena asārassa jīvitassa aniccādivasena vipassanāyogo sāro,
atk-s0513a4:56_15: tasmā asārehi bhogehi sāraggahaṇatthaṃ dānaṃ dassāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:57_0: So āsanā vuṭṭhāya rañño santikaṃ gantvā rājānaṃ āpucchitvā mahādānaṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0513a4:57_1: Yāva sattamā divasā dhanaṃ aparikkhīyamānaṃ disvā “kiṃ me dhanena,
atk-s0513a4:57_3: tāvadeva pabbajitvā abhiññā ca samāpattiyo ca nibbattetvā brahmalokaparāyaṇo bhavissāmī”ti cintetvā gehe sabbadvārāni vivarāpetvā “dinnaṃ me,
atk-s0513a4:57_4: harantū”ti asuciṃ viya jigucchanto vatthukāme pahāya mahājanassa rodantassa paridevantassa nagarā nikkhamitvā
atk-s0513a4:57_5: himavantapadesaṃ pavisitvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā attano vasanatthāya ramaṇīyaṃ bhūmibhāgaṃ olokento
atk-s0513a4:57_6: imaṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā “idha vasissāmī”ti ekaṃ indavāruṇīrukkhaṃ gocaragāmaṃ adhiṭṭhāya tasseva rukkhassa
atk-s0513a4:57_17: Khamāya pathavīāpatejavāyusamo hutvā ete ettake dhutaṅgaguṇe samādāya vattati,
atk-s0513a4:57_18: imasmiṃ kira jātake bodhisatto paramappiccho ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:57_19: So na cirasseva abhiññā ca samāpattiyo ca nibbattetvā jhānakīḷaṃ kīḷanto tattheva vasati,
atk-s0513a4:57_25: Evaṃ paramasantuṭṭho hutvā imasmiṃ ṭhāne ciraṃ vasati.
atk-s0513a4:58_0: So ekadivasaṃ pubbaṇhasamaye tassa rukkhassa pakkāni phalāni gaṇhi,
atk-s0513a4:58_1: gaṇhanto pana loluppacārena uṭṭhāya aññasmiṃ padese na gaṇhāti,
atk-s0513a4:58_2: yathānisinnova hatthaṃ pasāretvā hatthappasāraṇaṭṭhāne ṭhitāni phalāni saṃharati,
atk-s0513a4:58_4: Evaṃ paramasantuṭṭhassa tassa sīlatejena sakkassa paṇḍukambalasilāsanaṃ uṇhākāraṃ dassesi.
atk-s0513a4:58_5: Taṃ kira sakkassa āyukkhayena vā uṇhaṃ hoti puññakkhayena vā,
atk-s0513a4:58_6: aññasmiṃ vā mahānubhāvasatte taṃ ṭhānaṃ patthente,
atk-s0513a4:58_7: dhammikānaṃ vā mahiddhikasamaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ sīlatejena uṇhaṃ hoti.
atk-s0513a4:58_8: Sakko “ko nu kho maṃ ṭhānā cāvetukāmo”ti āvajjetvā imasmiṃ padese vasantaṃ kaṇhaṃ isiṃ rukkhaphalāni
atk-s0513a4:58_9: uccinantaṃ disvā cintesi “ayaṃ isi ghoratapo paramajitindriyo,
atk-s0513a4:58_10: imaṃ dhammakathāya sīhanādaṃ nadāpetvā sukāraṇaṃ sutvā varena santappetvā imamassa rukkhaṃ dhuvaphalaṃ katvā āgamissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:58_11: So mahantenānubhāvena sīghaṃ otaritvā tasmiṃ rukkhamūle tassa piṭṭhipasse ṭhatvā “attano avaṇṇe kathite kujjhissati nu kho,
atk-s0513a4:61_0: Kaṇhe bhūmipadesasmiṃ, na mayhaṃ manaso piyo”ti.
atk-s0513a4:63_0: Kaṇho isi sakkassa vacanaṃ sutvā “ko nu kho mayā saddhiṃ kathetī”ti dibbacakkhunā upadhārento “sakko”ti
atk-s0513a4:65_0: “Na kaṇho tacasā hoti, antosāro hi brāhmaṇo;
atk-s0513a4:66_0: Yasmiṃ pāpāni kammāni, sa ve kaṇho sujampatī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:67_0: Tattha tacasāti tacena kaṇho nāma na hotīti attho.
atk-s0513a4:67_2: Evarūpo hi bāhitapāpattā brāhmaṇo nāma hoti.
atk-s0513a4:67_3: Sa veti yasmiṃ pana pāpāni kammāni atthi,
atk-s0513a4:67_4: so yattha katthaci kule jātopi yena kenaci sarīravaṇṇena samannāgatopi kāḷakova.
atk-s0513a4:68_0: Evañca pana vatvā imesaṃ sattānaṃ kaṇhabhāvakarāni pāpakammāni ekavidhādibhedehi vitthāretvā sabbānipi
atk-s0513a4:68_1: tāni garahitvā sīlādayo guṇe pasaṃsitvā ākāse candaṃ uṭṭhāpento viya sakkassa dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0513a4:68_2: Sakko tassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā pamudito somanassajāto mahāsattaṃ varena nimantento tatiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:71_0: Varaṃ brāhmaṇa te dammi, yaṃ kiñci manasicchasī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:72_0: Tattha etasminti yaṃ idaṃ tayā sabbaññubuddhena viya sulapitaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:72_1: tasmiṃ sulapite tumhākameva anucchavikattā patirūpe subhāsite yaṃ kiñci manasā icchasi,
atk-s0513a4:72_2: sabbaṃ te yaṃ varaṃ icchitaṃ patthitaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:73_0: Taṃ sutvā mahāsatto cintesi “ayaṃ kiṃ nu kho attano avaṇṇe kathite kujjhissati,
atk-s0513a4:73_1: noti maṃ vīmaṃsanto mayhaṃ chavivaṇṇañca bhojanañca vasanaṭṭhānañca garahitvā idāni mayhaṃ akuddhabhāvaṃ ñatvā pasannacitto varaṃ deti,
atk-s0513a4:73_2: maṃ kho panesa ‘sakkissariyabrhmissariyānaṃ atthāya brahmacariyaṃ caratī’tipi maññeyya,
atk-s0513a4:73_3: tatrassa nikkaṅkhabhāvatthaṃ mayhaṃ paresu kodho vā doso vā mā uppajjatu,
atk-s0513a4:73_4: parasampattiyaṃ lobho vā paresu sineho vā mā uppajjatu,
atk-s0513a4:73_5: majjhattova bhaveyyanti ime mayā cattāro vare gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:73_6: So tassa nikkaṅkhabhāvatthāya cattāro vare gaṇhanto catutthaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:78_0: Tattha varañce me ado sakkāti sace tvaṃ mayhaṃ varaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a4:78_5: Nisnehanti puttadhītādīsu vā saviññāṇakesu dhanadhaññādīsu vā aviññāṇakesu attano santakesupi nisnehaṃ apagatalobhaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:78_6: Abhikaṅkhāmīti evarūpaṃ imehi catūhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ attano vuttiṃ abhikaṅkhāmi.
atk-s0513a4:78_7: Ete me caturo vareti ete nikkodhādike caturo mayhaṃ vare dehīti.
atk-s0513a4:79_0: Kiṃ panesa na jānāti “yathā na sakkā sakkassa santike varaṃ gahetvā varena kodhādayo hanitu”nti.
atk-s0513a4:79_2: sakke kho pana varaṃ dente na gaṇhāmīti vacanaṃ na yuttanti tassa ca nikkaṅkhabhāvatthāya gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a4:79_3: Tato sakko cintesi “kaṇhapaṇḍito varaṃ gaṇhanto ativiya anavajje vare gaṇhi,
atk-s0513a4:81_0: “Kiṃnu kodhe vā dose vā, lobhe snehe ca brāhmaṇa;
atk-s0513a4:82_0: Ādīnavaṃ tvaṃ passasi, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito”ti.
atk-s0513a4:83_1: brāhmaṇa kiṃ nu kho tvaṃ kodhe dose lobhe snehe ca ādīnavaṃ passasi,
atk-s0513a4:83_3: na hi mayaṃ ettha ādīnavaṃ jānāmāti.
atk-s0513a4:84_0: Atha naṃ mahāsatto “tena hi suṇāhī”ti vatvā catasso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:86_0: “Appo hutvā bahu hoti, vaḍḍhate so akhantijo;
atk-s0513a4:87_0: Āsaṅgī bahupāyāso, tasmā kodhaṃ na rocaye.
atk-s0513a4:90_0: Tato pāṇi tato daṇḍo, satthassa paramā gati;
atk-s0513a4:91_0: Doso kodhasamuṭṭhāno, tasmā dosaṃ na rocaye.
atk-s0513a4:94_0: Dissanti lobhadhammesu, tasmā lobhaṃ na rocaye.
atk-s0513a4:97_0: Te bhusaṃ upatāpenti, tasmā snehaṃ na rocaye”ti.
atk-s0513a4:98_0: Tattha akhantijoti so anadhivāsakajātikassa akhantito jāto kodho paṭhamaṃ paritto hutvā pacchā bahu hoti aparāparaṃ vaḍḍhati.
atk-s0513a4:98_1: Tassa vaḍḍhanabhāvo khantivādījātakena ceva cūḷadhammapālajātakena ca vaṇṇetabbo.
atk-s0513a4:98_2: Apica tissāmaccassapettha bhariyaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbaṃ saparijanaṃ māretvā pacchā attano māritavatthu kathetabbaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:98_6: taṃ vatthuṃ vissajjetvā gantuṃ na deti,
atk-s0513a4:98_8: Bahupāyāsoti bahunā kāyikacetasikadukkhasaṅkhātena upāyāsena kilamathena samannāgato.
atk-s0513a4:98_9: Kodhaṃ nissāya hi kodhavasena ariyādīsu katavītikkamā diṭṭhadhamme ceva samparāye ca vadhabandhavippaṭisārādīni
atk-s0513a4:98_10: ceva pañcavidhabandhanakammakaraṇādīni ca bahūni dukkhāni anubhavantīti kodho bahupāyāso nāma.
atk-s0513a4:99_0: Duṭṭhassāti kujjhanalakkhaṇena kodhena kujjhitvā aparabhāge dussanalakkhaṇena dosena duṭṭhassa paṭhamaṃ tāva “are, dāsa,
atk-s0513a4:99_5: daṇḍappahāre atikkamitvā pana ekatodhāraubhatodhārassa satthassa paramā gati,
atk-s0513a4:99_7: Yadā hi satthena paraṃ jīvitā voropetvā pacchā teneva satthena attānaṃ jīvitā voropeti,
atk-s0513a4:99_9: Doso kodhasamuṭṭhānoti yathā anambilaṃ takkaṃ vā kañjikaṃ vā pariṇāmavasena parivattitvā ambilaṃ hoti,
atk-s0513a4:99_10: taṃ ekajātikampi samānaṃ ambilaṃ anambilanti nānā vuccati,
atk-s0513a4:99_11: tathā pubbakāle kodho pariṇamitvā aparabhāge doso hoti.
atk-s0513a4:99_12: So akusalamūlattena ekajātikopi samāno kodho dosoti nānā vuccati.
atk-s0513a4:100_0: Ālopasāhasākārāti divā divasseva gāmaṃ paharitvā vilumpanāni ca āvudhaṃ sarīre ṭhapetvā “idaṃ nāma me dehī”ti sāhasākārā ca.
atk-s0513a4:100_1: Nikatī vañcanāni cāti patirūpakaṃ dassetvā parassa haraṇaṃ nikati nāma,
atk-s0513a4:100_2: sā asuvaṇṇameva “suvaṇṇa”nti kūṭakahāpaṇaṃ “kahāpaṇo”ti datvā parasantakaggahaṇe daṭṭhabbā.
atk-s0513a4:100_3: Paṭibhānavasena pana upāyakusalatāya parasantakaggahaṇaṃ vañcanaṃ nāma.
atk-s0513a4:100_5: eko kira ujujātiko gāmikapuriso araññato sasakaṃ ānetvā nadītīre ṭhapetvā nhāyituṃ otari.
atk-s0513a4:100_6: Atheko dhutto taṃ sasakaṃ sīse katvā nhāyituṃ otiṇṇo.
atk-s0513a4:100_7: Itaro uttaritvā sasakaṃ apassanto ito cito ca vilokesi.
atk-s0513a4:100_8: Tamenaṃ dhutto “kiṃ bho vilokesī”ti vatvā “imasmiṃ me ṭhāne sasako ṭhapito,
atk-s0513a4:100_12: passa ahaṃ attano sasakaṃ sīse ṭhapetvāva nhāyāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:100_14: Ekakahāpaṇena migapotakaṃ gahetvā puna taṃ datvā dvikahāpaṇagghanakassa migassa gahitavatthupettha kathetabbaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:100_16: ime ālopādayo pāpadhammā lobhasabhāvesu lobhābhibhūtesu sattesu dissanti.
atk-s0513a4:100_17: Na hi aluddhā evarūpāni kammāni karonti.
atk-s0513a4:101_0: Snehasaṅgathitā ganthāti ārammaṇesu allīyanalakkhaṇena snehena saṅgathitā punappunaṃ uppādavasena ghaṭitā
atk-s0513a4:101_1: suttena pupphāni viya baddhā nānappakāresu ārammaṇesu pavattamānā abhijjhākāyaganthā.
atk-s0513a4:101_2: Senti manomayā puthūti te puthūsu ārammaṇesu uppannā suvaṇṇādīhi nibbattāni suvaṇṇādimayāni ābharaṇādīni
atk-s0513a4:101_3: viya manena nibbattattā manomayā abhijjhākāyaganthā tesu ārammaṇesu senti anusenti.
atk-s0513a4:101_4: Te bhusaṃ upatāpentīti te evaṃ anusayitā balavatāpaṃ janentā bhusaṃ upatāpenti atikilamenti.
atk-s0513a4:101_5: Tesaṃ pana bhusaṃ upatāpane “sallaviddhova ruppatī”ti gāthāya vatthu,
atk-s0513a4:101_9: Apica maṅgalabodhisattassa dārake datvā balavasokena hadayaṃ phali,
atk-s0513a4:101_11: Evaṃ pūritapāramīnaṃ mahāsattānaṃ pemaṃ upatāpaṃ karotiyeva.
atk-s0513a4:102_0: Sakko pañhavissajjanaṃ sutvā “kaṇhapaṇḍita tayā ime pañhā buddhalīḷāya sādhukaṃ kathitā,
atk-s0513a4:102_2: aparampi varaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti vatvā dasamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:105_0: Varaṃ brāhmaṇa te dammi, yaṃ kiñci manasicchasī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:111_0: Tattha antarāyakarā bhusāti imassa me tapokammassa antarāyakarā.
atk-s0513a4:112_0: Taṃ sutvā sakko “kaṇhapaṇḍito varaṃ gaṇhanto na āmisasannissitaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0513a4:112_1: tapokammanissitameva gaṇhātī”ti cintetvā bhiyyosomattāya pasanno aparampi varaṃ dadamāno itaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:115_0: Varaṃ brāhmaṇa te dammi, yaṃ kiñci manasicchasī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:116_0: Bodhisattopi varaggahaṇāpadesena tassa dhammaṃ desento osānagāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:119_0: Na mano vā sarīraṃ vā, maṃ-kate sakka kassaci;
atk-s0513a4:120_0: Kadāci upahaññetha, etaṃ sakka varaṃ vare”ti.
atk-s0513a4:121_2: vacīdvārampi etesaṃ gahaṇena gahitamevāti veditabbaṃ. Maṃ-
atk-s0513a4:121_7: mama kāraṇā maṃ nissāya mama anatthakāmatāya kassaci sattassa kismiñci kāle idaṃ tividhampi kammadvāraṃ na upahaññetha,
atk-s0513a4:121_8: pāṇātipātādīhi dasahi akusalakammapathehi vimuttaṃ parisuddhameva bhaveyyāti.
atk-s0513a4:122_0: Iti mahāsatto chasupi ṭhānesu varaṃ gaṇhanto nekkhammanissitameva gaṇhi,
atk-s0513a4:122_2: na taṃ sakkā sakkena abyādhidhammaṃ kātu”nti.
atk-s0513a4:122_4: evaṃ santepi tassa dhammadesanatthaṃ ime vare gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a4:122_5: Sakkopi taṃ rukkhaṃ dhuvaphalaṃ katvā mahāsattaṃ vanditvā sirasi añjaliṃ patiṭṭhapetvā “arogā idheva vasathā”ti vatvā sakaṭṭhānameva gato.
atk-s0513a4:123_1: pubbe mayā nivutthabhūmippadeso ceso”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a4:127_0: 24-38. Yo kopaneyyoti idaṃ catuposathikajātakaṃ puṇṇakajātake āvi bhavissati.
atk-s0513a4:131_0: Bahussutoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sabbaparikkhāradānaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:131_1: Sāvatthiyaṃ kireko upāsako tathāgatassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasannacitto svātanāya nimantetvā attano
atk-s0513a4:131_2: gharadvāre maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā alaṅkaritvā punadivase tathāgatassa kālaṃ ārocāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:131_3: Satthā pañcasatabhikkhuparivāro tattha gantvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:131_4: Upāsako saputtadāro saparijano buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā puna svātanāyāti evaṃ
atk-s0513a4:131_5: sattāhaṃ nimantetvā mahādānaṃ pavattetvā sattame divase sabbaparikkhāraṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a4:131_6: Taṃ pana dadamāno upāhanadānaṃ ussannaṃ katvā adāsi.
atk-s0513a4:131_10: Iti so sabbaparikkhāradānaṃ datvā attano parisāya saddhiṃ bhagavato santike nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:131_11: Athassa satthā madhurena sarena anumodanaṃ karonto “upāsaka,
atk-s0513a4:131_14: pubbe anuppanne buddhe paccekabuddhassa ekaṃ upāhanasaṅghāṭaṃ datvā nāvāya bhinnāya appatiṭṭhe mahāsamuddepi
atk-s0513a4:131_16: tvaṃ pana buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa sabbaparikkhāradānaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0513a4:131_17: tassa te upāhanadānassa phalaṃ kasmā na patiṭṭhā bhavissatī”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:132_0: Atīte ayaṃ bārāṇasī moḷinī nāma ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:132_1: Moḷininagare brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente saṅkho nāma brāhmaṇo aḍḍho mahaddhano mahābhogo pahūtavittupakaraṇo
atk-s0513a4:132_2: pahūtadhanadhaññasuvaṇṇarajato catūsu nagaradvāresu nagaramajjhe nivesanadvāre cāti chasu ṭhānesu cha
atk-s0513a4:132_3: dānasālāyo kāretvā devasikaṃ chasatasahassāni vissajjento kapaṇaddhikānaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0513a4:132_4: So ekadivasaṃ cintesi “ahaṃ gehe dhane khīṇe dātuṃ na sakkhissāmi,
atk-s0513a4:132_5: aparikkhīṇeyeva dhane nāvāya suvaṇṇabhūmiṃ gantvā dhanaṃ āharissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:132_6: So nāvaṃ bandhāpetvā bhaṇḍassa pūrāpetvā puttadāraṃ āmantetvā “yāvāhaṃ āgacchāmi,
atk-s0513a4:132_7: tāva me dānaṃ anupacchinditvā pavatteyyāthā”ti vatvā dāsakammakaraparivuto chattaṃ ādāya upāhanaṃ āruyha majjhanhikasamaye paṭṭanagāmābhimukho pāyāsi.
atk-s0513a4:132_8: Tasmiṃ khaṇe gandhamādane eko paccekabuddho āvajjetvā taṃ dhanāharaṇatthāya gacchantaṃ disvā “mahāpuriso dhanaṃ āharituṃ gacchati,
atk-s0513a4:132_9: bhavissati nu kho assa samudde antarāyo,
atk-s0513a4:132_10: no”ti āvajjetvā “bhavissatī”ti ñatvā “esa maṃ disvā chattañca upāhanañca mayhaṃ datvā upāhanadānanissandena
atk-s0513a4:132_12: karissāmissa anuggaha”nti ākāsenāgantvā tassāvidūre otaritvā caṇḍavātātape aṅgārasantharasadisaṃ uṇhavālukaṃ maddanto tassa abhimukho āgacchi.
atk-s0513a4:133_1: ajja mayā ettha dānabījaṃ ropetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti tuṭṭhacitto vegena taṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā “bhante,
atk-s0513a4:133_2: mayhaṃ anuggahatthāya thokaṃ maggā okkamma imaṃ rukkhamūlaṃ upasaṅkamathā”ti vatvā tasmiṃ rukkhamūlaṃ
atk-s0513a4:133_3: upasaṅkamante rukkhamūle vālukaṃ ussāpetvā uttarāsaṅgaṃ paññapetvā paccekabuddhaṃ nisīdāpetvā vanditvā
atk-s0513a4:133_4: vāsitaparissāvitena udakena pāde dhovitvā gandhatelena makkhetvā attano upāhanā omuñcitvā papphoṭetvā
atk-s0513a4:133_6: imā upāhanā āruyha chattaṃ matthake katvā gacchathā”ti chattupāhanaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a4:133_7: So assa anuggahatthāya taṃ gahetvā pasādasaṃvaḍḍhanatthaṃ passantassevassa uppatitvā gandhamādanameva agamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:133_8: Bodhisattopi taṃ disvā ativiya pasannacitto paṭṭanaṃ gantvā nāvaṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0513a4:133_9: Athassa mahāsamuddaṃ paṭipannassa sattame divase nāvā vivaraṃ adāsi,
atk-s0513a4:133_11: Mahājano maraṇabhayabhīto attano attano devatā namassitvā mahāviravaṃ viravi.
atk-s0513a4:133_12: Mahāsatto ekaṃ upaṭṭhākaṃ gahetvā sakalasarīraṃ telena makkhetvā sappinā saddhiṃ sakkharacuṇṇaṃ yāvadatthaṃ
atk-s0513a4:133_13: khāditvā tampi khādāpetvā tena saddhiṃ kūpakayaṭṭhimatthakaṃ āruyha “imāya disāya amhākaṃ nagara”nti
atk-s0513a4:133_14: disaṃ vavatthapetvā macchakacchapaparipanthato attānaṃ mocento tena saddhiṃ usabhamattaṃ atikkamitvā pati.
atk-s0513a4:133_16: Mahāsatto pana upaṭṭhākena saddhiṃ samuddaṃ tarituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0513a4:133_18: So tasmimpi kāle loṇodakena mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā uposathiko ahosiyeva.
atk-s0513a4:134_0: Tadā pana catūhi lokapālehi maṇimekhalā nāma devadhītā “sace samudde nāvāya bhinnāya tisaraṇagatā vā
atk-s0513a4:134_1: sīlasampannā vā mātāpitupaṭṭhākā vā manussā dukkhappattā honti,
atk-s0513a4:134_2: te rakkheyyāsī”ti samudde ārakkhaṇatthāya ṭhapitā hoti.
atk-s0513a4:134_3: Sā attano issariyena sattāhamanubhavitvā pamajjitvā sattame divase samuddaṃ olokentī sīlācārasaṃyuttaṃ
atk-s0513a4:134_4: saṅkhabrāhmaṇaṃ disvā “imassa sattamo divaso samudde patitassa,
atk-s0513a4:134_5: sace so marissati ativiya gārayhā me bhavissatī”ti saṃviggamānahadayā hutvā ekaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ nānaggarasabhojanassa
atk-s0513a4:134_6: pūretvā vātavegena tattha gantvā tassa purato ākāse ṭhatvā “brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0513a4:134_11: Athassa upaṭṭhāko pacchato āgato devataṃ adisvā saddameva sutvā “ayaṃ brāhmaṇo pakatisukhumālo sattāhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:136_0: “Bahussuto sutadhammosi saṅkha, diṭṭhā tayā samaṇabrāhmaṇā ca;
atk-s0513a4:137_0: Athakkhaṇe dassayase vilāpaṃ, añño nu ko te paṭimantako mayā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:138_0: Tattha sutadhammosīti dhammopi tayā dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ santike suto asi.
atk-s0513a4:138_1: Diṭṭhā tayāti tesaṃ paccaye dentena veyyāvaccaṃ karontena dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇā ca tayā diṭṭhā.
atk-s0513a4:138_2: Evaṃ akaronto hi passantopi te na passatiyeva.
atk-s0513a4:138_3: Athakkhaṇeti atha akkhaṇe sallapantassa kassaci abhāvena vacanassa anokāse.
atk-s0513a4:138_5: Paṭimantakoti mayā añño ko tava paṭimantako paṭivacanadāyako,
atk-s0513a4:139_0: So tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “imassa devatā na paññāyati maññe”ti cintetvā “samma,
atk-s0513a4:139_2: atthi pana me añño paṭimantako”ti vatvā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:142_0: ‘Bhuñjassu bhattaṃ’ iti maṃ vadeti, saddhāvittā, tamahaṃ noti brūmī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:143_8: Tamahaṃ notīti tamahaṃ devataṃ uposathikattā paṭikkhipanto noti brūmi,
atk-s0513a4:146_0: “Etādisaṃ brāhmaṇa disvāna yakkhaṃ, puccheyya poso sukhamāsisāno;
atk-s0513a4:147_0: Uṭṭhehi naṃ pañjalikābhipuccha, devī nusi tvaṃ uda mānusī nū”ti.
atk-s0513a4:148_0: Tattha sukhamāsisānoti etādisaṃ yakkhaṃ disvā attano sukhaṃ āsīsanto paṇḍito puriso “amhākaṃ sukhaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0513a4:148_4: Uda mānusīti udāhu mahiddhikā mānusī tvanti.
atk-s0513a4:149_0: Bodhisatto “yuttaṃ kathesī”ti taṃ pucchanto catutthaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:151_0: “Yaṃ tvaṃ sukhenābhisamekkhase maṃ, bhuñjassu bhattaṃ iti maṃ vadesi;
atk-s0513a4:152_0: Pucchāmi taṃ nāri mahānubhāve, devī nusi tvaṃ uda mānusī nū”ti.
atk-s0513a4:153_0: Tattha yaṃ tvanti yasmā tvaṃ sukhena maṃ abhisamekkhase,
atk-s0513a4:153_2: Pucchāmi tanti tena kāraṇena taṃ pucchāmi.
atk-s0513a4:157_0: Anukampikā no ca paduṭṭhacittā, taveva atthāya idhāgatāsmi.
atk-s0513a4:160_0: Sabbassa tyāhaṃ paṭipādayāmi, yaṃ kiñci tuyhaṃ manasābhipatthita”nti.
atk-s0513a4:161_1: Nānāvividhānīti bahūni ca anekappakārāni ca hatthiyānaassayānādīni atthi.
atk-s0513a4:161_2: Sabbassa tyāhanti tassa annapānādino sabbassa sāmikaṃ katvā taṃ te annapānādiṃ paṭipādayāmi dadāmi.
atk-s0513a4:161_3: Yaṃ kiñcīti aññampi yaṃ kiñci manasā icchitaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:162_0: Taṃ sutvā mahāsatto “ayaṃ devadhītā samuddapiṭṭhe mayhaṃ ‘idañcidañca dammī’ti vadati,
atk-s0513a4:162_1: kiṃ nu kho esā mayā katena puññakammena dātukāmā,
atk-s0513a4:162_3: pucchissāmi tāva na”nti cintetvā pucchanto sattamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:164_0: “Yaṃ kiñci yiṭṭhañca hutañca mayhaṃ, sabbassa no issarā tvaṃ sugatte;
atk-s0513a4:165_0: Sussoṇi subbhamu suvilaggamajjhe, kissa me kammassa ayaṃ vipāko”ti.
atk-s0513a4:166_2: Sabbassa no issarā tvanti tassa amhākaṃ puññakammassa tvaṃ issarā,
atk-s0513a4:166_8: Kissa meti mayā katakammesu katarakammassa ayaṃ vipāko,
atk-s0513a4:167_0: Taṃ sutvā devadhītā “ayaṃ brāhmaṇo ‘yaṃ tena kusalaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0513a4:167_1: taṃ kammaṃ na jānātī’ti aññāya pucchati maññe,
atk-s0513a4:167_2: kathayissāmi dānissā”ti taṃ kathentī aṭṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:169_0: “Ghamme pathe brāhmaṇa ekabhikkhuṃ, ugghaṭṭapādaṃ tasitaṃ kilantaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:170_0: Paṭipādayī saṅkha upāhanāni, sā dakkhiṇā kāmaduhā tavajjā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:172_0: Taṃ sutvā mahāsatto “evarūpepi nāma appatiṭṭhe mahāsamudde mayā dinnaupāhanadānaṃ mama sabbakāmadadaṃ jātaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:172_1: aho sudinnaṃ me paccekabuddhassa dāna”nti tuṭṭhacitto navamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:175_0: Aññassa yānassa na hettha bhūmi, ajjeva maṃ moḷiniṃ pāpayassū”ti.
atk-s0513a4:176_1: evaṃ sante mayhaṃ ekaṃ nāvaṃ māpehi,
atk-s0513a4:176_4: sā hotu nāvā bahūhi susibbitehi phalakehi upapannā,
atk-s0513a4:176_6: erakena sammā gahetvā gacchantena vātena yuttā,
atk-s0513a4:176_7: ṭhapetvā dibbanāvaṃ aññassa yānassa ettha bhūmi natthi,
atk-s0513a4:176_8: tāya pana dibbanāvāya ajjeva maṃ moḷininagaraṃ pāpayassūti.
atk-s0513a4:177_0: Devadhītā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā tuṭṭhacittā sattaratanamayaṃ nāvaṃ māpesi.
atk-s0513a4:177_1: Sā dīghato aṭṭhausabhā ahosi vitthārato catuusabhā,
atk-s0513a4:177_4: sovaṇṇamayāni yottāni rajatamayāni pattāni sovaṇṇamayāni ca phiyārittāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:177_5: Devatā taṃ nāvaṃ sattannaṃ ratanānaṃ pūretvā brāhmaṇaṃ āliṅgitvā alaṅkatanāvāya āropesi,
atk-s0513a4:177_7: Brāhmaṇo attanā katakalyāṇato tassa pattiṃ adāsi,
atk-s0513a4:177_9: Tadā devatā tampi āliṅgitvā nāvāya patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:177_10: Atha naṃ nāvaṃ moḷininagaraṃ netvā brāhmaṇassa ghare dhanaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā attano vasanaṭṭhānameva agamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:179_0: “Sā tattha vittā sumanā patītā, nāvaṃ sucittaṃ abhinimminitvā;
atk-s0513a4:180_0: Ādāya saṅkhaṃ purisena saddhiṃ, upānayī nagaraṃ sādhuramma”nti. –
atk-s0513a4:182_1: sā devatā tattha samuddamajjhe tassa vacanaṃ sutvā vittisaṅkhātāya pītiyā samannāgatattā vittā.
atk-s0513a4:182_2: Sumanāti sundaramanā pāmojjena patītacittā hutvā vicitranāvaṃ nimminitvā brāhmaṇaṃ paricārakena saddhiṃ
atk-s0513a4:183_0: Brāhmaṇopi yāvajīvaṃ aparimitadhanaṃ gehaṃ ajjhāvasanto dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ rakkhitvā jīvitapariyosāne sapariso devanagaraṃ paripūresi.
atk-s0513a4:184_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a4:185_0: Tadā devadhītā uppalavaṇṇā ahosi, upaṭṭhākapuriso ānando, saṅkhabrāhmaṇo pana ahameva ahosinti.
atk-s0513a4:189_0: Yo te imaṃ visālakkhinti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ kodhanaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:189_1: So kira bhikkhu niyyānike buddhasāsane pabbajitvāpi kodhaṃ niggahetuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0513a4:189_3: appampi vutto samāno abhisajji kuppi byāpajji patiṭṭhayi.
atk-s0513a4:189_4: Satthā tassa kodhanabhāvaṃ sutvā pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ kodhano”ti pucchitvā “saccaṃ bhante”ti vutte “bhikkhu kodho nāma vāretabbo,
atk-s0513a4:189_5: evarūpo hi idhaloke ca paraloke ca anatthakārako,
atk-s0513a4:189_6: tvaṃ nikkodhassa buddhassa sāsane pabbajitvā kasmā kujjhasi,
atk-s0513a4:189_7: porāṇakapaṇḍitā bāhirasāsane pabbajitvāpi kodhaṃ na kariṃsū”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:190_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente aññatarasmiṃ kāsinigame eko brāhmaṇo aḍḍho mahaddhano mahābhogo aputtako ahosi,
atk-s0513a4:190_2: Tadā bodhisatto brahmalokā cavitvā tassā kucchiyaṃ nibbatti,
atk-s0513a4:190_4: Tassa vayappattakāle takkasilaṃ gantvā sabbasippāni uggaṇhitvā paccāgatassa anicchantasseva mātāpitaro samānajātikā kulā kumārikaṃ ānesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:190_7: Ubhinnaṃ panetesaṃ kilesasamudācāro nāma na bhūtapubbo,
atk-s0513a4:191_0: Athāparabhāge mahāsatto mātāpitūsu kālakatesu tesaṃ sarīrakiccaṃ katvā taṃ pakkositvā “bhadde,
atk-s0513a4:191_1: tvaṃ imaṃ asītikoṭidhanaṃ gahetvā sukhena jīvāhī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:191_5: himavantapadesaṃ pavisitvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā attano patiṭṭhaṃ karissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:191_6: “Kiṃ pana ayyaputta pabbajjā nāma purisānaññeva vaṭṭatī”ti?
atk-s0513a4:191_9: “Tena hi ahaṃ tumhehi chaṭṭitakheḷaṃ na gaṇhissāmi,
atk-s0513a4:191_13: Te ubhopi mahādānaṃ datvā nikkhamitvā ramaṇīye bhūmibhāge assamaṃ katvā pabbajitvā uñchācariyāya phalāphalehi
atk-s0513a4:191_15: jhānaṃ pana nesaṃ na tāva uppajjati.
atk-s0513a4:191_16: Te tattha pabbajjāsukheneva dasa saṃvacchare vasitvā loṇambilasevanatthāya janapadacārikaṃ carantā anupubbena bārāṇasiṃ patvā rājuyyāne vasiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:192_0: Athekadivasaṃ rājā uyyānapālaṃ paṇṇākāraṃ ādāya āgataṃ disvā “uyyānakīḷikaṃ kīḷissāma,
atk-s0513a4:192_1: uyyānaṃ sodhehī”ti vatvā tena sodhitaṃ sajjitaṃ uyyānaṃ mahantena parivārena agamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:192_2: Tasmiṃ khaṇe te ubhopi janā uyyānassa ekapasse pabbajjāsukhena vītināmetvā nisinnā honti.
atk-s0513a4:192_3: Atha rājā uyyāne vicaranto te ubhopi nisinnake disvā paramapāsādikaṃ uttamarūpadharaṃ paribbājikaṃ olokento paṭibaddhacitto ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:192_5: ayaṃ paribbājikā imassa kiṃ hotī”ti bodhisattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “pabbajita ayaṃ te paribbājikā kiṃ hotī”ti pucchi. Mahārāja,
atk-s0513a4:192_8: apica kho pana me gihikāle pādaparicārikā ahosīti.
atk-s0513a4:192_9: Taṃ sutvā rājā “ayaṃ kiretassa kiñci na hoti,
atk-s0513a4:192_10: apica kho pana gihikāle pādaparicārikā kirassa ahosi,
atk-s0513a4:192_13: pariggaṇhissāmi tāva na”nti cintetvā upasaṅkamitvā paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:195_0: Ādāya balā gaccheyya, kiṃ nu kayirāsi brāhmaṇā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:196_2: Kiṃ nu kayirāsīti tassa tvaṃ brāhmaṇa kiṃ kareyyāsīti?
atk-s0513a4:197_0: Athassa kathaṃ sutvā mahāsatto dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:199_0: “Uppajje me na mucceyya, na me mucceyya jīvato;
atk-s0513a4:201_1: sace imaṃ gahetvā gacchante kismiñci mama abbhantare kopo uppajjeyya,
atk-s0513a4:201_2: so me anto uppajjitvā na mucceyya,
atk-s0513a4:201_6: atha kho yathā uppannaṃ rajaṃ vipulā meghavuṭṭhi khippaṃ nivāreti,
atk-s0513a4:201_7: tathā khippameva naṃ mettābhāvanāya niggahetvā vāressāmīti.
atk-s0513a4:202_1: Rājā panassa kathaṃ sutvāpi andhabālatāya paṭibaddhaṃ attano cittaṃ nivāretuṃ asakkonto aññataraṃ amaccaṃ
atk-s0513a4:202_4: ayutta”ntiādīni vatvā paridevamānaṃyeva naṃ ādāya pāyāsi.
atk-s0513a4:202_5: Bodhisatto tassā paridevanasaddaṃ sutvā ekavāraṃ oloketvā puna na olokesi.
atk-s0513a4:202_7: Sopi bārāṇasirājā uyyāne papañcaṃ akatvāva sīghataraṃ gantvā taṃ paribbājikaṃ pakkosāpetvā mahantena yasena nimantesi.
atk-s0513a4:202_8: Sā yasassa aguṇaṃ pabbajāya eva guṇaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:202_9: Rājā kenaci pariyāyena tassā manaṃ alabhanto taṃ ekasmiṃ gabbhe kāretvā cintesi “ayaṃ paribbājikā evarūpaṃ yasaṃ na icchati,
atk-s0513a4:202_10: sopi tāpaso evarūpaṃ mātugāmaṃ gahetvā gacchante kujjhitvā olokitamattampi na akāsi,
atk-s0513a4:202_13: gacchāmi tāva jānāmi kiṃ karonto nisinno”ti saṇṭhātuṃ asakkonto uyyānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:202_15: Rājā mandaparivārova padasaddaṃ akaronto saṇikaṃ upasaṅkami.
atk-s0513a4:202_17: Rājā “ayaṃ kujjhitvā mayā saddhiṃ na sallapatī”ti maññamāno “ayaṃ kūṭatāpaso ‘kodhassa uppajjituṃ na dassāmi,
atk-s0513a4:202_18: uppannampi naṃ khippameva niggaṇhissāmī’ti paṭhamameva gajjitvā idāni kodhena thaddho hutvā mayā saddhiṃ na sallapatī”ti saññāya tatiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:206_0: Tattha balamhiva apassitoti balanissito viya hutvā.
atk-s0513a4:207_0: Taṃ sutvā mahāsatto “ayaṃ rājā kodhavasena maṃ nālapatīti maññati,
atk-s0513a4:207_1: kathessāmi dānissa uppannassa kodhassa vasaṃ agatabhāva”nti cintetvā catutthaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:209_0: “Uppajji me na muccittha, na me muccittha jīvato;
atk-s0513a4:211_5: iti so mama jīvato na muccittheva,
atk-s0513a4:211_6: rajaṃ vipulā vuṭṭhi viya khippameva naṃ nivāresinti.
atk-s0513a4:212_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā “kiṃ nu kho esa kopameva sandhāya vadati,
atk-s0513a4:212_1: udāhu aññaṃ kiñci sippaṃ sandhāya kathesi,
atk-s0513a4:212_2: pucchissāmi tāva na”nti cintetvā pucchanto pañcamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:214_0: “Kiṃ te uppajji no mucci, kiṃ te na mucci jīvato;
atk-s0513a4:215_0: Rajaṃva vipulā vuṭṭhi, katamaṃ taṃ nivārayī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:216_0: Tattha kiṃ te uppajji no muccīti kiṃ tava uppajji ceva na mucci ca.
atk-s0513a4:217_3: uppannañca naṃ mettābhāvanāya nivāresi”nti kodhe ādīnavaṃ pakāsento –
atk-s0513a4:219_0: “Yamhi jāte na passati, ajāte sādhu passati;
atk-s0513a4:220_0: So me uppajji no mucci, kodho dummedhagocaro.
atk-s0513a4:223_0: So me uppajji no mucci, kodho dummedhagocaro.
atk-s0513a4:226_0: So me uppajji no mucci, kodho dummedhagocaro.
atk-s0513a4:229_0: Sa bhīmaseno balavā pamaddī, kodho mahārāja na me amuccatha.
atk-s0513a4:232_0: Tameva kaṭṭhaṃ ḍahati, yasmā so jāyate gini.
atk-s0513a4:235_0: Sārambhā jāyate kodho, sopi teneva ḍayhati.
atk-s0513a4:241_0: Āpūrati tassa yaso, sukkapakkheva candimā”ti. – imā gāthā āha;
atk-s0513a4:242_0: Tattha na passatīti attatthampi na passati,
atk-s0513a4:242_2: Sādhu passatīti attatthaṃ paratthaṃ ubhayatthampi sādhu passati.
atk-s0513a4:242_5: Sadatthanti attano atthabhūtaṃ atthato ceva dhammato ca vuddhiṃ.
atk-s0513a4:242_6: Parakkareti vipulampi atthaṃ uppannaṃ parato kāreti, apanetha,
atk-s0513a4:242_8: Sa bhīmasenoti so kodho bhīmāya bhayajananiyā mahatiyā kilesasenāya samannāgato.
atk-s0513a4:242_9: Pamaddīti attano balavabhāvena uḷārepi satte gahetvā attano vase karaṇena maddanasamattho.
atk-s0513a4:242_10: Na me amuccathāti mama santikā mokkhaṃ na labhati,
atk-s0513a4:242_11: hadaye vā pana me khīraṃ viya muhuttaṃ dadhibhāvena na patiṭṭhahitthātipi attho.
atk-s0513a4:243_6: Sārambhā jāyateti ahaṃ tvanti ākaḍḍhanavikaḍḍhanaṃ karontassa karaṇuttariyalakkhaṇā sārambhā araṇīmatthanā viya pāvako kodho jāyati.
atk-s0513a4:243_7: Sopi tenevāti sopi bālo teneva kodhena kaṭṭhaṃ viya agginā ḍayhati.
atk-s0513a4:243_9: Tassāti tassa adhivāsanakhantiyā samannāgatassa puggalassa sukkapakkhe cando viya laddho yaso aparāparaṃ āpūratīti.
atk-s0513a4:244_0: Rājā mahāsattassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā tuṭṭho ekaṃ amaccaṃ āṇāpetvā paribbājikaṃ āharāpetvā “bhante nikkodhatāpasa,
atk-s0513a4:244_1: ubhopi tumhe pabbajjāsukhena vītināmentā idheva uyyāne vasatha,
atk-s0513a4:244_2: ahaṃ vo dhammikaṃ rakkhāvaraṇaguttiṃ karissāmī”ti vatvā khamāpetvā vanditvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a4:244_5: Bodhisatto tassā kālakatāya himavantaṃ pavisitvā abhiññā ca samāpattiyo ca nibbattetvā cattāro brahmavihāre bhāvetvā brahmalokaparāyaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:245_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a4:246_0: Tadā paribbājikā rāhulamātā ahosi, rājā ānando, paribbājako pana ahameva ahosinti.
atk-s0513a4:250_0: Sattāhamevāhanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:250_2: Satthā taṃ bhikkhuṃ “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu ukkaṇṭhitosī”ti pucchitvā “saccaṃ bhante”ti vutte “bhikkhu
atk-s0513a4:250_3: porāṇakapaṇḍitā anuppanne buddhe bāhirakapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā atirekapaññāsavassāni anabhiratā brahmacariyaṃ
atk-s0513a4:250_4: carantā hirottappabhedabhayena attano ukkaṇṭhitabhāvaṃ na kassaci kathesuṃ,
atk-s0513a4:250_5: tvaṃ kasmā evarūpe niyyānikasāsane pabbajitvā mādisassa garuno buddhassa sammukhe ṭhatvā catuparisamajjhe ukkaṇṭhitabhāvaṃ āvi karosi,
atk-s0513a4:250_6: kimatthaṃ attano hirottappaṃ na rakkhasī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:251_0: Atīte vaṃsaraṭṭhe kosambiyaṃ nāma nagare kosambako nāma rājā rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a4:251_1: Tadā aññatarasmiṃ nigame dve brāhmaṇā asītikoṭidhanavibhavā aññamaññaṃ piyasahāyakā kāmesu dosaṃ disvā
atk-s0513a4:251_2: mahādānaṃ pavattetvā ubhopi kāme pahāya mahājanassa rodantassa paridevantassa nikkhamitvā himavantapadese
atk-s0513a4:251_3: assamapadaṃ katvā pabbajitvā uñchācariyāya vanamūlaphalāphalena yāpentā paṇṇāsa vassāni vasiṃsu,
atk-s0513a4:251_5: Te paṇṇāsavassaccayena loṇambilasevanatthāya janapadaṃ carantā kāsiraṭṭhaṃ sampāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:251_6: Tatra aññatarasmiṃ nigamagāme dīpāyanatāpasassa gihisahāyo maṇḍabyo nāma atthi,
atk-s0513a4:251_8: So te disvāva attamano paṇṇasālaṃ kāretvā ubhopi te catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahi.
atk-s0513a4:251_9: Te tattha tīṇi cattāri vassāni vasitvā taṃ āpucchitvā cārikaṃ carantā bārāṇasiṃ patvā atimuttakasusāne vasiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:251_10: Tattha dīpāyano yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā puna tasseva sahāyassa santikaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a4:252_0: Athekadivasaṃ eko coro antonagare corikaṃ katvā dhanasāraṃ ādāya nikkhanto “coro”ti ñatvā paṭibuddhehi
atk-s0513a4:252_1: gharassāmikehi ceva ārakkhamanussehi ca anubaddho niddhamanena nikkhamitvā vegena susānaṃ pavisitvā tāpasassa
atk-s0513a4:252_4: tvaṃ rattiṃ corikaṃ katvā divā tāpasarūpena carasī”ti tajjetvā pothetvā taṃ ādāya netvā rañño dassayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:252_7: Te taṃ susānaṃ netvā khadirasūlaṃ āropayiṃsu,
atk-s0513a4:252_13: Tāpaso “kiṃ nu kho me pubbakamma”nti olokesi,
atk-s0513a4:252_18: So kira purimabhave vaḍḍhakiputto hutvā pitu rukkhatacchanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā ekaṃ makkhikaṃ gahetvā koviḷārasalākāya sūle viya vijjhi.
atk-s0513a4:252_19: Tamenaṃ pāpakammaṃ imaṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a4:252_20: So “na sakkā ito pāpā mayā muccitu”nti ñatvā rājapurise āha “sace maṃ sūle uttāsetukāmattha,
atk-s0513a4:252_22: Te tathā katvā taṃ sūle uttāsetvā ārakkhaṃ datvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:253_0: Ārakkhakā paṭicchannā hutvā tassa santikaṃ āgacchante olokenti.
atk-s0513a4:253_1: Tadā dīpāyano “ciradiṭṭho me sahāyo”ti maṇḍabyassa santikaṃ āgacchanto “sūle uttāsito”ti taṃ divasaññeva
atk-s0513a4:253_2: antarāmagge sutvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito “kiṃ samma kārakosī”ti pucchitvā “akārakomhī”ti vutte
atk-s0513a4:253_7: na rañño upari mayhaṃ manopadoso atthī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:253_8: “Evaṃ sante tādisassa sīlavato chāyā mayhaṃ sukhā”ti vatvā dīpāyano sūlaṃ nissāya nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:253_9: Athassa sarīre maṇḍabyassa sarīrato lohitabindūni patiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:253_10: Tāni suvaṇṇavaṇṇasarīre patitapatitāni sussitvā kāḷakāni uppajjiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:253_11: Tato paṭṭhāyeva so kaṇhadīpāyano nāma ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:254_0: Punadivase ārakkhapurisā āgantvā taṃ pavattiṃ rañño ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:254_1: Rājā “anisāmetvāva me kata”nti vegena tattha gantvā “pabbajita,
atk-s0513a4:254_2: kasmā sūlaṃ nissāya nisinnosī”ti dīpāyanaṃ pucchi. Mahārāja,
atk-s0513a4:254_5: imassa kārakabhāvaṃ vā akārakabhāvaṃ vā ñatvā evaṃ kāresīti?
atk-s0513a4:254_9: alaso gihī kāmabhogī na sādhū”tiādīni vatvā dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0513a4:254_10: Rājā maṇḍabyassa niddosabhāvaṃ ñatvā “sūlaṃ harathā”ti āṇāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:254_14: ahaṃ pubbe katakammadosena evarūpaṃ bhayaṃ sampatto,
atk-s0513a4:254_15: mama sarīrato sūlaṃ harituṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0513a4:254_17: kakacaṃ āharāpetvā imaṃ sūlaṃ cammasamaṃ chindāpehī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:254_20: Tadā kira so sukhumaṃ koviḷārasalākaṃ gahetvā makkhikāya vaccamaggaṃ pavesesi,
atk-s0513a4:254_22: So tena kāraṇena amaritvā attano āyukkhayeneva mari,
atk-s0513a4:254_24: Rājā tāpase vanditvā khamāpetvā ubhopi uyyāne vasāpento paṭijaggi,
atk-s0513a4:254_25: tato paṭṭhāya maṇḍabyo āṇimaṇḍabyo nāma jāto.
atk-s0513a4:254_27: dīpāyano pana tassa vaṇaṃ phāsukaṃ katvā attano gihisahāyamaṇḍabyassa santikameva gato.
atk-s0513a4:255_0: Taṃ paṇṇasālaṃ pavisantaṃ disvā eko puriso sahāyassa ārocesi.
atk-s0513a4:255_1: So sutvāva tuṭṭhacitto saputtadāro bahū gandhamālatelaphāṇitādīni ādāya taṃ paṇṇasālaṃ gantvā dīpāyanaṃ
atk-s0513a4:255_2: vanditvā pāde dhovitvā telena makkhetvā pānakaṃ pāyetvā āṇimaṇḍabyassa pavattiṃ suṇanto nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:255_3: Athassa putto yaññadattakumāro nāma caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ geṇḍukena kīḷi,
atk-s0513a4:255_5: Kumārassa bhūmiyaṃ pahaṭageṇḍuko gantvā vammikabile āsīvisassa matthake pati.
atk-s0513a4:255_7: Atha naṃ kuddho āsīviso hatthe ḍaṃsi.
atk-s0513a4:255_9: Athassa mātāpitaro sappena ḍaṭṭhabhāvaṃ ñatvā kumārakaṃ ukkhipitvā tāpasassa santikaṃ ānetvā pādamūle nipajjāpetvā “bhante,
atk-s0513a4:255_10: pabbajitā nāma osadhaṃ vā parittaṃ vā jānanti,
atk-s0513a4:255_15: imasmiṃ kumārake mettaṃ katvā saccakiriyaṃ karothā”ti vutte tāpaso “sādhu,
atk-s0513a4:255_16: saccakiriyaṃ karissāmī”ti vatvā yaññadattassa sīse hatthaṃ ṭhapetvā paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:258_0: Athāparaṃ yaṃ caritaṃ mamedaṃ, vassāni paññāsa samādhikāni;
atk-s0513a4:259_0: Akāmakovāpi ahaṃ carāmi, etena saccena suvatthi hotu;
atk-s0513a4:261_0: Tattha athāparaṃ yaṃ caritanti tasmā sattāhā uttari yaṃ mama brahmacariyaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:261_2: Etena saccena suvatthi hotūti sace atirekapaṇṇāsavassāni anabhirativāsaṃ vasantena mayā kassaci anārocitabhāvo saccaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:262_0: Athassa saha saccakiriyāya yaññadattassa thanappadesato uddhaṃ visaṃ bhassitvā pathaviṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a4:262_1: Kumāro akkhīni ummīletvā mātāpitaro oloketvā “ammatātā”ti vatvā parivattitvā nipajji.
atk-s0513a4:262_5: So “ahampi saccakiriyaṃ karissāmī”ti puttassa ure hatthaṃ ṭhapetvā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:264_0: “Yasmā dānaṃ nābhinandiṃ kadāci, disvānahaṃ atithiṃ vāsakāle;
atk-s0513a4:265_0: Na cāpi me appiyataṃ aveduṃ, bahussutā samaṇabrāhmaṇā ca;
atk-s0513a4:266_0: Akāmakovāpi ahaṃ dadāmi, etena saccena suvatthi hotu;
atk-s0513a4:268_1: Na cāpi me appiyataṃ avedunti bahussutāpi samaṇabrāhmaṇā “ayaṃ neva dānaṃ abhinandati na amhe”ti imaṃ mama appiyabhāvaṃ neva jāniṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:268_3: Etena saccenāti sace ahaṃ dānaṃ dadamāno vipākaṃ asaddahitvā attano anicchāya dammi,
atk-s0513a4:269_0: Evaṃ tassa saccakiriyāya saha kaṭito uddhaṃ visaṃ bhassitvā pathaviṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a4:269_5: tvaṃ idāni saccakiriyaṃ katvā puttassa uṭṭhāya gamanabhāvaṃ karohī”ti. “Sāmi,
atk-s0513a4:269_7: tava pana santike kathetuṃ na sakkomī”ti. “Bhadde,
atk-s0513a4:269_8: yathā tathā me puttaṃ arogaṃ karohī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:269_9: Sā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā saccaṃ karontī tatiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:271_0: “Āsīviso tāta pahūtatejo, yo taṃ aḍaṃsī bilarā udicca;
atk-s0513a4:272_0: Tasmiñca me appiyatāya ajja, pitarañca te natthi koci viseso;
atk-s0513a4:273_0: Etena saccena suvatthi hotu, hataṃ visaṃ jīvatu yaññadatto”ti.
atk-s0513a4:274_9: yaññadatta tasmiñca āsīvise tava pitari ca appiyabhāvena mayhaṃ koci viseso natthi.
atk-s0513a4:274_10: Tañca pana appiyabhāvaṃ ṭhapetvā ajja mayā koci jānāpitapubbo nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a4:275_0: Saha ca saccakiriyāya sabbaṃ visaṃ bhassitvā pathaviṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a4:275_1: Yaññadatto nibbisena sarīrena uṭṭhāya kīḷituṃ āraddho.
atk-s0513a4:275_2: Evaṃ putte uṭṭhite maṇḍabyo dīpāyanassa ajjhāsayaṃ pucchanto catutthaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:278_0: Dīpāyana kissa jigucchamāno, akāmako carasi brahmacariya”nti.
atk-s0513a4:279_1: ye keci khattiyādayo kāme pahāya idha loke pabbajanti,
atk-s0513a4:279_2: te aññatra kaṇhā bhavantaṃ kaṇhaṃ ṭhapetvā aññe akāmarūpā nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a4:279_5: tathā tesaṃ damitattā dantā hutvā abhiratāva brahmacariyaṃ caranti,
atk-s0513a4:279_7: kiṃkāraṇā tapaṃ jigucchamāno akāmako hutvā brahmacariyaṃ carasi,
atk-s0513a4:280_0: Athassa so kāraṇaṃ kathento pañcamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:282_0: “Saddhāya nikkhamma punaṃ nivatto, so eḷamūgova bālo vatāyaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:283_0: Etassa vādassa jigucchamāno, akāmako carāmi brahmacariyaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:284_0: Viññuppasatthañca satañca ṭhānaṃ, evampahaṃ puññakaro bhavāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:285_1: kaṇho kammañca phalañca saddahitvā tāva mahantaṃ vibhavaṃ pahāya agārā nikkhamitvā yaṃ jahi,
atk-s0513a4:285_3: So ayaṃ eḷamūgo gāmadārako viya bālo vatāti imaṃ vādaṃ jigucchamāno ahaṃ attano hirottappabhedabhayena anicchamānopi brahmacariyaṃ carāmi.
atk-s0513a4:285_4: Kiñca bhiyyo pabbajjāpuññañca nāmetaṃ viññūhi buddhādīhi pasatthaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:285_6: Evaṃ imināpi kāraṇena ahaṃ puññakaro bhavāmi,
atk-s0513a4:286_0: Evaṃ so attano ajjhāsayaṃ kathetvā puna maṇḍabyaṃ pucchanto chaṭṭhaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:288_0: “Samaṇe tuvaṃ brāhmaṇe addhike ca, santappayāsi annapānena bhikkhaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:289_0: Opānabhūtaṃva gharaṃ tava yidaṃ, annena pānena upetarūpaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:290_0: Atha kissa vādassa jigucchamāno, akāmako dānamimaṃ dadāsī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:291_0: Tattha bhikkhanti bhikkhāya carantānaṃ bhikkhañca sampādetvā dadāsi.
atk-s0513a4:292_0: Tato maṇḍabyo attano ajjhāsayaṃ kathento sattamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:294_0: “Pitaro ca me āsuṃ pitāmahā ca, saddhā ahuṃ dānapatī vadaññū;
atk-s0513a4:295_0: Taṃ kullavattaṃ anuvattamāno, māhaṃ kule antimagandhano ahuṃ;
atk-s0513a4:296_0: Etassa vādassa jigucchamāno, akāmako dānamimaṃ dadāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:297_2: Ahunti saddhā hutvā tato uttari dānajeṭṭhakā ceva “detha karothā”ti vuttavacanassa atthajānanakā ca ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:297_5: Māhaṃ kule antimagandhano ahunti “ahaṃ attano kule sabbapacchimako ceva kulapalāpo ca mā ahu”nti sallakkhetvā
atk-s0513a4:297_6: etaṃ “kulaantimo kulapalāpo”ti vādaṃ jigucchamāno dānaṃ anicchantopi idaṃ dānaṃ dadāmīti dīpeti.
atk-s0513a4:298_0: Evañca pana vatvā maṇḍabyo attano bhariyaṃ pucchamāno aṭṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:300_0: “Dahariṃ kumāriṃ asamatthapaññaṃ, yaṃ tānayiṃ ñātikulā sugatte;
atk-s0513a4:301_0: Na cāpi me appiyataṃ avedi, aññatra kāmā paricārayantā;
atk-s0513a4:302_0: Atha kena vaṇṇena mayā te bhoti, saṃvāsadhammo ahu evarūpo”ti.
atk-s0513a4:303_0: Tattha asamatthapaññanti kuṭumbaṃ vicāretuṃ appaṭibalapaññaṃ atitaruṇiññeva samānaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:303_2: ahaṃ daharimeva samānaṃ taṃ ñātikulato ānesinti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0513a4:303_3: Aññatra kāmā paricārayantāti ettakaṃ kālaṃ vinā kāmena anicchāya maṃ paricārayantāpi attano appiyataṃ maṃ na jānāpesi,
atk-s0513a4:303_7: Evarūpoti āsīvisasamānapaṭikūlabhāvena mayā saddhiṃ tava saṃvāsadhammo evarūpo piyasaṃvāso viya kathaṃ jātoti.
atk-s0513a4:306_0: “Ārā dūre nayidha kadāci atthi, paramparā nāma kule imasmiṃ;
atk-s0513a4:307_0: Taṃ kullavattaṃ anuvattamānā, māhaṃ kule antimagandhinī ahuṃ;
atk-s0513a4:308_0: Etassa vādassa jigucchamānā, akāmikā paddhacarāmhi tuyha”nti.
atk-s0513a4:309_6: imasmiṃ amhākaṃ ñātikule dūrato paṭṭhāya yāva sattamā kulaparivaṭṭā purisaparamparā nāma na kadāci atthi,
atk-s0513a4:309_7: ekitthiyāpi sāmikaṃ chaḍḍetvā añño puriso gahitapubbo nāma natthīti.
atk-s0513a4:309_8: Taṃ kullavattanti ahampi taṃ kulavattaṃ kulapaveṇiṃ anuvattamānā attano kule pacchimikā palālabhūtā mā
atk-s0513a4:309_9: ahunti sallakkhetvā etaṃ kulaantimā kulagandhinīti vādaṃ jigucchamānā akāmikāpi tuyhaṃ paddhacarāmhi
atk-s0513a4:310_0: Evañca pana vatvā “mayā sāmikassa santike abhāsitapubbaṃ guyhaṃ bhāsitaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:310_2: amhākaṃ kulūpakatāpasassa sammukheyeva khamāpessāmī”ti cintetvā khamāpentī dasamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:312_0: “Maṇḍabya bhāsiṃ yamabhāsaneyyaṃ, taṃ khamyataṃ puttakahetu majja;
atk-s0513a4:313_0: Puttapemā na idha paratthi kiñci, so no ayaṃ jīvati yaññadatto”ti.
atk-s0513a4:314_1: Puttakahetu majjāti taṃ mama bhāsitaṃ ajja imassa puttassa hetu khamayatu.
atk-s0513a4:314_2: So no ayanti yassa puttassa kāraṇā mayā etaṃ bhāsitaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:315_2: ito pana paṭṭhāya mā pharusacittā ahosi,
atk-s0513a4:315_3: ahampi te appiyaṃ na karissāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:315_5: tayā dussaṅgharaṃ dhanaṃ saṅgharitvā kammañca phalañca asaddahitvā dānaṃ dadantena ayuttaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0513a4:315_8: tayā amhākaṃ dakkhiṇeyyabhāve ṭhatvā anabhiratena brahmacariyaṃ carantena ayuttaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0513a4:315_9: ito paṭṭhāya idāni yathā tayi katakārā mahapphalā honti,
atk-s0513a4:315_10: evaṃ cittaṃ pasādetvā suddhacitto abhirato hutvā brahmacariyaṃ carāhī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:315_12: Tato paṭṭhāya bhariyā sāmike sasnehā ahosi,
atk-s0513a4:315_14: Bodhisatto anabhiratiṃ vinodetvā jhānābhiññaṃ uppādetvā brahmalokaparāyaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:316_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a4:320_0: Na vāhametaṃ jānāmīti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto devadattaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:320_3: tvañhi satthāraṃ nissāya pabbajjaṃ labhi upasampadaṃ labhi,
atk-s0513a4:320_6: lābhasakkāropi te dasabalasseva santako”ti bhikkhūhi vutte tiṇasalākaṃ ukkhipitvā “ettakampi samaṇena
atk-s0513a4:320_7: gotamena mayhaṃ kataṃ guṇaṃ na passāmī”ti vutte dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:320_10: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a4:320_12: pubbepi devadatto akataññū mittadubbhī”ti vatvā tehi yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:321_0: Atīte rājagahe magadhamahārājā nāma rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a4:321_1: Tadā rājagahaseṭṭhi attano puttassa janapadaseṭṭhino dhītaraṃ ānesi,
atk-s0513a4:321_4: “Amhākaṃ puttassa gehe vañjhitthiyā vasantiyā kathaṃ kulavaṃso vaḍḍhissatī”ti yathā sā suṇāti,
atk-s0513a4:321_6: Sā taṃ sutvā “hotu gabbhiniālayaṃ katvā ete vañcessāmī”ti cintetvā attano atthacārikaṃ dhātiṃ āha “amma,
atk-s0513a4:321_7: gabbhiniyo nāma kiñca kiñca karontī”ti gabbhiniparihāraṃ pucchitvā utunikāle paṭicchādetvā ambilādirucikā
atk-s0513a4:321_8: hutvā hatthapādānaṃ uddhumāyanakāle hatthapādapiṭṭhiyo koṭṭāpetvā bahalaṃ kāresi,
atk-s0513a4:321_9: divase divasepi pilotikāveṭhanena ca udaravaḍḍhanaṃ vaḍḍhesi,
atk-s0513a4:321_11: sarīrakiccaṃ karontīpi aññatra tassā dhātiyā aññesaṃ sammukhaṭṭhāne na karoti.
atk-s0513a4:321_13: Evaṃ nava māse vasitvā “idāni janapade pitu gharaṃ gantvā vijāyissāmī”ti sasure āpucchitvā rathamāruhitvā
atk-s0513a4:321_14: mahantena parivārena rājagahā nikkhamitvā maggaṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0513a4:321_15: Tassā pana purato eko sattho gacchati.
atk-s0513a4:321_16: Satthena vasitvā gataṭṭhānaṃ esā pātarāsakāle pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0513a4:322_0: Athekadivasaṃ tasmiṃ satthe ekā duggatitthī rattiyā ekasmiṃ nigrodhamūle puttaṃ vijāyitvā pātova satthe
atk-s0513a4:322_1: gacchante “ahaṃ vinā satthena gantuṃ na sakkhissāmi,
atk-s0513a4:322_2: sakkā kho pana jīvantiyā puttaṃ labhitu”nti nigrodhamūlajāle jalābuñceva gabbhamalañca attharitvā puttaṃ chaṭṭetvā agamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:322_4: So hi na yo vā so vā,
atk-s0513a4:322_6: So pana tadā tādisaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a4:322_7: Itarā pātarāsakāle taṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā “sarīrakiccaṃ karissāmī”ti tāya dhātiyā saddhiṃ nigrodhamūlaṃ gatā suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ dārakaṃ disvā “amma,
atk-s0513a4:322_8: nipphannaṃ no kicca”nti pilotikāyo apanetvā ucchaṅgapadesaṃ lohitena ca gabbhamalena ca makkhetvā attano gabbhavuṭṭhānaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0513a4:322_9: Tāvadeva naṃ sāṇiyā parikkhipitvā haṭṭhatuṭṭho saparijano rājagahaṃ paṇṇaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0513a4:322_10: Athassā sassusasurā vijātakālato paṭṭhāya “pitu kule kiṃ karissati,
atk-s0513a4:322_13: Tattha taṃ sampaṭicchitvā dārakassa nāmaṃ karontā nigrodhamūle jātattā “nigrodhakumāro”ti nāmaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:322_14: Taṃ divasaññeva anuseṭṭhisuṇisāpi vijāyanatthāya kulagharaṃ gacchantī antarāmagge ekissā rukkhasākhāya heṭṭhā puttaṃ vijāyi,
atk-s0513a4:322_16: Taṃ divasaññeva seṭṭhiṃ nissāya vasantassa tunnakārassa bhariyāpi pilotikantare puttaṃ vijāyi,
atk-s0513a4:323_0: Mahāseṭṭhi ubhopi te dārake “nigrodhakumārassa jātadivasaññeva jātā”ti āṇāpetvā teneva saddhiṃ saṃvaḍḍhesi.
atk-s0513a4:323_1: Te ekato vaḍḍhitvā vayappattā takkasilaṃ gantvā sippaṃ uggaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:323_2: Ubhopi seṭṭhiputtā ācariyassa dve sahassāni adaṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:323_3: Nigrodhakumāro pottikassa attano santike sippaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a4:323_4: Te nipphannasippā ācariyaṃ āpucchitvā nikkhantā “janapadacārikaṃ carissāmā”ti anupubbena bārāṇasiṃ patvā ekasmiṃ rukkhamūle nipajjiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:323_7: Tesupi sahāyesu rukkhamūle nipajjitvā niddāyantesu pottiko paccūsakāle uṭṭhāya nigrodhakumārassa pāde parimajjanto nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:323_8: Tasmiṃ rukkhe vutthakukkuṭesu uparikukkuṭo heṭṭhākukkuṭassa sarīre vaccaṃ pātesi.
atk-s0513a4:323_12: tvaṃ mama sarīraṃ attano vaccaṭṭhānaṃ maññasi,
atk-s0513a4:323_14: Atha naṃ itaro “are tvaṃ ‘ajānantena me kata’nti vuttepi kujjhasiyeva,
atk-s0513a4:323_19: Atha naṃ itaro “are ettakamattena tvaṃ mānaṃ karosi,
atk-s0513a4:323_20: maṃ pana māretvā yo thūlamaṃsaṃ khādati,
atk-s0513a4:324_0: Pottiko tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā “kiṃ no sahassena,
atk-s0513a4:324_1: rajjameva vara”nti saṇikaṃ rukkhaṃ abhiruhitvā uparisayitakukkuṭaṃ gahetvā māretvā aṅgāre pacitvā thūlamaṃsaṃ nigrodhassa adāsi,
atk-s0513a4:324_8: ahaṃ pana bhaṇḍāgāriko bhavissāmī”ti vatvā “kathaṃ jānāsī”ti puṭṭho taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0513a4:324_9: Te tayopi janā pātarāsavelāya bārāṇasiṃ pavisitvā ekassa brāhmaṇassa gehe sappisakkarayuttaṃ pāyāsaṃ bhuñjitvā nagarā nikkhamitvā uyyānaṃ pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:324_12: Tasmiṃ samaye pañca rājakakudhabhaṇḍāni anto ṭhapetvā phussarathaṃ vissajjesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:324_14: Phussaratho uyyānaṃ gantvā nivattitvā ārohanasajjo hutvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:324_15: Purohito “uyyāne puññavatā sattena bhavitabba”nti uyyānaṃ pavisitvā kumāraṃ disvā pādantato sāṭakaṃ apanetvā
atk-s0513a4:324_17: sakalajambudīpassa adhipatirājā bhavituṃ yutto”ti sabbatālāvacare paggaṇhāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:324_18: Nigrodhakumāro pabujjhitvā mukhato sāṭakaṃ apanetvā mahājanaṃ oloketvā parivattitvā nipanno thokaṃ vītināmetvā silāpaṭṭe pallaṅkena nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:324_19: Atha naṃ purohito jaṇṇunā patiṭṭhāya “rajjaṃ te deva pāpuṇātī”ti vatvā “‘sādhū”ti vutte tattheva ratanarāsimhi ṭhapetvā abhisiñci.
atk-s0513a4:324_20: So rajjaṃ patvā sākhassa senāpatiṭṭhānaṃ datvā mahantena sakkārena nagaraṃ pāvisi,
atk-s0513a4:324_22: Tato paṭṭhāya mahāsatto bārāṇasiyaṃ dhammena rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a4:325_0: So ekadivasaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ saritvā sākhaṃ āha – “samma,
atk-s0513a4:325_2: mahantena parivārena gantvā mātāpitaro no ānehī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:325_3: Sākho “na me tattha gamanakammaṃ atthī”ti paṭikkhipi.
atk-s0513a4:325_5: So “sādhū”ti tattha gantvā nigrodhassa mātāpitaro “putto vo rajje patiṭṭhito,
atk-s0513a4:325_13: So tesaṃ manaṃ alabhitvā bārāṇasimeva paccāgantvā “senāpatissa ghare maggakilamathaṃ vinodetvā pacchā
atk-s0513a4:325_14: nigrodhasahāyaṃ passissāmī”ti cintetvā tassa nivesanadvāraṃ gantvā “sahāyo kira te pottiko nāma āgatoti
atk-s0513a4:325_17: Sākho pana “ayaṃ mayhaṃ rajjaṃ adatvā sahāyanigrodhassa adāsī”ti tasmiṃ veraṃ bandhi.
atk-s0513a4:325_18: So taṃ kathaṃ sutvāva kuddho āgantvā “ko imassa sahāyo ummattako dāsiputto,
atk-s0513a4:325_19: gaṇhatha na”nti vatvā hatthapādajaṇṇukapparehi koṭṭāpetvā gīvāyaṃ gāhāpetvā nīharāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:326_0: So cintesi “sākho mama santikā senāpatiṭṭhānaṃ labhitvā akataññū mittadubbhī,
atk-s0513a4:326_5: pottiko kira nāma te sahāyo dvāre ṭhito”ti rañño ārocāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:326_6: Rājā pakkosāpetvā taṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā āsanā vuṭṭhāya paccuggantvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā massukammādīni
atk-s0513a4:326_7: kārāpetvā sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitena paribhuttanānaggarasabhojanena tena saddhiṃ sukhanisinno mātāpitūnaṃ
atk-s0513a4:326_10: mayi pana gate kiñci vattuṃ na sakkhissatī”ti tattheva agamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:326_12: ahaṃ maggakilanto ‘sākhassa gehaṃ gantvā vissamitvā idhāgamissāmī’ti agamiṃ.
atk-s0513a4:326_13: Atha maṃ sākho ‘nāhaṃ taṃ jānāmī’ti vatvā koṭṭāpetvā gīvāyaṃ gāhāpetvā nīharāpesīti saddaheyyāsi tvaṃ eta”nti vatvā tisso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:328_0: “Na vāhametaṃ jānāmi, ko vāyaṃ kassa vāti vā;
atk-s0513a4:329_0: Yathā sākho vadi eva, nigrodha kinti maññasi.
atk-s0513a4:335_0: Kataṃ anariyaṃ sākhena, sakhinā te janādhipā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:336_0: Tattha kinti maññasīti yathā maṃ sākho acari,
atk-s0513a4:337_0: Taṃ sutvā nigrodho catasso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:339_0: “Na vāhametaṃ jānāmi, napi me koci saṃsati;
atk-s0513a4:340_0: Yaṃ me tvaṃ samma akkhāsi, sākhena kāraṇaṃ kataṃ.
atk-s0513a4:344_0: Tayāmā labbhitā iddhī, ettha me natthi saṃsayo.
atk-s0513a4:347_0: Evaṃ kataṃ asappurise, nassati na virūhati.
atk-s0513a4:350_0: Sukhette viya bījāni, kataṃ tamhi na nassatī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:351_3: pottika tvaṃ sahāyakānaṃ suājīvakaro jīvikāya uppādetā.
atk-s0513a4:351_4: Mama sākhassa cūbhayanti mayhañca sākhassa ca ubhinnampi sakhīnanti attho.
atk-s0513a4:351_5: Tvaṃ nosissariyanti tvaṃ no asi issariyaṃ dātā,
atk-s0513a4:351_6: tava santikā imā sampattī amhehi laddhā.
atk-s0513a4:352_0: Evañca pana vatvā ettakaṃ kathente nigrodhe sākho tattheva aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:352_1: Atha naṃ rājā “sākha imaṃ pottikaṃ sañjānāsī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0513a4:352_3: Athassa rājā daṇḍaṃ āṇāpento aṭṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:355_0: Hanantu sākhaṃ sattīhi, nāssa icchāmi jīvita”nti.
atk-s0513a4:357_0: Taṃ sutvā pottiko “mā esa bālo maṃ nissāya nassatū”ti cintetvā navamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:360_0: Khama deva asappurisassa, nāssa icchāmahaṃ vadha”nti.
atk-s0513a4:361_2: Na paṭiānayāti matassa nāma pāṇā paṭiānetuṃ na sakkā.
atk-s0513a4:362_0: Rājā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā sākhassa khami,
atk-s0513a4:362_3: Athassa sabbasenānīnaṃ vicāraṇārahaṃ bhaṇḍāgārikaṭṭhānaṃ nāma adāsi.
atk-s0513a4:362_6: Aparabhāge pottiko bhaṇḍāgāriko puttadhītāhi vaḍḍhamāno attano puttadhītānaṃ ovādavasena osānagāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:365_0: Nigrodhasmiṃ mataṃ seyyo, yañce sākhasmi jīvita”nti.
atk-s0513a4:366_2: devadatto pubbepi akataññūyevā”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a4:370_0: Na takkalā santi na āluvānīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ pituposakaṃ upāsakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:370_1: So kira daliddakule paccājāto mātari kālakatāya pātova uṭṭhāya dantakaṭṭhamukhodakadānādīni karonto bhatiṃ
atk-s0513a4:370_2: vā kasiṃ vā katvā laddhavibhavānurūpena yāgubhattādīni sampādetvā pitaraṃ posesi.
atk-s0513a4:370_4: tvaṃ ekakova anto ca bahi ca kattabbaṃ karosi,
atk-s0513a4:370_7: itthiyo nāma gharaṃ āgatā neva mayhaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:370_10: ahaṃ yāvajīvaṃ tumhe posetvā tumhākaṃ accayena jānissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:370_11: Athassa pitā anicchamānasseva ekaṃ kumārikaṃ ānesi.
atk-s0513a4:370_12: Sā sasurassa ca sāmikassa ca upakārikā ahosi nīcavutti.
atk-s0513a4:370_13: Sāmikopissā “mama pitu upakārikā”ti tussitvā laddhaṃ laddhaṃ manāpaṃ āharitvā deti,
atk-s0513a4:370_15: Sā aparabhāge cintesi “mayhaṃ sāmiko laddhaṃ laddhaṃ pitu adatvā mayhameva deti,
atk-s0513a4:370_17: imaṃ mahallakaṃ ekenupāyena mama sāmikassa paṭikkūlaṃ katvā gehā nikkaḍḍhāpessāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:371_0: Sā tato paṭṭhāya udakaṃ atisītaṃ vā accuṇhaṃ vā,
atk-s0513a4:371_2: bhattaṃ uttaṇḍulaṃ vā atikilinnaṃ vāti evamādīni tassa kodhuppattikāraṇāni katvā tasmiṃ kujjhante “ko
atk-s0513a4:371_3: imaṃ mahallakaṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ sakkhissatī”ti pharusāni vatvā kalahaṃ vaḍḍhesi.
atk-s0513a4:371_4: Tattha tattha kheḷapiṇḍādīni chaḍḍetvāpi sāmikaṃ ujjhāpesi “passa pitu kammaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:371_6: imasmiṃ gehe pitaraṃ vā vasāpehi maṃ vā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:371_8: tvaṃ daharā yattha katthaci jīvituṃ sakkhissasi,
atk-s0513a4:371_10: tvaṃ tassa asahantī imamhā gehā nikkhamā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:371_11: Sā bhītā “ito paṭṭhāya evaṃ na karissāmī”ti sasurassa pādesu patitvā khamāpetvā pakatiniyāmeneva paṭijaggituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0513a4:371_12: Atha so upāsako purimadivasesu tāya ubbāḷho satthu santikaṃ dhammassavanāya agantvā tassā pakatiyā patiṭṭhitakāle agamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:371_16: Satthā “idāni tāva tassā kathaṃ aggahetvā pitaraṃ na nīharāpesi,
atk-s0513a4:371_17: pubbe pana etissā kathaṃ gahetvā pitaraṃ āmakasusānaṃ netvā āvāṭaṃ khaṇitvā tattha naṃ pakkhipitvā māraṇakāle
atk-s0513a4:371_18: ahaṃ sattavassiko hutvā mātāpitūnaṃ guṇaṃ kathetvā pitughātakakammā nivāresiṃ,
atk-s0513a4:371_19: tadā tvaṃ mama kathaṃ sutvā tava pitaraṃ yāvajīvaṃ paṭijaggitvā saggaparāyaṇo jāto,
atk-s0513a4:371_20: svāyaṃ mayā dinno ovādo bhavantaragatampi na vijahati,
atk-s0513a4:371_21: iminā kāraṇena tassā kathaṃ aggahetvā idāni tayā pitā na nīhaṭo”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:372_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente aññatarasmiṃ kāsigāme ekassa kulassa ghare ekaputtako ahosi nāmena saviṭṭhako nāma.
atk-s0513a4:372_1: So mātāpitaro paṭijagganto aparabhāge mātari kālakatāya pitaraṃ posesīti sabbaṃ vatthu paccuppannavatthuniyāmeneva kathetabbaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:372_5: pitā te caṇḍo pharuso niccaṃ kalahaṃ karoti,
atk-s0513a4:372_7: ahañca etena saddhiṃ ekagehe vasituṃ na sakkomi,
atk-s0513a4:372_9: tvaṃ etaṃ āmakasusānaṃ netvā āvāṭaṃ khaṇitvā tattha naṃ pakkhipitvā kuddālena sīsaṃ chinditvā jīvitakkhayaṃ
atk-s0513a4:372_10: pāpetvā upari paṃsunā chādetvā āgacchāhī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:372_16: tvaṃ paccūsakāle pitu nisinnaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā yathā sabbe suṇanti,
atk-s0513a4:372_21: sve yānake nisīditvā pātova gacchissāmā’ti vatvā tena vuttavelāyameva uṭṭhāya yānakaṃ yojetvā tattha
atk-s0513a4:372_22: nisīdāpetvā āmakasusānaṃ netvā āvāṭaṃ khaṇitvā corehi acchinnasaddaṃ katvā māretvā āvāṭe pakkhipitvā
atk-s0513a4:373_0: Saviṭṭhako “atthesa upāyo”ti tassā vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā yānakaṃ gamanasajjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a4:373_1: Tassa paneko sattavassiko putto atthi paṇḍito byatto.
atk-s0513a4:373_2: So mātu vacanaṃ sutvā “mayhaṃ mātā pāpadhammā pitaraṃ me pitughātakammaṃ kāreti,
atk-s0513a4:373_3: ahaṃ imassa pitughātakammaṃ kātuṃ na dassāmī”ti saṇikaṃ gantvā ayyakena saddhiṃ nipajji.
atk-s0513a4:373_4: Saviṭṭhakopi itarāya vuttavelāya yānakaṃ yojetvā “ehi, tāta,
atk-s0513a4:373_7: Saviṭṭhako taṃ nivāretuṃ asakkonto teneva saddhiṃ āmakasusānaṃ gantvā pitarañca kumārakena saddhiṃ ekamante
atk-s0513a4:373_8: ṭhapetvā sayaṃ otaritvā kuddālapiṭakaṃ ādāya ekasmiṃ paṭicchannaṭṭhāne caturassāvāṭaṃ khaṇituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0513a4:373_9: Kumārako otaritvā tassa santikaṃ gantvā ajānanto viya kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:375_0: “Na takkalā santi na āluvāni, na biḷāliyo na kaḷambāni tāta;
atk-s0513a4:376_0: Eko araññamhi susānamajjhe, kimatthiko tāta khaṇāsi kāsu”nti.
atk-s0513a4:377_0: Tattha na takkalā santīti piṇḍālukandā na santi.
atk-s0513a4:380_0: “Pitāmaho tāta sudubbalo te, anekabyādhīhi dukhena phuṭṭho;
atk-s0513a4:381_0: Tamajjahaṃ nikhaṇissāmi sobbhe, na hissa taṃ jīvitaṃ rocayāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:382_0: Tattha anekabyādhīhīti anekehi byādhīhi uppannena dukkhena phuṭṭho.
atk-s0513a4:382_1: Na hissa tanti ahañhi tassa tava pitāmahassa taṃ dujjīvitaṃ na icchāmi,
atk-s0513a4:382_2: “evarūpā jīvitā maraṇamevassa vara”nti maññamāno taṃ sobbhe nikhaṇissāmīti.
atk-s0513a4:385_0: “Saṅkappametaṃ paṭiladdha pāpakaṃ, accāhitaṃ kamma karosi ludda”nti.
atk-s0513a4:386_1: tvaṃ “pītaraṃ dukkhā pamocessāmī”ti maraṇadukkhena yojento etaṃ pāpakaṃ saṅkappaṃ paṭiladdhā tassa ca
atk-s0513a4:386_2: saṅkappavasena hitaṃ atikkamma ṭhitattā accāhitaṃ kammaṃ karosi luddanti.
atk-s0513a4:387_0: Evañca pana vatvā kumāro pitu hatthato kuddālaṃ gahetvā avidūre aññataraṃ āvāṭaṃ khaṇituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0513a4:388_0: “Mayāpi tāta paṭilacchase tuvaṃ, etādisaṃ kamma jarūpanīto;
atk-s0513a4:389_0: Taṃ kullavattaṃ anuvattamāno, ahampi taṃ nikhaṇissāmi sobbhe”ti.
atk-s0513a4:390_1: ahampi etasmiṃ sobbhe taṃ mahallakakāle nikhaṇissāmi,
atk-s0513a4:390_3: mayāpi kate imasmiṃ sobbhe tuvaṃ jarūpanīto etādisaṃ kammaṃ paṭilacchase,
atk-s0513a4:390_5: taṃ anuvattamāno vayappatto bhariyāya saddhiṃ vasanto ahampi taṃ nikhaṇissāmi sobbheti.
atk-s0513a4:393_0: “Pharusāhi vācāhi pakubbamāno, āsajja maṃ tvaṃ vadase kumāra;
atk-s0513a4:394_0: Putto mamaṃ orasako samāno, ahītānukampī mama tvaṃsi puttā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:396_0: Evaṃ vutte paṇḍitakumārako ekaṃ paṭivacanagāthaṃ, dve udānagāthāti tisso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:398_0: “Na tāhaṃ tāta ahitānukampī, hitānukampī te ahampi tāta;
atk-s0513a4:399_0: Pāpañca taṃ kamma pakubbamānaṃ, arahāmi no vārayituṃ tato.
atk-s0513a4:401_0: “Yo mātaraṃ vā pitaraṃ saviṭṭha, adūsake hiṃsati pāpadhammo;
atk-s0513a4:402_0: Kāyassa bhedā abhisamparāyaṃ, asaṃsayaṃ so nirayaṃ upeti.
atk-s0513a4:404_0: “Yo mātaraṃ vā pitaraṃ saviṭṭha, annena pānena upaṭṭhahāti;
atk-s0513a4:405_0: Kāyassa bhedā abhisamparāyaṃ, asaṃsayaṃ so sugatiṃ upetī”ti. –
atk-s0513a4:406_0: Imaṃ pana puttassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā pitā aṭṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:408_0: “Na me tvaṃ putta ahitānukampī, hitānukampī me tvaṃsi putta;
atk-s0513a4:409_0: Ahañca taṃ mātarā vuccamāno, etādisaṃ kamma karomi ludda”nti.
atk-s0513a4:410_0: Tattha ahañca taṃ mātarāti ahañca te mātarā, ayameva vā pāṭho.
atk-s0513a4:411_1: itthiyo nāma uppanne dose aniggayhamānā punappunaṃ pāpaṃ karonti,
atk-s0513a4:411_2: mama mātā yathā puna evarūpaṃ na karoti,
atk-s0513a4:411_3: tathā naṃ paṇāmetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti navamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:413_0: “Yā te sā bhariyā anariyarūpā, mātā mamesā sakiyā janetti;
atk-s0513a4:414_0: Niddhāpaye tañca sakā agārā, aññampi te sā dukhamāvaheyyā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:415_0: Saviṭṭhako paṇḍitaputtassa kathaṃ sutvā somanassajāto hutvā “gacchāma,
atk-s0513a4:415_1: tātā”ti saddhiṃ puttena ca pitarā ca yānake nisīditvā pāyāsi.
atk-s0513a4:415_2: Sāpi kho anācārā “nikkhantā no gehā kāḷakaṇṇī”ti haṭṭhatuṭṭhā allagomayena gehaṃ upalimpetvā pāyāsaṃ
atk-s0513a4:415_3: pacitvā āgamanamaggaṃ olokentī te āgacchante disvā “nikkhantaṃ kāḷakaṇṇiṃ puna gahetvā āgato”ti kujjhitvā
atk-s0513a4:415_5: nikkhantaṃ kāḷakaṇṇiṃ puna ādāya āgatosī”ti paribhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:415_6: Saviṭṭhako kiñci avatvā yānakaṃ mocetvā “anācāre kiṃ vadesī”ti taṃ sukoṭṭitaṃ koṭṭetvā “ito paṭṭhāya mā imaṃ gehaṃ pāvisī”ti pāde gahetvā nikkaḍḍhi.
atk-s0513a4:415_7: Tato pitarañca puttañca nhāpetvā sayampi nhāyitvā tayopi pāyāsaṃ paribhuñjiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:415_8: Sāpi pāpadhammā katipāhaṃ aññasmiṃ gehe vasi.
atk-s0513a4:415_11: tumhe mama mātu maṅkubhāvakaraṇatthaṃ ‘asukagāmake mama mātuladhītā atthi,
atk-s0513a4:415_12: sā mayhaṃ pitarañca puttañca mañca paṭijaggissati,
atk-s0513a4:415_13: taṃ ānessāmī’ti vatvā mālāgandhādīni ādāya yānakena nikkhamitvā khettaṃ anuvicaritvā sāyaṃ āgacchathā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:416_0: Paṭivissakakule itthiyo “sāmiko kira te aññaṃ bhariyaṃ ānetuṃ asukagāmaṃ nāma gato”ti tassā ācikkhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:416_2: natthi me puna okāso”ti bhītā tasitā hutvā “puttameva yācissāmī”ti paṇḍitaputtassa santikaṃ gantvā tassa pādesu patitvā “tāta,
atk-s0513a4:416_3: taṃ ṭhapetvā añño mama paṭisaraṇaṃ natthi,
atk-s0513a4:416_4: ito paṭṭhāya tava pitarañca pitāmahañca alaṅkatacetiyaṃ viya paṭijaggissāmi,
atk-s0513a4:416_5: puna mayhaṃ imasmiṃ ghare pavesanaṃ karohī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:416_9: appamattā hothā”ti vatvā pitu āgatakāle dasamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:418_0: “Yā te sā bhariyā anariyarūpā, mātā mamesā sakiyā janetti;
atk-s0513a4:419_0: Dantā kareṇūva vasūpanītā, sā pāpadhammā punarāvajātū”ti.
atk-s0513a4:420_1: idāni sā āneñjakāraṇaṃ kārikā hatthinī viya dantā vasaṃ upanītā nibbisevanā jātā.
atk-s0513a4:421_0: Evaṃ so pitu dhammaṃ kathetvā gantvā mātaraṃ ānesi.
atk-s0513a4:421_1: Sā sāmikañca sasurañca khamāpetvā tato paṭṭhāya dantā dhammena samannāgatā hutvā sāmikañca sasurañca puttañca paṭijaggi.
atk-s0513a4:421_2: Ubhopi ca puttassa ovāde ṭhatvā dānādīni puññāni karitvā saggaparāyaṇā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:422_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a4:422_2: Tadā pitā ca putto ca suṇisā ca teyeva ahesuṃ,
atk-s0513a4:426_0: Kiṃ te vatanti idaṃ satthā paṭhamagamanena kapilapuraṃ gantvā nigrodhārāme viharanto pitu nivesane rañño asaddahanaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:426_1: Tadā hi suddhodanamahārājā vīsatisahassabhikkhuparivārassa bhagavato attano nivesane yāgukhajjakaṃ datvā
atk-s0513a4:426_3: tumhākaṃ padhānakāle devatā āgantvā ākāse ṭhatvā ‘putto te siddhatthakumāro appāhāratāya mato’ti mayhaṃ ārocesu”nti āha.
atk-s0513a4:426_7: ‘mama puttassa bodhitale buddhattaṃ appatvā parinibbānaṃ nāma natthī’ti paṭikkhipi”nti āha.
atk-s0513a4:426_9: pubbepi tvaṃ mahādhammapālakālepi ‘putto te mato imānissa aṭṭhīnī’ti dassetvā vadantassapi disāpāmokkhācariyassa
atk-s0513a4:426_10: ‘amhākaṃ kule taruṇakāle kālakiriyā nāma natthī’ti na saddahi,
atk-s0513a4:426_11: idāni pana kasmā saddahissasī”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:427_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente kāsiraṭṭhe dhammapālagāmo nāma ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:427_1: So dhammapālakulassa vasanatāya etaṃ nāmaṃ labhi.
atk-s0513a4:427_2: Tattha dasannaṃ kusalakammapathānaṃ pālanato “dhammapālo”tveva paññāto brāhmaṇo paṭivasati,
atk-s0513a4:427_3: tassa kule antamaso dāsakammakarāpi dānaṃ denti,
atk-s0513a4:427_8: Atha naṃ vayappattaṃ pitā sahassaṃ datvā sippuggahaṇatthāya takkasilaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0513a4:427_9: So tattha gantvā disāpāmokkhācariyassa santike sippaṃ uggaṇhi,
atk-s0513a4:427_12: Ācariyo māṇavakaparivuto ñātigaṇena saddhiṃ rodanto kandanto susāne tassa sarīrakiccaṃ kāreti.
atk-s0513a4:427_13: Tattha ācariyo ca ñātivaggo cassa antevāsikā ca rodanti paridevanti,
atk-s0513a4:427_15: Apica kho pana tesu pañcasatesu māṇavesu susānā āgamma ācariyassa santike nisīditvā “aho evarūpo nāma
atk-s0513a4:427_16: ācārasampanno taruṇamāṇavo taruṇakāleyeva mātāpitūhi vippayutto maraṇappatto”ti vadantesu “sammā,
atk-s0513a4:428_0: Atha naṃ te āhaṃsu “kiṃ pana samma,
atk-s0513a4:428_1: tvaṃ imesaṃ sattānaṃ maraṇabhāvaṃ na jānāsī”ti? Jānāmi,
atk-s0513a4:428_4: Nanu aniccā sabbe saṅkhārā hutvā abhāvinoti?
atk-s0513a4:428_16: Māṇavā taṃ tassa kathaṃ ācariyassa ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:428_17: Atha naṃ so pakkosāpetvā pucchi “saccaṃ kira tāta dhammapāla,
atk-s0513a4:428_20: So tassa vacanaṃ sutvā cintesi “ayaṃ ativiya acchariyaṃ vadati,
atk-s0513a4:428_21: imassa pitu santikaṃ gantvā pucchitvā sace etaṃ saccaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:428_23: So puttassa kattabbakiccaṃ katvā sattaṭṭhadivasaccayena dhammapālaṃ pakkosāpetvā “tāta,
atk-s0513a4:428_25: yāva mamāgamanā ime māṇave sippaṃ vācehī”ti vatvā ekassa eḷakassa aṭṭhīni gahetvā dhovitvā pasibbake
atk-s0513a4:428_26: katvā ekaṃ cūḷupaṭṭhākaṃ ādāya takkasilato nikkhamitvā anupubbena taṃ gāmaṃ patvā “kataraṃ mahādhammapālassa
atk-s0513a4:428_28: Brāhmaṇassa dāsamanussesu yo yo paṭhamaṃ addasa,
atk-s0513a4:428_29: so so ācariyassa hatthato chattaṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0513a4:428_32: “Puttassa vo dhammapālakumārassa ācariyo dvāre ṭhitoti kumārassa pitu ārocethā”ti ca vuttā “sādhū”ti gantvā ārocayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:428_33: So vegena dvāramūlaṃ gantvā “ito ethā”ti taṃ gharaṃ abhinetvā pallaṅke nisīdāpetvā sabbaṃ pādadhovanādikiccaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a4:429_1: putto te dhammapālakumāro paññavā tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ aṭṭhārasannañca sippānaṃ nipphattiṃ patto,
atk-s0513a4:429_2: apica kho panekena aphāsukena jīvitakkhayaṃ patto,
atk-s0513a4:429_7: hasasī”ti ca vutte “mayhaṃ putto na marati,
atk-s0513a4:429_11: puttasseva te aṭṭhīni disvā saddahā”ti aṭṭhīni nīharitvā “imāni te puttassa aṭṭhīnī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:429_12: Etāni eḷakassa vā sunakhassa vā bhavissanti,
atk-s0513a4:429_14: amhākāñhi kule yāva sattamā kulaparivaṭṭā taruṇakāle matapubbā nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a4:429_16: Tasmiṃ khaṇe sabbepi pāṇiṃ paharitvā mahāhasitaṃ hasiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:429_17: Ācariyo taṃ acchariyaṃ disvā somanassappatto hutvā “brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0513a4:429_18: tumhākaṃ kulapaveṇiyaṃ daharānaṃ amaraṇena na sakkā ahetukena bhavituṃ,
atk-s0513a4:429_19: kena vo kāraṇena daharā na mīyantī”ti pucchanto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:431_0: “Kiṃ te vataṃ kiṃ pana brahmacariyaṃ, kissa suciṇṇassa ayaṃ vipāko;
atk-s0513a4:432_0: Akkhāhi me brāhmaṇa etamatthaṃ, kasmā nu tumhaṃ daharā na mīyare”ti.
atk-s0513a4:433_2: Kissa suciṇṇassāti tumhākaṃ kule daharānaṃ amaraṇaṃ nāma katarasucaritassa vipākoti.
atk-s0513a4:434_0: Taṃ sutvā brāhmaṇo yesaṃ guṇānaṃ ānubhāvena tasmiṃ kule daharā na mīyanti, te vaṇṇayanto –
atk-s0513a4:436_0: “Dhammaṃ carāma na musā bhaṇāma, pāpāni kammāni parivajjayāma;
atk-s0513a4:437_0: Anariyaṃ parivajjemu sabbaṃ, tasmā hi amhaṃ daharā na mīyare.
atk-s0513a4:439_0: “Suṇoma dhammaṃ asataṃ satañca, na cāpi dhammaṃ asataṃ rocayāma;
atk-s0513a4:440_0: Hitvā asante na jahāma sante, tasmā hi amhaṃ daharā na mīyare.
atk-s0513a4:442_0: “Pubbeva dānā sumanā bhavāma, dadampi ve attamanā bhavāma;
atk-s0513a4:443_0: Datvāpi ve nānutappāma pacchā, tasmā hi amhaṃ daharā na mīyare.
atk-s0513a4:445_0: “Samaṇe mayaṃ brāhmaṇe addhike ca, vanibbake yācanake dalidde;
atk-s0513a4:446_0: Annena pānena abhitappayāma, tasmā hi amhaṃ daharā na mīyare.
atk-s0513a4:448_0: “Mayañca bhariyaṃ nātikkamāma, amhe ca bhariyā nātikkamanti;
atk-s0513a4:449_0: Aññatra tāhi brahmacariyaṃ carāma, tasmā hi amhaṃ daharā na mīyare.
atk-s0513a4:452_0: Amajjapā nopi musā bhaṇāma, tasmā hi amhaṃ daharā na mīyare.
atk-s0513a4:454_0: “Etāsu ve jāyare suttamāsu, medhāvino honti pahūtapaññā;
atk-s0513a4:455_0: Bahussutā vedaguno ca honti, tasmā hi amhaṃ daharā na mīyare.
atk-s0513a4:457_0: “Mātā pitā ca bhaginī bhātaro ca, puttā ca dārā ca mayañca sabbe;
atk-s0513a4:458_0: Dhammaṃ carāma paralokahetu, tasmā hi amhaṃ daharā na mīyare.
atk-s0513a4:460_0: “Dāsā ca dāsyo anujīvino ca, paricārakā kammakarā ca sabbe;
atk-s0513a4:461_0: Dhammaṃ caranti paralokahetu, tasmā hi amhaṃ daharā na mīyare”ti. –
atk-s0513a4:463_1: attano jīvitahetu antamaso kunthakipillikampi jīvitā na voropema,
atk-s0513a4:463_2: parabhaṇḍaṃ lobhacittena na olokemāti sabbaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:463_3: Musāvādo cettha musāvādissa akaraṇapāpaṃ nāma natthīti ussannavasena puna vutto.
atk-s0513a4:463_4: Te kira hasādhippāyenapi musā na bhaṇanti.
atk-s0513a4:463_6: Anariyanti ariyagarahitaṃ sabbaṃ asundaraṃ aparisuddhaṃ kammaṃ parivajjayāma.
atk-s0513a4:463_9: tena kāraṇena amhākaṃ daharā na mīyanti,
atk-s0513a4:463_10: antarā akālamaraṇaṃ nāma no natthīti attho.
atk-s0513a4:463_12: Suṇomāti mayaṃ kiriyavādānaṃ sappurisānaṃ kusaladīpanampi asappurisānaṃ akusaladīpanampi dhammaṃ suṇoma,
atk-s0513a4:463_15: Tehi pana no saddhiṃ viggaho vā vivādo vā mā hotūti dhammaṃ suṇāma,
atk-s0513a4:464_0: Samaṇe mayaṃ brāhmaṇeti mayaṃ samitapāpe bāhitapāpe paccekabuddhasamaṇabrāhmaṇepi avasesadhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇepi
atk-s0513a4:464_2: Pāḷiyaṃ pana ayaṃ gāthā “pubbeva dānā”ti gāthāya pacchato āgatā.
atk-s0513a4:464_3: Nātikkamāmāti attano bhariyaṃ atikkamitvā bahi aññaṃ micchācāraṃ na karoma.
atk-s0513a4:464_4: Aññatra tāhīti tā attano bhariyā ṭhapetvā sesaitthīsu brahmacariyaṃ carāma,
atk-s0513a4:464_9: ye etāsu sampannasīlāsu uttamitthīsu amhākaṃ puttā jāyanti,
atk-s0513a4:464_12: tasmāpi amhākaṃ kule daharā na marantīti.
atk-s0513a4:467_0: “Dhammo have rakkhati dhammacāriṃ, dhammo suciṇṇo sukhamāvahati;
atk-s0513a4:468_0: Esānisaṃso dhamme suciṇṇe, na duggatiṃ gacchati dhammacārī.
atk-s0513a4:470_0: “Dhammo have rakkhati dhammacāriṃ, chattaṃ mahantaṃ viya vassakāle;
atk-s0513a4:471_0: Dhammena gutto mama dhammapālo, aññassa aṭṭhīni sukhī kumāro”ti. –
atk-s0513a4:472_0: Imāhi dvīhi gāthāhi dhammacārīnaṃ guṇaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:473_0: Tattha rakkhatīti dhammo nāmeso rakkhito attano rakkhitaṃ paṭirakkhati.
atk-s0513a4:473_2: Na duggatinti nirayādibhedaṃ duggatiṃ na gacchati.
atk-s0513a4:473_6: Dhammena guttoti mahāchattasadisena attanā gopitadhammena gutto.
atk-s0513a4:473_7: Aññassa aṭṭhīnīti tayā ānītāni aṭṭhīni aññassa eḷakassa vā sunakhassa vā aṭṭhīni bhavissanti,
atk-s0513a4:474_0: Taṃ sutvā ācariyo “mayhaṃ āgamanaṃ suāgamanaṃ, saphalaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:474_1: no nipphala”nti sañjātasomanasso dhammapālassa pitaraṃ khamāpetvā “mayā āgacchantena tumhākaṃ vīmaṃsanatthāya imāni eḷakaaṭṭhīni ābhatāni,
atk-s0513a4:474_3: tumhākaṃ rakkhitadhammaṃ mayhampi dethā”ti paṇṇe likhitvā katipāhaṃ tattha vasitvā takkasilaṃ gantvā
atk-s0513a4:474_4: dhammapālaṃ sabbasippāni sikkhāpetvā mahantena parivārena pesesi.
atk-s0513a4:475_0: Satthā suddhodanamahārājassa imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a4:479_0: Nāsmase katapāpamhīti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto devadattassa vadhāya parisakkanaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:479_2: devadatto dhanuggahādipayojanena dasabalassa vadhatthameva upāyaṃ karotī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:479_5: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a4:479_7: pubbepi esa mayhaṃ vadhāya parisakkiyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:480_0: Atīte kosambiyaṃ kosambako nāma rājā rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a4:480_1: Tadā bodhisatto ekasmiṃ veḷuvane kukkuṭayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā anekasatakukkuṭaparivāro araññe vasati,
atk-s0513a4:480_3: So upāyena ekekaṃ kukkuṭaṃ gahetvā khādanto ṭhapetvā bodhisattaṃ sese khādi,
atk-s0513a4:480_5: So appamatto velāya gocaraṃ gahetvā veḷuvanaṃ pavisitvā vasati.
atk-s0513a4:480_6: So seno taṃ gaṇhituṃ asakkonto “ekena naṃ upāyena upalāpetvā gaṇhissāmī”ti cintetvā tassāvidūre sākhāya nilīyitvā “samma kukkuṭarāja,
atk-s0513a4:480_10: tattha ubhopi gocaraṃ gahetvā aññamaññaṃ piyasaṃvāsaṃ vasissāmā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:480_12: mayhaṃ tayā saddhiṃ vissāso nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a4:480_14: tvaṃ mayā pubbe katapāpatāya na saddahasi,
atk-s0513a4:480_18: Iti naṃ yāvatatiyaṃ paṭikkhipitvā “etehi aṅgehi samannāgatena puggalena saddhiṃ vissāso nāma kātuṃ na
atk-s0513a4:480_19: vaṭṭatī”ti vanaghaṭaṃ unnādento devatāsu sādhukāraṃ dadamānāsu dhammakathaṃ samuṭṭhāpento –
atk-s0513a4:486_0: Ghasanti maññe mittāni, vācāya na ca kammunā.
atk-s0513a4:500_0: “Āmisaṃ vā dhanaṃ vāpi, yattha passati tādiso;
atk-s0513a4:501_0: Dubbhiṃ karoti dummedho, tañca hantvāna gacchatī”ti. – imā gāthā āha;
atk-s0513a4:502_5: Tassa hi akattabbaṃ nāma pāpaṃ natthi.
atk-s0513a4:502_6: Nāsmase attatthapaññamhīti attano atthāya eva yassa paññā snehavasena na bhajati,
atk-s0513a4:502_9: Atisanteti anto upasame avijjamāneyeva ca bahi upasamadassanena atisante viya paṭicchannakammantepi bilapaṭicchannaāsīvisasadise kuhakapuggale.
atk-s0513a4:502_12: Yathā pipāsitagāvo titthaṃ otaritvā mukhapūraṃ udakaṃ pivanti,
atk-s0513a4:502_14: evameva ekacce “idañcidañca karissāmā”ti madhuravacanena mittāni ghasanti,
atk-s0513a4:502_16: tādisesu vissāso mahato anatthāya hotīti dīpeti.
