atk-s0513a4:503_3: Manussapheggūti evarūpā asārakā manussā manussapheggū nāma.
atk-s0513a4:503_4: Nāsīdeti na āsīde evarūpe na upagaccheyya.
atk-s0513a4:503_5: Yasmiṃ natthīti yasmiñca puggale kataññutā natthi,
atk-s0513a4:503_9: Evarūpānaṃ itthīnaṃ vā purisānaṃ vā na vissaseti dīpeti.
atk-s0513a4:503_10: Nānāvikatvā saṃsagganti yopi na sakkā anupagantvā etassa antarāyaṃ kātunti antarāyakaraṇatthaṃ nānākāraṇehi
atk-s0513a4:503_11: saṃsaggamāvikatvā daḷhaṃ karitvā pacchā antarāyaṃ karoti,
atk-s0513a4:503_12: tādisampi puggalaṃ nāsmase na vissaseyyāti dīpeti.
atk-s0513a4:504_0: Anariyakammamokkantati anariyānaṃ dussīlānaṃ kammaṃ otaritvā ṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:504_3: Nisitaṃva paṭicchannanti kosiyā vā pilotikāya vā paṭicchannaṃ nisitakhaggamiva.
atk-s0513a4:504_4: Tādisampīti evarūpampi amittaṃ mittapatirūpakaṃ na vissaseyya.
atk-s0513a4:504_10: Tādisampīti yo etehi amittehi mittapatirūpakehi sadiso hoti,
atk-s0513a4:504_14: Yattha passatīti sahāyakagehe yasmiṃ ṭhāne passati.
atk-s0513a4:504_17: Tañca hantvānāti tañca sahāyakampi chetvā gacchati.
atk-s0513a4:504_18: Iti imā satta gāthā kukkuṭarājā kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:507_0: Jahe kāpurise hete, kukkuṭo viya senakaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:516_0: Ārā vivajjeyya naro vicakkhaṇo, senaṃ yathā kukkuṭo vaṃsakānane”ti. –
atk-s0513a4:518_3: Pacchā ca manutappatīti pacchā ca anutappati.
atk-s0513a4:518_4: Kūṭamivoḍḍitanti vane migānaṃ bandhanatthāya kūṭapāsaṃ viya oḍḍitaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:518_6: Vaṃsakānaneti yathā vaṃsavane kukkuṭo senaṃ vivajjeti,
atk-s0513a4:519_0: Sopi tā gāthā vatvā senaṃ āmantetvā “sace imasmiṃ ṭhāne vasissasi,
atk-s0513a4:520_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “evaṃ bhikkhave devadatto pubbepi mayhaṃ vadhāya parisakkī”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a4:524_0: Alaṅkato maṭṭhakuṇḍalīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ mataputtaṃ kuṭumbikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:524_1: Sāvatthiyaṃ kirekassa buddhupaṭṭhākassa kuṭumbikassa piyaputto kālamakāsi.
atk-s0513a4:524_2: So puttasokasamappito na nhāyati na bhuñjati na kammante vicāreti,
atk-s0513a4:524_5: maṃ ohāya paṭhamataraṃ gatosī”tiādīni vatvā vippalapati.
atk-s0513a4:524_6: Satthā paccūsasamaye lokaṃ olokento tassa sotāpattiphalūpanissayaṃ disvā punadivase bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto
atk-s0513a4:524_7: sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā katabhattakicco bhikkhū uyyojetvā ānandattherena pacchāsamaṇena tassa gharadvāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:524_9: Athassa gehajano āsanaṃ paññapetvā satthāraṃ nisīdāpetvā kuṭumbikaṃ pariggahetvā satthu santikaṃ ānesi.
atk-s0513a4:524_10: Taṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ satthā karuṇāsītalena vacanena āmantetvā “kiṃ, upāsaka,
atk-s0513a4:524_13: porāṇakapaṇḍitā putte kālakate sokasamappitā vicarantāpi paṇḍitānaṃ kathaṃ sutvā ‘alabbhanīyaṭṭhāna’nti
atk-s0513a4:524_14: tathato ñatvā appamattakampi sokaṃ na kariṃsū”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:525_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente ekassa mahāvibhavassa brāhmaṇassa putto pañcadasasoḷasavassakāle
atk-s0513a4:525_1: ekena byādhinā phuṭṭho kālaṃ katvā devaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0513a4:525_2: Brāhmaṇo tassa kālakiriyato paṭṭhāya susānaṃ gantvā chārikapuñjaṃ āvijjhanto paridevati,
atk-s0513a4:525_4: Tadā devaputto anuvicaranto taṃ disvā “ekaṃ upamaṃ katvā sokaṃ harissāmī”ti tassa susānaṃ gantvā paridevanakāle
atk-s0513a4:525_5: tasseva puttavaṇṇī hutvā sabbābharaṇapaṭimaṇḍito ekasmiṃ padese ṭhatvā ubho hatthe sīse ṭhapetvā mahāsaddena paridevi.
atk-s0513a4:525_6: Brāhmaṇo saddaṃ sutvā taṃ oloketvā puttapemaṃ paṭilabhitvā tassa santike ṭhatvā “tāta māṇava,
atk-s0513a4:525_7: imasmiṃ susānamajjhe kasmā paridevasī”ti pucchanto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:528_0: Bāhā paggayha kandasi, vanamajjhe kiṃ dukkhito tuva”nti.
atk-s0513a4:529_5: Kiṃ dukkhito tuvanti kiṃkāraṇā dukkhito tvaṃ, ācikkha,
atk-s0513a4:533_0: Tassa cakkayugaṃ na vindāmi, tena dukkhena jahāmi jīvita”nti.
atk-s0513a4:537_0: Pāvada rathaṃ karissāmi te, cakkayugaṃ paṭipādayāmi ta”nti.
atk-s0513a4:538_0: Tattha pāvadāti yādisena te attho yādisaṃ rocesi,
atk-s0513a4:538_3: Paṭipādayāmi tanti taṃ pañjarānurūpaṃ cakkayugaṃ adhigacchāpemi.
atk-s0513a4:539_0: Taṃ sutvā māṇavena kathitāya gāthāya paṭhamapādaṃ satthā abhisambuddho hutvā kathesi, sesaṃ māṇavo.
atk-s0513a4:541_0: “So māṇavo tassa pāvadi, candasūriyā ubhayettha bhātaro;
atk-s0513a4:542_0: Sovaṇṇamayo ratho mama, tena cakkayugena sobhatī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:545_0: “Bālo kho tvaṃsi māṇava, yo tvaṃ patthayasi apatthiyaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:546_0: Maññāmi tuvaṃ marissasi, na hi tvaṃ lacchasi candasūriye”ti. –
atk-s0513a4:551_0: Peto pana neva dissati, ko nu kho kandataṃ bālyataro”ti.
atk-s0513a4:552_2: Ubhayettha vīthiyoti ettha ākāse “ayaṃ candassa vīthi,
atk-s0513a4:552_3: ayaṃ sūriyassa vīthī”ti evaṃ ubhayagamanāgamanabhūmiyopi paññāyanti.
atk-s0513a4:552_4: Peto panāti paralokaṃ gatasatto pana na dissateva.
atk-s0513a4:552_5: Ko nu khoti evaṃ sante amhākaṃ dvinnaṃ kandantānaṃ ko nu kho bālyataroti.
atk-s0513a4:553_0: Evaṃ māṇave kathente brāhmaṇo sallakkhetvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:555_0: “Saccaṃ kho vadesi māṇava, ahameva kandataṃ bālyataro;
atk-s0513a4:556_0: Candaṃ viya dārako rudaṃ, petaṃ kālakatābhipatthaye”ti.
atk-s0513a4:557_0: Tattha candaṃ viya dārakoti yathā daharo gāmadārako “candaṃ dethā”ti candassatthāya rodeyya,
atk-s0513a4:558_0: Iti brāhmaṇo māṇavassa kathāya nissoko hutvā tassa thutiṃ karonto sesagāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:561_0: Vārinā viya osiñcaṃ, sabbaṃ nibbāpaye daraṃ.
atk-s0513a4:567_0: Na socāmi na rodāmi, tava sutvāna māṇavā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:568_8: Brāhmaṇopi tassovāde ṭhatvā dānādīni puññāni katvā kālakato devaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0513a4:569_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānehi,
atk-s0513a4:569_1: saccapariyosāne kuṭumbiko sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi.Tadā dhammadesakadevaputto ahameva ahosinti.
atk-s0513a4:573_0: Apacantāpīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ dānavittaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:573_1: So kira bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ sutvā sāsane pabbajitvā pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya dānavitto ahosi dānajjhāsayo,
atk-s0513a4:573_2: pattapariyāpannampi piṇḍapātaṃ aññassa adatvā na bhuñji,
atk-s0513a4:573_3: antamaso pānīyampi labhitvā aññassa adatvā na pivi,
atk-s0513a4:573_8: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte taṃ bhikkhuṃ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ
atk-s0513a4:573_10: bhante”ti vutte “bhikkhave ayaṃ pubbe assaddho ahosi appasanno,
atk-s0513a4:573_11: tiṇaggena telabindumpi uddharitvā kassaci na adāsi,
atk-s0513a4:573_12: atha naṃ ahaṃ dametvā nibbisevanaṃ katvā dānaphalaṃ ñāpesiṃ,
atk-s0513a4:573_13: tameva dānaninnaṃ cittaṃ bhavantarepi na pajahatī”ti vatvā bhikkhūhi yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:574_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto seṭṭhikule nibbattitvā vayappatto kuṭumbaṃ saṇṭhapetvā
atk-s0513a4:574_1: pitu accayena seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ patvā ekadivasaṃ dhanavilokanaṃ katvā “dhanaṃ paññāyati,
atk-s0513a4:574_3: imaṃ dhanaṃ vissajjetvā mahādānaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti dānasālaṃ kāretvā yāvajīvaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattetvā āyupariyosāne
atk-s0513a4:574_4: “idaṃ dānavattaṃ mā upacchindī”ti puttassa ovādaṃ datvā tāvatiṃsabhavane sakko hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0513a4:574_5: Puttopissa tatheva dānaṃ datvā puttaṃ ovaditvā āyupariyosāne cando devaputto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0513a4:574_8: tassa putto pañcasikho gandhabbadevaputto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0513a4:574_9: Chaṭṭho pana assaddho ahosi thaddhacitto nisneho maccharī,
atk-s0513a4:574_10: dānasālaṃ viddhaṃsetvā jhāpetvā yācake pothetvā nīharāpesi,
atk-s0513a4:574_11: kassaci tiṇaggena uddharitvā telabindumpi na deti.
atk-s0513a4:574_12: Tadā sakko devarājā attano pubbakammaṃ oloketvā “pavattati nu kho me dānavaṃso,
atk-s0513a4:574_13: udāhu no”ti upadhārento “putto me dānaṃ pavattetvā cando hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0513a4:574_16: tassa putto pañcasikho gandhabbadevaputto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0513a4:574_17: chaṭṭho pana taṃ vaṃsaṃ upacchindī”ti passi.
atk-s0513a4:575_0: Athassa etadahosi “imaṃ pāpadhammaṃ dametvā dānaphalaṃ jānāpetvā āgamissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:575_2: amhākaṃ vaṃse chaṭṭho kulavaṃsaṃ samucchinditvā dānasālaṃ jhāpetvā yācake nīharāpesi,
atk-s0513a4:575_4: etha naṃ damessāmā”ti tehi saddhiṃ bārāṇasiṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:575_5: Tasmiṃ khaṇe seṭṭhi rājupaṭṭhānaṃ katvā āgantvā sattame dvārakoṭṭhake antaravīthiṃ olokento caṅkamati.
atk-s0513a4:575_6: Sakko “tumhe mama paviṭṭhakāle pacchato paṭipāṭiyā āgacchathā”ti vatvā gantvā seṭṭhissa santike ṭhatvā “bho mahāseṭṭhi,
atk-s0513a4:575_11: brāhmaṇehi bhatte yācite na dātuṃ na labbhatī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:575_13: mama gehe pakkampi pacitabbampi bhattaṃ natthi,
atk-s0513a4:575_20: Sakko tassa kathaṃ asuṇanto viya dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:578_0: Kimeva tvaṃ pacamāno, yaṃ na dajjā na taṃ samaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:580_0: “Maccherā ca pamādā ca, evaṃ dānaṃ na dīyati;
atk-s0513a4:582_1: mahāseṭṭhi apacantāpi santo sappurisā bhikkhācariyāya laddhampi bhojanaṃ dātuṃ icchanti,
atk-s0513a4:582_3: Kimeva tvaṃ pacamāno yaṃ na dadeyyāsi,
atk-s0513a4:582_5: taṃ tava anurūpaṃ anucchavikaṃ na hoti.
atk-s0513a4:582_6: Dānañhi maccherena ca pamādena cāti dvīhi dosehi na dīyati,
atk-s0513a4:582_7: puññaṃ ākaṅkhamānena vijānatā paṇḍitamanussena dātabbameva hotīti.
atk-s0513a4:583_0: So tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “tena hi gehaṃ pavisitvā nisīda,
atk-s0513a4:583_2: Sakko pavisitvā te siloke sajjhāyanto nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:583_3: Atha naṃ cando āgantvā bhattaṃ yāci.
atk-s0513a4:583_5: gacchā”ti ca vutto “mahāseṭṭhi anto eko brāhmaṇo nisinno,
atk-s0513a4:583_8: nikkhamā”ti vuccamānopi “mahāseṭṭhi iṅgha tāva silokaṃ suṇāhī”ti dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:585_0: “Yasseva bhīto na dadāti maccharī, tadevādadato bhayaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:586_0: Jighacchā ca pipāsā ca, yassa bhāyati maccharī;
atk-s0513a4:587_0: Tameva bālaṃ phusati, asmiṃ loke paramhi ca.
atk-s0513a4:591_0: Tattha yassa bhāyatīti “ahaṃ aññesaṃ datvā sayaṃ jighacchito ca pipāsito ca bhavissāmī”ti yassā jighacchāya pipāsāya bhāyati.
atk-s0513a4:591_1: Tamevāti taññeva jighacchāpipāsāsaṅkhātaṃ bhayaṃ etaṃ bālaṃ nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne idhaloke paraloke ca phusati pīḷeti,
atk-s0513a4:592_3: Tato thokaṃ vītināmetvā sūriyo āgantvā bhattaṃ yācanto dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:597_0: “Tasmā satañca asataṃ, nānā hoti ito gati;
atk-s0513a4:599_0: Tattha duddadanti dānaṃ nāma duddadaṃ maccheraṃ abhibhavitvā dātabbato,
atk-s0513a4:599_4: Nānukubbantīti asappurisā dānaphalaṃ ajānantā tesaṃ gatamaggaṃ nānugacchanti.
atk-s0513a4:599_5: Sataṃ dhammoti sappurisānaṃ bodhisattānaṃ dhammo aññehi duranugamo.
atk-s0513a4:599_6: Asantoti macchariyavasena dānaṃ adatvā asappurisā nirayaṃ yanti.
atk-s0513a4:600_0: Seṭṭhi gahetabbagahaṇaṃ apassanto “tena hi pavisitvā brāhmaṇānaṃ santike nisīda,
atk-s0513a4:600_2: Tato thokaṃ vītināmetvā mātali āgantvā bhattaṃ yācitvā “natthī”ti vacanamattakālameva sattamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:603_0: Appasmā dakkhiṇā dinnā, sahassena samaṃ mitā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:604_0: Tattha appasmeke pavecchantīti mahāseṭṭhi ekacce paṇḍitapurisā appasmimpi deyyadhamme pavecchanti,
atk-s0513a4:604_2: Bahunāpi deyyadhammena samannāgatā eke sattā na dicchare na dadanti.
atk-s0513a4:604_4: Sahassena samaṃ mitāti evaṃ dinnā kaṭacchubhattamattāpi dakkhiṇā sahassadānena saddhiṃ mitā,
atk-s0513a4:605_0: Tampi so “tena hi pavisitvā nisīdā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:605_1: Tato thokaṃ vītināmetvā pañcasikho āgantvā bhattaṃ yācitvā “natthi gacchā”ti vutte “ahaṃ na gatapubbo,
atk-s0513a4:605_2: imasmiṃ gehe brāhmaṇavācanakaṃ bhavissati maññe”ti tassa dhammakathaṃ ārabhanto aṭṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:607_0: “Dhammaṃ care yopi samuñchakaṃ care, dārañca posaṃ dadamappakasmiṃ;
atk-s0513a4:608_0: Sataṃ sahassānaṃ sahassayāginaṃ, kalampi nāgghanti tathāvidhassa te”ti.
atk-s0513a4:609_1: Samuñchakanti gāme vā āmakapakkabhikkhācariyaṃ araññe vā phalāphalaharaṇasaṅkhātaṃ uñchaṃ yo careyya,
atk-s0513a4:609_3: Dārañca posanti attano ca puttadāraṃ posentoyeva.
atk-s0513a4:609_4: Dadamappakasminti paritte vā deyyadhamme dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ dadamāno dhammaṃ careti attho.
atk-s0513a4:609_5: Sataṃ sahassānaṃ sahassayāginanti paraṃ pothetvā viheṭhetvā sahassena yāgaṃ yajantānaṃ sahassayāgīnaṃ issarānaṃ satasahassampi.
atk-s0513a4:609_6: Kalampi nāgghanti tathāvidhassa teti tesaṃ satasahassasaṅkhātānaṃ sahassayāgīnaṃ yāgā tathāvidhassa dhammena
atk-s0513a4:609_7: samena deyyadhammaṃ uppādetvā dentassa duggatamanussassa soḷasiṃ kalaṃ na agghantīti.
atk-s0513a4:610_0: Seṭṭhi pañcasikhassa kathaṃ sutvā sallakkhesi. Atha naṃ anagghakāraṇaṃ pucchanto navamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:612_0: “Kenesa yañño vipulo mahagghato, samena dinnassa na agghameti;
atk-s0513a4:613_0: Kathaṃ sataṃ sahassānaṃ sahassayāginaṃ, kalampi nāgghanti tathāvidhassa te”ti.
atk-s0513a4:614_2: Samena dinnassāti dhammena dinnassa kena kāraṇena agghaṃ na upeti.
atk-s0513a4:614_4: kathaṃ sahassayāgīnaṃ purisānaṃ bahūnaṃ sahassānaṃ satasahassasaṅkhātā issarā tathāvidhassa dhammena
atk-s0513a4:614_5: uppādetvā dāyakassa ekassa duggatamanussassa kalaṃ nāgghantīti.
atk-s0513a4:617_0: “Dadanti heke visame niviṭṭhā, chetvā vadhitvā atha socayitvā;
atk-s0513a4:618_0: Sā dakkhiṇā assumukhā sadaṇḍā, samena dinnassa na agghameti;
atk-s0513a4:619_0: Evaṃ sataṃ sahassānaṃ sahassayāginaṃ, kalampi nāgghanti tathāvidhassa te”ti.
atk-s0513a4:621_0: So pañcasikhassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā “tena hi gaccha,
atk-s0513a4:621_4: Tato bilārakosiyo seṭṭhi ekaṃ dāsiṃ āmantetvā “etesaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ palāpavīhīnaṃ nāḷiṃ nāḷiṃ dehī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:621_5: Sā vīhī gahetvā brāhmaṇe upasaṅkamitvā “ime ādāya yattha katthaci pacāpetvā bhuñjathā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:621_10: Sā taṇḍule ādāya gantvā “brāhmaṇā taṇḍule gaṇhathā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:621_13: “Tena hi tesaṃ karoṭiyaṃ vaḍḍhetvā gobhattaṃ dehī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:621_14: Sā tesaṃ karoṭiyaṃ vaḍḍhetvā mahāgoṇānaṃ pakkabhattaṃ āharitvā adāsi.
atk-s0513a4:621_15: Pañcapi janā kabaḷe vaḍḍhetvā mukhe pakkhipitvā gale laggāpetvā akkhīni parivattetvā vissaṭṭhasaññā matā viya nipajjiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:621_16: Dāsī te disvā “matā bhavissantī”ti bhītā gantvā seṭṭhino ārocesi “ayya,
atk-s0513a4:621_17: te brāhmaṇā gobhattaṃ gilituṃ asakkontā matā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:622_0: So cintesi “idāni ayaṃ pāpadhammo sukhumālabrāhmaṇānaṃ gobhattaṃ dāpesi,
atk-s0513a4:622_1: te taṃ gilituṃ asakkontā matāti maṃ garahissantī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:622_3: “khippaṃ gantvā etesaṃ karoṭikesu bhattaṃ haritvā nānaggarasaṃ sālibhattaṃ vaḍḍhehī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:622_5: Seṭṭhi antarapīthiṃ paṭipannamanusse pakkosāpetvā “ahaṃ mama bhuñjananiyāmena etesaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ bhattaṃ dāpesiṃ,
atk-s0513a4:622_6: ete lobhena mahante piṇḍe katvā bhuñjamānā gale laggāpetvā matā,
atk-s0513a4:622_7: mama niddosabhāvaṃ jānāthā”ti vatvā parisaṃ sannipātesi.
atk-s0513a4:622_8: Mahājane sannipatite brāhmaṇā uṭṭhāya mahājanaṃ oloketvā “passathimassa seṭṭhissa musāvāditaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:622_10: paṭhamaṃ gobhattaṃ amhākaṃ datvā amhesu matesu viya nipannesu imaṃ bhattaṃ vaḍḍhāpesī”ti vatvā attano mukhehi gahitabhattaṃ bhūmiyaṃ pātetvā dassesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:622_15: idāni imesaṃ sukhumālabrāhmaṇānaṃ bhattaṃ dento gobhattaṃ dāpesi,
atk-s0513a4:622_16: paralokaṃ gacchanto tava ghare vibhavaṃ gīvāyaṃ bandhitvā gamissasi maññe”ti.
atk-s0513a4:623_1: tumhe imasmiṃ gehe dhanaṃ kassa santaka”nti?
atk-s0513a4:623_3: “Imasmiṃ nagare asukakāle bārāṇasiyaṃ mahāseṭṭhi nāma dānasālaṃ kāretvā mahādānaṃ pavattayī”ti sutapubbaṃ tumhehīti.
atk-s0513a4:623_6: dānaṃ datvā sakko devarājā hutvā puttopi me taṃ vaṃsaṃ avināsetvā dānaṃ datvā cando devaputto hutvā nibbatto,
atk-s0513a4:623_9: tassa putto pañcasikho gandhabbadevaputto hutvā nibbatto.
atk-s0513a4:623_13: ayaṃ imassa pāpadhammassa pitā pañcasikho gandhabbadevaputto,
atk-s0513a4:623_15: kattabbameva kusalaṃ paṇḍitehī”ti kathentā mahājanassa kaṅkhacchedanatthaṃ ākāse uppatitvā mahantenānubhāvena
atk-s0513a4:623_18: Sakko mahājanaṃ āmantetvā “mayaṃ attano dibbasampattiṃ pahāya āgacchantā imaṃ kulavaṃsanāsakaraṃ pāpadhammabilārakosiyaṃ nissāya āgatā,
atk-s0513a4:623_19: ayaṃ pāpadhammo attano kulavaṃsaṃ nāsetvā dānasālaṃ jhāpetvā yācake gīvāyaṃ gahetvā nīharāpetvā amhākaṃ vaṃsaṃ samucchindi,
atk-s0513a4:623_20: ‘ayaṃ adānasīlo hutvā niraye nibbatteyyā’ti imassa anukampāya āgatāmhā”ti vatvā dānaguṇaṃ pakāsento mahājanassa dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0513a4:623_22: ahaṃ ito paṭṭhāya porāṇakulavaṃsaṃ anāsāpetvā dānaṃ pavattessāmi,
atk-s0513a4:623_23: ajja ādiṃ katvā antamaso udakadantaponaṃ upādāya attano laddhāhāraṃ parassa adatvā na khādissāmī”ti sakkassa paṭiññaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a4:623_24: Sakko taṃ dametvā nibbisevanaṃ katvā pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhapetvā cattāro devaputte ādāya sakaṭṭhānameva gato.
atk-s0513a4:623_25: Sopi seṭṭhi yāvajīvaṃ dānaṃ datvā tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbatti.
atk-s0513a4:624_2: ayaṃ bhikkhu pubbe assaddho ahosi kassaci kiñci adātā,
atk-s0513a4:624_3: ahaṃ pana naṃ dametvā dānaphalaṃ jānāpesiṃ,
atk-s0513a4:624_4: tameva cittaṃ bhavantaragatampi na jahātī”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a4:628_0: Vaṇṇavā abhirūposīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ lolabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:628_4: Athaññe pesalā bhikkhū tassānuggahena satthu ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:628_5: Satthā taṃ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu lolo”ti pucchitvā “saccaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:628_6: bhante”ti vutte “bhikkhu kasmā evarūpe niyyānikasāsane pabbajitvā lolo ahosi,
atk-s0513a4:628_8: pubbepi tvaṃ lolabhāvaṃ nissāya bārāṇasiyaṃ hatthikuṇapādīhi atitto mahāaraññaṃ paviṭṭho”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:629_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente eko lolakāko bārāṇasiyaṃ hatthikuṇapādīhi atitto “araññaṃ
atk-s0513a4:629_1: nu kho kīdisa”nti araññaṃ gantvā tatthapi phalāphalehi asantuṭṭho gaṅgāya tīraṃ gantvā vicaranto jayampatike
atk-s0513a4:629_3: ime imasmiṃ gaṅgātīre bahuṃ macchamaṃsaṃ khādanti maññe,
atk-s0513a4:629_4: ime paṭipucchitvā mayāpi imesaṃ bhojanaṃ gocaraṃ khāditvā vaṇṇavantena bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti tesaṃ avidūre
atk-s0513a4:629_5: nisīditvā cakkavākaṃ pucchanto dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:635_0: Gaṅgāya tīre nisinno, evaṃ bhuñjasi bhojana”nti.
atk-s0513a4:636_7: Evaṃ bhuñjasīti evarūpaṃ bhojanaṃ maññe bhuñjasīti pucchati.
atk-s0513a4:637_0: Cakkavāko tassa vacanaṃ paṭikkhipanto tatiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:640_0: Aññatra sevālapaṇakā, etaṃ me samma bhojana”nti.
atk-s0513a4:641_2: aññatra sevālā ca paṇakā ca sesāni jaṅgalāni vā odakāni vā maṃsāni ādāya etaṃ bhojanaṃ na bhuñjāmi,
atk-s0513a4:648_0: Na ca me tādiso vaṇṇo, cakkavāka yathā tuva”nti.
atk-s0513a4:649_0: Tattha yathā tuvanti yathā tuvaṃ sobhaggappatto sarīravaṇṇo,
atk-s0513a4:649_2: etena kāraṇena ahaṃ tava “sevālapaṇakaṃ mama bhojana”nti vadantassa vacanaṃ na saddahāmīti.
atk-s0513a4:650_0: Athassa cakkavāko dubbaṇṇakāraṇaṃ kathetvā dhammaṃ desento sesagāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:653_0: Utrasto ghasasī bhīto, tena vaṇṇo tavediso.
atk-s0513a4:656_0: Laddho piṇḍo na pīṇeti, tena vaṇṇo tavediso.
atk-s0513a4:662_0: Ahiṃsāya cara loke, piyo hohisi maṃmiva.
atk-s0513a4:664_0: “Yo na hanti na ghāteti, na jināti na jāpaye;
atk-s0513a4:665_0: Mettaṃso sabbabhūtesu, veraṃ tassa na kenacī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:666_0: Tattha sampassanti samma kāka tvaṃ paresu uppannaṃ attani veracittaṃ sampassamāno mānusiṃ pajaṃ hiṃsanto viheṭhento.
atk-s0513a4:666_6: Ahiṃsaṃ sabbapāṇinanti ahaṃ pana sabbasatte ahiṃsanto bhuñjāmīti vadati.
atk-s0513a4:666_7: So karassu ānubhāvanti so tvampi vīriyaṃ karohi,
atk-s0513a4:666_9: Ahiṃsāyāti ahiṃsāya samannāgato hutvā loke cara.
atk-s0513a4:666_10: Piyo hohisi maṃmivāti evaṃ sante mayā sadisova lokassa piyo hohisi.
atk-s0513a4:666_14: Na kenacīti kenaci ekasattenapi saddhiṃ tassa veraṃ nāma natthīti.
atk-s0513a4:667_0: Tasmā sace lokassa piyo bhavituṃ icchasi,
atk-s0513a4:667_1: sabbaverehi viramāhīti evaṃ cakkavāko kākassa dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0513a4:667_2: Kāko “tumhe attano gocaraṃ mayhaṃ na kathetha,
atk-s0513a4:667_3: kā kā”ti vassanto uppatitvā bārāṇasiyaṃ ukkārabhūmiyaññeva otari.
atk-s0513a4:668_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a4:672_0: 145-154. Saccaṃ kirāti idaṃ bhūripaññajātakaṃ mahāumaṅgajātake āvi bhavissati.
atk-s0513a4:676_0: Kiṃsu naroti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto mahāmaṅgalasuttaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:676_1: Rājagahanagarasmiñhi kenacideva karaṇīyena santhāgāre sannipatitassa mahājanassa majjhe eko puriso “ajja me maṅgalakiriyā atthī”ti uṭṭhāya agamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:676_2: Aparo tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “ayaṃ ‘maṅgala’nti vatvāva gato,
atk-s0513a4:676_5: Ekacco hi kālasseva uṭṭhāya sabbasetaṃ usabhaṃ vā passati,
atk-s0513a4:676_6: gabbhinitthiṃ vā rohitamacchaṃ vā puṇṇaghaṭaṃ vā navanītaṃ vā gosappiṃ vā ahatavatthaṃ vā pāyāsaṃ vā passati,
atk-s0513a4:676_7: ito uttari maṅgalaṃ nāma natthī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:676_14: ito uttari maṅgalaṃ nāma natthī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:676_18: Ekacco hi kālasseva uṭṭhāya pathaviṃ āmasati,
atk-s0513a4:676_19: haritatiṇaṃ allagomayaṃ parisuddhasāṭakaṃ rohitamacchaṃ suvaṇṇarajatabhājanaṃ āmasati,
atk-s0513a4:676_20: ito uttari maṅgalaṃ nāma natthī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:676_22: Evaṃ diṭṭhamaṅgalikā sutamaṅgalikā mutamaṅgalikāti tissopi parisā hutvā aññamaññaṃ saññāpetuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu,
atk-s0513a4:676_23: bhummadevatā ādiṃ katvā yāva brahmalokā “idaṃ maṅgala”nti tathato na jāniṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:677_0: Sakko cintesi “imaṃ maṅgalapañhaṃ sadevake loke aññatra bhagavatā añño kathetuṃ samattho nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a4:677_2: So rattibhāge satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā añjaliṃ paggayha “bahū devā manussā cā”ti pañhaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0513a4:677_3: Athassa satthā dvādasahi gāthāhi aṭṭhatiṃsa mahāmaṅgalāni kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:677_4: Maṅgalasutte vinivaṭṭanteyeva koṭisatasahassamattā devatā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu,
atk-s0513a4:677_7: Satthārā maṅgale kathite sadevako loko “sukathita”nti abhinandi.
atk-s0513a4:677_9: satthā aññesaṃ avisayaṃ maṅgalapañhaṃ sadevakassa lokassa cittaṃ gahetvā kukkuccaṃ chinditvā gaganatale candaṃ uṭṭhāpento viya kathesi,
atk-s0513a4:677_14: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “anacchariyaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:677_17: svāhaṃ bodhisattacariyaṃ carantopi devamanussānaṃ kaṅkhaṃ chinditvā maṅgalapañhaṃ kathesi”nti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:678_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto ekasmiṃ gāme vibhavasampannassa brāhmaṇassa kule nibbatti,
atk-s0513a4:678_2: So vayappatto takkasilāyaṃ uggahitasippo katadārapariggaho mātāpitūnaṃ accayena ratanavilokanaṃ katvā
atk-s0513a4:678_3: saṃviggamānaso mahādānaṃ pavattetvā kāme pahāya himavantapadese pabbajitvā jhānābhiññaṃ nibbattetvā vanamūlaphalāhāro
atk-s0513a4:678_7: Athekadivasaṃ te tāpasā bodhisattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā “ācariya,
atk-s0513a4:678_8: vassārattasamaye himavantato otaritvā loṇambilasevanatthāya janapadacārikaṃ gacchāma,
atk-s0513a4:678_12: ahaṃ idheva vasissāmī”ti vutte taṃ vanditvā himavantā otaritvā cārikaṃ caramānā bārāṇasiṃ patvā rājuyyāne vasiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:678_14: Athekadivasaṃ bārāṇasiyaṃ santhāgāre sannipatite mahājanakāye maṅgalapañho samuṭṭhāti.
atk-s0513a4:679_0: Tadā pana manussānaṃ kaṅkhaṃ chinditvā maṅgalapañhaṃ kathetuṃ samatthaṃ apassanto mahājano uyyānaṃ gantvā isigaṇaṃ maṅgalapañhaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0513a4:679_3: apica kho amhākaṃ ācariyo rakkhitatāpaso nāma mahāpañño himavante vasati,
atk-s0513a4:679_4: so sadevakassa lokassa cittaṃ gahetvā etaṃ maṅgalapañhaṃ kathessatī”ti vadiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:679_8: sādhu vata tumheyeva ācariyassa santikaṃ gantvā pucchitvā uggaṇhitvā punāgantvā amhākaṃ kathethā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:679_9: Te “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā ācariyassa santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā katapaṭisanthārā ācariyena rañño dhammikabhāve
atk-s0513a4:679_10: janapadacāritte ca pucchite taṃ diṭṭhamaṅgalādīnaṃ uppattiṃ ādito paṭṭhāya kathetvā rañño yācanāya ca
atk-s0513a4:679_11: attano pañhasavanatthaṃ āgatabhāvaṃ pakāsetvā “sādhu no bhante,
atk-s0513a4:679_13: Tato jeṭṭhantevāsiko ācariyaṃ pucchanto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:681_0: “Kiṃsu naro jappamadhicca kāle, kaṃ vā vijjaṃ katamaṃ vā sutānaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:682_0: So macco asmiñca paramhi loke, kathaṃ karo sotthānena gutto”ti.
atk-s0513a4:683_6: puriso maṅgalaṃ icchanto maṅgalakāle kiṃsu nāma jappanto tīsu vedesu kataraṃ vā vedaṃ kataraṃ vā sutānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:683_7: antare sutapariyattiṃ adhīyitvā so macco imasmiñca loke paramhi ca kathaṃ karo etesu jappādīsu kiṃ kena
atk-s0513a4:683_8: niyāmena karonto sotthānena niraparādhamaṅgalena gutto rakkhito hoti,
atk-s0513a4:683_9: taṃ ubhayalokahitaṃ gahetvā ṭhitamaṅgalaṃ amhākaṃ kathehī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:684_0: Evaṃ jeṭṭhantevāsikena maṅgalapañhaṃ puṭṭho mahāsatto devamanussānaṃ kaṅkhaṃ chindanto “idañcidañca maṅgala”nti buddhalīḷāya maṅgalaṃ kathento āha –
atk-s0513a4:686_0: “Yassa devā pitaro ca sabbe, sarīsapā sabbabhūtāni cāpi;
atk-s0513a4:687_0: Mettāya niccaṃ apacitāni honti, bhūtesu ve sotthānaṃ tadāhū”ti.
atk-s0513a4:688_1: Devāti bhummadeve ādiṃ katvā sabbepi kāmāvacaradevā.
atk-s0513a4:688_4: Sabbabhūtāni cāpīti vuttāvasesāni ca sabbānipi bhūtāni.
atk-s0513a4:688_5: Mettāya niccaṃ apacitāni hontīti ete sabbe sattā dasadisāpharaṇavasena pavattāya appanāppattāya mettābhāvanāya apacitā honti.
atk-s0513a4:688_6: Bhūtesu veti taṃ tassa puggalassa sabbasattesu sotthānaṃ nirantaraṃ pavattaṃ niraparādhamaṅgalaṃ āhu.
atk-s0513a4:688_7: Mettāvihārī hi puggalo sabbesaṃ piyo hoti parūpakkamena avikopiyo.
atk-s0513a4:688_8: Iti so iminā maṅgalena rakkhito gopito hotīti.
atk-s0513a4:689_0: Iti mahāsatto paṭhamaṃ maṅgalaṃ kathetvā dutiyādīni kathento –
atk-s0513a4:694_0: “Yo nāvajānāti sahāyamatte, sippena kulyāhi dhanena jaccā;
atk-s0513a4:695_0: Rucipañño atthakāle matīmā, sahāyesu ve sotthānaṃ tadāhu.
atk-s0513a4:697_0: “Mittāni ve yassa bhavanti santo, saṃvissatthā avisaṃvādakassa;
atk-s0513a4:698_0: Na mittadubbhī saṃvibhāgī dhanena, mittesu ve sotthānaṃ tadāhu.
atk-s0513a4:700_0: “Yassa bhariyā tulyavayā samaggā, anubbatā dhammakāmā pajātā;
atk-s0513a4:701_0: Koliniyā sīlavatī patibbatā, dāresu ve sotthānaṃ tadāhu.
atk-s0513a4:703_0: “Yassa rājā bhūtapati yasassī, jānāti soceyyaṃ parakkamañca;
atk-s0513a4:704_0: Advejjhatā suhadayaṃ mamanti, rājūsu ve sotthānaṃ tadāhu.
atk-s0513a4:706_0: “Annañca pānañca dadāti saddho, mālañca gandhañca vilepanañca;
atk-s0513a4:707_0: Pasannacitto anumodamāno, saggesu ve sotthānaṃ tadāhu.
atk-s0513a4:710_0: Bahussutā isayo sīlavanto, arahantamajjhe sotthānaṃ tadāhū”ti. –
atk-s0513a4:712_0: Tattha nivātavuttīti muducittatāya sabbalokassa nīcavutti hoti.
atk-s0513a4:712_1: Khantā duruttānanti parehi vuttānaṃ duṭṭhavacanānaṃ adhivāsako hoti.
atk-s0513a4:712_3: avadhi ma”nti yugaggāhaṃ akaronto anukūlameva vadati.
atk-s0513a4:712_4: Adhivāsananti idaṃ adhivāsanaṃ tassa sotthānaṃ niraparādhamaṅgalaṃ paṇḍitā vadanti.
atk-s0513a4:713_2: dasa dvādasa vassāni ekato vutthā sahāyamattā nāma,
atk-s0513a4:713_4: ime nisippā”ti evaṃ sippena vā “ahaṃ kulīno,
atk-s0513a4:713_5: ime na kulīnā”ti evaṃ kulasampattisaṅkhātāhi kulyāhi vā,
atk-s0513a4:713_9: ime dujjātā”ti evaṃ jaccā vā nāvajānāti.
atk-s0513a4:713_12: Matīmāti taṃ taṃ atthaṃ paricchinditvā vicāraṇasamatthatāya matimā hutvā te sahāye nāvajānāti.
atk-s0513a4:713_13: Sahāyesūti taṃ tassa anavajānanaṃ sahāyesu sotthānaṃ nāmāti porāṇakapaṇḍitā āhu.
atk-s0513a4:713_14: Tena hi so niraparādhamaṅgalena idhaloke ca paraloke ca gutto hoti.
atk-s0513a4:713_15: Tattha paṇḍite sahāye nissāya sotthibhāvo kusanāḷijātakena kathetabbo.
atk-s0513a4:714_0: Santoti paṇḍitā sappurisā yassa mittāni bhavanti.
atk-s0513a4:714_1: Saṃvissatthāti gharaṃ pavisitvā icchiticchitasseva gahaṇavasena vissāsamāpannā.
atk-s0513a4:714_3: Na mittadubbhīti yo ca mittadubbhī na hoti.
atk-s0513a4:714_4: Saṃvibhāgī dhanenāti attano dhanena mittānaṃ saṃvibhāgaṃ karoti.
atk-s0513a4:714_5: Mittesūti mitte nissāya laddhabbaṃ tassa taṃ mittesu sotthānaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0513a4:714_6: So hi evarūpehi mittehi rakkhito sotthiṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0513a4:714_7: Tattha mitte nissāya sotthibhāvo mahāukkusajātakādīhi kathetabbo.
atk-s0513a4:715_6: Dāresūti etehi sīlaguṇehi samannāgate mātugāme gehe vasante sāmikassa sotthi hotīti paṇḍitā kathenti.
atk-s0513a4:715_7: Tattha sīlavantaṃ mātugāmaṃ nissāya sotthibhāvo maṇicorajātaka-
atk-s0513a4:716_1: Advejjhatāti advejjhatāya na esa mayā saddhiṃ bhijjitvā dvidhā bhavissatīti evaṃ advejjhabhāvena yaṃ jānāti.
atk-s0513a4:716_2: Suhadayaṃ mamanti suhado ayaṃ mamanti ca yaṃ jānāti.
atk-s0513a4:716_3: Rājūsu veti evaṃ rājūsu sevakānaṃ sotthānaṃ nāmāti paṇḍitā kathenti.
atk-s0513a4:716_4: Dadāti saddhoti kammañca phalañca saddahitvā dadāti.
atk-s0513a4:716_5: Saggesu veti evaṃ sagge devaloke sotthānaṃ niraparādhamaṅgalanti paṇḍitā kathenti,
atk-s0513a4:717_0: Punanti vuddhāti yaṃ puggalaṃ ñāṇavuddhā ariyadhammena punanti parisodhenti.
atk-s0513a4:717_5: Arahantamajjheti arahantānaṃ majjhe paṭilabhitabbaṃ taṃ sotthānanti paṇḍitā kathenti.
atk-s0513a4:717_6: Arahanto hi attanā paṭividdhamaggaṃ ācikkhitvā paṭipādentā ārādhakaṃ puggalaṃ ariyamaggena punanti,
atk-s0513a4:718_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto arahattena desanāya kūṭaṃ gaṇhanto aṭṭhahi gāthāhi aṭṭha mahāmaṅgalāni kathetvā tesaññeva maṅgalānaṃ thutiṃ karonto osānagāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:721_0: Tānīdha sevetha naro sapañño, na hi maṅgale kiñcanamatthi sacca”nti.
atk-s0513a4:722_0: Tattha na hi maṅgaleti tasmiṃ pana diṭṭhasutamutappabhede maṅgale kiñcanaṃ ekamaṅgalampi saccaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a4:723_0: Isayo tāni maṅgalāni sutvā sattaṭṭhadivasaccayena ācariyaṃ āpucchitvā tattheva agamaṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:723_2: Te tassa ācariyena kathitaniyāmena maṅgalapañhaṃ kathetvā himavantameva āgamaṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:723_3: Tato paṭṭhāya loke maṅgalaṃ pākaṭaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:723_5: Bodhisatto cattāro brahmavihāre bhāvetvā isigaṇaṃ ādāya brahmaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0513a4:724_2: pubbepāhaṃ maṅgalapañhaṃ kathesi”nti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a4:728_0: Uṭṭhehi kaṇhāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto mataputtaṃ kuṭumbikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:728_2: Idha pana satthā taṃ upāsakaṃ “kiṃ, upāsaka,
atk-s0513a4:728_5: porāṇakapaṇḍitā paṇḍitānaṃ kathaṃ sutvā mataputtaṃ nānusociṃsū”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:729_0: Atīte uttarapathe kaṃsabhoge asitañjananagare mahākaṃso nāma rājā rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a4:729_4: Tassā jātadivase nemittakā brāhmaṇā “etissā kucchiyaṃ nibbattaputtā kaṃsagottaṃ kaṃsavaṃsaṃ nāsessantī”ti byākariṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:729_11: etaṃ kassaci adatvā nissāmikaṃ katvā paṭijaggissāmā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:729_12: Te ekathūṇakaṃ pāsādaṃ kāretvā taṃ tattha vasāpesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:729_14: Andhakaveṇḍo nāma dāso tassā sāmiko ārakkhamakāsi.
atk-s0513a4:730_0: Tadā uttaramadhurāya mahāsāgaro nāma rājā rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a4:730_3: Tesu pitu accayena sāgaro rājā ahosi,
atk-s0513a4:730_5: So upakaṃsassa sahāyako ekācariyakule ekato uggahitasippo.
atk-s0513a4:730_6: So sāgarassa bhātu antepure dubbhitvā bhāyamāno palāyitvā kaṃsabhoge upakaṃsassa santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:730_9: So rājupaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanto devagabbhāya nivāsaṃ ekathambhaṃ pāsādaṃ disvā “kasseso nivāso”ti pucchitvā
atk-s0513a4:730_10: taṃ kāraṇaṃ sutvā devagabbhāya paṭibaddhacitto ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:730_11: Devagabbhāpi ekadivasaṃ taṃ upakaṃsena saddhiṃ rājupaṭṭhānaṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā “ko eso”ti pucchitvā “mahāsāgarassa
atk-s0513a4:730_12: putto upasāgaro nāmā”ti nandigopāya santikā sutvā tasmiṃ paṭibaddhacittā ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:730_16: garuka”nti vatvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ devagabbhāya ārocesi.
atk-s0513a4:730_17: Sā pakatiyāva tasmiṃ paṭibaddhacittā taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā nandigopā upasāgarassa saññaṃ datvā rattibhāge taṃ pāsādaṃ āropesi.
atk-s0513a4:730_19: Atha nesaṃ punappunaṃ saṃvāsena devagabbhā gabbhaṃ paṭilabhi.
atk-s0513a4:731_2: sā abhayaṃ yācitvā taṃ antaraṃ kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:731_9: Bhātaro sutvā haṭṭhatuṭṭhā tassā “añjanadevī”ti nāmaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:731_14: Tāsu paripuṇṇagabbhāsu ekadivasameva devagabbhā puttaṃ vijāyi,
atk-s0513a4:731_16: Devagabbhā puttassa vināsanabhayena puttaṃ nandigopāya rahassena pesetvā tassā dhītaraṃ āharāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:731_19: dhītara”nti pucchitvā “dhītara”nti vutte “tena hi posethā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:731_35: Te andhakaveṇḍadāsaputtā dasa bhātikā ceṭakāti pākaṭā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:732_0: Te aparabhāge vuddhimanvāya thāmabalasampannā kakkhaḷā pharusā hutvā vilopaṃ karontā vicaranti,
atk-s0513a4:732_2: Manussā sannipatitvā “andhakaveṇḍadāsaputtā dasa bhātikā raṭṭhaṃ vilumpantī”ti rājaṅgaṇe upakkosiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:732_3: Rājā andhakaveṇḍaṃ pakkosāpetvā “kasmā puttehi vilopaṃ kārāpesī”ti tajjesi.
atk-s0513a4:732_4: Evaṃ dutiyampi tatiyampi manussehi upakkose kate rājā taṃ santajjesi.
atk-s0513a4:732_8: Rājā bhīto “kena te upāyena gaṇhāmā”ti amacce pucchitvā “ete, deva,
atk-s0513a4:732_10: nagare yuddhaṃ kāretvā tattha ne yuddhamaṇḍalaṃ āgate gāhāpetvā māressāmā”ti vutte cārurañca,
atk-s0513a4:732_11: muṭṭhikañcāti dve malle posetvā “ito sattame divase yuddhaṃ bhavissatī”ti nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā rājaṅgaṇe
atk-s0513a4:732_12: yuddhamaṇḍalaṃ sajjāpetvā akkhavāṭaṃ kāretvā yuddhamaṇḍalaṃ alaṅkārāpetvā dhajapaṭākaṃ bandhāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:732_14: Cakkāticakkaṃ mañcātimañcaṃ bandhitvā cāruramuṭṭhikā yuddhamaṇḍalaṃ āgantvā vaggantā gajjantā apphoṭentā vicariṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:732_15: Dasa bhātikāpi āgantvā rajakavīthiṃ vilumpitvā vaṇṇasāṭake nivāsetvā gandhāpaṇesu gandhaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:732_16: mālākārāpaṇesu mālaṃ vilumpitvā vilittagattā māladhārino katakaṇṇapūrā vaggantā gajjantā apphoṭentā yuddhamaṇḍalaṃ pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:733_1: Baladevo taṃ disvā “na naṃ hatthena chupissāmī”ti hatthisālato mahantaṃ hatthiyottaṃ āharitvā vaggitvā
atk-s0513a4:733_2: gajjitvā yottaṃ khipitvā cāruraṃ udare veṭhetvā dve yottakoṭiyo ekato katvā vattetvā ukkhipitvā sīsamatthake
atk-s0513a4:733_3: bhametvā bhūmiyaṃ pothetvā bahi akkhavāṭe khipi.
atk-s0513a4:733_7: amallomhī”ti vadantameva “nāhaṃ tava mallabhāvaṃ vā amallabhāvaṃ vā jānāmī”ti hatthe gahetvā bhūmiyaṃ
atk-s0513a4:733_8: pothetvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpetvā bahi akkhavāṭe khipi.
atk-s0513a4:733_9: Muṭṭhiko maranto “yakkho hutvā taṃ khādituṃ labhissāmī”ti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a4:733_10: So kālamattikaaṭaviyaṃ nāma yakkho hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0513a4:733_14: Mahājano bhītatasito “avassayā no hothā”ti tesaṃ pādesu patitvā nipajji.
atk-s0513a4:733_15: Te dvepi mātule māretvā asitañjananagare rajjaṃ gahetvā mātāpitaro tattha katvā “sakalajambudīpe rajjaṃ
atk-s0513a4:733_16: gaṇhissāmā”ti nikkhamitvā anupubbena kālayonakarañño nivāsaṃ ayujjhanagaraṃ gantvā taṃ parikkhipitvā
atk-s0513a4:733_17: ṭhitaṃ parikhārukkhagahanaṃ viddhaṃsetvā pākāraṃ bhinditvā rājānaṃ gahetvā taṃ rajjaṃ attano hatthagataṃ
atk-s0513a4:733_19: Tassa pana nagarassa ekato samuddo ekato pabbato,
atk-s0513a4:734_0: Tassa ārakkhaṃ gahetvā ṭhitayakkho paccāmitte disvā gadrabhavesena gadrabharavaṃ ravati.
atk-s0513a4:734_1: Tasmiṃ khaṇe yakkhānubhāvena sakalanagaraṃ uppatitvā mahāsamudde ekasmiṃ dīpake tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0513a4:734_3: Tadāpi so gadrabho tesaṃ dasannaṃ bhātikānaṃ āgamanaṃ ñatvā gadrabharavaṃ ravi.
atk-s0513a4:734_4: Nagaraṃ uppatitvā dīpake patiṭṭhāya tesu nagaraṃ adisvā nivattantesu punāgantvā sakaṭṭhāne patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:734_7: Te dvāravatinagare rajjaṃ gaṇhituṃ asakkontā kaṇhadīpāyanassa isino santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā “bhante,
atk-s0513a4:734_8: mayaṃ dvāravatiyaṃ rajjaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoma,
atk-s0513a4:734_9: ekaṃ no upāyaṃ karothā”ti pucchitvā “parikhāpiṭṭhe asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne eko gadrabho carati.
atk-s0513a4:734_13: ayaṃ vo nipphajjanūpāyo”ti vutte tāpasaṃ vanditvā gantvā gadrabhassa pādesu gahetvā nipatitvā “sāmi,
atk-s0513a4:734_14: ṭhapetvā tumhe añño amhākaṃ avassayo natthi,
atk-s0513a4:734_15: amhākaṃ nagaraṃ gaṇhanakāle mā ravitthā”ti yāciṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:734_17: tumhe pana paṭhamataraṃ āgantvā cattāro janā mahantāni ayanaṅgalāni gahetvā catūsu nagaradvāresu mahante
atk-s0513a4:734_18: ayakhāṇuke bhūmiyaṃ ākoṭetvā nagarassa uppatanakāle naṅgalāni gahetvā naṅgalabaddhaṃ ayasaṅkhalikaṃ ayakhāṇuke
atk-s0513a4:735_0: Te “sādhū”ti vatvā tasmiṃ aviravanteyeva naṅgalāni ādāya catūsu nagaradvāresu khāṇuke bhūmiyaṃ ākoṭetvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:735_3: Catūsu dvāresu ṭhitā catūhi ayanaṅgalehi gahetvā naṅgalabaddhā ayasaṅkhalikā khāṇukesu bandhiṃsu,
atk-s0513a4:735_5: Dasa bhātikā tato nagaraṃ pavisitvā rājānaṃ māretvā rajjaṃ gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:735_6: Evaṃ te sakalajambudīpe tesaṭṭhiyā nagarasahassesu sabbarājāno cakkena jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpetvā dvāravatiyaṃ
atk-s0513a4:735_7: vasamānā rajjaṃ dasa koṭṭhāse katvā vibhajiṃsu,
atk-s0513a4:735_9: Tato puna “ekādasa koṭṭhāse karomā”ti vutte aṅkuro “mama koṭṭhāsaṃ tassā detha,
atk-s0513a4:735_11: kevalaṃ tumhe attano janapade mayhaṃ suṅkaṃ vissajjethā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:735_12: Te “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā tassa koṭṭhāsaṃ bhaginiyā datvā saddhiṃ tāya nava rājāno dvāravatiyaṃ vasiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:735_14: Evaṃ tesu aparāparaṃ puttadhītāhi vaḍḍhamānesu addhāne gate mātāpitaro kālamakaṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:736_2: Rājā sokapareto sabbakiccāni pahāya mañcassa aṭaniṃ pariggahetvā vilapanto nipajji.
atk-s0513a4:736_3: Tasmiṃ kāle ghaṭapaṇḍito cintesi “ṭhapetvā maṃ añño koci mama bhātu sokaṃ harituṃ samattho nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a4:736_6: sasaṃ me dethā”ti ākāsaṃ ullokento sakalanagaraṃ vicari.
atk-s0513a4:736_8: Tasmiṃ kāle rohiṇeyyo nāma amacco vāsudevarañño santikaṃ gantvā tena saddhiṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpento paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:738_0: “Uṭṭhehi kaṇha kiṃ sesi, ko attho supanena te;
atk-s0513a4:739_0: Yopi tuyhaṃ sako bhātā, hadayaṃ cakkhu ca dakkhiṇaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:740_0: Tassa vātā balīyanti, ghaṭo jappati kesavā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:741_3: Hadayaṃ cakkhu ca dakkhiṇanti hadayena ceva dakkhiṇacakkhunā ca samānoti attho.
atk-s0513a4:741_4: Tassa vātā balīyantīti tassa hadayaṃ apasmāravātā avattharantīti attho.
atk-s0513a4:742_0: Evaṃ amaccena vutte tassa ummattakabhāvaṃ ñatvā satthā abhisambuddho hutvā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:746_0: Rājā uṭṭhāya sīghaṃ pāsādā otaritvā ghaṭapaṇḍitassa santikaṃ gantvā ubhosu hatthesu daḷhaṃ gahetvā tena saddhiṃ sallapanto tatiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:749_0: Saso sasoti lapasi, ko nu te sasamāharī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:750_0: Tattha kevalaṃ dvārakaṃ imanti kasmā ummattako viya hutvā sakalaṃ imaṃ dvāravatinagaraṃ vicaranto “saso saso”ti lapasi.
atk-s0513a4:751_0: So raññā evaṃ vuttepi punappunaṃ tadeva vacanaṃ vadati. Rājā puna dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:758_1: tesu suvaṇṇamayādīsu yaṃ icchasi, taṃ vada,
atk-s0513a4:759_0: Rañño kathaṃ sutvā ghaṭapaṇḍito chaṭṭhaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:762_0: Candato sasamicchāmi, taṃ me ohara kesavā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:764_0: Rājā tassa kathaṃ sutvā “nissaṃsayaṃ me bhātā ummattakova jāto”ti domanassappatto sattamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:768_2: mayhaṃ piyañāti so tvaṃ nūna atimadhuraṃ attano jīvitaṃ vijahissasi,
atk-s0513a4:769_0: Ghaṭapaṇḍito rañño vacanaṃ sutvā niccalo ṭhatvā “bhātika,
atk-s0513a4:769_1: tvaṃ candato sasakaṃ patthentassa taṃ alabhitvā jīvitakkhayabhāvaṃ jānanto kiṃ kāraṇā mataputtaṃ anusocasī”ti vatvā aṭṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:772_0: Kasmā pure mataṃ puttaṃ, ajjāpi manusocasī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:773_0: Tattha evanti idaṃ alabbhaneyyaṭṭhānaṃ nāma na patthetabbanti yadi evaṃ jānāsi.
atk-s0513a4:773_1: Yadaññamanusāsasīti evaṃ jānantova yadi aññaṃ anusāsasīti attho.
atk-s0513a4:773_2: Pureti atha kasmā ito catumāsamatthake mataputtaṃ ajjāpi anusocasīti vadati.
atk-s0513a4:774_2: tvaṃ pana apaññāyamānassa socasī”ti vatvā tassa dhammaṃ desento puna dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:776_0: “Yaṃ na labbhā manussena, amanussena vā puna;
atk-s0513a4:777_0: Jāto me mā marī putto, kuto labbhā alabbhiyaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:781_0: Tattha yanti bhātika yaṃ evaṃ jāto me putto mā marīti manussena vā devena vā puna na labbhā na sakkā laddhuṃ,
atk-s0513a4:781_2: tadetaṃ kuto labbhā kena kāraṇena sakkā laddhuṃ,
atk-s0513a4:781_12: taṃ etehi mantapayogādīhi ānetuṃ na sakkā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:782_2: mama sokaharaṇatthāya tayā idaṃ kata”nti ghaṭapaṇḍitaṃ vaṇṇento catasso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:788_0: Vārinā viya osiñcaṃ, sabbaṃ nibbāpaye daraṃ.
atk-s0513a4:794_0: Na socāmi na rodāmi, tava sutvāna māṇavā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:795_1: yathā yena kāraṇena ajja maṃ puttasokaparetaṃ ghaṭo purisapaṇḍito sokaharaṇatthāya nijjhāpaye nijjhāpesi bodhesi.
atk-s0513a4:795_2: Yassa aññassapi etādisā purisapaṇḍitā amaccā assu,
atk-s0513a4:801_0: Evaṃ ghaṭakumārena vītasoke kate vāsudeve rajjaṃ anusāsante dīghassa addhuno accayena dasabhātikaputtā
atk-s0513a4:801_3: Te ekaṃ daharakumāraṃ alaṅkaritvā gabbhiniākārena dassetvā udare masūrakaṃ bandhitvā tassa santikaṃ netvā “bhante,
atk-s0513a4:801_6: mayhaṃ nu kho āyusaṅkhāro kīdiso hotī”ti olokento “ajjeva maraṇaṃ bhavissatī”ti ñatvā “kumārā iminā tumhākaṃ ko attho”ti vatvā “kathetheva no,
atk-s0513a4:801_7: bhante”ti nibaddho “ayaṃ ito sattame divase khadiraghaṭikaṃ vijāyissati,
atk-s0513a4:801_9: apica kho pana tumhe taṃ khadiraghaṭikaṃ gahetvā jhāpetvā chārikaṃ nadiyaṃ pakkhipeyyāthā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:801_11: puriso vijāyanako nāma natthī”ti vatvā tantarajjukaṃ nāma kammakaraṇaṃ katvā tattheva jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:801_12: Rājāno kumāre pakkosāpetvā “kiṃ kāraṇā tāpasaṃ mārayitthā”ti pucchitvā sabbaṃ sutvā bhītā tassa ārakkhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:801_13: datvā sattame divase tassa kucchito nikkhantaṃ khadiraghaṭikaṃ jhāpetvā chārikaṃ nadiyaṃ khipiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:801_14: Sā nadiyā vuyhamānā mukhadvāre ekapasse laggi,
atk-s0513a4:802_0: Athekadivasaṃ te rājāno “samuddakīḷaṃ kīḷissāmā”ti mukhadvāraṃ gantvā mahāmaṇḍapaṃ kārāpetvā alaṅkatamaṇḍape
atk-s0513a4:802_1: khādantā pivantā kīḷāvaseneva pavattahatthapādaparāmāsā dvidhā bhijjitvā mahākalahaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:802_2: Atheko aññaṃ muggaraṃ alabhanto erakavanato ekaṃ erakapattaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a4:802_7: Tesu mahāvināsaṃ vinassantesu vāsudevo ca baladevo ca bhaginī añjanadevī ca purohito cāti cattāro janā rathaṃ abhiruhitvā palāyiṃsu,
atk-s0513a4:802_9: Tepi cattāro rathena palāyantā kāḷamattikaaṭaviṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:802_10: So hi muṭṭhikamallo patthanaṃ katvā yakkho hutvā tattha nibbatto baladevassa āgatabhāvaṃ ñatvā tattha
atk-s0513a4:802_11: gāmaṃ māpetvā mallavesaṃ gahetvā “ko yujjhitukāmo”ti vagganto gajjanto apphoṭento vicari.
atk-s0513a4:802_13: ahaṃ iminā saddhiṃ yujjhissāmī”ti vatvā vāsudeve vārenteyeva rathā oruyha tassa santikaṃ gantvā vagganto gajjanto apphoṭesi.
atk-s0513a4:802_14: Atha naṃ so pasāritahattheyeva gahetvā mūlakandaṃ viya khādi.
atk-s0513a4:802_15: Vāsudevo tassa matabhāvaṃ ñatvā bhaginiñca purohitañca ādāya sabbarattiṃ gantvā sūriyodaye ekaṃ paccantagāmaṃ
atk-s0513a4:802_16: patvā “āhāraṃ pacitvā āharathā”ti bhaginiñca purohitañca gāmaṃ pahiṇitvā sayaṃ ekasmiṃ gacchantare paṭicchanno nipajji.
atk-s0513a4:803_0: Atha naṃ jarā nāma eko luddako gacchaṃ calantaṃ disvā “sūkaro ettha bhavissatī”ti saññāya sattiṃ khipitvā
atk-s0513a4:803_1: pāde vijjhitvā “ko maṃ vijjhī”ti vutte manussassa viddhabhāvaṃ ñatvā bhīto palāyituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0513a4:803_2: Rājā satiṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā uṭṭhāya “mātula, mā bhāyi,
atk-s0513a4:803_3: ehī”ti pakkositvā āgataṃ “kosi nāma tva”nti pucchitvā “ahaṃ sāmi,
atk-s0513a4:803_4: jarā nāmā”ti vutte “jarāya viddho marissatīti kira maṃ porāṇā byākariṃsu,
atk-s0513a4:803_5: nissaṃsayaṃ ajja mayā maritabba”nti ñatvā “mātula, mā bhāyi,
atk-s0513a4:803_6: ehi pahāraṃ me bandhā”ti tena pahāramukhaṃ bandhāpetvā taṃ uyyojesi.
atk-s0513a4:803_10: tumhe pana sukhumālā aññaṃ kammaṃ katvā jīvituṃ na sakkhissatha,
atk-s0513a4:803_11: imaṃ vijjaṃ sikkhathā”ti ekaṃ vijjaṃ sikkhāpetvā te uyyojetvā tattheva jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a4:803_12: Evaṃ añjanadeviṃ ṭhapetvā sabbeva vināsaṃ pāpuṇiṃsūti.
atk-s0513a4:804_1: evaṃ porāṇakapaṇḍitā paṇḍitānaṃ kathaṃ sutvā attano puttasokaṃ hariṃsu,
atk-s0513a4:804_2: mā cintayī”ti vatvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a4:811_0: Bilāra cakka bhūri ca, maṅgala ghaṭa soḷasa.
atk-s0513a4:816_0: Tassa nāgassa vippavāsenāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto mātuposakabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:816_4: porāṇakapaṇḍitā tiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbattāpi mātarā viyuttā sattāhaṃ nirāhāratāya sussamānā rājārahaṃ
atk-s0513a4:816_5: bhojanaṃ labhitvāpi ‘mātarā vinā na bhuñjissāmā’ti mātaraṃ disvāva gocaraṃ gaṇhiṃsū”ti vatvā tehi yācito
atk-s0513a4:817_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto himavantapadese hatthiyoniyaṃ nibbattitvā sabbaseto
atk-s0513a4:817_1: ahosi abhirūpo dassanīyo pāsādiko lakkhaṇasampanno asītihatthisahassaparivāro.
atk-s0513a4:817_4: So madhuramadhurāni phalāphalāni hatthīnaṃ datvā mātu santikaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0513a4:817_6: So pariggaṇhanto taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā “yūthaṃ chaḍḍetvā mātarameva posessāmī”ti rattibhāge aññesaṃ hatthīnaṃ
atk-s0513a4:817_7: ajānantānaṃ mātaraṃ gahetvā caṇḍoraṇapabbatapādaṃ gantvā ekaṃ naḷiniṃ upanissāya ṭhitāya pabbataguhāyaṃ
atk-s0513a4:817_9: Atheko bārāṇasivāsī vanacarako maggamūḷho disaṃ vavatthapetuṃ asakkonto mahantena saddena paridevi.
atk-s0513a4:817_10: Bodhisatto tassa saddaṃ sutvā “ayaṃ puriso anātho,
atk-s0513a4:817_12: yaṃ esa mayi ṭhite idha vinasseyyā”ti tassa santikaṃ gantvā taṃ bhayena palāyantaṃ disvā “ambho purisa,
atk-s0513a4:817_17: ajja me sattamo divaso”ti vutte “bho purisa, mā bhāyi,
atk-s0513a4:817_18: ahaṃ taṃ manussapathe ṭhapessāmī”ti taṃ attano piṭṭhiyaṃ nisīdāpetvā araññā nīharitvā nivatti.
atk-s0513a4:817_19: Sopi pāpo “nagaraṃ gantvā rañño ārocessāmī”ti rukkhasaññaṃ pabbatasaññaṃ karontova nikkhamitvā bārāṇasiṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:818_1: Rājā “sace kenaci katthaci opavayhaṃ kātuṃ yuttarūpo hatthī diṭṭho atthi,
atk-s0513a4:818_4: tumhākaṃ opavayho bhavituṃ yuttarūpo sabbaseto sīlavā hatthirājā diṭṭho,
atk-s0513a4:818_6: mayā saddhiṃ hatthācariye pesetvā taṃ gaṇhāpethā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:818_7: Rājā “sādhū”ti “imaṃ maggadesakaṃ katvā araññaṃ gantvā iminā vuttaṃ hatthināgaṃ ānethā”ti tena saddhiṃ mahantena parivārena hatthācariyaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0513a4:818_8: So tena saddhiṃ gantvā bodhisattaṃ naḷiniṃ pavisitvā gocaraṃ gaṇhantaṃ passi.
atk-s0513a4:818_9: Bodhisattopi hatthācariyaṃ disvā “idaṃ bhayaṃ na aññato uppannaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:818_11: ahaṃ kho pana mahābalo hatthisahassampi viddhaṃsetuṃ samattho homi,
atk-s0513a4:818_15: tasmā ajja sattīhi koṭṭiyamānopi na kujjhissāmī”ti adhiṭṭhāya sīsaṃ nāmetvā niccalova aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:818_16: Hatthācariyo padumasaraṃ otaritvā tassa lakkhaṇasampattiṃ disvā “ehi puttā”ti rajatadāmasadisāya soṇḍāya gahetvā sattame divase bārāṇasiṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a4:818_17: Bodhisattamātā pana putte anāgacchante “putto me rājarājamahāmattādīhi nīto bhavissati,
atk-s0513a4:818_18: idāni tassa vippavāsena ayaṃ vanasaṇḍo vaḍḍhissatī”ti paridevamānā dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:820_0: “Tassa nāgassa vippavāsena, virūḷho sallakī ca kuṭajā ca;
atk-s0513a4:821_0: Kuruvindakaravīrā bhisasāmā ca, nivāte pupphitā ca kaṇikārā.
atk-s0513a4:824_0: Yattha rājā rājakumāro vā, kavacamabhihessati achambhito”ti.
atk-s0513a4:825_2: Sallakī ca kuṭajā cāti indasālarukkhā ca kuṭajarukkhā ca.
atk-s0513a4:825_3: Kuruvindakaravīrā bhisasāmā cāti kuruvindarukkhā ca karavīranāmakāni mahātiṇāni ca bhisāni ca sāmākāni cāti attho.
atk-s0513a4:825_4: Ete ca sabbe idāni vaḍḍhissantīti paridevati.
atk-s0513a4:825_6: Pupphitāti mama puttena sākhaṃ bhañjitvā akhādiyamānā kaṇikārāpi pupphitā bhavissantīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0513a4:825_7: Kocidevāti katthacideva gāme vā nagare vā.
atk-s0513a4:825_9: Bharanti piṇḍenāti ajja mātuposakaṃ nāgarājaṃ rājārahassa bhojanassa suvaḍḍhitena piṇḍena posenti.
atk-s0513a4:825_11: Kavacamabhihessatīti saṅgāmaṃ pavisitvā paccāmittānaṃ kavacaṃ abhihanissati bhindissati.
atk-s0513a4:825_13: “yattha mama putte nisinno rājā vā rājakumāro vā achambhito hutvā sapattānaṃ kavacaṃ hanissati,
atk-s0513a4:825_14: taṃ me puttaṃ nāgarājānaṃ suvaṇṇābharaṇā ajja piṇḍena bharantī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:826_2: Hatthācariyo bodhisattaṃ katagandhaparibhaṇḍaṃ alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ hatthisālaṃ netvā vicitrasāṇiyā parikkhipāpetvā rañño ārocāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:826_3: Rājā nānaggarasabhojanaṃ ādāya gantvā bodhisattassa dāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:826_4: So “mātaraṃ vinā gocaraṃ na gaṇhissāmī”ti piṇḍaṃ na gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a4:826_5: Atha naṃ yācanto rājā tatiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:828_0: “Gaṇhāhi nāga kabaḷaṃ, mā nāga kisako bhava;
atk-s0513a4:833_0: Khāṇuṃ pādena ghaṭṭeti, giriṃ caṇḍoraṇaṃ patī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:834_4: Ghaṭṭetīti paridevamānā tattha tattha pādena pothentī nūna pādena hanati.
atk-s0513a4:835_0: Atha naṃ pucchanto rājā pañcamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:837_0: “Kā nu te sā mahānāga, andhā apariṇāyikā;
atk-s0513a4:838_0: Khāṇuṃ pādena ghaṭṭeti, giriṃ caṇḍoraṇaṃ patī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:843_0: Khāṇuṃ pādena ghaṭṭeti, giriṃ caṇḍoraṇaṃ patī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:844_0: Rājā chaṭṭhagāthāya tamatthaṃ sutvā muñcāpento sattamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:847_0: Sametu mātarā nāgo, saha sabbehi ñātibhī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:848_0: Tattha yoyaṃ bharatīti ayaṃ nāgo “ahaṃ, mahārāja,
atk-s0513a4:848_2: mayā vinā mayhaṃ mātā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇissati,
atk-s0513a4:848_3: tāya vinā mayhaṃ issariyena attho natthi,
atk-s0513a4:848_4: ajja me mātu gocaraṃ alabhantiyā sattamo divaso”ti vadati,
atk-s0513a4:848_7: Sabbehi ñātibhīti saddhiṃ esa mātarā sametu samāgacchatūti.
atk-s0513a4:856_0: So kira nāgo bandhanā mutto thokaṃ vissamitvā rañño dasarājadhammagāthāya dhammaṃ desetvā “appamatto hohi,
atk-s0513a4:856_1: mahārājā”ti ovādaṃ datvā mahājanena gandhamālādīhi pūjiyamāno nagarā nikkhamitvā tadaheva taṃ padumasaraṃ
atk-s0513a4:856_2: patvā “mama mātaraṃ gocaraṃ gāhāpetvāva sayaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti bahuṃ bhisamuḷālaṃ ādāya soṇḍapūraṃ udakaṃ
atk-s0513a4:856_3: gahetvā guhāleṇato nikkhamitvā guhādvāre nisinnāya mātuyā santikaṃ gantvā sattāhaṃ nirāhāratāya mātu
atk-s0513a4:856_5: tamatthaṃ āvikaronto satthā dve gāthā abhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:856_6: Bodhisattassa mātāpi “devo vassatī”ti saññāya taṃ akkosantī dasamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:859_0: Gato me atrajo putto, yo mayhaṃ paricārako”ti.
atk-s0513a4:861_0: Atha naṃ samassāsento bodhisatto ekādasamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:865_0: Tattha āgato tyāhanti āgato te ahaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:865_2: Yasassināti mahāparivārena tena raññā maṅgalahatthibhāvāya gahitopi ahaṃ mutto,
atk-s0513a4:865_3: idāni tava santikaṃ āgato uṭṭhehi gocaraṃ gaṇhāhīti.
atk-s0513a4:866_0: Sā tuṭṭhamānasā rañño anumodanaṃ karontī osānagāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:869_0: Yo me puttaṃ pamocesi, sadā vuddhāpacāyika”nti.
atk-s0513a4:870_0: Tadā rājā bodhisattassa guṇe pasīditvā naḷiniyā avidūre gāmaṃ māpetvā bodhisattassa ca mātu cassa nibaddhaṃ vattaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a4:870_1: Aparabhāge bodhisatto mātari kālakatāya tassā sarīraparihāraṃ katvā kāraṇḍakaassamapadaṃ nāma gato.
atk-s0513a4:870_2: Tasmiṃ pana ṭhāne himavantato otaritvā pañcasatā isayo vasiṃsu,
atk-s0513a4:870_4: Rājā bodhisattassa samānarūpaṃ silāpaṭimaṃ kāretvā mahāsakkāraṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0513a4:870_5: Sakalajambudīpavāsino anusaṃvaccharaṃ sannipatitvā hatthimahaṃ nāma kariṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:871_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a4:875_0: Suṇohi mayhaṃ vacanaṃ janindāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ānandattherena laddhavare ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:875_1: Paṭhamabodhiyañhi vīsati vassāni bhagavato anibaddhupaṭṭhākā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:875_12: ekacce bhikkhū ‘iminā maggena gacchāmā’ti vutte aññena gacchanti,
atk-s0513a4:875_16: ahaṃ upaṭṭhahissāmī”ti sirasi añjaliṃ katvā uṭṭhite sāriputtattherādayo “tumhākaṃ patthanā matthakaṃ pattā,
atk-s0513a4:875_25: sace pana bhagavā mayā gahitaṃ nimantanaṃ gamissati,
atk-s0513a4:875_26: sace ahaṃ tiroraṭṭhā tirojanapadā bhagavantaṃ daṭṭhuṃ āgataṃ parisaṃ āgatakkhaṇeyeva dassetuṃ labhissāmi,
atk-s0513a4:875_29: sace yaṃ bhagavā mama parammukhā dhammaṃ katheti,
atk-s0513a4:875_31: evāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ upaṭṭhahissāmī”ti ime cattāro paṭikkhepe catasso ca āyācanāti aṭṭha vare yāci,
atk-s0513a4:876_0: So tato paṭṭhāya pañcavīsati vassāni nibaddhupaṭṭhāko ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:876_1: So pañcasu ṭhānesu etadagge ṭhapanaṃ patvā āgamasampadā,
atk-s0513a4:876_7: buddhūpanissayasampadāti imāhi sattahi sampadāhi samannāgato buddhassa santike aṭṭhavaradāyajjaṃ labhitvā
atk-s0513a4:876_8: buddhasāsane paññāto gaganamajjhe cando viya pākaṭo ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:876_13: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a4:876_17: taṃ taṃ adāsiṃyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:877_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto tassa putto juṇhakumāro nāma hutvā takkasilāyaṃ
atk-s0513a4:877_1: sippaṃ uggahetvā ācariyassa anuyogaṃ datvā rattibhāge andhakāre ācariyassa gharā nikkhamitvā attano nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:877_2: vegena gacchanto aññataraṃ brāhmaṇaṃ bhikkhaṃ caritvā attano nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ gacchantaṃ apassanto bāhunā
atk-s0513a4:877_5: Kumāro kāruññena nivattitvā taṃ hatthe gahetvā uṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:877_10: na dānāhaṃ tava bhattamūlaṃ dātuṃ sakkomi,
atk-s0513a4:877_11: ahaṃ kho pana kāsikarañño putto juṇhakumāro nāma,
atk-s0513a4:877_12: mayi rajje patiṭṭhite āgantvā maṃ dhanaṃ yāceyyāsī”ti vatvā niṭṭhitasippo ācariyaṃ vanditvā bārāṇasiṃ gantvā pitu sippaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0513a4:877_15: So juṇharājā nāma hutvā dhammena rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a4:877_16: Brāhmaṇo taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā “idāni mama bhattamūlaṃ āharissāmī”ti bārāṇasiṃ gantvā rājānaṃ alaṅkatanagaraṃ
atk-s0513a4:877_17: padakkhiṇaṃ karontameva disvā ekasmiṃ unnatappadese ṭhito hatthaṃ pasāretvā jayāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:877_19: Brāhmaṇo tena adiṭṭhabhāvaṃ ñatvā kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpento paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:879_0: “Suṇohi mayhaṃ vacanaṃ janinda, atthena juṇhamhi idhānupatto;
atk-s0513a4:880_0: Na brāhmaṇe addhike tiṭṭhamāne, gantabbamāhu dvipadinda seṭṭhā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:881_1: tayi juṇhamhi ahaṃ ekena atthena idhānuppatto,
atk-s0513a4:881_4: Gantabbanti taṃ addhikaṃ addhānamāgataṃ yācamānaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ anoloketvāva gantabbanti paṇḍitā na āhu na kathentīti.
atk-s0513a4:882_0: Rājā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā hatthiṃ vajiraṅkusena niggahetvā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:884_0: “Suṇomi tiṭṭhāmi vadehi brahme, yenāsi atthena idhānupatto;
atk-s0513a4:885_0: Kaṃ vā tvamatthaṃ mayi patthayāno, idhāgamo brahme tadiṅgha brūhī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:887_0: Tato paraṃ brāhmaṇassa ca rañño ca vacanapaṭivacanavasena sesagāthā kathitā –
atk-s0513a4:889_0: “Dadāhi me gāmavarāni pañca, dāsīsataṃ satta gavaṃsatāni;
atk-s0513a4:890_0: Parosahassañca suvaṇṇanikkhe, bhariyā ca me sādisī dve dadāhi.
atk-s0513a4:892_0: “Tapo nu te brāhmaṇa bhiṃsarūpo, mantā nu te brāhmaṇa cittarūpā;
atk-s0513a4:893_0: Yakkhā nu te assavā santi keci, atthaṃ vā me abhijānāsi kattaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:895_0: “Na me tapo atthi na cāpi mantā, yakkhāpi me assavā natthi keci;
atk-s0513a4:896_0: Atthampi te nābhijānāmi kattaṃ, pubbe ca kho saṅgatimattamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:898_0: “Paṭhamaṃ idaṃ dassanaṃ jānato me, na tābhijānāmi ito puratthā;
atk-s0513a4:899_0: Akkhāhi me pucchito etamatthaṃ, kadā kuhiṃ vā ahu saṅgamo no.
atk-s0513a4:904_0: “Te tattha ṭhatvāna ubho janinda, sārāṇiyaṃ vītisārayimha tattha;
atk-s0513a4:905_0: Sāyeva no saṅgatimattamāsi, tato na pacchā na pure ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:907_0: “Yadā kadāci manujesu brahme, samāgamo sappurisena hoti;
atk-s0513a4:908_0: Na paṇḍitā saṅgatisanthavāni, pubbe kataṃ vāpi vināsayanti.
atk-s0513a4:910_0: “Bālāva kho saṅgatisanthavāni, pubbe kataṃ vāpi vināsayanti;
atk-s0513a4:911_0: Bahumpi bālesu kataṃ vinassati, tathā hi bālā akataññurūpā.
atk-s0513a4:913_0: “Dhīrā ca kho saṅgatisanthavāni, pubbe kataṃ vāpi na nāsayanti;
atk-s0513a4:914_0: Appampi dhīresu kataṃ na nassati, tathā hi dhīrā sukataññurūpā.
atk-s0513a4:916_0: “Dadāmi te gāmavarāni pañca, dāsīsataṃ satta gavaṃsatāni;
atk-s0513a4:917_0: Parosahassañca suvaṇṇanikkhe, bhariyā ca te sādisī dve dadāmi.
atk-s0513a4:919_0: “Evaṃ sataṃ hoti samecca rāja, nakkhattarājāriva tārakānaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:920_0: Āpūratī kāsipatī tathāhaṃ, tayāpi me saṅgamo ajja laddho”ti.
atk-s0513a4:921_0: Tattha sādisīti rūpavaṇṇajātikulapadesena mayā sādisī ekasadisā dve mahāyasā bhariyā ca me dehīti attho.
atk-s0513a4:921_1: Bhiṃsarūpoti kiṃ nu te brāhmaṇa balavarūpasīlācāraguṇasaṅkhātaṃ tapokammaṃ atthīti pucchati.
atk-s0513a4:921_2: Mantā nu teti udāhu vicitrarūpā sabbatthasādhakā mantā te atthi.
atk-s0513a4:921_3: Assavāti vacanakārakā icchiticchitadāyakā yakkhā vā te keci santi.
atk-s0513a4:921_5: udāhu tayā kataṃ kiñci mama atthaṃ abhijānāsīti pucchati.
atk-s0513a4:921_6: Saṅgatimattanti samāgamamattaṃ tayā saddhiṃ pubbe mama āsīti vadati.
atk-s0513a4:921_7: Jānato meti jānantassa mama idaṃ paṭhamaṃ tava dassanaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:921_10: Te tattha ṭhatvānāti te mayaṃ tasmiṃ aṃsena aṃsaṃ ghaṭṭitaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā vītisārayimha tatthāti tasmiṃyeva
atk-s0513a4:921_14: tvaṃ “idānāhaṃ tava bhattamūlaṃ dātuṃ na sakkomi,
atk-s0513a4:921_15: ahaṃ kho pana kāsikarañño putto juṇhakumāro nāma,
atk-s0513a4:921_16: mayi rajje patiṭṭhite āgantvā maṃ dhanaṃ yāceyyāsī”ti avacāti imaṃ sāraṇīyakathaṃ karimhāti āha.
atk-s0513a4:921_20: Tatoti tato pana taṃmuhuttikamittadhammato pacchā vā pure vā kadāci amhākaṃ saṅgati nāma na bhūtapubbā.
atk-s0513a4:922_0: Na paṇḍitāti brāhmaṇa paṇḍitā nāma taṃmuhuttikaṃ saṅgatiṃ vā cirakālasanthavāni vā yaṃ kiñci pubbe kataguṇaṃ vā na nāsenti.
atk-s0513a4:922_3: tasmā tesu bahumpi kataṃ nassatīti attho.
atk-s0513a4:922_7: Dadāmi teti brāhmaṇena yācitayācitaṃ dadanto evamāha.
atk-s0513a4:922_8: Evaṃ satanti brāhmaṇo rañño anumodanaṃ karonto vadati,
atk-s0513a4:922_9: sataṃ sappurisānaṃ ekavārampi samecca saṅgati nāma evaṃ hoti.
atk-s0513a4:922_15: kāsiraṭṭhādhipati yathā cando tārakānaṃ majjhe ṭhito tārakagaṇaparivuto pāṭipadato paṭṭhāya yāva puṇṇamā āpūrati,
atk-s0513a4:922_16: tathā ahampi ajja tayā dinnehi gāmavarādīhi āpūrāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:922_17: Tayāpi meti mayā pubbe tayā saddhiṃ laddhopi saṅgamo aladdhova,
atk-s0513a4:922_18: ajja pana mama manorathassa nipphannattā mayā tayā saha saṅgamo laddho nāmāti nipphannaṃ me tayā saddhiṃ mittaphalanti vadati.
atk-s0513a4:923_2: pubbepāhaṃ ānandaṃ varena santappesiṃ yevā”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a4:927_0: Yasokaro puññakarohamasmīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto devadattassa pathavipavesanaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:927_1: Tadā hi bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “āvuso,
atk-s0513a4:927_2: devadatto tathāgatena saddhiṃ paṭivirujjhitvā pathaviṃ paviṭṭho”ti.
atk-s0513a4:927_5: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na idānevesa,
atk-s0513a4:927_7: mama jinacakke pahāraṃ datvā pathaviṃ paviṭṭho,
atk-s0513a4:927_8: pubbepi dhammacakke pahāraṃ datvā pathaviṃ pavisitvā avīciparāyaṇo jātoyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:928_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto kāmāvacaradevaloke dhammo nāma devaputto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0513a4:928_2: Tesu dhammo dibbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍito dibbarathavaramabhiruyha accharāgaṇaparivuto manussesu sāyamāsaṃ
atk-s0513a4:928_3: bhuñjitvā attano attano gharadvāre sukhakathāya nisinnesu puṇṇamuposathadivase gāmanigamajanapadarājadhānīsu
atk-s0513a4:928_4: ākāse ṭhatvā “pāṇātipātādīhi dasahi akusalakammapathehi viramitvā mātupaṭṭhānadhammaṃ pitupaṭṭhānadhammaṃ
atk-s0513a4:928_6: evaṃ saggaparāyaṇā hutvā mahantaṃ yasaṃ anubhavissathā”ti manusse dasa kusalakammapathe samādapento jambudīpaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karoti.
atk-s0513a4:928_7: Adhammo pana devaputto “pāṇaṃ hanathā”tiādinā nayena dasa akusalakammapathe samādapento jambudīpaṃ vāmaṃ karoti.
atk-s0513a4:928_8: Atha tesaṃ ākāse rathā sammukhā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:928_11: mayaṃ adhammassā”ti vatvā maggā okkamitvā dvidhā jātā.
atk-s0513a4:928_16: tava rathaṃ okkāmetvā mayhaṃ maggaṃ dehī”ti paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:931_0: Maggāraho devamanussapūjito, dhammo ahaṃ dehi adhamma magga”nti.
atk-s0513a4:935_0: Sa kissa hetumhi tavajja dajjaṃ, maggaṃ ahaṃ dhamma adinnapubbaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:937_0: “Dhammo have pāturahosi pubbe, pacchā adhammo udapādi loke;
atk-s0513a4:938_0: Jeṭṭho ca seṭṭho ca sanantano ca, uyyāhi jeṭṭhassa kaniṭṭha maggā.
atk-s0513a4:940_0: “Na yācanāya napi pātirūpā, na arahatā tehaṃ dadeyyaṃ maggaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:941_0: Yuddhañca no hotu ubhinnamajja, yuddhamhi yo jessati tassa maggo.
atk-s0513a4:944_0: Guṇehi sabbehi upetarūpo, dhammo adhamma tvaṃ kathaṃ vijessasi.
atk-s0513a4:946_0: “Lohena ve haññati jātarūpaṃ, na jātarūpena hananti lohaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:947_0: Sace adhammo hañchati dhammamajja, ayo suvaṇṇaṃ viya dassaneyyaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:949_0: “Sace tuvaṃ yuddhabalo adhamma, na tuyha vuḍḍhā ca garū ca atthi;
atk-s0513a4:950_0: Maggañca te dammi piyāppiyena, vācāduruttānipi te khamāmī”ti. –
atk-s0513a4:951_0: Imā cha gāthā tesaññeva vacanapaṭivacanavasena kathitā.
atk-s0513a4:952_0: Tattha sa kissa hetumhi tavajja dajjanti somhi ahaṃ adhammo adhammayānaṃ rathaṃ āruḷho abhīto balavā.
atk-s0513a4:952_3: Pubbeti paṭhamakappikakāle imasmiṃ loke dasakusalakammapathadhammo ca pubbe pāturahosi,
atk-s0513a4:952_5: Jeṭṭho cāti pure nibbattabhāvena ahaṃ jeṭṭho ca seṭṭho ca porāṇako ca,
atk-s0513a4:952_8: Napi pātirūpāti ahañhi te neva yācanāya na patirūpavacanena maggārahatāya maggaṃ dadeyyaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:952_9: Anuvisaṭoti ahaṃ catasso disā catasso anudisāti sabbā disā attano guṇena patthaṭo paññāto pākaṭo.
atk-s0513a4:952_12: Tuvaṃ yuddhabalo adhammāti sace tvaṃ yuddhabalosi adhamma.
atk-s0513a4:952_13: Vuḍḍhā ca garū cāti yadi tuyhaṃ “ime vuḍḍhā,
atk-s0513a4:952_15: Piyāppiyenāti piyenāpi appiyenāpi dadanto piyena viya te maggaṃ dadāmīti attho.
atk-s0513a4:953_0: Bodhisattena pana imāya gāthāya kathitakkhaṇeyeva adhammo rathe ṭhātuṃ asakkonto avaṃsiro pathaviyaṃ
atk-s0513a4:953_1: patitvā pathaviyā vivare dinne gantvā avīcimhiyeva nibbatti.
atk-s0513a4:953_2: Etamatthaṃ viditvā bhagavā abhisambuddho hutvā sesagāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:955_0: “Idañca sutvā vacanaṃ adhammo, avaṃsiro patito uddhapādo;
atk-s0513a4:956_0: Yuddhatthiko ce na labhāmi yuddhaṃ, ettāvatā hoti hato adhammo.
atk-s0513a4:958_0: “Khantībalo yuddhabalaṃ vijetvā, hantvā adhammaṃ nihanitva bhūmyā;
atk-s0513a4:959_0: Pāyāsi vitto abhiruyha sandanaṃ, maggeneva atibalo saccanikkamo.
atk-s0513a4:961_0: “Mātā pitā samaṇabrāhmaṇā ca, asammānitā yassa sake agāre;
atk-s0513a4:962_0: Idheva nikkhippa sarīradehaṃ, kāyassa bhedā nirayaṃ vajanti te;
atk-s0513a4:965_0: “Mātā pitā samaṇabrāhmaṇā ca, susammānitā yassa sake agāre;
atk-s0513a4:966_0: Idheva nikkhippa sarīradehaṃ, kāyassa bhedā sugatiṃ vajanti te;
atk-s0513a4:968_0: Tattha yuddhatthiko ceti ayaṃ tassa vilāpo,
atk-s0513a4:968_1: so kirevaṃ vilapantoyeva patitvā pathaviṃ paviṭṭho.
atk-s0513a4:968_6: evaṃ adhammo pathaviṃ paviṭṭho adhivāsanakhantībalo taṃ yuddhabalaṃ vijetvā vadhitvā bhūmiyaṃ nihanitvā
atk-s0513a4:968_7: pātetvā vittajātatāya vitto attano rathaṃ āruyha maggeneva saccanikkamo tathaparakkamo dhammadevaputto pāyāsi.
atk-s0513a4:968_9: Sarīradehanti imasmiṃyeva loke sarīrasaṅkhātaṃ dehaṃ nikkhipitvā.
atk-s0513a4:968_10: Nirayaṃ vajantīti yassa pāpapuggalassa ete sakkārārahā gehe asakkatā,
atk-s0513a4:968_14: tādisā paṇḍitā yathāpi dhammo sandanaṃ abhiruyha devalokaṃ gato,
atk-s0513a4:969_2: pubbepi devadatto mayā saddhiṃ paṭivirujjhitvā pathaviṃ paviṭṭho”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a4:973_0: Ekā nisinnāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:973_2: Satthā pana taṃ bhikkhuṃ “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ ukkaṇṭhitosī”ti pucchitvā “saccaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:973_3: bhante”ti vutte “bhikkhu kasmā kilesavasena evarūpe niyyānikasāsane pabbajitvā ukkaṇṭhitosi?
atk-s0513a4:973_4: Porāṇakapaṇḍitā samiddhe dvādasayojanike surundhananagare rajjaṃ kārentā devaccharapaṭibhāgāya itthiyā
atk-s0513a4:973_5: saddhiṃ satta vassasatāni ekagabbhe vasantāpi indriyāni bhinditvā lobhavasena na olokesu”nti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:974_0: Atīte kāsiraṭṭhe surundhananagare kāsirājā rajjaṃ kāresi,
atk-s0513a4:974_4: Aggamahesīpi rañño vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā tathā akāsi.
atk-s0513a4:974_5: Tadā bodhisatto brahmalokā cavitvā tasseva rañño aggamahesiyā kucchimhi nibbatti.
atk-s0513a4:974_6: Athassa mahājanassa hadayaṃ vaḍḍhetvā jātabhāvena “udayabhaddo”ti nāmaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:974_7: Kumārassa padasā caraṇakāle aññopi satto brahmalokā cavitvā tasseva rañño aññatarāya deviyā kucchimhi kumārikā hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0513a4:974_13: Rājā puttaṃ rajje abhisiñcitukāmo “kumārassa idāni rajjasukhasevanakālo,
atk-s0513a4:974_16: kilesesu me cittaṃ na allīyatī”ti paṭikkhipitvā punappunaṃ vuccamāno rattajambunadamayaṃ itthirūpaṃ kāretvā
atk-s0513a4:974_17: “evarūpaṃ itthiṃ labhamāno rajjaṃ sampaṭicchissāmī”ti mātāpitūnaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0513a4:974_18: Te taṃ suvaṇṇarūpakaṃ sakalajambudīpaṃ parihārāpetvā tathārūpaṃ itthiṃ alabhantā udayabhaddaṃ alaṅkāretvā tassa santike ṭhapesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:974_20: Atha nesaṃ anicchamānānaññeva vemātikaṃ bhaginiṃ udayabhaddakumāriṃ aggamahesiṃ katvā bodhisattaṃ rajje abhisiñciṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:975_0: Aparabhāge mātāpitūnaṃ accayena bodhisatto rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a4:975_1: Ubho ekagabbhe vasamānāpi lobhavasena indriyāni bhinditvā aññamaññaṃ na olokesuṃ,
atk-s0513a4:975_2: apica kho pana “yo amhesu paṭhamataraṃ kālaṃ karoti,
atk-s0513a4:975_3: so nibbattaṭṭhānato āgantvā ‘asukaṭṭhāne nibbattosmī’ti ārocetū”ti saṅgaramakaṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:975_4: Atha kho bodhisatto abhisekato sattavassasataccayena kālamakāsi.
atk-s0513a4:975_8: Bodhisattopi cutikkhaṇe tāvatiṃsabhavane sakkattaṃ patvā yasamahantatāya sattāhaṃ anussarituṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0513a4:975_9: Iti so manussagaṇanāya sattavassasataccayena āvajjetvā “udayabhaddaṃ rājadhītaraṃ dhanena vīmaṃsitvā
atk-s0513a4:975_10: sīhanādaṃ nadāpetvā dhammaṃ desetvā saṅgaraṃ mocetvā āgamissāmī”ti cintesi.
atk-s0513a4:975_12: Rājadhītāpi taṃ divasaṃ rattibhāge pihitesu dvāresu ṭhapitaārakkhe sattabhūmikapāsādavaratale alaṅkatasirigabbhe
atk-s0513a4:975_13: ekikāva niccalā attano sīlaṃ āvajjamānā nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:975_14: Atha sakko suvaṇṇamāsakapūraṃ ekaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ ādāya āgantvā sayanagabbheyeva pātubhavitvā ekamantaṃ
atk-s0513a4:975_15: ṭhito tāya saddhiṃ sallapanto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:978_0: Yācāmi taṃ kinnaranettacakkhu, imekarattiṃ ubhayo vasemā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:979_2: iriyāpathaṃ saṇṭhapetvā sucivatthā ekikāva nisinnāsīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0513a4:979_3: Aninditaṅgīti pādantato yāva kesaggā aninditasarīrā paramasobhaggappattasarīrā.
atk-s0513a4:979_4: Kinnaranettacakkhūti tīhi maṇḍalehi pañcahi ca pasādehi upasobhitattā kinnarānaṃ nettasadisehi cakkhūhi samannāgate.
atk-s0513a4:979_5: Imekarattinti imaṃ ekarattaṃ ajja imasmiṃ alaṅkatasayanagabbhe ekato vaseyyāmāti yācati.
atk-s0513a4:985_0: “Daharassa yuvino cāpi, āgamo ca na vijjati;
atk-s0513a4:986_0: Atha kena nu vaṇṇena, saṅgamaṃ icchase mayā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:987_0: Tattha okiṇṇantaraparikhanti idaṃ dvādasayojanikaṃ surundhanapuraṃ antarantarā udakaparikhānaṃ kaddamaparikhānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:987_2: Daḷhamaṭṭālakoṭṭhakanti thiratarehi aṭṭālakehi dvārakoṭṭhakehi ca samannāgataṃ.
atk-s0513a4:987_4: Duppavesamidaṃ puranti idaṃ sakalapurampi tassa anto māpitaṃ mayhaṃ nivāsapurampi ubhayaṃ kassaci pavisituṃ na sakkā.
atk-s0513a4:987_5: Āgamo cāti idha imāya velāya taruṇassa vā yobbanappattassa vā thāmasampannayodhassa vā aññassa vā mahantampi
atk-s0513a4:987_6: paṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā āgacchantassa āgamo nāma natthi.
atk-s0513a4:987_7: Saṅgamanti atha tvaṃ kena kāraṇena imāya velāya mayā saha samāgamaṃ icchasīti.
atk-s0513a4:991_0: Tvaṃ maṃ nandaya bhaddante, puṇṇakaṃsaṃ dadāmi te”ti.
atk-s0513a4:992_3: ahaṃ te imaṃ suvaṇṇamāsakapuṇṇaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ dadāmīti.
atk-s0513a4:995_0: “Devaṃva yakkhaṃ atha vā manussaṃ, na patthaye udayamaticca aññaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:996_0: Gaccheva tvaṃ yakkha mahānubhāva, mā cassu gantvā punarāvajitthā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:997_2: devaṃ vā yakkhaṃ vā udayaṃ atikkamitvā aññaṃ na patthemi,
atk-s0513a4:997_5: na me tayā ābhatena paṇṇākārena attho,
atk-s0513a4:997_6: gantvā ca mā imaṃ ṭhānaṃ punarāvajitthāti.
atk-s0513a4:998_0: So tassā sīhanādaṃ sutvā aṭṭhatvā gatasadiso hutvā tattheva antarahito aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:998_1: So punadivase tāya velāyameva suvaṇṇamāsakapūraṃ rajatapātiṃ ādāya tāya saddhiṃ sallapanto chaṭṭhaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:1000_0: “Yā sā rati uttamā kāmabhoginaṃ, yaṃhetu sattā visamaṃ caranti;
atk-s0513a4:1001_0: Mā taṃ ratiṃ jīyi tuvaṃ sucimhite, dadāmi te rūpiyaṃ kaṃsapūra”nti.
atk-s0513a4:1002_1: rājadhīte yā esā kāmabhogisattānaṃ ratīsu methunakāmarati nāma uttamā rati,
atk-s0513a4:1002_2: yassā ratiyā kāraṇā sattā kāyaduccaritādivisamaṃ caranti,
atk-s0513a4:1002_8: imaṃ te ahaṃ rūpiyapātiṃ suvaṇṇapūraṃ dadāmīti.
atk-s0513a4:1003_0: Rājadhītā cintesi “ayaṃ kathāsallāpaṃ labhanto punappunaṃ āgamissati,
atk-s0513a4:1004_0: Sakko tassā akathitabhāvaṃ ñatvā tattheva antarahito hutvā punadivase tāyameva velāya lohapātiṃ kahāpaṇapūraṃ ādāya “bhadde,
atk-s0513a4:1004_2: imaṃ te kahāpaṇapūraṃ lohapātiṃ dassāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:1006_0: “Nāriṃ naro nijjhapayaṃ dhanena, ukkaṃsatī yattha karoti chandaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:1007_0: Vipaccanīko tava devadhammo, paccakkhato thokatarena esī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1008_3: Naro hi nāma nāriṃ kilesaratikāraṇā dhanena nijjhāpento saññāpento yattha nāriyā chandaṃ karoti,
atk-s0513a4:1008_4: taṃ ukkaṃsati vaṇṇetvā thometvā bahutarena dhanena palobheti,
atk-s0513a4:1009_1: ahaṃ chekavāṇijo na niratthakena atthaṃ nāsemi,
atk-s0513a4:1009_2: sace tvaṃ āyunā vā vaṇṇena vā vaḍḍheyyāsi,
atk-s0513a4:1009_5: tenāhampi dhanaṃ parihāpemī”ti vatvā tisso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:1011_0: “Āyu ca vaṇṇo ca manussaloke, nihīyati manujānaṃ sugatte;
atk-s0513a4:1012_0: Teneva vaṇṇena dhanampi tuyhaṃ, nihīyati jiṇṇatarāsi ajja.
atk-s0513a4:1019_0: Tattha nihīyatīti parissāvane āsittaudakaṃ viya parihāyati.
atk-s0513a4:1019_1: Manussalokasmiñhi sattā jīvitena vaṇṇena cakkhupasādādīhi ca dine dine parihāyanteva.
atk-s0513a4:1019_2: Jiṇṇatarāsīti mama paṭhamaṃ āgatadivase pavattañhi te āyu hiyyo divasaṃ na pāpuṇi,
atk-s0513a4:1019_7: Evaṃ meti tiṭṭhatu hiyyo ca parahiyyo ca,
atk-s0513a4:1019_8: ajjeva pana mayhaṃ evaṃ pekkhamānasseva hāyateva tava vaṇṇo.
atk-s0513a4:1019_9: Ahorattānamaccayeti ito paṭṭhāya rattindivesu vītivattesu ahorattānaṃ accayena apaṇṇattikabhāvameva gamissasīti dasseti.
atk-s0513a4:1019_11: sace tvaṃ iminā vayeneva imasmiṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇe sarīre rajāya avilutteyeva seṭṭhacariyaṃ careyyāsi,
atk-s0513a4:1022_0: “Devā na jīranti yathā manussā, gattesu tesaṃ valiyo na honti;
atk-s0513a4:1023_0: Pucchāmi taṃ yakkha mahānubhāva, kathaṃ nu devāna sarīradeho”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1027_0: “Devā na jīranti yathā manussā, gattesu tesaṃ valiyo na honti;
atk-s0513a4:1028_0: Suve suve bhiyyatarova tesaṃ, dibbo ca vaṇṇo vipulā ca bhogā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1029_0: Tattha yathā manussāti yathā manussā jīrantā rūpena vaṇṇena bhogena cakkhupasādādīhi ca jīranti,
atk-s0513a4:1029_5: Bhiyyatarovāti atirekatarova tesaṃ dibbo ca vaṇṇo vipulā ca bhogā honti,
atk-s0513a4:1029_9: Tasmā tvaṃ jaraṃ appatvāva nikkhamitvā pabbaja,
atk-s0513a4:1029_10: evaṃ parihāniyasabhāvā manussalokā cavitvā aparihāniyasabhāvaṃ evarūpaṃ devalokaṃ gamissasīti.
atk-s0513a4:1030_0: Sā devalokassa vaṇṇaṃ sutvā tassa gamanamaggaṃ pucchantī itaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:1032_0: “Kiṃsūdha bhītā janatā anekā, maggo ca nekāyatanaṃ pavutto;
atk-s0513a4:1033_0: Pucchāmi taṃ yakkha mahānubhāva, katthaṭṭhito paralokaṃ na bhāye”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1034_1: ayaṃ khattiyādibhedā anekā janatā kiṃbhītā kassa bhayena parihāniyasabhāvā manussalokā devalokaṃ na gacchatīti pucchati.
atk-s0513a4:1034_4: Ayañhettha attho “anekatitthāyatanavasena paṇḍitehi pavutto devalokamaggo ko kataro”ti vutto.
atk-s0513a4:1034_5: Katthaṭṭhitoti paralokaṃ gacchanto katarasmiṃ magge ṭhito na bhāyatīti.
atk-s0513a4:1037_0: “Vācaṃ manañca paṇidhāya sammā, kāyena pāpāni akubbamāno;
atk-s0513a4:1038_0: Bahunnapānaṃ gharamāvasanto, saddho mudū saṃvibhāgī vadaññū;
atk-s0513a4:1039_0: Saṅgāhako sakhilo saṇhavāco, etthaṭṭhito paralokaṃ na bhāye”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1040_1: udaye vācaṃ manañca sammā ṭhapetvā kāyena pāpāni akaronto ime dasa kusalakammapathe samādāya vattanto
atk-s0513a4:1040_2: bahuannapāne pahūtadeyyadhamme ghare vasanto “dānassa vipāko atthī”ti saddhāya samannāgato muducitto
atk-s0513a4:1040_3: dānasaṃvibhāgatāya saṃvibhāgī pabbajitā bhikkhāya caramānā vadanti nāma,
atk-s0513a4:1040_4: tesaṃ paccayadānena tassa vādassa jānanato vadaññū catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi saṅgahatāya saṅgāhako piyavāditāya
atk-s0513a4:1040_5: sakhilo maṭṭhavacanatāya saṇhavāco ettha ettake guṇarāsimhi ṭhito paralokaṃ gacchanto na bhāyatīti.
atk-s0513a4:1041_0: Tato rājadhītā taṃ tassa vacanaṃ sutvā thutiṃ karontī itaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:1043_0: “Anusāsasi maṃ yakkha, yathā mātā yathā pitā;
atk-s0513a4:1044_0: Uḷāravaṇṇa pucchāmi, ko nu tvamasi subrahā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1045_3: Uḷāravaṇṇa sobhaggappattarūpadāraka ko nu asi tvaṃ evaṃ accuggatasarīroti.
atk-s0513a4:1049_0: Āmanta kho taṃ gacchāmi, muttosmi tava saṅgarā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1050_1: kalyāṇadassane ahaṃ purimabhave tava sāmiko udayo nāma tāvatiṃsabhavane sakko hutvā nibbatto,
atk-s0513a4:1050_3: taṃ vīmaṃsitvā pana saṅgaraṃ mocessāmīti saṅgarattā pubbe saṅgarassa katattā āgatosmi,
atk-s0513a4:1051_1: tvaṃ udayabhaddarājā”ti assudhārā pavattayamānā “ahaṃ tumhehi vinā vasituṃ na sakkomi,
atk-s0513a4:1051_3: tathā maṃ anusāsathā”ti vatvā itaraṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:1054_0: Anusāsa maṃ rājaputta, yathāssa puna saṅgamo”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1055_0: Atha naṃ anusāsanto mahāsatto catasso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:1057_0: “Atipatati vayo khaṇo tatheva, ṭhānaṃ natthi dhuvaṃ cavanti sattā;
atk-s0513a4:1058_0: Parijīyati addhuvaṃ sarīraṃ, udaye mā pamāda carassu dhammaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1060_0: “Kasiṇā pathavī dhanassa pūrā, ekasseva siyā anaññadheyyā;
atk-s0513a4:1061_0: Taṃ cāpi jahati avītarāgo, udaye mā pamāda carassu dhammaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1063_0: “Mātā ca pitā ca bhātaro ca, bhariyā yāpi dhanena hoti kītā;
atk-s0513a4:1064_0: Te cāpi jahanti aññamaññaṃ, udaye mā pamāda carassu dhammaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1067_0: Ittaravāsoti jāniyāna, udaye mā pamāda carassu dhamma”nti.
atk-s0513a4:1068_4: Ubhayenapi bhinno imesaṃ sattānaṃ āyusaṅkhāro nāma sīghasotā nadī viya anivattanto sīghaṃ atikkamatīti dasseti.
atk-s0513a4:1068_5: Ṭhānaṃ natthīti “uppannā saṅkhārā abhijjitvā tiṭṭhantū”ti patthanāyapi tesaṃ ṭhānaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a4:1068_6: dhuvaṃ ekaṃseneva buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbepi sattā cavanti,
atk-s0513a4:1068_8: addhuvaṃ jīvita”nti evaṃ maraṇassatiṃ bhāvehīti dīpeti.
atk-s0513a4:1068_11: Mā pamādanti tasmā tvaṃ udayabhadde mā pamādaṃ āpajji,
atk-s0513a4:1069_3: Taṃ cāpi jahati avītarāgoti taṇhāvasiko puggalo ettakenapi yasena atitto maraṇakāle avītarāgova taṃ vijahati.
atk-s0513a4:1070_1: Ittaravāsoti yā esā imasmiṃ saṃsāre manussabhūtā suggati ca tiracchānabhūtā duggati ca,
atk-s0513a4:1070_4: Imesaṃ sattānaṃ nānāṭhānato āgantvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne samāgamo paritto,
atk-s0513a4:1070_5: ime sattā appakasmiṃyeva kāle ekato vasanti,
atk-s0513a4:1071_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto tassā ovādamadāsi. Sāpi tassa dhammakathāya pasīditvā thutiṃ karontī osānagāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:1075_0: Sāhaṃ ekā pabbajissāmi, hitvā kāsiṃ surundhana”nti.
atk-s0513a4:1076_0: Tattha sādhūti “appaṃ maccāna jīvita”nti bhāsamāno ayaṃ devarājā sādhu bhāsati.
atk-s0513a4:1076_4: Sace hi kasirampi samānaṃ dīghakālaṃ pavatteyya,
atk-s0513a4:1076_6: idaṃ pana kasirañceva parittañca sakalena vaṭṭadukkhena saṃyutaṃ sannihitaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1076_8: Surundhananti surundhananagarañca kāsiraṭṭhañca chaḍḍetvā ekikāva pabbajissāmīti āha.
atk-s0513a4:1077_0: Bodhisatto tassā ovādaṃ datvā sakaṭṭhānameva gato.
atk-s0513a4:1077_1: Sāpi punadivase amacce rajjaṃ paṭicchāpetvā antonagareyeva ramaṇīye uyyāne isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā dhammaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1077_2: caritvā āyupariyosāne tāvatiṃsabhavane bodhisattassa pādaparicārikā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0513a4:1078_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a4:1082_0: Mitto mittassāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kilesaniggahaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:1082_1: Ekasmiñhi samaye sāvatthivāsino pañcasatā gihisahāyakā tathāgatassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pabbajitvā upasampannā
atk-s0513a4:1082_4: Bhagavato āṇattiyā panāyasmatā ānandena bhikkhusaṅghe sannipātite satthā paññattāsane nisīditvā anodissakaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1082_8: porāṇakapaṇḍitā anuppannepi buddhe kilese niggahetvā paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ pattā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:1083_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente kāsiraṭṭhe ekasmiṃ gāmake dve sahāyakā pānīyatumbāni ādāya
atk-s0513a4:1083_1: khettaṃ gantvā ekamantaṃ ṭhapetvā khettaṃ koṭṭetvā pipāsitakāle āgantvā pānīyaṃ pivanti.
atk-s0513a4:1083_2: Tesu eko pānīyatthāya āgantvā attano pānīyaṃ rakkhanto itarassa tumbato pivitvā sāyaṃ araññā nikkhamitvā
atk-s0513a4:1083_3: nhāyitvā ṭhito “atthi nu kho me kāyadvārādīhi ajja kiñci pāpaṃ kata”nti upadhārento thenetvā pānīyassa
atk-s0513a4:1083_4: pivitabhāvaṃ disvā saṃvegappatto hutvā “ayaṃ taṇhā vaḍḍhamānā maṃ apāyesu khipissati,
atk-s0513a4:1083_5: imaṃ kilesaṃ niggaṇhissāmī”ti pānīyassa thenetvā pivitabhāvaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1083_7: Atha naṃ itaro nhāyitvā uṭṭhito “ehi, samma,
atk-s0513a4:1083_22: So ākāse ṭhatvā dhammaṃ desetvā uppatitvā nandamūlakapabbhāreyeva otari.
atk-s0513a4:1084_0: Aparopi kāsigāmeyeva kuṭumbiko āpaṇe nisinno ekaṃ purisaṃ attano bhariyaṃ ādāya gacchantaṃ disvā taṃ
atk-s0513a4:1084_1: uttamarūpadharaṃ itthiṃ indriyāni bhinditvā oloketvā puna cintesi “ayaṃ lobho vaḍḍhamāno maṃ apāyesu
atk-s0513a4:1084_2: khipissatī”ti saṃviggamānaso vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ nibbattetvā ākāse ṭhito dhammaṃ desetvā
atk-s0513a4:1085_0: Aparepi kāsigāmavāsinoyeva dve pitāputtā ekato maggaṃ paṭipajjiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1085_2: Te pitāputte labhitvā puttaṃ gahetvā “dhanaṃ āharitvā tava puttaṃ gaṇhā”ti pitaraṃ vissajjenti,
atk-s0513a4:1085_3: dve bhātaro labhitvā kaniṭṭhaṃ gahetvā jeṭṭhaṃ vissajjenti,
atk-s0513a4:1085_4: ācariyantevāsike labhitvā ācariyaṃ gahetvā antevāsikaṃ vissajjenti,
atk-s0513a4:1085_5: antevāsiko sippalobhena dhanaṃ āharitvā ācariyaṃ gaṇhitvā gacchati.
atk-s0513a4:1085_6: Atha te pitāputtāpi tattha corānaṃ uṭṭhitabhāvaṃ ñatvā “tvaṃ maṃ ‘pitā’ti mā vada,
atk-s0513a4:1085_7: ahampi taṃ ‘putto’ti na vakkhāmī”ti katikaṃ katvā corehi gahitakāle “tumhe aññamaññaṃ kiṃ hothā”ti puṭṭhā
atk-s0513a4:1085_9: Tesu aṭavito nikkhamitvā sāyaṃ nhāyitvā ṭhitesu putto attano sīlaṃ sodhento taṃ musāvādaṃ disvā “idaṃ pāpaṃ vaḍḍhamānaṃ maṃ apāyesu khipissati,
atk-s0513a4:1085_10: imaṃ kilesaṃ niggaṇhissāmī”ti vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ nibbattetvā ākāse ṭhito pitu dhammaṃ desetvā nandamūlakapabbhārameva gato.
atk-s0513a4:1086_0: Aparopi kāsigāmeyeva pana eko gāmabhojako māghātaṃ kārāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:1086_1: Atha naṃ balikammakāle mahājano sannipatitvā āha “sāmi,
atk-s0513a4:1086_2: mayaṃ migasūkarādayo māretvā yakkhānaṃ balikammaṃ karissāma,
atk-s0513a4:1086_4: Tumhākaṃ pubbe karaṇaniyāmeneva karothāti manussā bahuṃ pāṇātipātamakaṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1086_5: So bahuṃ macchamaṃsaṃ disvā “ime manussā ettake pāṇe mārentā mamevekassa vacanena mārayiṃsū”ti kukkuccaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1086_6: katvā vātapānaṃ nissāya ṭhitakova vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ nibbattetvā ākāse ṭhito mahājanassa
atk-s0513a4:1087_1: pubbe imasmiṃ kāle surāchaṇo nāma hoti,
atk-s0513a4:1087_2: kiṃ karomā”ti mahājanena vutto “tumhākaṃ porāṇakaniyāmeneva karothā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:1087_3: Manussā chaṇaṃ katvā suraṃ pivitvā kalahaṃ karontā hatthapāde bhañjitvā sīsaṃ bhinditvā kaṇṇe chinditvā bahudaṇḍena bajjhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1087_4: Gāmabhojako te disvā cintesi “mayi ananujānante ime imaṃ dukkhaṃ na vindeyyu”nti.
atk-s0513a4:1087_5: So ettakena kukkuccaṃ katvā vātapānaṃ nissāya ṭhitakova vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ nibbattetvā
atk-s0513a4:1087_6: “appamattā hothā”ti ākāse ṭhatvā dhammaṃ desetvā nandamūlakapabbhārameva gato.
atk-s0513a4:1088_0: Aparabhāge te pañca paccekabuddhā bhikkhācāratthāya bārāṇasidvāre otaritvā sunivatthā supārutā pāsādikehi
atk-s0513a4:1088_2: Rājā te disvā pasannacitto rājanivesanaṃ pavesetvā pāde dhovitvā gandhatelena makkhetvā paṇītena khādanīyena
atk-s0513a4:1088_5: imasmiṃ vaye pabbajantā kathaṃ kāmesu ādīnavaṃ passittha,
atk-s0513a4:1091_0: Tena pacchā vijigucchiṃ, taṃ pāpaṃ pakataṃ mayā;
atk-s0513a4:1092_0: Mā puna akaraṃ pāpaṃ, tasmā pabbajito ahaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1095_0: Tena pacchā vijigucchiṃ, taṃ pāpaṃ pakataṃ mayā;
atk-s0513a4:1096_0: Mā puna akaraṃ pāpaṃ, tasmā pabbajito ahaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1099_0: Tesāhaṃ pucchito jānaṃ, aññathā naṃ viyākariṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1101_0: “Tena pacchā vijigucchiṃ, taṃ pāpaṃ pakataṃ mayā;
atk-s0513a4:1102_0: Mā puna akaraṃ pāpaṃ, tasmā pabbajito ahaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1107_0: “Tena pacchā vijigucchiṃ, taṃ pāpaṃ pakataṃ mayā;
atk-s0513a4:1108_0: Mā puna akaraṃ pāpaṃ, tasmā pabbajito ahaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1114_0: “Tena pacchā vijigucchiṃ, taṃ pāpaṃ pakataṃ mayā;
atk-s0513a4:1115_0: Mā puna akaraṃ pāpaṃ, tasmā pabbajito aha”nti. –
