atk-s0513a4:1117_1: ahaṃ ekassa mitto hutvā tassa mittassa santakaṃ pānīyaṃ iminā niyāmeneva paribhuñjiṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1117_2: Tasmāti yasmā puthujjanā nāma pāpakammaṃ karonti,
atk-s0513a4:1117_3: tasmā ahaṃ mā puna akaraṃ pāpaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:1117_6: imināva niyāmena mama paradāraṃ disvā kāme chando uppajji.
atk-s0513a4:1117_8: Jānanti tesaṃ corānaṃ “ayaṃ kiṃ te hotī”ti pucchito jānantoyeva “na kiñci hotī”ti aññathā byākāsiṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1117_9: Somayāgeti navacande uṭṭhite somayāgaṃ nāma yakkhabaliṃ kariṃsu,
atk-s0513a4:1117_12: Surāmerayamādhukāti piṭṭhasurādisurañca pupphāsavādimerayañca pakkamadhu viya madhuraṃ maññamānā.
atk-s0513a4:1117_13: Ye janā paṭhamāsu noti ye no gāme janā paṭhamaṃ evarūpā āsuṃ ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1117_14: Bahūnaṃ teti te ekadivasaṃ ekasmiṃ chaṇe patte bahūnaṃ anatthāya majjapānaṃ akappayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1118_0: Rājā tesaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā pasannacitto cīvarasāṭake ca bhesajjāni ca datvā paccekabuddhe uyyojesi.
atk-s0513a4:1118_1: Tepi tassa anumodanaṃ katvā tattheva agamaṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1118_2: Tato paṭṭhāya rājā vatthukāmesu viratto anapekkho hutvā nānaggarasabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā itthiyo anālapitvā
atk-s0513a4:1118_3: anoloketvā virattacitto uṭṭhāya sirigabbhaṃ pavisitvā nisinno setabhittiyaṃ kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā jhānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1121_0: Ye ahaṃ paṭisevanto, nālabhiṃ tādisaṃ sukha”nti. – gāthamāha;
atk-s0513a4:1123_0: Athassa aggamahesī “ayaṃ rājā paccekabuddhānaṃ dhammakathaṃ sutvā ukkaṇṭhitarūpo ahosi,
atk-s0513a4:1123_2: pariggaṇhissāmi tāva na”nti cintetvā sirigabbhadvāre ṭhitā rañño kāmesu garahantassa udānaṃ sutvā “mahārāja,
atk-s0513a4:1123_4: kāmasukhasadisaṃ nāma sukhaṃ natthī”ti kāme vaṇṇentī itaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:1125_0: “Mahassādā sukhā kāmā, natthi kāmā paraṃ sukhaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:1126_0: Ye kāme paṭisevanti, saggaṃ te upapajjare”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1127_3: Kāmasevino hi apāye anupagamma sagge nibbattantīti attho.
atk-s0513a4:1130_0: “Appassādā dukhā kāmā, natthi kāmā paraṃ dukhaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:1131_0: Ye kāme paṭisevanti, nirayaṃ te upapajjare.
atk-s0513a4:1134_0: Sattīva urasi khittā, kāmā dukkhatarā tato.
atk-s0513a4:1141_2: Dukkhatarāti evaṃ jalitaṅgārakāsuṃ vā divasaṃ tattaṃ phālaṃ vā paṭicca yaṃ dukkhaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0513a4:1141_4: Anantaragāthāya yathā etāni visādīni dukkhāvahanato dukkhāni,
atk-s0513a4:1141_6: taṃ pana kāmadukkhaṃ itarehi dukkhehi dukkhataranti attho.
atk-s0513a4:1142_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto deviyā dhammaṃ desetvā amacce sannipātetvā “bhonto amaccā,
atk-s0513a4:1142_2: ahaṃ pabbajissāmī”ti vatvā mahājanassa rodantassa paridevantassa uṭṭhāya ākāse ṭhatvā ovādaṃ datvā anilapatheneva
atk-s0513a4:1142_3: uttarahimavantaṃ gantvā ramaṇīye padese assamaṃ māpetvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā āyupariyosāne brahmalokaparāyaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:1143_2: appamattakopi paṇḍitehi niggahitabboyevā”ti vatvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a4:1147_0: Mittāmaccaparibyūḷhanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto mahābhinikkhamanaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:1147_3: sakalacakkavāḷagabbhe cakkavattirājā abhavissa sattaratanasamannāgato caturiddhīhi samiddho parosahassaputtaparivāro,
atk-s0513a4:1147_4: so evarūpaṃ sirivibhavaṃ pahāya kāmesu dosaṃ disvā aḍḍharattasamaye channasahāyova kaṇṭakamāruyha nikkhamitvā
atk-s0513a4:1147_5: anomanadītīre pabbajitvā chabbassāni dukkarakārikaṃ katvā sammāsambodhiṃ patto”ti satthu guṇakathaṃ kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1147_8: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a4:1147_11: pubbepi dvādasayojanike bārāṇasinagare rajjaṃ pahāya nikkhantoyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:1148_0: Atīte rammanagare sabbadatto nāma rājā ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:1148_1: Ayañhi bārāṇasī udayajātake surundhananagaraṃ nāma jātā,
atk-s0513a4:1148_6: imasmiṃ pana yudhañcayajātake rammanagaraṃ nāma ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:1148_11: Evaṃ gacchante kāle bodhisatto ekadivasaṃ pātova rathavaramāruyha mahantena sirivibhavena uyyānakīḷaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1148_14: himasamaye patanakaussavabindūni nāmā”ti sutvā divasabhāgaṃ uyyāne kīḷitvā sāyanhakāle paccāgacchanto te adisvāva “samma sārathi,
atk-s0513a4:1148_17: te sūriye uggacchante sabbeva bhijjitvā pathaviyaṃ patantī”ti sutvā saṃvegappatto hutvā “imesaṃ sattānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1148_19: mayā byādhijarāmaraṇehi apīḷiteyeva mātāpitaro āpucchitvā pabbajituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ussavabindumeva ārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1148_20: katvā āditte viya tayo bhave passanto attano gehaṃ agantvā alaṅkatapaṭiyattāya vinicchayasālāya nisinnassa
atk-s0513a4:1148_21: pitu santikaṃyeva gantvā pitaraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito pabbajjaṃ yācanto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:1152_0: Tattha paribyūḷhanti parivāritaṃ. Taṃ devoti taṃ mama pabbajjaṃ devo anujānātūti attho.
atk-s0513a4:1153_0: Atha naṃ rājā nivārento dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:1155_0: “Sace te ūnaṃ kāmehi, ahaṃ paripūrayāmi te;
atk-s0513a4:1156_0: Yo taṃ hiṃ sati vāremi, mā pabbaja yudhañcayā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1159_0: “Na matthi ūnaṃ kāmehi, hiṃsitā me na vijjati;
atk-s0513a4:1161_0: Tattha dīpañcāti tāta neva mayhaṃ kāmehi ūnaṃ atthi,
atk-s0513a4:1161_2: ahaṃ pana paralokagamanāya attano patiṭṭhaṃ kātumicchāmi. Kīdisaṃ?
atk-s0513a4:1164_0: “Putto vā pitaraṃ yāce, pitā vā puttamorasa”nti.
atk-s0513a4:1167_0: “Negamo taṃ yāce tāta, mā pabbaja yudhañcayā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1168_0: Tassattho – ayaṃ te tāta nigamavāsimahājano yācati, nagarajanopi mā tvaṃ pabbajāti.
atk-s0513a4:1173_0: Tattha vasamanvagūti mā ahaṃ kāmehi sammatto pamatto jarāya vasagāmī nāma homi,
atk-s0513a4:1173_1: vaṭṭadukkhaṃ pana khepetvā yathā ca sabbaññutaññāṇappaṭivijjhanako homi,.
atk-s0513a4:1174_2: pitaraṃ pabbajjaṃ anujānāpetī”ti sutvā “kiṃ tumhe kathethā”ti nirassāsena mukhena suvaṇṇasivikāya nisīditvā
atk-s0513a4:1174_3: sīghaṃ vinicchayaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā yācamānā chaṭṭhaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:1176_0: “Ahaṃ taṃ tāta yācāmi, ahaṃ putta nivāraye;
atk-s0513a4:1177_0: Ciraṃ taṃ daṭṭhumicchāmi, mā pabbaja yudhañcayā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1181_0: Evamāyu manussānaṃ, mā maṃ amma nivārayā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1182_1: yathā tiṇagge ussavabindu sūriyassa uggamanaṃ patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0513a4:1182_3: evaṃ imesaṃ sattānaṃ jīvitaṃ parittaṃ tāvakālikaṃ aciraṭṭhitikaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:1182_4: evarūpe lokasannivāse kathaṃ tvaṃ ciraṃ maṃ passasi,
atk-s0513a4:1183_0: Evaṃ vuttepi sā punappunaṃ yāciyeva. Tato mahāsatto pitaraṃ āmantetvā aṭṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:1186_0: Mā me mātā tarantassa, antarāyakarā ahū”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1187_2: imaṃ mama mātaraṃ taramāno puriso suvaṇṇasivikāyānaṃ āropetu,
atk-s0513a4:1187_3: mā me jātijarābyādhimaraṇakantāraṃ tarantassa atikkamantassa mātā antarāyakarā ahūti.
atk-s0513a4:1188_1: tava sivikāya nisīditvā rativaḍḍhanapāsādaṃ abhiruhā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:1188_2: Sā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā ṭhātuṃ asakkontī nārīgaṇaparivutā gantvā pāsādaṃ abhiruhitvā “kā nu kho puttassa pavattī”ti vinicchayaṭṭhānaṃ olokentī aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:1188_3: Bodhisatto mātu gatakāle puna pitaraṃ yāci.
atk-s0513a4:1188_7: Rañño anuññātakāle bodhisattassa kaniṭṭho yudhiṭṭhilakumāro nāma pitaraṃ vanditvā “tāta,
atk-s0513a4:1188_9: Ubhopi bhātaro pitaraṃ vanditvā kāme pahāya mahājanaparivutā vinicchayato nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1188_10: Devīpi mahāsattaṃ oloketvā “mama putte pabbajite rammanagaraṃ tucchaṃ bhavissatī”ti paridevamānā gāthādvayamāha –
atk-s0513a4:1195_0: Tattha abhidhāvathāti parivāretvā ṭhitā nāriyo sabbā vegena dhāvathāti āṇāpeti.
atk-s0513a4:1195_1: Bhaddanteti evaṃ gantvā “bhaddaṃ tava hotū”ti vadatha.
atk-s0513a4:1195_3: Yohu seṭṭhoti yo rañño putto sahassassa seṭṭho ahosi,
atk-s0513a4:1196_1: So hi mātāpitaro vanditvā kaniṭṭhaṃ yudhiṭṭhilakumāraṃ gahetvā nagarā nikkhamma mahājanaṃ nivattetvā
atk-s0513a4:1196_2: ubhopi bhātaro himavantaṃ pavisitvā manorame ṭhāne assamapadaṃ karitvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā jhānābhiññaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1196_3: nibbattetvā vanamūlaphalādīhi yāvajīvaṃ yāpetvā brahmalokaparāyaṇā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1200_3: yudhañcayo ca yudhiṭṭhilo ca te ubhopi kumārā mātāpitaro pahāya mārassa santakaṃ rāgadosamohasaṅgaṃ chinditvā pabbajitāti.
atk-s0513a4:1201_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā “na bhikkhave, idāneva,
atk-s0513a4:1201_1: pubbepi tathāgato rajjaṃ chaḍḍetvā pabbajitoyevā”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a4:1205_0: Etha lakkhaṇa sītā cāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ matapitikaṃ kuṭumbikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:1205_1: So hi pitari kālakate sokābhibhūto sabbakiccāni pahāya sokānuvattakova ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:1205_2: Satthā paccūsasamaye lokaṃ olokento tassa sotāpattiphalūpanissayaṃ disvā punadivase sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya
atk-s0513a4:1205_3: caritvā katabhattakicco bhikkhū uyyojetvā ekaṃ pacchāsamaṇaṃ gahetvā tassa gehaṃ gantvā vanditvā nisinnaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1205_4: madhuravacanena ālapanto “kiṃ socasi upāsakā”ti vatvā “āma, bhante,
atk-s0513a4:1205_6: porāṇakapaṇḍitā aṭṭhavidhe lokadhamme tathato jānantā pitari kālakate appamattakampi sokaṃ na kariṃsū”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:1206_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ dasarathamahārājā nāma agatigamanaṃ pahāya dhammena rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a4:1206_1: Tassa soḷasannaṃ itthisahassānaṃ jeṭṭhikā aggamahesī dve putte ekañca dhītaraṃ vijāyi.
atk-s0513a4:1206_6: Rājā tassā kālakatāya cirataraṃ sokavasaṃ gantvā amaccehi saññāpito tassā kattabbaparihāraṃ katvā aññaṃ aggamahesiṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a4:1206_8: Sāpi aparabhāge gabbhaṃ gaṇhitvā laddhagabbhaparihārā puttaṃ vijāyi,
atk-s0513a4:1206_13: Sā gahitakaṃ katvā ṭhapetvā kumārassa sattaṭṭhavassakāle rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “deva,
atk-s0513a4:1206_15: idānissa varaṃ dethā”ti āha. Gaṇha, bhaddeti. “Deva,
atk-s0513a4:1206_16: puttassa me rajjaṃ dethā”ti vutte rājā accharaṃ paharitvā “nassa, vasali,
atk-s0513a4:1206_17: mayhaṃ dve puttā aggikkhandhā viya jalanti,
atk-s0513a4:1206_18: te mārāpetvā tava puttassa rajjaṃ yācasī”ti tajjesi.
atk-s0513a4:1206_19: Sā bhītā sirigabbhaṃ pavisitvā aññesupi divasesu rājānaṃ punappunaṃ rajjameva yāci.
atk-s0513a4:1207_0: Rājā tassā taṃ varaṃ adatvāva cintesi “mātugāmo nāma akataññū mittadubbhī,
atk-s0513a4:1207_1: ayaṃ me kūṭapaṇṇaṃ vā kūṭalañjaṃ vā katvā putte ghātāpeyyā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1207_4: tumhe sāmantarajjaṃ vā araññaṃ vā gantvā mama maraṇakāle āgantvā kulasantakaṃ rajjaṃ gaṇheyyāthā”ti vatvā
atk-s0513a4:1207_5: puna nemittake brāhmaṇe pakkosāpetvā attano āyuparicchedaṃ pucchitvā “aññāni dvādasa vassāni pavattissatī”ti
atk-s0513a4:1207_7: ito dvādasavassaccayena āgantvā chattaṃ ussāpeyyāthā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:1207_8: Te “sādhū”ti vatvā pitaraṃ vanditvā rodantā pāsādā otariṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1207_9: Sītā devī “ahampi bhātikehi saddhiṃ gamissāmī”ti pitaraṃ vanditvā rodantī nikkhami.
atk-s0513a4:1207_10: Tayopi janā mahāparivārā nikkhamitvā mahājanaṃ nivattetvā anupubbena himavantaṃ pavisitvā sampannodake
atk-s0513a4:1207_11: sulabhaphalāphale padese assamaṃ māpetvā phalāphalena yāpentā vasiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1208_0: Lakkhaṇapaṇḍito ca sītā ca rāmapaṇḍitaṃ yācitvā “tumhe amhākaṃ pituṭṭhāne ṭhitā,
atk-s0513a4:1208_2: mayaṃ phalāphalaṃ āharitvā tumhe posessāmā”ti paṭiññaṃ gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1208_4: Itare dve phalāphalaṃ āharitvā taṃ paṭijaggiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1208_5: Evaṃ tesaṃ phalāphalena yāpetvā vasantānaṃ dasarathamahārājā puttasokena navame saṃvacchare kālamakāsi.
atk-s0513a4:1208_6: Tassa sarīrakiccaṃ kāretvā devī “attano puttassa bharatakumārassa chattaṃ ussāpethā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:1208_7: Amaccā pana “chattassāmikā araññe vasantī”ti na adaṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1208_8: Bharatakumāro “mama bhātaraṃ rāmapaṇḍitaṃ araññato ānetvā chattaṃ ussāpessāmī”ti pañcarājakakudhabhaṇḍāni
atk-s0513a4:1208_9: gahetvā caturaṅginiyā senāya tassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ patvā avidūre khandhāvāraṃ katvā tattha nivāsetvā katipayehi
atk-s0513a4:1208_10: amaccehi saddhiṃ lakkhaṇapaṇḍitassa ca sītāya ca araññaṃ gatakāle assamapadaṃ pavisitvā assamapadadvāre
atk-s0513a4:1208_11: ṭhapitakañcanarūpakaṃ viya rāmapaṇḍitaṃ nirāsaṅkaṃ sukhanisinnaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito
atk-s0513a4:1208_12: rañño pavattiṃ ārocetvā saddhiṃ amaccehi pādesu patitvā rodati.
atk-s0513a4:1208_16: Bharatassa pana roditvā nisinnakāle sāyanhasamaye itare dve phalāphalaṃ ādāya āgamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1208_17: Rāmapaṇḍito cintesi “ime daharā mayhaṃ viya pariggaṇhanapaññā etesaṃ natthi,
atk-s0513a4:1208_18: sahasā ‘pitā vo mato’ti vutte sokaṃ sandhāretuṃ asakkontānaṃ hadayampi tesaṃ phaleyya,
atk-s0513a4:1208_19: upāyena te udakaṃ otāretvā etaṃ pavattiṃ ārocessāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1208_20: Atha nesaṃ purato ekaṃ udakaṭṭhānaṃ dassetvā “tumhe aticirena āgatā,
atk-s0513a4:1208_22: imaṃ udakaṃ otaritvā tiṭṭhathā”ti upaḍḍhagāthaṃ tāva āha –
atk-s0513a4:1211_0: Tassattho – etha lakkhaṇa sītā ca āgacchatha, ubhopi otaratha udakanti;
atk-s0513a4:1212_0: Te ekavacaneneva otaritvā aṭṭhaṃsu. Atha nesaṃ pitu pavattiṃ ārocento sesaṃ upaḍḍhagāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:1214_0: Te pitu matasāsanaṃ sutvāva visaññā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1214_2: punapi te visaññā ahesunti evaṃ yāvatatiyaṃ visaññitaṃ patte te amaccā ukkhipitvā udakā nīharitvā thale
atk-s0513a4:1214_3: nisīdāpetvā laddhassāsesu tesu sabbe aññamaññaṃ roditvā paridevitvā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1214_5: “mayhaṃ bhātā lakkhaṇakumāro ca bhaginī ca sītā devī pitu matasāsanaṃ sutvāva sokaṃ sandhāretuṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0513a4:1217_0: Pitaraṃ kālakataṃ sutvā, na taṃ pasahate dukha”nti.
atk-s0513a4:1218_1: Na taṃ pasahate dukhanti evarūpaṃ dukkhaṃ kena kāraṇena taṃ na pīḷeti,
atk-s0513a4:1221_0: “Yaṃ na sakkā nipāletuṃ, posena lapataṃ bahuṃ;
atk-s0513a4:1224_0: “Daharā ca hi vuddhā ca, ye bālā ye ca paṇḍitā;
atk-s0513a4:1225_0: Aḍḍhā ceva daliddā ca, sabbe maccuparāyaṇā.
atk-s0513a4:1228_0: Evaṃ jātāna maccānaṃ, niccaṃ maraṇato bhayaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1231_0: Pāto eke na dissanti, sāyaṃ diṭṭhā bahujjanā.
atk-s0513a4:1237_0: Na tena petā pālenti, niratthā paridevanā.
atk-s0513a4:1240_0: Evampi dhīro sutavā, medhāvī paṇḍito naro;
atk-s0513a4:1246_0: “Tasmā hi dhīrassa bahussutassa, sampassato lokamimaṃ parañca;
atk-s0513a4:1247_0: Aññāya dhammaṃ hadayaṃ manañca, sokā mahantāpi na tāpayanti.
atk-s0513a4:1252_4: yaṃ sattānaṃ jīvitaṃ bahumpi vilapantānaṃ purisānaṃ ekenāpi mā ucchijjīti na sakkā rakkhituṃ,
atk-s0513a4:1252_5: so dāni mādiso aṭṭha lokadhamme tathato jānanto viññū medhāvī paṇḍito maraṇapariyosānajīvitesu sattesu kissa attānamupatāpaye,
atk-s0513a4:1253_0: Daharā cāti gāthā “maccu nāmesa tāta bharata,
atk-s0513a4:1253_7: sabbepime sattā maccuparāyaṇā maraṇamukhe saṃbhaggavibhaggā bhavantiyevā”ti dassanatthaṃ vuttā.
atk-s0513a4:1254_2: pakkānaṃ phalānaṃ pakkakālato paṭṭhāya “idāni vaṇṭā chijjitvā patissanti,
atk-s0513a4:1254_3: idāni patissantī”ti patanato bhayaṃ niccaṃ dhuvaṃ ekaṃsikameva bhavati,
atk-s0513a4:1254_4: evaṃ āsaṅkanīyato evaṃ jātānaṃ maccānampi ekaṃsikaṃyeva maraṇato bhayaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:1254_5: natthi so khaṇo vā layo vā yattha tesaṃ maraṇaṃ na āsaṅkitabbaṃ bhaveyyāti.
atk-s0513a4:1255_1: Iminā rattibhāge ca diṭṭhānaṃ divasabhāge adassanaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:1255_2: divasabhāge ca diṭṭhānaṃ rattibhāge adassanaṃ dīpeti.
atk-s0513a4:1255_4: putto me”tiādīhi paridevamānova poso sammūḷho attānaṃ hiṃsanto kilamento appamattakampi atthaṃ āhareyya.
atk-s0513a4:1255_5: Kayirā taṃ vicakkhaṇoti atha paṇḍito puriso evaṃ paridevaṃ kareyya,
atk-s0513a4:1255_6: yasmā pana paridevanto mataṃ vā ānetuṃ aññaṃ vā tassa vaḍḍhiṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0513a4:1255_7: tasmā niratthakattā paridevitassa paṇḍitā na paridevanti.
atk-s0513a4:1256_1: Na tenāti tena paridevena paralokaṃ gatā sattā na pālenti na yāpenti.
atk-s0513a4:1256_2: Niratthāti tasmā tesaṃ matasattānaṃ ayaṃ paridevanā niratthakā.
atk-s0513a4:1256_5: yathā paṇḍito puriso attano vasanāgāre āditte muhuttampi vosānaṃ anāpajjitvā ghaṭasatena ghaṭasahassena vārinā nibbāpayateva,
atk-s0513a4:1256_6: evaṃ dhīro uppatitaṃ sokaṃ khippameva nibbāpaye.
atk-s0513a4:1256_7: Tūlaṃ viya ca vāto yathā saṇṭhātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0513a4:1257_0: Macco ekova accetīti ettha tāta bharata,
atk-s0513a4:1257_2: tathā hi ito paralokaṃ gacchanto satto ekova acceti atikkamati,
atk-s0513a4:1257_4: Tattha tattha pana ñātimittasaṃyogena “ayaṃ me pitā,
atk-s0513a4:1257_6: ayaṃ me mitto”ti saṃyogaparamātveva sambhogā sabbapāṇīnaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:1257_7: paramatthena pana tīsupi bhavesu kammassakāvete sattāti attho.
atk-s0513a4:1258_0: Tasmāti yasmā etesaṃ sattānaṃ ñātimittasaṃyogaṃ ñātimittaparibhogamattaṃ ṭhapetvā ito paraṃ aññaṃ natthi, tasmā.
atk-s0513a4:1258_1: Sampassatoti imañca parañca lokaṃ nānābhāvavinābhāvameva sammā passato.
atk-s0513a4:1258_3: Hadayaṃ manañcāti idaṃ ubhayampi cittasseva nāmaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1259_0: “Lābho alābho yaso ayaso ca, nindā pasaṃsā ca sukhañca dukkhaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:1260_0: Ete aniccā manujesu dhammā, mā soca kiṃ socasi poṭṭhapādā”ti. –
atk-s0513a4:1261_0: Imesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ lokadhammānaṃ yena kenaci cittaṃ pariyādīyati,
atk-s0513a4:1261_1: tassa ca aniccataṃ ñatvā ṭhitassa dhīrassa pituputtamaraṇādivatthukā mahantāpi sokā hadayaṃ na tāpayantīti.
atk-s0513a4:1261_2: Etaṃ vā aṭṭhavidhaṃ lokadhammaṃ ñatvā ṭhitassa hadayavatthuñca manañca mahantāpi sokā na tāpayantīti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0513a4:1262_2: andhabālānaṃ sattānaṃ viya mama rodanaparidevanaṃ nāma na anucchavikaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:1262_3: ahaṃ pana pitu accayena tassa ṭhāne ṭhatvā kapaṇādīnaṃ dānārahānaṃ dānaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:1262_9: dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ dhammikaṃ rakkhāvaraṇaguttiṃ karissāmīti evañhi jānato paṇḍitapurisassa anurūpaṃ kiccanti attho.
atk-s0513a4:1263_0: Parisā imaṃ rāmapaṇḍitassa aniccatāpakāsanaṃ dhammadesanaṃ sutvā nissokā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1263_1: Tato bharatakumāro rāmapaṇḍitaṃ vanditvā “bārāṇasirajjaṃ sampaṭicchathā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:1263_5: mama pitā “dvādasavassaccayena āgantvā rajjaṃ kāreyyāsī”ti maṃ avoca,
atk-s0513a4:1263_6: ahaṃ idāneva gacchanto tassa vacanakaro nāma na homi,
atk-s0513a4:1263_11: “Tena hi yāva mamāgamanā imā pādukā kāressantī”ti attano tiṇapādukā omuñcitvā adāsi.
atk-s0513a4:1263_12: Te tayopi janā pādukā gahetvā rāmapaṇḍitaṃ vanditvā mahājanaparivutā bārāṇasiṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1263_14: Amaccā tiṇapādukā rājapallaṅke ṭhapetvā aḍḍaṃ vinicchinanti.
atk-s0513a4:1263_19: Rāmapaṇḍito tiṇṇaṃ saṃvaccharānaṃ accayena araññā nikkhamitvā bārāṇasinagaraṃ patvā uyyānaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a4:1263_20: Tassa āgamanabhāvaṃ ñatvā kumārā amaccagaṇaparivutā uyyānaṃ gantvā sītaṃ aggamahesiṃ katvā ubhinnampi abhisekaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1263_21: Evaṃ abhisekappatto mahāsatto alaṅkatarathe ṭhatvā mahantena parivārena nagaraṃ pavisitvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā candakapāsādavarassa mahātalaṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0513a4:1263_22: Tato paṭṭhāya soḷasa vassasahassāni dhammena rajjaṃ kāretvā āyupariyosāne saggapuraṃ pūresi.
atk-s0513a4:1268_0: Tattha kambugīvoti suvaṇṇāḷiṅgasadisagīvo. Suvaṇṇañhi kambūti vuccati.
atk-s0513a4:1269_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a4:1273_0: Jānanto no mahārājāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ ossaṭṭhavīriyaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:1273_1: So kira sāvatthivāsī kulaputto satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado ācariyupajjhāyavattaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1273_2: pūrento ubhayāni pātimokkhāni paguṇāni katvā paripuṇṇapañcavasso kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā “araññe vasissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a4:1273_3: ācariyupajjhāye āpucchitvā kosalaraṭṭhe ekaṃ paccantagāmaṃ gantvā tattha iriyāpathe pasannamanussehi
atk-s0513a4:1273_4: paṇṇasālaṃ katvā upaṭṭhiyamāno vassaṃ upagantvā yuñjanto ghaṭento vāyamanto accāraddhena vīriyena temāsaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1273_5: kammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvetvā obhāsamattampi uppādetuṃ asakkonto cintesi “addhā ahaṃ satthārā desitesu catūsu
atk-s0513a4:1273_8: jetavanaṃ gantvā tathāgatassa rūpasiriṃ passanto madhuradhammadesanaṃ suṇanto vītināmessāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1273_9: So vīriyaṃ ossajitvā tato nikkhanto anupubbena jetavanaṃ gantvā ācariyupajjhāyehi ceva sandiṭṭhasambhattehi
atk-s0513a4:1273_10: ca āgamanakāraṇaṃ puṭṭho tamatthaṃ kathetvā tehi “kasmā evamakāsī”ti garahitvā satthu santikaṃ netvā “kiṃ,
atk-s0513a4:1273_13: vīriyaṃ ossajitvā āgato”ti ārocite satthā “saccaṃ kirā”ti pucchitvā “saccaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:1273_15: imasmiñhi sāsane nibbīriyassa kusītapuggalassa aggaphalaṃ arahattaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a4:1273_17: tvaṃ kho pana pubbe vīriyavā ovādakkhamo,
atk-s0513a4:1273_18: teneva kāraṇena bārāṇasirañño puttasatassa sabbakaniṭṭho hutvāpi paṇḍitānaṃ ovāde ṭhatvā setacchattaṃ pattosī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:1274_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente saṃvarakumāro nāma puttasatassa sabbakaniṭṭho ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:1274_1: Rājā ekekaṃ puttaṃ “sikkhitabbayuttakaṃ sikkhāpethā”ti ekekassa amaccassa adāsi.
atk-s0513a4:1274_2: Saṃvarakumārassa ācariyo amacco bodhisatto ahosi paṇḍito byatto rājaputtassa pituṭṭhāne ṭhito.
atk-s0513a4:1274_5: Saṃvarakumāro sabbasippassa nipphattiṃ patvā bodhisattaṃ pucchi “tāta,
atk-s0513a4:1274_8: tvaṃ janapade dīyamāne taṃ aggahetvā ‘deva ahaṃ sabbakaniṭṭho,
atk-s0513a4:1274_9: mayipi gate tumhākaṃ pādamūlaṃ tucchaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0513a4:1274_11: Athekadivasaṃ rājā saṃvarakumāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ pucchi “kiṃ tāta,
atk-s0513a4:1274_17: So tato paṭṭhāya rañño pādamūleyeva hutvā punapi bodhisattaṃ pucchi “tāta aññaṃ kiṃ karomī”ti?
atk-s0513a4:1274_19: So “sādhū”ti uyyānaṃ yācitvā tattha jātakehi pupphaphalehi nagare issarajanaṃ saṅgaṇhitvā puna “kiṃ karomī”ti pucchi. “Tāta,
atk-s0513a4:1274_20: rājānaṃ āpucchitvā antonagare bhattavetanaṃ tvameva dehī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1274_21: So tathā katvā antonagare kassaci kiñci ahāpetvā bhattavetanaṃ datvā puna bodhisattaṃ pucchitvā rājānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1274_22: viññāpetvā antonivesane dāsaporisānampi hatthīnampi assānampi balakāyassapi vattaṃ aparihāpetvā adāsi,
atk-s0513a4:1274_23: tirojanapadehi āgatānaṃ dūtādīnaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānādīni vāṇijānaṃ suṅkanti sabbakaraṇīyāni attanāva akāsi.
atk-s0513a4:1274_24: Evaṃ so mahāsattassa ovāde ṭhatvā sabbaṃ antojanañca bahijanañca nāgare ca raṭṭhavāsino ca āgantuke ca
atk-s0513a4:1274_25: āyavattane ca tena tena saṅgahavatthunā ābandhitvā saṅgaṇhi,
atk-s0513a4:1275_0: Aparabhāge rājānaṃ maraṇamañce nipannaṃ amaccā pucchiṃsu “deva,
atk-s0513a4:1275_5: Te tasmiṃ kālakate tassa sarīraparihāraṃ katvā sattame divase sannipatitvā “raññā ‘yo tumhākaṃ manaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0513a4:1275_7: amhākañca ayaṃ saṃvarakumāro manaṃ gaṇhātī”ti ñātakehi parivāritā tassa kañcanamālaṃ setacchattaṃ ussāpayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1275_8: Saṃvaramahārājā bodhisattassa ovāde ṭhatvā dhammena rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a4:1275_13: sabbajeṭṭhakassa chattaṃ ussāpessāmā”ti ekato āgantvā “chattaṃ vā no detu,
atk-s0513a4:1275_14: yuddhaṃ vā”ti saṃvaramahārājassa paṇṇaṃ pesetvā nagaraṃ uparundhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1275_15: Rājā bodhisattassa taṃ pavattiṃ ārocetvā “idāni kiṃ karomā”ti pucchi. Mahārāja,
atk-s0513a4:1275_17: tvaṃ pitu santakaṃ dhanaṃ satakoṭṭhāse kāretvā ekūnasataṃ bhātikānaṃ pesetvā “imaṃ tumhākaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ pitu santakaṃ gaṇhatha,
atk-s0513a4:1275_18: nāhaṃ tumhehi saddhiṃ yujjhāmī”ti sāsanaṃ pahiṇāhīti.
atk-s0513a4:1275_20: Athassa sabbajeṭṭhabhātiko uposathakumāro nāma sese āmantetvā “tātā,
atk-s0513a4:1275_21: rājānaṃ nāma abhibhavituṃ samatthā nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a4:1275_22: ayañca no kaniṭṭhabhātiko paṭisattupi hutvā na tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0513a4:1275_23: amhākaṃ pitu santakaṃ dhanaṃ pesetvā ‘nāhaṃ tumhehi saddhiṃ yujjhāmī’ti pesesi,
atk-s0513a4:1275_24: na kho pana mayaṃ sabbepi ekakkhaṇe chattaṃ ussāpessāma,
atk-s0513a4:1275_27: etha taṃ passitvā rājakuṭumbaṃ paṭicchādetvā amhākaṃ janapadameva gacchāmā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:1275_28: Atha te sabbepi kumārā nagaradvāraṃ vivarāpetvā paṭisattuno ahutvā nagaraṃ pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1276_0: Rājāpi tesaṃ amaccehi paṇṇākāraṃ gāhāpetvā paṭimaggaṃ peseti.
atk-s0513a4:1276_1: Kumārā nātimahantena parivārena pattikāva āgantvā rājanivesanaṃ abhiruhitvā saṃvaramahārājassa nipaccakāraṃ dassetvā nīcāsane nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1276_5: Uposathakumāro saṃvaramahārājassa sirivibhavaṃ oloketvā “amhākaṃ pitā attano accayena saṃvarakumārassa
atk-s0513a4:1276_6: rājabhāvaṃ ñatvā maññe amhākaṃ janapade datvā imassa na adāsī”ti cintetvā tena saddhiṃ sallapanto tisso
atk-s0513a4:1279_0: Ime kumāre pūjento, na taṃ kenaci maññatha.
atk-s0513a4:1286_5: Na taṃ kenacīti khuddakenāpi kenaci janapadena taṃ pūjetabbaṃ na maññittha,
atk-s0513a4:1286_6: “ayaṃ mama accayena rājā bhavissatī”ti ñatvā maññe attano pādamūleyeva vāsesīti.
atk-s0513a4:1286_9: adu deveti udāhu amhākaṃ pitari divaṅgate attano atthaṃ vuḍḍhiṃ passantā saddhiṃ rājakārakehi negamajānapadehi ñātayo taṃ “rājā hohī”ti samanuññiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1286_11: Sañjāte abhitiṭṭhasīti samānajātike ekūnasatabhātaro abhibhavitvā tiṭṭhasi.
atk-s0513a4:1287_0: Taṃ sutvā saṃvaramahārājā attano guṇaṃ kathento cha gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:1290_0: Sakkaccaṃ te namassāmi, pāde vandāmi tādinaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1296_0: Na kiñci atimaññāmi, dhamme me nirato mano.
atk-s0513a4:1305_0: Tesu me vihitā rakkhā, evaṃ jānāhuposathā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1306_1: kañci sattaṃ “ayaṃ sampatti imassa mā hotū”ti na usūyāmi.
atk-s0513a4:1306_2: Tādinanti tādilakkhaṇayuttānaṃ samitapāpatāya samaṇānaṃ mahantānaṃ sīlakkhandhādīnaṃ guṇānaṃ esitatāya
atk-s0513a4:1306_4: dānaṃ dadanto dhammikañca nesaṃ rakkhāvaraṇaguttiṃ paccupaṭṭhapento sakkaccaṃ te namassāmi,
atk-s0513a4:1306_6: Te manti te samaṇā maṃ “ayaṃ dhammakoṭṭhāse yuttapayutto sussūsaṃ anusūyako”ti tathato ñatvā maṃ dhammaguṇe yuttaṃ sussūsaṃ anusūyakaṃ anusāsanti,
atk-s0513a4:1306_14: Niviṭṭhanti yaṃ tehi sajjitaṃ bhattañca vetanañca,
atk-s0513a4:1307_1: mayhaṃ mahāpaññā mantesu kusalā mahāamaccā ceva avasesamantino ca paricārakā atthi.
atk-s0513a4:1307_2: Iminā imaṃ dasseti “tumhe mantasampanne paṇḍite ācariye na labhittha,
atk-s0513a4:1307_6: mama chattaṃ ussāpitakālato paṭṭhāya “amhākaṃ rājā dhammiko anvaddhamāsaṃ devo vassati,
atk-s0513a4:1307_8: bārāṇasiyaṃ bahuṃ khāditabbayuttakaṃ macchamaṃsaṃ pāyitabbayuttakaṃ surodakañca jāta”nti evaṃ raṭṭhavāsino
atk-s0513a4:1307_10: Phītāti hatthiratanaassaratanamuttaratanādīni āharitvā nirupaddavā vohāraṃ karontā phītā samiddhā.
atk-s0513a4:1307_11: Evaṃ jānāhīti bhātika uposatha ahaṃ imehi ettakehi kāraṇehi sabbakaniṭṭhopi hutvā mama bhātike abhibhavitvā setacchattaṃ patto,
atk-s0513a4:1308_0: Athassa guṇaṃ sutvā uposathakumāro dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:1311_0: Medhāvī paṇḍito cāsi, athopi ñātinaṃ hito.
atk-s0513a4:1315_0: Tattha dhammena kira ñātīnanti tāta saṃvara mahārāja,
atk-s0513a4:1315_1: dhammena kira tvaṃ ekūnasatānaṃ ñātīnaṃ attano jeṭṭhabhātikānaṃ ānubhāvaṃ abhibhavasi,
atk-s0513a4:1315_3: tvameva medhāvī ceva paṇḍito ca ñātīnañca hitoti attho.
atk-s0513a4:1315_7: Asurādhipoti yathā tāvatiṃsehi parivāritaṃ indaṃ asurarājā nappasahati,
atk-s0513a4:1315_8: evaṃ amhehi ārakkhaṃ karontehi parivāritaṃ taṃ tiyojanasatike kāsiraṭṭhe dvādasayojanikāya bārāṇasiyā rajjaṃ kārentaṃ amittā nappasahantīti dīpeti.
atk-s0513a4:1316_0: Saṃvaramahārājā sabbesampi bhātikānaṃ mahantaṃ yasaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a4:1316_1: Te tassa santike māsaḍḍhamāsaṃ vasitvā “mahārāja janapadesu coresu uṭṭhahantesu mayaṃ jānissāma,
atk-s0513a4:1316_2: tvaṃ rajjasukhaṃ anubhavā”ti vatvā attano attano janapadaṃ gatā.
atk-s0513a4:1316_3: Rājāpi bodhisattassa ovāde ṭhatvā āyupariyosāne devanagaraṃ pūrento agamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:1317_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “bhikkhu evaṃ tvaṃ pubbe ovādakkhamo,
atk-s0513a4:1317_1: idāni kasmā vīriyaṃ na akāsī”ti vatvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a4:1322_0: Ummujjanti nimujjantīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto paññāpāramiṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:1322_1: Ekadivasañhi sāyanhasamaye tathāgatassa dhammaṃ desetuṃ nikkhamanaṃ āgamayamānā bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ nisīditvā “āvuso,
atk-s0513a4:1322_2: aho satthā mahāpañño puthupañño hāsapañño javanapañño tikkhapañño nibbedhikapañño tatra tatra upāyapaññāya samannāgato vipulāya pathavīsamāya,
atk-s0513a4:1322_5: sakalajambudīpasmiñhi uṭṭhitapañho dasabalaṃ atikkamitvā gantuṃ samattho nāma natthi.
atk-s0513a4:1322_8: evaṃ na koci pañho dasabalaṃ atikkamati,
atk-s0513a4:1322_9: satthu pādamūlaṃ patvā bhijjatevā”ti dasabalassa mahāpaññāpāramiṃ vaṇṇesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1322_12: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a4:1322_16: andho hutvāpi mahāsamudde udakasaññāya ‘imasmiṃ imasmiṃ samudde idaṃ nāma idaṃ nāma ratana’nti aññāsī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:1323_0: Atīte kururaṭṭhe kururājā nāma rajjaṃ kāresi,
atk-s0513a4:1323_2: Tadā bodhisatto kurukacche niyāmakajeṭṭhakassa putto hutvā nibbatti pāsādiko suvaṇṇavaṇṇo,
atk-s0513a4:1323_4: So mahantena parivārena vaḍḍhanto soḷasavassakāleyeva niyāmakasippe nipphattiṃ patvā aparabhāge pitu
atk-s0513a4:1323_8: Tassa aparabhāge loṇajalapahaṭāni dvepi cakkhūni nassiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1323_9: So tato paṭṭhāya niyāmakajeṭṭhako hutvāpi niyāmakakammaṃ akatvā “rājānaṃ nissāya jīvissāmī”ti rājānaṃ upasaṅkami.
atk-s0513a4:1324_0: Athekadivasaṃ “rañño maṅgalahatthī bhavissatī”ti kāḷapāsāṇakūṭavaṇṇaṃ ekaṃ vāraṇaṃ ānesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1324_3: So hatthena tassa sarīraṃ parimajjitvā “nāyaṃ maṅgalahatthī bhavituṃ anucchaviko,
atk-s0513a4:1324_5: etañhi mātā vijāyamānā aṅkena sampaṭicchituṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0513a4:1324_6: tasmā bhūmiyaṃ patitvā pacchimapādehi vāmanadhātuko hotī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:1324_9: Taṃ kāraṇaṃ rājā sutvā tuṭṭho tassa aṭṭha kahāpaṇe dāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:1325_0: Punekadivasaṃ “rañño maṅgalaasso bhavissatī”ti ekaṃ assaṃ ānayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1325_2: So tampi hatthena parāmasitvā “ayaṃ maṅgalaasso bhavituṃ na yutto,
atk-s0513a4:1325_4: tasmā mātu khīraṃ alabhanto na sammā vaḍḍhito”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:1325_6: Tampi sutvā rājā tussitvā aṭṭha kahāpaṇe dāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:1325_9: So tampi hatthena parāmasitvā “ayaṃ ratho susirarukkhena kato,
atk-s0513a4:1325_12: Rājā tampi sutvā aṭṭheva kahāpaṇe dāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:1325_15: So tampi hatthena parāmasitvā “imassa mūsikacchinnaṃ ekaṭṭhānaṃ atthī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:1325_17: Rājā sutvā tussitvā aṭṭheva kahāpaṇe dāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:1326_0: So cintesi “ayaṃ rājā evarūpānipi acchariyāni disvā aṭṭheva kahāpaṇe dāpesi,
atk-s0513a4:1326_6: Tasmiṃ tattha vasante vāṇijā nāvaṃ sajjetvā “kaṃ niyāmakaṃ karissāmā”ti mantesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1326_9: andho samānopi suppārakapaṇḍitova uttamo”ti taṃ upasaṅkamitvā “niyāmako no hohī”ti vatvā “tātā,
atk-s0513a4:1326_12: andhāpi tumheyeva amhākaṃ uttamā”ti punappunaṃ yāciyamāno “sādhu tātā,
atk-s0513a4:1326_13: tumhehi ārocitasaññāya niyāmako bhavissāmī”ti tesaṃ nāvaṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0513a4:1326_17: nāvā cattāro māse pakatisamuddapiṭṭhe vicaritvā khuramālīsamuddaṃ nāma pattā.
atk-s0513a4:1326_18: Tattha macchā manussasamānasarīrā khuranāsā udake ummujjanimujjaṃ karonti.
atk-s0513a4:1326_19: Vāṇijā te disvā mahāsattaṃ tassa samuddassa nāmaṃ pucchantā paṭhamaṃ gāthamāhaṃsu –
atk-s0513a4:1329_0: Suppārakaṃ taṃ pucchāma, samuddo katamo aya”nti.
atk-s0513a4:1330_0: Evaṃ tehi puṭṭho mahāsatto attano niyāmakasuttena saṃsanditvā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:1334_2: Nāvāya vippanaṭṭhāyāti tāta tumhākaṃ imāya videsaṃ pakkhandanāvāya kammakārakaṃ pakatisamuddaṃ atikkamitvā
atk-s0513a4:1335_0: Tasmiṃ pana samudde vajiraṃ ussannaṃ hoti.
atk-s0513a4:1335_2: lobhena bahuṃ vajiraṃ gaṇhitvā nāvaṃ osīdāpessantī”ti tesaṃ anācikkhitvāva nāvaṃ laggāpetvā upāyenekaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1335_3: yottaṃ gahetvā macchagahaṇaniyāmena jālaṃ khipāpetvā vajirasāraṃ uddharitvā nāvāyaṃ pakkhipitvā aññaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1335_5: Nāvā taṃ samuddaṃ atikkamitvā purato aggimāliṃ nāma gatā.
atk-s0513a4:1335_6: So pajjalitaaggikkhandho viya majjhanhikasūriyo viya ca obhāsaṃ muñcanto aṭṭhāsi. Vāṇijā –
atk-s0513a4:1338_0: Suppārakaṃ taṃ pucchāma, samuddo katamo aya”nti. – gāthāya taṃ pucchiṃsu;
atk-s0513a4:1343_0: Tasmiṃ pana samudde suvaṇṇaṃ ussannaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:1343_1: Mahāsatto purimanayeneva tatopi suvaṇṇaṃ gāhāpetvā nāvāyaṃ pakkhipāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:1343_2: Nāvā tampi samuddaṃ atikkamitvā khīraṃ viya dadhiṃ viya ca obhāsantaṃ dadhimāliṃ nāma samuddaṃ pāpuṇi. Vāṇijā –
atk-s0513a4:1346_0: Suppārakaṃ taṃ pucchāma, samuddo katamo aya”nti. –
atk-s0513a4:1352_0: Tasmiṃ pana samudde rajataṃ ussannaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:1352_1: So tampi upāyena gāhāpetvā nāvāyaṃ pakkhipāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:1352_2: Nāvā tampi samuddaṃ atikkamitvā nīlakusatiṇaṃ viya sampannasassaṃ viya ca obhāsamānaṃ nīlavaṇṇaṃ kusamāliṃ nāma samuddaṃ pāpuṇi. Vāṇijā –
atk-s0513a4:1355_0: Suppārakaṃ taṃ pucchāma, samuddo katamo aya”nti. –
atk-s0513a4:1361_0: Tasmiṃ pana samudde nīlamaṇiratanaṃ ussannaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:1361_1: So tampi upāyeneva gāhāpetvā nāvāyaṃ pakkhipāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:1361_2: Nāvā tampi samuddaṃ atikkamitvā naḷavanaṃ viya veḷuvanaṃ viya ca khāyamānaṃ naḷamāliṃ nāma samuddaṃ pāpuṇi. Vāṇijā –
atk-s0513a4:1364_0: Suppārakaṃ taṃ pucchāma, samuddo katamo aya”nti. –
atk-s0513a4:1370_0: Tasmiṃ pana samudde masāragallaṃ veḷuriyaṃ ussannaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:1370_1: So tampi upāyena gāhāpetvā nāvāyaṃ pakkhipāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:1370_6: so ca samuddo pavāḷussanno rattobhāso ahosi,
atk-s0513a4:1371_0: Vāṇijā naḷamāliṃ atikkantā balavāmukhasamuddaṃ nāma passiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1371_1: Tattha udakaṃ kaḍḍhitvā kaḍḍhitvā sabbato bhāgena uggacchati.
atk-s0513a4:1371_2: Tasmiṃ sabbato bhāgena uggate udakaṃ sabbato bhāgena chinnapapātamahāsobbho viya paññāyati,
atk-s0513a4:1371_4: bhayajanano saddo uppajjati sotāni bhindanto viya hadayaṃ phālento viya ca.
atk-s0513a4:1375_0: Suppārakaṃ taṃ pucchāma, samuddo katamo aya”nti. –
atk-s0513a4:1381_1: imaṃ balavāmukhasamuddaṃ patvā nivattituṃ samatthā nāvā nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a4:1381_2: ayaṃ sampattanāvaṃ nimujjāpetvā vināsaṃ pāpetī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:1381_4: Te sabbe maraṇabhayabhītā ekappahāreneva avīcimhi paccamānasattā viya atikāruññaṃ ravaṃ muñciṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1381_5: Mahāsatto “ṭhapetvā maṃ añño etesaṃ sotthibhāvaṃ kātuṃ samattho nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a4:1381_6: saccakiriyāya tesaṃ sotthiṃ karissāmī”ti cintetvā te āmantetvā āha – “tātā,
atk-s0513a4:1381_7: khippaṃ maṃ gandhodakena nhāpetvā ahatavatthāni nivāsāpetvā puṇṇapātiṃ sajjetvā nāvāya dhure ṭhapethā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1381_9: Mahāsatto ubhohi hatthehi puṇṇapātiṃ gahetvā nāvāya dhure ṭhito saccakiriyaṃ karonto osānagāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:1386_0: Tattha yatoti yato paṭṭhāya ahaṃ attānaṃ sarāmi,
atk-s0513a4:1386_1: yato paṭṭhāya camhi viññutaṃ pattoti attho.
atk-s0513a4:1386_2: Ekapāṇampi hiṃsitanti etthantare sañcicca ekaṃ kunthakipillikapāṇampi hiṃsitaṃ nābhijānāmi.
atk-s0513a4:1386_4: bodhisatto pana tiṇasalākampi upādāya mayā parasantakaṃ na gahitapubbaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:1386_7: tiṇaggenāpi majjaṃ na pivitapubbanti evaṃ pañcasīlavasena pana saccakiriyaṃ akāsi,
atk-s0513a4:1386_8: katvā ca pana puṇṇapātiyā udakaṃ nāvāya dhure abhisiñci.
atk-s0513a4:1387_0: Cattāro māse videsaṃ pakkhandanāvā nivattitvā iddhimā viya saccānubhāvena ekadivaseneva kurukacchapaṭṭanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:1387_1: Gantvā ca pana thalepi aṭṭhusabhamattaṃ ṭhānaṃ pakkhanditvā nāvikassa gharadvāreyeva aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:1387_2: Mahāsatto tesaṃ vāṇijānaṃ suvaṇṇarajatamaṇipavāḷamuttavajirāni bhājetvā adāsi.
atk-s0513a4:1387_4: mā puna samuddaṃ pavisathā”ti tesaṃ ovādaṃ datvā yāvajīvaṃ dānādīni puññāni katvā devapuraṃ pūresi.
atk-s0513a4:1388_2: pubbepi tathāgato mahāpaññoyevā”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a4:1391_0: Mātuposaka juṇho ca, dhamma udaya pānīyo;
atk-s0513a4:1399_0: Luddhānaṃ lahucittānanti idaṃ jātakaṃ kuṇālajātake āvi bhavissati;
atk-s0513a4:1403_0: Kā tvaṃ suddhehi vatthehīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ñātatthacariyaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:1403_1: Sāvatthiyañhi anāthapiṇḍikassa nivesane pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ nibaddhabhojanaṃ pavattati,
atk-s0513a4:1403_6: bhattaṃ gahetvā anāthapiṇḍikassa vā visākhāya vā aññesaṃ vā vissāsikānaṃ gharaṃ gantvā bhuñjanti.
atk-s0513a4:1403_7: Rājā ekadivasaṃ paṇṇākāraṃ āhaṭaṃ “bhikkhūnaṃ dethā”ti bhattaggaṃ pesetvā “bhattagge bhikkhū natthī”ti
atk-s0513a4:1403_8: vutte “kahaṃ gatā”ti pucchitvā “attano vissāsikagehesu nisīditvā bhuñjantī”ti sutvā bhuttapātarāso satthu
atk-s0513a4:1403_12: kañjikamattakampi vissāsikena dinnaṃ madhuraṃ hotīti. Bhante,
atk-s0513a4:1403_13: kena pana saddhiṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vissāso hotīti?
atk-s0513a4:1403_16: Tato rājā cintesi “ekaṃ sakyadhītaraṃ ānetvā aggamahesiṃ karissāmi,
atk-s0513a4:1403_17: evaṃ mayā saddhiṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ñātake viya vissāso bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1403_18: So uṭṭhāyāsanā attano nivesanaṃ gantvā kapilavatthuṃ dūtaṃ pesesi “dhītaraṃ me detha,
atk-s0513a4:1404_0: Sākiyā dūtavacanaṃ sutvā sannipatitvā mantayiṃsu “mayaṃ kosalarañño āṇāpavattiṭṭhāne vasāma,
atk-s0513a4:1404_8: mama dhītā vāsabhakhattiyā nāma nāgamuṇḍāya nāma dāsiyā kucchismiṃ nibbatti.
atk-s0513a4:1404_9: Sā soḷasavassuddesikā uttamarūpadharā sobhaggappattā pitu vaṃsena khattiyajātikā,
atk-s0513a4:1404_14: Dūtā cintesuṃ “ime sākiyā nāma jātiṃ nissāya atimānino,
atk-s0513a4:1404_17: Te evamāhaṃsu “mayaṃ gahetvā gacchantā yā tumhehi saddhiṃ ekato bhuñjati,
atk-s0513a4:1404_19: Sākiyā tesaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ dāpetvā “kiṃ karissāmā”ti cintayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1404_23: tumhe mama bhojanakāle vāsabhakhattiyaṃ alaṅkaritvā ānetvā mayā ekasmiṃ kabaḷe gahitamatte ‘deva,
atk-s0513a4:1404_25: imaṃ tāva sāsanaṃ suṇāthā’ti paṇṇaṃ dasseyyāthā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1404_26: Te “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā tasmiṃ bhuñjamāne kumārikaṃ alaṅkariṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1405_2: Atha naṃ alaṅkaritvā tāvadeva thokaṃ papañcaṃ katvā ānayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1405_3: Sā “pitarā saddhiṃ bhuñjissāmī”ti ekapātiyaṃ hatthaṃ otāresi.
atk-s0513a4:1405_4: Mahānāmopi tāya saddhiṃ ekapiṇḍaṃ gahetvā mukhe ṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a4:1405_7: imaṃ tāva sāsanaṃ suṇāthā”ti paṇṇaṃ upanāmesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1405_9: tvaṃ bhuñjāhī”ti dakkhiṇahatthaṃ pātiyāyeva katvā vāmahatthena gahetvā paṇṇaṃ olokesi.
atk-s0513a4:1405_10: Tassa taṃ sāsanaṃ upadhārentasseva itarā bhuñji.
atk-s0513a4:1405_11: So tassā bhuttakāle hatthaṃ dhovitvā mukhaṃ vikkhālesi.
atk-s0513a4:1405_12: Taṃ disvā dūtā “nicchayenesā etassa dhītā”ti niṭṭhamakaṃsu,
atk-s0513a4:1405_15: Dūtāpi naṃ sāvatthiṃ netvā “ayaṃ kumārikā jātisampannā mahānāmassa dhītā”ti vadiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1405_16: Rājā tussitvā sakalanagaraṃ alaṅkārāpetvā taṃ ratanarāsimhi ṭhapetvā aggamahesiṭṭhāne abhisiñcāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:1406_3: Athassa nāmaggahaṇadivase rājā attano ayyakassa santikaṃ pesesi “sakyarājadhītā vāsabhakhattiyā puttaṃ vijāyi,
atk-s0513a4:1406_5: Taṃ pana sāsanaṃ gahetvā gato amacco thokaṃ badhiradhātuko,
atk-s0513a4:1406_7: So taṃ sutvā “vāsabhakhattiyā puttaṃ avijāyitvāpi sabbaṃ janaṃ abhibhavati,
atk-s0513a4:1406_8: idāni pana ativiya rañño vallabhā bhavissatī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:1406_9: So badhiraamacco “vallabhā”ti vacanaṃ dussutaṃ sutvā “viṭaṭūbho”ti sallakkhetvā rājānaṃ upagantvā “deva,
atk-s0513a4:1406_11: Rājā “porāṇakaṃ no kuladattikaṃ nāmaṃ bhavissatī”ti cintetvā “viṭaṭūbho”ti nāmaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a4:1406_12: Tato paṭṭhāya kumāro kumāraparihārena vaḍḍhanto sattavassikakāle aññesaṃ kumārānaṃ mātāmahakulato hatthirūpakaassarūpakādīni
atk-s0513a4:1406_19: tena te kiñci na pesentī”ti vatvā vañcesi.
atk-s0513a4:1407_2: kiṃ tattha gantvā karissasī”ti vāriyamānopi punappunaṃ yāci.
atk-s0513a4:1407_4: So pitu ārocetvā mahantena parivārena nikkhami.
atk-s0513a4:1407_5: Vāsabhakhattiyā puretaraṃ paṇṇaṃ pesesi “ahaṃ idha sukhaṃ vasāmi,
atk-s0513a4:1407_7: Sākiyā viṭaṭūbhassa āgamanaṃ ñatvā “vandituṃ na sakkā”ti tassa daharadahare kumārake janapadaṃ pahiṇiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1407_8: Kumāre kapilavatthuṃ sampatte sākiyā santhāgāre sannipatiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1407_11: ayaṃ mātulo”ti vadiṃsu so sabbe vandamāno vicari.
atk-s0513a4:1407_12: So yāvapiṭṭhiyā rujanappamāṇā vanditvā ekampi attānaṃ vandamānaṃ adisvā “kiṃ nu kho maṃ vandantā natthī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0513a4:1407_14: tava kaniṭṭhakumārā janapadaṃ gatā”ti vatvā tassa mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1407_15: So katipāhaṃ vasitvā mahantena parivārena nikkhami.
atk-s0513a4:1407_16: Athekā dāsī santhāgāre tena nisinnaphalakaṃ “idaṃ vāsabhakhattiyāya dāsiyā puttassa nisinnaphalaka”nti akkositvā paribhāsitvā khīrodakena dhovi.
atk-s0513a4:1407_17: Eko puriso attano āvudhaṃ pamussitvā nivatto taṃ gaṇhanto viṭaṭūbhakumārassa akkosanasaddaṃ sutvā taṃ
atk-s0513a4:1407_18: antaraṃ pucchitvā “vāsabhakhattiyā dāsiyā kucchismiṃ mahānāmasakkassa jātā”ti ñatvā gantvā balakāyassa kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:1408_0: Kumāro taṃ sutvā “ete tāva mama nisinnaphalakaṃ khīrodakena dhovantu,
atk-s0513a4:1408_1: ahaṃ pana rajje patiṭṭhitakāle etesaṃ galalohitaṃ gahetvā mama nisinnaphalakaṃ dhovissāmī”ti cittaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a4:1408_2: Tasmiṃ sāvatthiṃ gate amaccā sabbaṃ pavattiṃ rañño ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1408_3: Rājā “sabbe mayhaṃ dāsidhītaraṃ adaṃsū”ti sākiyānaṃ kujjhitvā vāsabhakhattiyāya ca puttassa ca dinnaparihāraṃ
atk-s0513a4:1408_5: Tato katipāhaccayena satthā rājanivesanaṃ āgantvā nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:1408_7: tumhākaṃ kira ñātakehi dāsidhītā mayhaṃ dinnā,
atk-s0513a4:1408_8: tenassā ahaṃ saputtāya parihāraṃ acchinditvā dāsadāsīhi laddhabbaparihāramattameva dāpesi”nti āha.
atk-s0513a4:1408_13: vadāmi vāsabhakhattiyā khattiyarājadhītā khattiyassa rañño gehe abhisekaṃ labhi,
atk-s0513a4:1408_16: pitugottameva pamāṇanti porāṇakapaṇḍitā dalidditthiyā kaṭṭhahārikāyapi aggamahesiṭṭhānaṃ adaṃsu,
atk-s0513a4:1408_17: tassā ca kucchimhi jātakumāro dvādasayojanikāya bārāṇasiyā rajjaṃ katvā kaṭṭhavāhanarājā nāma jāto”ti kaṭṭhavāhanajātakaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:1408_18: Rājā satthu dhammakathaṃ sutvā “pitugottameva kira pamāṇa”nti sutvā tussitvā mātāputtānaṃ pakatiparihārameva dāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:1409_0: Rañño pana bandhulo nāma senāpati mallikaṃ nāma attano bhariyaṃ vañjhaṃ “tava kulagharameva gacchāhī”ti kusinārameva pesesi.
atk-s0513a4:1409_1: Sā “satthāraṃ disvāva gamissāmī”ti jetavanaṃ pavisitvā tathāgataṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ ṭhitā “kahaṃ gacchasī”ti ca puṭṭhā “sāmiko me, bhante,
atk-s0513a4:1409_3: bhante”ti vatvā satthārā “yadi evaṃ gamanakiccaṃ natthi,
atk-s0513a4:1409_4: nivattāhī”ti vuttā tuṭṭhā satthāraṃ vanditvā nivesanameva puna agamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:1409_7: Sā na cirasseva gabbhaṃ paṭilabhitvā uppannadohaḷā “dohaḷo me uppanno”ti ārocesi.
atk-s0513a4:1409_9: “Vesāliyā nagare licchavirājānaṃ abhisekamaṅgalapokkharaṇiṃ otaritvā nhatvā pānīyaṃ pivitukāmāmhi, sāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1409_10: Senāpati “sādhū”ti vatvā sahassathāmadhanuṃ gahetvā taṃ rathaṃ āropetvā sāvatthito nikkhamitvā rathaṃ pājento vesāliṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a4:1410_0: Tasmiñca kāle kosalarañño bandhulasenāpatinā saddhiṃ ekācariyakule uggahitasippo mahāli nāma licchavī
atk-s0513a4:1410_1: andho licchavīnaṃ atthañca dhammañca anusāsanto dvārasamīpe vasati.
atk-s0513a4:1410_2: So rathassa ummāre paṭighaṭṭanasaddaṃ sutvā “bandhulamallassa rathapatanasaddo eso,
atk-s0513a4:1410_4: Pokkharaṇiyā anto ca bahi ca ārakkhā balavā,
atk-s0513a4:1410_7: Senāpati pana rathā otaritvā ārakkhake khaggena paharanto palāpetvā lohajālaṃ chinditvā antopokkharaṇiyaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1410_8: bhariyaṃ otāretvā nhāpetvā pāyetvā sayampi nhatvā mallikaṃ rathaṃ āropetvā nagarā nikkhamitvā āgatamaggeneva pāyāsi.
atk-s0513a4:1410_10: Licchavirājāno kujjhitvā pañca rathasatāni āruyha “bandhulamallaṃ gaṇhissāmā”ti nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1410_13: so hi vo sabbe ghātayissatī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:1410_15: Tena hi cakkassa yāva nābhito pathaviṃ paviṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ disvā nivatteyyātha,
atk-s0513a4:1410_16: tato anivattantā purato asanisaddaṃ viya suṇissatha,
atk-s0513a4:1410_18: tato anivattantā tumhākaṃ rathadhuresu chiddaṃ passissatha,
atk-s0513a4:1410_21: Te tassa vacanena anivattitvā taṃ anubandhiṃsuyeva.
atk-s0513a4:1411_2: Tena hi ekassa rathassa viya paññāyanakāle mama āroceyyāsīti.
atk-s0513a4:1411_3: Sā yadā sabbe eko viya hutvā paññāyiṃsu,
atk-s0513a4:1411_5: Bandhulo “tena hi imā rasmiyo gaṇhāhī”ti tassā rasmiyo datvā rathe ṭhitova dhanuṃ āropeti,
atk-s0513a4:1411_7: licchavino taṃ ṭhānaṃ disvāpi na nivattiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1411_12: Bandhulo rathe ṭhitakova ekaṃ saraṃ khipi.
atk-s0513a4:1411_13: So pañcannaṃ rathasatānaṃ rathasīsaṃ chiddaṃ katvā pañca rājasatāni parikarabandhanaṭṭhāne vijjhitvā pathaviṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a4:1411_17: matakehi saddhiṃ mayhaṃ yuddhaṃ nāma natthī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:1411_18: Te “matakā nāma amhādisā neva hontī”ti vadiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1411_23: attano gharāni gantvā saṃvidhātabbaṃ saṃvidahitvā puttadāre anusāsitvā sannāhaṃ mocethā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:1411_24: Te tathā katvā sabbe jīvitakkhayaṃ pattā.
atk-s0513a4:1412_5: Pitarā saddhiṃ rājanivesanaṃ gacchantehi teheva rājaṅgaṇaṃ paripūri.
atk-s0513a4:1412_6: Athekadivasaṃ vinicchaye kūṭaḍḍaparājitā manussā bandhulaṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā mahāravaṃ viravantā vinicchayaamaccānaṃ kūṭaḍḍakāraṇaṃ tassa ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1412_7: Sopi vinicchayaṃ gantvā taṃ aḍḍaṃ tīretvā sāmikameva sāmikaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:1412_10: Rājā “kimida”nti pucchitvā tamatthaṃ sutvā tussitvā sabbepi te amacce hāretvā bandhulasseva vinicchayaṃ niyyādesi.
atk-s0513a4:1412_12: Tato porāṇakavinicchayikā lañjaṃ alabhantā appalābhā hutvā “bandhulo rajjaṃ patthetī”ti rājakule paribhindiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1412_13: Rājā taṃ kathaṃ gahetvā cittaṃ niggahetuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0513a4:1412_14: “imasmiṃ idheva ghātiyamāne garahā me uppajjissatī”ti puna cintetvā “payuttapurisehi paccantaṃ paharāpetvā
atk-s0513a4:1412_15: te palāpetvā nivattakāle antarāmagge puttehi saddhiṃ māretuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti bandhulaṃ pakkosāpetvā “paccanto
atk-s0513a4:1412_17: tava puttehi saddhiṃ gantvā core gaṇhāhī”ti pahiṇitvā “etthevassa dvattiṃsāya puttehi saddhiṃ sīsaṃ chinditvā
atk-s0513a4:1412_18: āharathā”ti tehi saddhiṃ aññepi samatthe mahāyodhe pesesi.
atk-s0513a4:1412_19: Tasmiṃ paccantaṃ gacchanteyeva “senāpati kira āgacchatī”ti sutvāva payuttakacorā palāyiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1412_20: So taṃ padesaṃ āvāsāpetvā janapadaṃ saṇṭhapetvā nivatti.
atk-s0513a4:1413_0: Athassa nagarato avidūre ṭhāne te yodhā puttehi saddhiṃ sīsaṃ chindiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1413_1: Taṃ divasaṃ mallikāya pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ dve aggasāvakā nimantitā honti.
atk-s0513a4:1413_2: Athassā pubbaṇhasamaye “sāmikassa te saddhiṃ puttehi sīsaṃ chindiṃsū”ti paṇṇaṃ āharitvā adaṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1413_3: Sā taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā kassaci kiñci avatvā paṇṇaṃ ucchaṅge katvā bhikkhusaṅghameva parivisi.
atk-s0513a4:1413_4: Athassā paricārikā bhikkhūnaṃ bhattaṃ datvā sappicāṭiṃ āharantiyo therānaṃ purato cāṭiṃ bhindiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1413_8: Sā ucchaṅgato paṇṇaṃ nīharitvā “dvattiṃsaputtehi saddhiṃ pitu sīsaṃ chinnanti me imaṃ paṇṇaṃ āhariṃsu,
atk-s0513a4:1413_12: Dhammasenāpati “animittamanaññāta”ntiādīni vatvā dhammaṃ desetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:1413_13: Sāpi dvattiṃsa suṇisāyo pakkosāpetvā “tumhākaṃ sāmikā attano purimakammaphalaṃ labhiṃsu,
atk-s0513a4:1413_15: rañño upari manopadosaṃ mā karitthā”ti ovadi.
atk-s0513a4:1414_0: Rañño carapurisā taṃ kathaṃ sutvā tesaṃ niddosabhāvaṃ rañño kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1414_1: Rājā saṃvegappatto tassā nivesanaṃ gantvā mallikañca suṇisāyo cassā khamāpetvā mallikāya varaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a4:1414_2: Sā “gahito me hotū”ti vatvā tasmiṃ gate matakabhattaṃ datvā nhatvā rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā “deva,
atk-s0513a4:1414_5: dvattiṃsāya me suṇisānaṃ mama ca kulagharagamanaṃ anujānāthā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:1414_7: Sā dvattiṃsāya suṇisānaṃ sakakulaṃ pesetvā sayaṃ kusināranagare attano kulagharaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:1414_8: Rājā bandhulasenāpatino bhāgineyyassa dīghakārāyanassa nāma senāpatiṭṭhānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a4:1414_9: So pana “mātulo me iminā mārito”ti rañño otāraṃ gavesanto vicarati.
atk-s0513a4:1414_10: Rājāpi nipparādhassa bandhulassa māritakālato paṭṭhāya vippaṭisārī cittassādaṃ na labhati,
atk-s0513a4:1415_0: Tadā satthā sākiyānaṃ veḷuṃ nāma nigamaṃ upanissāya viharati.
atk-s0513a4:1415_1: Rājā tattha gantvā ārāmato avidūre khandhāvāraṃ nivāsetvā “mahantena parivārena satthāraṃ vandissāmā”ti
atk-s0513a4:1415_2: vihāraṃ gantvā pañca rājakakudhabhaṇḍāni dīghakārāyanassa datvā ekakova gandhakuṭiṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a4:1415_4: Tasmiṃ gandhakuṭiṃ paviṭṭhe dīghakārāyano tāni pañca rājakakudhabhaṇḍāni gahetvā viṭaṭūbhaṃ rājānaṃ katvā
atk-s0513a4:1415_5: rañño ekaṃ assaṃ ekañca upaṭṭhānakārikaṃ mātugāmaṃ nivattetvā sāvatthiṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:1415_6: Rājā satthārā saddhiṃ piyakathaṃ kathetvā nikkhanto senaṃ adisvā taṃ mātugāmaṃ pucchitvā taṃ pavattiṃ
atk-s0513a4:1415_7: sutvā “ahaṃ bhāgineyyaṃ ajātasattuṃ ādāya āgantvā viṭaṭūbhaṃ gahessāmī”ti rājagahanagaraṃ gacchanto vikāle
atk-s0513a4:1415_8: dvāresu pihitesu nagaraṃ pavisitumasakkonto ekissāya sālāya nipajjitvā vātātapena kilanto rattibhāge
atk-s0513a4:1415_11: idāni anāthosi jāto”ti vilapantiyā tassā itthiyā saddaṃ sutvā rañño ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1415_12: So mātulassa mahantena sakkārena sarīrakiccaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a4:1416_0: Viṭaṭūbhopi rajjaṃ labhitvā taṃ veraṃ saritvā “sabbepi sākiye māressāmī”ti mahatiyā senāya nikkhami.
atk-s0513a4:1416_1: Taṃ divasaṃ satthā paccūsasamaye lokaṃ volokento ñātisaṅghassa vināsaṃ disvā “ñātisaṅgahaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0513a4:1416_2: cintetvā pubbaṇhasamaye piṇḍāya caritvā piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto gandhakuṭiyaṃ sīhaseyyaṃ kappetvā sāyanhasamaye
atk-s0513a4:1416_3: ākāsena gantvā kapilavatthusāmante ekasmiṃ kabaracchāye rukkhamūle nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:1416_4: Tato avidūre viṭaṭūbhassa rajjasīmāya anto sandacchāyo nigrodharukkho atthi,
atk-s0513a4:1416_6: kiṃkāraṇā evarūpāya uṇhavelāya imasmiṃ kabaracchāye rukkhamūle nisīdatha,
atk-s0513a4:1416_9: ñātakānaṃ chāyā nāma sītalā”ti vutte “ñātakānaṃ rakkhaṇatthāya satthā āgato bhavissatī”ti cintetvā satthāraṃ vanditvā sāvatthimeva paccāgami.
atk-s0513a4:1417_0: Rājā sākiyānaṃ dosaṃ saritvā dutiyaṃ nikkhamitvā tatheva satthāraṃ passitvā puna nivattitvā tatiyavāre
atk-s0513a4:1417_2: Catutthavāre pana tasmiṃ nikkhante satthā sākiyānaṃ pubbakammaṃ oloketvā tesaṃ nadiyaṃ visapakkhipanapāpakammassa
atk-s0513a4:1417_4: Viṭaṭūbharājā khīrapāyake dārake ādiṃ katvā sabbe sākiye ghātetvā galalohitena nisinnaphalakaṃ dhovitvā paccāgami.
atk-s0513a4:1417_5: Satthari tatiyavāre gamanato paccāgantvā punadivase piṇḍāya caritvā niṭṭhāpitabhattakicce gandhakuṭiyaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1417_6: pavisante disāhi sannipatitā bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ nisīditvā “āvuso,
atk-s0513a4:1417_7: satthā attānaṃ dassetvā rājānaṃ nivattāpetvā ñātake maraṇabhayā mocesi,
atk-s0513a4:1417_8: evaṃ ñātakānaṃ atthacaro satthā”ti bhagavato guṇakathaṃ kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1417_11: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a4:1418_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā dasa rājadhamme akopetvā dhammena rajjaṃ kārento ekadivasaṃ cintesi
atk-s0513a4:1418_2: tasmā bahūhi thambhehi pāsādakaraṇaṃ nāma anacchariyaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:1418_5: So vaḍḍhakī pakkosāpetvā “mayhaṃ sobhaggappattaṃ ekathambhakaṃ pāsādaṃ karothā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:1418_6: Te “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā araññaṃ pavisitvā ujū mahante ekathambhakapāsādārahe bahū rukkhe disvā “ime rukkhā santi,
atk-s0513a4:1418_11: yena kenaci upāyena na sakkā”ti vutte “tena hi mama uyyāne ekaṃ rukkhaṃ upadhārethā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:1418_12: Vaḍḍhakī uyyānaṃ gantvā ekaṃ sujātaṃ ujukaṃ gāmanigamapūjitaṃ rājakulatopi laddhabalikammaṃ maṅgalasālarukkhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1418_13: disvā rañño santikaṃ gantvā tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1418_16: Te “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā gandhamālādihatthā uyyānaṃ gantvā rukkhe gandhapañcaṅgulikaṃ datvā suttena
atk-s0513a4:1418_17: parikkhipitvā pupphakaṇṇikaṃ bandhitvā dīpaṃ jāletvā balikammaṃ katvā “ito sattame divase āgantvā rukkhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1419_0: Atha tasmiṃ nibbatto devaputto taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā “nissaṃsayaṃ ime vaḍḍhakī imaṃ rukkhaṃ chindissanti,
atk-s0513a4:1419_3: imañca rakkhaṃ parivāretvā ṭhitesu taruṇasālarukkhesu nibbattānaṃ mama ñātidevatānampi bahūni vimānāni nassissanti.
atk-s0513a4:1419_5: na kho pana maṃ tathā attano vināso bādhati,
atk-s0513a4:1419_7: tasmā nesaṃ mayā jīvitaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā aḍḍharattasamaye dibbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍito rañño sirigabbhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1419_8: pavisitvā sakalagabbhaṃ ekobhāsaṃ katvā ussisakapasse rodamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:1419_9: Rājā taṃ disvā bhītatasito tena saddhiṃ sallapanto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:1421_0: “Kā tvaṃ suddhehi vatthehi, aghe vehāyasaṃ ṭhitā;
atk-s0513a4:1422_0: Kena tyāssūni vattanti, kuto taṃ bhayamāgata”nti.
atk-s0513a4:1423_0: Tattha kā tvanti nāgayakkhasupaṇṇasakkādīsu kā nāma tvanti pucchati.
atk-s0513a4:1423_5: Kena tyāssūni vattantīti kena kāraṇena tava assūni vattanti.
atk-s0513a4:1423_6: Kutoti ñātiviyogadhanavināsādīnaṃ kiṃ nissāya taṃ bhayamāgatanti pucchati.
atk-s0513a4:1430_0: Vividhe cāpi pāsāde, na maṃ te accamaññisuṃ;
atk-s0513a4:1431_0: Yatheva maṃ te pūjesuṃ, tatheva tvampi pūjayā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1432_0: Tattha tiṭṭhatoti sakalabārāṇasinagarehi ceva gāmanigamehi ca tayā ca pūjitassa niccaṃ balikammañca sakkārañca
atk-s0513a4:1432_1: labhantassa mayhaṃ imasmiṃ uyyāne tiṭṭhantassa ettako kālo gatoti dasseti.
atk-s0513a4:1432_5: Na maṃ teti te nagarapaṭisaṅkharaṇādīni karontā imasmiṃ nagare porāṇakarājāno maṃ nātimaññisuṃ nātikkamiṃsu na viheṭhayiṃsu,
atk-s0513a4:1432_6: mama nivāsarukkhaṃ chinditvā attano kammaṃ na kariṃsu,
atk-s0513a4:1432_8: Yathevāti tasmā yatheva te porāṇakarājāno maṃ pūjayiṃsu,
atk-s0513a4:1435_0: “Taṃ ivāhaṃ na passāmi, thūlaṃ kāyena te dumaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:1439_0: Tattha taṃ upanessāmi, ciraṃ te yakkha jīvita”nti.
atk-s0513a4:1440_2: tava pamāṇena taṃ viya thūlaṃ mahantaṃ aññaṃ dumaṃ na passāmi,
atk-s0513a4:1440_3: tvaññeva pana ārohapariṇāhena sujātasaṅkhātāya samasaṇṭhānaujubhāvappakārāya jātiyā ca abhirūpo sobhaggappatto ekathambhapāsādārahoti.
atk-s0513a4:1440_4: Pāsādanti tasmā taṃ chedāpetvā ahaṃ pāsādaṃ kārāpessāmeva.
atk-s0513a4:1440_5: Tattha tanti taṃ panāhaṃ samma devarāja,
atk-s0513a4:1440_7: so tvaṃ mayā saddhiṃ ekato vasanto aggagandhamālādīni labhanto sakkārappatto sukhaṃ jīvissasi,
atk-s0513a4:1440_8: nivāsaṭṭhānābhāvena me vināso bhavissatīti mā cintayi,
atk-s0513a4:1441_0: Taṃ sutvā devarājā dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:1446_0: “Agge ca chetvā majjhe ca, pacchā mūlamhi chindatha;
atk-s0513a4:1447_0: Evaṃ me chijjamānassa, na dukkhaṃ maraṇaṃ siyā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1448_0: Tattha evaṃ cittaṃ udapādīti yadi evaṃ cittaṃ tava uppannaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1448_1: Sarīrena vinābhāvoti yadi te mama sarīrena bhaddasālarukkhena saddhiṃ mama vinābhāvo patthito.
atk-s0513a4:1448_5: Agge cāti avakantantā pana paṭhamaṃ agge,
atk-s0513a4:1448_6: tato majjhe chetvā sabbapacchā mūle chindatha.
atk-s0513a4:1448_7: Evañhi me chijjamānassa na dukkhaṃ maraṇaṃ siyā,
atk-s0513a4:1452_0: Tato pacchā siro chinde, taṃ dukkhaṃ maraṇaṃ siyā.
atk-s0513a4:1456_0: Tattha hatthapādanti hatthe ca pāde ca.
atk-s0513a4:1456_1: Taṃ dukkhanti evaṃ paṭipāṭiyā chijjantassa corassa taṃ maraṇaṃ dukkhaṃ siyā.
atk-s0513a4:1456_3: vajjhappattā corā sukhena maritukāmā sīsacchedaṃ yācanti,
atk-s0513a4:1456_6: tena taṃ pucchāmi “sukhaṃ nu khaṇḍaso chinna”nti.
atk-s0513a4:1456_7: Kiṃhetūti khaṇḍaso chinnaṃ nāma na sukhaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:1456_8: kāraṇena panettha bhavitabbanti taṃ pucchanto evamāha.
atk-s0513a4:1457_0: Athassa ācikkhanto bhaddasālo dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:1464_3: hetuṃ upādāya ārabbha sandhāyāhaṃ khaṇḍaso chinnamicchāmi,
atk-s0513a4:1464_5: Ñātī meti mama bhaddasālarukkhassa chāyāya sukhasaṃvaddhā mama passe taruṇasālarukkhesu nibbattā mayā
atk-s0513a4:1464_6: katavātaparittāṇattā nivātajā mama ñātakā devasaṅghā atthi,
atk-s0513a4:1464_7: te ahaṃ visālasākhaviṭapo mūle chinditvā patanto upahiṃseyyaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:1464_9: Paresaṃ asukhocitanti evaṃ sante mayā tesaṃ paresaṃ ñātidevasaṅghānaṃ asukhaṃ dukkhaṃ ocitaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:1464_11: tasmā bhaddasālaṃ khaṇḍaso khaṇḍaso chindāpemīti ayametthādhippāyo.
atk-s0513a4:1465_2: attano vimānavināsatopi ñātīnaṃ vimānavināsaṃ na icchati,
atk-s0513a4:1468_0: Hitakāmosi ñātīnaṃ, abhayaṃ samma dammi te”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1469_0: Tattha ceteyyarūpaṃ cetesīti ñātīsu muducittatāya cintento cintetabbayuttakameva cintesi.
atk-s0513a4:1469_8: gaccha ñātisaṅghaparivuto sakkatagarukato sukhaṃ jīvāti āha.
atk-s0513a4:1470_1: Rājā tassovāde ṭhatvā dānādīni puññāni katvā saggapuraṃ pūresi.
atk-s0513a4:1471_2: pubbepi tathāgato ñātatthacariyaṃ acariyevā”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a4:1475_0: Kasanti vapanti te janāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto devadattassa pañca kulasatāni gahetvā niraye patitabhāvaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:1475_1: So hi aggasāvakesu parisaṃ gahetvā pakkantesu sokaṃ sandhāretuṃ asakkonto uṇhalohite mukhato nikkhante
atk-s0513a4:1475_2: balavavedanāpīḷito tathāgatassa guṇaṃ anussaritvā “ahameva nava māse tathāgatassa anatthaṃ cintesiṃ,
atk-s0513a4:1475_3: satthu pana mayi pāpacittaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a4:1475_5: mayā katakammena ahameva idāni anātho jāto,
atk-s0513a4:1475_6: satthārāpimhi vissaṭṭho mahātherehipi ñātiseṭṭhena rāhulattherenapi sakyarājakulehipi,
atk-s0513a4:1475_7: gantvā satthāraṃ khamāpessāmī”ti parisāya saññaṃ datvā attānaṃ pañcakena gāhāpetvā rattiṃ rattiṃ gacchanto kosalaraṭṭhaṃ sampāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a4:1476_0: Atha tasmiṃ sāvatthinagaradvāraṃ sampatte puna thero ārocesi,
atk-s0513a4:1476_2: Tassa jetavane pokkharaṇiyā samīpaṃ āgatassa pāpaṃ matthakaṃ pāpuṇi,
atk-s0513a4:1476_4: nhatvā pānīyaṃ pivitukāmo hutvā “mañcakato maṃ āvuso otāretha,
atk-s0513a4:1476_6: Tassa otāretvā bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapitamattassa cittassāde aladdheyeva mahāpathavī vivaramadāsi.
atk-s0513a4:1476_7: Tāvadeva taṃ avīcito aggijālā uṭṭhāya parikkhipitvā gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a4:1476_8: So “pāpakammaṃ me matthakaṃ patta”nti tathāgatassa guṇe anussaritvā –
atk-s0513a4:1478_0: Samantacakkhuṃ satapuññalakkhaṇaṃ, pāṇehi buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ upemī”ti. –
atk-s0513a4:1479_0: Imāya gāthāya saraṇe patiṭṭhahanto avīciparāyaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:1479_2: Tānipi tappakkhikāni hutvā dasabalaṃ akkositvā avīcimhiyeva nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1479_3: Evaṃ so tāni pañca kulasatāni gaṇhitvā avīcimhi patiṭṭhito.
atk-s0513a4:1480_1: devadatto pāpo lābhasakkāragiddhatāya sammāsambuddhe aṭṭhāne kopaṃ bandhitvā anāgatabhayamanoloketvā pañcahi kulasatehi saddhiṃ avīciparāyaṇo jāto”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1480_4: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a4:1480_5: idāneva devadatto lābhasakkāragiddho hutvā anāgatabhayaṃ na olokesi,
atk-s0513a4:1480_6: pubbepi anāgatabhayaṃ anoloketvā paccuppannasukhagiddhena saddhiṃ parisāya mahāvināsaṃ patto”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:1481_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bārāṇasito avidūre kulasahassanivāso mahāvaḍḍhakīgāmo ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:1481_3: gehaṃ karissāmā”ti vatvā manussānaṃ hatthato bahuṃ iṇaṃ gahetvā kiñci kātuṃ na sakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1481_5: Te iṇāyikehi upaddutā sukhaṃ vasituṃ asakkontā “videsaṃ gantvā yattha katthaci vasissāmā”ti araññaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0513a4:1481_6: rukkhe chinditvā mahatiṃ nāvaṃ bandhitvā nadiṃ otāretvā āharitvā gāmato gāvutaḍḍhayojanamatte ṭhāne ṭhapetvā
atk-s0513a4:1481_7: aḍḍharattasamaye gāmaṃ āgantvā puttadāramādāya nāvaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā nāvaṃ āruyha anukkamena mahāsamuddaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1481_8: pavisitvā vātavegena vicarantā samuddamajjhe ekaṃ dīpakaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1481_10: aññataro pabhinnanāvo puriso paṭhamataraṃ taṃ dīpakaṃ patvā sālibhattaṃ bhuñjamāno ucchuādīni khādamāno
atk-s0513a4:1481_11: thūlasarīro naggo parūḷhakesamassu tasmiṃ dīpake paṭivasati.
atk-s0513a4:1482_0: Vaḍḍhakī cintayiṃsu “sace ayaṃ dīpako rakkhasapariggahito bhavissati,
atk-s0513a4:1482_3: Atha sattaṭṭha purisā sūrā balavanto sannaddhapañcāvudhā hutvā otaritvā dīpakaṃ pariggaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1482_4: Tasmiṃ khaṇe so puriso bhuttapātarāso ucchurasaṃ pivitvā sukhappatto ramaṇīye padese rajatapaṭṭasadise
atk-s0513a4:1482_5: vālukatale sītacchāyāya uttānako nipajjitvā “jambudīpavāsino kasantā vapantā evarūpaṃ sukhaṃ na labhanti,
atk-s0513a4:1482_6: jambudīpato mayhaṃ ayameva dīpako vara”nti gāyamāno udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0513a4:1482_7: Atha satthā bhikkhū āmantetvā “so bhikkhave puriso imaṃ udānaṃ udānesī”ti dassento paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:1485_0: Nayimassa dīpakassa bhāgino, jambudīpā idameva no vara”nti.
atk-s0513a4:1486_0: Tattha te janāti te jambudīpavāsino janā. Kammaphalūpajīvinoti nānākammānaṃ phalūpajīvino sattā.
atk-s0513a4:1487_0: Atha te dīpakaṃ pariggaṇhantā purisā tassa gītasaddaṃ sutvā “manussasaddo viya suyyati,
atk-s0513a4:1487_1: jānissāma na”nti saddānusārena gantvā taṃ purisaṃ disvā “yakkho bhavissatī”ti bhītatasitā sare sannahiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1487_2: Sopi te disvā attano vadhabhayena “nāhaṃ, sāmi, yakkho,
atk-s0513a4:1487_4: jīvitaṃ me dethā”ti yācanto “purisā nāma tumhādisā naggā na hontī”ti vutte punappunaṃ yācitvā manussabhāvaṃ viññāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:1487_5: Te taṃ purisaṃ upasaṅkamitvā sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sutvā tassa tattha āgataniyāmaṃ pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1487_6: Sopi sabbaṃ tesaṃ kathetvā “tumhe attano puññasampattiyā idhāgatā,
atk-s0513a4:1487_8: na ettha sahatthena kammaṃ katvā jīvanti,
atk-s0513a4:1487_9: sayaṃjātasālīnañceva ucchuādīnañcettha anto natthīti anukkaṇṭhantā vasathā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:1487_10: Idha pana vasantānaṃ amhākaṃ añño paripantho natthi,
atk-s0513a4:1487_14: tasmā taṃ karontā vālukaṃ viyūhitvā vālukāya paṭicchādeyyātha,
atk-s0513a4:1487_19: Tasmiṃ pana kulasahasse pañcannaṃ pañcannaṃ kulasatānaṃ jeṭṭhakā dve vaḍḍhakī ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1488_0: Aparabhāge sabbepi te tattha sukhaṃ vasantā thūlasarīrā hutvā cintayiṃsu “ciraṃ pītā no surā,
atk-s0513a4:1488_2: Te merayaṃ kāretvā pivitvā madavasena gāyantā naccantā kīḷantā pamattā tattha tattha uccārapassāvaṃ katvā
atk-s0513a4:1488_4: Devatā “ime amhākaṃ kīḷāmaṇḍalaṃ paṭikūlaṃ karontī”ti kujjhitvā “mahāsamuddaṃ uttarāpetvā dīpakadhovanaṃ karissāmā”ti mantetvā “ayaṃ kāḷapakkho,
atk-s0513a4:1488_6: ito dāni pannarasame divase puṇṇamīuposathadivase candassuggamanavelāya samuddaṃ ubbattetvā sabbepime ghātessāmā”ti divasaṃ ṭhapayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1488_7: Atha nesaṃ antare eko dhammiko devaputto “mā ime mama passantassa nassiṃsū”ti anukampāya tesu sāyamāsaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1488_8: bhuñjitvā gharadvāre sukhakathāya nisinnesu sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍito sakaladīpaṃ ekobhāsaṃ katvā uttarāya
atk-s0513a4:1488_12: ito aḍḍhamāsaccayena hi devatā samuddaṃ ubbattetvā sabbeva tumhe ghātessanti,
atk-s0513a4:1488_13: ito nikkhamitvā palāyathā”ti vatvā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:1491_0: Uplavissaṃ dīpamimaṃ uḷāraṃ, mā vo vadhī gacchatha leṇamañña”nti.
atk-s0513a4:1492_0: Tattha uplavissanti imaṃ dīpakaṃ uplavanto ajjhottharanto abhibhavissati.
atk-s0513a4:1492_1: Mā vo vadhīti so sāgaravego tumhe mā vadhi.
atk-s0513a4:1493_0: Iti so tesaṃ ovādaṃ datvā attano ṭhānameva gato.
atk-s0513a4:1493_1: Tasmiṃ gate aparo sāhasiko kakkhaḷo devaputto “ime imassa vacanaṃ gahetvā palāyeyyuṃ,
atk-s0513a4:1493_2: ahaṃ nesaṃ gamanaṃ nivāretvā sabbepime mahāvināsaṃ pāpessāmī”ti cintetvā dibbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍito sakaladīpaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1493_3: ekobhāsaṃ karonto āgantvā dakkhiṇāya disāya ākāse ṭhatvā “eko devaputto idhāgato,
atk-s0513a4:1493_4: no”ti pucchitvā “āgato”ti vutte “so vo kiṃ kathesī”ti vatvā “imaṃ nāma,
atk-s0513a4:1493_5: sāmī”ti vutte “so tumhākaṃ idha nivāsaṃ na icchati,
atk-s0513a4:1493_7: tumhe aññattha agantvā idheva vasathā”ti vatvā dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:1496_0: Taṃ me nimittehi bahūhi diṭṭhaṃ, mā bhetha kiṃ socatha modathavho.
atk-s0513a4:1499_0: Na vo bhayaṃ paṭipassāmi kiñci, āputtaputtehi pamodathavho”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1500_0: Tattha na jātuyanti na jātu ayaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1501_0: Evaṃ so imāhi dvīhi gāthāhi te assāsetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a4:1501_1: Tassa pakkantakāle dhammikadevaputtassa vacanaṃ anādiyanto bālavaḍḍhakī “suṇantu me, bhonto,
atk-s0513a4:1503_0: “Yo devoyaṃ dakkhiṇāyaṃ disāyaṃ, khemanti pakkosati tassa saccaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:1504_0: Na uttaro vedi bhayābhayassa, mā bhetha kiṃ socatha modathavho”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1505_0: Tattha dakkhiṇāyanti dakkhiṇāya, ayameva vā pāṭho.
atk-s0513a4:1506_0: Taṃ sutvā rasagiddhā pañcasatā vaḍḍhakī tassa bālassa vacanaṃ ādiyiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1506_1: Itaro pana paṇḍitavaḍḍhakī tassa vacanaṃ anādiyanto te vaḍḍhakī āmantetvā catasso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:1508_0: “Yathā ime vippavadanti yakkhā, eko bhayaṃ saṃsati khemameko;
atk-s0513a4:1509_0: Tadiṅgha mayhaṃ vacanaṃ suṇātha, khippaṃ lahuṃ mā vinassimha sabbe.
atk-s0513a4:1511_0: “Sabbe samāgamma karoma nāvaṃ, doṇiṃ daḷhaṃ sabbayantūpapannaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:1512_0: Sace ayaṃ dakkhiṇo saccamāha, moghaṃ paṭikkosati uttaroyaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:1513_0: Sā ceva no hehiti āpadatthā, imañca dīpaṃ na pariccajema.
atk-s0513a4:1515_0: “Sace ca kho uttaro saccamāha, moghaṃ paṭikkosati dakkhiṇoyaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:1516_0: Tameva nāvaṃ abhiruyha sabbe, evaṃ mayaṃ sotthi taremu pāraṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1518_0: “Na ve sugaṇhaṃ paṭhamena seṭṭhaṃ, kaniṭṭhamāpāthagataṃ gahetvā;
atk-s0513a4:1519_0: Yo cīdha tacchaṃ paviceyya gaṇhati, sa ve naro seṭṭhamupeti ṭhāna”nti.
atk-s0513a4:1520_4: Sā ceva no hehiti āpadatthāti sā ca no nāvā pacchāpi uppannāya āpadāya atthā bhavissati,
atk-s0513a4:1520_7: Na ve sugaṇhanti na ve sukhena gaṇhitabbaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1520_9: Kaniṭṭhanti paṭhamavacanaṃ upādāya pacchimavacanaṃ kaniṭṭhaṃ nāma.
atk-s0513a4:1520_13: yena kenaci paṭhamena vuttavacanaṃ “idameva seṭṭhaṃ tathaṃ sacca”nti sukhaṃ na gaṇhitabbameva,
atk-s0513a4:1520_15: evaṃ kaniṭṭhaṃ gacchā vuttavacanampi “idameva tathaṃ sacca”nti na gaṇhitabbaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1520_17: taṃ āpāthagataṃ gahetvā yo idha paṇḍitapuriso purimavacanañca pacchimavacanañca paviceyya vicinitvā tīretvā upaparikkhitvā tacchaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0513a4:1520_20: Sa ve naro seṭṭhamupeti ṭhānanti so uttamaṃ ṭhānaṃ upeti adhigacchati vindati labhatīti.
atk-s0513a4:1521_12: imaṃ evarūpaṃ varadīpaṃ pahāya kuhiṃ gamissāma,
atk-s0513a4:1521_16: Paṇḍito attano parisaṃ gahetvā nāvaṃ sajjetvā nāvāya sabbūpakaraṇāni āropetvā sapariso nāvāya aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:1522_0: Tato puṇṇamadivase candassa uggamanavelāya samuddato ūmi uttaritvā jāṇukapamāṇā hutvā dīpakaṃ dhovitvā gatā.
atk-s0513a4:1522_1: Paṇḍito samuddassa uttaraṇabhāvaṃ ñatvā nāvaṃ vissajjesi.
atk-s0513a4:1522_2: Bālavaḍḍhakipakkhikāni pañca kulasatāni “samuddato ūmi dīpadhovanatthāya āgatā,
atk-s0513a4:1522_4: Tato paṭipāṭiyā kaṭippamāṇā purisappamāṇā tālappamāṇā sattatālappamāṇā sāgaraūmi dīpakampi vuyhamānā āgañchi.
atk-s0513a4:1522_5: Paṇḍito upāyakusalatāya rase alaggo sotthinā gato,
atk-s0513a4:1522_6: bālavaḍḍhakī rasagiddhena anāgatabhayaṃ anolokento pañcahi kulasatehi saddhiṃ vināsaṃ patto.
atk-s0513a4:1523_0: Ito parā sānusāsanī tamatthaṃ dīpayamānā tisso abhisambuddhagāthā honti –
atk-s0513a4:1525_0: “Yathāpi te sāgaravārimajjhe, sakammunā sotthi vahiṃsu vāṇijā;
atk-s0513a4:1526_0: Anāgatatthaṃ paṭivijjhiyāna, appampi nācceti sa bhūripañño.
atk-s0513a4:1529_0: Paccuppanne sīdanti atthajāte, samuddamajjhe yathā te manussā.
atk-s0513a4:1531_0: “Anāgataṃ paṭikayirātha kiccaṃ, ‘mā maṃ kiccaṃ kiccakāle byadhesi’;
atk-s0513a4:1532_0: Taṃ tādisaṃ paṭikatakiccakāriṃ, na taṃ kiccaṃ kiccakāle byadhetī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1533_0: Tattha sakammunāti anāgatabhayaṃ disvā puretaraṃ katena attano kammena.
atk-s0513a4:1533_5: paṭhamataraṃ kattabbaṃ anāgataṃ atthaṃ paṭivijjhitvā idhaloke bhūripañño kulaputto appamattakampi attano atthaṃ na acceti nātivattati,
atk-s0513a4:1533_9: Paccuppanneti yadā taṃ anāgataṃ atthajātaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0513a4:1533_11: atthe jāte attano patiṭṭhaṃ na labhanti,
atk-s0513a4:1533_12: samudde te bālavaḍḍhakī manussā viya vināsaṃ pāpuṇanti.
atk-s0513a4:1534_1: paṇḍitapuriso anāgataṃ paṭhamataraṃ kattabbakiccaṃ samparāyikaṃ vā diṭṭhadhammikaṃ vā paṭikayirātha,
atk-s0513a4:1534_5: pure kattabbañhi pure akayiramānaṃ pacchā paccuppannabhāvappattaṃ attano kiccakāle kāyacittābādhena byadheti,
atk-s0513a4:1534_6: taṃ maṃ mā byadhesīti paṭhamameva naṃ paṇḍito kareyya.
atk-s0513a4:1534_9: Taṃ kiccaṃ kiccakāleti anāgataṃ kiccaṃ kayiramānaṃ pacchā paccuppannabhāvappattaṃ attano kiccakāle kāyacittābādhakāle
atk-s0513a4:1534_10: tādisaṃ purimaṃ na byadheti na bādhati. Kasmā?
atk-s0513a4:1535_2: pubbepi devadatto paccuppannasukhe laggo anāgatabhayaṃ anoloketvā sapariso vināsaṃ patto”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a4:1539_0: Kāmaṃ kāmayamānassāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:1539_1: Eko kira sāvatthivāsī brāhmaṇo aciravatītīre khettakaraṇatthāya araññaṃ koṭesi.
atk-s0513a4:1539_2: Satthā tassa upanissayaṃ disvā sāvatthiṃ piṇḍāya pavisanto maggā okkamma tena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā
atk-s0513a4:1539_6: Eteneva upāyena chinnarukkhe hāretvā khettassa sodhanakāle kasanakāle kedārabandhanakāle vapanakāleti
atk-s0513a4:1539_11: ahaṃ imasmiṃ sasse nipphanne buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ dassāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:1539_14: Satthāpi tattha gantvā “kiṃ karosi brāhmaṇā”ti pucchitvā “sassaṃ olokemi bho gotamā”ti vutte “sādhu brāhmaṇā”ti vatvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a4:1539_15: Tadā brāhmaṇo cintesi “samaṇo gotamo abhiṇhaṃ āgacchati,
atk-s0513a4:1539_18: Tassevaṃ cintetvā gehaṃ gatadivase satthāpi tattha agamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:1539_20: Aparabhāge pariṇate sasse “sve khettaṃ lāyissāmī”ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā nipanne brāhmaṇe aciravatiyā upari sabbarattiṃ karakavassaṃ vassi.
atk-s0513a4:1539_21: Mahogho āgantvā ekanāḷimattampi anavasesaṃ katvā sabbaṃ sassaṃ samuddaṃ pavesesi.
atk-s0513a4:1539_22: Brāhmaṇo oghamhi patite sassavināsaṃ oloketvā sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ nāhosi,
atk-s0513a4:1539_23: balavasokābhibhūto hatthena uraṃ paharitvā paridevamāno rodanto nipajji.
atk-s0513a4:1540_0: Satthā paccūsasamaye sokābhibhūtaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ disvā “brāhmaṇassāvassayo bhavissāmī”ti punadivase sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1540_1: piṇḍāya caritvā piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto bhikkhū vihāraṃ pesetvā pacchāsamaṇena saddhiṃ tassa gehadvāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:1540_2: Brāhmaṇo satthu āgatabhāvaṃ sutvā “paṭisanthāratthāya me sahāyo āgato bhavissatī”ti paṭiladdhassāso āsanaṃ paññapesi.
atk-s0513a4:1540_7: aciravatītīre mayā rukkhacchedanato paṭṭhāya kataṃ kammaṃ tumhe jānātha,
atk-s0513a4:1540_8: ahaṃ “imasmiṃ sasse nipphanne tumhākaṃ dānaṃ dassāmī”ti vicarāmi,
atk-s0513a4:1540_9: idāni me sabbaṃ taṃ sassaṃ mahogho samuddameva pavesesi,
atk-s0513a4:1540_17: imesaṃ sattānaṃ dhanadhaññaṃ nāma uppajjanakāle uppajjati,
atk-s0513a4:1540_21: Iti naṃ satthā samassāsetvā tassa sappāyadhammaṃ desento kāmasuttaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:1540_23: Satthā taṃ nissokaṃ katvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:1540_24: “Satthā asukaṃ nāma brāhmaṇaṃ sokasallasamappitaṃ nissokaṃ katvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpesī”ti sakalanagaraṃ aññāsi.
atk-s0513a4:1540_26: dasabalo brāhmaṇena saddhiṃ mittaṃ katvā vissāsiko hutvā upāyeneva tassa sokasallasamappitassa dhammaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1540_27: desetvā taṃ nissokaṃ katvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpesī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1540_30: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a4:1540_32: pubbepāhaṃ etaṃ nissokamakāsi”nti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:1541_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadattassa rañño dve puttā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1541_3: Aparabhāge brahmadatte kālakate amaccā jeṭṭhakassa abhisekaṃ paṭṭhapesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1541_5: kaniṭṭhassa me dethā”ti vatvā punappunaṃ yāciyamānopi paṭikkhipitvā kaniṭṭhassa abhiseke kate “na me issariyenattho”ti uparajjādīnipi na icchi.
atk-s0513a4:1541_6: “Tena hi sādūni bhojanāni bhuñjanto idheva vasāhī”ti vuttepi “na me imasmiṃ nagare kiccaṃ atthī”ti bārāṇasito
atk-s0513a4:1541_7: nikkhamitvā paccantaṃ gantvā ekaṃ seṭṭhikulaṃ nissāya sahatthena kammaṃ karonto vasi.
atk-s0513a4:1541_8: Te aparabhāge tassa rājakumārabhāvaṃ ñatvā kammaṃ kātuṃ nādaṃsu,
atk-s0513a4:1541_10: Aparabhāge rājakammikā khettappamāṇaggahaṇatthāya taṃ gāmaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1541_13: kaniṭṭhabhātikassa paṇṇaṃ pesetvā amhākaṃ baliṃ hārethā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:1541_14: So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā “ahaṃ asukaseṭṭhikulaṃ nāma upanissāya vasāmi,
atk-s0513a4:1541_15: maṃ nissāya etesaṃ baliṃ vissajjehī”ti paṇṇaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0513a4:1542_0: Atha naṃ sakalagāmavāsinopi janapadavāsinopi upasaṅkamitvā “mayaṃ tumhākaññeva baliṃ dassāma,
atk-s0513a4:1542_2: So tesampi atthāya paṇṇaṃ pesetvā vissajjāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:1542_3: Tato paṭṭhāya te tasseva baliṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:1542_9: So taṇhāya vaḍḍhamānāya upaḍḍharajjenapi asantuṭṭho “rajjaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti janapadaparivuto taṃ nagaraṃ
atk-s0513a4:1542_10: gantvā bahinagare ṭhatvā “rajjaṃ vā me detu yuddhaṃ vā”ti kaniṭṭhassa paṇṇaṃ pahiṇi.
atk-s0513a4:1542_11: Kaniṭṭho cintesi “ayaṃ bālo pubbe rajjampi uparajjādīnipi paṭikkhipitvā idāni ‘yuddhena gaṇhāmī’ti vadati,
atk-s0513a4:1542_12: sace kho panāhaṃ imaṃ yuddhena māressāmi,
atk-s0513a4:1542_17: So rajjaṃ gaṇhitvā kaniṭṭhassa uparajjaṃ datvā tato paṭṭhāya rajjaṃ kārento taṇhāvasiko hutvā ekena rajjena
atk-s0513a4:1542_18: asantuṭṭho dve tīṇi rajjāni patthetvā taṇhāya koṭiṃ nāddasa.
atk-s0513a4:1543_0: Tadā sakko devarājā “ke nu kho loke mātāpitaro upaṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0513a4:1543_2: ke taṇhāvasikā”ti olokento tassa taṇhāvasikabhāvaṃ ñatvā “ayaṃ bālo bārāṇasirajjenapi na tussati,
atk-s0513a4:1543_3: ahaṃ sikkhāpessāmi na”nti māṇavakavesena rājadvāre ṭhatvā “eko upāyakusalo māṇavo dvāre ṭhito”ti ārocāpetvā
atk-s0513a4:1543_4: “pavisatū”ti vutte pavisitvā rājānaṃ jayāpetvā “kiṃkāraṇā āgatosī”ti vutte “mahārāja tumhākaṃ kiñci vattabbaṃ atthi,
atk-s0513a4:1543_8: phītāni ākiṇṇamanussāni sampannabalavāhanāni tīṇi nagarāni passāmi,
atk-s0513a4:1543_9: ahaṃ te attano ānubhāvena tesu rajjaṃ gahetvā dassāmi,
atk-s0513a4:1543_10: papañcaṃ akatvā sīghaṃ gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:1543_11: So taṇhāvasiko rājā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā sakkānubhāvena “ko vā tvaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:1543_13: kiṃ vā te laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti na pucchi.
atk-s0513a4:1544_0: Rājā amacce pakkosāpetvā “eko māṇavo ‘amhākaṃ tīṇi rajjāni gahetvā dassāmī’ti āha,
atk-s0513a4:1544_3: papañcaṃ akatvā tīṇi rajjāni gaṇhissāmī”ti vatvā “kiṃ pana te, mahārāja,
atk-s0513a4:1544_5: nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ vā pucchita”nti vutte “neva sakkāraṃ akāsiṃ,
atk-s0513a4:1544_10: Taṃ sutvā rājā domanassajāto “tīsu nagaresu rajjaṃ naṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:1544_13: na ca pucchi nivāsaṭṭhāna’nti mayhaṃ kujjhitvā māṇavo anāgato bhavissatī”ti punappunaṃ cintesi.
atk-s0513a4:1544_15: sarīre pariḍayhante udaraṃ khobhetvā lohitapakkhandikā udapādi.
atk-s0513a4:1545_0: Tadā bodhisatto takkasilato sabbasippāni uggaṇhitvā bārāṇasinagare mātāpitūnaṃ santikaṃ āgato taṃ rañño
atk-s0513a4:1545_1: pavattiṃ sutvā “ahaṃ tikicchissāmī”ti rājadvāraṃ gantvā “eko kira taruṇamāṇavo tumhe tikicchituṃ āgato”ti
atk-s0513a4:1545_3: Rājā “mahantamahantā disāpāmokkhavejjāpi maṃ tikicchituṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0513a4:1545_6: Taṃ sutvā māṇavo “mayhaṃ vejjakammena vetanaṃ natthi,
atk-s0513a4:1545_12: apica kho pana me rogassa samuṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhāhī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:1545_15: vejjā nāma “ayaṃ byādhi imaṃ nissāya samuṭṭhito”ti ñatvā anucchavikaṃ bhesajjaṃ karontīti.
atk-s0513a4:1545_16: Rājā “sādhu tātā”ti samuṭṭhānaṃ kathento “ekena māṇavena āgantvā tīsu nagaresu rajjaṃ gahetvā dassāmī”tiādiṃ katvā sabbaṃ kathetvā “iti me tāta,
atk-s0513a4:1545_24: sabbameva hi saviññāṇakāviññāṇakavatthuṃ attano kāyaṃ ādiṃ katvā pahāya gamanīyaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:1545_25: catūsu nagaresu rajjaṃ gahetvāpi tvaṃ ekappahāreneva na catasso bhattapātiyo bhuñjissasi,
atk-s0513a4:1545_29: ayañhi taṇhā nāma vaḍḍhamānā catūhi apāyehi muccituṃ na detīti.
atk-s0513a4:1546_0: Iti naṃ mahāsatto ovaditvā athassa dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:1549_0: Addhā pītimano hoti, laddhā macco yadicchati.
atk-s0513a4:1552_0: Tato naṃ aparaṃ kāme, ghamme taṇhaṃva vindati.
atk-s0513a4:1556_0: Bhiyyo taṇhā pipāsā ca, vaḍḍhamānassa vaḍḍhati.
atk-s0513a4:1559_0: Datvā ca nālamekassa, iti vidvā samaṃ care.
atk-s0513a4:1562_0: Oraṃ samuddassa atittarūpo, pāraṃ samuddassapi patthayetha.
atk-s0513a4:1565_0: Tato nivattā paṭikkamma disvā, te ve sutittā ye paññāya tittā.
atk-s0513a4:1567_0: “Paññāya tittinaṃ seṭṭhaṃ, na so kāmehi tappati;
atk-s0513a4:1568_0: Paññāya tittaṃ purisaṃ, taṇhā na kurute vasaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1571_0: Samuddamatto puriso, na so kāmehi tappati.
atk-s0513a4:1574_0: Yaṃ yaṃ cajati kāmānaṃ, taṃ taṃ sampajjate sukhaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:1576_2: Tassa ce taṃ samijjhatīti tassa puggalassa taṃ kāmitavatthu samijjhati ce,
atk-s0513a4:1576_4: Tato naṃ aparaṃ kāmeti ettha nanti nipātamattaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1576_8: sace kāmaṃ kāmayamānassa taṃ kāmitavatthu samijjhati,
atk-s0513a4:1576_9: tasmiṃ samiddhe tato paraṃ so puggalo kāmayamāno yathā nāma ghamme gimhakāle vātātapena kilanto taṇhaṃ vindati,
atk-s0513a4:1576_11: evaṃ bhiyyo kāmataṇhāsaṅkhāte kāme vindati paṭilabhati,
atk-s0513a4:1576_18: yathā vacchakassa vaḍḍhantassa sarīreneva saddhiṃ siṅgaṃ vaḍḍhati,
atk-s0513a4:1576_19: evaṃ andhabālassapi appattakāmataṇhā ca pattakāmapipāsā ca aparāparaṃ vaḍḍhatīti.
atk-s0513a4:1577_8: sace so māṇavo aññaṃ vā sakalampi pathaviṃ saviññāṇakāviññāṇakaratanapūraṃ kassaci datvā gaccheyya,
atk-s0513a4:1577_11: Iti vidvā samaṃ careti evaṃ jānanto puriso taṇhāvasiko ahutvā kāyasamācārādīni pūrento careyya.
atk-s0513a4:1578_0: Oranti orimakoṭṭhāsaṃ patvā tena atittarūpo puna samuddapārampi patthayetha.
atk-s0513a4:1578_6: puriso apariyantepi kāme manasā anussaranto tittiṃ na vindati,
atk-s0513a4:1578_9: Tato nivattāti tato pana vatthukāmakilesakāmato cittena nivattitvā kāyena paṭikkamma ñāṇena ādīnavaṃ disvā ye paññāya tittā paripuṇṇā,
atk-s0513a4:1579_0: Paññāya tittinaṃ seṭṭhanti paññāya tittīnaṃ ayaṃ paripuṇṇaseṭṭho,
atk-s0513a4:1579_2: Na so kāmehi tappatīti “na hī”tipi pāṭho.
atk-s0513a4:1579_3: Yasmā paññāya titto puriso kāmehi na pariḍayhatīti attho.
atk-s0513a4:1579_4: Na kurute vasanti tādisañhi purisaṃ taṇhā vase vattetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0513a4:1579_5: sveva pana taṇhāya ādīnavaṃ disvā sarabhaṅgamāṇavo viya ca aḍḍhamāsakarājā viya ca taṇhāvase na pavattatīti attho.
atk-s0513a4:1579_8: So mahantena aggināpi samuddo viya kilesakāmehi na tappati na ḍayhati.
atk-s0513a4:1580_3: yathā cammakāro upāhanaṃ parikantanto yaṃ yaṃ cammassa agayhūpagaṭṭhānaṃ hoti,
atk-s0513a4:1580_4: taṃ taṃ cajitvā upāhanaṃ katvā upāhanamūlaṃ labhitvā sukhito hoti,
atk-s0513a4:1580_5: evameva paṇḍito cammakārasatthasadisāya paññāya kantanto yaṃ yaṃ odhiṃ kāmānaṃ cajati,
atk-s0513a4:1580_6: tena tenassa kāmodhinā rahitaṃ taṃ taṃ kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ manokammañca sukhaṃ sampajjati vigatadarathaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:1580_7: sace pana sabbampi kāyakammādisukhaṃ vigatapariḷāhameva iccheyya,
atk-s0513a4:1580_8: kasiṇaṃ bhāvetvā jhānaṃ nibbattetvā sabbe kāme pariccajeti.
atk-s0513a4:1581_0: Bodhisattassa pana imaṃ gāthaṃ kathentassa rañño setacchattaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā odātakasiṇajjhānaṃ udapādi,
atk-s0513a4:1581_2: So tuṭṭho sayanā vuṭṭhahitvā “ettakā vejjā maṃ tikicchituṃ nāsakkhiṃsu,
atk-s0513a4:1581_3: paṇḍitamāṇavo pana attano ñāṇosadhena maṃ nirogaṃ akāsī”ti tena saddhiṃ sallapanto dasamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:1583_0: “Aṭṭha te bhāsitā gāthā, sabbā honti sahassiyā;
atk-s0513a4:1585_0: Tattha aṭṭhāti dutiyagāthaṃ ādiṃ katvā kāmādīnavasaṃyuttā aṭṭha.
atk-s0513a4:1585_3: Sādhetaṃ tava bhāsitanti sādhu etaṃ tava vacanaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:1588_0: “Na me attho sahassehi, satehi nahutehi vā;
atk-s0513a4:1589_0: Pacchimaṃ bhāsato gāthaṃ, kāme me na rato mano”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1590_1: Kāme me na rato manoti imaṃ gāthaṃ bhāsamānasseva mama vatthukāmepi kilesakāmepi mano nābhiramāmi.
atk-s0513a4:1590_2: Ahañhi imaṃ gāthaṃ bhāsamāno attanova dhammadesanāya jhānaṃ nibbattesiṃ,
atk-s0513a4:1591_0: Rājā bhiyyosomattāya tussitvā mahāsattaṃ vaṇṇento osānagāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:1594_0: Yo imaṃ taṇhaṃ dukkhajananiṃ, parijānāti paṇḍito”ti.
atk-s0513a4:1596_1: appamatto hutvā dhammaṃ carā”ti rājānaṃ ovaditvā ākāsena himavantaṃ gantvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā yāvatāyukaṃ
atk-s0513a4:1596_2: ṭhatvā brahmavihāre bhāvetvā aparihīnajjhāno hutvā brahmalokūpago ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:1597_2: pubbepāhaṃ etaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ nissokamakāsi”nti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a4:1601_0: Dasa khalūti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kosalarañño ovādatthāya kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:1601_1: Ekasmiñhi kāle rājā issariyamadamatto kilesasukhanissito vinicchayampi na paṭṭhapesi,
atk-s0513a4:1601_3: So ekadivase dasabalaṃ anussaritvā “satthāraṃ vandissāmī”ti bhuttapātarāso rathavaramāruyha vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:1601_4: Atha naṃ satthā “kiṃ mahārāja ciraṃ na paññāyasī”ti vatvā “bahukiccatāya no bhante buddhupaṭṭhānassa okāso na jāto”ti vutte “mahārāja,
atk-s0513a4:1601_5: mādise nāma ovādadāyake sabbaññubuddhe dhuravihāre viharante ayuttaṃ tava pamajjituṃ,
atk-s0513a4:1601_7: raṭṭhavāsīnaṃ mātāpitusamena agatigamanaṃ pahāya dasa rājadhamme akopentena rajjaṃ kāretuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0513a4:1601_8: rañño hi dhammikabhāve sati parisāpissa dhammikā honti,
atk-s0513a4:1601_10: yaṃ mayi anusāsante tvaṃ dhammena rajjaṃ kāreyyāsi,
atk-s0513a4:1601_11: porāṇakapaṇḍitā anusāsakaācariye avijjamānepi attano matiyāva tividhasucaritadhamme patiṭṭhāya mahājanassa
atk-s0513a4:1601_12: dhammaṃ desetvā saggapathaṃ pūrayamānā agamaṃsū”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:1602_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto tassa aggamahesiyā kucchimhi nibbatti,
