atk-s0513a4:2410_0: Tattha advejjhaṃ katvānāti jiyāya ca sarena ca saddhiṃ ekameva katvā.
atk-s0513a4:2411_0: Rājā tassa madhurakathāya bandhitvā dhanuṃ otāretvā gāravena aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:2411_1: Mahāsattopi rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā madhurapaṭisanthāraṃ katvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:2411_2: Mahājanopi sabbāvudhāni chaḍḍetvā āgantvā rājānaṃ parivāresi.
atk-s0513a4:2411_3: Tasmiṃ khaṇe mahāsatto suvaṇṇakiṅkiṇikaṃ cālento viya madhurena sarena rājānaṃ pucchi “ko nu te idamakkhāsi,
atk-s0513a4:2411_5: Tasmiṃ khaṇe pāpapuriso thokaṃ paṭikkamitvā sotapatheva aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:2411_6: Rājā “iminā me dassito”ti kathento chaṭṭhaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2414_0: Soyaṃ me idamakkhāsi, ettheso tiṭṭhate migo”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2416_0: Taṃ sutvā mahāsatto taṃ mittadubbhiṃ garahitvā raññā saddhiṃ sallapanto sattamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2419_0: Kaṭṭhaṃ niplavitaṃ seyyo, na tvevekacciyo naro”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2420_1: Ekacciyoti ekacco pana mittadubbhī pāpapuggalo udake patantopi uttārito na tveva seyyo.
atk-s0513a4:2420_4: tasmā tato kaṭṭhameva varataranti porāṇakapaṇḍitā kathayiṃsu,
atk-s0513a4:2420_5: mayā pana tesaṃ vacanaṃ na katanti.
atk-s0513a4:2423_0: “Kiṃ nu ruru garahasi migānaṃ, kiṃ pakkhīnaṃ kiṃ pana mānusānaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:2424_0: Bhayaṃ hi maṃ vindatinapparūpaṃ, sutvāna taṃ mānusiṃ bhāsamāna”nti.
atk-s0513a4:2425_3: Bhayañhi maṃ vindatīti bhayaṃ maṃ paṭilabhati,
atk-s0513a4:2425_4: ahaṃ attani anissaro bhayasantako viya homi.
atk-s0513a4:2426_2: manussaṃ pana garahāmī”ti dassento navamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2429_0: Tatonidānaṃ bhayamāgataṃ mama, dukkho have rāja asabbhi saṅgamo”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2430_0: Tattha vāhaneti patitapatite vahituṃ samatthe gaṅgāvahe.
atk-s0513a4:2430_5: eso mayā gaṅgāya vuyhamāno aḍḍharattasamaye kāruññaravaṃ viravanto uddharito,
atk-s0513a4:2431_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā tassa kujjhitvā “evaṃ bahūpakārassa nāma guṇaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0513a4:2431_1: vijjhitvā naṃ jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpessāmī”ti dasamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2434_0: Hanāmi taṃ mittadubbhiṃ akiccakāriṃ, yo tādisaṃ kammakataṃ na jāne”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2436_0: Tato mahāsatto “mā esa maṃ nissāya nassatū”ti cintetvā ekādasamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2438_0: “Dhīrassa bālassa have janinda, santo vadhaṃ nappasaṃsanti jātu;
atk-s0513a4:2439_0: Kāmaṃ gharaṃ gacchatu pāpadhammo, yañcassa bhaṭṭhaṃ tadetassa dehi;
atk-s0513a4:2441_0: Tattha kāmanti kāmena yathāruciyā attano gharaṃ gacchatu.
atk-s0513a4:2441_1: Yañcassa bhaṭṭhaṃ tadetassa dehīti yañca tassa “idaṃ nāma te dassāmī”ti tayā kathitaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:2442_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā tuṭṭhamānaso mahāsattassa thutiṃ karonto anantaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2444_0: “Addhā rurū aññataro sataṃ so, yo dubbhato mānusassa na dubbhi;
atk-s0513a4:2445_0: Kāmaṃ gharaṃ gacchatu pāpadhammo, yañcassa bhaṭṭhaṃ tadetassa dammi;
atk-s0513a4:2447_0: Tattha sataṃ soti addhā tvaṃ sataṃ paṇḍitānaṃ aññataro.
atk-s0513a4:2447_1: Kāmacāranti ahaṃ tava dhammakathāya pasīditvā tuyhaṃ kāmacāraṃ abhayaṃ dadāmi,
atk-s0513a4:2447_2: ito paṭṭhāya tumhe nibbhayā yathāruciyā viharathāti mahāsattassa varaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a4:2448_2: aññaṃ kāyena karontī”ti pariggaṇhanto dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:2453_0: “Api ce maññatī poso, ñāti mitto sakhāti vā;
atk-s0513a4:2454_0: Yo pubbe sumano hutvā, pacchā sampajjate diso”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2455_2: ahañhi rajjaṃ jahantopi na tuyhaṃ dinnavaraṃ jahissaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:2455_5: Mahāsatto tassa santike varaṃ gaṇhanto attānaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbasattānaṃ abhayadānaṃ varaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a4:2455_6: Rājāpi taṃ varaṃ datvā bodhisattaṃ nagaraṃ netvā mahāsattañca nagarañca alaṅkārāpetvā deviyā dhammaṃ desāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:2455_7: Mahāsatto deviṃ ādiṃ katvā rañño ca rājaparisāya ca madhurāya manussabhāsāya dhammaṃ desetvā rājānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2455_8: dasahi rājadhammehi ovaditvā mahājanaṃ anusāsitvā araññaṃ pavisitvā migagaṇaparivuto vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0513a4:2455_9: Rājā “sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ abhayaṃ dammī”ti nagare bheriṃ carāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:2455_10: Tato paṭṭhāya migapakkhīnaṃ koci hatthaṃ pasāretuṃ samattho nāma nāhosi.
atk-s0513a4:2458_0: Migā sassāni khādanti, taṃ devo paṭisedhatū”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2459_0: Tattha taṃ devoti taṃ migagaṇaṃ devo paṭisedhatūti.
atk-s0513a4:2463_0: Na tvevāhaṃ ruruṃ dubbhe, datvā abhayadakkhiṇaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:2466_0: Na tvevāhaṃ migarājassa, varaṃ datvā musā bhaṇe”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2467_0: Tattha māsīti kāmaṃ mayhaṃ janapado mā hotu.
atk-s0513a4:2467_1: Rurunti na tveva ahaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇassa rurumigarājassa abhayadakkhiṇaṃ datvā dubbhissāmīti.
atk-s0513a4:2468_0: Mahājano rañño vacanaṃ sutvā kiñci vattuṃ avisahanto paṭikkami.
atk-s0513a4:2468_2: Taṃ sutvā mahāsatto migagaṇaṃ sannipātāpetvā “ito paṭṭhāya manussānaṃ sassāni mā khādathā”ti ovaditvā
atk-s0513a4:2468_5: tāya saññāya migā yāvajjatanā sassāni na khādanti.
atk-s0513a4:2469_2: pubbepi devadatto akataññūyevā”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā seṭṭhiputto devadatto ahosi,
atk-s0513a4:2473_0: Āsīsetheva purisoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto attanā saṃkhittena pucchitapañhassa dhammasenāpatino vitthārena byākaraṇaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:2473_1: Kadā pana satthā theraṃ saṃkhittena pañhaṃ pucchīti?
atk-s0513a4:2473_4: Rājagahaseṭṭhino hi santake candanapatte āyasmatā piṇḍolabhāradvājena iddhiyā gahite satthā bhikkhūnaṃ iddhipāṭihāriyakaraṇaṃ paṭikkhipi.
atk-s0513a4:2473_6: idāni sayampi na karissatī”ti cintetvā maṅkubhūtehi attano sāvakehi “kiṃ, bhante,
atk-s0513a4:2473_7: iddhiyā pattaṃ na gaṇhathā”ti vuccamānā “netaṃ āvuso,
atk-s0513a4:2473_9: chavassa pana dārupattassatthāya attano saṇhasukhumaguṇaṃ ko gihīnaṃ pakāsessatīti na gaṇhimha,
atk-s0513a4:2473_10: samaṇā pana sakyaputtiyā lolatāya iddhiṃ dassetvā gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:2473_13: ākaṅkhamānā pana samaṇena gotamena saddhiṃ iddhiṃ dassessāma,
atk-s0513a4:2473_14: sace hi samaṇo gotamo ekaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ karissati,
atk-s0513a4:2474_4: Taṃ sutvā bimbisāro āgantvā bhagavantaṃ pucchi “bhante,
atk-s0513a4:2474_12: tava uyyāne pupphaphalaṃ aññesaṃ vāritaṃ, na tava,
atk-s0513a4:2474_22: “Sāvatthinagaradvāre kaṇḍambarukkhamūle titthiyamaddanaṃ yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ kātu”nti tesaṃ bhikkhū kathayanti.
atk-s0513a4:2474_24: passissāma na”nti gharadvārāni chaḍḍetvā satthārā saddhiṃyeva agamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:2475_0: Aññatitthiyā “mayampi samaṇassa gotamassa pāṭihāriyakaraṇaṭṭhāne pāṭihāriyaṃ karissāmā”ti upaṭṭhākehi saddhiṃ satthārameva anubandhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:2475_1: Satthā anupubbena sāvatthiṃ gantvā raññā “pāṭihāriyaṃ kira, bhante,
atk-s0513a4:2475_3: bhante”ti vutte “ito sattame divase āsāḷhipuṇṇamāsiya”nti āha.
atk-s0513a4:2475_6: mama pāṭihāriyakaraṇaṭṭhāne sakko devarājā dvādasayojanikaṃ ratanamaṇḍapaṃ karissatī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2475_10: Rājā dhammaghosakaṃ alaṅkatahatthipiṭṭhiṃ āropetvā “bhagavā kira sāvatthinagaradvāre kaṇḍambarukkhamūle
atk-s0513a4:2475_11: titthiyamaddanaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ karissati ito sattame divase”ti yāva chaṭṭhadivasā devasikaṃ ghosanaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a4:2475_12: Titthiyā “kaṇḍambarukkhamūle kira karissatī”ti sāmikānaṃ dhanaṃ datvā sāvatthisāmante ambarukkhe chindāpayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:2475_15: Devatānubhāvena sakalajambudīpe dvāre ṭhatvā ugghositaṃ viya ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:2475_17: te te sāvatthiṃ pattameva attānaṃ passiṃsu,
atk-s0513a4:2476_0: Satthā pātova sāvatthiṃ piṇḍāya pavisituṃ nikkhami.
atk-s0513a4:2476_1: Kaṇḍo nāma uyyānapālo piṇḍipakkameva kumbhapamāṇaṃ mahantaṃ ambapakkaṃ rañño haranto satthāraṃ nagaradvāre
atk-s0513a4:2476_3: Satthā paṭiggahetvā tattheva ekamantaṃ nisinno paribhuñjitvā “ānanda,
atk-s0513a4:2476_4: imaṃ ambaṭṭhiṃ uyyānapālakassa imasmiṃ ṭhāne ropanatthāya dehi,
atk-s0513a4:2476_10: mahājanassa olokentasseva paṇṇāsahatthakkhandho paṇṇāsahatthasākho ubbedhato ca hatthasatiko ambarukkho sampajji,
atk-s0513a4:2476_11: tāvadevassa pupphāni ca phalāni ca uṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:2476_12: So madhukaraparivuto suvaṇṇavaṇṇaphalabharito nabhaṃ pūretvā aṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0513a4:2477_0: Sāyanhasamaye sakko devarājā āvajjento “satthu ratanamaṇḍapakaraṇaṃ amhākaṃ bhāro”ti ñatvā vissakammadevaputtaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2477_3: Satthā titthiyamaddanaṃ asādhāraṇaṃ sāvakehi yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ katvā bahujanassa pasannabhāvaṃ ñatvā oruyha buddhāsane nisinno dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0513a4:2477_5: Tato “purimabuddhā pana pāṭihāriyaṃ katvā kattha gacchantī”ti āvajjento “tāvatiṃsabhavana”nti ñatvā buddhāsanā
atk-s0513a4:2477_6: uṭṭhāya dakkhiṇapādaṃ yugandharamuddhani ṭhapetvā vāmapādena sinerumatthakaṃ akkamitvā pāricchattakamūle
atk-s0513a4:2477_7: paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ vassaṃ upagantvā antotemāsaṃ devānaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:2477_8: Parisā satthu gataṭṭhānaṃ ajānantī “disvāva gamissāmā”ti tattheva temāsaṃ vasi.
atk-s0513a4:2477_9: Upakaṭṭhāya pavāraṇāya mahāmoggallānatthero gantvā bhagavato ārocesi.
atk-s0513a4:2477_10: Atha naṃ satthā pucchi “kahaṃ pana etarahi sāriputto”ti? “Eso, bhante,
atk-s0513a4:2477_11: pāṭihāriye pasīditvā pabbajitehi pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ saṅkassanagaradvāre vasī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2477_13: ahaṃ ito sattame divase saṅkassanagaradvāre otarissāmi,
atk-s0513a4:2477_15: Thero “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā āgantvā parisāya ārocetvā sakalaparisaṃ sāvatthito tiṃsayojanaṃ saṅkassanagaraṃ ekamuhutteneva pāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:2478_2: Sakko vissakammaṃ āmantetvā “dasabalassa manussalokagamanatthāya tīṇi sopānāni karohī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:2478_3: So sinerumatthake sopānasīsaṃ saṅkassanagaradvāre dhurasopānaṃ katvā majjhe maṇimayaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:2478_5: ekasmiṃ passe suvaṇṇamayanti tīṇi sopānāni māpesi,
atk-s0513a4:2478_7: Satthā lokavivaraṇaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ katvā majjhe maṇimayena sopānena otari.
atk-s0513a4:2478_12: Satthāraṃ dhurasopāne patiṭṭhitaṃ paṭhamameva sāriputtatthero vandi,
atk-s0513a4:2478_17: ṭhapetvā maṃ añño etena sadiso samapañño nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a4:2478_18: paññāguṇamassa pākaṭaṃ karissāmī”ti paṭhamaṃ tāva puthujjanānaṃ visaye pañhaṃ pucchi,
atk-s0513a4:2478_19: taṃ puthujjanāva kathayiṃsu tato sotāpannānaṃ visaye pañhaṃ pucchi,
atk-s0513a4:2478_22: Evaṃ sakadāgāmivisaye anāgāmivisaye khīṇāsavavisaye mahāsāvakavisaye ca pañhaṃ pucchi,
atk-s0513a4:2479_0: Manussā “ko nāma esa thero satthārā saddhiṃ kathesī”ti pucchitvā “dhammasenāpati sāriputtatthero nāmā”ti sutvā “aho mahāpañño”ti vadiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:2479_1: Tato paṭṭhāya devamanussānaṃ antare therassa mahāpaññaguṇo pākaṭo jāto.
atk-s0513a4:2480_0: “Ye ca saṅkhātadhammāse, ye ca sekhā puthū idha;
atk-s0513a4:2481_0: Tesaṃ me nipako iriyaṃ, puṭṭho pabrūhi mārisā”ti. –
atk-s0513a4:2482_0: Buddhavisaye pañhaṃ pucchitvā “imassa nu kho sāriputta,
atk-s0513a4:2482_1: saṃkhittena bhāsitassa kathaṃ vitthārena attho daṭṭhabbo”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:2482_2: Thero pañhaṃ oloketvā “satthā maṃ sekhāsekhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ āgamanapaṭipadaṃ pucchatī”ti pañhe nikkaṅkho
atk-s0513a4:2482_3: hutvā “āgamanapaṭipadā nāma khandhādivasena bahūhi mukhehi sakkā kathetuṃ,
atk-s0513a4:2482_4: kataṃ nu kho kathento satthu ajjhāsayaṃ gaṇhituṃ sakkhissāmī”ti ajjhāsaye kaṅkhi.
atk-s0513a4:2482_7: mayā naye adinne kathetuṃ na sakkhissati,
atk-s0513a4:2482_8: nayamassa dassāmī”ti nayaṃ dadanto “bhūtamidaṃ sāriputta samanupassā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:2482_9: Evaṃ kirassa ahosi “sāriputto mama ajjhāsayaṃ gahetvā kathento khandhavasena kathessatī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2482_10: Therassa saha nayadānena so pañho nayasatena nayasahassena upaṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:2482_11: So satthārā dinnanaye ṭhatvā buddhavisaye pañhaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:2483_2: Satthā parisaṃ uyyojetvā cārikaṃ caranto anupubbena sāvatthiṃ gantvā punadivase sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā
atk-s0513a4:2483_3: piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto bhikkhūhi vatte dassite gandhakuṭiṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a4:2483_4: Sāyanhasamaye bhikkhū therassa guṇakathaṃ kathentā dhammasabhāyaṃ nisīdiṃsu “mahāpañño, āvuso,
atk-s0513a4:2483_5: sāriputto puthupañño javanapañño tikkhapañño nibbedhikapañño dasabalena saṃkhittena pucchitapañhaṃ vitthārena kathesī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2483_8: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a4:2483_10: pubbepi esa saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ kathesiyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:2484_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto sarabhamigayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā araññe vasati.
atk-s0513a4:2484_3: So ekadivasaṃ migavaṃ gantvā amacce āha –
atk-s0513a4:2484_9: ajja pana yena kenaci upāyena rañño ṭhitaṭṭhānaññeva āropessāmā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2484_10: Cintetvā ca pana katikaṃ katvā rañño dhuramaggaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:2484_11: Te mahantaṃ gumbaṃ parikkhipitvā muggarādīhi bhūmiṃ pothayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:2484_12: Paṭhamameva sarabhamigo uṭṭhāya tikkhattuṃ gubbhaṃ anuparigantvā palāyanokāsaṃ olokento sesadisāsu manusse
atk-s0513a4:2484_13: bāhāya bāhaṃ dhanunā dhanuṃ āhacca nirantare ṭhite disvā rañño ṭhitaṭṭhāneyeva okāsaṃ addasa.
atk-s0513a4:2484_14: So ummīlitesu akkhīsu vālukaṃ khipamāno viya rājānaṃ abhimukho agamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:2484_15: Rājā taṃ lahusampattaṃ disvā saraṃ ukkhipitvā vijjhi.
atk-s0513a4:2484_16: Sarabhamigā nāma saraṃ vañcetuṃ chekā honti,
atk-s0513a4:2484_17: sare abhimukhaṃ āgacchante vegaṃ hāpetvā tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0513a4:2485_0: Sopi rājā tasmiṃ parivattitvā patite “sarabhamigo me viddho”ti nādaṃ muñci.
atk-s0513a4:2485_2: Balamaṇḍalaṃ bhijjitvā ubhosu passesu ṭhitaamaccā sarabhaṃ palāyamānaṃ disvā ekato hutvā pucchiṃsu “migo kassa ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ abhiruhī”ti?
atk-s0513a4:2485_7: bhūminena viddhā”ti te nānappakārena raññā saddhiṃ keḷiṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:2485_9: na mama pamāṇaṃ jānantī”ti gāḷhaṃ nivāsetvā pattikova khaggaṃ ādāya “sarabhaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti vegena pakkhandi.
atk-s0513a4:2485_10: Atha naṃ disvā tīṇi yojanāni anubandhi.
atk-s0513a4:2485_13: Tattha sarabhamigassa gamanamagge saṭṭhihatthamatto mahāpūtipādanarakāvāṭo atthi,
atk-s0513a4:2485_14: so tiṃsahatthamattaṃ udakena puṇṇo tiṇehi ca paṭicchanno.
atk-s0513a4:2485_15: Sarabho udakagandhaṃ ghāyitvāva āvāṭabhāvaṃ ñatvā thokaṃ osakkitvā gato.
atk-s0513a4:2485_16: Rājā pana ujukameva gacchanto tasmiṃ pati.
atk-s0513a4:2486_0: Sarabho tassa padasaddaṃ asuṇanto nivattitvā taṃ apassanto “narakāvāṭe patito bhavissatī”ti ñatvā āgantvā
atk-s0513a4:2486_1: olokento taṃ gambhīraudake apatiṭṭhaṃ kilamantaṃ disvā tena kataṃ aparādhaṃ hadaye akatvā sañjātakāruñño
atk-s0513a4:2486_3: imamhā dukkhā naṃ mocessāmī”ti āvāṭatīre ṭhito “mā bhāyi, mahārāja,
atk-s0513a4:2486_4: mahantā dukkhā taṃ mocessāmī”ti vatvā attano piyaputtaṃ uddharituṃ ussāhaṃ karonto viya tassuddharaṇatthāya
atk-s0513a4:2486_5: silāya yoggaṃ katvāva “vijjhissāmī”ti āgataṃ rājānaṃ saṭṭhihatthā narakā uddharitvā assāsetvā piṭṭhiṃ
atk-s0513a4:2486_6: āropetvā araññā nīharitvā senāya avidūre otāretvā ovādamassa datvā pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:2486_7: Rājā mahāsattaṃ vinā vasituṃ asakkonto āha “sāmi sarabhamigarāja,
atk-s0513a4:2486_15: mayā dinnāni sīlāni rakkhanto raṭṭhavāsinopi sīlaṃ rakkhāpehī”ti taṃ ovaditvā araññameva pāvisi.
atk-s0513a4:2487_0: So assupuṇṇehi nettehi tassa guṇaṃ sarantova senaṃ pāpuṇitvā senaṅgaparivuto nagaraṃ gantvā “ito paṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a4:2487_1: sakalanagaravāsino pañca sīlāni rakkhantū”ti dhammabheriṃ carāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:2487_2: Mahāsattena pana attano kataguṇaṃ kassaci akathetvā sāyanhe nānaggarasabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā alaṅkatasayane
atk-s0513a4:2487_3: sayitvā paccūsakāle mahāsattassa guṇaṃ saritvā uṭṭhāya sayanapiṭṭhe pallaṅkena nisīditvā pītipuṇṇena
atk-s0513a4:2490_0: Passāmi vohaṃ attānaṃ, yathā icchiṃ tathā ahu.
atk-s0513a4:2496_0: Passāmi vohaṃ attānaṃ, yathā icchiṃ tathā ahu.
atk-s0513a4:2501_0: “Dukkhūpanītopi naro sapañño, āsaṃ na chindeyya sukhāgamāya;
atk-s0513a4:2502_0: Bahū hi phassā ahitā hitā ca, avitakkitā maccumupabbajanti.
atk-s0513a4:2505_0: Na hi cintāmayā bhogā, itthiyā purisassa vā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2506_0: Tattha āsīsetheva purisoti āsacchedakakammaṃ akatvā attano kammesu āsaṃ karotheva na ukkaṇṭheyya.
atk-s0513a4:2506_1: Yathā icchinti ahañhi saṭṭhihatthā narakā uṭṭhānaṃ icchiṃ,
atk-s0513a4:2506_4: Ahitā hitā cāti dukkhaphassā ca sukhaphassā ca,
atk-s0513a4:2506_7: tesaṃ avitakkito acintitopi maraṇaphasso āgacchatīti dasseti.
atk-s0513a4:2506_8: Acinti tampīti mayā “āvāṭe patissāmī”ti na cintitaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:2507_1: Purohito ca pātova sukhaseyyapucchanatthaṃ āgantvā rājadvāre ṭhito tassa udānagītasaddaṃ sutvā cintesi “rājā hiyyo migavaṃ agamāsi,
atk-s0513a4:2507_3: tato amaccehi avahasiyamāno ‘māretvā naṃ āharissāmī’ti khattiyamānena taṃ anubandhanto saṭṭhihatthe narake patito bhavissati,
atk-s0513a4:2507_4: dayālunā sarabharājena rañño dosaṃ acintetvā rājā uddharito bhavissati,
atk-s0513a4:2507_6: Evaṃ brāhmaṇassa rañño paripuṇṇabyañjanaṃ udānaṃ sutvā sumajjite ādāse mukhaṃ olokentassa chāyā viya raññā ca sarabhena ca katakāraṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:2507_11: So pavisitvā rājānaṃ jayāpetvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito “ahaṃ, mahārāja,
atk-s0513a4:2507_13: tvaṃ ekaṃ sarabhamigaṃ anubandhanto narake patito,
atk-s0513a4:2507_14: atha naṃ so sarabho silāya yoggaṃ katvā narakato uddhari,
atk-s0513a4:2507_15: so tvaṃ tassa guṇaṃ anussaritvā udānaṃ udānesī”ti vatvā dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:2512_0: “Yo taṃ viduggā narakā samuddhari, silāya yoggaṃ sarabho karitvā;
atk-s0513a4:2513_0: Dukkhūpanītaṃ maccumukhā pamocayi, alīnacittaṃ ta migaṃ vadesī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2514_5: Ta migaṃ vadesīti taṃ suvaṇṇasarabhamigaṃ idha sirisayane nisinno vaṇṇesi.
atk-s0513a4:2515_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā “ayaṃ mayā saddhiṃ na migavaṃ gato,
atk-s0513a4:2517_0: “Kiṃ tvaṃ nu tattheva tadā ahosi, udāhu te koci naṃ etadakkhā;
atk-s0513a4:2518_0: Vivaṭacchaddo nusi sabbadassī, ñāṇaṃ nu te brāhmaṇa bhiṃsarūpa”nti.
atk-s0513a4:2519_0: Tattha bhiṃsarūpanti kiṃ nu te ñāṇaṃ balavajātikaṃ, tenetaṃ jānāsīti.
atk-s0513a4:2520_1: byañjanaṃ amakkhetvā tayā kathitagāthānaṃ pana mayhaṃ attho upaṭṭhātī”ti dīpento dasamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2522_0: “Na cevahaṃ tattha tadā ahosiṃ, na cāpi me koci naṃ etadakkhā;
atk-s0513a4:2523_0: Gāthāpadānañca subhāsitānaṃ, atthaṃ tadānenti janinda dhīrā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2524_0: Tattha subhāsitānanti byañjanaṃ amakkhetvā suṭṭhu bhāsitānaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:2525_0: Rājā tassa tussitvā bahuṃ dhanaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a4:2525_2: manussāpi puññābhiratā hutvā matamatā saggameva pūrayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:2525_3: Athekadivasaṃ rājā “lakkhaṃ vijjhissāmī”ti purohitamādāya uyyānaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a4:2525_4: Tadā sakko devarājā bahū nave deve ca devakaññāyo ca disvā “kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti āvajjento sarabhamigena
atk-s0513a4:2525_5: narakā uddharitvā rañño sīlesu patiṭṭhāpitabhāvaṃ ñatvā “rañño ānubhāvena mahājano puññāni karoti,
atk-s0513a4:2525_7: idāni kho pana rājā lakkhaṃ vijjhituṃ uyyānaṃ gato,
atk-s0513a4:2525_8: taṃ vīmaṃsitvā sīhanādaṃ nadāpetvā sarabhamigassa guṇaṃ kathāpetvā attano ca sakkabhāvaṃ jānāpetvā ākāse
atk-s0513a4:2525_9: ṭhito dhammaṃ desetvā mettāya ceva pañcannaṃ sīlānañca guṇaṃ kathetvā āgamissāmī”ti cintetvā uyyānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:2525_10: Rājāpi “lakkhaṃ vijjhissāmī”ti dhanuṃ āropetvā saraṃ sannayhi.
atk-s0513a4:2525_11: Tasmiṃ khaṇe sakko rañño ca lakkhassa ca antare attano ānubhāvena sarabhaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0513a4:2525_12: Rājā taṃ disvā saraṃ na muñci.
atk-s0513a4:2525_13: Atha naṃ sakko purohitassa sarīre adhimuccitvā gāthaṃ abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:2527_0: “Ādāya pattiṃ paraviriyaghātiṃ, cāpe saraṃ kiṃ vicikicchase tuvaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:2528_0: Nunno saro sarabhaṃ hantu khippaṃ, annañhi etaṃ varapañña rañño”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2529_2: Cāpe saranti etaṃ pattasahitaṃ saraṃ cāpe ādāya sannayhitvā idāni tvaṃ kiṃ vicikicchasi.
atk-s0513a4:2529_3: Hantūti tayā vissaṭṭho hutvā esa saro khippaṃ imaṃ sarabhaṃ hanatu.
atk-s0513a4:2529_5: sarabho nāma rañño āhāro bhakkhoti attho.
atk-s0513a4:2532_0: “Addhā pajānāmi ahampi etaṃ, annaṃ migo brāhmaṇa khattiyassa;
atk-s0513a4:2533_0: Pubbe katañca apacāyamāno, tasmā migaṃ sarabhaṃ no hanāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2534_1: ahametaṃ ekaṃsena jānāmi yathā migo khattiyassa annaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:2534_2: pubbe pana iminā mayhaṃ kataguṇaṃ pūjemi,
atk-s0513a4:2540_0: “Sace ca rājā vicikicchase tuvaṃ, hantuṃ migaṃ sarabhaṃ sahāyakaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:2541_0: Saputtadāro naravīraseṭṭha, gantā tuvaṃ vetaraṇiṃ yamassā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2542_2: Amarādhipoti tvaṃ etaṃ sakkaṃ māretvā sayaṃ sakko devarājā hohīti vadati.
atk-s0513a4:2542_3: Vetaraṇiṃ yamassāti “sace etaṃ ‘sahāyo me’ti cintetvā na māressasi,
atk-s0513a4:2542_4: saputtadāro yamassa vetaraṇinirayaṃ gato bhavissasī”ti naṃ tāsesi.
atk-s0513a4:2545_0: “Kāmaṃ ahaṃ jānapadā ca sabbe, puttā ca dārā ca sahāyasaṅghā;
atk-s0513a4:2546_0: Gacchemu taṃ vetaraṇiṃ yamassa, na tveva hañño mama pāṇado yo.
atk-s0513a4:2548_0: “Ayaṃ migo kicchagatassa mayhaṃ, ekassa kattā vivanasmi ghore;
atk-s0513a4:2549_0: Taṃ tādisaṃ pubbakiccaṃ saranto, jānaṃ mahābrahme kathaṃ haneyya”nti.
atk-s0513a4:2550_1: yo mama pāṇadado yena me piyaṃ jīvitaṃ dinnaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:2550_2: narakaṃ pavisantena mayā so na tveva hañño na hanitabbo,
atk-s0513a4:2550_4: Ekassa kattā vivanasmi ghoreti dāruṇe araññe paviṭṭhassa sato ekassa asahāyakassa mama kattā kārako jīvitassa dāyako,
atk-s0513a4:2550_5: svāhaṃ taṃ iminā kataṃ tādisaṃ pubbakiccaṃ sarantoyeva taṃ guṇaṃ jānantoyeva kathaṃ haneyyaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:2551_0: Atha sakko purohitassa sarīrato apagantvā sakkattabhāvaṃ māpetvā ākāse ṭhatvā rañño guṇaṃ pakāsento gāthādvayamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2553_0: “Mittābhirādhī cirameva jīva, rajjaṃ imaṃ dhammaguṇe pasāsa;
atk-s0513a4:2554_0: Nārīgaṇehi paricāriyanto, modassu raṭṭhe tidiveva vāsavo.
atk-s0513a4:2557_0: Datvā ca bhutvā ca yathānubhāvaṃ, anindito saggamupehi ṭhāna”nti.
atk-s0513a4:2558_0: Tattha mittābhirādhīti mitte ārādhento tosento tesu adubbhamāno.
atk-s0513a4:2558_1: Sabbātithīti sabbe dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇe atithī pāhunakeyeva katvā pariharanto yācitabbayuttako hutvā.
atk-s0513a4:2558_2: Aninditoti dānādīni puññāni karaṇena pamudito devalokena abhinandito hutvā saggaṭṭhānaṃ upehīti.
atk-s0513a4:2559_0: Evaṃ vatvā sakko “ahaṃ mahārājaṃ taṃ pariggaṇhituṃ āgato,
atk-s0513a4:2559_2: appamatto hohī”ti taṃ ovaditvā sakaṭṭhānameva gato.
atk-s0513a4:2560_2: pubbepi sāriputto saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ jānātiyevā”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a4:2563_0: Amba phandana javana, nārada dūta kaliṅgā;
atk-s0513a4:2564_0: Akitti takkāriyaṃ ruru, sarabhaṃ dasa terase.
atk-s0513a4:2569_0: Sampannaṃ sālikedāranti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto mātuposakabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:2569_2: Satthā pana taṃ bhikkhuṃ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu gihī posesī”ti pucchitvā “saccaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:2569_3: bhante”ti vutte “kiṃ te hontī”ti vatvā “mātāpitaro me,
atk-s0513a4:2569_5: porāṇakapaṇḍitā tiracchānā hutvā suvayoniyaṃ nibbattitvāpi jiṇṇe mātāpitaro kulāvake nipajjāpetvā mukhatuṇḍakena
atk-s0513a4:2569_6: gocaraṃ āharitvā posesu”nti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:2570_0: Atīte rājagahe magadharājā nāma rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a4:2570_1: Tadā nagarato pubbuttaradisāya sāliddiyo nāma brāhmaṇagāmo ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:2570_3: tattha kosiyagotto nāma sāliddiyavāsī brāhmaṇo sahassakarīsamattaṃ khettaṃ gahetvā sāliṃ vapāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:2570_4: Uṭṭhite ca pana sasse vatiṃ thiraṃ kāretvā kassaci paṇṇāsakarīsamattaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:2570_5: kassaci saṭṭhikarīsamattanti evaṃ pañcasatakarīsamattaṃ khettaṃ attano purisānaṃyeva ārakkhaṇatthāya
atk-s0513a4:2570_6: datvā sesaṃ pañcasatakarīsamattaṃ khettaṃ bhatiṃ katvā ekassa bhatakassa adāsi.
atk-s0513a4:2570_7: So tattha kuṭiṃ katvā rattindivaṃ vasati.
atk-s0513a4:2570_8: Khettassa pana pubbuttaradisābhāge ekasmiṃ sānupabbate mahantaṃ simbalivanaṃ atthi,
atk-s0513a4:2570_10: Tadā bodhisatto tasmiṃ suvasaṅghe suvarañño putto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0513a4:2570_11: So vayappatto abhirūpo thāmasampanno sakaṭanābhipamāṇasarīro ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:2570_12: Athassa pitā mahallakakāle “ahaṃ idāni dūraṃ gantuṃ na sakkomi,
atk-s0513a4:2570_13: tvaṃ imaṃ gaṇaṃ pariharā”ti gaṇaṃ niyyādesi.
atk-s0513a4:2570_14: So punadivasato paṭṭhāya mātāpitūnaṃ gocaratthāya gantuṃ nādāsi,
atk-s0513a4:2570_15: suvagaṇaṃ pariharanto himavantaṃ gantvā sayaṃjātasālivane yāvadatthaṃ sāliṃ khāditvā āgamanakāle mātāpitūnaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2571_0: Athassa ekadivasaṃ suvā ārocesuṃ “pubbe imasmiṃ kāle magadhakhette sāli paccati,
atk-s0513a4:2571_3: Te gantvā magadhakhette otarantā tassa bhatiyā rakkhaṇapurisassa khette otaritvā sāliṃ khāditvā ekaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2571_4: sālisīsaṃ ādāya simbalivanaṃ gantvā sālisīsaṃ mahāsattassa pādamūle ṭhapetvā “tattha evarūpo sālī”ti vadiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:2571_5: So punadivase suvagaṇaparivuto tattha gantvā tasmiṃ bhatakassa khette otari.
atk-s0513a4:2571_6: So pana puriso suve sāliṃ khādante disvā ito cito ca dhāvitvā vārentopi vāretuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0513a4:2571_7: Sesā suvā yāvadatthaṃ sāliṃ khāditvā tucchamukhāva gacchanti.
atk-s0513a4:2571_8: Suvarājā pana bahūni sālisīsāni ekato katvā tehi parivuto hutvā āharitvā mātāpitūnaṃ deti.
atk-s0513a4:2571_9: Suvā punadivasato paṭṭhāya tattheva sāliṃ khādiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:2571_10: Atha so puriso “sace ime aññaṃ katipāhaṃ evaṃ khādissanti,
atk-s0513a4:2571_12: brāhmaṇo sāliṃ agghāpetvā mayhaṃ iṇaṃ karissati,
atk-s0513a4:2571_13: gantvā tassa ārocessāmī”ti sālimuṭṭhinā saddhiṃ tathārūpaṃ paṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā sāliddiyagāmaṃ gantvā brāhmaṇaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2571_14: passitvā vanditvā paṇṇākāraṃ datvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito “kiṃ,
atk-s0513a4:2574_0: Paṭivedemi te brahme, na ne vāretumussahe.
atk-s0513a4:2576_0: “Eko ca tattha sakuṇo, yo nesaṃ sabbasundaro;
atk-s0513a4:2578_2: Sabbasundaroti sabbehi koṭṭhāsehi sundaro rattatuṇḍo jiñjukasannibhaakkhi rattapādo tīhi rattarājīhi
atk-s0513a4:2578_3: parikkhittagīvo mahāmayūrapamāṇo so yāvadatthaṃ sāliṃ khāditvā aññaṃ tuṇḍena gahetvā gacchatīti.
atk-s0513a4:2579_0: Brāhmaṇo tassa kathaṃ sutvā suvarāje sinehaṃ uppādetvā khettapālaṃ pucchi “ambho purisa,
atk-s0513a4:2584_0: Taṃ sutvā khettapālo sāliṃ agghāpetvā iṇassa akatabhāvena tuṭṭho gantvā assavāle vaṭṭetvā “ajja imasmiṃ
atk-s0513a4:2584_1: ṭhāne otarissatī”ti suvarañño otaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ sallakkhetvā punadivase pātova cāṭipamāṇaṃ pañjaraṃ katvā
atk-s0513a4:2584_2: pāsañca oḍḍetvā suvānaṃ āgamanaṃ olokento kuṭiyaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:2584_3: Suvarājāpi suvagaṇaparivuto āgantvā aloluppacāratāya hiyyo khāditaṭṭhāne oḍḍitapāse pādaṃ pavesantova otari.
atk-s0513a4:2584_4: So attano baddhabhāvaṃ ñatvā cintesi “sacāhaṃ idāneva baddharavaṃ ravissāmi,
atk-s0513a4:2584_8: So tesaṃ suhitabhāvaṃ ñatvā maraṇabhayatajjito hutvā tikkhattuṃ baddharavaṃ ravi.
atk-s0513a4:2584_10: Suvarājā “ettakesu me ñātakesu nivattitvā olokento ekopi natthi,
atk-s0513a4:2584_11: kiṃ nu kho mayā pāpaṃ kata”nti vilapanto gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2587_0: Eko baddhosmi pāsena, kiṃ pāpaṃ pakataṃ mayā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2588_0: Khettapālo suvarājassa baddharavaṃ suvānañca ākāse pakkhandanasaddaṃ sutvā “kiṃ nu kho”ti kuṭiyā oruyha
atk-s0513a4:2588_1: pāsāṭṭhānaṃ gantvā suvarājānaṃ disvā “yasseva me pāso oḍḍito,
atk-s0513a4:2588_2: sveva baddho”ti tuṭṭhamānaso suvarājānaṃ pāsato mocetvā dve pāde ekato bandhitvā daḷhaṃ ādāya sāliddiyagāmaṃ gantvā suvarājaṃ brāhmaṇassa adāsi.
atk-s0513a4:2588_3: Brāhmaṇo balavasinehena mahāsattaṃ ubhohi hatthehi daḷhaṃ gahetvā aṅke nisīdāpetvā tena saddhiṃ sallapanto dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:2593_0: “Koṭṭhaṃ nu tattha pūresi, suva veraṃ nu te mayā;
atk-s0513a4:2594_0: Puṭṭho me samma akkhāhi, kuhiṃ sāliṃ nidāhasī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2595_0: Tattha udaraṃ nūnāti aññesaṃ udaraṃ udarameva maññe,
atk-s0513a4:2596_0: Taṃ sutvā suvarājā madhurāya manussabhāsāya sattamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2598_0: “Na me veraṃ tayā saddhiṃ, koṭṭho mayhaṃ na vijjati;
atk-s0513a4:2600_0: Nidhimpi tattha nidahāmi, evaṃ jānāhi kosiyā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2601_0: Tattha iṇaṃ muñcāmiṇaṃ dammīti tava sāliṃ haritvā iṇaṃ muñcāmi ceva dammi cāti vadati.
atk-s0513a4:2601_1: Nidhimpīti ekaṃ tattha simbalivane anugāmikanidhimpi nidahāmi.
atk-s0513a4:2606_0: Tattha iṇadānanti iṇassa dānaṃ. Nidhinidhānanti nidhino nidhānaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:2607_0: Evaṃ brāhmaṇena puṭṭho suvarājā tassa byākaronto catasso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:2610_0: Te maṃ bhatā bharissanti, tasmā tesaṃ iṇaṃ dade.
atk-s0513a4:2612_0: “Mātā pitā ca me vuddhā, jiṇṇakā gatayobbanā;
atk-s0513a4:2613_0: Tesaṃ tuṇḍena hātūna, muñce pubbakataṃ iṇaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:2616_0: Tesaṃ puññatthiko dammi, taṃ nidhiṃ āhu paṇḍitā.
atk-s0513a4:2620_1: Taṃ nidhinti taṃ puññakammaṃ paṇḍitā anugāmikanidhiṃ nāma kathenti.
atk-s0513a4:2621_0: Brāhmaṇo mahāsattassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā pasannacitto dve gāthā abhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:2624_0: Ekaccesu manussesu, ayaṃ dhammo na vijjati.
atk-s0513a4:2627_0: Punāpi suva passemu, piyaṃ me tava dassana”nti.
atk-s0513a4:2628_0: Tattha bhuñja sālinti ito paṭṭhāya nibbhayo hutvā bhuñjāti karīsasahassampi tasseva niyyādento evamāha.
atk-s0513a4:2628_1: Passemūti attano ruciyā āgataṃ aññesupi divasesu taṃ passeyyāmāti.
atk-s0513a4:2629_0: Evaṃ brāhmaṇo mahāsattaṃ yācitvā piyaputtaṃ viya muducittena olokento pādato bandhanaṃ mocetvā satapākatelena
atk-s0513a4:2629_1: pāde makkhetvā bhaddapīṭhe nisīdāpetvā kañcanataṭṭake madhulāje khādāpetvā sakkharodakaṃ pāyesi.
atk-s0513a4:2631_0: “Bhuttañca pītañca tavassamamhi, ratī ca no kosiya te sakāse;
atk-s0513a4:2632_0: Nikkhittadaṇḍesu dadāhi dānaṃ, jiṇṇe ca mātāpitaro bharassū”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2633_0: Tattha tavassamamhīti tava nivesane. Ratīti abhirati.
atk-s0513a4:2634_0: Taṃ sutvā brāhmaṇo tuṭṭhamānaso udānaṃ udānento gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2636_0: “Lakkhī vata me udapādi ajja, yo addasāsiṃ pavaraṃ dijānaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:2637_0: Suvassa sutvāna subhāsitāni, kāhāmi puññāni anappakānī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2639_0: Mahāsatto brāhmaṇena attano dinnaṃ karīsasahassamattaṃ paṭikkhipitvā aṭṭhakarīsameva gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a4:2639_1: Brāhmaṇo thambhe nikhanitvā tassa khettaṃ niyyādetvā gandhamālādīhi pūjetvā khamāpetvā “gaccha sāmi,
atk-s0513a4:2639_2: assumukhe rodamāne mātāpitaro assāsehī”ti vatvā taṃ uyyojesi.
atk-s0513a4:2639_3: So tuṭṭhamānaso sālisīsaṃ ādāya gantvā mātāpitūnaṃ purato nikkhipitvā “ammatātā,
atk-s0513a4:2639_9: Kosiyopi suvarañño ovādaṃ sutvā tato paṭṭhāya dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ mahādānaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a4:2642_0: Annena pānena pasannacitto, santappayi samaṇabrāhmaṇe cā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2643_0: Tattha santappayīti gahitagahitāni bhājanāni pūrento santappesīti.
atk-s0513a4:2644_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “evaṃ bhikkhu mātāpitūnaṃ posanaṃ nāma paṇḍitānaṃ vaṃso”ti vatvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a4:2648_0: Upanīyatidaṃ maññeti idaṃ satthā kapilavatthupuraṃ upanissāya nigrodhārāme viharanto rājanivesane rāhulamātaraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:2648_1: Idaṃ pana jātakaṃ dūrenidānato paṭṭhāya kathetabbaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:2648_2: Sā panesā nidānakathā yāva laṭṭhivane uruvelakassapasīhanādā apaṇṇakajātake kathitā,
atk-s0513a4:2648_3: tato paraṃ yāva kapilavatthugamanā vessantarajātake āvi bhavissati.
atk-s0513a4:2648_4: Satthā pana pitu nivesane nisīditvā antarabhattasamaye mahādhammapālajātakaṃ kathetvā katabhattakicco
atk-s0513a4:2648_5: “rāhulamātu nivesane nisīditvā tassā guṇaṃ vaṇṇento candakinnarījātakaṃ kathessāmī”ti rājānaṃ pattaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2648_6: gāhāpetvā dvīhi aggasāvakehi saddhiṃ rāhulamātu nivesanaṭṭhānaṃ pāyāsi.
atk-s0513a4:2648_7: Tadā tassā sammukhā cattālīsasahassanāṭakitthiyo vasanti tāsu khattiyakaññānaṃyeva navutiadhikasahassaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:2648_8: Sā tathāgatassa āgamanaṃ ñatvā “sabbā kāsāvāneva nivāsentū”ti tāsaṃ ārocāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:2648_13: Rāhulamātāpi paridevitvā sokaṃ vinodetvā satthāraṃ vanditvā rājagatena bahumānena sagāravena nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:2648_15: mama suṇhā ‘tumhehi kāsāvāni nivatthānī’ti sutvā kāsāvāneva nivāsesi,
atk-s0513a4:2648_18: tumhākaṃ pabbajitakāle vidhavā hutvā aññehi rājūhi pesitaṃ paṇṇākāraṃ na gaṇhi,
atk-s0513a4:2648_19: evaṃ tumhesu asaṃhīracittā esā”ti nānappakārehi tassā guṇakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:2648_21: yaṃ esā idāni mama pacchime attabhāve mayi sasinehā asaṃhīracittā anaññaneyyā bhaveyya.
atk-s0513a4:2648_22: Esā tiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbattāpi mayi asaṃhīracittā anaññaneyyā ahosī”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:2649_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente mahāsatto himavantapadese kinnarayoniyaṃ nibbatti,
atk-s0513a4:2649_3: Tadā bārāṇasirājā amaccānaṃ rajjaṃ niyyādetvā dve kāsāyāni nivāsetvā sannaddhapañcāvudho ekakova himavantaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a4:2649_4: So migamaṃsaṃ khādanto ekaṃ khuddakanadiṃ anusañcaranto uddhaṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0513a4:2649_5: Candapabbatavāsino kinnarā vassārattasamaye anotaritvā pabbateyeva vasanti,
atk-s0513a4:2649_7: Tadā ca so candakinnaro attano bhariyāya saddhiṃ otaritvā tesu tesu ṭhānesu gandhe vilimpanto pupphareṇuṃ
atk-s0513a4:2649_8: khādanto pupphapaṭe nivāsento pārupanto latādolāhi kīḷanto madhurassarena gāyanto taṃ khuddakanadiṃ patvā
atk-s0513a4:2649_9: ekasmiṃ nivattanaṭṭhāne otaritvā udake pupphāni vikiritvā udakakīḷaṃ kīḷitvā pupphapaṭe nivāsetvā pārupitvā
atk-s0513a4:2649_10: rajatapaṭṭavaṇṇāya vālukāya pupphāsanaṃ paññapetvā ekaṃ veḷu daṇḍakaṃ gahetvā sayane nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:2649_11: Tato candakinnaro veḷuṃ vādento madhurasaddena gāyi.
atk-s0513a4:2649_12: Candakinnarī muduhatthe nāmetvā tassa avidūre ṭhitā nacci ceva gāyi ca.
atk-s0513a4:2649_13: So rājā tesaṃ saddaṃ sutvā padasaddaṃ asāvento saṇikaṃ gantvā paṭicchanne ṭhatvā te kinnare disvā kinnariyā
atk-s0513a4:2649_14: paṭibaddhacitto hutvā “taṃ kinnaraṃ vijjhitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpetvā imāya saddhiṃ saṃvāsaṃ kappessāmī”ti
atk-s0513a4:2649_16: So vedanāppatto paridevamāno catasso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:2652_0: Ajja jahāmi jīvitaṃ, pāṇā me cande nirujjhanti.
atk-s0513a4:2654_0: “Osīdi me dukkhaṃ hadayaṃ, me ḍayhate nitammāmi;
atk-s0513a4:2655_0: Tava candiyā socantiyā, na naṃ aññehi sokehi.
atk-s0513a4:2658_0: Tava candiyā socantiyā, na naṃ aññehi sokehi.
atk-s0513a4:2660_0: “Vassamiva sare pāde, imāni assūni vattare mayhaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:2661_0: Tava candiyā socantiyā, na naṃ aññehi sokehī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2662_8: atha kho tava candiyā socantiyā sokahetu yasmā tvaṃ mama viyogena socissasi,
atk-s0513a4:2662_10: Tiṇamiva vanamiva milāyāmīti tattapāsāṇe khittatiṇamiva mūlachinnavanamiva milāyāmīti vadati.
atk-s0513a4:2662_11: Sare pādeti yathā nāma pabbatapāde patitavassaṃ saritvā acchinnadhāraṃ vattati.
atk-s0513a4:2663_0: Mahāsatto imāhi catūhi gāthāhi paridevitvā pupphasayane nipannova satiṃ vissajjetvā parivatti.
atk-s0513a4:2663_2: Itarā mahāsatte paridevante attano ratiyā mattā hutvā tassa viddhabhāvaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0513a4:2663_3: visaññaṃ pana naṃ parivattitvā nipannaṃ disvā “kiṃ nu kho me piyasāmikassa dukkha”nti upadhārentī pahāramukhato
atk-s0513a4:2663_4: paggharantaṃ lohitaṃ disvā piyasāmike uppannaṃ balavasokaṃ sandhāretuṃ asakkontī mahāsaddena paridevi.
atk-s0513a4:2663_5: Rājā “kinnaro mato bhavissatī”ti nikkhamitvā attānaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0513a4:2663_6: Candā taṃ disvā “iminā me corena piyasāmiko viddho bhavissatī”ti kampamānā palāyitvā pabbatamatthake ṭhatvā rājānaṃ paribhāsantī pañca gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:2665_0: “Pāpo khosi rājaputta, yo me icchitaṃ patiṃ varākiyā;
atk-s0513a4:2666_0: Vijjhasi vanamūlasmiṃ, soyaṃ viddho chamā seti.
atk-s0513a4:2668_0: “Imaṃ mayhaṃ hadayasokaṃ, paṭimuñcatu rājaputta tava mātā;
atk-s0513a4:2671_0: “Imaṃ mayhaṃ hadayasokaṃ, paṭimuñcatu rājaputta tava jāyā;
atk-s0513a4:2674_0: “Mā ca puttaṃ mā ca patiṃ, addakkhi rājaputta tava mātā;
atk-s0513a4:2675_0: Yo kimpurisaṃ avadhi, adūsakaṃ mayha kāmā hi.
atk-s0513a4:2677_0: “Mā ca puttaṃ mā ca patiṃ, addakkhi rājaputta tava jāyā;
atk-s0513a4:2678_0: Yo kimpurisaṃ avadhi, adūsakaṃ mayha kāmā hī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2680_0: Rājā naṃ pañcahi gāthāhi paribhāsitvā pabbatamatthake ṭhitaṃyeva assāsento gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2682_0: “Mā tvaṃ cande rodi mā sopi, vanatimiramattakkhi;
atk-s0513a4:2683_0: Mama tvaṃ hehisi bhariyā, rājakule pūjitā nārībhī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2684_0: Tattha candeti mahāsattassa paridevanakāle nāmassa sutattā evamāha.
atk-s0513a4:2684_2: Pūjitā nārībhīti soḷasannaṃ itthisahassānaṃ jeṭṭhikā aggamahesī hessasi.
atk-s0513a4:2685_0: Candā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “tvaṃ kiṃ maṃ vadesī”ti sīhanādaṃ nadantī anantaragāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2687_0: “Api nūnahaṃ marissaṃ, nāhaṃ rājaputta tava hessaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:2688_0: Yo kimpurisaṃ avadhi, adūsakaṃ mayha kāmā hī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2689_0: Tattha api nūnahanti api ekaṃseneva ahaṃ marissaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:2690_0: So tassā vacanaṃ sutvā nicchandarāgo hutvā itaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2692_0: “Api bhīruke api jīvitukāmike, kimpurisi gaccha himavantaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:2694_5: vatvā ca pana nirapekkho hutvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a4:2695_0: Sā tassa gatabhāvaṃ ñatvā oruyha mahāsattaṃ āliṅgitvā pabbatamatthakaṃ āropetvā pabbatatale nipajjāpetvā
atk-s0513a4:2695_1: sīsamassa attano ūrūsu katvā balavaparidevaṃ paridevamānā dvādasa gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:2697_0: “Te pabbatā tā ca kandarā, tā ca giriguhāyo tatheva tiṭṭhanti;
atk-s0513a4:2698_0: Tattheva taṃ apassantī, kimpurisa kathaṃ ahaṃ kassaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:2701_0: Tattheva taṃ apassantī, kimpurisa kathaṃ ahaṃ kassaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:2704_0: Tattheva taṃ apassantī, kimpurisa kathaṃ ahaṃ kassaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:2707_0: Tattheva taṃ apassantī, kimpurisa kathaṃ ahaṃ kassaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:2710_0: Tattheva taṃ apassantī, kimpurisa kathaṃ ahaṃ kassaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:2713_0: Tattheva taṃ apassantī, kimpurisa kathaṃ ahaṃ kassaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:2716_0: Tattheva taṃ apassantī, kimpurisa kathaṃ ahaṃ kassaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:2719_0: Tattheva taṃ apassantī, kimpurisa kathaṃ ahaṃ kassaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:2722_0: Tattheva taṃ apassantī, kimpurisa kathaṃ ahaṃ kassaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:2725_0: Tattheva taṃ apassantī, kimpurisa kathaṃ ahaṃ kassaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:2728_0: Tattheva taṃ apassantī, kimpurisa kathaṃ ahaṃ kassaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:2731_0: Tattheva taṃ apassantī, kimpurisa kathaṃ ahaṃ kassa”nti.
atk-s0513a4:2732_0: Tattha te pabbatāti yesu mayaṃ ekatova abhiramimha,
atk-s0513a4:2732_1: ime te pabbatā tā ca kandarā tā ca giriguhāyo tatheva ṭhitā.
atk-s0513a4:2732_2: Tesu ahaṃ idāni taṃ apassantī kathaṃ kassaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:2732_4: tesu pupphaphalapallavādisobhaṃ taṃ apassantī kathaṃ adhivāsetuṃ sakkhissāmīti paridevati.
atk-s0513a4:2733_0: Iti sā dvādasahi gāthāhi paridevitvā mahāsattassa ure hatthaṃ ṭhapetvā santāpabhāvaṃ ñatvā “cando jīvatiyeva,
atk-s0513a4:2733_1: devujjhānakammaṃ katvā jīvitamassa dassāmī”ti cintetvā “kiṃ nu kho lokapālā nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a4:2733_3: te me piyasāmikaṃ na rakkhantī”ti devujjhānakammaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a4:2733_4: Tassā sokavegena sakkassa āsanaṃ uṇhaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:2733_5: Sakko āvajjento taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā brāhmaṇavaṇṇena vegeneva āgantvā kuṇḍikato udakaṃ gahetvā mahāsattaṃ āsiñci.
atk-s0513a4:2733_10: Candā piyasāmikaṃ arogaṃ disvā somanassappattā sakkassa pāde vandantī anantaragāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2735_0: “Vande te ayirabrahme, yo me icchitaṃ patiṃ varākiyā;
atk-s0513a4:2737_0: Tattha amatenāti udakaṃ “amata”nti maññamānā evamāha. Piyatamenāti piyatarena, ayameva vā pāṭho.
atk-s0513a4:2738_0: Sakko tesaṃ ovādamadāsi “ito paṭṭhāya candapabbatato oruyha manussapathaṃ mā gamittha,
atk-s0513a4:2738_2: Evañca pana vatvā te ovaditvā sakaṭṭhānameva gato.
atk-s0513a4:2742_1: pubbepesā mayi asaṃhīracittā anaññaneyyā evā”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a4:2746_0: Ukkā cilācā bandhantīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto mittabandhakaupāsakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:2746_1: So kira sāvatthiyaṃ parijiṇṇassa kulassa putto sahāyaṃ pesetvā aññataraṃ kuladhītaraṃ vārāpetvā “atthi
atk-s0513a4:2746_2: panassa uppannakiccaṃ nittharaṇasamattho mitto vā sahāyo vā”ti vutte “natthī”ti vatvā “tena hi mitte
atk-s0513a4:2746_3: tāva bandhatū”ti vutte tasmiṃ ovāde ṭhatvā paṭhamaṃ tāva catūhi dovārikehi saddhiṃ mettiṃ akāsi,
atk-s0513a4:2746_4: athānupubbena nagaraguttikagaṇakamahāmattādīhi saddhiṃ mettiṃ katvā senāpatināpi uparājenāpi saddhiṃ mettiṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a4:2746_5: Tehi pana saddhiṃ ekato hutvā raññā saddhiṃ mettiṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a4:2746_6: Tato asītiyā mahātherehi saddhiṃ ānandattherenapi saddhiṃ ekato hutvā tathāgatena saddhiṃ mettiṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a4:2746_7: Atha naṃ satthā saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpesi,
atk-s0513a4:2746_10: Athassa rājā mahantaṃ gehaṃ datvā āvāhamaṅgalaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a4:2746_11: Rājānaṃ ādiṃ katvā mahājano paṇṇākāre pahiṇi.
atk-s0513a4:2746_12: Athassa bhariyā raññā pahitaṃ paṇṇākāraṃ uparājassa,
atk-s0513a4:2746_13: uparājena pahitaṃ paṇṇākāraṃ senāpatissāti etena upāyena sakalanagaravāsino ābandhitvā gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a4:2746_14: Sattame divase mahāsakkāraṃ katvā dasabalaṃ nimantetvā pañcasatassa buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0513a4:2746_15: mahādānaṃ datvā bhattakiccāvasāne satthārā kathitaṃ anumodanaṃ sutvā ubhopi jayampatikā sotāpattiphale
atk-s0513a4:2747_1: mittabandhakaupāsako attano bhariyaṃ nissāya tassā vacanaṃ katvā sabbehi mettiṃ katvā rañño santikā mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ labhi,
atk-s0513a4:2747_2: tathāgatena pana saddhiṃ mettiṃ katvā ubhopi jayampatikā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhitā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2747_5: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a4:2747_7: idāneva so etaṃ mātugāmaṃ nissāya mahantaṃ yasaṃ sampatto,
atk-s0513a4:2747_8: pubbe tiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbattopi panesa etissā vacanena bahūhi saddhiṃ mettiṃ katvā puttasokato muttoyevā”ti vatvā tehi yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:2748_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente ekacce paccantavāsino yattha yattha bahuṃ maṃsaṃ labhanti,
atk-s0513a4:2748_1: tattha tattha gāmaṃ nivāsetvā araññe caritvā migādayo māretvā maṃsaṃ āharitvā puttadāre posenti.
atk-s0513a4:2748_8: Tadā seno seniṃ “bhariyā me hohī”ti vadati.
atk-s0513a4:2748_12: Amhākaṃ uppannaṃ bhayaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā haraṇasamatthaṃ mittaṃ vā sahāyaṃ vā laddhuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0513a4:2748_18: So tassā vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā tathā akāsi.
atk-s0513a4:2748_19: Tadā te ubhopi saṃvāsaṃ kappetvā tasmiṃyeva sare ekasmiṃ dīpake kadambarukkho atthi samantā udakena parikkhitto,
atk-s0513a4:2749_1: Tesaṃ pakkhesu asañjātesuyeva ekadivasaṃ te jānapadā divasaṃ araññe caritvā kiñci alabhitvā “na sakkā tucchahatthena gharaṃ gantuṃ,
atk-s0513a4:2749_2: macche vā kacchape vā gaṇhissāmā”ti saraṃ otaritvā taṃ dīpakaṃ gantvā tassa kadambassa mūle nipajjitvā
atk-s0513a4:2749_3: makasādīhi khajjamānā tesaṃ palāpanatthāya araṇiṃ manthetvā aggiṃ nibbattetvā dhūmaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:2749_10: sakuṇamaṃsaṃ khāditvāva sayissāmā”ti vatvā aggiṃ jāletvā ukkā bandhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:2749_11: Sakuṇikā tesaṃ saddaṃ sutvā “ime amhākaṃ potake khāditukāmā,
atk-s0513a4:2749_12: mayaṃ evarūpassa bhayassa haraṇatthāya mitte gaṇhimha,
atk-s0513a4:2749_13: sāmikaṃ ukkusarājassa santikaṃ pesessāmī”ti cintetvā “gaccha, sāmi,
atk-s0513a4:2749_14: puttānaṃ no uppannabhayaṃ ukkusarājassa ārocehī”ti vatvā paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2751_0: “Ukkā cilācā bandhanti dīpe, pajā mamaṃ khādituṃ patthayanti;
atk-s0513a4:2752_0: Mittaṃ sahāyañca vadehi senaka, ācikkha ñātibyasanaṃ dijāna”nti.
atk-s0513a4:2753_5: Dijānanti amhākaṃ ñātīnaṃ dijānaṃ idaṃ byasanaṃ ukkusarājassa santikaṃ gantvā ācikkhāhīti vadati.
atk-s0513a4:2754_0: So vegena tassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā vassitvā attano āgatabhāvaṃ jānāpetvā katokāso upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā
atk-s0513a4:2754_1: “kiṃkāraṇā āgatosī”ti puṭṭho āgatakāraṇaṃ dassento dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2756_0: “Dijo dijānaṃ pavarosi pakkhima, ukkusarāja saraṇaṃ taṃ upema;
atk-s0513a4:2757_0: Pajā mamaṃ khādituṃ patthayanti, luddā cilācā bhava me sukhāyā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2758_0: Tattha dijoti tvaṃ dijo ceva dijānaṃ pavaro ca.
atk-s0513a4:2759_0: Ukkusarājā “senaka mā bhāyī”ti taṃ assāsetvā tatiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2761_0: “Mittaṃ sahāyañca karonti paṇḍitā, kāle akāle sukhamesamānā;
atk-s0513a4:2762_0: Karomi te senaka etamatthaṃ, ariyo hi ariyassa karoti kicca”nti.
atk-s0513a4:2763_0: Tattha kāle akāleti divā ca rattiñca.
atk-s0513a4:2764_4: Tena hi tvaṃ sīghaṃ gantvā mama sahāyikaṃ assāsetvā mamāgamanabhāvaṃ ācikkhāhīti.
atk-s0513a4:2764_6: Ukkusarājāpi gantvā kadambassa avidūre cilācānaṃ abhiruhanaṃ olokento ekasmiṃ rukkhagge nisīditvā ekassa
atk-s0513a4:2764_7: cilācassa abhiruhanakāle tasmiṃ kulāvakassa avidūraṃ abhiruḷhe sare nimujjitvā pakkhehi ca mukhena ca
atk-s0513a4:2764_10: Cilācā “imañca senakasakuṇapotake cassa khādissāmī”ti otaritvā puna ukkaṃ jālāpetvā abhiruhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:2764_12: Etenupāyena baddhaṃ baddhaṃ vijjhāpentassevassa aḍḍharatto jāto.
atk-s0513a4:2764_18: etassa thokaṃ vissamanatthāya gantvā kacchaparājassa kathehī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2764_19: So tassā vacanaṃ sutvā ukkusaṃ upasaṅkamitvā gāthāya ajjhabhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:2766_0: “Yaṃ hoti kiccaṃ anukampakena, ariyassa ariyena kataṃ tayīdaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:2767_0: Attānurakkhī bhava mā aḍayhi, lacchāma putte tayi jīvamāne”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2768_0: Tattha tayīdanti tayā idaṃ, ayameva vā pāṭho.
atk-s0513a4:2769_0: So tassa vacanaṃ sutvā sīhanādaṃ nadanto pañcamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2772_0: Karonti heke sakhinaṃ sakhāro, pāṇaṃ cajantā satamesa dhammo”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2773_0: Chaṭṭhaṃ pana satthā abhisambuddho hutvā tassa guṇaṃ vaṇṇento āha –
atk-s0513a4:2777_1: Putteti senakassa putte rakkhanto tesaṃ atthāya aḍḍharatte anāgate yāva diyaḍḍhayāmā vāyāmaṃ karonto dukkaraṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a4:2778_1: sammā”ti vatvā kacchapassa santikaṃ gantvā taṃ uṭṭhāpetvā “kiṃ, samma,
atk-s0513a4:2778_4: tenamhi tava santikaṃ āgato”ti vatvā sattamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2781_0: Puttā mamaṭṭā gatimāgatosmi, atthaṃ caretho mama vāricarā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2782_1: ekacce hi yasato vā dhanato vā cutāpi sakammunā khalitāpi mittānaṃ anukampāya patiṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0513a4:2782_3: tenāhaṃ taṃ gatiṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ katvā āgatosmi,
atk-s0513a4:2782_4: puttānaṃ jīvitadānaṃ dadanto atthaṃ me carāhi vāricarāti.
atk-s0513a4:2785_0: “Dhanena dhaññena ca attanā ca, mittaṃ sahāyañca karonti paṇḍitā;
atk-s0513a4:2786_0: Karomi te senaka etamatthaṃ, ariyo hi ariyassa karoti kicca”nti.
atk-s0513a4:2787_0: Athassa putto avidūre nipanno pitu vacanaṃ sutvā “mā me pitā kilamatu,
atk-s0513a4:2787_1: ahaṃ pitu kiccaṃ karissāmī”ti cintetvā navamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2789_0: “Appossukko tāta tuvaṃ nisīda, putto pitu carati atthacariyaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:2790_0: Ahaṃ carissāmi tavetamatthaṃ, senassa putte paritāyamāno”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2793_0: “Addhā hi tāta satamesa dhammo, putto pitu yaṃ care atthacariyaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:2794_0: Appeva maṃ disvāna pavaḍḍhakāyaṃ, senassa puttā na viheṭhayeyyu”nti.
atk-s0513a4:2795_0: Tattha satamesa dhammoti paṇḍitānaṃ esa dhammo. Puttāti senassa putte cilācā na heṭhayeyyunti.
atk-s0513a4:2796_2: idānāhaṃ āgamissāmī”ti taṃ uyyojetvā udake patitvā kalalañca sevālañca saṃkaḍḍhitvā ādāya dīpakaṃ gantvā aggiṃ vijjhāpetvā nipajji.
atk-s0513a4:2796_5: ayaṃ no sabbesaṃ pahossatī”ti valliyo uddharitvā jiyā gahetvā nivatthapilotikāpi mocetvā tesu tesu ṭhānesu
atk-s0513a4:2796_7: Kacchapo te ākaḍḍhanto gantvā gambhīraṭṭhāne udake pati.
atk-s0513a4:2796_8: Tepi kacchapalobhena saddhiṃyeva patitvā udakapuṇṇāya kucchiyā kilantā nikkhamitvā “bho ekena no ukkusena yāva aḍḍharattā ukkā vijjhāpitā,
atk-s0513a4:2796_9: idāni iminā kacchapena udake pātetvā udakaṃ pāyetvā mahodarā katamha,
atk-s0513a4:2796_10: puna aggiṃ karitvā aruṇe uggatepi ime senakapotake khādissāmā”ti aggiṃ kātuṃ ārabhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:2796_12: ime yāya kāyaci velāya amhākaṃ puttake khāditvā gamissanti,
atk-s0513a4:2796_13: sahāyassa no sīhassa santikaṃ gacchāhī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:2796_14: So taṅkhaṇaññeva sīhassa santikaṃ gantvā “kiṃ avelāya āgatosī”ti vutte ādito paṭṭhāya taṃ pavattiṃ ārocetvā ekādasamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2799_0: Puttā mamaṭṭā gatimāgatosmi, tvaṃ nosi rājā bhava me sukhāyā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2800_3: sabbalokasmiñhi sabbe tiracchānāpi manussāpi bhayaṭṭitā hutvā seṭṭhaṃ upagacchanti,
atk-s0513a4:2800_6: tvaṃ amhākaṃ rājā sukhāya me bhavāhī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2803_0: “Karomi te senaka etamatthaṃ, āyāmi te taṃ disataṃ vadhāya;
atk-s0513a4:2804_0: Kathañhi viññū pahu sampajāno, na vāyame attajanassa guttiyā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2806_0: Evañca pana vatvā “gaccha tvaṃ putte samassāsehī”ti taṃ uyyojetvā maṇivaṇṇaṃ udakaṃ maddamāno pāyāsi.
atk-s0513a4:2806_1: Cilācā taṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā “kurarena tāva amhākaṃ ukkā vijjhāpitā,
atk-s0513a4:2806_2: tathā kacchapena amhe nivatthapilotikānampi assāmikā katā,
atk-s0513a4:2806_4: sīho no jīvitakkhayameva pāpessatī”ti maraṇabhayatajjitā yena vā tena vā palāyiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:2806_5: Sīho āgantvā rukkhamūle na kiñci addasa.
atk-s0513a4:2806_6: Atha naṃ kuraro ca kacchapo ca seno ca upasaṅkamitvā vandiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:2806_7: So tesaṃ mittānisaṃsaṃ kathetvā “ito paṭṭhāya mittadhammaṃ abhinditvā appamattā hothā”ti ovaditvā pakkāmi,
atk-s0513a4:2806_9: Senasakuṇī attano putte oloketvā “mitte nissāya amhehi dārakā laddhā”ti sukhanisinnasamaye senena saddhiṃ
atk-s0513a4:2806_10: sallapantī mittadhammaṃ pakāsamānā cha gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:2814_0: “Mittaṃ sahāyaṃ adhigamma paṇḍito, so bhuñjatī putta pasuṃ dhanaṃ vā;
atk-s0513a4:2815_0: Ahañca puttā ca patī ca mayhaṃ, mittānukampāya samaṅgibhūtā.
atk-s0513a4:2817_0: “Rājavatā sūravatā ca attho, sampannasakhissa bhavanti hete;
atk-s0513a4:2818_0: So mittavā yasavā uggatatto, asmiṃdhaloke modati kāmakāmī.
atk-s0513a4:2824_0: Evaṃ so sukhito hoti, yathāhaṃ tvañca senakā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2825_0: Tattha mittañcāti yaṃkiñci attano mittañca suhadayañca suhadayasahāyañca sāmikasaṅkhātaṃ ayirañca karotheva.
atk-s0513a4:2825_2: Yathā nāma paṭimukkakavaco sare abhihanati nivāreti,
atk-s0513a4:2825_3: evaṃ mayampi mittabalena paccatthike abhihantvā puttehi saddhiṃ modāmāti vadati.
atk-s0513a4:2825_6: Lomasāti pakkhino amhākaṃ puttakā mañca tañca kūjantaṃ hadayaṅgamaṃ madhurassaraṃ nicchāretvā upakūjanti.
atk-s0513a4:2826_0: Rājavatā sūravatā ca atthoti yassa sīhasadiso rājā ukkusakacchapasadisā ca sūrā mittā honti,
atk-s0513a4:2826_1: tena rājavatā sūravatā ca attho sakkā pāpuṇituṃ.
atk-s0513a4:2826_2: Bhavanti heteti yo ca sampannasakho paripuṇṇamittadhammo,
atk-s0513a4:2826_7: So hi kāme kāmanato kāmakāmī nāma.
atk-s0513a4:2827_0: Evaṃ sā chahi gāthāhi mittadhammassa guṇakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:2827_1: Te sabbepi sahāyakā mittadhammaṃ abhinditvā yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā yathākammaṃ gatā.
atk-s0513a4:2828_4: “tadā seno ca senī ca jayampatikā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0513a4:2832_0: Kharājinā jaṭilā paṅkadantāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ kuhakabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:2832_1: So hi niyyānikasāsane pabbajitvāpi catupaccayatthāya tividhaṃ kuhakavatthuṃ pūresi.
atk-s0513a4:2832_2: Athassa aguṇaṃ pakāsentā bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “āvuso,
atk-s0513a4:2832_3: asuko nāma bhikkhu evarūpe niyyānikasāsane pabbajitvā kuhanaṃ nissāya jīvikaṃ kappetī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2832_6: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a4:2833_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto tassa purohito ahosi paṇḍito byatto.
atk-s0513a4:2833_1: So ekadivasaṃ uyyānakīḷaṃ gato ekaṃ abhirūpaṃ gaṇikaṃ disvā paṭibaddhacitto tāya saddhiṃ saṃvāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0513a4:2833_5: jātakāle nāmaṃ karontī assa kiṃ nāmaṃ karomī”ti?
atk-s0513a4:2833_6: So “vaṇṇadāsiyā kucchimhi nibbattattā na sakkā kulanāmaṃ kātu”nti cintetvā “bhadde,
atk-s0513a4:2833_8: idha paṭiladdhattā ‘uddālako’tissa nāmaṃ kareyyāsī”ti vatvā aṅgulimuddikaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a4:2833_12: atha naṃ vayappattaṃ mayhaṃ dasseyyāsī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:2833_13: Sā aparabhāge puttaṃ vijāyitvā “uddālako”tissa nāmaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a4:2834_3: “Yadi evaṃ vede uggaṇhissāmī”ti mātu hatthato muddikañca ācariyabhāgañca gahetvā takkasilaṃ gantvā disāpāmokkhācariyassa
atk-s0513a4:2834_4: santike sippaṃ uggaṇhanto ekaṃ tāpasagaṇaṃ disvā “imesaṃ santike varasippaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0513a4:2834_5: taṃ uggaṇhissāmī”ti sippalobhena pabbajitvā tesaṃ vattapaṭivattaṃ katvā “ācariyā maṃ tumhākaṃ jānanasippaṃ sikkhāpethā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:2834_6: Te attano attano jānananiyāmeneva taṃ sikkhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:2834_7: Pañcannaṃ tāpasasatānaṃ ekopi tena atirekapañño nāhosi,
atk-s0513a4:2834_13: manussā nāma mahādānaṃ datvā anumodanaṃ kārāpenti,
atk-s0513a4:2834_16: mayaṃ tena bhayena tattha na gacchāmā”ti. “Mārisā,
atk-s0513a4:2834_18: manaṃ gahetvā kathanaṃ nāma mayhaṃ bhāro,
atk-s0513a4:2834_19: tumhe mā bhāyathā”ti vatvā tehi saddhiṃ cārikaṃ caramāno anupubbena bārāṇasiṃ patvā rājuyyāne vasitvā
atk-s0513a4:2834_20: punadivase sabbehi saddhiṃ dvāragāme bhikkhāya cari,
atk-s0513a4:2834_22: Tāpasā punadivase nagaraṃ pavisiṃsu manussā mahādānaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:2835_0: Rājā “kuhiṃ vasatī”ti pucchitvā “uyyāne”ti sutvā “sādhu ajja tesaṃ dassanāya gamissāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:2835_1: Eko puriso gantvā “rājā kira vo passituṃ āgacchissatī”ti uddālakassa kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:2835_4: issare nāma ekadivasaṃ ārādhetvā yāvajīvaṃ alaṃ hotī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2835_14: Sayaṃ pana aṭṭha vā dasa vā paṇḍitavādino gahetvā manorame ādhārake ramaṇīyaṃ potthakaṃ ṭhapetvā antevāsikaparivuto supaññatte sāpassaye āsane nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:2835_15: Tasmiṃ khaṇe rājā purohitaṃ ādāya mahantena parivārena uyyānaṃ gantvā te micchātapaṃ carante disvā “apāyabhayamhā
atk-s0513a4:2835_16: muttā”ti pasīditvā uddālakassa santikaṃ gantvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā ekamantaṃ nisinno tuṭṭhamānaso purohitena
atk-s0513a4:2837_0: “Kharājinā jaṭilā paṅkadantā, dummakkharūpā ye mantaṃ jappanti;
atk-s0513a4:2838_0: Kaccinnu te mānusake payoge, idaṃ vidū parimuttā apāyā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2839_4: Idaṃ vidūti idaṃ tapacaraṇañca mantasajjhāyanañca jānantā.
atk-s0513a4:2840_0: Taṃ sutvā purohito “ayaṃ rājā aṭṭhāne pasanno,
atk-s0513a4:2840_1: tuṇhī bhavituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2842_0: “Pāpāni kammāni karetha rāja, bahussuto ce na careyya dhammaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:2843_0: Sahassavedopi na taṃ paṭicca, dukkhā pamucce caraṇaṃ apatvā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2844_4: sahassavedopi samāno taṃ bāhusaccaṃ paṭicca aṭṭhasamāpattisaṅkhātaṃ caraṇaṃ appatvā apāyadukkhato na mucceyyāti.
atk-s0513a4:2845_0: Tassa vacanaṃ sutvā uddālako cintesi “rājā yathā vā tathā vā isigaṇassa pasīdi,
atk-s0513a4:2845_1: ayaṃ pana brāhmaṇo carantaṃ goṇaṃ daṇḍena paharanto viya vaḍḍhitabhatte kacavaraṃ khipanto viya kathesi,
atk-s0513a4:2845_3: So tena saddhiṃ kathento tatiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2847_0: “Sahassavedopi na taṃ paṭicca, dukkhā pamucce caraṇaṃ apatvā;
atk-s0513a4:2848_0: Maññāmi vedā aphalā bhavanti, sasaṃyamaṃ caraṇaññeva sacca”nti.
atk-s0513a4:2849_0: Tattha aphalāti tava vāde vedā ca sesasippāni ca aphalāni āpajjanti,
atk-s0513a4:2849_2: sīlasaṃyamena saddhiṃ caraṇaññeva ekaṃ saccaṃ āpajjatīti.
atk-s0513a4:2852_0: “Na heva vedā aphalā bhavanti, sasaṃyamaṃ caraṇaññeva saccaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:2853_0: Kittiñhi pappoti adhicca vede, santiṃ puṇāti caraṇena danto”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2854_0: Tattha na hevāti nāhaṃ “vedā aphalā”ti vadāmi,
atk-s0513a4:2854_1: apica kho pana sasaṃyamaṃ caraṇaṃ saccameva sabhāvabhūtaṃ uttamaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:2854_3: Santiṃ puṇātīti samāpattisaṅkhātena caraṇena danto bhayasantikaraṃ nibbānaṃ pāpuṇātīti.
atk-s0513a4:2855_0: Taṃ sutvā uddālako “na sakkā iminā saddhiṃ paṭipakkhavasena ṭhātuṃ,
atk-s0513a4:2855_1: ‘putto tavāha’nti vutte sinehaṃ akaronto nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a4:2857_0: “Bhaccā mātā pitā bandhū, yena jāto sayeva so;
atk-s0513a4:2859_0: Tattha bhaccāti mātā ca pitā ca sesabandhū ca bharitabbā nāma.
atk-s0513a4:2860_0: So “ekaṃsena tvaṃ uddālakosī”ti vutte “āmā”ti vatvā “mayā te mātu saññāṇaṃ dinnaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:2860_1: taṃ kuhi”nti vutte “idaṃ brāhmaṇā”ti muddikaṃ tassa hatthe ṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a4:2860_2: Brāhmaṇo muddikaṃ sañjānitvā nicchayena “tvaṃ brāhmaṇadhammaṃ pajānāsī”ti vatvā brāhmaṇadhammaṃ pucchanto chaṭṭhaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2862_0: “Kathaṃ bho brāhmaṇo hoti, kathaṃ bhavati kevalī;
atk-s0513a4:2866_0: “Niraṃkatvā aggimādāya brāhmaṇo, āpo siñcaṃ yajaṃ usseti yūpaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:2867_0: Evaṃkaro brāhmaṇo hoti khemī, dhamme ṭhitaṃ tena amāpayiṃsū”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2868_0: Tattha niraṃkatvā aggimādāyāti nirantaraṃ katvā aggiṃ gahetvā paricarati.
atk-s0513a4:2868_1: Āpo siñcaṃ yajaṃ usseti yūpanti abhisecanakakammaṃ karonto sammāpāsaṃ vā vājapeyyaṃ vā niraggaḷaṃ vā yajanto suvaṇṇayūpaṃ ussāpeti.
atk-s0513a4:2868_3: Amāpayiṃsūti teneva ca kāraṇena dhamme ṭhitaṃ kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:2869_0: Taṃ sutvā purohito tena kathitaṃ brāhmaṇadhammaṃ garahanto aṭṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2872_0: Na khantī nāpi soraccaṃ, nāpi so parinibbuto”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2873_0: Tattha secanenāti tena vuttesu brāhmaṇadhammesu ekaṃ dassetvā sabbaṃ paṭikkhipati.
atk-s0513a4:2873_2: “aggiparicaraṇena vā udakasecanena vā pasughātayaññena vā suddhi nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a4:2874_0: Tato naṃ uddālako “yadi evaṃ brāhmaṇo na hoti, atha kathaṃ hotī”ti pucchanto navamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2876_0: “Kathaṃ so brāhmaṇo hoti, kathaṃ bhavati kevalī;
atk-s0513a4:2881_0: Evaṃkaro brāhmaṇo hoti khemī, dhamme ṭhitaṃ tena amāpayiṃsū”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2888_0: Tattha atthi seyyotha pāpiyoti ete khattiyādayo sabbepi soraccādīhi samannāgatā honti,
atk-s0513a4:2888_1: evaṃ bhūtānaṃ pana tesaṃ ayaṃ seyyo,
atk-s0513a4:2889_0: Athassa “arahattuppattito paṭṭhāya hīnukkaṭṭhatā nāma natthī”ti dassetuṃ brāhmaṇo gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2901_1: yadi etehi guṇehi samannāgatānaṃ viseso natthi,
atk-s0513a4:2901_3: evaṃ sante tvaṃ ubhato sujātabhāvaṃ nāsento panaṭṭhaṃ carasi brahmaññaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:2902_0: Atha naṃ purohito upamāya saññāpento gāthādvayamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2905_0: Na tesaṃ chāyā vatthānaṃ, so rāgo anupajjatha.
atk-s0513a4:2909_0: Tattha vimānanti gehaṃ vā maṇḍapaṃ vā.
atk-s0513a4:2909_1: Chāyāti tesaṃ vatthānaṃ chāyā so nānāvidho rāgo na upeti,
atk-s0513a4:2909_3: Evamevāti manussesupi evameva ekacce aññāṇabrāhmaṇā akāraṇeneva cātuvaṇṇe suddhiṃ paññāpenti,
atk-s0513a4:2909_6: tadā tehi paṭividdhaṃ nibbānadhammaṃ jānitvā subbatā sīlavantā paṇḍitapurisā te sajātiṃ muñcanti.
atk-s0513a4:2909_7: Nibbānappattito paṭṭhāya hi jāti nāma niratthakāti.
atk-s0513a4:2910_0: Uddālako pana paccāharituṃ asakkonto appaṭibhānova nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:2910_5: sese uppabbājetvā phalakāvudhāni datvā sevake karothā”ti. “Sādhu,
atk-s0513a4:2915_0: Assaṃ gavaṃ rajataṃ jātarūpanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:2915_2: Tadā pana satthā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu ukkaṇṭhitosī”ti pucchitvā “saccaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:2915_4: bhante”ti vutte “bhikkhu evarūpe niyyānikasāsane pabbajitvā kasmā kilesaṃ paṭicca ukkaṇṭhitosi,
atk-s0513a4:2915_5: porāṇakapaṇḍitā anuppanne buddhe bāhirakapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā vatthukāmakilesakāme ārabbha uppajjanakasaññaṃ
atk-s0513a4:2915_6: sapathaṃ katvā vihariṃsū”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:2916_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto asītikoṭivibhavassa brāhmaṇamahāsālakulassa putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0513a4:2916_2: Athassa padasā vicaraṇakāle aparopi putto jāyi,
atk-s0513a4:2916_7: Mahākañcanakumāro vayappatto takkasilato sabbasippāni uggaṇhitvā āgacchi.
atk-s0513a4:2916_8: Atha naṃ mātāpitaro gharāvāsena bandhitukāmā “attanā samānajātiyakulato te dārikaṃ ānessāma,
atk-s0513a4:2916_12: mayhañhi tayo bhavā ādittā viya sappaṭibhayā,
atk-s0513a4:2916_17: te gharāvāsena nimantethā”ti vatvā punappunaṃ yācitopi sahāye pesetvā tehi yācitopi na icchi.
atk-s0513a4:2917_1: kiṃ pana tvaṃ patthento kāme paribhuñjituṃ na icchasī”ti pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:2917_7: Mahākañcanapaṇḍito mātāpitūnaṃ kattabbakiccaṃ katvā asītikoṭidhanena kapaṇaddhikānaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā
atk-s0513a4:2917_8: cha bhātaro bhaginiṃ ekaṃ dāsaṃ ekaṃ dāsiṃ ekaṃ sahāyakañca ādāya mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā himavantaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a4:2917_9: Te tattha ekaṃ padumasaraṃ nissāya ramaṇīye bhūmibhāge assamaṃ katvā pabbajitvā vanamūlaphalāhārehi yāpayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:2917_10: Te araññaṃ gacchantā ekatova gantvā yattha eko phalaṃ vā pattaṃ vā passati,
atk-s0513a4:2917_11: tattha itarepi pakkositvā diṭṭhasutādīni kathentā uccinanti,
atk-s0513a4:2917_13: Atha ācariyo mahākañcanatāpaso cintesi “amhākaṃ asītikoṭidhanaṃ chaḍḍetvā pabbajitānaṃ evaṃ loluppacāravasena
atk-s0513a4:2917_16: So assamaṃ patvā sabbepi te sāyanhasamaye sannipātetvā tamatthaṃ ārocetvā “tumhe idheva samaṇadhammaṃ karontā acchatha,
atk-s0513a4:2917_23: mayaṃ aṭṭha janā vārena phalāphalaṃ āharissāma,
atk-s0513a4:2917_24: tumhe pana tayo vāramuttāva hothā”ti vatvā paṭiññaṃ gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:2918_0: Tato paṭṭhāya aṭṭhasupi janesu ekeko vāreneva phalāphalaṃ āharati.
atk-s0513a4:2918_3: Vārappatto phalāphalaṃ āharitvā eko māḷako atthi,
atk-s0513a4:2918_4: tattha pāsāṇaphalake ekādasa koṭṭhāse katvā ghaṇḍisaññaṃ katvā attano koṭṭhāsaṃ ādāya vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisati.
atk-s0513a4:2918_5: Sesā ghaṇḍisaññāya nikkhamitvā loluppaṃ akatvā gāravaparihārena gantvā attano pāpuṇanakoṭṭhāsaṃ ādāya
atk-s0513a4:2918_7: Te aparabhāge bhisāni āharitvā khādantā tattatapā ghoratapā paramājitindriyā kasiṇaparikammaṃ karontā vihariṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:2918_8: Atha tesaṃ sīlatejena sakkassa bhavanaṃ kampi.
atk-s0513a4:2918_9: Sakkopi āvajjento taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā “kāmādhimuttā nu kho ime isayo,
atk-s0513a4:2918_11: So “ime tāva isayo pariggaṇhissāmī”ti cintetvā attano ānubhāvena mahāsattassa koṭṭhāsaṃ tayo divase antaradhāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:2918_12: So paṭhamadivase koṭṭhāsaṃ adisvā “mama koṭṭhāsaṃ pamuṭṭho bhavissatī”ti cintesi,
atk-s0513a4:2918_14: paṇāmanavasena mama koṭṭhāsaṃ na ṭhapesi maññe”ti cintesi,
atk-s0513a4:2918_15: tatiyadivase “kena nu kho kāraṇena mayhaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ na ṭhapenti,
atk-s0513a4:2919_4: Tesu eko uṭṭhāya “mayā ācariyā”ti vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:2919_5: Koṭṭhāse karontena te mayhaṃ koṭṭhāso katoti. “Āma, ācariya,
atk-s0513a4:2919_15: ajja mayhaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ alabhantassa tatiyo divaso,
atk-s0513a4:2919_16: paṭhamadivase koṭṭhāsaṃ adisvā ‘koṭṭhāsaṃ karonto maṃ pamuṭṭho bhavissatī’ti cintesiṃ,
atk-s0513a4:2919_23: kāme pahāya pabbajitānaṃ bhisamattaṃ thenanaṃ nāma appatirūpanti.
atk-s0513a4:2919_24: Te tassa kathaṃ sutvā “aho sāhasikakamma”nti sabbeva ubbegappattā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:2920_0: Tasmiṃ assamapade vanajeṭṭhakarukkhe nibbattadevatāpi otaritvā āgantvā tesaṃyeva santike nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:2920_1: Āneñjakaraṇaṃ kāriyamāno dukkhaṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto āḷānaṃ bhinditvā palāyitvā araññaṃ paviṭṭho eko vāraṇo kālena kālaṃ isigaṇaṃ vandati,
atk-s0513a4:2920_3: Sappakīḷāpanako eko vānaro ahituṇḍikassa hatthato muccitvā palāyitvā araññaṃ pavisitvā tattheva assame vasati.
atk-s0513a4:2920_4: Sopi taṃ divasaṃ isigaṇaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:2920_5: Sakko “isigaṇaṃ pariggaṇhissāmī”ti tesaṃ santike adissamānakāyo aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:2920_6: Tasmiṃ khaṇeva bodhisattassa kaniṭṭho upakañcanatāpaso uṭṭhāyāsanā bodhisattaṃ vanditvā sesānaṃ apacitiṃ dassetvā “ācariya,
atk-s0513a4:2920_7: ahaṃ aññe apaṭṭhapetvā attānaññeva sodhetuṃ labhāmī”ti pucchi. “Āma,
atk-s0513a4:2920_9: So isigaṇamajjhe ṭhatvā “sace te mayā bhisāni khāditāni,
atk-s0513a4:2920_10: evarūpo nāma hotū”ti sapathaṃ karonto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2922_0: “Assaṃ gavaṃ rajataṃ jātarūpaṃ, bhariyañca so idha labhataṃ manāpaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:2923_0: Puttehi dārehi samaṅgi hotu, bhisāni te brāhmaṇa yo ahāsī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2924_1: tehi vippayoge tattakāni sokadukkhāni uppajjantī’ti vatthukāme garahanto abhāsī”ti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:2925_7: Tasmiṃ paṭhamaṃ sapathaṃ katvā nisinne dutiyopi bhātā sahasā uṭṭhāya mahāsattaṃ vanditvā sapathena attānaṃ sodhento dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2927_0: “Mālañca so kāsikacandanañca, dhāretu puttassa bahū bhavantu;
atk-s0513a4:2928_0: Kāmesu tibbaṃ kurutaṃ apekkhaṃ, bhisāni te brāhmaṇa yo ahāsī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2929_0: Tattha tibbanti vatthukāmakilesakāmesu bahalaṃ apekkhaṃ karotūti.
atk-s0513a4:2929_2: so tehi vippayoge mahantaṃ dukkhaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti dukkhapaṭikkhepavaseneva āha.
atk-s0513a4:2930_0: Tasmiṃ nisinne sesāpi attano attano ajjhāsayānurūpena taṃ taṃ gāthaṃ abhāsiṃsu –
atk-s0513a4:2932_0: “Pahūtadhañño kasimā yasassī, putte gihī dhanimā sabbakāme;
atk-s0513a4:2933_0: Vayaṃ apassaṃ gharamāvasātu, bhisāni te brāhmaṇa yo ahāsi.
atk-s0513a4:2935_0: “So khattiyo hotu pasayhakārī, rājābhirājā balavā yasassī;
atk-s0513a4:2936_0: Sa cāturantaṃ mahimāvasātu, bhisāni te brāhmaṇa yo ahāsi.
atk-s0513a4:2939_0: Pūjetu naṃ raṭṭhapatī yasassī, bhisāni te brāhmaṇa yo ahāsi.
atk-s0513a4:2942_0: Pūjentu naṃ jānapadā samecca, bhisāni te brāhmaṇa yo ahāsi.
atk-s0513a4:2944_0: “Catussadaṃ gāmavaraṃ samiddhaṃ, dinnañhi so bhuñjatu vāsavena;
atk-s0513a4:2945_0: Avītarāgo maraṇaṃ upetu, bhisāni te brāhmaṇa yo ahāsi.
atk-s0513a4:2947_0: “So gāmaṇī hotu sahāyamajjhe, naccehi gītehi pamodamāno;
atk-s0513a4:2948_0: So rājato byasana mālattha kiñci, bhisāni te brāhmaṇa yo ahāsi.
atk-s0513a4:2950_0: “Yaṃ ekarājā pathaviṃ vijetvā, itthīsahassāna ṭhapetu aggaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:2951_0: Sīmantinīnaṃ pavarā bhavātu, bhisāni te brāhmaṇa yā ahāsi.
atk-s0513a4:2954_0: Carātu lābhena vikatthamānā, bhisāni te brāhmaṇa yā ahāsi.
atk-s0513a4:2957_0: Ālokasandhiṃ divasaṃ karotu, bhisāni te brāhmaṇa yo ahāsi.
atk-s0513a4:2959_0: “So bajjhatū pāsasatehi chabbhi, rammā vanā niyyatu rājadhāniṃ;
atk-s0513a4:2960_0: Tuttehi so haññatu pācanehi, bhisāni te brāhmaṇa yo ahāsi.
atk-s0513a4:2963_0: Sakacchabandho visikhaṃ carātu, bhisāni te brāhmaṇa yo ahāsī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2964_1: Putte gihī dhanimā sabbakāmeti putte labhatu,
atk-s0513a4:2964_5: Vayaṃ apassanti mahallakakāle pabbajjānurūpampi attano vayaṃ apassanto pañcakāmaguṇasamiddhaṃ gharameva āvasatūti.
atk-s0513a4:2964_6: Idaṃ so “pañcakāmaguṇagiddho kāmaguṇavippayogena mahāvināsaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti dassetuṃ kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:2965_0: Catutthena vuttagāthāya rājābhirājāti rājūnaṃ antare abhirājāti.
atk-s0513a4:2965_1: Idaṃ so “issarānaṃ nāma issariye parigalite mahantaṃ dukkhaṃ uppajjatī”ti rajje dosaṃ dassento kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:2965_3: Idaṃ so “purohitassa purohitaṭṭhāne parigalite mahantaṃ domanassaṃ uppajjatī”ti dassetuṃ kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:2965_4: Chaṭṭhena vuttagāthāya tapassinanti tapasīlasampannoti taṃ maññatu.
atk-s0513a4:2965_5: Idaṃ so “lābhasakkārāpagamena mahantaṃ domanassaṃ uppajjatī”ti lābhasakkāragarahavasena kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:2966_6: vāsavato laddhavarānubhāvena ekaṃ rājānaṃ ārādhetvā tena dinnantipi attho.
atk-s0513a4:2966_7: Avītarāgoti kaddame sūkaro viya kāmapaṅke nimuggova hutvā.
atk-s0513a4:2966_8: Iti sopi kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ kathento evamāha.
atk-s0513a4:2967_2: Kañcanadeviyā vuttagāthāya yanti yaṃ itthinti attho.
atk-s0513a4:2967_7: Iti sā itthibhāve ṭhatvāpi duggandhagūtharāsiṃ viya kāme garahantīyeva evamāha.
atk-s0513a4:2967_8: Dāsiyā vuttagāthāya sabbasamāgatānanti sabbesaṃ sannipatitānaṃ majjhe nisīditvā avikampamānā anosakkamānā sādurasaṃ bhuñjatūti attho.
atk-s0513a4:2967_9: Dāsīnaṃ kira sāmikassa santike nisīditvā bhuñjanaṃ nāma appiyaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:2967_12: Lābhena vikatthamānāti lābhahetu kuhanakammaṃ karontī lābhasakkāraṃ uppādentī caratūti attho.
atk-s0513a4:2967_13: Iminā sā dāsibhāve ṭhitāpi kilesakāmavatthukāme garahati.
atk-s0513a4:2968_4: So kira devaputto kassapabuddhakāle gajaṅgalanagaraṃ nissāya yojanike jiṇṇamahāvihāre āvāsikasaṅghatthero
atk-s0513a4:2968_5: hutvā jiṇṇavihāre navakammaṃ karontoyeva mahādukkhaṃ anubhavi.
atk-s0513a4:2968_8: Chabbhīti catūsu pādesu gīvāya kaṭibhāge cāti chasu ṭhānesu.
atk-s0513a4:2968_11: So kira attano anubhūtadukkhaññeva ārabbha evamāha.
atk-s0513a4:2969_0: Vānarena vuttagāthāya alakkamālīti ahituṇḍikena kaṇṭhe parikkhipitvā ṭhapitāya alakkamālāya samannāgato.
atk-s0513a4:2969_2: Laṭṭhīhatoti sappakīḷaṃ sikkhāpayamāno laṭṭhiyā hato hutvā.
atk-s0513a4:2969_3: Esopi ahituṇḍikassa hatthe attano anubhūtadukkhameva sandhāya evamāha.
atk-s0513a4:2970_0: Evaṃ tehi terasahi janehi sapathe kate mahāsatto cintesi “kadāci ime ‘ayaṃ anaṭṭhameva naṭṭhanti kathetī’ti mayi āsaṅkaṃ kareyyuṃ,
atk-s0513a4:2972_0: “Yo ve anaṭṭhaṃva naṭṭhanti cāha, kāmeva so labhataṃ bhuñjatañca;
atk-s0513a4:2973_0: Agāramajjhe maraṇaṃ upetu, yo vā bhonto saṅkati kañcidevā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2974_2: bhavanto yo anaṭṭhe koṭṭhāse “naṭṭhaṃ me”ti vadati,
atk-s0513a4:2974_4: so pañca kāmaguṇe labhatu ceva bhuñjatu ca,
atk-s0513a4:2975_0: Evaṃ isīhi sapathe kate sakko bhāyitvā “ahaṃ ime vīmaṃsanto bhisāni antaradhāpesiṃ.
atk-s0513a4:2975_1: Ime ca chaḍḍitakheḷapiṇḍaṃ viya kāme garahantā sapathaṃ karonti,
atk-s0513a4:2975_2: kāme garahakāraṇaṃ te pucchissāmī”ti cintetvā dissamānarūpo bodhisattaṃ vanditvā pucchanto anantaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2978_0: Piyaṃ manuññaṃ cidha jīvaloke, kasmā isayo nappasaṃsanti kāme”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2979_0: Tattha yadesamānāti yaṃ vatthukāmaṃ kilesakāmañca kasigorakkhādīhi samavisamakammehi pariyesamānā sattā loke vicaranti,
atk-s0513a4:2979_1: etaṃ bahūnaṃ devamanussānaṃ iṭṭhañca kantañca piyañca manuññañca,
atk-s0513a4:2980_0: Athassa pañhaṃ vissajjento mahāsatto dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:2982_0: “Kāmesu ve haññare bajjhare ca, kāmesu dukkhañca bhayañca jātaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:2983_0: Kāmesu bhūtādhipatī pamattā, pāpāni kammāni karonti mohā.
atk-s0513a4:2985_0: “Te pāpadhammā pasavetva pāpaṃ, kāyassa bhedā nirayaṃ vajanti;
atk-s0513a4:2986_0: Ādīnavaṃ kāmaguṇesu disvā, tasmā isayo nappasaṃsanti kāme”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2987_8: So panesa ādīnavo dukkhakkhandhādīhi suttehi dīpetabbo.
atk-s0513a4:2988_0: Sakko mahāsattassa kathaṃ sutvā saṃviggamānaso anantaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:2990_0: “Vīmaṃsamāno isino bhisāni, tīre gahetvāna thale nidhesiṃ;
atk-s0513a4:2991_0: Suddhā apāpā isayo vasanti, etāni te brahmacārī bhisānī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2992_4: Tīre gahetvānāti tīre nikkhittāni gahetvā thale ekamante nidhesiṃ.
atk-s0513a4:2992_5: Suddhāti idāni mayā tumhākaṃ sapathakiriyāya ñātaṃ “ime isayo suddhā apāpā hutvā vasantī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2995_0: “Na te naṭā no pana kīḷaneyyā, na bandhavā no pana te sahāyā;
atk-s0513a4:2996_0: Kismiṃ vupatthambha sahassanetta, isīhi tvaṃ kīḷasi devarājā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:2997_0: Tattha na te naṭā noti devarāja,
atk-s0513a4:2997_1: mayaṃ tava naṭā vā kīḷitabbayuttakā vā keci na homa,
atk-s0513a4:2997_4: atha tvaṃ kiṃ vā upatthambhaṃ katvā kiṃ nissāya isīhi saddhiṃ kīḷasīti attho.
atk-s0513a4:2998_0: Atha naṃ sakko khamāpento vīsatimaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:3000_0: “Ācariyo mesi pitā ca mayhaṃ, esā patiṭṭhā khalitassa brahme;
atk-s0513a4:3001_0: Ekāparādhaṃ khama bhūripañña, na paṇḍitā kodhabalā bhavantī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3002_0: Tattha esā patiṭṭhāti esā tava pādacchāyā ajja mama khalitassa aparaddhassa patiṭṭhā hotu.
atk-s0513a4:3003_0: Atha mahāsatto sakkassa devarañño khamitvā sayaṃ isigaṇaṃ khamāpento itaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:3006_0: Sabbeva bhonto sumanā bhavantu, yaṃ brāhmaṇo paccupādī bhisānī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3007_0: Tattha suvāsitaṃ isinaṃ ekarattanti āyasmantānaṃ isīnaṃ ekarattampi imasmiṃ araññe vasitaṃ suvasitameva.
atk-s0513a4:3007_5: Bhontoti bhavanto sabbepi sumanā bhavantu, tussantu,
atk-s0513a4:3008_0: Sakko isigaṇaṃ vanditvā devalokameva gato. Isigaṇopi jhānābhiññāyo nibbattetvā brahmalokūpago ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:3009_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “evaṃ bhikkhu porāṇakapaṇḍitā sapathaṃ katvā kilese pajahiṃsū”ti vatvā saccāni pakāsesi,
atk-s0513a4:3009_2: Jātakaṃ samodhānento puna satthā tisso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:3012_0: Anuruddho puṇṇo ānando, tadāsuṃ satta bhātaro.
atk-s0513a4:3015_0: Citto gahapati dāso, yakkho sātāgiro tadā.
atk-s0513a4:3018_0: Kāḷudāyī tadā sakko, evaṃ dhāretha jātaka”nti.
atk-s0513a4:3022_0: Mahesī surucino bhariyāti idaṃ satthā sāvatthiṃ upanissāya migāramātupāsāde viharanto visākhāya mahāupāsikāya laddhe aṭṭha vare ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:3022_1: Sā hi ekadivasaṃ jetavane dhammakathaṃ sutvā bhagavantaṃ saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena svātanāya nimantetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a4:3022_2: Tassā pana rattiyā accayena cātuddīpiko mahāmegho pāvassi.
atk-s0513a4:3022_9: ayaṃ pacchimako cātuddīpiko mahāmegho”ti vatvā ovassāpitakāyehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ iddhibalena jetavane antarahito visākhāya koṭṭhake pāturahosi.
atk-s0513a4:3022_13: yatra hi nāma jāṇukamattesupi oghesu vattamānesu kaṭimattesupi oghesu vattamānesu na hi nāma ekabhikkhussapi
atk-s0513a4:3022_14: pādā vā cīvarāni vā allāni bhavissantī”ti haṭṭhā udaggā buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ parivisitvā katabhattakiccaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3023_1: atthavasaṃ sampassamānā tathāgataṃ aṭṭha varāni yācasī”ti pucchitvā tāya varānisaṃse kathite “sādhu sādhu, visākhe,
atk-s0513a4:3023_3: imaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ sampassamānā tathāgataṃ aṭṭha varāni yācasī”ti vatvā “anujānāmi te, visākhe,
atk-s0513a4:3023_4: aṭṭha varānī”ti aṭṭha vare datvā anumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a4:3023_5: Athekadivasaṃ satthari pubbārāme viharante bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “āvuso,
atk-s0513a4:3023_6: visākhā mahāupāsikā mātugāmattabhāve ṭhatvāpi dasabalassa santike aṭṭha vare labhi,
atk-s0513a4:3023_10: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a4:3023_12: visākhā idāneva mama santikā vare labhati,
atk-s0513a4:3024_0: Atīte mithilāyaṃ suruci nāma rājā rajjaṃ kārento puttaṃ paṭilabhitvā tassa “surucikumāro”tveva nāmaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a4:3024_1: So vayappatto “takkasilāyaṃ sippaṃ uggaṇhissāmī”ti gantvā nagaradvāre sālāyaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:3024_2: Bārāṇasiraññopi putto brahmadattakumāro nāma tatheva gantvā surucikumārassa nisinnaphalakeyeva nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:3024_3: Te aññamaññaṃ pucchitvā vissāsikā hutvā ekatova ācariyassa santikaṃ gantvā ācariyabhāgaṃ datvā sippaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3024_4: paṭṭhapetvā na cirasseva niṭṭhitasippā ācariyaṃ āpucchitvā thokaṃ maggaṃ ekatova gantvā dvedhāpathe ṭhitā
atk-s0513a4:3024_5: aññamaññaṃ āliṅgitvā mittadhammānurakkhaṇatthaṃ katikaṃ kariṃsu “sace mama putto jāyati,
atk-s0513a4:3024_10: Tesu rajjaṃ kārentesu surucimahārājassa putto jāyi,
atk-s0513a4:3025_0: Surucikumāro vayappatto takkasilāyaṃ gantvā sippaṃ uggaṇhitvā āgacchi.
atk-s0513a4:3025_1: Atha naṃ pitā rajje abhisiñcitukāmo hutvā “sahāyassa kira me bārāṇasirañño dhītā atthi,
atk-s0513a4:3025_2: tamevassa aggamahesiṃ karissāmī”ti tassā atthāya bahuṃ paṇṇākāraṃ datvā amacce pesesi.
atk-s0513a4:3025_6: amhākaṃ ekaṃ dhītaraṃ sumedhādeviṃ tamhā dukkhā mocetvā yo etaṃ ekikameva gaṇhissati,
atk-s0513a4:3025_8: So tehi amaccehi āgantvā tassā nāme gahite “tātā,
atk-s0513a4:3025_9: kāmaṃ mayā pubbe mayhaṃ sahāyassa paṭiññā katā,
atk-s0513a4:3025_10: imaṃ pana mayaṃ itthighaṭāya antare na khipitukāmā,
atk-s0513a4:3025_17: heṭṭhimantena soḷasa itthisahassāni laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā na rocesi.
atk-s0513a4:3026_0: Surucikumāro pana sumedhāya rūpasampadaṃ sutvā savanasaṃsaggena bajjhitvā “ahaṃ taṃ ekikameva gaṇhissāmi,
atk-s0513a4:3026_3: Te tassa manaṃ abhinditvā bahuṃ dhanaṃ pesetvā mahantena parivārena taṃ ānetvā kumārassa aggamahesiṃ katvā ekatova abhisiñciṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3026_4: So surucimahārājā nāma hutvā dhammena rajjaṃ kārento tāya saddhiṃ piyasaṃvāsaṃ vasi.
atk-s0513a4:3026_5: Sā pana dasa vassasahassāni tassa gehe vasantī neva puttaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:3026_7: Atha nāgarā sannipatitvā rājaṅgaṇe upakkositvā “kimeta”nti vutte “rañño doso natthi,
atk-s0513a4:3026_8: vaṃsānupālako pana vo putto na vijjati,
atk-s0513a4:3026_10: rājakule ca nāma heṭṭhimantena soḷasahi itthisahassehi bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:3026_12: addhā tāsu puññavatī puttaṃ labhissatī”ti vatvā “tātā,
atk-s0513a4:3026_14: ‘ahaṃ aññaṃ na gaṇhissāmī’ti paṭiññaṃ datvā mayā esā ānītā,
atk-s0513a4:3026_16: na mayhaṃ itthighaṭāya attho”ti raññā paṭikkhittā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3027_0: Sumedhā taṃ kathaṃ sutvā “rājā tāva saccavāditāya aññā itthiyo na ānesi,
atk-s0513a4:3027_1: ahameva panassa ānessāmī”ti rañño mātusamabhariyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano ruciyāva khattiyakaññānaṃ sahassaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:3027_5: Tāpi dasa vassasahassāni rājakule vasitvā neva puttaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:3027_7: Etenevupāyena aparānipi tikkhattuṃ cattāri cattāri sahassāni ānesi.
atk-s0513a4:3027_12: tāni tāya ekikāya vutthehi dasahi sahassehi saddhiṃ paññāsa vassasahassāni honti.
atk-s0513a4:3027_13: Atha nāgarā sannipatitvā puna upakkositvā “kimeta”nti vutte “deva,
atk-s0513a4:3027_14: tumhākaṃ itthiyo puttaṃ patthetuṃ āṇāpethā”ti vadiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3027_16: Tā tato paṭṭhāya puttaṃ patthayamānā nānādevatā namassanti,
atk-s0513a4:3027_21: Sā “sādhū”ti pannarasauposathadivase aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ uposathaṃ samādāya sirigabbhe sīlāni āvajjamānā kappiyamañcake nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:3027_22: Sesā ajavatagovatā hutvā puttaṃ alabhitvā uyyānaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3028_3: na kho pana sakkā yaṃ vā taṃ vā dātuṃ,
atk-s0513a4:3028_4: anucchavikamassā puttaṃ upadhāressāmī”ti upadhārento naḷakāradevaputtaṃ passi.
atk-s0513a4:3028_5: So hi puññasampanno satto purimattabhāve bārāṇasiyaṃ vasanto vappakāle khettaṃ gacchanto ekaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ disvā dāsakammakare “vapathā”ti pahiṇi.
atk-s0513a4:3028_6: Sayaṃ nivattitvā paccekabuddhaṃ gehaṃ netvā bhojetvā puna gaṅgātīraṃ ānetvā puttena saddhiṃ ekato hutvā
atk-s0513a4:3028_7: udumbarabhittipādaṃ naḷabhittikaṃ paṇṇasālaṃ katvā dvāraṃ yojetvā caṅkamaṃ katvā paccekabuddhaṃ tattheva
atk-s0513a4:3028_8: temāsaṃ vasāpetvā vutthavassaṃ dve pitāputtā ticīvarena acchādetvā uyyojesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3028_9: Eteneva niyāmena sattaṭṭha paccekabuddhe tāya paṇṇasālāya vasāpetvā ticīvarāni adaṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3028_10: “Dve pitāputtā naḷakārā hutvā gaṅgātīre veḷuṃ upadhārentā paccekabuddhaṃ disvā evamakaṃsū”tipi vadantiyeva.
atk-s0513a4:3029_0: Te kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbattitvā chasu kāmāvacarasaggesu anulomapaṭilomena mahantaṃ devissariyaṃ anubhavantā vicaranti.
atk-s0513a4:3029_1: Te tato cavitvā uparidevaloke nibbattitukāmā honti.
atk-s0513a4:3029_2: Sakko tathā gatabhāvaṃ ñatvā tesu ekassa vimānadvāraṃ gantvā taṃ āgantvā vanditvā ṭhitaṃ āha – “mārisa,
atk-s0513a4:3029_6: tattha ṭhitā dānādīni puññāni katvā devalokaṃ patthenti,
atk-s0513a4:3029_12: Sakko tassa paṭiññaṃ gahetvā isivesena rājuyyānaṃ gantvā tāsaṃ itthīnaṃ upari ākāse caṅkamanto attānaṃ dassetvā “kassāhaṃ puttavaraṃ dammi,
atk-s0513a4:3029_15: mayhaṃ dehī”ti soḷasa itthisahassāni hatthe ukkhipiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3029_22: So ākāseneva gantvā tassā vāsāgāre sīhapañjare aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:3030_1: sakko devarājā ‘tumhākaṃ puttavaraṃ dassāmī’ti ākāsenāgantvā sīhapañjare ṭhito”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3030_2: Sā garuparihārenāgantvā sīhapañjaraṃ ugghāṭetvā “saccaṃ kira, bhante,
atk-s0513a4:3030_9: Sā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “tena hi suṇāhī”ti vatvā attano sīlaguṇaṃ kathentī pannarasa gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:3037_0: Suruciṃ atimaññittha, āvi vā yadi vā raho.
atk-s0513a4:3040_0: Musā me bhaṇamānāya, muddhā phalatu sattadhā.
atk-s0513a4:3042_0: “Bhattu mama sassu mātā, pitā cāpi ca sassuro;
atk-s0513a4:3043_0: Te maṃ brahme vinetāro, yāva aṭṭhaṃsu jīvitaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3049_0: Musā me bhaṇamānāya, muddhā phalatu sattadhā.
atk-s0513a4:3052_0: Tāsu issā vā kodho vā, nāhu mayhaṃ kudācanaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3054_0: “Hitena tāsaṃ nandāmi, na ca me kāci appiyā;
atk-s0513a4:3058_0: Musā me bhaṇamānāya, muddhā phalatu sattadhā.
atk-s0513a4:3064_0: Musā me bhaṇamānāya, muddhā phalatu sattadhā.
atk-s0513a4:3070_0: Musā me bhaṇamānāya, muddhā phalatu sattadhā.
atk-s0513a4:3077_0: Musā me bhaṇamānāya, muddhā phalatu sattadhā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3078_3: Yaṃ manti yasmiṃ kāle maṃ suruci ānayi,
atk-s0513a4:3078_4: tato paṭṭhāya ahaṃ dasa vassasahassāni ekikāva imasmiṃ gehe vasiṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3078_5: Atimaññitthāti muhuttampi sammukhā vā parammukhā vā atimaññinti idaṃ atikkamitvā maññanaṃ na jānāmi na sarāmi.
atk-s0513a4:3079_0: Te manti sasuro ca sassu cāti te ubhopi maṃ vinetāro,
atk-s0513a4:3080_1: Nāhūti kilesaṃ nissāya issādhammo vā kodhadhammo vā mayhaṃ na bhūtapubbo.
atk-s0513a4:3080_4: ure vutthadhītaro viya tā disvā tussāmi.
atk-s0513a4:3080_5: Kācīti tāsu ekāpi mayhaṃ appiyā nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a4:3080_7: Anukampāmīti muducittena sabbā soḷasasahassāpi tā attānaṃ viya anukampāmi.
atk-s0513a4:3081_0: Sahadhammenāti nayena kāraṇena yo yaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0513a4:3081_2: Pamuditindriyāti pesentī ca niccaṃ pamuditindriyāva hutvā pesemi,
atk-s0513a4:3081_3: “are duṭṭha dāsa idaṃ nāma karohī’ti evaṃ kujjhitvā na me koci katthaci pesitapubbo.
atk-s0513a4:3082_0: Evaṃ tassā gāthāya satenapi sahassenapi vaṇṇiyamānānaṃ guṇānaṃ pamāṇaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a4:3082_1: tāya pannarasahi gāthāhi attano guṇānaṃ vaṇṇitakāleyeva sakko attano bahukaraṇīyatāya tassā kathaṃ avicchinditvā
atk-s0513a4:3082_2: “pahūtā abbhutāyeva te guṇā”ti taṃ pasaṃsanto gāthādvayamāha –
atk-s0513a4:3085_0: Saṃvijjanti tayi bhadde, ye tvaṃ kittesi attani.
atk-s0513a4:3090_0: Sā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā somanassajātā taṃ pucchantī dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:3093_0: Manuññaṃ bhāsase vācaṃ, yaṃ mayhaṃ hadayaṅgamaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3096_0: Ko vāsi tvaṃ anuppatto, attānaṃ me pavedayā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3097_0: Tattha dummīti anañjitāmaṇḍito sakko āgacchanto ramaṇīyena tāpasavesena āgato,
atk-s0513a4:3097_3: Yaṃ mayhanti yaṃ etaṃ manuññaṃ vācaṃ mayhaṃ bhāsasi,
atk-s0513a4:3097_4: taṃ bhāsamāno tvaṃ devatānusi saggamhā idhāgato.
atk-s0513a4:3097_5: Isi vāsi mahiddhikoti yakkhādīsu ko vā tvaṃ asi idhānuppatto,
atk-s0513a4:3098_0: Sakko tassā kathento cha gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:3113_0: Devalokūpapattī ca, kittī ca idha jīvite.
atk-s0513a4:3116_0: Esāhaṃ tidivaṃ yāmi, piyaṃ me tava dassana”nti.
