atk-s0513a4:3117_0: Tattha sahassakkhoti atthasahassassa taṃmuhuttaṃ dassanavasena sahassakkho.
atk-s0513a4:3117_5: Ubhayattha kaṭaggahoti ayaṃ tava imasmiñca attabhāve anāgate ca jayaggāho.
atk-s0513a4:3117_6: Tesu anāgate devalokuppatti ca idha jīvite pavattamāne kitti cāti ayaṃ ubhayattha kaṭaggaho nāma.
atk-s0513a4:3117_7: Dhammanti evaṃ sabhāvaguṇaṃ ciraṃ attani pālaya.
atk-s0513a4:3117_9: Piyaṃ meti mayhaṃ tava dassanaṃ piyaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3118_2: tvaṃ appamattā hohīti tassā ovādaṃ datvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a4:3118_3: Naḷakāradevaputto pana paccūsakāle cavitvā tassā kucchiyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a4:3118_4: Sā gabbhassa patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ ñatvā rañño ārocesi,
atk-s0513a4:3118_8: Ubhayaraṭṭhavāsino “sāmiputtassa no khīramūla”nti ekekaṃ kahāpaṇaṃ rājaṅgaṇe khipiṃsu,
atk-s0513a4:3118_10: Raññā paṭikkhittāpi “sāmiputtassa no vaḍḍhitakāle paribbayo bhavissatī”ti aggahetvāva pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3118_11: Kumāro pana mahāparivārena vaḍḍhitvā vayappatto soḷasavassakāleyeva sabbasippesu nipphattiṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a4:3118_12: Rājā puttassa vayaṃ oloketvā deviṃ āha – “bhadde,
atk-s0513a4:3118_17: vaḍḍhakiṃ gahetvā amhākaṃ nivesanato avidūre puttassa me pāsādaṃ māpetha,
atk-s0513a4:3119_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe sakkassa bhavanaṃ uṇhākāraṃ dassesi.
atk-s0513a4:3119_1: So taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā vissakammaṃ āmantetvā “gaccha, tāta,
atk-s0513a4:3119_6: So vaḍḍhakīvesena vaḍḍhakīnaṃ santikaṃ gantvā “tumhe pātarāsaṃ bhuñjitvā ethā”ti te pesetvā daṇḍakena bhūmiṃ pahari,
atk-s0513a4:3119_11: Maṅgalaṭṭhāne ubhayaraṭṭhavāsino sannipatitvā maṅgalacchaṇena satta vassāni vītināmesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3119_15: amhākaṃ maṅgalaṃ bhuñjantānaṃ satta vassāni gatāni,
atk-s0513a4:3119_18: puttena me ettakaṃ kālaṃ na hasitapubbaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:3119_21: Atha mahājano bheriṃ carāpetvā naṭe sannipātesi.
atk-s0513a4:3119_22: Cha naṭasahassāni sannipatitvā satta koṭṭhāsā hutvā naccantā rājānaṃ hasāpetuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3119_23: Tassa kira dīgharattaṃ dibbanāṭakānaṃ diṭṭhattā tesaṃ naccaṃ amanuññaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:3120_0: Tadā bhaṇḍukaṇḍo ca paṇḍukaṇḍo cāti dve nāṭakajeṭṭhakā “mayaṃ rājānaṃ hasāpessāmā”ti rājaṅgaṇaṃ pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3120_1: Tesu bhaṇḍukaṇḍo tāva rājadvāre mahantaṃ atulaṃ nāma ambaṃ māpetvā suttaguḷaṃ khipitvā tassa sākhāya laggāpetvā suttena atulambaṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0513a4:3120_3: Atha tampi vessavaṇassa dāsā gahetvā aṅgapaccaṅgāni chinditvā pātesuṃ,
atk-s0513a4:3120_5: So pupphapaṭaṃ nivāsetvā ca pārupitvā ca naccantova uṭṭhahi.
atk-s0513a4:3120_7: Paṇḍukaṇḍo naṭo rājaṅgaṇe dārucitakaṃ kāretvā attano parisāya saddhiṃ aggiṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a4:3120_9: So sapariso pupphapaṭaṃ nivāsetvā ca pārupitvā ca naccantova uṭṭhahi.
atk-s0513a4:3120_11: Iti taṃ hasāpetuṃ asakkontā manussā upaddutā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3121_2: So āgantvā rājaṅgaṇe ākāse ṭhatvā upaḍḍhaaṅgaṃ nāma dassesi,
atk-s0513a4:3121_8: Taṃ disvā mahāpanādo thokaṃ hasitaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a4:3121_9: Mahājano pana hasanto hasanto hāsaṃ sandhāretuṃ satiṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetuṃ asakkonto aṅgāni vissajjetvā rājaṅgaṇeyeva pati,
atk-s0513a4:3121_13: Rājā mahāpanādo dānādīni puññāni katvā āyupariyosāne devalokameva gato.
atk-s0513a4:3122_2: visākhā pubbepi mama santikā varaṃ labhiyevā”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a4:3126_0: Appossukko dāni tuvaṃ kapotāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto uposathike pañcasate upāsake ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:3126_1: Tadā hi satthā dhammasabhāyaṃ catuparisamajjhe alaṅkatabuddhāsane nisīditvā muducittena parisaṃ oloketvā
atk-s0513a4:3126_2: “ajja upāsakānaṃ kathaṃ paṭicca desanā samuṭṭhahissatī”ti ñatvā upāsake āmantetvā “uposathikattha upāsakā”ti
atk-s0513a4:3126_6: porāṇakapaṇḍitā hi rāgādikilesaniggahatthaṃ uposathavāsaṃ vasiṃsū”ti vatvā tehi yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:3127_0: Atīte magadharaṭṭhādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ raṭṭhānaṃ antare aṭavī ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:3127_1: Bodhisatto magadharaṭṭhe brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbattitvā vayappatto kāme pahāya nikkhamitvā taṃ aṭaviṃ
atk-s0513a4:3127_2: pavisitvā assamaṃ katvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0513a4:3127_3: Tassa pana assamassa avidūre ekasmiṃ veḷugahane attano bhariyāya saddhiṃ kapotasakuṇo vasati,
atk-s0513a4:3127_7: Te cattāropi kālena kālaṃ isiṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ suṇanti.
atk-s0513a4:3128_0: Athekadivasaṃ kapoto bhariyāya saddhiṃ kulāvakā nikkhamitvā gocarāya pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a4:3128_1: Tassa pacchato gacchantiṃ kapotiṃ eko seno gahetvā palāyi.
atk-s0513a4:3128_2: Tassā viravasaddaṃ sutvā kapoto nivattitvā olokento taṃ tena hariyamānaṃ passi.
atk-s0513a4:3128_4: Kapoto tāya viyogena rāgapariḷāhena pariḍayhamāno cintesi “ayaṃ rāgo maṃ ativiya kilameti,
atk-s0513a4:3128_5: na idāni imaṃ aniggahetvā gocarāya pakkamissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3128_6: So gocarapathaṃ pacchinditvā tāpasassa santikaṃ gantvā rāganiggahāya uposathaṃ samādiyitvā ekamantaṃ nipajji.
atk-s0513a4:3129_0: Sappopi “gocaraṃ pariyesissāmī”ti vasanaṭṭhānā nikkhamitvā paccantagāme gāvīnaṃ vicaraṇaṭṭhāne gocaraṃ pariyesati.
atk-s0513a4:3129_1: Tadā gāmabhojakassa sabbaseto maṅgalausabho gocaraṃ gahetvā ekasmiṃ vammikapāde jaṇṇunā patiṭṭhāya siṅgehi mattikaṃ gaṇhanto kīḷati,
atk-s0513a4:3129_2: sappo gāvīnaṃ padasaddena bhīto taṃ vammikaṃ pavisituṃ pakkanto.
atk-s0513a4:3129_6: Gāmavāsino “usabho kira mato”ti sutvā sabbe ekato āgantvā roditvā kanditvā taṃ gandhamālādīhi pūjetvā āvāṭe nikhaṇitvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3129_7: Sappo tesaṃ gatakāle nikkhamitvā “ahaṃ kodhaṃ nissāya imaṃ jīvitā voropetvā mahājanassa hadaye sokaṃ pavesesiṃ,
atk-s0513a4:3129_8: na dāni imaṃ kodhaṃ aniggahetvā gocarāya pakkamissāmī”ti cintetvā nivattitvā taṃ assamaṃ gantvā kodhaniggahāya
atk-s0513a4:3130_0: Siṅgālopi gocaraṃ pariyesanto ekaṃ matahatthiṃ disvā “mahā me gocaro laddho”ti tuṭṭho gantvā soṇḍāyaṃ ḍaṃsi,
atk-s0513a4:3130_13: nipajjanakāle antāni ca papphāsañca avattharitvā nipajji.
atk-s0513a4:3130_15: aññattha kiṃ karissāmī”ti cintetvā tattheva abhirato bahi anikkhamitvā antokucchiyaṃyeva vasi.
atk-s0513a4:3130_16: Aparabhāge vātātapena hatthikuṇape sukkhante karīsamaggo pihito,
atk-s0513a4:3130_17: siṅgālo antokucchiyaṃ nipajjamāno appamaṃsalohito paṇḍusarīro hutvā nikkhamanamaggaṃ na passi.
atk-s0513a4:3130_19: karīsamaggo temiyamāno mudu hutvā vivaraṃ dassesi.
atk-s0513a4:3130_21: iminā chiddena palāyissāmī”ti karīsamaggaṃ sīsena pahari.
atk-s0513a4:3130_22: Tassa sambādhaṭṭhānena vegena nikkhantassa sinnasarīrassa sabbāni lomāni karīsamagge laggāni,
atk-s0513a4:3130_24: So “lobhaṃ nissāya mayā idaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhūtaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:3130_25: na dāni imaṃ aniggahetvā gocaraṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti cintetvā taṃ assamaṃ gantvā lobhaniggahatthāya uposathaṃ samādiyitvā ekamantaṃ nipajji.
atk-s0513a4:3131_0: Acchopi araññā nikkhamitvā atricchābhibhūto mallaraṭṭhe paccantagāmaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a4:3131_1: Gāmavāsino “accho kira āgato”ti dhanudaṇḍādihatthā nikkhamitvā tena paviṭṭhaṃ gumbaṃ parivāresuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3131_2: So mahājanena parivāritabhāvaṃ ñatvā nikkhamitvā palāyi,
atk-s0513a4:3131_3: palāyantameva taṃ dhanūhi ceva daṇḍādīhi ca pothesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3131_4: So bhinnena sīsena lohitena galantena attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā “idaṃ dukkhaṃ mama atricchālobhavasena uppannaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:3131_5: na dāni imaṃ aniggahetvā gocaraṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti cintetvā taṃ assamaṃ gantvā atricchāniggahāya uposathaṃ samādiyitvā ekamantaṃ nipajji.
atk-s0513a4:3132_0: Tāpasopi attano jātiṃ nissāya mānavasiko hutvā jhānaṃ uppādetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0513a4:3132_1: Atheko paccekabuddho tassa mānanissitabhāvaṃ ñatvā “ayaṃ na lāmakasatto,
atk-s0513a4:3132_4: imassa mānaniggahaṃ katvā samāpattinibbattanākāraṃ karissāmī”ti tasmiṃ paṇṇasālāya nisinneyeva uttarahimavantato āgantvā tassa pāsāṇaphalake nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:3132_5: So nikkhamitvā taṃ attano āsane nisinnaṃ disvā mānanissitabhāvena anattamano hutvā taṃ upasaṅkamitvā accharaṃ paharitvā “nassa, vasala,
atk-s0513a4:3132_13: pāramiyo pūretvā āgato aññaṃ ettakaṃ nāma kālaṃ atikkamitvā buddho bhavissasi,
atk-s0513a4:3132_14: buddhattabhāve ṭhito siddhattho nāma bhavissasī”ti nāmañca gottañca kulañca aggasāvakādayo ca sabbe ācikkhitvā
atk-s0513a4:3132_17: So tena evaṃ vuttopi neva naṃ vandi,
atk-s0513a4:3132_19: Atha naṃ paccekabuddho “tava jātiyā mama guṇānaṃ mahantabhāvaṃ jāna,
atk-s0513a4:3132_21: ahaṃ viya ākāse vicarāhī”ti vatvā ākāse uppatitvā attano pādapaṃsuṃ tassa jaṭāmaṇḍale vikiranto uttarahimavantameva gato.
atk-s0513a4:3133_0: Tāpaso tassa gatakāle saṃvegappatto hutvā “ayaṃ samaṇo evaṃ garusarīro vātamukhe khittatūlapicu viya ākāse pakkhando,
atk-s0513a4:3133_1: ahaṃ jātimānena evarūpassa paccekabuddhassa neva pāde vandiṃ,
atk-s0513a4:3133_5: ayaṃ kho pana me māno vaḍḍhanto nirayaṃ upanessati,
atk-s0513a4:3133_6: na idāni imaṃ mānaṃ aniggahetvā phalāphalatthāya gamissāmī”ti paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā mānaniggahāya uposathaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3133_7: samādāya kaṭṭhattharikāya nisinno mahāñāṇo kulaputto mānaṃ niggahetvā kasiṇaṃ vaḍḍhetvā abhiññā ca samāpattiyo
atk-s0513a4:3133_8: ca nibbattetvā nikkhamitvā caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ pāsāṇaphalake nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:3133_9: Atha naṃ kapotādayo upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3133_10: Mahāsatto kapotaṃ pucchi “tvaṃ aññesu divasesu na imāya velāya āgacchasi,
atk-s0513a4:3133_12: kiṃ nu kho ajja uposathiko jātosī”ti?
atk-s0513a4:3133_14: Atha naṃ “kena kāraṇenā”ti pucchanto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:3135_0: “Appossukko dāni tuvaṃ kapota, vihaṅgama na tava bhojanattho;
atk-s0513a4:3136_0: Khudaṃ pipāsaṃ adhivāsayanto, kasmā bhavaṃposathiko kapotā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3137_0: Tattha appossukkoti nirālayo. Na tava bhojanatthoti kiṃ ajja tava bhojanena attho natthi.
atk-s0513a4:3138_0: Taṃ sutvā kapoto dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:3140_0: “Ahaṃ pure giddhigato kapotiyā, asmiṃ padesasmimubho ramāma;
atk-s0513a4:3141_0: Athaggahī sākuṇiko kapotiṃ, akāmako tāya vinā ahosiṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3144_0: Tasmā ahaṃposathaṃ pālayāmi, rāgo mamaṃ mā punarāgamāsī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3145_0: Tattha ramāmāti imasmiṃ bhūmibhāge kāmaratiyā ramāma. Sākuṇikoti senasakuṇo.
atk-s0513a4:3146_0: Kapotena attano uposathakamme vaṇṇite mahāsatto sappādīsu ekekaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0513a4:3149_0: Khudaṃ pipāsaṃ adhivāsayanto, kasmā bhavaṃposathiko nu dīgha.
atk-s0513a4:3152_0: So maṃ akkami taṃ kupito aḍaṃsiṃ, dukkhābhituṇṇo maraṇaṃ upāgā.
atk-s0513a4:3154_0: “Tato janā nikkhamitvāna gāmā, kanditvā roditvā apakkamiṃsu;
atk-s0513a4:3155_0: Tasmā ahaṃposathaṃ pālayāmi, kodho mamaṃ mā punarāgamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:3157_0: “Matāna maṃsāni bahū susāne, manuññarūpaṃ tava bhojane taṃ;
atk-s0513a4:3158_0: Khudaṃ pipāsaṃ adhivāsayanto, kasmā bhavaṃposathiko siṅgāla.
atk-s0513a4:3160_0: “Pavisi kucchiṃ mahato gajassa, kuṇape rato hatthimaṃsesu giddho;
atk-s0513a4:3161_0: Uṇho ca vāto tikhiṇā ca rasmiyo, te sosayuṃ tassa karīsamaggaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3163_0: “Kiso ca paṇḍū ca ahaṃ bhadante, na me ahū nikkhamanāya maggo;
atk-s0513a4:3164_0: Mahā ca megho sahasā pavassi, so temayī tassa karīsamaggaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3166_0: “Tato ahaṃ nikkhamisaṃ bhadante, cando yathā rāhumukhā pamutto;
atk-s0513a4:3167_0: Tasmā ahaṃposathaṃ pālayāmi, lobho mamaṃ mā punarāgamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:3170_0: Khudaṃ pipāsaṃ adhivāsayanto, kasmā bhavaṃposathiko nu accha.
atk-s0513a4:3173_0: Tato janā nikkhamitvāna gāmā, kodaṇḍakena paripothayiṃsu maṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3176_0: Tasmā ahaṃposathaṃ pālayāmi, atricchatā mā punarāgamāsī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3177_2: Dukkhābhituṇṇoti so usabho dukkhena abhituṇṇo āturo hutvā.
atk-s0513a4:3178_0: Evaṃ te cattāropi attano uposathakammaṃ vaṇṇetvā uṭṭhāya mahāsattaṃ vanditvā “bhante,
atk-s0513a4:3178_1: tumhe aññesu divasesu imāya velāya phalāphalatthāya gacchatha,
atk-s0513a4:3178_2: ajja agantvā kasmā uposathikatthā”ti pucchantā gāthamāhaṃsu –
atk-s0513a4:3180_0: “Yaṃ no apucchittha tuvaṃ bhadante, sabbeva byākarimha yathāpajānaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:3181_0: Mayampi pucchāma tuvaṃ bhadante, kasmā bhavaṃposathiko nu brahme”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3185_0: So maṃ avedī gatimāgatiñca, nāmañca gottaṃ caraṇañca sabbaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3187_0: “Evampahaṃ na vandi tassa pāde, na cāpi naṃ mānagatena pucchiṃ;
atk-s0513a4:3188_0: Tasmā ahaṃposathaṃ pālayāmi, māno mamaṃ mā punarāgamāsī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3189_0: Tattha yaṃ noti yaṃ atthaṃ tvaṃ amhe apucchi.
atk-s0513a4:3189_1: Yathāpajānanti attano pajānananiyāmena taṃ mayaṃ byākarimha.
atk-s0513a4:3189_3: So maṃ avedīti so mama idāni gantabbaṭṭhānañca gataṭṭhānañca “anāgate tvaṃ evaṃnāmo buddho bhavissasi evaṃgotto,
atk-s0513a4:3189_4: evarūpaṃ te sīlacaraṇaṃ bhavissatī”ti evaṃ nāmañca gottañca caraṇañca sabbaṃ maṃ avedi jānāpesi,
atk-s0513a4:3189_6: Evampahaṃ na vandīti evaṃ kathentassapi tassa ahaṃ attano mānaṃ nissāya pāde na vandinti.
atk-s0513a4:3190_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto attano uposathakāraṇaṃ kathetvā te ovaditvā uyyojetvā paṇṇasālaṃ pāvisi,
atk-s0513a4:3190_3: itare ca tassovāde ṭhatvā saggaparāyaṇā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3195_0: Sace hi tyāhaṃ dhanahetu gāhitoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:3195_1: Tañhi bhikkhuṃ satthā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ ukkaṇṭhitosī”ti pucchitvā “saccaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:3195_2: bhante”ti vutte “bhikkhu ayaṃ nandīrāgo tādisaṃ kiṃ nāma nālolessati,
atk-s0513a4:3195_3: na hi sineruubbāhanakavāto sāmante purāṇapaṇṇassa lajjati,
atk-s0513a4:3195_4: pubbe satta vassasatāni antokilesasamudācāraṃ vāretvā viharante visuddhasattepesa ālolesiyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:3196_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto paccantapadese morasakuṇiyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0513a4:3196_1: Gabbhe paripākagate mātā gocarabhūmiyaṃ aṇḍaṃ pātetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a4:3196_2: Aṇḍañca nāma mātu arogabhāve sati aññasmiṃ dīghajātikādiparipanthe ca avijjamāne na nassati.
atk-s0513a4:3196_3: Tasmā taṃ aṇḍaṃ kaṇikāramakulaṃ viya suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ hutvā pariṇatakāle attano dhammatāya bhijji,
atk-s0513a4:3196_7: tisso rattarājiyo gīvaṃ parikkhipitvā piṭṭhimajjhena agamaṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3196_9: Taṃ sabbe nīlamorā sannipatitvā rājānaṃ katvā parivārayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3197_0: So ekadivasaṃ udakasoṇḍiyaṃ pānīyaṃ pivanto attano rūpasampattiṃ disvā cintesi “ahaṃ sabbamorehi atirekarūpasobho,
atk-s0513a4:3197_4: So rattibhāge moresu paṭisallīnesu kañci ajānāpetvā uppatitvā himavantaṃ pavisitvā tisso pabbatarājiyo
atk-s0513a4:3197_5: atikkamma catutthāya pabbatarājiyā ekasmiṃ araññe padumasañchanno jātassaro atthi,
atk-s0513a4:3197_6: tassa avidūre ekaṃ pabbataṃ nissāya ṭhito mahānigrodharukkho atthi,
atk-s0513a4:3197_8: Tassa pana pabbatassa vemajjhe manāpā guhā atthi.
atk-s0513a4:3197_9: So tattha vasitukāmo hutvā tassā pamukhe pabbatatale nilīyi.
atk-s0513a4:3197_10: Taṃ pana ṭhānaṃ neva heṭṭhābhāgena abhiruhituṃ,
atk-s0513a4:3197_13: So “idaṃ me phāsukaṭṭhāna”nti taṃ divasaṃ tattheva vasitvā punadivase pabbataguhāto uṭṭhāya pabbatamatthake
atk-s0513a4:3197_14: puratthābhimukho nisinno udentaṃ sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ disvā attano divārakkhāvaraṇatthāya “udetayaṃ cakkhumā
atk-s0513a4:3197_15: ekarājā”ti parittaṃ katvā gocarabhūmiyaṃ otaritvā gocaraṃ gahetvā sāyaṃ āgantvā pabbatamatthake pacchābhimukho
atk-s0513a4:3197_16: nisinno atthaṅgataṃ sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ disvā attano rattirakkhāvaraṇatthāya “apetayaṃ cakkhumā ekarājā”ti
atk-s0513a4:3198_0: Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ eko luddaputto araññe vicaranto pabbatamatthake nisinnaṃ moraṃ disvā attano nivesanaṃ āgantvā maraṇāsannakāle puttaṃ āha – “tāta,
atk-s0513a4:3198_1: catutthāya pabbatarājiyā araññe suvaṇṇavaṇṇo moro atthi,
atk-s0513a4:3198_4: Athekasmiṃ divase bārāṇasirañño khemā nāma aggamahesī paccūsakāle supinaṃ passi.
atk-s0513a4:3198_11: pabujjhitvā ca pana supinabhāvaṃ ñatvā “supinoti vutte rājā na ādaraṃ karissati,
atk-s0513a4:3198_12: ‘dohaḷo me’ti vutte karissatī”ti cintetvā dohaḷinī viya hutvā nipajji.
atk-s0513a4:3198_23: labhissasī”ti rājā naṃ assāsetvā gantvā rājāsane nisinno amacce pucchi “ambho,
atk-s0513a4:3199_2: thalajesu migā haṃsā morā tittirā ete tiracchānagatā ca manussā ca suvaṇṇavaṇṇā hontīti amhākaṃ lakkhaṇamantesu āgata”nti.
atk-s0513a4:3199_3: Rājā attano vijite luddaputte sannipātetvā “suvaṇṇavaṇṇo moro vo diṭṭhapubbo”ti pucchi.
atk-s0513a4:3199_5: Yassa pana pitarā ācikkhitaṃ, so āha –
atk-s0513a4:3199_7: pitā pana me ‘asukaṭṭhāne nāma suvaṇṇavaṇṇo moro atthī’ti kathesī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3199_9: mayhañca deviyā ca jīvitaṃ dinnaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0513a4:3199_10: gantvā taṃ bandhitvā ānehī”ti bahuṃ dhanaṃ datvā uyyojesi.
atk-s0513a4:3199_11: So puttadārassa dhanaṃ datvā tattha gantvā mahāsattaṃ disvā pāse oḍḍetvā “ajja bajjhissati,
atk-s0513a4:3199_14: Rājā “taṃ moraṃ nissāya piyabhariyā me matā”ti kujjhitvā kodhavasiko hutvā “himavante catutthāya pabbatarājiyā suvaṇṇavaṇṇo moro carati,
atk-s0513a4:3199_15: tassa maṃsaṃ khāditvā ajarā amarā hontī”ti suvaṇṇapaṭṭe likhāpetvā taṃ paṭṭaṃ sāramañjūsāyaṃ ṭhapetvā kālamakāsi.
atk-s0513a4:3200_1: So suvaṇṇapaṭṭe akkharāni disvā “ajaro amaro bhavissāmī”ti tassa gahaṇatthāya ekaṃ luddaputtaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0513a4:3200_5: Sattamena pana raññā pesito sattamo luddo “ajja ajjevā”ti satta saṃvaccharāni bajjhituṃ asakkonto cintesi
atk-s0513a4:3200_6: “kiṃ nu kho imassa morarājassa pāde pāsassa asañcaraṇakāraṇa”nti?
atk-s0513a4:3200_7: Atha naṃ pariggaṇhanto sāyaṃpātaṃ parittaṃ karontaṃ disvā “imasmiṃ ṭhāne añño moro natthi,
atk-s0513a4:3200_9: brahmacariyānubhāvena ceva parittānubhāvena cassa pādo pāse na bajjhatī”ti nayato pariggahetvā paccantajanapadaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3200_10: gantvā ekaṃ moriṃ bandhitvā yathā sā accharāya pahaṭāya vassati,
atk-s0513a4:3200_12: evaṃ sikkhāpetvā ādāya gantvā bodhisattassa parittakaraṇato puretarameva pāsaṃ oḍḍetvā accharaṃ paharitvā moriṃ vassāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:3200_14: tāvadevassa satta vassasatāni sannisinnakileso phaṇaṃ karitvā daṇḍena pahaṭāsīviso viya uṭṭhahi.
atk-s0513a4:3200_15: So kilesāturo hutvā parittaṃ kātuṃ asakkuṇitvāva vegena tassā santikaṃ gantvā pāse pādaṃ pavesentoyeva ākāsā otari.
atk-s0513a4:3200_16: Satta vassasatāni asañcaraṇakapāso taṅkhaṇaññeva sañcaritvā pādaṃ bandhi.
atk-s0513a4:3201_0: Atha naṃ luddaputto yaṭṭhiagge olambantaṃ disvā cintesi “imaṃ morarājaṃ cha luddaputtā bandhituṃ nāsakkhiṃsu,
atk-s0513a4:3201_2: ajja panesa imaṃ moriṃ nissāya kilesāturo hutvā parittaṃ kātuṃ asakkuṇitvā āgamma pāse baddho heṭṭhāsīsako olambati,
atk-s0513a4:3201_7: Puna cintesi “ayaṃ nāgabalo thāmasampanno mayi upasaṅkamante ‘esa maṃ māretuṃ āgacchatī’ti maraṇabhayatajjito
atk-s0513a4:3201_8: phandamāno pādaṃ vā pakkhaṃ vā bhindeyya,
atk-s0513a4:3201_9: anupagantvā pana paṭicchanne ṭhatvā khurappenassa pāsaṃ chindissāmi,
atk-s0513a4:3201_11: So paṭicchanne ṭhatvā dhanuṃ āropetvā khurappaṃ sannayhitvā ākaḍḍhi.
atk-s0513a4:3201_12: Moropi “ayaṃ luddako maṃ kilesāturaṃ katvā baddhabhāvaṃ ñatvā nirāsaṅko āgacchissati,
atk-s0513a4:3201_13: kahaṃ nu kho so”ti cintetvā ito cito ca viloketvā dhanuṃ āropetvā ṭhitaṃ disvā “māretvā maṃ ādāya gantukāmo
atk-s0513a4:3201_14: bhavissatī”ti maññamāno maraṇabhayatajjito hutvā jīvitaṃ yācanto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:3203_0: “Sace hi tyāhaṃ dhanahetu gāhito, mā maṃ vadhī jīvagāhaṃ gahetvā;
atk-s0513a4:3204_0: Rañño ca maṃ samma upantikaṃ nehi, maññe dhanaṃ lacchasinapparūpa”nti.
atk-s0513a4:3205_0: Tattha sace hi tyāhanti sace hi te ahaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3208_0: “Na me ayaṃ tuyha vadhāya ajja, samāhito cāpadhure khurappo;
atk-s0513a4:3209_0: Pāsañca tyāhaṃ adhipātayissaṃ, yathāsukhaṃ gacchatu morarājā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3213_0: “Yaṃ satta vassāni mamānubandhi, rattindivaṃ khuppipāsaṃ sahanto;
atk-s0513a4:3214_0: Atha kissa maṃ pāsavasūpanītaṃ, pamuttave icchasi bandhanasmā.
atk-s0513a4:3216_0: “Pāṇātipātā virato nusajja, abhayaṃ nu te sabbabhūtesu dinnaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:3217_0: Yaṃ maṃ tuvaṃ pāsavasūpanītaṃ, pamuttave icchasi bandhanasmā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3218_0: Tattha yanti yasmā maṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ tvaṃ anubandhi,
atk-s0513a4:3218_2: atha kissa maṃ pāsavasaṃ upanītaṃ bandhanasmā pamocetuṃ icchasīti attho.
atk-s0513a4:3221_0: “Pāṇātipātā viratassa brūhi, abhayañca yo sabbabhūtesu deti;
atk-s0513a4:3222_0: Pucchāmi taṃ morarājetamatthaṃ, ito cuto kiṃ labhate sukhaṃ so.
atk-s0513a4:3224_0: “Pāṇātipātā viratassa brūmi, abhayañca yo sabbabhūtesu deti;
atk-s0513a4:3225_0: Diṭṭheva dhamme labhate pasaṃsaṃ, saggañca so yāti sarīrabhedā.
atk-s0513a4:3227_0: “Na santi devā iti āhu eke, idheva jīvo vibhavaṃ upeti;
atk-s0513a4:3228_0: Tathā phalaṃ sukatadukkaṭānaṃ, dattupaññattañca vadanti dānaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:3229_0: Tesaṃ vaco arahataṃ saddahāno, tasmā ahaṃ sakuṇe bādhayāmī”ti. –
atk-s0513a4:3231_0: Tattha iti āhu eketi ekacce samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṃ kathenti.
atk-s0513a4:3231_1: Tesaṃ vaco arahataṃ saddahānoti tassa kira kulūpakā ucchedavādino naggasamaṇakā.
atk-s0513a4:3231_2: Te taṃ paccekabodhiñāṇassa upanissayasampannampi sattaṃ ucchedavādaṃ gaṇhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3231_3: So tehi saṃsaggena “kusalākusalaṃ natthī”ti gahetvā sakuṇe māreti.
atk-s0513a4:3232_0: Taṃ sutvā mahāsatto “tasseva paralokassa atthibhāvaṃ kathessāmī”ti pāsayaṭṭhiyaṃ adhosiro olambamānova imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:3234_0: “Cando ca suriyo ca ubho sudassanā, gacchanti obhāsayamantalikkhe;
atk-s0513a4:3235_0: Imassa lokassa parassa vā te, kathaṃ nu te āhu manussaloke”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3236_0: Tattha imassāti kiṃ nu te imassa lokassa santi,
atk-s0513a4:3236_3: Kathaṃ nu teti etesu vimānesu candimasūriyadevaputte kathaṃ nu kathenti,
atk-s0513a4:3239_0: “Cando ca suriyo ca ubho sudassanā, gacchanti obhāsayamantalikkhe;
atk-s0513a4:3240_0: Parassa lokassa na te imassa, devāti te āhu manussaloke”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3243_0: “Ettheva te nīhatā hīnavādā, ahetukā ye na vadanti kammaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:3244_0: Tathā phalaṃ sukatadukkaṭānaṃ, dattupaññattaṃ ye ca vadanti dāna”nti.
atk-s0513a4:3245_0: Tattha ettheva te nihatā hīnavādāti sace candimasūriyā devaloke ṭhitā,
atk-s0513a4:3245_4: ettheva ettake byākaraṇe te tava kulūpakā hīnavādā nīhatā honti.
atk-s0513a4:3245_5: Ahetukā “visuddhiyā vā saṃkilesassa vā hetubhūtaṃ kammaṃ natthī”ti evaṃvādā.
atk-s0513a4:3245_6: Dattupaññattanti ye ca dānaṃ “bālakehi paññatta”nti vadanti.
atk-s0513a4:3248_0: “Addhā hi saccaṃ vacanaṃ tavedaṃ, kathañhi dānaṃ aphalaṃ bhaveyya;
atk-s0513a4:3249_0: Tathā phalaṃ sukatadukkaṭānaṃ, dattupaññattañca kathaṃ bhaveyya.
atk-s0513a4:3251_0: “Kathaṃkaro kintikaro kimācaraṃ, kiṃ sevamāno kena tapoguṇena;
atk-s0513a4:3252_0: Akkhāhi me morarājetamatthaṃ, yathā ahaṃ no nirayaṃ pateyya”nti.
atk-s0513a4:3253_0: Tattha dattupaññattañcāti dānañca dattupaññattaṃ nāma kathaṃ bhaveyyāti attho.
atk-s0513a4:3253_2: Kintikaroti kena kāraṇena karonto ahaṃ nirayaṃ na gaccheyyaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3254_0: Taṃ sutvā mahāsatto “sacāhaṃ imaṃ pañhaṃ na kathessāmi,
atk-s0513a4:3254_2: tathevassa dhammikānaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ atthibhāvaṃ kathessāmī”ti cintetvā dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:3256_0: “Ye keci atthi samaṇā pathabyā, kāsāyavatthā anagāriyā te;
atk-s0513a4:3257_0: Pātova piṇḍāya caranti kāle, vikālacariyā viratā hi santo.
atk-s0513a4:3259_0: “Te tattha kālenupasaṅkamitvā, pucchāhi yaṃ te manaso piyaṃ siyā;
atk-s0513a4:3260_0: Te te pavakkhanti yathāpajānaṃ, imassa lokassa parassa cattha”nti.
atk-s0513a4:3261_1: Yathāpajānanti te tuyhaṃ attano pajānananiyāmena vakkhanti,
atk-s0513a4:3261_3: Imassa lokassa parassa catthanti iminā nāma kammena manussaloke nibbattanti,
atk-s0513a4:3261_5: iminā nirayādīsūti evaṃ imassa ca parassa ca lokassa atthaṃ ācikkhissanti,
atk-s0513a4:3262_1: So pana pūritapāramī paccekabodhisatto sūriyarasmisamphassaṃ oloketvā ṭhitaṃ pariṇatapadumaṃ viya paripākagatañāṇo vicarati.
atk-s0513a4:3262_2: So tassa dhammakathaṃ suṇanto ṭhitapadeneva ṭhito saṅkhāre pariggaṇhitvā tilakkhaṇaṃ sammasanto paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ paṭivijjhi.
atk-s0513a4:3262_3: Tassa paṭivedho ca mahāsattassa pāsato mokkho ca ekakkhaṇeyeva ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:3262_4: Paccekabuddho sabbakilese padāletvā bhavapariyante ṭhitova udānaṃ udānanto gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:3264_0: “Tacaṃva jiṇṇaṃ urago purāṇaṃ, paṇḍūpalāsaṃ harito dumova;
atk-s0513a4:3266_1: yathā jiṇṇaṃ purāṇaṃ tacaṃ urago jahati,
atk-s0513a4:3266_2: yathā ca harito sampajjamānanīlapatto dumo katthaci ṭhitaṃ paṇḍupalāsaṃ jahati,
atk-s0513a4:3266_3: evaṃ ahampi ajja luddabhāvaṃ dāruṇabhāvaṃ jahitvā ṭhito,
atk-s0513a4:3266_4: so dāni esa pahīno mama luddabhāvo,
atk-s0513a4:3267_0: So imaṃ udānaṃ udānetvā “ahaṃ tāva sabbakilesabandhanehi mutto,
atk-s0513a4:3267_1: nivesane pana me bandhitvā ṭhapitā bahū sakuṇā atthi,
atk-s0513a4:3267_2: te kathaṃ mocessāmī”ti cintetvā mahāsattaṃ pucchi –
atk-s0513a4:3267_4: nivesane me bahū sakuṇā baddhā atthi,
atk-s0513a4:3267_7: tena naṃ āha “yaṃ vo maggena kilese khaṇḍetvā paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ paṭividdhaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:3267_9: sakalajambudīpe bandhanagato satto nāma na bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3267_10: So bodhisattena dinnanayadvāre ṭhatvā saccakiriyaṃ karonto gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:3269_0: “Ye cāpi me sakuṇā atthi baddhā, satāninekāni nivesanasmiṃ;
atk-s0513a4:3270_0: Tesampahaṃ jīvitamajja dammi, mokkhañca te pattā sakaṃ niketa”nti.
atk-s0513a4:3271_0: Tattha mokkhañca te pattāti svāhaṃ mokkhaṃ patto paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ paṭivijjhitvā ṭhito,
atk-s0513a4:3271_3: Sakaṃ niketanti sabbepi te sattā attano attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gacchantūti vadati.
atk-s0513a4:3272_0: Athassa saccakiriyāsamakālameva sabbe bandhanā muccitvā tuṭṭhiravaṃ ravantā sakaṭṭhānameva agamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3272_1: Tasmiṃ khaṇe tesaṃ tesaṃ gehesu biḷāle ādiṃ katvā sakalajambudīpe bandhanagato satto nāma nāhosi.
atk-s0513a4:3272_5: So saṭṭhivassikatthero viya ākappasampanno aṭṭhaparikkhāradharo hutvā “tvameva mama patiṭṭhā ahosī”ti
atk-s0513a4:3272_6: morarājassa añjaliṃ paggayha padakkhiṇaṃ katvā ākāse uppatitvā nandamūlakapabbhāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:3272_7: Morarājāpi yaṭṭhiaggato uppatitvā gocaraṃ gahetvā attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a4:3272_8: Idāni luddassa satta vassāni pāsahatthassa caritvāpi morarājānaṃ nissāya dukkhā muttabhāvaṃ pakāsento satthā osānagāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:3274_0: “Luddo carī pāsahattho araññe, bādhetu morādhipatiṃ yasassiṃ;
atk-s0513a4:3275_0: Bandhitvā morādhipatiṃ yasassiṃ, dukkhā sa pamucci yathāhaṃ pamutto”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3276_2: Bandhitvāti bandhitvā ṭhitassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaṃvego hutvāti attho.
atk-s0513a4:3277_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a4:3281_0: Yadesamānā vicarimhāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto dve mahallakatthere ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:3281_1: Mahākosalo kira rañño bimbisārassa dhītaraṃ dento dhītu nhānīyamūlatthāya kāsigāmaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a4:3281_2: Pasenadi rājā ajātasattunā pitari mārite taṃ gāmaṃ acchindi.
atk-s0513a4:3281_3: Tesu tassatthāya yujjhantesu paṭhamaṃ ajātasattussa jayo ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:3281_4: Kosalarājā parājayappatto amacce pucchi “kena nu kho upāyena ajātasattuṃ gaṇheyyāmā”ti. Mahārāja,
atk-s0513a4:3281_6: carapurise pesetvā vihāre bhikkhūnaṃ kathaṃ pariggaṇhituṃ vaṭṭatīti.
atk-s0513a4:3281_8: tumhe vihāraṃ gantvā paṭicchannā hutvā bhadantānaṃ kathaṃ pariggaṇhathā”ti carapurise payojesi.
atk-s0513a4:3281_10: Tesu dve mahallakattherā vihārapaccante paṇṇasālāyaṃ vasanti,
atk-s0513a4:3282_6: lālako vatāyaṃ kosalarājā cāṭimattabhojanameva bhuñjituṃ jānātī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3282_11: Tesu bhāgineyyaṃ ajātasattuṃ gaṇhantena sakaṭabyūhaṃ katvā gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0513a4:3282_12: asukasmiṃ nāma pabbatakaṇṇe dvīsu passesu sūrapurise ṭhapetvā purato balaṃ dassetvā anto paviṭṭhabhāvaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3282_13: ñatvā naditvā vaggitvā kumine paviṭṭhamacchaṃ viya antomuṭṭhiyaṃ katvāva naṃ gahetuṃ sakkā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3283_0: Payojitapurisā taṃ kathaṃ sutvā rañño ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3283_1: Rājā mahatiyā senāya gantvā tathā katvā ajātasattuṃ gahetvā saṅkhalikabandhanena bandhitvā katipāhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3283_2: nimmadaṃ katvā “puna evarūpaṃ mā karī”ti assāsetvā mocetvā dhītaraṃ vajirakumāriṃ nāma tassa datvā mahantena
atk-s0513a4:3283_4: “Kosalaraññā dhanuggahatissattherassa saṃvidhānena ajātasattu gahito”ti bhikkhūnaṃ antare kathā samuṭṭhahi,
atk-s0513a4:3283_8: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a4:3283_10: pubbepi dhanuggahatisso yuddhasaṃvidhāne chekoyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:3284_0: Atīte bārāṇasinagarassa dvāragāmavāsī eko vaḍḍhakī dāruatthāya araññaṃ gantvā āvāṭe patitaṃ ekaṃ sūkarapotakaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3284_7: Atha vaḍḍhakī tasmiṃ puttapemaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā “imaṃ idha vasantaṃ kocideva hiṃseyyā”ti araññe vissajjesi.
atk-s0513a4:3284_8: So cintesi “ahaṃ imasmiṃ araññe ekakova vasituṃ na sakkhissāmi,
atk-s0513a4:3284_10: So vanaghaṭāya sūkare pariyesanto bahū sūkare disvā tussitvā tisso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:3287_0: Anvesaṃ vicariṃ ñātī, teme adhigatā mayā.
atk-s0513a4:3294_0: Tattha yadesamānāti yaṃ ñātigaṇaṃ pariyesantā mayaṃ vicarimha.
atk-s0513a4:3295_0: Sūkarā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā catutthaṃ gāthamāhaṃsu –
atk-s0513a4:3297_0: “Aññampi leṇaṃ pariyesa, sattu no idha vijjati;
atk-s0513a4:3298_0: So taccha sūkare hanti, idhāgantvā varaṃ vara”nti.
atk-s0513a4:3299_0: Tattha tacchāti taṃ nāmenālapanti. Varaṃ varanti sūkare hananto thūlamaṃsaṃ varaṃ varaññeva hanati.
atk-s0513a4:3302_0: “Ko numhākaṃ idha sattu, ko ñātī susamāgate;
atk-s0513a4:3303_0: Duppadhaṃse padhaṃseti, taṃ me akkhātha pucchitā.
atk-s0513a4:3306_0: So taccha sūkare hanti, idhāgantvā varaṃ varaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3308_0: “Na no dāṭhā na vijjanti, balaṃ kāye samohitaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:3309_0: Sabbe samaggā hutvāna, vasaṃ kāhāma ekakaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3312_0: Yopi yuddhe palāyeyya, tampi pacchā hanāmase”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3313_0: Tattha ko numhākanti ahaṃ tumhe disvāva “ime sūkarā appamaṃsalohitā,
atk-s0513a4:3313_6: Yopīti yo amhākaṃ antare ekopi palāyissati,
atk-s0513a4:3314_0: Tacchasūkaro sabbe sūkare ekacitte katvā pucchi “kāya velāya byaggho āgamissatī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3314_3: So yuddhakusalo “imasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhitena sakkā jetu”nti bhūmisīsaṃ pajānāti,
atk-s0513a4:3314_4: tasmā ekaṃ padesaṃ sallakkhetvā rattimeva sūkare gocaraṃ gāhāpetvā balavapaccūsato paṭṭhāya “yuddhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3314_5: nāma sakaṭabyūhādivasena tividhaṃ hotī”ti vatvā padumabyūhaṃ saṃvidahati.
atk-s0513a4:3314_13: tato tattha tattha dasavaggaṃ vīsativaggaṃ tiṃsavaggañca katvā balagumbaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a4:3314_15: byagghassa patanatthāya ekaṃ suppasaṇṭhānaṃ pabbhāraṃ katvā khaṇāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:3314_16: Dvinnaṃ āvāṭānaṃ antare attano vasanatthāya pīṭhakaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a4:3314_17: So thāmasampanne yodhasūkare gahetvā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne sūkare assāsento vicari.
atk-s0513a4:3315_0: Atha byaggharājā kūṭajaṭilassa assamapadā nikkhamitvā pabbatatale aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:3315_1: Taṃ disvā sūkarā “āgato no bhante verī”ti vadiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3315_5: Byaggho sarīraṃ vidhunitvā osakkanto viya passāvamakāsi,
atk-s0513a4:3315_9: So tesaṃ kiriyaṃ disvā cintesi “na ime pubbasadisā,
atk-s0513a4:3315_10: ajja mayhaṃ paṭisattuno hutvā vaggavaggā ṭhitā,
atk-s0513a4:3315_12: ajja mayā etesaṃ santikaṃ gantuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti maraṇabhayatajjito nivattitvā kūṭajaṭilassa santikaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a4:3315_13: Atha naṃ so tucchahatthaṃ disvā navamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:3317_0: “Pāṇātipātā virato nu ajja, abhayaṃ nu te sabbabhūtesu dinnaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:3318_0: Dāṭhā nu te migavadhāya na santi, yo saṅghapatto kapaṇova jhāyasī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3319_0: Tattha saṅghapattoti yo tvaṃ sūkarasaṅghapatto hutvā kiñci gocaraṃ alabhitvā kapaṇo viya jhāyasīti.
atk-s0513a4:3322_0: “Na me dāṭhā na vijjanti, balaṃ kāye samohitaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:3323_0: Ñātī ca disvāna sāmaggī ekato, tasmā ca jhāyāmi vanamhi ekako.
atk-s0513a4:3325_0: “Imassudaṃ yanti disodisaṃ pure, bhayaṭṭitā leṇagavesino puthu;
atk-s0513a4:3326_0: Te dāni saṅgamma vasanti ekato, yatthaṭṭhitā duppasahajja te mayā.
atk-s0513a4:3329_0: Te maṃ samaggā hiṃseyyuṃ, tasmā nesaṃ na patthaye”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3330_0: Tattha sāmaggī ekatoti sahitā hutvā ekato ṭhite.
atk-s0513a4:3330_1: Imassudanti ime sudaṃ mayā akkhīni ummīletvā olokitamattāva pubbe disodisaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0513a4:3330_5: Tasmā nesaṃ na patthayeti tena kāraṇena etesaṃ na patthemi.
atk-s0513a4:3331_0: Taṃ sutvā kūṭajaṭilo tassa ussāhaṃ janayanto gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:3333_0: “Ekova indo asure jināti, ekova seno hanti dije pasayha;
atk-s0513a4:3334_0: Ekova byaggho migasaṅghapatto, varaṃ varaṃ hanti balañhi tādisa”nti.
atk-s0513a4:3335_0: Tattha migasaṅghapattoti migagaṇapatto hutvā varaṃ varaṃ migaṃ hanti.
atk-s0513a4:3338_0: “Na heva indo na seno, napi byaggho migādhipo;
atk-s0513a4:3339_0: Samagge sahite ñātī, na byagghe kurute vase”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3340_0: Tattha byaggheti byagghasadise hutvā sarīravidhūnanādīni katvā ṭhite vase na kurute,
atk-s0513a4:3340_1: attano vase vattāpetuṃ na sakkotīti attho.
atk-s0513a4:3341_0: Puna jaṭilo taṃ ussāhento dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:3347_0: Tañca seno nitāḷeti, veyyagghiyeva sā gatī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3348_2: Ḍayanti cāti gocaraṃ gahetvā ākāsena gacchanti.
atk-s0513a4:3348_3: Ekettha apasakkatīti eko etesu osakkitvā vā ekapassena vā visuṃ gacchati.
atk-s0513a4:3348_5: Veyyagghiyeva sā gatīti byagghānaṃ esāti veyyagghi,
atk-s0513a4:3348_6: samaggānaṃ gacchantānampi esā evarūpā gati byagghānaṃ gatiyeva nāma hoti.
atk-s0513a4:3348_7: Na hi sakkā sabbehi ekatova gantuṃ,
atk-s0513a4:3348_8: tasmā yo evaṃ tattha eko gacchati,
atk-s0513a4:3349_0: Evañca pana vatvā “byaggharāja tvaṃ attano balaṃ na jānāsi, mā bhāyi,
atk-s0513a4:3349_2: dve ekato gacchantā nāma na bhavissantī”ti ussāhesi.
atk-s0513a4:3352_0: Dāṭhī dāṭhīsu pakkhanti, maññamāno yathā pure”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3353_0: Tattha dāṭhīti sayaṃ dāṭhāvudho itaresu dāṭhāvudhesu pakkhandi.
atk-s0513a4:3354_0: So kira gantvā pabbatatale tāva aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:3354_3: So “mā bhāyathā”ti te assāsetvā uṭṭhāya dvinnaṃ āvāṭānaṃ antare pīṭhakāya aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:3354_4: Byaggho vegaṃ janetvā tacchasūkaraṃ sandhāya pakkhandi.
atk-s0513a4:3354_6: Byaggho ca vegaṃ sandhāretuṃ asakkonto gantvā suppapabbhāre āvāṭe patitvā puñjakitova aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:3354_7: Tacchasūkaro vegena uṭṭhāya tassa antarasatthimhi dāṭhaṃ otāretvā yāva hadayā phāletvā maṃsaṃ khāditvā
atk-s0513a4:3354_8: mukhena ḍaṃsitvā bahiāvāṭe pātetvā “gaṇhathimaṃ dāsa”nti āha.
atk-s0513a4:3354_10: pacchā āgatā alabhitvā “byagghamaṃsaṃ nāma kīdisa”nti vadiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3354_11: Tacchasūkaro āvāṭā uttaritvā sūkare oloketvā “kiṃ nu kho na tussathā”ti āha. “Sāmi,
atk-s0513a4:3354_17: gaṇhissāma na”nti tehi saddhiṃ vegena pakkhandi.
atk-s0513a4:3355_0: Jaṭilo “byaggho cirāyatī”ti tassa āgamanamaggaṃ olokento bahū sūkare āgacchante disvā “ime byagghaṃ māretvā
atk-s0513a4:3355_1: mama māraṇatthāya āgacchanti maññe”ti palāyitvā ekaṃ udumbararukkhaṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0513a4:3355_6: idāni naṃ gaṇhissāmā”ti taruṇasūkare pakkositvā rukkhamūlatā paṃsuṃ apabyūhāpesi,
atk-s0513a4:3355_10: Tato sesasūkare “tumhe apethā”ti ussāretvā jaṇṇukehi patiṭṭhahitvā dāṭhāya mūlaṃ pahari,
atk-s0513a4:3355_13: Taṃ kūṭajaṭilaṃ patantameva sampaṭicchitvā maṃsaṃ bhakkhesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3360_0: Ubhinnaṃ pana nesaṃ hatabhāvaṃ pakāsento satthā itaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:3364_0: Puna tacchasūkaro te pucchi “aññepi vo amittā atthī”ti?
atk-s0513a4:3364_2: sāmī”ti vatvā “taṃ abhisiñcitvā rājānaṃ karissāmā”ti udakaṃ pariyesantā jaṭilassa pānīyasaṅkhaṃ disvā
atk-s0513a4:3364_3: taṃ dakkhiṇāvaṭṭaṃ saṅkharatanaṃ pūretvā udakaṃ abhiharitvā tacchasūkaraṃ udumbararukkhamūleyeva abhisiñciṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3364_6: Tato paṭṭhāya udumbarabhaddapīṭhe nisīdāpetvā dakkhiṇāvaṭṭasaṅkhena abhisekakaraṇaṃ pavattaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3367_0: Tacchakaṃ abhisiñciṃsu, tvaṃ no rājāsi issaro”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3368_0: Tattha te sūti te sūkarā, su-kāro nipātamattaṃ. Udumbaramūlasminti udumbarassa mūle.
atk-s0513a4:3369_2: pubbepi dhanuggahatissatthero yuddhasaṃvidahane chekoyevā”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a4:3373_0: Vāṇijā samitiṃ katvāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sāvatthivāsino vāṇije ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:3373_1: Te kira vohāratthāya gacchantā satthu mahādānaṃ datvā saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāya “bhante,
atk-s0513a4:3373_3: puna tumhākaṃ pāde vandissāmā”ti vatvā pañcamattehi sakaṭasatehi nikkhamitvā kantāraṃ patvā maggaṃ asallakkhetvā
atk-s0513a4:3373_4: maggamūḷhā nirudake nirāhāre araññe vicarantā ekaṃ nāgapariggahitaṃ nigrodharukkhaṃ disvā sakaṭāni mocetvā
atk-s0513a4:3373_6: Te tassa udakatintāni viya nīlāni siniddhāni pattāni udakapuṇṇā viya ca sākhā disvā cintayiṃsu “imasmiṃ rukkhe udakaṃ sañcarantaṃ viya paññāyati,
atk-s0513a4:3373_11: Te tattha nhatvā pivitvā ca dakkhiṇasākhaṃ chindiṃsu,
atk-s0513a4:3373_17: Tāni gahetvā pañca sakaṭasatāni pūretvā sāvatthiṃ paccāgantvā dhanaṃ gopetvā gandhamālādihatthā jetavanaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3373_18: gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā pūjetvā ekamantaṃ nisinnā dhammakathaṃ sutvā nimantetvā punadivase mahādānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3373_20: imasmiṃ dāne amhākaṃ dhanadāyikāya rukkhadevatāya pattiṃ demā”ti pattiṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3373_23: Satthā “tumhe tāva mattaññutāya taṇhāvasikā ahutvā dhanaṃ labhittha,
atk-s0513a4:3373_24: pubbe pana amattaññutāya taṇhāvasikā dhanañca jīvitañca vijahiṃsū”ti vatvā tehi yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:3374_0: Atīte bārāṇasinagare tadeva pana kantāraṃ sveva nigrodho.
atk-s0513a4:3374_1: Vāṇijā maggamūḷhā hutvā tameva nigrodhaṃ passiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3374_2: Tamatthaṃ satthā abhisambuddho hutvā kathento imā gāthā āha –
atk-s0513a4:3382_0: “Te ca tattha nisīditvā, tassa rukkhassa chāyayā;
atk-s0513a4:3386_0: Iṅghassa purimaṃ sākhaṃ, mayaṃ chindāma vāṇijā.
atk-s0513a4:3388_0: “Sā ca chinnāva pagghari, acchaṃ vāriṃ anāvilaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:3389_0: Te tattha nhatvā pivitvā, yāvaticchiṃsu vāṇijā.
atk-s0513a4:3392_0: Iṅghassa dakkhiṇaṃ sākhaṃ, mayaṃ chindāma vāṇijā.
atk-s0513a4:3399_0: Iṅghassa pacchimaṃ sākhaṃ, mayaṃ chindāma vāṇijā.
atk-s0513a4:3409_0: Iṅghassa uttaraṃ sākhaṃ, mayaṃ chindāma vāṇijā.
atk-s0513a4:3411_0: “Sā ca chinnāva pagghari, muttā veḷuriyā bahū;
atk-s0513a4:3415_0: Te tattha bhāre bandhitvā, yāvaticchiṃsu vāṇijā.
atk-s0513a4:3418_0: Iṅghassa mūlaṃ chindāma, api bhiyyo labhāmase.
atk-s0513a4:3421_0: Nigrodho kiṃ parajjhati, vāṇijā bhaddamatthu te.
atk-s0513a4:3424_0: Nāridā pacchimā sākhā, sabbakāme ca uttarā;
atk-s0513a4:3425_0: Nigrodho kiṃ parajjhati, vāṇijā bhaddamatthu te.
atk-s0513a4:3428_0: Na tassa sākhaṃ bhañjeyya, mittadubbho hi pāpako.
atk-s0513a4:3432_0: Tattha samitiṃ katvāti bārāṇasiyaṃ samāgamaṃ katvā,
atk-s0513a4:3432_2: Pakkamiṃsūti pañcahi sakaṭasatehi bārāṇaseyyakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ ādāya pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3432_5: Allāyateti udakabharito viya allo hutvā paññāyati.
atk-s0513a4:3432_6: Chinnāva paggharīti eko rukkhārohanakusalo abhiruhitvā taṃ chindi,
atk-s0513a4:3433_3: Vāṇijā ekāti ekekassa vāṇijassa yattakā vāṇijā,
atk-s0513a4:3433_7: Tāhi pana saddhiṃyeva nāgānubhāvena sāṇivitānasayanādīni pagghariṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3434_3: Uddiyāni ca kambalāti uddiyāni nāma kambalā atthi.
atk-s0513a4:3434_4: Te tattha bhāre bandhitvāti yāvatakaṃ icchiṃsu,
atk-s0513a4:3434_5: tāvatakaṃ gahetvā pañca sakaṭasatāni pūretvāti attho.
atk-s0513a4:3434_6: Vāṇijā bhaddamatthu teti ekekaṃ vāṇijaṃ ālapanto “bhaddaṃ te atthū”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:3434_9: Mittadubbho hīti mittānaṃ dubbhanapuriso hi pāpako lāmako nāma.
atk-s0513a4:3435_0: Atha ne chindanatthāya rukkhaṃ upagate disvā nāgarājā cintesi “ahaṃ etesaṃ pipāsitānaṃ pānīyaṃ dāpesiṃ,
atk-s0513a4:3435_2: tato sayanādīni ceva paricārikā ca nāriyo,
atk-s0513a4:3441_0: “Ete hanatha bandhatha, mā vo muñcittha jīvitaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:3442_0: Ṭhapetvā satthavāhaṃva, sabbe bhasmaṃ karotha ne”ti. – ayaṃ nāgarājena vuttagāthā;
atk-s0513a4:3443_0: Tattha mā vo muñcittha jīvitanti kassaci ekassapi jīvitaṃ mā muñcittha.
atk-s0513a4:3444_0: Nāgā tathā katvā attharaṇādīni pañcasu sakaṭasatesu āropetvā satthavāhaṃ gahetvā sayaṃ tāni sakaṭāni
atk-s0513a4:3444_1: pājentā bārāṇasiṃ gantvā sabbaṃ dhanaṃ tassa gehe paṭisāmetvā taṃ āpucchitvā attano nāgabhavanameva gatā.
atk-s0513a4:3447_0: Lobhassa na vasaṃ gacche, haneyyārisakaṃ manaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3451_0: Tattha tasmāti yasmā lobhavasikā mahāvināsaṃ pattā,
atk-s0513a4:3451_2: Haneyyārisakaṃ mananti anto uppajjamānānaṃ nānāvidhānaṃ lobhasattūnaṃ santakaṃ manaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:3451_5: Taṇhā dukkhassa sambhavanti jātiādidukkhassa taṇhā sambhavo,
atk-s0513a4:3451_7: evaṃ taṇhāva dukkhassa sambhavaṃ ñatvā vītataṇho taṇhāādānena anādāno maggena āgatāya satiyā sato hutvā
atk-s0513a4:3451_8: bhikkhu paribbaje iriyetha vattethāti arahattena desanāya kūṭaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a4:3452_0: Imañca pana dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “evaṃ upāsakā pubbe lobhavasikā vāṇijā mahāvināsaṃ pattā,
atk-s0513a4:3452_1: tasmā lobhavasikena na bhavitabba”nti vatvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a4:3456_0: Abbhuto vata lokasminti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto uposathike upāsake ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:3456_1: Tadā hi satthā “upāsakā porāṇakapaṇḍitā attano uposathakammaṃ nissāya manussasarīreneva devalokaṃ gantvā
atk-s0513a4:3456_2: ciraṃ vasiṃsū”ti vatvā tehi yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:3457_0: Atīte mithilāyaṃ sādhino nāma rājā dhammena rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a4:3457_1: So catūsu nagaradvāresu nagaramajjhe nivesanadvāre cāti cha dānasālāyo kāretvā sakalajambudīpaṃ unnaṅgalaṃ katvā mahādānaṃ pavattesi,
atk-s0513a4:3457_5: Raṭṭhavāsinopi tassa ovāde ṭhatvā dānādīni puññāni katvā matamatā devanagareyeva nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3457_6: Sudhammadevasabhaṃ pūretvā nisinnā devā rañño sīlādiguṇameva vaṇṇayanti.
atk-s0513a4:3457_7: Taṃ sutvā sesadevāpi rājānaṃ daṭṭhukāmā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3457_8: Sakko devarājā tesaṃ manaṃ viditvā āha –
atk-s0513a4:3457_11: So mātaliṃ āṇāpesi “gaccha tvaṃ vejayantarathaṃ yojetvā sādhinarājānaṃ ānehī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3457_12: So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā rathaṃ yojetvā videharaṭṭhaṃ agamāsi,
atk-s0513a4:3457_14: Mātali manussānaṃ sāyamāsaṃ bhuñjitvā gharadvāresu sukhakathāya nisinnakāle candamaṇḍalena saddhiṃ rathaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0513a4:3457_15: Manussā “dve candā uṭṭhitā”ti vadantā puna candamaṇḍalaṃ ohāya rathaṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā “nāyaṃ cando,
atk-s0513a4:3457_21: rājā hi no dhammiko dhammarājā”ti somanassajātā hutvā añjaliṃ paggayha ṭhitā paṭhamaṃ gāthamāhaṃsu –
atk-s0513a4:3461_3: yassa dibbo ratho pāturahosi vedehassa yasassinoti.
atk-s0513a4:3462_0: Mātalipi taṃ rathaṃ ānetvā manussesu gandhamālādīhi pūjentesu tikkhattuṃ nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā rañño
atk-s0513a4:3462_1: nivesanadvāraṃ gantvā rathaṃ nivattetvā pacchābhāgena sīhapañjaraummāre ṭhapetvā ārohaṇasajjaṃ katvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:3462_2: Taṃ divasaṃ rājāpi dānasālāyo oloketvā “iminā niyāmena dānaṃ dethā”ti āṇāpetvā uposathaṃ samādiyitvā
atk-s0513a4:3462_3: divasaṃ vītināmetvā amaccagaṇaparivuto alaṅkatamahātale pācīnasīhapañjarābhimukho dhammayuttaṃ kathento
atk-s0513a4:3462_5: Atha naṃ mātali rathābhiruhanatthaṃ nimantetvā ādāya agamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:3462_6: Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:3469_0: Saramānā hi te devā, sudhammāyaṃ samacchare.
atk-s0513a4:3484_1: Agā devāna santiketi devānaṃ santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:3484_2: Tasmiñhi rathaṃ abhiruhitvā ṭhite ratho ākāsaṃ pakkhandi,
atk-s0513a4:3484_5: Taṃ disvā devatā ca sakko ca haṭṭhatuṭṭhā paccuggamanaṃ katvā paṭisanthāraṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3484_8: Āsanena cāti rājānaṃ āliṅgitvā “idha nisīdā”ti attano paṇḍukambalasilāsanena ca kāmehi ca nimantesi,
atk-s0513a4:3485_0: Tattha sakkena devaraññā dasayojanasahassaṃ devanagaraṃ aḍḍhatiyā ca accharākoṭiyo vejayantapāsādañca
atk-s0513a4:3485_1: majjhe bhinditvā dinnaṃ sampattiṃ anubhavantassa manussagaṇanāya satta vassasatāni atikkantāni.
atk-s0513a4:3487_0: “Ahaṃ pure saggagato ramāmi, naccehi gītehi ca vāditehi;
atk-s0513a4:3488_0: So dāni ajja na ramāmi sagge, āyuṃ nu khīṇo maraṇaṃ nu santike;
atk-s0513a4:3490_0: Tattha āyuṃ nu khīṇoti kiṃ nu mama sarasena jīvitindriyaṃ khīṇaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:3490_1: udāhu upacchedakakammavasena maraṇaṃ santike jātanti pucchati.
atk-s0513a4:3493_0: “Na tāyu khīṇaṃ maraṇañca dūre, na cāpi mūḷho naravīraseṭṭha;
atk-s0513a4:3494_0: Tuyhañca puññāni parittakāni, yesaṃ vipākaṃ idha vedayittho.
atk-s0513a4:3498_0: Tattha “parittakānī”ti idaṃ tena attabhāvena devaloke vipākadāyakāni puññāni sandhāya vuttaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:3498_1: itarāni panassa puññāni pathaviyaṃ paṃsu viya appamāṇāni.
atk-s0513a4:3498_2: Vasa devānubhāvenāti ahaṃ te attano puññāni majjhe bhinditvā dassāmi,
atk-s0513a4:3505_0: Sayaṃkatāni puññāni, taṃ me āveṇikaṃ dhanaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3509_0: Yaṃ katvā sukhito hoti, na ca pacchānutappatī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3510_0: Tattha yaṃ parato dānapaccayāti yaṃ parena dinnattā labbhati,
atk-s0513a4:3510_7: Yaṃ katvāti yaṃ karitvā sukhito ceva hoti na ca pacchānutappati,
atk-s0513a4:3511_0: Athassa vacanaṃ sutvā sakko mātaliṃ āṇāpesi “gaccha, tāta,
atk-s0513a4:3511_4: Atha naṃ uyyānapālo disvā pucchitvā gantvā nāradarañño ārocesi.
atk-s0513a4:3511_5: So rañño āgatabhāvaṃ sutvā “tvaṃ purato gantvā uyyānaṃ sajjetvā tassa ca mayhañca dve āsanāni paññāpehī”ti uyyānapālaṃ uyyojesi.
atk-s0513a4:3511_7: Atha naṃ rājā pucchi “kassa dve āsanāni paññāpesī”ti?
atk-s0513a4:3511_10: Atha naṃ rājā “ko añño satto mama santike āsane nisīdissatī”ti vatvā ekasmiṃ nisīditvā ekasmiṃ pāde ṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a4:3511_11: Nāradarājā āgantvā tassa pāde vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:3511_14: Mahāsatto pana attano puññabalena ettakaṃ kālaṃ vītināmesi.
atk-s0513a4:3511_15: So nāradaṃ hatthe gahetvā uyyāne vicaranto tisso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:3514_0: Imā tā haritānūpā, imā najjo savantiyo.
atk-s0513a4:3518_0: Yassimāni mamāyiṃsu, kiṃ nu te disataṃ gatā.
atk-s0513a4:3521_0: Tameva mayhaṃ janataṃ apassato, suññaṃva me nārada khāyate disā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3522_3: Haritānūpāti udakaniddhamanassa ubhosu passesu haritatiṇasañchannā anūpabhūmiyo.
atk-s0513a4:3522_5: ye mama upaṭṭhākā ca orodhā ca imasmiṃ uyyāne mahantena yasena mayā saddhiṃ vicarantā imāni ṭhānāni mamāyiṃsu piyāyiṃsu,
atk-s0513a4:3522_8: Tānīdha khettānīti imasmiṃ uyyāne tāneva etāni uparopanakaviruhanaṭṭhānāni.
atk-s0513a4:3523_3: tumhākaṃ upaṭṭhākā ca orodhā ca maraṇamukhaṃ pattā,
atk-s0513a4:3523_9: ahaṃ puññameva karissāmī”ti vatvā gāthā āha –
atk-s0513a4:3528_0: “Vutthaṃ me bhavanaṃ dibyaṃ, bhuttā kāmā amānusā;
atk-s0513a4:3535_0: Taṃ maggaṃ paṭipajjissaṃ, yena gacchanti subbatā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3536_0: Tattha vutthaṃ me bhavanaṃ dibyanti vejayantaṃ sandhāya āha.
atk-s0513a4:3536_2: sohaṃ buddhañāṇena aparicchindanīyaṃ evarūpaṃ kāmaguṇasampattiṃ pahāya puññakaraṇatthāya idhāgato.
atk-s0513a4:3536_3: Adaṇḍāvacaranti adaṇḍehi nikkhittadaṇḍahatthehi avacaritabbaṃ sammādiṭṭhipurekkhāraṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3536_4: Subbatāti yena maggena subbatā sabbaññubuddhā gacchanti,
atk-s0513a4:3536_5: ahampi agatapubbaṃ disaṃ gantuṃ bodhitale nisīditvā tameva maggaṃ paṭipajjissāmīti.
atk-s0513a4:3537_0: Evaṃ bodhisatto imā gāthāyo sabbaññutaññāṇena saṅkhipitvā kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:3537_4: satta vassasatāni vigataṃ dānaṃ sattāheneva dātukāmamhī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3537_5: Nārado “sādhū”ti tassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā mahādānaṃ paṭiyādesi.
atk-s0513a4:3537_6: Rājā sattāhaṃ dānaṃ datvā sattame divase kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavaneyeva nibbatti.
atk-s0513a4:3538_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “evaṃ vasitabbayuttakaṃ uposathakammaṃ nāmā”ti dassetvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a4:3542_0: Rājā avoca vidhuranti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto asadisadānaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:3542_2: Rājā kira taṃ dānaṃ dadanto satthāraṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā pañca bhikkhusatāni vicinitvā gaṇhitvā mahākhīṇāsavānaṃyeva adāsi.
atk-s0513a4:3542_4: rājā asadisadānaṃ dadanto vicinitvā mahapphalaṭṭhāne adāsī”ti dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3542_7: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “anacchariyaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:3542_9: yaṃ kosalarājā mādisassa buddhassa upaṭṭhāko hutvā viceyyadānaṃ deti,
atk-s0513a4:3542_10: porāṇakapaṇḍitā anuppanne buddhepi viceyyadānaṃ adaṃsū”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:3543_0: Atīte kururaṭṭhe indapatthanagare yudhiṭṭhilagotto korabyo nāma rājā rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a4:3543_1: Tassa vidhuro nāma amacco atthañca dhammañca anusāsati.
atk-s0513a4:3543_3: Taṃ gahetvā bhuñjantesu ekopi pañcasīlamattaṃ rakkhanto nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a4:3543_6: Rājā “viceyyadānaṃ mahapphala”nti sīlavantānaṃ dātukāmo hutvā cintesi “vidhurapaṇḍitena saddhiṃ mantayissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3543_7: So taṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ āgataṃ āsane nisīdāpetvā pañhaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0513a4:3546_0: Parato rañño ca vidhurassa ca vacanapaṭivacanaṃ hoti –
atk-s0513a4:3549_0: “Virate methunā dhammā, ye me bhuñjeyyu bhojanaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:3550_0: Dakkhiṇaṃ samma dassāma, yattha dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3553_0: Viratā methunā dhammā, ye te bhuñjeyyu bhojanaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3556_0: Tesaṃ vibhaṅgaṃ vicayaṃ, vitthārena suṇohi me.
atk-s0513a4:3568_0: “Virate methunā dhammā, ye me bhuñjeyyu bhojanaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:3569_0: Dakkhiṇaṃ samma dassāma, yattha dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3581_0: “Virate methunā dhammā, ye me bhuñjeyyu bhojanaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:3582_0: Dakkhiṇaṃ samma dassāma, yattha dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3586_0: Nādinne vuṭṭhahissāma, gāmamhi vā vanamhi vā.
atk-s0513a4:3595_0: “Virate methunā dhammā, ye me bhuñjeyyu bhojanaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:3596_0: Dakkhiṇaṃ samma dassāma, yattha dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ.

atk-s0513a4:3609_0: Dakkhiṇaṃ samma dassāma, yattha dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ.

atk-s0513a4:3625_0: Dakkhiṇaṃ samma dassāma, yattha dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ.

atk-s0513a4:3638_0: Dakkhiṇaṃ samma dassāma, yattha dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ.

atk-s0513a4:3678_0: Dakkhiṇaṃ samma dassāma, yattha dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3690_0: “Virate methunā dhammā, ye me bhuñjeyyu bhojanaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:3691_0: Dakkhiṇaṃ samma dassāma, yattha dinnaṃ mahapphala”nti.
atk-s0513a4:3692_3: Ye teti ye dhammikā samaṇabrāhmaṇā tava dānaṃ bhuñjeyyuṃ,
atk-s0513a4:3692_6: Tesaṃ vibhaṅgaṃ vicayanti tesaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ vibhaṅgaṃ mama paññāya vicitabhāvaṃ vitthārena suṇohi.
atk-s0513a4:3692_9: idaṃ imassa rogassa bhesajja”nti evaṃ siloke bandhitvā manussānaṃ denti.
atk-s0513a4:3692_14: abrāhmaṇā vā”ti ajānitvā vejjakammena jīvikaṃ kappentā vohārena “brāhmaṇā”ti vuccanti.
atk-s0513a4:3692_15: Akkhātā teti ime te mayā vejjabrāhmaṇā nāma akkhātā.
atk-s0513a4:3692_21: Na te vuccantīti te bāhitapāpatāya brāhmaṇā nāma na vuccanti.
atk-s0513a4:3693_1: aparepi brāhmaṇā attano brāhmaṇadhammaṃ chaḍḍetvā jīvikatthāya rājarājamahāmattānaṃ purato kaṃsatāḷe gahetvā vādentā gāyantā gacchanti.
atk-s0513a4:3693_6: Paccupessanti rājānoti rājarājamahāmatte paṭicca āgamma sandhāya upasevanti.
atk-s0513a4:3693_7: Gāmesu nigamesu cāti tesaṃ nivesanadvāre nisīdanti.
atk-s0513a4:3693_9: Yathā te purisā “aggahetvā na gamissāmā”ti niggahaṃ katvā gaṇhantiyeva,
atk-s0513a4:3693_10: tathā “gāme vā vane vā aladdhā marantāpi na vuṭṭhahissāmā”ti upavasanti.
atk-s0513a4:3694_0: Rajareṇūhīti rajehi ca paṃsūhi ca okiṇṇā.
atk-s0513a4:3694_2: Khāṇughātasamāti malīnasarīratāya jhāmakhette khāṇughātakehi bhūmiṃ khaṇitvā jhāmakhāṇukauddharaṇakamanussehi samānā,
atk-s0513a4:3694_3: “aggahetvā na gamissāmā”ti niccalabhāvena ṭhitattā nikhaṇitvā ṭhapitavatikhāṇukā viyātipi attho.
atk-s0513a4:3694_4: Tepīti tepi tathā laddhaṃ dhanaṃ vaḍḍhiyā payojetvā puna tatheva ṭhitattā dussīlā brāhmaṇā.
atk-s0513a4:3695_5: Tepīti tepi imāni ettakāni vikkiṇitvā jīvikakappakā vāṇijakabrāhmaṇā.
atk-s0513a4:3695_7: Pavecchantīti attano dhītaro hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ gahetvā paresaṃ denti.
atk-s0513a4:3695_8: Te evaṃ paresaṃ dadamānā vivāhanti nāma,
atk-s0513a4:3695_9: attano puttānaṃ atthāya gaṇhamānā āvāhanti nāma.
atk-s0513a4:3695_10: Ambaṭṭhavessehīti kuṭumbikehi ceva gahapatīhi ca samā,
atk-s0513a4:3696_0: Nikkhittabhikkhanti gāmapurohitā hutvā attano atthāya nibaddhabhikkhaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3696_1: Bahū teti bahū janā ete gāmapurohite nakkhattamuhuttamaṅgalāni pucchanti.
atk-s0513a4:3696_2: Aṇḍacchedā nilañchakāti bhatiṃ gahetvā balibaddānaṃ aṇḍacchedakā ceva tisūlādiaṅkakaraṇena lañchakā ca,
atk-s0513a4:3696_4: Tatthāti tesaṃ gāmapurohitānaṃ gehesu maṃsavikkiṇanatthaṃ ete pasuādayopi haññanti.
atk-s0513a4:3697_2: Satthaṃ abbāhayantīti satthavāhānaṃ hatthato satampi sahassampi gahetvā satthe corāṭaviṃ atibāhenti.
atk-s0513a4:3697_3: Gopanisādehīti gopālakehi ceva nisādehi ca gāmaghātakacorehi samāti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3697_8: Āgodhā macchakacchapanti thalajesu tāva āgodhato mahante ca khuddake ca pāṇayo bādhenti mārenti,
atk-s0513a4:3698_0: Aññe dhanassa kāmā hīti apare brāhmaṇā dhanaṃ patthentā.
atk-s0513a4:3698_1: Heṭṭhāmañce pasakkitāti “kalipavāhakammaṃ kāressāmā”ti ratanamayaṃ mañcaṃ kāretvā tassa heṭṭhā nipannā acchanti.
atk-s0513a4:3698_2: Atha nesaṃ somayāge upaṭṭhite rājāno upari nahāyanti,
atk-s0513a4:3698_3: te kira somayāge niṭṭhite āgantvā tasmiṃ mañce nisīdanti.
atk-s0513a4:3698_4: Atha ne aññe brāhmaṇā “kaliṃ pavāhessāmā”ti nahāpenti.
atk-s0513a4:3698_5: Ratanamañco ceva rañño rājālaṅkāro ca sabbo heṭṭhāmañce nipannasseva hoti.
atk-s0513a4:3698_6: Tepīti tepi malamajjakehi nahāpitehi sadisā brāhmaṇāti vuccanti.
atk-s0513a4:3699_0: Evañcime vohāramattabrāhmaṇe dassetvā idāni paramatthabrāhmaṇe dassento dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:3702_0: Viratā methunā dhammā, ye te bhuñjeyyu bhojanaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3704_0: “Ekañca bhattaṃ bhuñjanti, na ca majjaṃ pivanti te;
atk-s0513a4:3706_2: Tādiseti evarūpe bāhitapāpe paccekabuddhabrāhmaṇe nimantanatthāya upasaṅkamāmāti.
atk-s0513a4:3707_0: Rājā tassa kathaṃ sutvā pucchi “samma vidhura,
atk-s0513a4:3707_4: tava balena mayhaṃ te brāhmaṇe pariyesā”ti tuṭṭhamānaso gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:3710_0: Ete vidhura pariyesa, khippañca ne nimantayā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3711_0: Mahāsatto “sādhū”ti tassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā “tena hi, mahārāja,
atk-s0513a4:3711_1: nagaraṃ alaṅkārāpetvā sabbe nagaravāsino dānaṃ datvā uposathaṃ adhiṭṭhāya samādinnasīlā hontū”ti bheriṃ
atk-s0513a4:3711_2: carāpetvā “tumhepi saddhiṃ parijanena uposathaṃ samādiyathā”ti vatvā sayaṃ pātova bhuñjitvā uposathaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3711_3: samādāya sāyanhasamaye jātipupphapuṇṇaṃ suvaṇṇasamuggaṃ āharāpetvā raññā saddhiṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitaṃ patiṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0513a4:3711_4: paccekabuddhānaṃ guṇe anussaritvā vanditvā “uttarahimavante nandamūlakapabbhāravāsino pañcasatā paccekabuddhā
atk-s0513a4:3711_5: sve amhākaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhantū”ti nimantetvā ākāse aṭṭha pupphamuṭṭhiyo vissajjesi.
atk-s0513a4:3711_17: Rājā punadivase mahāsakkāraṃ katvā mahātale mahārahāni āsanāni paññapesi.
atk-s0513a4:3711_18: Paccekabuddhā anotattadahe katasarīrapaṭijagganā velaṃ sallakkhetvā ākāsenāgantvā rājaṅgaṇe otariṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3711_19: Rājā ca bodhisatto ca pasannamānasā tesaṃ hatthato pattāni gahetvā pāsādaṃ āropetvā nisīdāpetvā dakkhiṇodakaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3711_21: Bhattakiccapariyosāne ca punadivasatthāyāti evaṃ satta divase nimantetvā mahādānaṃ datvā sattame divase sabbaparikkhāre adaṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3711_22: Te anumodanaṃ katvā ākāsena tattheva gatā,
atk-s0513a4:3712_2: kosalarañño mama upaṭṭhākassa sato viceyyadānaṃ dātuṃ,
atk-s0513a4:3712_3: porāṇakapaṇḍitā anuppannepi buddhe dānaṃ adaṃsuyevā”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a4:3716_0: Sukhumālarūpaṃ disvāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ kuṭumbikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:3716_2: tathāgatassa ceva saṅghassa ca nibaddhaṃ mahāsakkāraṃ karoti.
atk-s0513a4:3716_3: Athekadivasaṃ cintesi “ahaṃ buddharatanassa ceva saṅgharatanassa ca paṇītāni khādanīyabhojanīyāni ceva
atk-s0513a4:3716_4: sukhumavatthāni ca dento niccaṃ mahāsakkāraṃ karomi,
atk-s0513a4:3716_6: kathaṃ nu kho tassa sakkāraṃ karontena kattabba”nti.
atk-s0513a4:3716_7: So bahūni gandhamālādīni ādāya jetavanaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā pucchi “ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0513a4:3716_9: kathaṃ nu kho tassa sakkāraṃ karontena kattabba”nti.
atk-s0513a4:3716_13: So “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā theraṃ nimantetvā punadivase mahantena sakkārena attano gehaṃ netvā mahārahe
atk-s0513a4:3716_14: āsane nisīdāpetvā gandhamālādīhi pūjetvā nānaggarasabhojanaṃ datvā mahagghe ticīvarappahonake sāṭake adāsi.
atk-s0513a4:3716_17: aggasāvakassa dhammasenāpatissa anucchaviko”ti cintetvā piṇḍapātañca vatthāni ca vihāraṃ haritvā sāriputtattherassa adāsi.
atk-s0513a4:3716_19: ekantena dhammassāmino sammāsambuddhasseva anucchaviko”ti cintetvā dasabalassa adāsi.
atk-s0513a4:3716_20: Satthā attano uttaritaraṃ adisvā piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñji,
atk-s0513a4:3717_1: asuko nāma kuṭumbiko ‘dhammaratanassa sakkāraṃ karomī’ti dhammabhaṇḍāgārikassa ānandattherassa adāsi.
atk-s0513a4:3717_4: Tathāgato aññaṃ uttaritaraṃ apassanto attano dhammassāmitāya ‘mayhameveso anucchaviko’ti taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñji,
atk-s0513a4:3717_6: evaṃ so piṇḍapāto yathānucchavikatāya dhammassāminova pādamūlaṃ gato”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3717_9: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a4:3717_12: pubbepi anuppanne buddhe agamāsiyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:3718_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatto agatigamanaṃ pahāya dasa rājadhamme akopento dhammena rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a4:3718_1: Evaṃ santepissa vinicchayo suñño viya ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:3718_2: Rājā attano aguṇagavesako hutvā antonivesanādīni pariggaṇhanto antepure ca antonagare ca dvāragāmesu
atk-s0513a4:3718_3: ca attano aguṇaṃ kathentaṃ adisvā “janapade gavesissāmī”ti amaccānaṃ rajjaṃ niyyādetvā purohitena saddhiṃ
atk-s0513a4:3718_4: aññātakaveseneva kāsiraṭṭhe caranto kañci aguṇaṃ kathentaṃ adisvā paccante ekaṃ nigamaṃ patvā bahidvārasālāyaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:3718_5: Tasmiṃ khaṇe nigamavāsī asītikoṭivibhavo kuṭumbiko mahantena parivārena nhānatitthaṃ gacchanto sālāyaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3718_6: nisinnaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ sukhumālasarīraṃ rājānaṃ disvā uppannasineho sālaṃ pavisitvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā
atk-s0513a4:3718_7: “idheva hothā”ti vatvā gehaṃ gantvā nānaggarasabhojanaṃ sampādetvā mahantena parivārena bhattabhājanāni
atk-s0513a4:3718_9: Tasmiṃ khaṇe himavantavāsī pañcābhiñño tāpaso āgantvā tattheva nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:3719_0: Kuṭumbiko rañño hatthadhovanaudakaṃ datvā nānaggarasehi sūpabyañjanehi bhattapātiṃ sajjetvā rañño upanesi.
atk-s0513a4:3719_1: Rājā naṃ gahetvā purohitassa brāhmaṇassa adāsi.
atk-s0513a4:3719_3: Tāpaso paccekabuddhassa santikaṃ gantvā vāmahatthena bhattapātiṃ,
atk-s0513a4:3719_4: dakkhiṇahatthena kamaṇḍaluṃ gahetvā dakkhiṇodakaṃ datvā patte bhattaṃ pakkhipi.
atk-s0513a4:3719_6: Tassa bhattakiccapariyosāne kuṭumbiko cintesi “mayā rañño bhattaṃ dinnaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:3719_11: kiṃ nu kho imesaṃ ettakaṃ dānakāraṇaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:3728_0: Attānaṃ anasitvāna, koyaṃ dhammo namatthu te.
atk-s0513a4:3731_0: Garu ca āmantanīyo ca, dātumarahāmi bhojanaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3734_0: Rājā te bhattaṃ pādāsi, suciṃ maṃsūpasecanaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3736_0: “Taṃ tvaṃ bhattaṃ paṭiggayha, isissa bhojanaṃ adā;
atk-s0513a4:3737_0: Akhettaññūsi dānassa, koyaṃ dhammo namatthu te.
atk-s0513a4:3749_0: Bhikkhu kena tayā seyyo, yassa tvaṃ bhojanaṃ adā.
atk-s0513a4:3755_0: Tāni āharitvā bhuñjāmi, atthi me so pariggaho.
atk-s0513a4:3761_0: Isi te bhattaṃ pādāsi, suciṃ maṃsūpasecanaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3763_0: “Taṃ tvaṃ bhattaṃ paṭiggayha, tuṇhī bhuñjasi ekako;
atk-s0513a4:3764_0: Nāññaṃ kañci nimantesi, koyaṃ dhammo namatthu te.
atk-s0513a4:3766_0: “Na pacāmi na pācemi, na chindāmi na chedaye;
atk-s0513a4:3767_0: Taṃ maṃ akiñcanaṃ ñatvā, sabbapāpehi ārataṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3770_0: Isi me bhattaṃ pādāsi, suciṃ maṃsūpasecanaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3774_0: Tattha vivananti nirudakāraññasadisaṃ imaṃ paccantaṃ āgataṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3774_4: Tassa teti evarūpaṃ taṃ disvā ahaṃ pemamakāsiṃ,
atk-s0513a4:3774_15: yo tvaṃ attanā abhuñjitvā parassa adāsi.
atk-s0513a4:3775_0: Ācariyoti kuṭumbika esa mayhaṃ ācārasikkhāpako ācariyo.
atk-s0513a4:3775_2: Āmantanīyoti āmantetabbayuttako mayā dinnaṃ bhattaṃ gahetuṃ anurūpo.
atk-s0513a4:3775_3: Dātumarahāmīti “ahaṃ evarūpassa ācariyassa bhojanaṃ dātuṃ arahāmī”ti rājā brāhmaṇassa guṇaṃ vaṇṇesi.
atk-s0513a4:3775_5: mayi dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ na hotīti evaṃ attānaṃ dānassa akhettaṃ jānāsi maññeti.
atk-s0513a4:3775_6: Anusāsāmīti attano atthaṃ pahāya rañño atthañca dhammañca anusāsāmi.
atk-s0513a4:3776_0: Evaṃ attano aguṇaṃ kathetvā āraññikassāti isino guṇaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:3776_4: Nāvakaṅkhasīti sayaṃ dullabhabhojano hutvā evarūpaṃ bhojanaṃ aññassa desi,
atk-s0513a4:3776_6: Bhikkhu kenāti ayaṃ bhikkhu katarena guṇena tayā seṭṭhataro.
atk-s0513a4:3777_0: Khaṇantālukalambānīti khaṇanto ālūni ceva tālakandāni ca.
atk-s0513a4:3777_3: Saṅghāriyaṃ pasāriyanti ete sāmākanīvāre dhunanto saṅghāretvā puna sukkhāpite pasāretvā suppena papphoṭetvā
atk-s0513a4:3777_4: koṭṭetvā taṇḍule ādāya pacitvā bhuñjāmīti vadati.
atk-s0513a4:3777_11: Dātumarahāmīti evarūpassa paccekabuddhassa attanā laddhabhojanaṃ dātuṃ arahāmi.
atk-s0513a4:3778_4: Ete hīti ete rājādayo tayo janāti hatthaṃ pasāretvā te niddisanto evamāha.
atk-s0513a4:3778_7: Dāyakassa hi nimantanaṃ ekavīsatiyā anesanāsu aññatarāya piṇḍapātapariyesanāya jīvikakappanasaṅkhātā micchājīvapaṭipatti nāma hoti.
atk-s0513a4:3779_0: Tassa vacanaṃ sutvā kuṭumbiko attamano dve osānagāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:3782_0: Sohaṃ ajja pajānāmi, yattha dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3785_0: Isī mūlaphale giddhā, vippamuttā ca bhikkhavo”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3786_2: Bhikkhavoti paccekabuddhā bhikkhavo pana sabbabhavehi vippamuttā.
atk-s0513a4:3787_0: Paccekabuddho tassa dhammaṃ desetvā sakaṭṭhānameva gato,
atk-s0513a4:3787_2: Rājā pana katipāhaṃ tassa santike vasitvā bārāṇasimeva gato.
atk-s0513a4:3799_0: Kuto nu āgacchasi dummavāsīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto udenaṃ nāma vaṃsarājānaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:3799_1: Tasmiñhi kāle āyasmā piṇḍolabhāradvājo jetavanato ākāsena gantvā yebhuyyena kosambiyaṃ udenassa rañño uyyānaṃ divāvihārāya gacchati.
atk-s0513a4:3799_2: Thero kira purimabhave rajjaṃ kārento dīghamaddhānaṃ tasmiṃ uyyāne mahāparivāro sampattiṃ anubhavi.
atk-s0513a4:3799_3: So tena pubbāciṇṇena yebhuyyena tattheva divāvihāraṃ nisīditvā phalasamāpattisukhena vītināmeti.
atk-s0513a4:3799_4: Tasmiṃ ekadivasaṃ tattha gantvā supupphitasālamūle nisinne udeno sattāhaṃ mahāpānaṃ pivitvā “uyyānakīḷaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3799_5: kīḷissāmī”ti mahantena parivārena uyyānaṃ gantvā maṅgalasilāpaṭṭe aññatarāya itthiyā aṅke nipanno surāmadamattatāya
atk-s0513a4:3799_7: Gāyantā nisinnitthiyo tūriyāni chaḍḍetvā uyyānaṃ pavisitvā pupphaphalādīni vicinantiyo theraṃ disvā gantvā vanditvā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3799_9: Itarāpi itthī aṅkaṃ cāletvā rājānaṃ pabodhetvā “kuhiṃ tā vasaliyo gatā”ti vutte “ekaṃ samaṇaṃ parivāretvā nisinnā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:3799_10: So kuddho gantvā theraṃ akkositvā paribhāsitvā “handāhaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:3799_11: taṃ samaṇaṃ tambakipillakehi khādāpessāmī”ti kodhavasena therassa sarīre tambakipillakapuṭaṃ bhindāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:3799_12: Thero ākāse ṭhatvā tassovādaṃ datvā jetavane gandhakuṭidvāreyeva otaritvā tathāgatena “kuto āgatosī”ti puṭṭho thero tamatthaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0513a4:3799_16: pubbepi viheṭhesiyevā”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:3800_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente tadā mahāsatto bahinagare caṇḍālayoniyaṃ nibbatti,
atk-s0513a4:3800_3: Tadā bārāṇasiseṭṭhino dhītā diṭṭhamaṅgalikā nāma ekamāsadvemāsavārena mahāparivārā uyyānaṃ kīḷituṃ gacchati.
atk-s0513a4:3800_4: Athekadivasaṃ mahāsatto kenaci kammena nagaraṃ pavisanto antaradvāre diṭṭhamaṅgalikaṃ disvā ekamantaṃ apagantvā allīyitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:3800_5: Diṭṭhamaṅgalikā sāṇiyā antarena olokentī taṃ disvā “ko eso”ti pucchitvā “caṇḍālo ayye”ti vutte “adiṭṭhapubbayuttakaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3800_6: vata passāmī”ti gandhodakena akkhīni dhovitvā tato nivatti.
atk-s0513a4:3800_9: ajja taṃ nissāya amhākaṃ amūlakaṃ surābhattaṃ naṭṭha”nti kodhābhibhūto mātaṅgapaṇḍitaṃ hatthehi ca pādehi ca pothetvā visaññiṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a4:3800_10: So muhuttaṃ vītināmetvā paṭiladdhasañño cintesi “diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya parijano maṃ niddosaṃ akāraṇena pothesi,
atk-s0513a4:3800_12: no alabhitvā”ti adhiṭṭhāya gantvā tassā pitu nivesanadvāre nipajji.
atk-s0513a4:3800_13: So “kena kāraṇena nipannosī”ti vutte “aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ natthi,
atk-s0513a4:3800_19: tasmā sattame divase diṭṭhamaṅgalikaṃ nīharitvā tassa adaṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3801_3: maṃ ukkhipitvā piṭṭhiṃ āropetvā ādāya gacchāhīti.
atk-s0513a4:3801_4: Sā tathā katvā nagaravāsīnaṃ passantānaññeva nagarā nikkhamitvā caṇḍālagāmakaṃ gatā.
atk-s0513a4:3801_5: Atha naṃ mahāsatto jātisambhedavītikkamaṃ akatvāva katipāhaṃ gehe vasāpetvā cintesi “ahametaṃ lābhaggayasaggappattaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3801_9: mayi araññato kiñci anāharante amhākaṃ jīvikā nappavattati,
atk-s0513a4:3801_11: ahaṃ araññaṃ gamissāmī”ti vatvā gehavāsinopi “imaṃ mā pamajjitthā”ti ovaditvā araññaṃ gantvā samaṇapabbajjaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3801_12: pabbajitvā appamatto sattame divase aṭṭha samāpattiyo ca pañca abhiññāyo ca uppādetvā “idāni diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya
atk-s0513a4:3801_13: avassayo bhavituṃ sakkhissāmī”ti iddhiyā gantvā caṇḍālagāmadvāre otaritvā diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya gehadvāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:3801_15: kasmā maṃ anāthaṃ katvā pabbajitosī”ti paridevi.
atk-s0513a4:3801_18: tava porāṇakayasato idāni mahantataraṃ yasaṃ karissāmi,
atk-s0513a4:3801_19: apica kho pana ‘na mayhaṃ mātaṅgapaṇḍito sāmiko,
atk-s0513a4:3801_20: mahābrahmā me sāmiko’ti ettakaṃ parisamajjhe vattuṃ sakkhissasī’ti āha. “Āma, sāmi,
atk-s0513a4:3801_22: “Tena hi “idāni te sāmiko kuhinti puṭṭhā ‘brahmalokaṃ gato’ti vatvā ‘kadā āgamissatī’ti vutte ‘ito sattame
atk-s0513a4:3801_23: divase puṇṇamāyaṃ candaṃ bhinditvā āgamissatī’ti vadeyyāsī”ti naṃ vatvā mahāsatto himavantameva gato.
atk-s0513a4:3802_0: Diṭṭhamaṅgalikāpi bārāṇasiyaṃ mahājanassa majjhe tesu tesu ṭhānesu tathā kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:3802_1: Mahājano “aho mahābrahmā samāno diṭṭhamaṅgalikaṃ na gacchati,
atk-s0513a4:3802_3: Bodhisattopi puṇṇamadivase candassa gaganamajjhe ṭhitakāle brahmattabhāvaṃ māpetvā sakalaṃ kāsiraṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3802_4: dvādasayojanikaṃ bārāṇasinagarañca ekobhāsaṃ katvā candamaṇḍalaṃ bhinditvā otaritvā bārāṇasiyā uparūpari
atk-s0513a4:3802_5: tikkhattuṃ paribbhamitvā mahājanena gandhamālādīhi pūjiyamāno caṇḍālagāmakābhimukho ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:3802_6: Brahmabhattā sannipatitvā caṇḍālagāmakaṃ gantvā diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya gehaṃ suddhavatthehi chādetvā bhūmiṃ
atk-s0513a4:3802_7: catujjātiyagandhehi opuñchitvā pupphāni vikiritvā dhūmaṃ datvā celavitānaṃ pasāretvā mahāsayanaṃ paññapetvā
atk-s0513a4:3802_8: gandhatelehi dīpaṃ jāletvā dvāre rajatapaṭṭavaṇṇavālukaṃ okiritvā pupphāni vikiritvā dhaje bandhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3802_9: Evaṃ alaṅkate gehe mahāsatto otaritvā anto pavisitvā thokaṃ sayanapiṭṭhe nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:3803_7: tava pādadhovanaudakaṃ sakalajambudīpe rājūnaṃ abhisekodakaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0513a4:3803_12: tava pādapiṭṭhe sīsaṃ ṭhapetvā vandantā sahassaṃ dassanti,
atk-s0513a4:3803_14: cakkhupathe ṭhatvā vandantā ekaṃ kahāpaṇaṃ datvā vandissanti,
atk-s0513a4:3803_15: appamattā hohī”ti naṃ ovaditvā gehā nikkhamitvā mahājanassa passantasseva uppatitvā candamaṇḍalaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a4:3803_16: Brahmabhattā sannipatitvā ṭhitakāva rattiṃ vītināmetvā pātova diṭṭhamaṅgalikaṃ suvaṇṇasivikaṃ āropetvā sīsena ukkhipitvā nagaraṃ pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3803_18: Pādapiṭṭhe sīsaṃ ṭhapetvā vandituṃ labhantā sahassatthavikaṃ denti,
atk-s0513a4:3803_19: sotapathe ṭhatvā vandituṃ labhantā sataṃ denti,
atk-s0513a4:3803_20: cakkhupathe ṭhatvā vandituṃ labhantā ekaṃ kahāpaṇaṃ denti.
atk-s0513a4:3803_21: Evaṃ dvādasayojanikaṃ bārāṇasiṃ taṃ gahetvā vicarantā aṭṭhārasakoṭidhanaṃ labhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3804_0: Atha naṃ nagaraṃ pariharitvā ānetvā nagaramajjhe mahāmaṇḍapaṃ kāretvā sāṇiṃ parikkhipitvā mahāsayanaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3804_2: Maṇḍapasantikeyeva sattadvārakoṭṭhaṃ sattabhūmikaṃ pāsādaṃ kātuṃ ārabhiṃsu,
atk-s0513a4:3804_5: Athassa nāmaggahaṇadivase brāhmaṇā sannipatitvā maṇḍape jātattā “maṇḍabyakumāro”ti nāmaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3804_7: Tato paṭṭhāya sā mahantena yasena tasmiṃ vasati,
atk-s0513a4:3804_11: So soḷasavassakālato paṭṭhāya brāhmaṇānaṃ bhattaṃ paṭṭhapesi,
atk-s0513a4:3805_0: Athekasmiṃ mahāmahadivase gehe bahuṃ pāyāsaṃ paṭiyādesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3805_1: Soḷasa brāhmaṇasahassāni catutthe dvārakoṭṭhake nisīditvā suvaṇṇarasavaṇṇena navasappinā pakkamadhukhaṇḍasakkharāhi
atk-s0513a4:3805_3: Kumāropi sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍito suvaṇṇapādukā āruyha hatthena kañcanadaṇḍaṃ gahetvā “idha sappiṃ detha,
atk-s0513a4:3805_5: Tasmiṃ khaṇe mātaṅgapaṇḍito himavante assamapade nisinno “kā nu kho diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya puttassa pavattī”ti
atk-s0513a4:3805_6: olokento tassa atitthe pakkhandabhāvaṃ disvā “ajjeva gantvā māṇavaṃ dametvā yattha dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ hoti,
atk-s0513a4:3805_7: tattha dānaṃ dāpetvā āgamissāmī”ti cintetvā ākāsena anotattadahaṃ gantvā mukhadhovanādīni katvā manosilātale
atk-s0513a4:3805_8: ṭhito rattadupaṭṭaṃ nivāsetvā kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā paṃsukūlasaṅghāṭiṃ pārupitvā mattikāpattaṃ ādāya
atk-s0513a4:3805_9: ākāsenāgantvā catutthe dvārakoṭṭhake dānaggeyeva otaritvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:3805_10: Maṇḍabyo kumāro ito cito ca olokento taṃ disvā “evaṃvirūpo saṅkārayakkhasadiso ayaṃ pabbajito imaṃ ṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3805_11: āgacchanto kuto nu kho āgacchatī”ti tena saddhiṃ sallapanto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:3808_0: Saṅkāracoḷaṃ paṭimuñca kaṇṭhe, ko re tuvaṃ hosi adakkhiṇeyyo”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3809_5: Adakkhiṇeyyoti tvaṃ adakkhiṇeyyo imesaṃ paramadakkhiṇeyyānaṃ nisinnaṭṭhānaṃ eko hutvā kuto āgato.
atk-s0513a4:3810_0: Taṃ sutvā mahāsatto muducitteneva tena saddhiṃ sallapanto dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:3812_0: “Annaṃ tavedaṃ pakataṃ yasassi, taṃ khajjare bhuñjare piyyare ca;
atk-s0513a4:3813_0: Jānāsi maṃ tvaṃ paradattūpajīviṃ, uttiṭṭhapiṇḍaṃ labhataṃ sapāko”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3814_2: Taṃ khajjareti taṃ khajjanti ca bhuñjanti ca pivanti ca.
atk-s0513a4:3814_5: uṭṭhāya ṭhitehi vā dīyamānaṃ heṭṭhā ṭhatvā labhitabbapiṇḍaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3814_10: tasmā me jīvitapavattanatthaṃ bhojanaṃ dāpehi, kumārāti.
atk-s0513a4:3817_0: “Annaṃ mamedaṃ pakataṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ, attatthāya saddahato mamedaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:3818_0: Apehi etto kimidhaṭṭhitosi, na mādisā tumhaṃ dadanti jammā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3819_2: Na mādisāti mādisā jātisampannānaṃ udiccabrāhmaṇānaṃ dānaṃ denti,
atk-s0513a4:3822_0: “Thale ca ninne ca vapanti bījaṃ, anūpakhette phalamāsamānā;
atk-s0513a4:3823_0: Etāya saddhāya dadāhi dānaṃ, appeva ārādhaye dakkhiṇeyye”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3824_1: sassaphalaṃ āsīsamānā tīsupi khettesu bījaṃ vapanti.
atk-s0513a4:3824_4: anūpakhette nadiñca taḷākañca nissāya kataṃ oghena vuyhati.
atk-s0513a4:3824_10: Tasmā yathā phalamāsīsamānā tīsupi khettesu vapanti,
atk-s0513a4:3824_11: tathā tvampi etāya phalasaddhāya āgatāgatānaṃ sabbesaṃyeva dānaṃ dehi,
atk-s0513a4:3824_12: appeva nāma evaṃ dadanto dakkhiṇeyye ārādheyyāsi labheyyāsīti.
atk-s0513a4:3827_0: “Khettāni mayhaṃ viditāni loke, yesāhaṃ bījāni patiṭṭhapemi;
atk-s0513a4:3828_0: Ye brāhmaṇā jātimantūpapannā, tānīdha khettāni supesalānī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3829_0: Tattha yesāhanti yesu ahaṃ. Jātimantūpapannāti jātiyā ca mantehi ca upapannā.
atk-s0513a4:3832_0: “Jātimado ca atimānitā ca, lobho ca doso ca mado ca moho;
atk-s0513a4:3833_0: Ete aguṇā yesu ca santi sabbe, tānīdha khettāni apesalāni.
atk-s0513a4:3835_0: “Jātimado ca atimānitā ca, lobho ca doso ca mado ca moho;
atk-s0513a4:3836_0: Ete aguṇā yesu na santi sabbe, tānīdha khettāni supesalānī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3837_1: Atimānitā cāti “añño mayā saddhiṃ jātiādīhi sadiso natthī”ti atikkamma pavattamāno.
atk-s0513a4:3837_3: Apesalānīti evarūpā puggalā āsīvisabharitā viya vammikā appiyasīlā honti.
atk-s0513a4:3838_0: Iti so mahāsatte punappunaṃ kathente kujjhitvā “ayaṃ ativiya bahuṃ vippalapati,
atk-s0513a4:3840_0: “Kvettha gatā upajotiyo ca, upajjhāyo atha vā gaṇḍakucchi;
atk-s0513a4:3841_0: Imassa daṇḍañca vadhañca datvā, gale gahetvā khalayātha jamma”nti.
atk-s0513a4:3842_0: Tattha kvettha gatāti imesu tīsu dvāresu ṭhapitā upajotiyo ca upajjhāyo ca gaṇḍakucchi cāti tayo dovārikā kuhiṃ gatāti attho.
atk-s0513a4:3843_0: Tepi tassa vacanaṃ sutvā vegenāgantvā vanditvā “kiṃ karoma devā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3843_4: “Ko cesa māyākāro vā vijjādharo vā bhavissati,
atk-s0513a4:3843_7: “Imassa mukhameva pothetvā bhindantā daṇḍaveḷupesikāhi piṭṭhicammaṃ uppāṭentā vadhañca datvā gale gahetvā etaṃ jammaṃ khalayātha,
atk-s0513a4:3844_0: Mahāsatto tesu attano santikaṃ anāgatesveva uppatitvā ākāse ṭhito gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:3848_0: Tattha jātavedaṃ padahasīti aggiṃ gilituṃ vāyamasi.
atk-s0513a4:3849_0: Imañca pana gāthaṃ vatvā mahāsatto passantasseva māṇavassa ca brāhmaṇānañca ākāse pakkhandi.
atk-s0513a4:3854_0: So pācīnadisābhimukho gantvā ekāya vīthiyā otaritvā “padavaḷañjaṃ paññāyatū”ti adhiṭṭhāya pācīnadvārasamīpe
atk-s0513a4:3854_1: piṇḍāya caranto missakabhattaṃ saṃkaḍḍhitvā ekissaṃ sālāyaṃ nisīditvā missakabhattaṃ paribhuñji.
atk-s0513a4:3854_2: Nagaradevatā “ayaṃ amhākaṃ ayyaṃ viheṭhetvā kathetī”ti asahamānā āgamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3854_3: Athassa jeṭṭhakayakkho maṇḍabyassa gīvaṃ gahetvā parivattesi,
atk-s0513a4:3854_5: Bodhisatte muducittatāya pana “tassa putto”ti naṃ na mārenti,
atk-s0513a4:3854_11: sesabrāhmaṇā mukhena kheḷaṃ vamantā aparāparaṃ parivattanti.
atk-s0513a4:3854_13: puttassa te kiṃ jāta”nti diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya ārocayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3854_14: Sā vegena gantvā puttaṃ disvā “kimeta”nti vatvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:3857_0: Setāni akkhīni yathā matassa, ko me imaṃ puttamakāsi eva”nti.
atk-s0513a4:3859_0: Athassā tasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhitajano ārocetuṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:3862_0: Saṅkāracoḷaṃ paṭimuñca kaṇṭhe, so te imaṃ puttamakāsi eva”nti.
atk-s0513a4:3863_0: Sā taṃ sutvāva cintesi “aññassetaṃ balaṃ natthi,
atk-s0513a4:3863_2: sampannamettābhāvano kho pana dhīro na ettakaṃ janaṃ kilametvā gamissati,
atk-s0513a4:3863_3: kataraṃ nu kho disaṃ gato bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3865_0: “Katamaṃ disaṃ agamā bhūripañño, akkhātha me māṇavā etamatthaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:3866_0: Gantvāna taṃ paṭikaremu accayaṃ, appeva naṃ putta labhemu jīvita”nti.
atk-s0513a4:3867_1: Taṃ paṭikaremu accayanti taṃ accayaṃ paṭikarissāma desessāma,
atk-s0513a4:3867_3: Putta labhemu jīvitanti appeva nāma puttassa jīvitaṃ labheyyāma.
atk-s0513a4:3868_0: Athassā tattha ṭhitā māṇavā kathentā gāthamāhaṃsu –
atk-s0513a4:3871_0: Api cāpi so purimadisaṃ agacchi, saccappaṭiñño isi sādhurūpo”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3872_0: Tattha pathaddhunoti ākāsapathasaṅkhātassa addhuno majjhe ṭhito pannarase cando viya.
atk-s0513a4:3872_1: Api cāpi soti apica kho pana so puratthimaṃ disaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a4:3873_0: Sā tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā “mama sāmikaṃ upadhāressāmī”ti suvaṇṇakalasasuvaṇṇasarakāni gāhāpetvā dāsigaṇaparivutā
atk-s0513a4:3873_1: tena padavaḷañjassa adhiṭṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ patvā tenānusārena gacchantī tasmiṃ pīṭhikāya nisīditvā bhuñjamāne
atk-s0513a4:3873_3: So taṃ disvā thokaṃ odanaṃ patte ṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a4:3873_5: So tattheva hatthaṃ dhovitvā mukhaṃ vikkhālesi.
atk-s0513a4:3873_6: Atha naṃ sā “kena me puttassa so vippakāro kato”ti pucchantī gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:3876_0: Setāni akkhīni yathā matassa, ko me imaṃ puttamakāsi eva”nti.
atk-s0513a4:3879_0: “Yakkhā have santi mahānubhāvā, anvāgatā isayo sādhurūpā;
atk-s0513a4:3880_0: Te duṭṭhacittaṃ kupitaṃ viditvā, yakkhā hi te puttamakaṃsu evaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3882_0: “Yakkhā ca me puttamakaṃsu evaṃ, tvaññeva me mā kuddho brahmacāri;
atk-s0513a4:3883_0: Tumheva pāde saraṇaṃ gatāsmi, anvāgatā puttasokena bhikkhu.
atk-s0513a4:3885_0: “Tadeva hi etarahi ca mayhaṃ, manopadoso na mamatthi koci;
atk-s0513a4:3886_0: Putto ca te vedamadena matto, atthaṃ na jānāti adhicca vede.
atk-s0513a4:3888_0: “Addhā have bhikkhu muhuttakena, sammuyhateva purisassa saññā;
atk-s0513a4:3889_0: Ekāparādhaṃ khama bhūripañña, na paṇḍitā kodhabalā bhavantī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3890_2: isayo sādhurūpā guṇasampannāti evaṃ jānamānāti attho.
atk-s0513a4:3890_3: Teti te isīnaṃ guṇaṃ ñatvā tava puttaṃ duṭṭhacittaṃ kupitacittaṃ viditvā.
atk-s0513a4:3890_4: Tvaññeva meti sace yakkhā kupitā evamakaṃsu, karontu,
atk-s0513a4:3890_7: kevalaṃ tvaññeva me puttassa mā kujjhi.
atk-s0513a4:3890_9: Bhikkhūti mahāsattaṃ ālapantī puttassa jīvitadānaṃ yācati.
atk-s0513a4:3890_10: Tadeva hīti diṭṭhamaṅgalike tadā tava puttassa maṃ akkosanakāle ca mayhaṃ manopadoso natthi,
atk-s0513a4:3890_11: etarahi ca tayi yācamānāyapi mama tasmiṃ manopadoso natthiyeva.
atk-s0513a4:3890_13: Adhiccāti vede uggahetvāpi atthānatthaṃ na jānāti.
atk-s0513a4:3891_0: Evaṃ tāya khamāpiyamāno mahāsatto “tena hi etesaṃ yakkhānaṃ palāyanatthāya amatosadhaṃ dassāmī”ti vatvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:3893_0: “Idañca mayhaṃ uttiṭṭhapiṇḍaṃ, tava maṇḍabyo bhuñjatu appapañño;
atk-s0513a4:3894_0: Yakkhā ca te naṃ na viheṭhayeyyuṃ, putto ca te hessati so arogo”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3896_2: Mahāsatto ucchiṭṭhakakañjikaṃ tattha āsiñcitvā “paṭhamaññeva ito upaḍḍhaṃ tava puttassa mukhe osiñcitvā
atk-s0513a4:3896_3: sesaṃ cāṭiyaṃ udakena missetvā sesabrāhmaṇānaṃ mukhe osiñcehi,
atk-s0513a4:3896_4: sabbepi nirogā bhavissantī”ti vatvā uppatitvā himavantameva gato.
atk-s0513a4:3896_5: Sāpi taṃ sarakaṃ sīsenādāya “amatosadhaṃ me laddha”nti vadantī nivesanaṃ gantvā paṭhamaṃ puttassa mukhe kañjikaṃ osiñci,
atk-s0513a4:3896_7: Itaro paṃsuṃ puñchanto uṭṭhāya “amma kimeta”nti āha.
atk-s0513a4:3896_8: Tayā kataṃ tvameva jānissasi. Ehi, tāta,
atk-s0513a4:3896_12: tvaṃ bālo dānassa mahapphalaṭṭhānaṃ na jānāsi,
atk-s0513a4:3896_15: ito paṭṭhāya mā etesaṃ dussīlānaṃ dānamadāsi,
atk-s0513a4:3901_0: “Jaṭā ca kesā ajinā nivatthā, jarūdapānaṃva mukhaṃ parūḷhaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:3902_0: Pajaṃ imaṃ passatha dummarūpaṃ, na jaṭājinaṃ tāyati appapaññaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3904_0: “Yesaṃ rāgo ca doso ca, avijjā ca virājitā;
atk-s0513a4:3906_0: Tattha mahakkasāvesūti mahākasāvesu mahantehi rāgakasāvādīhi samannāgatesu.
atk-s0513a4:3906_2: tava dakkhiṇeyyesu ekaccānaṃ kesā jaṭā katvā baddhā.
atk-s0513a4:3906_4: Jarūdapānaṃ vāti tiṇagahanena jiṇṇakūpo viya mukhaṃ dīghamassutāya parūḷhaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3906_5: Pajaṃ imanti imaṃ evarūpaṃ anañjitāmaṇḍitalūkhavesaṃ pajaṃ passatha.
atk-s0513a4:3906_6: Na jaṭājinanti etaṃ jaṭājinaṃ imaṃ appapaññaṃ pajaṃ tāyituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0513a4:3906_8: Yesanti yasmā yesaṃ ete rajjanadussanamuyhanasabhāvā rāgādayo aṭṭhavatthukā ca avijjā virājitā vigatā,
atk-s0513a4:3906_9: vigatattāyeva ca etesaṃ kilesānaṃ ye khīṇāsavā arahanto,
atk-s0513a4:3906_12: ito paṭṭhāya evarūpānaṃ dussīlānaṃ adatvā ye loke aṭṭhasamāpattilābhino pañcābhiññā dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇā ca paccekabuddhā ca santi,
atk-s0513a4:3906_14: tava kulūpake amatosadhaṃ pāyetvā aroge karissāmāti vatvā ucchiṭṭhakañjikaṃ gāhāpetvā udakacāṭiyaṃ pakkhipitvā
atk-s0513a4:3907_1: Atha ne brāhmaṇā “imehi caṇḍālucchiṭṭhakaṃ pīta”nti abrāhmaṇe kariṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3907_2: Te lajjitā bārāṇasito nikkhamitvā majjharaṭṭhaṃ gantvā majjharañño santike vasiṃsu,
atk-s0513a4:3907_4: Tadā vettavatīnagaraṃ upanissāya vettavatīnadītīre jātimanto nāmeko brāhmaṇo pabbajito jātiṃ nissāya mahantaṃ mānamakāsi.
atk-s0513a4:3907_5: Mahāsatto “etassa mānaṃ bhindissāmī”ti taṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā tassa santike uparisote vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0513a4:3907_6: So ekadivasaṃ dantakaṭṭhaṃ khāditvā “imaṃ dantakaṭṭhaṃ jātimantassa jaṭāsu laggatū”ti adhiṭṭhāya nadiyaṃ pātesi.
atk-s0513a4:3907_7: Taṃ tassa udakaṃ ācamantassa jaṭāsu laggi.
atk-s0513a4:3907_8: So taṃ disvāva “nassa vasalā”ti vatvā “kuto ayaṃ kāḷakaṇṇī āgato,
atk-s0513a4:3907_9: upadhāressāmi na”nti uddhaṃsotaṃ gacchanto mahāsattaṃ disvā “kiṃjātikosī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0513a4:3907_13: heṭṭhāsote vasāhī”ti vatvā heṭṭhāsote vasantenapi tena pātite dantakaṭṭhe paṭisotaṃ āgantvā jaṭāsu laggante so “nassa vasala,
atk-s0513a4:3907_15: sattame divase sattadhā muddhā phalissatī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:3908_2: upāyenevassa mānaṃ bhindissāmī”ti sattame divase sūriyuggamanaṃ nivāresi.
atk-s0513a4:3908_4: tumhe sūriyuggamanaṃ na dethā”ti pucchiṃsu. So āha –
atk-s0513a4:3908_13: tasmiṃ āgantvā khamāpanatthāya mama pādesu patite sūriyaṃ vissajjessāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3908_14: Te gantvā taṃ kaḍḍhantā ānetvā mahāsattassa pādamūle nipajjāpetvā khamāpetvā āhaṃsu “sūriyaṃ vissajjetha bhante”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3908_19: So “mattikāpiṇḍaṃ āharathā”ti āharāpetvā “imaṃ tāpasassa sīse ṭhapetvā tāpasaṃ otāretvā udake ṭhapethā”ti ṭhapāpetvā sūriyaṃ vissajjesi.
atk-s0513a4:3909_0: Mahāsatto taṃ dametvā “kahaṃ nu kho dāni soḷasa brāhmaṇasahassāni vasantī”ti upadhārento “majjharañño
atk-s0513a4:3909_1: santike”ti ñatvā “te damessāmī”ti iddhiyā gantvā nagarasāmante otaritvā pattaṃ ādāya nagare piṇḍāya cari.
atk-s0513a4:3909_2: Brāhmaṇā taṃ disvā “ayaṃ idha ekaṃ dve divase vasantopi amhe appatiṭṭhe karissatī”ti vegena gantvā “mahārāja,
atk-s0513a4:3909_6: Mahāsattopi missakabhattaṃ ādāya aññataraṃ kuṭṭaṃ nissāya pīṭhikāya nisinno bhuñjati.
atk-s0513a4:3909_7: Atha naṃ aññavihitakaṃ āhāraṃ paribhuñjamānameva raññā pahitapurisā asinā gīvaṃ paharitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3909_9: Imasmiṃ kira jātake bodhisatto koṇḍadamako ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:3909_11: Devatā kujjhitvā sakalameva majjharaṭṭhaṃ uṇhaṃ kukkuḷavassaṃ vassāpetvā raṭṭhaṃ araṭṭhamakaṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3912_1: pubbepi udeno pabbajite viheṭhesiyevā”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a4:3916_0: Sabbaṃ narānaṃ saphalaṃ suciṇṇanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto āyasmato mahākassapassa piyasaṃvāse dve saddhivihārike bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
