atk-s0513a4:3916_1: Te kira aññamaññaṃ appaṭivibhattabhogā paramavissāsikā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0513a4:3916_5: Dhammasabhāyaṃ bhikkhū tesaṃyeva vissāsaṃ vaṇṇayamānā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3916_8: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “anacchariyaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:3916_11: porāṇakapaṇḍitā tīṇi cattāri bhavantarāni gacchantāpi mittabhāvaṃ na vijahiṃsuyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:3917_0: Atīte avantiraṭṭhe ujjeniyaṃ avantimahārājā nāma rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a4:3917_3: aparopi satto tasseva mātucchāputto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0513a4:3917_6: Te ubhopi vayappattā caṇḍālavaṃsadhovanaṃ nāma sippaṃ uggaṇhitvā ekadivasaṃ “ujjenīnagaradvāre sippaṃ dassessāmā”ti eko uttaradvāre sippaṃ dassesi,
atk-s0513a4:3917_11: Tā bahukhādanīyabhojanīyamālāgandhādīni gāhāpetvā “uyyānakīḷaṃ kīḷissāmā”ti ekā uttaradvārena nikkhami,
atk-s0513a4:3917_13: Tā te caṇḍālaputte sippaṃ dassente disvā “ke ete”ti pucchitvā “caṇḍālaputtā”ti sutvā “apassitabbayuttakaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3917_14: vata passimhā”ti gandhodakena akkhīni dhovitvā nivattiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3917_16: tumhe nissāya mayaṃ amūlakāni surābhattādīni na labhimhā”ti te ubhopi bhātike pothetvā anayabyasanaṃ pāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:3918_0: Te paṭiladdhasaññā uṭṭhāya aññamaññassa santikaṃ gacchantā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne samāgantvā aññamaññassa taṃ
atk-s0513a4:3918_1: dukkhuppattiṃ ārocetvā roditvā paridevitvā “kinti karissāmā”ti mantetvā “imaṃ amhākaṃ jātiṃ nissāya dukkhaṃ uppannaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:3918_3: jātiṃ paṭicchādetvā brāhmaṇamāṇavavaṇṇena takkasilaṃ gantvā sippaṃ uggaṇhissāmā”ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā
atk-s0513a4:3918_4: tattha gantvā dhammantevāsikā hutvā disāpāmokkhācariyassa santike sippaṃ paṭṭhapesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3918_5: Jambudīpatale “dve kira caṇḍālā jātiṃ paṭicchādetvā sippaṃ uggaṇhantī”ti sūyittha.
atk-s0513a4:3919_0: Athekadivasaṃ eko gāmavāsī “brāhmaṇavācanakaṃ karissāmī”ti ācariyaṃ nimantesi.
atk-s0513a4:3919_1: Tameva rattiṃ devo vassitvā magge kandarādīni pūresi.
atk-s0513a4:3919_4: tvaṃ māṇavehi saddhiṃ gantā maṅgalaṃ vatvā tumhehi laddhaṃ bhuñjitvā amhehi laddhaṃ āharā”ti pesesi.
atk-s0513a4:3919_6: Yāva māṇavā nhāyanti ceva mukhāni ca dhovanti,
atk-s0513a4:3919_7: tāva manussā pāyāsaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nibbātūti ṭhapesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3919_9: Manussā dakkhiṇodakaṃ datvā tesaṃ purato pātiyo ṭhapesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3919_10: Sambhūto luddhadhātuko viya hutvā “sītalo”ti saññāya pāyāsapiṇḍaṃ ukkhipitvā mukhe ṭhapesi,
atk-s0513a4:3919_11: so tassa ādittaayoguḷo viya mukhaṃ dahi.
atk-s0513a4:3919_12: So kampamāno satiṃ anupaṭṭhāpetvā cittapaṇḍitaṃ oloketvā caṇḍālabhāsāya eva “khaḷu khaḷū”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:3919_13: Sopi tatheva satiṃ anupaṭṭhāpetvā caṇḍālabhāsāya eva “niggala niggalā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:3919_14: Māṇavā aññamaññaṃ oloketvā “kiṃ bhāsā nāmesā”ti vadiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3919_16: Māṇavā bahi nikkhamitvā vaggavaggā hutvā tattha tattha nisīditvā bhāsaṃ sodhentā “caṇḍālabhāsā”ti ñatvā “are duṭṭhacaṇḍālā,
atk-s0513a4:3919_17: ettakaṃ kālaṃ ‘brāhmaṇāmhā’ti vatvā vañcayitthā”ti ubhopi te pothayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3919_18: Atheko sappuriso “apethā”ti vāretvā “ayaṃ tumhākaṃ jātiyā doso,
atk-s0513a4:3919_19: gacchatha katthaci deseva pabbajitvā jīvathā”ti te ubho uyyojesi.
atk-s0513a4:3920_0: Tepi araññaṃ pavisitvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā na cirasseva tato cavitvā nerañjarāya tīre migiyā kucchismiṃ nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3920_1: Te mātukucchito nikkhantakālato paṭṭhāya ekatova vicaranti,
atk-s0513a4:3920_3: Te ekadivasaṃ gocaraṃ gahetvā ekasmiṃ rukkhamūle sīsena sīsaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:3920_5: tuṇḍena tuṇḍaṃ allīyāpetvā romanthayamāne ṭhite disvā eko luddako sattiṃ khipitvā ekappahāreneva jīvitā voropesi.
atk-s0513a4:3920_7: Tatrāpi vuddhippatte gocaraṃ gahetvā sīsena sīsaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:3920_8: tuṇḍena tuṇḍaṃ allīyāpetvā ṭhite disvā eko yaṭṭhiluddako ekappahāreneva bandhitvā vadhi.
atk-s0513a4:3920_9: Tato pana cavitvā cittapaṇḍito kosambiyaṃ purohitassa putto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0513a4:3920_11: Te nāmaggahaṇadivasato paṭṭhāya attano jātiṃ anussariṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:3920_12: Tesu sambhūtapaṇḍito nirantaraṃ sarituṃ asakkonto catutthaṃ caṇḍālajātimeva anussarati,
atk-s0513a4:3920_14: So soḷasavassakāle nikkhamitvā himavantaṃ pavisitvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā jhānābhiññaṃ nibbattetvā jhānasukhena vītināmento vasi.
atk-s0513a4:3920_15: Sambhūtapaṇḍitopi pitu accayena chattaṃ ussāpetvā chattamaṅgaladivaseyeva mahājanamajjhe maṅgalagītaṃ katvā udānavasena dve gāthā abhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:3920_16: Taṃ sutvā “amhākaṃ rañño maṅgalagīta”nti orodhāpi gandhabbāpi tameva gītaṃ gāyanti.
atk-s0513a4:3920_17: Anukkameneva “rañño piyagīta”nti sabbepi nagaravāsino manussā tameva gāyanti.
atk-s0513a4:3921_0: Cittapaṇḍitopi himavantapadese vasantoyeva “kiṃ nu kho mama bhātikena sambhūtena chattaṃ laddhaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:3921_1: udāhu na vā”ti upadhārento laddhabhāvaṃ ñatvā “navarajjaṃ tāva idāni gantvāpi bodhetuṃ na sakkhissāmi,
atk-s0513a4:3921_2: mahallakakāle naṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ kathetvā pabbājessāmī”ti cintetvā paṇṇāsa vassāni agantvā rañño
atk-s0513a4:3921_3: puttadhītāhi vaḍḍhitakāle iddhiyā gantvā uyyāne otaritvā maṅgalasilāpaṭṭe suvaṇṇapaṭimā viya nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:3921_4: Tasmiṃ khaṇe eko dārako taṃ gītaṃ gāyanto dārūni uddharati.
atk-s0513a4:3921_17: “Tena hi tvaṃ raññā dvīsu gītesu gāyitesu idaṃ tatiyaṃ katvā gāyassū”ti gītaṃdatvā “gantvā rañño santike gāyissasi,
atk-s0513a4:3921_18: rājā te pasīditvā mahantaṃ issariyaṃ dassatī”ti uyyojesi.
atk-s0513a4:3922_0: So sīghaṃ mātu santikaṃ gantvā attānaṃ alaṅkārāpetvā rājadvāraṃ gantvā “eko kira dārako tumhehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0513a4:3922_1: paṭigītaṃ gāyissatī”ti rañño ārocāpetvā “āgacchatū”ti vutte gantvā vanditvā “tvaṃ kira, tāta,
atk-s0513a4:3922_3: sabbaṃ rājaparisaṃ sannipātethā”ti sannipatitāya parisāya rājānaṃ āha “tumhe tāva, deva,
atk-s0513a4:3924_0: “Sabbaṃ narānaṃ saphalaṃ suciṇṇaṃ, na kammunā kiñcana moghamatthi;
atk-s0513a4:3927_0: “Sabbaṃ narānaṃ saphalaṃ suciṇṇaṃ, na kammunā kiñcana moghamatthi;
atk-s0513a4:3928_0: Kaccinnu cittassapi evamevaṃ, iddho mano tassa yathāpi mayha”nti.
atk-s0513a4:3929_0: Tattha na kammunā kiñcana moghamatthīti sukatadukkaṭesu kammesu kiñcana ekakammampi moghaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a4:3929_4: passāmahaṃ āyasmantaṃ sambhūtaṃ sakena kammena puññaphalūpapannaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:3929_5: sakammaṃ nissāya puññaphalena upapannaṃ taṃ passāmīti attho.
atk-s0513a4:3929_6: Kaccinnu cittassapīti mayañhi dvepi janā ekato hutvā na ciraṃ sīlaṃ rakkhimha,
atk-s0513a4:3929_7: ahaṃ tāva tassa phalena mahantaṃ yasaṃ patto,
atk-s0513a4:3929_8: kacci nu kho me bhātikassa cittassapi evameva mano iddho samiddhoti.
atk-s0513a4:3930_0: Tassa gītāvasāne dārako gāyanto tatiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:3932_0: “Sabbaṃ narānaṃ saphalaṃ suciṇṇaṃ, na kammunā kiñcana moghamatthi;
atk-s0513a4:3933_0: Cittampi jānāhi tatheva deva, iddho mano tassa yathāpi tuyha”nti.
atk-s0513a4:3936_0: “Bhavaṃ nu citto sutamaññato te, udāhu te koci naṃ etadakkhā;
atk-s0513a4:3937_0: Gāthā sugītā na mamatthi kaṅkhā, dadāmi te gāmavaraṃ satañcā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3938_0: Tattha sutamaññato teti ahaṃ sambhūtassa bhātā citto nāmāti vadantassa cittasseva nu te santikā sutanti attho.
atk-s0513a4:3938_1: Koci nanti udāhu mayā sambhūtassa rañño bhātā citto diṭṭhoti koci te etamatthaṃ ācikkhi.
atk-s0513a4:3938_4: Gāmavaraṃ satañcāti gāmavarānaṃ te sataṃ dadāmīti vadati.
atk-s0513a4:3941_0: “Na cāhaṃ citto sutamaññato me, isī ca me etamatthaṃ asaṃsi;
atk-s0513a4:3942_0: Gantvāna rañño paṭigāhi gāthaṃ, api te varaṃ attamano dadeyyā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3943_0: Tattha etamatthanti tumhākaṃ uyyāne nisinno eko isi mayhaṃ etamatthaṃ ācikkhi.
atk-s0513a4:3944_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā “so mama bhātā citto bhavissati,
atk-s0513a4:3944_1: idāneva naṃ gantvā passissāmī”ti purise āṇāpento gāthādvayamāha –
atk-s0513a4:3950_0: Ajjevahaṃ assamaṃ taṃ gamissaṃ, yattheva dakkhissamisiṃ nisinna”nti.
atk-s0513a4:3951_0: Tattha āhaññantūti āhanantu. Assamaṃ tanti taṃ assamaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:3952_0: So evaṃ vatvā rathaṃ abhiruyha sīghaṃ gantvā uyyānadvāre rathaṃ ṭhapetvā cittapaṇḍitaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0513a4:3952_1: vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno tuṭṭhamānaso aṭṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:3954_0: “Suladdhalābho vata me ahosi, gāthā sugītā parisāya majjhe;
atk-s0513a4:3955_0: Svāhaṃ isiṃ sīlavatūpapannaṃ, disvā patīto sumanohamasmī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:3956_1: suladdhalābho vata mayhaṃ chattamaṅgaladivase parisāya majjhe gītagāthā sugītāva ahosi,
atk-s0513a4:3956_2: svāhaṃ ajja sīlavatasampannaṃ isiṃ disvā pītisomanassappatto jātoti.
atk-s0513a4:3957_0: So cittapaṇḍitassa diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya somanassappatto “bhātikassa me pallaṅkaṃ attharathā”tiādīni āṇāpento navamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:3960_0: Agghe bhavantaṃ pucchāma, agghaṃ kurutu no bhava”nti.
atk-s0513a4:3961_0: Tattha aggheti atithino dātabbayuttakasmiṃ agghe bhavantaṃ āpucchāma.
atk-s0513a4:3961_1: Kurutu noti imaṃ no agghaṃ bhavaṃ paṭiggaṇhātu.
atk-s0513a4:3962_0: Evaṃ madhurapaṭisanthāraṃ katvā rajjaṃ majjhe bhinditvā dento itaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:3966_0: Tattha imaṃ issariyanti kapilaraṭṭhe uttarapañcālanagare rajjaṃ majjhe bhinditvā dvepi janā karoma anubhavāma.
atk-s0513a4:3967_0: Tassa taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā cittapaṇḍito dhammaṃ desento cha gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:3969_0: “Disvā phalaṃ duccaritassa rāja, attho suciṇṇassa mahāvipākaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:3970_0: Attānameva paṭisaṃyamissaṃ, na patthaye putta pasuṃ dhanaṃ vā.
atk-s0513a4:3973_0: Apattaññeva taṃ odhiṃ, naḷo chinnova sussati.
atk-s0513a4:3975_0: “Tattha kā nandi kā khiḍḍā, kā ratī kā dhanesanā;
atk-s0513a4:3976_0: Kiṃ me puttehi dārehi, rāja muttosmi bandhanā.
atk-s0513a4:3982_0: Sakehi kammehi supāpakehi, caṇḍālagabbhe avasimha pubbe.
atk-s0513a4:3986_3: Mayañhi ubho duccaritassa phalena ito catutthe attabhāve caṇḍālayoniyaṃ nibbattā.
atk-s0513a4:3986_4: Tattha na ciraṃ sīlaṃ rakkhitvā tassa phalena tvaṃ khattiyakule nibbatto,
atk-s0513a4:3986_6: evāhaṃ duccaritassa ca phalaṃ suciṇṇassa ca mahāvipākaṃ disvā attānameva sīlasaṃyamena paṭisaṃyamissaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:3986_7: puttaṃ vā pasuṃ vā dhanaṃ vā na patthemi.
atk-s0513a4:3987_1: mandadasakaṃ khiḍḍādasakaṃ vaṇṇadasakaṃ baladasakaṃ paññādasakaṃ hānidasakaṃ pabbhāradasakaṃ vaṅkadasakaṃ
atk-s0513a4:3987_2: momūhadasakaṃ sayanadasakanti imesañhi dasannaṃ dasakānaṃ vasena daseva vassadasā imesaṃ maccānaṃ idha
atk-s0513a4:3987_4: Tayidaṃ na niyamena sabbā eva etā dasā pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0513a4:3987_5: atha kho appattaññeva taṃ odhiṃ naḷo chinnova sussati.
atk-s0513a4:3987_7: tesampi mandadasake pavattā rūpārūpadhammā vicchinditvā ātape khittanaḷo viya tattheva sussanti antaradhāyanti,
atk-s0513a4:3987_8: taṃ odhiṃ atikkamitvā khiḍḍādasakaṃ na pāpuṇanti,
atk-s0513a4:3988_0: Tatthāti tasmiṃ evaṃ sussamāne jīvite kā pañca kāmaguṇe nissāya abhinandī,
atk-s0513a4:3989_1: ito pubbe catutthaṃ jātiṃ avantiraṭṭhe ujjeninagare caṇḍālā ahumha,
atk-s0513a4:3989_2: tato cavitvā nerañjarāya nadiyā tīre ubhopi migā ahumha.
atk-s0513a4:3989_3: Tattha dvepi amhe ekasmiṃ rukkhamūle aññamaññaṃ nissāya ṭhite eko luddako ekeneva sattipahārena jīvitā voropesi,
atk-s0513a4:3989_5: Tatrāpi no nissāya ṭhite eko nesādo ekappahāreneva bandhitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpesi,
atk-s0513a4:3989_6: tato cavitvā te mayaṃ ajja brāhmaṇakhattiyā jātā.
atk-s0513a4:3990_0: Evamassa atīte lāmakajātiyo pakāsetvā idāni imissāpi jātiyā āyusaṅkhāraparittataṃ dassetvā puññesu ussāhaṃ janento catasso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:3993_0: Karohi pañcāla mameta vākyaṃ, mākāsi kammāni dukkhudrayāni.
atk-s0513a4:3996_0: Karohi pañcāla mameta vākyaṃ, mākāsi kammāni dukkhapphalāni.
atk-s0513a4:3999_0: Karohi pañcāla mameta vākyaṃ, mākāsi kammāni rajassirāni.
atk-s0513a4:4001_0: “Upanīyati jīvitamappamāyu, vaṇṇaṃ jarā hanti narassa jiyyato;
atk-s0513a4:4002_0: Karohi pañcāla mameta vākyaṃ, mākāsi kammaṃ nirayūpapattiyā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4003_2: Idañhi imesaṃ sattānaṃ appamāyu sarasaparittatāyapi ṭhitiparittatāyapi parittakaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:4003_4: Na santi tāṇāti na hi jarāya maraṇaṃ upanītassa puttādayo tāṇā nāma honti.
atk-s0513a4:4003_6: Mākāsīti mā rūpādikāmaguṇahetu pamādaṃ āpajjitvā nirayādīsu dukkhavaḍḍhanāni kammāni kari.
atk-s0513a4:4003_9: Vaṇṇanti jīramānassa narassa sarīravaṇṇaṃ jarā hanti.
atk-s0513a4:4004_0: Evaṃ mahāsatte kathente rājā tussitvā tisso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:4006_0: “Addhā hi saccaṃ vacanaṃ tavetaṃ, yathā isī bhāsasi evametaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:4007_0: Kāmā ca me santi anapparūpā, te duccajā mādisakena bhikkhu.
atk-s0513a4:4009_0: “Nāgo yathā paṅkamajjhe byasanno, passaṃ thalaṃ nābhisambhoti gantuṃ;
atk-s0513a4:4010_0: Evampahaṃ kāmapaṅke byasanno, na bhikkhuno maggamanubbajāmi.
atk-s0513a4:4012_0: “Yathāpi mātā ca pitā ca puttaṃ, anusāsare kinti sukhī bhaveyya;
atk-s0513a4:4013_0: Evampi maṃ tvaṃ anusāsa bhante, yathā ciraṃ pecca sukhī bhaveyya”nti.
atk-s0513a4:4014_5: “Nāgo yathā”ti iminā attano kāmapaṅke nimuggabhāvassa upamaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0513a4:4014_6: Tattha byasannoti visanno anupaviṭṭho ayameva vā pāṭho.
atk-s0513a4:4014_7: Magganti tumhākaṃ ovādānusāsanīmaggaṃ nānubbajāmi pabbajituṃ na sakkomi,
atk-s0513a4:4014_8: idheva pana me ṭhitassa ovādaṃ dethāti.
atk-s0513a4:4017_0: “No ce tuvaṃ ussahase janinda, kāme ime mānusake pahātuṃ;
atk-s0513a4:4018_0: Dhammiṃ baliṃ paṭṭhapayassu rāja, adhammakāro tava māhu raṭṭhe.
atk-s0513a4:4021_0: Te annapānena upaṭṭhahassu, vatthena senāsanapaccayena ca.
atk-s0513a4:4024_0: Datvā ca bhutvā ca yathānubhāvaṃ, anindito saggamupehi ṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:4026_0: “Sace ca taṃ rāja mado saheyya, nārīgaṇehi paricārayantaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:4027_0: Imameva gāthaṃ manasī karohi, bhāsesi cenaṃ parisāya majjhe.
atk-s0513a4:4031_1: Dhammiṃ balinti dhammena samena anatirittaṃ baliṃ gaṇhāti attho.
atk-s0513a4:4031_2: Adhammakāroti porāṇakarājūhi ṭhapitaṃ vinicchayadhammaṃ bhinditvā pavattā adhammakiriyā.
atk-s0513a4:4031_9: sace te nārīgaṇaparivutassa rūpādayo vā kāmaguṇe rajjasukhaṃ vā ārabbha māno uppajjeyya,
atk-s0513a4:4031_10: athevaṃ cinteyyāsi ‘ahaṃ pure caṇḍālayoniyaṃ nibbatto channassa tiṇakuṭimattassapi abhāvā abbhokāsasayo ahosiṃ,
atk-s0513a4:4031_11: tadā hi me mātā caṇḍālī araññaṃ dārupaṇṇādīnaṃ atthāya gacchantī maṃ kukkuragaṇassa majjhe abbhokāse nipajjāpetvā attano khīraṃ pāyetvā gacchati,
atk-s0513a4:4031_12: sohaṃ kukkurehi parivārito tehiyeva saddhiṃ sunakhiyā khīraṃ pivitvā vaḍḍhito,
atk-s0513a4:4031_13: evaṃ nīcajacco hutvā ajja rājā nāma jāto’ti. ‘Iti kho,
atk-s0513a4:4031_15: iminā atthena attānaṃ ovadanto yo so pubbe abbhokāsasayo jantu araññe vajantiyā caṇḍāliyā ito cito ca
atk-s0513a4:4031_16: anusañcarantiyā sunakhiyā ca khīraṃ pāyito sunakhehi parikiṇṇo vaḍḍhito,
atk-s0513a4:4031_17: so ajja rājāti vuccatī’ti imaṃ gāthaṃ bhāseyyāsī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4032_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto tassa ovādaṃ datvā “dinno te mayā ovādo,
atk-s0513a4:4032_1: idāni tvaṃ pabbaja vā mā vā,
atk-s0513a4:4032_2: attanāva attano kammassa vipākaṃ paṭisevissatī”ti vatvā ākāse uppatitvā tassa matthake pādarajaṃ pātento himavantameva gato.
atk-s0513a4:4032_3: Rājāpi taṃ disvā uppannasaṃvego jeṭṭhaputtassa rajjaṃ datvā balakāyaṃ nivattetvā himavantābhimukho pāyāsi.
atk-s0513a4:4032_4: Mahāsatto tassāgamanaṃ ñatvā isigaṇaparivuto āgantvā taṃ ādāya gantvā pabbājetvā kasiṇaparikammaṃ ācikkhi.
atk-s0513a4:4033_2: porāṇakapaṇḍitā tīṇi cattāri bhavantarāni gacchantāpi daḷhavissāsāva ahesu”nti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a4:4037_0: Dūre apassaṃ therovāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto asadisadānaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:4037_2: Tadā pana rājā sattame divase sabbaparikkhāre datvā anumodanaṃ yāci,
atk-s0513a4:4037_7: parisā”ti vatvā “na ve kadariyā devalokaṃ vajantī”ti gāthāya dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0513a4:4037_8: Rājā pasīditvā satasahassagghanakena sīveyyakena uttarāsaṅgena tathāgataṃ pūjetvā nagaraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a4:4037_10: kosalarājā asadisadānaṃ datvā tādisenapi dānena atitto dasabalena dhamme desite puna satasahassagghanakaṃ sīveyyakavatthaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0513a4:4037_11: yāva atitto vata āvuso dānena rājā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4037_14: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā ‘imāya nāmā”ti vutte “bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a4:4037_16: porāṇakapaṇḍitā sakalajambudīpaṃ unnaṅgalaṃ katvā devasikaṃ chasatasahassapariccāgena dānaṃ dadamānāpi
atk-s0513a4:4037_17: bāhiradānena atittā ‘piyassa dātā piyaṃ labhatī’ti sampattayācakānaṃ akkhīni uppāṭetvā adaṃsuyevā”ti
atk-s0513a4:4038_0: Atīte siviraṭṭhe ariṭṭhapuranagare sivimahārāje rajjaṃ kārente mahāsatto tassa putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0513a4:4038_2: So vayappatto takkasilaṃ gantvā uggahitasippo āgantvā pitu sippaṃ dassetvā uparajjaṃ labhitvā aparabhāge
atk-s0513a4:4038_3: pitu accayena rājā hutvā agatigamanaṃ pahāya dasa rājadhamme akopetvā dhammena rajjaṃ kāretvā catūsu
atk-s0513a4:4038_4: dvāresu nagaramajjhe nivesanadvāre cāti cha dānasālāyo kāretvā devasikaṃ chasatasahassapariccāgena mahādānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:4038_6: Aṭṭhamiyaṃ cātuddasiyaṃ pannarasiyañca niccaṃ dānasālaṃ gantvā dānaṃ olokesi.
atk-s0513a4:4038_7: So ekadā puṇṇamadivase pātova samussitasetacchatte rājapallaṅke nisinno attanā dinnadānaṃ āvajjento bāhiravatthuṃ
atk-s0513a4:4038_8: attanā adinnaṃ nāma adisvā “mayā bāhiravatthu adinnaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a4:4038_11: aho vata ajja mama dānasālaṃ gatakāle kocideva yācako bāhiravatthuṃ ayācitvā ajjhattikassa nāmaṃ gaṇheyya,
atk-s0513a4:4038_12: sace hi me koci hadayamaṃsassa nāmaṃ gaṇheyya,
atk-s0513a4:4038_13: kaṇayena uraṃ paharitvā pasannaudakato sanāḷaṃ padumaṃ uddharanto viya lohitabindūni paggharantaṃ hadayaṃ nīharitvā dassāmi.
atk-s0513a4:4038_15: avalekhanasatthakena telasiṅgaṃ likhanto viya sarīramaṃsaṃ otāretvā dassāmi.
atk-s0513a4:4038_17: yantamukhe pakkhanditvā upanītaṃ bhājanaṃ pūretvā lohitaṃ dassāmi.
atk-s0513a4:4038_18: Sace vā pana koci ‘gehe me kammaṃ nappavattati,
atk-s0513a4:4038_20: rājavesaṃ apanetvā bahi ṭhatvā attānaṃ sāvetvā dāsakammaṃ karissāmi.
atk-s0513a4:4038_21: Sace me koci akkhino nāmaṃ gaṇheyya,
atk-s0513a4:4038_22: tālamiñjaṃ nīharanto viya akkhīni uppāṭetvā dassāmī”ti cintesi.
atk-s0513a4:4040_0: “Yaṃkiñci mānusaṃ dānaṃ, adinnaṃ me na vijjati;
atk-s0513a4:4041_0: Yopi yāceyya maṃ cakkhuṃ, dadeyyaṃ avikampito”ti. –
atk-s0513a4:4042_0: Cintetvā soḷasahi gandhodakaghaṭehi nhāyitvā sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍito nānaggarasabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā alaṅkatahatthikkhandhavaragato dānaggaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:4042_1: Sakko tassa ajjhāsayaṃ viditvā “sivirājā ‘ajja sampattayācakānaṃ cakkhūni uppāṭetvā dassāmī’ti cintesi,
atk-s0513a4:4042_3: udāhu no”ti tassa vimaṃsanatthāya jarāpatto andhabrāhmaṇo viya hutvā rañño dānaggagamanakāle ekasmiṃ
atk-s0513a4:4042_4: unnatappadese hatthaṃ pasāretvā rājānaṃ jayāpetvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:4042_8: tava dānajjhāsayaṃ nissāya samuggatena kittighosena sakalalokasannivāso nirantaraṃ phuṭo,
atk-s0513a4:4042_10: tvaṃ dvicakkhuko”ti vatvā cakkhuṃ yācanto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:4045_0: Ekanettā bhavissāma, cakkhuṃ me dehi yācito”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4047_0: Taṃ sutvā mahāsatto “idānevāhaṃ pāsāde nisinno cintetvā āgato,
atk-s0513a4:4047_3: adinnapubbaṃ dānaṃ dassāmī”ti tuṭṭhamānaso dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:4050_0: Suduccajaṃ yācasi uttamaṅgaṃ, yamāhu nettaṃ purisena ‘duccaja’nti.
atk-s0513a4:4054_0: “Yamāhu devesu sujampatīti, maghavāti naṃ āhu manussaloke;
atk-s0513a4:4055_0: Tenānusiṭṭho idha māgatosmi, vanibbako cakkhupathāni yācituṃ.
atk-s0513a4:4057_0: “Vanibbato mayha vaniṃ anuttaraṃ, dadāhi te cakkhupathāni yācito;
atk-s0513a4:4058_0: Dadāhi me cakkhupathaṃ anuttaraṃ, yamāhu nettaṃ purisena duccajaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:4061_0: Te te ijjhantu saṅkappā, labha cakkhūni brāhmaṇa.
atk-s0513a4:4064_0: Sa cakkhumā gaccha janassa pekkhato, yadicchase tvaṃ tadate samijjhatū”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4065_2: Te teti te tava tassa atthassa saṅkappā.
atk-s0513a4:4065_3: Sa cakkhumāti so tvaṃ mama cakkhūhi cakkhumā hutvā.
atk-s0513a4:4065_4: Yadicchase tvaṃ tadate samijjhatūti yaṃ tvaṃ mama santikā icchasi,
atk-s0513a4:4066_0: Rājā ettakaṃ kathetvā “idheva mayā akkhīni uppāṭetvā dātuṃ asāruppa”nti cintetvā brāhmaṇaṃ ādāya antepuraṃ
atk-s0513a4:4066_1: gantvā rājāsane nisīditvā sīvikaṃ nāma vejjaṃ pakkosāpetvā “akkhiṃ me sodhehī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:4066_2: “Amhākaṃ kira rājā akkhīni uppāṭetvā brāhmaṇassa dātukāmo”ti sakalanagare ekakolāhalaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:4066_3: Atha senāpatiādayo rājavallabhā ca nāgarā ca orodhā ca sabbe sannipatitvā rājānaṃ vārentā tisso gāthā avocuṃ –
atk-s0513a4:4068_0: “Mā no deva adā cakkhuṃ, mā no sabbe parākari;
atk-s0513a4:4069_0: Dhanaṃ dehi mahārāja, muttā veḷuriyā bahū.
atk-s0513a4:4074_0: “Yathā taṃ sivayo sabbe, sayoggā sarathā sadā;
atk-s0513a4:4076_1: Akkhīsu hi dinnesu rajjaṃ tvaṃ na kāressasi,
atk-s0513a4:4076_3: evaṃ tayā mayaṃ pariccattā nāma bhavissāmāti adhippāyenevamāhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:4076_5: Evaṃ dehīti yathā taṃ avikalacakkhuṃ sivayo parivāreyyuṃ,
atk-s0513a4:4076_8: Akkhīsu hi dinnesu na taṃ sivayo parivāressantīti.
atk-s0513a4:4079_0: “Yo ve dassanti vatvāna, adāne kurute mano;
atk-s0513a4:4080_0: Bhūmyaṃ so patitaṃ pāsaṃ, gīvāyaṃ paṭimuñcati.
atk-s0513a4:4082_0: “Yo ve dassanti vatvānaṃ, adāne kurute mano;
atk-s0513a4:4085_0: “Yañhi yāce tañhi dade, yaṃ na yāce na taṃ dade;
atk-s0513a4:4086_0: Svāhaṃ tameva dassāmi, yaṃ maṃ yācati brāhmaṇo”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4087_1: Pāpā pāpataroti lāmakāpi lāmakataro nāma hoti.
atk-s0513a4:4087_2: Sampatto yamasādhananti yamassa āṇāpavattiṭṭhānaṃ ussadanirayaṃ esa pattoyeva nāma hoti.
atk-s0513a4:4088_0: Atha naṃ amaccā “kiṃ patthetvā cakkhūni desī”ti pucchantā gāthamāhaṃsu –
atk-s0513a4:4090_0: “Āyuṃ nu vaṇṇaṃ nu sukhaṃ balaṃ nu, kiṃ patthayāno nu janinda desi;
atk-s0513a4:4091_0: Kathañhi rājā sivinaṃ anuttaro, cakkhūni dajjā paralokahetū”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4092_1: kathaṃ nāma tumhādiso paṇḍitapuriso sandiṭṭhikaṃ issariyaṃ pahāya paralokahetu cakkhūni dadeyyāti.
atk-s0513a4:4095_0: “Na vāhametaṃ yasasā dadāmi, na puttamicche na dhanaṃ na raṭṭhaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:4096_0: Satañca dhammo carito purāṇo, icceva dāne ramate mano mamā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4097_0: Tattha na vāhanti na ve ahaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:4097_1: Yasasāti dibbassa vā mānusassa vā yasassa kāraṇā.
atk-s0513a4:4097_2: Na puttamiccheti imassa cakkhudānassa phalena nevāhaṃ puttaṃ icchāmi,
atk-s0513a4:4097_4: apica sataṃ paṇḍitānaṃ sabbaññubodhisattānaṃ esa āciṇṇo samāciṇṇo porāṇakamaggo,
atk-s0513a4:4097_6: Na hi pāramiyo apūretvā bodhipallaṅke sabbaññutaṃ pāpuṇituṃ samattho nāma atthi,
atk-s0513a4:4097_8: Icceva dāne ramate mano mamāti iminā kāraṇena mama mano dāneyeva niratoti vadati.
atk-s0513a4:4098_0: Sammāsambuddhopi dhammasenāpatisāriputtattherassa cariyāpiṭakaṃ desento “mayhaṃ dvīhi cakkhūhipi sabbaññutaññāṇameva piyatara”nti dīpetuṃ āha –
atk-s0513a4:4099_0: “Na me dessā ubho cakkhū, attānaṃ me na dessiyaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:4100_0: Sabbaññutaṃ piyaṃ mayhaṃ, tasmā cakkhuṃ adāsaha”nti. ;
atk-s0513a4:4101_0: Mahāsattassa pana kathaṃ sutvā amaccesu appaṭibhāṇesu ṭhitesu mahāsatto sīvikaṃ vejjaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:4103_0: “Sakhā ca mitto ca mamāsi sīvika, susikkhito sādhu karohi me vaco;
atk-s0513a4:4104_0: Uddharitvā cakkhūni mamaṃ jigīsato, hatthesu ṭhapehi vanibbakassā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4105_2: tvaṃ mayhaṃ sahāyo ca mitto ca vejjasippe cāsi susikkhito,
atk-s0513a4:4105_4: Mama jigīsato upadhārentassa olokentasseva tālamiñjaṃ viya me akkhīni uddharitvā imassa yācakassa hatthesu ṭhapehīti.
atk-s0513a4:4106_0: Atha naṃ sīviko āha “cakkhudānaṃ nāma bhāriyaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:4106_5: So cintesi “ayuttaṃ mādisassa susikkhitassa vejjassa rañño akkhīsu satthapātana”nti.
atk-s0513a4:4106_6: So nānābhesajjāni ghaṃsitvā bhesajjacuṇṇena nīluppalaṃ paribhāvetvā dakkhiṇakkhiṃ upasiṅghāpesi,
atk-s0513a4:4106_19: Akkhi osadhabalena paribbhamitvā akkhikūpato nikkhamitvā nhārusuttakena olambamānaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:4106_26: Orodhā ca amaccā ca rañño pādamūle patitvā “deva akkhīni mā dehī”ti mahāparidevaṃ parideviṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:4107_3: devā”ti vāmahatthena akkhiṃ dhāretvā dakkhiṇahatthena satthakaṃ ādāya akkhisuttakaṃ chinditvā akkhiṃ gahetvā mahāsattassa hatthe ṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a4:4107_4: So vāmakkhinā dakkhiṇakkhiṃ oloketvā vedanaṃ adhivāsetvā “ehi brāhmaṇā”ti brāhmaṇaṃ pakkositvā “mama
atk-s0513a4:4107_5: ito akkhito sataguṇena sahassaguṇena satasahassaguṇena sabbaññutaññāṇakkhimeva piyataraṃ,
atk-s0513a4:4107_6: tassa me idaṃ paccayo hotū”ti vatvā brāhmaṇassa akkhiṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a4:4107_7: So taṃ ukkhipitvā attano akkhimhi ṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a4:4107_8: Taṃ tassānubhāvena vikasitanīluppalaṃ viya hutvā patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:4107_9: Mahāsatto vāmakkhinā tassa taṃ akkhiṃ disvā “aho,
atk-s0513a4:4107_10: sudinnaṃ mayā akkhidāna”nti anto samuggatāya pītiyā nirantaraṃ phuṭo hutvā itarampi akkhiṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a4:4107_11: Sakko tampi attano akkhimhi ṭhapetvā rājanivesanā nikkhamitvā mahājanassa olokentasseva nagarā nikkhamitvā devalokameva gato.
atk-s0513a4:4111_0: Sacakkhu brāhmaṇo āsi, andho rājā upāvisī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4112_1: ruhamānāni ca āvāṭabhāvaṃ appatvā kambalageṇḍukena viya uggatena maṃsapiṇḍena pūretvā cittakammarūpassa viya akkhīni ahesuṃ,
atk-s0513a4:4112_3: Atha mahāsatto katipāhaṃ pāsāde vasitvā “kiṃ andhassa rajjena,
atk-s0513a4:4112_4: amaccānaṃ rajjaṃ niyyādetvā uyyānaṃ gantvā pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karissāmī”ti cintetvā amacce pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0513a4:4112_5: tesaṃ tamatthaṃ ārocetvā “eko mukhadhovanādidāyako kappiyakārakova mayhaṃ santike bhavissati,
atk-s0513a4:4112_6: sarīrakiccaṭṭhānesupi me rajjukaṃ bandhathā”ti vatvā sārathiṃ āmantetvā “rathaṃ yojehī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:4112_7: Amaccā panassa rathena gantuṃ adatvā suvaṇṇasivikāya naṃ netvā pokkharaṇītīre nisīdāpetvā ārakkhaṃ saṃvidhāya paṭikkamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:4112_8: Rājā pallaṅkena nisinno attano dānaṃ āvajjesi.
atk-s0513a4:4112_9: Tasmiṃ khaṇe sakkassa āsanaṃ uṇhaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:4112_10: So āvajjento taṃ kāraṇaṃ disvā “mahārājassa varaṃ datvā cakkhuṃ paṭipākatikaṃ karissāmī”ti cintetvā tattha
atk-s0513a4:4112_12: Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā imā gāthā āha –
atk-s0513a4:4122_0: Sakkopi mahāsattena padasaddaṃ sutvā “ko eso”ti puṭṭho gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:4125_0: Varaṃ varassu rājīsi, yaṃ kiñci manasicchasī”ti. –
atk-s0513a4:4128_0: “Pahūtaṃ me dhanaṃ sakka, balaṃ koso canappako;
atk-s0513a4:4129_0: Andhassa me sato dāni, maraṇaññeva ruccatī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4131_0: Tattha maraṇaññeva ruccatīti devarāja, idāni mayhaṃ andhabhāvena maraṇameva ruccati, taṃ me dehīti.
atk-s0513a4:4132_1: kiṃ pana tvaṃ maritukāmo hutvā maraṇaṃ rocesi,
atk-s0513a4:4132_5: dānaṃ nāma na kevalaṃ samparāyatthameva dīyati,
atk-s0513a4:4132_7: tvañca ekaṃ cakkhuṃ yācito dve adāsi,
atk-s0513a4:4132_8: tena saccakiriyaṃ karohī”ti kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā āha –
atk-s0513a4:4135_0: Saccaṃ te bhaṇamānassa, puna cakkhu bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4136_3: mama dānanissandeneva me cakkhu uppajjatū”ti vatvā sakkena “mahārāja,
atk-s0513a4:4136_4: ahaṃ sakko devarājāpi na paresaṃ cakkhuṃ dātuṃ sakkomi,
atk-s0513a4:4136_5: tayā dinnadānassa phaleneva te cakkhu uppajjissatī”ti vutte “tena hi mayā dānaṃ sudinna”nti vatvā saccakiriyaṃ karonto gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:4139_0: Yopi maṃ yācate tattha, sopi me manaso piyo;
atk-s0513a4:4141_0: Tattha ye manti ye maṃ yācituṃ āgacchanti,
atk-s0513a4:4141_1: tesu yācakesu āgacchantesu yopi maṃ yācate,
atk-s0513a4:4141_3: Etenāti sace mama sabbepi yācakā piyā,
atk-s0513a4:4141_5: etena me saccavacanena ekaṃ me cakkhu upapajjatha upapajjatūti āha.
atk-s0513a4:4142_0: Athassa vacanānantarameva paṭhamaṃ cakkhu udapādi. Tato dutiyassa uppajjanatthāya gāthādvayamāha –
atk-s0513a4:4144_0: “Yaṃ maṃ so yācituṃ āgā, dehi cakkhunti brāhmaṇo;
atk-s0513a4:4149_0: Tattha yaṃ manti yo maṃ yācati.
atk-s0513a4:4149_1: Soti so cakkhuvikalo brāhmaṇo “dehi me cakkhu”nti yācituṃ āgato.
atk-s0513a4:4149_3: Bhiyyo maṃ āvisīti brāhmaṇassa cakkhūni datvā andhakālato paṭṭhāya tasmiṃ andhakāle tathārūpaṃ vedanaṃ
atk-s0513a4:4149_4: agaṇetvā “aho sudinnaṃ me dāna”nti paccavekkhantaṃ maṃ bhiyyo atirekatarā pīti āvisi,
atk-s0513a4:4149_7: Etenāti sace mama tadā anappakaṃ pītisomanassaṃ uppannaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:4149_9: etena me saccavacanena dutiyampi cakkhu upapajjatūti āha.
atk-s0513a4:4150_3: Sakkabrāhmaṇassa hi dinnaṃ cakkhuṃ puna pākatikaṃ kātuṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0513a4:4150_4: upahatavatthuno ca dibbacakkhu nāma na uppajjati,
atk-s0513a4:4150_5: tāni panassa saccapāramitānubhāvena sambhūtāni cakkhūnīti vuttāni.
atk-s0513a4:4150_6: Tesaṃ uppattisamakālameva sakkānubhāvena sabbā rājaparisā sannipatitāva ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:4150_7: Athassa sakko mahājanamajjheyeva thutiṃ karonto gāthādvayamāha –
atk-s0513a4:4157_1: imā te gāthā dhammena sabhāveneva bhāsitā.
atk-s0513a4:4157_5: imāni te cakkhūni devatānaṃ cakkhūni viya parakuṭṭaṃ paraselaṃ yaṃkiñci pabbatampi samatiggayha atikkamitvā
atk-s0513a4:4157_6: samantā dasa disā yojanasataṃ rūpadassanaṃ anubhontu sādhentūti attho.
atk-s0513a4:4158_0: Iti so ākāse ṭhatvā mahājanamajjhe imā gāthā bhāsitvā “appamatto hohī”ti mahāsattaṃ ovaditvā devalokameva gato.
atk-s0513a4:4158_1: Mahāsattopi mahājanaparivuto mahantena sakkārena nagaraṃ pavisitvā sucandakaṃ pāsādaṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0513a4:4158_2: Tena cakkhūnaṃ paṭiladdhabhāvo sakalasiviraṭṭhe pākaṭo jāto.
atk-s0513a4:4158_3: Athassa dassanatthaṃ sakalaraṭṭhavāsino bahuṃ paṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā āgamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:4158_4: Mahāsatto “imasmiṃ mahājanasannipāte mama dānaṃ vaṇṇayissāmī”ti rājadvāre mahāmaṇḍapaṃ kāretvā samussitasetacchatte
atk-s0513a4:4158_5: rājapallaṅke nisinno nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā sabbaseniyo sannipātetvā “ambho,
atk-s0513a4:4158_6: siviraṭṭhavāsino imāni me dibbacakkhūni disvā ito paṭṭhāya dānaṃ adatvā mā bhuñjathā”ti dhammaṃ desento catasso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:4160_0: “Ko nīdha vittaṃ na dadeyya yācito, api visiṭṭhaṃ supiyampi attano;
atk-s0513a4:4161_0: Tadiṅgha sabbe sivayo samāgatā, dibbāni nettāni mamajja passatha.
atk-s0513a4:4166_0: “Na cāgamattā paramatthi kiñci, maccānaṃ idha jīvite;
atk-s0513a4:4167_0: Datvāna mānusaṃ cakkhuṃ, laddhaṃ me cakkhuṃ amānusaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:4170_0: Datvā ca bhutvā ca yathānubhāvaṃ, aninditā saggamupetha ṭhāna”nti.
atk-s0513a4:4171_2: Cāgamattāti cāgapamāṇato aññaṃ varaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0513a4:4171_7: iminā kāraṇena veditabbametaṃ “cāgato uttamaṃ nāma natthī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4171_8: Etampi disvāti etaṃ mayā laddhaṃ dibbacakkhuṃ disvāpi.
atk-s0513a4:4172_0: Iti imāhi catūhi gāthāhi dhammaṃ desetvā tato paṭṭhāya anvaddhamāsaṃ pannarasuposathesu mahājanaṃ sannipātāpetvā niccaṃ imāhi gāthāhi dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0513a4:4172_1: Taṃ sutvā mahājano dānādīni puññāni katvā devalokaṃ pūrentova agamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:4173_2: porāṇakapaṇḍitā bāhiradānena asantuṭṭhā sampattayācakānaṃ attano cakkhūni uppāṭetvā adaṃsū”ti vatvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a4:4177_0: 83-103. Paññāyupetaṃ siriyā vihīnanti ayaṃ sirīmantapañho mahāumaṅge āvi bhavissati.
atk-s0513a4:4181_0: Ete yūthā patiyantīti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto āyasmato ānandassa jīvitapariccāgaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:4181_1: So panassa jīvitapariccāgo asītinipāte cūḷahaṃsajātake dhanapāladamane āvi bhavissati.
atk-s0513a4:4181_2: Evaṃ tenāyasmatā satthu atthāya jīvite pariccatte dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “āvuso,
atk-s0513a4:4181_3: āyasmā ānando sekkhapaṭisambhidappatto hutvā dasabalassatthāya jīvitaṃ pariccajī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4181_6: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a4:4181_8: pubbepesa mamatthāya jīvitaṃ pariccajiyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:4182_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente khemā nāmassa aggamahesī ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:4182_1: Tadā bodhisatto himavantapadese migayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā suvaṇṇavaṇṇo ahosi sobhaggappatto.
atk-s0513a4:4182_4: Mahāsatto pana rohaṇo nāma migarājā ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:4182_5: So himavante dve pabbatarājiyo atikkamitvā tatiyāya antare rohaṇaṃ nāma saraṃ nissāya asītimigasahassaparivāro vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0513a4:4182_7: Atheko bārāṇasito avidūre nesādagāmavāsī nesādaputto himavantaṃ paviṭṭho mahāsattaṃ disvā attano gāmaṃ
atk-s0513a4:4182_9: amhākaṃ kammabhūmiyaṃ asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne suvaṇṇavaṇṇo migo vasati,
atk-s0513a4:4183_0: Athekadivasaṃ khemā devī paccūsakāle supinaṃ addasa.
atk-s0513a4:4183_2: suvaṇṇavaṇṇo migo āgantvā kañcanapīṭhe nisīditvā suvaṇṇakiṅkiṇikaṃ ākoṭento viya madhurassarena deviyā dhammaṃ deseti,
atk-s0513a4:4183_4: Migo dhammakathāya aniṭṭhitāya eva uṭṭhāya gacchati,
atk-s0513a4:4183_6: Paricārikāyo tassā saddaṃ sutvā “pihitadvāravātapānaṃ gehaṃ vātassapi okāso natthi, ayyā,
atk-s0513a4:4183_8: Sā tasmiṃ khaṇe “supino aya”nti ñatvā cintesi “supinoti vutte rājā anādaro bhavissati,
atk-s0513a4:4183_22: idheva me maraṇa”nti rañño piṭṭhiṃ datvā nipajji.
atk-s0513a4:4184_1: labhissasī”ti parisamajjhe nisīditvā morajātake vuttanayeneva amacce ca brāhmaṇe ca pucchitvā “suvaṇṇavaṇṇā
atk-s0513a4:4184_2: migā nāma hontī”ti sutvā luddake sannipātetvā “evarūpo migo kena diṭṭho,
atk-s0513a4:4184_3: kena suto”ti pucchitvā tena nesādaputtena pitu santikā sutaniyāmena kathite “samma,
atk-s0513a4:4184_4: tassa te migassa ānītakāle mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ karissāmi,
atk-s0513a4:4184_5: gaccha ānehi na”nti vatvā paribbayaṃ datvā taṃ pesesi.
atk-s0513a4:4184_10: tumhe mā cintayitthā”ti vatvā attano nivesanaṃ gantvā puttadārassa paribbayaṃ datvā tattha gantvā taṃ
atk-s0513a4:4184_11: migarājānaṃ disvā “kasmiṃ nu kho ṭhāne pāsaṃ oḍḍetvā imaṃ migarājānaṃ gaṇhituṃ sakkhissāmī”ti vīmaṃsanto
atk-s0513a4:4184_13: So daḷhaṃ cammayottaṃ vaṭṭetvā mahāsattassa pānīyapivanaṭṭhāne yaṭṭhipāsaṃ oḍḍesi.
atk-s0513a4:4185_0: Punadivase mahāsatto asītiyā migasahassehi saddhiṃ gocaraṃ caritvā “pakatitittheyeva pānīyaṃ pivissāmī”ti tattha gantvā otarantoyeva pāse bajjhi.
atk-s0513a4:4185_2: ñātigaṇā pānīyaṃ apivitvāva bhītā palāyissantī”ti cintetvā yaṭṭhiyaṃ allīyitvā attano vase vattetvā pānīyaṃ pivanto viya ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:4185_3: Atha asītiyā migasahassānaṃ pānīyaṃ pivitvā uttaritvā ṭhitakāle “pāsaṃ chindissāmī”ti tikkhattuṃ ākaḍḍhi.
atk-s0513a4:4185_6: tatiyavāre nhāruṃ chinditvā pāso aṭṭhiṃ āhacca aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:4185_9: Cittamigo tiṇṇampi ghaṭānaṃ antare mahāsattaṃ adisvā “idaṃ bhayaṃ uppajjamānaṃ mama bhātu uppannaṃ bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0513a4:4185_10: cintetvā tassa santikaṃ gantvā baddhaṃ passi.
atk-s0513a4:4185_13: sāsaṅkaṃ idaṃ ṭhāna”nti vatvā uyyojento paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:4188_0: Gaccha tuvampi mākaṅkhi, jīvissanti tayā sahā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4189_0: Tattha eteti cakkhupathaṃ atikkamitvā dūragate sandhāyāha.
atk-s0513a4:4189_4: Tayā sahāti tvaṃ etesaṃ mama ṭhāne ṭhatvā rājā hohi,
atk-s0513a4:4193_0: Na taṃ ahaṃ jahissāmi, idha hissāmi jīvitaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:4196_0: Gaccha tuvampi mākaṅkhi, jīvissanti tayā saha.
atk-s0513a4:4199_0: Na taṃ baddhaṃ jahissāmi, idha hissāmi jīvita”nti.
atk-s0513a4:4200_3: Te hi nūnāti te amhākaṃ mātāpitaro ekaṃseneva dvīsupi amhesu idha matesu apariṇāyakā hutvā appaṭijaggiyamānā sussitvā marissanti,
atk-s0513a4:4200_7: Idha hissāmīti imasmiṃyeva ṭhāne jīvitaṃ jahissāmīti.
atk-s0513a4:4201_0: Iti vatvā bodhisattassa dakkhiṇapassaṃ nissāya taṃ sandhāretvā assāsento aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:4201_1: Sutanāpi migapotikā palāyitvā migānaṃ antare ubho bhātike apassantī “idaṃ bhayaṃ mama bhātikānaṃ uppannaṃ
atk-s0513a4:4201_3: Naṃ āgacchantiṃ disvā mahāsatto pañcamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:4204_0: Gaccha tuvampi mākaṅkhi, jīvissanti tayā sahā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4205_0: Tattha bhīrūti mātugāmo nāma appamattakenapi bhāyati,
atk-s0513a4:4205_3: Āyaseti so hi antoudake ayakkhandhaṃ koṭṭetvā tattha sāradāruṃ yaṭṭhiṃ bandhitvā oḍḍito,
atk-s0513a4:4205_5: Tayā sahāti te asītisahassā migā tayā saddhiṃ jīvissantīti.
atk-s0513a4:4206_0: Tato paraṃ purimanayeneva tisso gāthā honti –
atk-s0513a4:4209_0: Na taṃ ahaṃ jahissāmi, idha hissāmi jīvitaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:4212_0: Gaccha tuvampi mākaṅkhi, jīvissanti tayā saha.
atk-s0513a4:4215_0: Na taṃ baddhaṃ jahissāmi, idha hissāmi jīvita”nti.
atk-s0513a4:4216_0: Tattha te hi nūnāti idhāpi mātāpitaroyeva sandhāyāha.
atk-s0513a4:4217_0: Sāpi tatheva paṭikkhipitvā mahāsattassa vāmapassaṃ nissāya assāsayamānā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:4217_1: Luddopi te mige palāyante disvā baddharavañca sutvā “baddho bhavissati migarājā”ti daḷhaṃ kacchaṃ bandhitvā migamāraṇasattiṃ ādāya vegenāgacchi.
atk-s0513a4:4217_2: Mahāsatto taṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā navamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:4220_0: Yo no vadhissati ajja, usunā sattiyā apī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4221_1: Sattiyā apīti sattiyāpi no paharitvā vadhissati,
atk-s0513a4:4222_1: Sutanā pana sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ asakkontī maraṇabhayabhītā thokaṃ palāyitvā –
atk-s0513a4:4222_2: “ahaṃ dve bhātike pahāya kuhiṃ palāyissāmī”ti attano jīvitaṃ jahitvā nalāṭena maccuṃ ādāya punāgantvā bhātu vāmapasse aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:4227_0: Luddopi āgantvā te tayo jane ekato ṭhite disvā mettacittaṃ uppādetvā ekakucchiyaṃ nibbattabhātaro viya te maññamāno cintesi “migarājā,
atk-s0513a4:4227_2: ime pana dve janā hirottappabandhanena baddhā,
atk-s0513a4:4227_3: kiṃ nu kho ime etassa hontī”ti?
atk-s0513a4:4229_0: “Kiṃ nu teme migā honti, muttā baddhaṃ upāsare;
atk-s0513a4:4231_0: Tattha kiṃ nu temeti kiṃ nu te ime. Upāsareti upāsanti.
atk-s0513a4:4236_0: So tassa vacanaṃ sutvā bhiyyosomattāya muducitto ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:4236_3: ayañhi asītiyā migasahassānaṃ rājā sīlācārasampanno sabbasattesu muducitto mahāpañño andhe jiṇṇe mātāpitaro poseti.
atk-s0513a4:4236_4: Sace tvaṃ evarūpaṃ dhammikaṃ migaṃ māresi,
atk-s0513a4:4236_5: etaṃ mārento mātāpitaro ca no mañca bhaginiñca meti amhe pañcapi jane māresiyeva.
atk-s0513a4:4236_6: Mayhaṃ pana bhātu jīvitaṃ dento pañcannampi janānaṃ jīvitadāyakosī”ti vatvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:4239_0: Pañcannaṃ jīvitaṃ dehi, bhātaraṃ muñca luddakā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4240_0: So tassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā pasannacitto “mā bhāyi sāmī”ti vatvā anantaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:4244_0: Tattha voti nipātamattaṃ. Muttanti bandhanā muttaṃ passitvā.
atk-s0513a4:4245_0: Evañca pana vatvā cintesi “raññā dinnayaso mayhaṃ kiṃ karissati,
atk-s0513a4:4245_2: ayaṃ vā me pathavī bhijjitvā vivaraṃ dassati,
atk-s0513a4:4245_5: So mahāsattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā yaṭṭhiṃ pātetvā cammayottaṃ chinditvā migarājānaṃ āliṅgitvā udakapariyante
atk-s0513a4:4245_6: nipajjāpetvā muducittena saṇikaṃ pāsā mocetvā nhārūhi nhāruṃ,
atk-s0513a4:4245_8: cammena cammaṃ samodhānetvā udakena lohitaṃ dhovitvā mettacittena punappunaṃ parimajji.
atk-s0513a4:4245_9: Tassa mettānubhāveneva mahāsattassa pāramitānubhāvena ca sabbāni nhārumaṃsacammāni sandhīyiṃsu,
atk-s0513a4:4245_13: Taṃ disvā cittamigo somanassajāto luddassa anumodanaṃ karonto gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:4249_0: Atha mahāsatto “kiṃ nu kho esa luddo maṃ gaṇhanto attano kāmena gaṇhi,
atk-s0513a4:4249_1: udāhu aññassa āṇattiyā”ti cintetvā gahitakāraṇaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0513a4:4249_4: rañño pana aggamahesī khemā nāma tumhākaṃ dhammakathaṃ sotukāmā,
atk-s0513a4:4249_5: tadatthāya rañño āṇattiyā tvaṃ mayā gahito”ti. Samma,
atk-s0513a4:4249_6: evaṃ sante maṃ vissajjento atidukkaraṃ karosi,
atk-s0513a4:4249_14: Puna mahāsatto “iminā maṃ vissajjentena atidukkaraṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0513a4:4249_16: piṭṭhiṃ tāva me hatthena parimajjā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:4249_20: imāni haritvā rañño ca deviyā ca dassetvā ‘imāni tassa suvaṇṇavaṇṇamigassa lomānī’ti vatvā mama ṭhāne ṭhatvā imāhi gāthāhi deviyā dhammaṃ desehi,
atk-s0513a4:4249_22: “Dhammaṃ cara mahārājā”ti dasa dhammacariyagāthā uggaṇhāpetvā pañca sīlāni datvā appamādena ovaditvā uyyojesi.
atk-s0513a4:4249_23: Luddaputto mahāsattaṃ ācariyaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā catūsu ṭhānesu vanditvā lomāni paduminipattena gahetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a4:4249_24: Tepi tayo janā thokaṃ anugantvā mukhena gocarañca pānīyañca gahetvā mātāpitūnaṃ santikaṃ gamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:4249_26: tvaṃ kira pāse baddho kathaṃ muttosī”ti pucchantā gāthamāhaṃsu –
atk-s0513a4:4253_0: Tattha upanītasmīti tava jīvite maraṇasantikaṃ upanīte kathaṃ pamokkho āsi.
atk-s0513a4:4254_0: Taṃ sutvā bodhisatto tisso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:4264_3: Sutvāti so imesaṃ ubhinnaṃ vācaṃ sutvā.
atk-s0513a4:4269_0: Luddopi araññā nikkhamitvā rājakulaṃ gantvā rājānaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:4272_0: Atha kena nu vaṇṇena, migacammāni nāharī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4273_0: Tattha migacammānīti migaṃ vā cammaṃ vā.
atk-s0513a4:4273_4: nanu tvaṃ evaṃ avaca “migaṃ ānetuṃ asakkonto cammaṃ āharissāmi,
atk-s0513a4:4273_6: so tvaṃ kena kāraṇena neva migaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:4277_0: Abajjhi taṃ migarājaṃ, tañca muttā upāsare.
atk-s0513a4:4280_0: Imañcāhaṃ migaṃ haññe, ajja hissāmi jīvita”nti.
atk-s0513a4:4281_1: so migo mama hatthatthaṃ hatthapāsañceva mayā oḍḍitaṃ kūṭapāsañca āgato,
atk-s0513a4:4281_3: Tañca muttā upāsareti tañca baddhaṃ apare muttā abaddhāva dve migā assāsentā taṃ nissāya aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:4281_5: Imañcāhanti atha me saṃviggassa etadahosi “sace ahaṃ imaṃ migaṃ hanissāmi,
atk-s0513a4:4284_0: “Kīdisā te migā ludda, kīdisā dhammikā migā;
atk-s0513a4:4285_0: Kathaṃvaṇṇā kathaṃsīlā, bāḷhaṃ kho ne pasaṃsasī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4286_0: Idaṃ so rājā vimhayavasena punappunaṃ pucchati. Taṃ sutvā luddo gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:4290_4: Añjitakkhāti añjitehi viya visuddhapañcapasādehi akkhīhi samannāgatā.
atk-s0513a4:4291_0: Iti so kathentova mahāsattassa suvaṇṇavaṇṇāni lomāni rañño hatthe ṭhapetvā tesaṃ migānaṃ sarīravaṇṇaṃ pakāsento gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:4293_0: “Edisā te migā deva, edisā dhammikā migā;
atk-s0513a4:4294_0: Mātāpettibharā deva, na te so abhihāritu”nti.
atk-s0513a4:4295_0: Tattha mātāpettibharāti jiṇṇe andhe mātāpitaro posenti,
atk-s0513a4:4295_2: Na te so abhihāritunti so migarājā na sakkā kenaci tava paṇṇākāratthāya abhiharitunti attho.
atk-s0513a4:4295_4: so ahaṃ taṃ te paṇṇākāratthāya nābhihārayiṃ na āharinti attho.
atk-s0513a4:4296_0: Iti so mahāsattassa ca cittamigassa ca sutanāya migapotikāya ca guṇaṃ kathetvā “mahārāja,
atk-s0513a4:4296_1: ahaṃ tena migaraññā ‘attano lomāni dassetvā mama ṭhāne ṭhatvā dasahi rājadhammacariyagāthāhi deviyā dhammaṃ katheyyāsī’ti uggaṇhāpito āṇatto”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:4296_2: Taṃ sutvā rājā naṃ nhāpetvā ahatavatthāni nivāsetvā sattaratanakhacite pallaṅke nisīdāpetvā sayaṃ deviyā
atk-s0513a4:4296_3: saddhiṃ nīcāsane ekamantaṃ nisīditvā taṃ añjaliṃ paggayha yācati.
atk-s0513a4:4298_0: Idha dhammaṃ caritvāna, rāja saggaṃ gamissasi.
atk-s0513a4:4300_0: Idha dhammaṃ caritvāna, rāja saggaṃ gamissasi.
atk-s0513a4:4302_0: Idha dhammaṃ caritvāna, rāja saggaṃ gamissasi.
atk-s0513a4:4304_0: Idha dhammaṃ caritvāna, rāja saggaṃ gamissasi.
atk-s0513a4:4306_0: Idha dhammaṃ caritvāna, rāja saggaṃ gamissasi.
atk-s0513a4:4308_0: Idha dhammaṃ caritvāna, rāja saggaṃ gamissasi.
atk-s0513a4:4310_0: Idha dhammaṃ caritvāna, rāja saggaṃ gamissasi.
atk-s0513a4:4312_0: Idha dhammaṃ caritvāna, rāja saggaṃ gamissasi.
atk-s0513a4:4314_0: Idha dhammaṃ caritvāna, rāja saggaṃ gamissasi.
atk-s0513a4:4316_0: Suciṇṇena divaṃ pattā, mā dhammaṃ rāja pāmado”ti. ;
atk-s0513a4:4317_0: Iti nesādaputto mahāsattena desitaniyāmena ākāsagaṅgaṃ otārento viya buddhalīlāya dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0513a4:4317_3: Rājā tussitvā luddaputtaṃ mahantena yasena santappento tisso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:4322_0: “Dve ca sādisiyo bhariyā, usabhañca gavaṃ sataṃ;
atk-s0513a4:4323_0: Dhammena rajjaṃ kāressaṃ, bahukāro mesi luddaka.
atk-s0513a4:4326_0: Etena dāraṃ posehi, mā pāpaṃ akarī punā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4327_0: Tattha thūlanti mahagghaṃ maṇikuṇḍalapasādhanañca te dammi.
atk-s0513a4:4327_3: Umāpupphasarinnibhanti nīlapaccattharaṇattā umāpupphasadisāya nibhāya obhāsena samannāgataṃ,
atk-s0513a4:4327_5: Sādisiyoti aññamaññaṃ rūpena ca bhogena ca sadisā.
atk-s0513a4:4327_6: Usabhañca gavaṃ satanti usabhaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā gavaṃ satañca te dammi.
atk-s0513a4:4327_7: Kāressanti dasa rājadhamme akopento dhammeneva rajjaṃ kāressāmi.
atk-s0513a4:4327_8: Bahukāro mesīti suvaṇṇavaṇṇassa migarañño ṭhāne ṭhatvā dhammassa desitattā tvaṃ mama bahupakāro,
atk-s0513a4:4327_9: migarājena vuttaniyāmeneva te ahaṃ pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpito.
atk-s0513a4:4327_11: ahampi migarājānaṃ adisvā tassa vacanameva sutvā pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhito,
atk-s0513a4:4327_13: yāni tāni kasivāṇijjāni iṇadānaṃ uñchācariyāti ājīvamukhāni,
atk-s0513a4:4328_0: So rañño kathaṃ sutvā “na me gharāvāsenattho,
atk-s0513a4:4328_1: pabbajjaṃ me anujānātha devā”ti anujānāpetvā raññā dinnadhanaṃ puttadārassa datvā himavantaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0513a4:4328_2: isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā brahmalokaparāyaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:4328_3: Rājāpi mahāsattassa ovāde ṭhatvā saggapuraṃ pūresi,
atk-s0513a4:4329_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “evaṃ bhikkhave pubbepi mamatthāya ānandena jīvitaṃ pariccattamevā”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a4:4333_0: Ete haṃsā pakkamantīti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto ānandatherassa jīvitapariccāgameva ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:4333_1: Tadāpi hi dhammasabhāyaṃ therassa guṇakathaṃ kathentesu bhikkhūsu satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha,
atk-s0513a4:4333_3: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a4:4333_5: pubbepi ānandena mamatthāya jīvitaṃ pariccattamevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:4334_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ bahuputtako nāma rājā rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a4:4334_2: Tadā mahāsatto suvaṇṇahaṃsayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā navutihaṃsasahassaparivuto cittakūṭe vasi.
atk-s0513a4:4334_3: Tadāpi devī vuttanayeneva supinaṃ disvā rañño suvaṇṇavaṇṇahaṃsassa dhammadesanāsavanadohaḷaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0513a4:4334_4: Rājāpi amacce pucchitvā “suvaṇṇavaṇṇahaṃsā nāma cittakūṭapabbate vasantī”ti ca sutvā khemaṃ nāma saraṃ
atk-s0513a4:4334_5: kāretvā nānappakārāni nivāpadhaññāni ropāpetvā catūsu kaṇṇesu devasikaṃ abhayaghosanaṃ ghosāpesi,
atk-s0513a4:4334_9: suvaṇṇahaṃsānaṃ āgatakāle rañño ārocetvā pāsānaṃ oḍḍitaniyāmo ca,
atk-s0513a4:4334_11: sumukhassa haṃsasenāpatino tīsu haṃsaghaṭāsu taṃ adisvā nivattanañca sabbaṃ mahāhaṃsajātake āvi bhavissati.
atk-s0513a4:4334_12: Idhāpi mahāsatto yaṭṭhipāse bajjhitvā pāsayaṭṭhiyaṃ olambantoyeva gīvaṃ pasāretvā haṃsānaṃ gatamaggaṃ
atk-s0513a4:4334_13: olokento sumukhaṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā “āgatakāle naṃ vīmaṃsissāmī”ti cintetvā tasmiṃ āgate tisso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:4343_0: Mā anīghāya hāpesi, kāmaṃ sumukha pakkamā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4344_7: Anapekkhamānāti te mama ñātakā mayi anapekkhāva gacchanti.
atk-s0513a4:4344_9: Mā anīghāyāti ito gantvā pattabbāya niddukkhabhāvāya vīriyaṃ mā hāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:4348_0: Jīvitaṃ maraṇaṃ vā me, tayā saddhiṃ bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4349_0: Tattha dukkhaparetoti mahārāja, “tvaṃ maraṇadukkhapareto”ti ettakeneva nāhaṃ taṃ jahāmi.
atk-s0513a4:4350_0: Evaṃ sumukhena sīhanāde kathite dhataraṭṭho gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:4354_0: Tattha etadariyassāti yaṃ tvaṃ “nāhaṃ taṃ jahe”ti bhāsasi,
atk-s0513a4:4354_2: Patatetanti ahañca na taṃ vissajjetukāmova evaṃ avacaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:4354_3: atha kho taṃ vīmaṃsamāno “patatū”ti etaṃ vacanaṃ avassajiṃ,
atk-s0513a4:4355_0: Evaṃ tesaṃ kathentānaññeva luddaputto daṇḍamādāya vegenāgato.
atk-s0513a4:4355_1: Sumukho dhataraṭṭhaṃ assāsetvā tassābhimukho gantvā apacitiṃ dassetvā haṃsarañño guṇe kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:4355_3: So tassa muducittakaṃ ñatvā puna gantvā haṃsarājameva assāsento aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:4358_0: Ārā pāsaṃ na bujjhi tvaṃ, haṃsānaṃ pavaruttamā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4359_1: tumhādiso antalikkhacaro dijo apade ākāse padaṃ katvā yāti.
atk-s0513a4:4359_2: Na bujjhi tvanti so tvaṃ evarūpo dūratova imaṃ pāsaṃ na bujjhi na jānīti pucchati.
atk-s0513a4:4363_0: Atha jālañca pāsañca, āsajjāpi na bujjhatī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4364_1: yadā parābhavo avuḍḍhi vināso sampatto hoti,
atk-s0513a4:4364_2: atha poso jīvitasaṅkhaye patte jālañca pāsañca patvāpi na jānātīti attho.
atk-s0513a4:4365_0: Luddo haṃsarañño kathaṃ abhinanditvā sumukhena saddhiṃ sallapanto tisso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:4370_0: “Ete bhutvā ca pivitvā ca, pakkamanti vihaṅgamā;
atk-s0513a4:4373_0: “Kiṃ nu tyāyaṃ dijo hoti, mutto baddhaṃ upāsasi;
atk-s0513a4:4374_0: Ohāya sakuṇā yanti, kiṃ eko avahiyyasī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4375_0: Tattha tvaññevāti tvameva ohiyyasīti pucchati. Upāsasīti payirupāsasi.
atk-s0513a4:4378_0: “Rājā me so dijo mitto, sakhā pāṇasamo ca me;
atk-s0513a4:4379_0: Neva naṃ vijahissāmi, yāva kālassa pariyāya”nti.
atk-s0513a4:4380_1: yāva jīvitakālassa pariyosānaṃ ahaṃ etaṃ na vijahissāmiyeva.
atk-s0513a4:4381_0: Taṃ sutvā luddo pasannacitto hutvā “sacāhaṃ evaṃ sīlasampannesu imesu aparajjhissāmi,
atk-s0513a4:4381_2: kiṃ me rañño santikā laddhena dhanena,
atk-s0513a4:4383_0: “Yo ca tvaṃ sakhino hetu, pāṇaṃ cajitumicchasi;
atk-s0513a4:4384_0: So te sahāyaṃ muñcāmi, hotu rājā tavānugo”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4385_0: Tattha yo ca tvanti yo nāma tvaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:4385_2: Tavānugoti esa haṃsarājā tava vasaṃ anugato hotu,
atk-s0513a4:4386_0: Evañca pana vatvā dhataraṭṭhaṃ yaṭṭhipāsato otāretvā saratīraṃ netvā pāsaṃ muñcitvā muducittena lohitaṃ dhovitvā nhāruādīni paṭipādesi.
atk-s0513a4:4386_1: Tassa muducittatāya mahāsattassa pāramitānubhāvena ca tāvadeva pādo sacchavi ahosi,
atk-s0513a4:4386_3: Sumukho bodhisattaṃ oloketvā tuṭṭhacitto anumodanaṃ karonto gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:4390_2: Atha naṃ mahāsatto “kiṃ pana tvaṃ samma,
atk-s0513a4:4390_4: udāhu aññassa āṇattiyā”ti pucchitvā tena tasmiṃ kāraṇe ārocite “kiṃ nu kho me itova cittakūṭaṃ gantuṃ seyyo,
atk-s0513a4:4390_5: udāhu nagara”nti vimaṃsanto “mayi nagaraṃ gate luddaputto dhanaṃ labhissati,
atk-s0513a4:4390_10: tasmā nagarameva gantuṃ seyyo”ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā “ludda,
atk-s0513a4:4390_11: tvaṃ amhe kājenādāya rañño santikaṃ nehi,
atk-s0513a4:4390_20: Rājā haṃse disvāva somanassajāto hutvā dvepi haṃse kañcanapīṭhe nisīdāpetvā madhulāje khādāpetvā madhurodakaṃ
atk-s0513a4:4390_22: Haṃsarājā tassa sotukāmataṃ viditvā paṭhamaṃ tāva paṭisanthāramakāsi.
atk-s0513a4:4390_23: Tatrimā haṃsassa ca rañño ca vacanapaṭivacanagāthāyo honti –
atk-s0513a4:4395_0: “Kusalaṃ ceva me haṃsa, atho haṃsa anāmayaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:4398_0: “Kacci bhoto amaccesu, doso koci na vijjati;
atk-s0513a4:4399_0: Kacci ārā amittā te, chāyā dakkhiṇatoriva.
atk-s0513a4:4401_0: “Athopi me amaccesu, doso koci na vijjati;
atk-s0513a4:4402_0: Atho ārā amittā me, chāyā dakkhiṇatoriva.
atk-s0513a4:4413_0: “Satameko ca me puttā, dhataraṭṭha mayā sutā;
atk-s0513a4:4414_0: Tesaṃ tvaṃ kiccamakkhāhi, nāvarujjhanti te vaco”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4415_2: Phītanti kacci te idaṃ raṭṭhaṃ phītaṃ subhikkhaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:4415_5: Chāyā dakkhiṇatorivāti yathā nāma dakkhiṇadisābhimukhā chāyā na vaḍḍhati,
atk-s0513a4:4415_6: evaṃ te kacci amittā na vaḍḍhantīti vadati.
atk-s0513a4:4415_10: Puttarūpayasūpetāti puttehi ca rūpena ca yasena ca upetā.
atk-s0513a4:4415_11: Paññājavenāti paññāvegena paññaṃ javāpetvā tāni tāni kiccāni paricchindituṃ samatthāti pucchati.
atk-s0513a4:4415_12: Sammodanti tato tatoti yattha yattha niyuttā honti,
atk-s0513a4:4415_17: iti te maṃ nissāya vissutā pākaṭā jātāti mayā sutā nāma hontīti vadati.
atk-s0513a4:4415_18: Tesaṃ tvaṃ kiccamakkhāhīti tesaṃ mama puttānaṃ “idaṃ nāma karontū”ti tvaṃ kiccamakkhāhi,
atk-s0513a4:4416_0: Taṃ sutvā mahāsatto tassa ovādaṃ dento pañca gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:4419_0: Atha pacchā kurute yogaṃ, kicche āpāsu sīdati.
atk-s0513a4:4430_0: “Etaṃ me upamaṃ katvā, putte vijjāsu vācaya;
atk-s0513a4:4432_1: Pacchā kurute yoganti yo ce sikkhitabbasikkhāsu daharakāle yogaṃ vīriyaṃ akatvā pacchā mahallakakāle karoti,
atk-s0513a4:4432_2: evarūpo pacchā tathārūpe dukkhe vā āpadāsu vā uppannāsu sīdati,
atk-s0513a4:4432_4: Tassa saṃhīrapaññassāti tassa asikkhitattā tato tato haritabbapaññassa niccaṃ calabuddhino.
atk-s0513a4:4432_9: “yathā rattandho rattikāṇo rattiṃ candobhāsādīhi thūlarūpāneva passati,
atk-s0513a4:4432_11: evaṃ asikkhito saṃhīrapañño kismiñcideva bhaye uppanne sukhumāni kiccāni passituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0513a4:4432_13: tasmā tava putte daharakāleyeva sikkhāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4433_2: Matiṃ na tveva vindatīti bahuṃ sikkhitvāpi paññaṃ na labhatiyeva.
atk-s0513a4:4433_3: Giriduggasminti so evarūpo yathā nāma sarabho attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ āgacchanto antarāmagge visamampi samanti
atk-s0513a4:4433_4: maññamāno giridugge vegenāgacchanto narakapapātaṃ patitvā antarāyeva sīdati,
atk-s0513a4:4433_6: evametaṃ asāraṃ lokāyatavedasamayaṃ sārasaññāya uggahetvā mahāvināsaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0513a4:4433_7: Tasmā tava putte atthanissitesu vaḍḍhiāvahesu kiccesu yojetvā sikkhāpehīti.
atk-s0513a4:4433_9: hīnajātikopi uṭṭhānādiguṇasampanno rattiṃ aggikkhandho viya obhāsati.
atk-s0513a4:4433_10: Etaṃ meti etaṃ mayā vuttaṃ rattandhañca aggikkhandhañca upamaṃ katvā tava putte vijjāsu vācaya,
atk-s0513a4:4433_12: Evaṃ yutto hi yathā sukhette suvuṭṭhiyā bījaṃ saṃvirūhati,
atk-s0513a4:4434_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto sabbarattiṃ rañño dhammaṃ desesi,
atk-s0513a4:4434_2: Mahāsatto aruṇuggamanavelāyameva rājānaṃ pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhapetvā appamādena ovaditvā saddhiṃ sumukhena
atk-s0513a4:4435_2: pubbepi iminā mamatthāya jīvitaṃ pariccattamevā”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a4:4439_0: Migaluddo mahārājāti idaṃ satthā maddakucchismiṃ migadāye viharanto devadattaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:4439_1: Devadattena hi silāya paviddhāya bhagavato pāde sakalikāya khate balavavedanā uppajji.
atk-s0513a4:4439_9: Bhikkhū satthu santike nisinnāva kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “āvuso,
atk-s0513a4:4439_16: pubbepi devadatto pāpo pāpaparivāroyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:4440_0: Atīte uttarapañcālanagare pañcālo nāma rājā rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a4:4440_1: Mahāsatto araññāyatane ekasmiṃ sānupabbate simbalivane ekassa suvarañño putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0513a4:4440_3: Tassa pana pabbatassa uparivāte coragāmako ahosi pañcannaṃ corasatānaṃ nivāso,
atk-s0513a4:4440_6: Tāya pahaṭo eko suvapotako coragāmake corānaṃ āvudhantare patito,
atk-s0513a4:4441_0: Athekadivasaṃ rājā sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍito rathavaraṃ abhiruhitvā mahantena parivārena migavadhāya nagarato
atk-s0513a4:4441_1: nātidūre supupphitaphalitaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ upagumbavanaṃ gantvā “yassa passena migo palāyati,
atk-s0513a4:4441_2: tasseva gīvā”ti vatvā rathā oruyha paṭicchādetvā dinne koṭṭhake dhanuṃ ādāya aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:4441_3: Purisehi migānaṃ uṭṭhāpanatthāya vanagumbesu pothiyamānesu eko eṇimigo uṭṭhāya gamanamaggaṃ olokento
atk-s0513a4:4441_4: rañño ṭhitaṭṭhānasseva vivittataṃ disvā tadabhimukho pakkhanditvā palāyi.
atk-s0513a4:4441_5: Amaccā “kassa passena migo palāyito”ti pucchantā “rañño passenā”ti ñatvā raññā saddhiṃ keḷiṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:4441_6: Rājā asmimānena tesaṃ keḷiṃ asahanto “idāni taṃ migaṃ gahessāmī”ti rathaṃ āruyha “sīghaṃ pesehī”ti sārathiṃ āṇāpetvā migena gatamaggaṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0513a4:4441_7: Rathaṃ vegena gacchantaṃ parisā anubandhituṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0513a4:4441_8: Rājā sārathidutiyo yāva majjhanhikā gantvā taṃ migaṃ adisvā nivattanto tassa coragāmassa santike ramaṇīyaṃ
atk-s0513a4:4441_9: kandaraṃ disvā rathā oruyha nhatvā ca pivitvā ca paccuttari.
atk-s0513a4:4441_10: Athassa sārathi rathassa uttarattharaṇaṃ otāretvā sayanaṃ rukkhacchāyāya paññapesi,
atk-s0513a4:4441_13: Rājā antarantarā niddāyati ceva pabujjhati ca.
atk-s0513a4:4442_0: Coragāmavāsino corāpi rañño ārakkhaṇatthāya araññameva pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:4442_1: Coragāmake sattigumbo ceva bhattarandhako patikolambo nāmeko puriso cāti dveva ohīyiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:4442_2: Tasmiṃ khaṇe sattigumbo gāmakā nikkhamitvā rājānaṃ disvā “imaṃ niddāyamānameva māretvā ābharaṇāni gahessāmā”ti
atk-s0513a4:4442_3: cintetvā patikolambassa santikaṃ gantvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0513a4:4442_4: Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā pañca gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:4448_0: Tassā kuṭiyā nikkhamma, suvo luddāni bhāsati.
atk-s0513a4:4457_0: Ādāya vatthaṃ maṇikuṇḍalañca, hantvāna sākhāhi avattharāmā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4458_0: Tattha migaluddoti luddo viya migānaṃ gavesanato “migaluddo”ti vutto.
atk-s0513a4:4458_2: Takkarānaṃ kuṭiṃ katanti so rājā tattha araññe corānaṃ vasanatthāya kataṃ gāmakaṃ addasa.
atk-s0513a4:4458_4: Luddāni bhāsatīti patikolambena saddhiṃ dāruṇāni vacanāni katheti.
atk-s0513a4:4458_9: Sāhasāti sāhasena pasayhākāraṃ katvā gaṇhāmāti vadati.
atk-s0513a4:4458_12: yathā nisīthe aḍḍharattasamaye manussā kilantā sayanti,
atk-s0513a4:4458_15: Hantvānāti rājānaṃ māretvā vatthābharaṇānissa gahetvā atha naṃ pāde gahetvā kaḍḍhitvā ekamante sākhāhi paṭicchādemāti.
atk-s0513a4:4459_2: So tassa vacanaṃ sutvā nikkhamitvā olokento rājabhāvaṃ ñatvā bhīto gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:4462_0: Durāsadā hi rājāno, aggi pajjalito yathā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4466_0: Mātari mayha naggāya, kinnu tvaṃ vijigucchase”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4467_1: Mattoti corānaṃ ucchiṭṭhasuraṃ labhitvā tāya matto hutvā pubbe mahāgajjitāni gajjasi.
atk-s0513a4:4467_3: Sā kira tadā sākhābhaṅgaṃ nivāsetvā carati.
atk-s0513a4:4467_4: Vijigucchaseti mama mātari naggāya kinnu tvaṃ idāni corakammaṃ jigucchasi,
atk-s0513a4:4468_0: Rājā pabujjhitvā tassa tena saddhiṃ manussabhāsāya kathentassa vacanaṃ sutvā “sappaṭibhayaṃ idaṃ ṭhāna”nti sārathiṃ uṭṭhāpento gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:4471_0: Sakuṇo me na ruccati, aññaṃ gacchāma assama”nti.
atk-s0513a4:4472_0: Sopi sīghaṃ uṭṭhahitvā rathaṃ yojetvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:4476_0: Tattha balavāhanoti balavavāhano, mahāthāmaassasampannoti attho. Adhitiṭṭhāti abhiruha.
atk-s0513a4:4477_0: Abhiruḷhamatteyeva ca tasmiṃ sindhavā vātavegena pakkhandiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:4477_1: Sattigumbo rathaṃ gacchantaṃ disvā saṃvegappatto dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:4479_0: “Ko numeva gatā sabbe, ye asmiṃ paricārakā;
atk-s0513a4:4480_0: Esa gacchati pañcālo, mutto tesaṃ adassanā.
atk-s0513a4:4483_0: Esa gacchati pañcālo, mā vo muñcittha jīvata”nti.
atk-s0513a4:4484_0: Tattha ko numeti kuhiṃ nu ime.
atk-s0513a4:4484_3: Adassanāti etesaṃ corānaṃ adassanena mutto esa gacchatīti,
atk-s0513a4:4484_4: etesaṃ hatthato mutto hutvā esa adassanaṃ gacchatītipi attho.
atk-s0513a4:4485_0: Evaṃ tassa viravitvā aparāparaṃ dhāvantasseva rājā isīnaṃ assamaṃ patto.
atk-s0513a4:4485_3: So rājānaṃ disvā paccuggamanaṃ katvā paṭisanthāramakāsi.
atk-s0513a4:4485_4: Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā catasso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:4488_0: Svāgataṃ te mahārāja, atho te adurāgataṃ;
atk-s0513a4:4492_0: Phalāni khuddakappāni, bhuñja rāja varaṃ varaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:4495_0: Tato piva mahārāja, sace tvaṃ abhikaṅkhasi.
atk-s0513a4:4498_0: Sayaṃ uṭṭhāya gaṇhavho, hatthā me natthi dātave”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4499_5: Tato pivāti tato pānīyamāḷato gahetvā pānīyaṃ piva.
atk-s0513a4:4503_0: Atheso itaro pakkhī, suvo luddāni bhāsati.
atk-s0513a4:4505_0: “‘Etaṃ hanatha bandhatha, mā vo muñcittha jīvataṃ’;
atk-s0513a4:4507_1: Iccevanti ahaṃ pana tassa evaṃ vilapantasseva imaṃ assamaṃ sotthinā patto.
atk-s0513a4:4508_0: Rañño kathaṃ sutvā pupphako dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:4514_0: Asataṃ so, sataṃ ahaṃ, tena dhammena no vinā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4515_1: so ca ahañca ubho bhātaro homa.
atk-s0513a4:4515_5: sataṃ ahanti so asādhūnaṃ dussīlānaṃ santikaṃ upagato,
atk-s0513a4:4515_8: taṃ sattigumbaṃ corā coradhammena corakiriyāya vinesuṃ,
atk-s0513a4:4515_10: tasmā sopi tena coradhammena no vinā hoti,
atk-s0513a4:4518_0: “Tattha vadho ca bandho ca, nikatī vañcanāni ca;
atk-s0513a4:4519_0: Ālopā sāhasākārā, tāni so tattha sikkhati.
atk-s0513a4:4521_0: “Idha saccañca dhammo ca, ahiṃsā saṃyamo damo;
atk-s0513a4:4523_3: Sāhasākārāti gehaṃ pavisitvā maraṇena tajjetvā sāhasikakammakaraṇāni.
atk-s0513a4:4524_0: Idāni rañño dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:4526_0: “Yaṃ yañhi rāja bhajati, santaṃ vā yadi vā asaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:4527_0: Sīlavantaṃ visīlaṃ vā, vasaṃ tasseva gacchati.
atk-s0513a4:4530_0: Sopi tādisako hoti, sahavāso hi tādiso.
atk-s0513a4:4544_0: Asanto nirayaṃ nenti, santo pāpenti suggati”nti.
atk-s0513a4:4545_0: Tattha santaṃ vā yadi vā asanti sappurisaṃ vā asappurisaṃ vā.
atk-s0513a4:4545_1: Sevamāno sevamānanti seviyamāno ācariyo sevamānaṃ antevāsikaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:4545_3: Samphusaṃ paranti paraṃ ācariyaṃ samphusanto antevāsī vā.
atk-s0513a4:4545_4: Alittanti taṃ antevāsikaṃ pāpadhammena alittaṃ so ācariyo visadiddho saro sesaṃ sarakalāpaṃ viya limpati.
atk-s0513a4:4545_5: Evaṃ bālūpasevanāti bālūpasevī hi pūtimacchaṃ upanayhanakusaggaṃ viya hoti,
atk-s0513a4:4545_7: Dhīrūpasevanāti dhīrūpasevī puggalo tagarādigandhajātipaliveṭhanapattaṃ viya hoti,
atk-s0513a4:4545_8: paṇḍito bhavituṃ asakkontopi kalyāṇamittasevī guṇakittiṃ labhati.
atk-s0513a4:4545_10: Sampākamattanoti kalyāṇamittasaṃsaggavasena attano paripākaṃ paribhāvanaṃ ñatvāti attho.
atk-s0513a4:4545_11: Pāpenti suggatinti santo sammādiṭṭhikā attānaṃ nissite satte saggameva pāpentīti desanaṃ yathānusandhimeva pāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:4546_3: maṃ anukampamānā mama vasanaṭṭhāne vasathā”ti vatvā tesaṃ paṭiññaṃ gahetvā nagaraṃ gantvā suvānaṃ abhayaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a4:4546_5: Rājā isigaṇaṃ uyyāne vasāpento yāvajīvaṃ upaṭṭhahitvā saggapuraṃ pūresi.
atk-s0513a4:4546_6: Athassa puttopi chattaṃ ussāpento isigaṇaṃ paṭijaggiyevāti tasmiṃ kulaparivaṭṭe satta rājāno isigaṇassa dānaṃ pavattayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:4547_2: pubbepi devadatto pāpo pāpaparivāroyevā”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a4:4551_0: Bhallātiyo nāma ahosi rājāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto mallikaṃ deviṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:4551_1: Tassā kira ekadivasaṃ raññā saddhiṃ sayanaṃ nissāya kalaho ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:4551_3: Sā cintesi “nanu tathāgato rañño mayi kuddhabhāvaṃ na jānātī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4551_4: Satthā taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā punadivase bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto sāvatthiṃ piṇḍāya pavisitvā rañño gehadvāraṃ gato.
atk-s0513a4:4551_5: Rājā paccuggantvā pattaṃ gahetvā satthāraṃ pāsādaṃ āropetvā paṭipāṭiyā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nisīdāpetvā dakkhiṇodakaṃ
atk-s0513a4:4551_6: datvā paṇītenāhārena parivisitvā bhattakiccāvasāne ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:4551_8: mallikā na paññāyatī”ti pucchitvā “attano sukhamadamattatāyā”ti vutte “nanu, mahārāja,
atk-s0513a4:4551_9: tvaṃ pubbe kinnarayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā ekarattiṃ kinnariyā vinā hutvā satta vassasatāni paridevamāno vicarī”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:4552_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ bhallātiyo nāma rājā rajjaṃ kārento “aṅgārapakkamigamaṃsaṃ khādissāmī”ti rajjaṃ amaccānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:4552_1: niyyādetvā sannaddhapañcāvudho susikkhitakoleyyakasuṇakhagaṇaparivuto nagarā nikkhamitvā himavantaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0513a4:4552_2: anugaṅgaṃ gantvā upari abhiruhituṃ asakkonto ekaṃ gaṅgaṃ otiṇṇanadiṃ disvā tadanusārena gacchanto migasūkarādayo
atk-s0513a4:4552_4: Tattha ramaṇīyā nadikā paripuṇṇakāle thanapamāṇodakā hutvā sandati,
atk-s0513a4:4552_7: Udakapariyante rajatapaṭṭavaṇṇavālukā ubhosu tīresu nānāpupphaphalabharitavinamitā rukkhā pupphaphalarasamattehi
atk-s0513a4:4552_9: Evaṃ ramaṇīyāya hemavatanadiyā tīre dve kinnarā aññamaññaṃ āliṅgitvā paricumbitvā nānappakārehi paridevantā rodanti.
atk-s0513a4:4553_0: Rājā tassā nadiyā tīrena gandhamādanaṃ abhiruhanto te kinnare disvā “kiṃ nu kho ete evaṃ paridevanti,
atk-s0513a4:4553_1: pucchissāmi ne”ti cintetvā sunakhe oloketvā accharaṃ pahari.
atk-s0513a4:4553_2: Susikkhitakoleyyakasunakhā tāya saññāya gumbaṃ pavisitvā urena nipajjiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:4553_3: So tesaṃ paṭisallīnabhāvaṃ ñatvā dhanukalāpañceva sesāvudhāni ca rukkhaṃ nissāya ṭhapetvā padasaddaṃ
atk-s0513a4:4553_4: akaronto saṇikaṃ tesaṃ santikaṃ gantvā “kiṃkāraṇā tumhe rodathā”ti kinnare pucchi.
atk-s0513a4:4553_5: Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā tisso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:4555_0: “Bhallātiyo nāma ahosi rājā, raṭṭhaṃ pahāya migavaṃ acāri so;
atk-s0513a4:4559_0: Upāgami vacanaṃ vattukāmo, yatthaṭṭhitā kimpurisā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:4562_0: Pucchāmi vo mānusadehavaṇṇe, kathaṃ vo jānanti manussaloke”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4564_0: Rañño vacanaṃ sutvā kinnaro tuṇhī ahosi, kinnarī pana raññā saddhiṃ sallapi –
atk-s0513a4:4566_0: “Mallaṃ giriṃ paṇḍarakaṃ tikūṭaṃ, sītodakā anuvicarāma najjo;
atk-s0513a4:4567_0: Migā manussāva nibhāsavaṇṇā, jānanti no kimpurisāti luddā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4568_1: mayaṃ imaṃ mallagiriñca paṇḍarakañca tikūṭañca imā ca najjo anuvicarāma.
atk-s0513a4:4572_0: Pucchāmi vo mānusadehavaṇṇe, kimidha vane rodatha appatītā.
atk-s0513a4:4575_0: Pucchāmi vo mānusadehavaṇṇe, kimidha vane vilapatha appatītā.
atk-s0513a4:4578_0: Pucchāmi vo mānusadehavaṇṇe, kimidha vane socatha appatītā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4579_0: Tattha sukiccharūpanti suṭṭhu dukkhappattā viya hutvā.
atk-s0513a4:4579_1: Āliṅgito cāsi piyo piyāyāti tayā piyāya tava piyo āliṅgito ca āsi.
atk-s0513a4:4579_4: Kimidha vaneti kiṃkāraṇā idha vane antarantarā āliṅgitvā paricumbitvā piyakathaṃ kathetvā puna appatītā rodathāti.
atk-s0513a4:4583_0: Tamekarattaṃ anutappamānā, socāma ‘sā ratti punaṃ na hossati’.
atk-s0513a4:4586_0: Pucchāmi vo mānusadehavaṇṇe, kathaṃ vinā vāsamakappayittha.
atk-s0513a4:4589_0: Taṃ me piyo uttari vassakāle, mamañca maññaṃ anubandhatīti.
atk-s0513a4:4592_0: ‘Piyo ca me hehiti mālabhārī, ahañca naṃ mālinī ajjhupessaṃ’.
atk-s0513a4:4595_0: ‘Piyo ca me hehiti mālabhārī, ahañca naṃ mālinī ajjhupessaṃ’.
atk-s0513a4:4597_0: “Ahañca sālassa supupphitassa, oceyya pupphāni karomi mālaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:4598_0: ‘Piyo ca me hehiti mālabhārī, ahañca naṃ mālinī ajjhupessaṃ’.
atk-s0513a4:4600_0: “Ahañca sālassa supupphitassa, oceyya pupphāni karomi bhāraṃ;
atk-s0513a4:4601_0: Idañca no hehiti santharatthaṃ, yatthajjimaṃ viharissāma rattiṃ.
atk-s0513a4:4603_0: “Ahañca kho agaḷuṃ candanañca, silāya piṃsāmi pamattarūpā;
atk-s0513a4:4604_0: ‘Piyo ca me hehiti rositaṅgo, ahañca naṃ rositā ajjhupessaṃ’.
atk-s0513a4:4606_0: “Athāgamā salilaṃ sīghasotaṃ, nudaṃ sāle salaḷe kaṇṇikāre;
atk-s0513a4:4607_0: Āpūratha tena muhuttakena, sāyaṃ nadī āsi mayā suduttarā.
atk-s0513a4:4609_0: “Ubhosu tīresu mayaṃ tadā ṭhitā, sampassantā ubhayo aññamaññaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:4610_0: Sakimpi rodāma sakiṃ hasāma, kicchena no āgamā saṃvarī sā.
atk-s0513a4:4612_0: “Pātova kho uggate sūriyamhi, catukkaṃ nadiṃ uttariyāna ludda;
atk-s0513a4:4613_0: Āliṅgiyā aññamaññaṃ mayaṃ ubho, sakimpi rodāma sakiṃ hasāma.
atk-s0513a4:4615_0: “Tīhūnakaṃ satta satāni ludda, yamidha mayaṃ vippavasimha pubbe;
atk-s0513a4:4616_0: Vassekimaṃ jīvitaṃ bhūmipāla, ko nīdha kantāya vinā vaseyya.
atk-s0513a4:4618_0: “Āyuñca vo kīvatako nu samma, sacepi jānātha vadetha āyuṃ;
atk-s0513a4:4619_0: Anussavā vuḍḍhato āgamā vā, akkhātha metaṃ avikampamānā.
atk-s0513a4:4621_0: “Āyuñca no vassasahassaṃ ludda, na cantarā pāpako atthi rogo;
atk-s0513a4:4622_0: Appañca dukkhaṃ sukhameva bhiyyo, avītarāgā vijahāma jīvita”nti.
atk-s0513a4:4623_2: Anutappamānāti “anicchamānānaṃ no ekaratto atīto”ti taṃ ekarattaṃ anucintayamānā.
atk-s0513a4:4623_3: Punaṃ na hessatīti puna na bhavissati nāgamissatīti socāma.
atk-s0513a4:4623_4: Dhanaṃva naṭṭhaṃ pitaraṃva petanti dhanaṃ vā naṭṭhaṃ pitaraṃ vā mātaraṃ vāpetaṃ kālakataṃ kiṃ nu kho
atk-s0513a4:4623_5: tumhe cintayamānā kena kāraṇena taṃ ekarattaṃ vinā vāsaṃ akappayittha,
atk-s0513a4:4623_10: Amhākañhi imasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe rativasena carantānaṃ eko megho uṭṭhahi.
atk-s0513a4:4623_11: Atha me piyasāmiko kinnaromaṃ “pacchato āgacchatī”ti maññamāno etaṃ nadiṃ uttarīti āha.
atk-s0513a4:4624_0: Ahañcāti ahaṃ panetassa paratīraṃ gatabhāvaṃ ajānantī supupphitāni aṅkolakādīni pupphāni ocināmi.
atk-s0513a4:4624_1: Tattha sattaliyothikañcāti kundālapupphañca suvaṇṇayothikañca ocinantī pana “piyo ca me mālabhārī bhavissati,
atk-s0513a4:4624_2: ahañca naṃ mālinī hutvā ajjhupessa”nti iminā kāraṇena ocināmi.
atk-s0513a4:4624_3: Uddālakā pāṭalisindhuvārakāti tepi mayā ocitāyevāti vadati.
atk-s0513a4:4624_9: Nudaṃ sāle salaḷe kaṇṇikāreti etāni mayā ocinitvā tīre ṭhapitāni pupphāni nudantaṃ harantaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:4624_10: Suduttarāti tassā hi orimatīre ṭhitakāleyeva nadiyā udakaṃ āgataṃ,
atk-s0513a4:4625_7: Yamidha mayanti yaṃ kālaṃ idha mayaṃ vippavasimha,
atk-s0513a4:4625_8: so ito tīhi ūnakāni satta vassasatāni hontīti vadati.
atk-s0513a4:4625_10: tumhākaṃ ekameva vassasataṃ imaṃ jīvitanti vadati.
atk-s0513a4:4625_11: Ko nīdhāti evaṃ parittake jīvite ko nu idha kantāya vinā bhaveyya,
atk-s0513a4:4625_12: ayuttaṃ tava piyabhariyāya vinā bhavitunti dīpeti.
atk-s0513a4:4626_0: Kīvatako nūti rājā kinnariyā vacanaṃ sutvā “imesaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ pucchissāmī”ti cintetvā “tumhākaṃ kittako āyū”ti pucchati.
atk-s0513a4:4626_1: Anussavāti sace vo kassaci vadantassa vā sutaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:4626_2: mātāpitūnaṃ vā vuḍḍhānaṃ mahallakānaṃ santikā āgamo atthi,
atk-s0513a4:4626_3: atha me tato anussavā vuḍḍhato āgamā vā etaṃ avikampamānā akkhātha.
atk-s0513a4:4626_5: antarā ca no pāpako jīvitantarāyakaro rogopi natthi.
atk-s0513a4:4627_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā “ime hi nāma tiracchānagatā hutvā ekarattiṃ vippayogena satta vassasatāni rodantā vicaranti,
atk-s0513a4:4627_1: ahaṃ pana tiyojanasatike rajje mahāsampattiṃ pahāya araññe vicarāmi,
atk-s0513a4:4627_2: aho akiccakārimhī”ti tatova nivatto bārāṇasiṃ gantvā “kiṃ te, mahārāja,
atk-s0513a4:4627_3: himavante acchariyaṃ diṭṭha”nti amaccehi puṭṭho sabbaṃ ārocetvā tato paṭṭhāya dānāni dadanto bhoge bhuñji.
atk-s0513a4:4630_0: Nivattatha na migavaṃ acari, adāsi dānāni abhuñji bhoge”ti. –
atk-s0513a4:4631_0: Imaṃ gāthaṃ vatvā puna ovadanto dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:4633_0: “Idañca sutvāna amānusānaṃ, sammodatha mā kalahaṃ akattha;
atk-s0513a4:4634_0: Mā vo tapī attakammāparādho, yathāpi te kimpurisekarattaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:4636_0: “Idañca sutvāna amānusānaṃ, sammodatha mā vivādaṃ akattha;
atk-s0513a4:4637_0: Mā vo tapī attakammāparādho, yathāpi te kimpurisekaratta”nti.
atk-s0513a4:4638_2: Kimpurisekarattanti yathā te kimpurise ekarattiṃ kato attano kammadoso tapi,
atk-s0513a4:4639_0: Mallikā devī tathāgatassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā uṭṭhāyāsanā añjaliṃ paggayha dasabalassa thutiṃ karontī osānagāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:4642_0: Muñcaṃ giraṃ nudaseva me daraṃ, samaṇa sukhāvaha jīva me cira”nti.
atk-s0513a4:4643_1: tumhehi vividhehi nānākāraṇehi alaṅkaritvā desitaṃ dhammadesanaṃ ahaṃ adhimanā pasannacittā hutvā suṇomi.
atk-s0513a4:4643_3: Muñcaṃ giraṃ nudaseva me daranti kaṇṇasukhaṃ madhuraṃ giraṃ muñcanto mama hadaye sokadarathaṃ nudasiyeva harasiyeva.
atk-s0513a4:4643_4: Samaṇa sukhāvaha jīva me ciranti bhante buddhasamaṇa,
atk-s0513a4:4644_0: Kosalarājā tato paṭṭhāya tāya saddhiṃ samaggavāsaṃ vasi.
atk-s0513a4:4645_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a4:4649_0: Ko taṃ hiṃsati heṭhetīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto devadattassa vadhāya parisakkanaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:4649_3: pubbepesa mama vadhāya parisakkiyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:4650_0: Atīte kururaṭṭhe uttarapañcālanagare reṇu nāma rājā rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a4:4650_1: Tadā mahārakkhito nāma tāpaso pañcasatatāpasaparivāro himavante ciraṃ vasitvā loṇambilasevanatthāya cārikaṃ
atk-s0513a4:4650_2: caranto uttarapañcālanagaraṃ patvā rājuyyāne vasitvā sapariso piṇḍāya caranto rājadvāraṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a4:4650_3: Rājā isigaṇaṃ disvā iriyāpathe pasanno alaṅkatamahātale nisīdāpetvā paṇītenāhārena parivisitvā “bhante,
atk-s0513a4:4650_4: imaṃ vassārattaṃ mama uyyāneyeva vasathā”ti vatvā tehi saddhiṃ uyyānaṃ gantvā vasanaṭṭhānāni kāretvā pabbajitaparikkhāre datvā vanditvā nikkhami.
atk-s0513a4:4650_5: Tato paṭṭhāya sabbepi te rājanivesane bhuñjanti.
atk-s0513a4:4650_9: tattheva gamissāmā”ti rājānaṃ āpucchitvā raññā katasakkārasammāno nikkhamitvā antarāmagge majjhanhikasamaye
atk-s0513a4:4650_10: maggā okkamma ekassa sandacchāyassa rukkhassa heṭṭhā taruṇatiṇapiṭṭhe saparivāro nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:4651_0: Tāpasā kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “rājagehe vaṃsānurakkhito putto natthi,
atk-s0513a4:4651_1: sādhu vatassa sace rājā puttaṃ labheyya,
atk-s0513a4:4651_3: Mahārakkhito tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā “bhavissati nu kho rañño putto,
atk-s0513a4:4651_4: udāhu no”ti upadhārento “bhavissatī”ti ñatvā evamāha “mā bhonto cintayittha,
atk-s0513a4:4651_5: ajja paccūsakāle eko devaputto cavitvā rañño aggamahesiyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhissatī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4651_6: Taṃ sutvā eko kuṭajaṭilo “idāni rājakulūpako bhavissāmī”ti cintetvā tāpasānaṃ gamanakāle gilānālayaṃ
atk-s0513a4:4651_7: katvā nipajjitvā “ehi gacchāmā”ti vutto “na sakkomī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:4651_9: tadā āgaccheyyāsī”ti vatvā isigaṇaṃ ādāya himavantameva gato.
atk-s0513a4:4651_10: Kuhakopi nivattitvā vegenāgantvā rājadvāre ṭhatvā “mahārakkhitassa upaṭṭhākatāpaso āgato”ti rañño ārocāpetvā
atk-s0513a4:4651_11: raññā vegena pakkosāpito pāsādaṃ abhiruyha paññattāsane nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:4651_12: Rājā kuhakaṃ tāpasaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno isīnaṃ ārogyaṃ pucchitvā “bhante,
atk-s0513a4:4651_16: sace rañño paveṇipālako putto uppajjeyyā’ti kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:4651_17: Ahaṃ kathaṃ sutvā “bhavissati nu kho rañño putto,
atk-s0513a4:4651_18: udāhu no”ti dibbacakkhunā olokento “mahiddhiko devaputto cavitvā aggamahesiyā sudhammāya kucchimhi nibbattissatī”ti disvā “ajānantā gabbhaṃ nāseyyuṃ,
atk-s0513a4:4651_24: na sakkā gantu”nti haṭṭhatuṭṭho pasannacitto kuhakatāpasaṃ uyyānaṃ netvā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ saṃvidahitvā adāsi.
atk-s0513a4:4651_25: So tato paṭṭhāya rājakule bhuñjanto vasati,
atk-s0513a4:4652_0: Tadā bodhisatto tāvatiṃsabhavanā cavitvā tattha paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a4:4652_3: Kuhakatāpasopi uyyānassa ekasmiṃ passe nānappakāraṃ sūpeyyasākañca valliphalāni ca ropetvā paṇṇikānaṃ hatthe vikkiṇanto dhanaṃ saṇṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a4:4652_5: “Dibbacakkhutāpasaṃ mā pamajjī”ti kumāraṃ paṭicchāpetvā “paccantaṃ vūpasamessāmī”ti gato.
atk-s0513a4:4652_6: Athekadivasaṃ kumāro “jaṭilaṃ passissāmī”ti uyyānaṃ gantvā kūṭajaṭilaṃ ekaṃ gaṇṭhikakāsāvaṃ nivāsetvā
atk-s0513a4:4652_7: ekaṃ pārupitvā ubhohi hatthehi dve udakaghaṭe gahetvā sākavatthusmiṃ udakaṃ āsiñcantaṃ disvā “ayaṃ kūṭajaṭilo
atk-s0513a4:4652_8: attano samaṇadhammaṃ akatvā paṇṇikakammaṃ karotī”ti ñatvā “kiṃ karosi paṇṇikagahapatikā”ti taṃ lajjāpetvā
atk-s0513a4:4652_12: idāneva naṃ nāsetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā rañño āgamanakāle pāsāṇaphalakaṃ ekamantaṃ khipitvā pānīyaghaṭaṃ
atk-s0513a4:4652_13: bhinditvā paṇṇasālāya tiṇāni vikiritvā sarīraṃ telena makkhetvā paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā sasīsaṃ pārupitvā
atk-s0513a4:4652_15: Rājā āgantvā nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā nivesanaṃ apavisitvāva “mama sāmikaṃ dibbacakkhukaṃ passissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a4:4652_16: paṇṇasāladvāraṃ gantvā taṃ vippakāraṃ disvā “kiṃ nu kho eta”nti anto pavisitvā taṃ nipannakaṃ disvā pāde
atk-s0513a4:4654_0: “Ko taṃ hiṃsati heṭheti, kiṃ dummano socasi appatīto;
atk-s0513a4:4655_0: Kassajja mātāpitaro rudantu, kvajja setu nihato pathabyā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4656_0: Tattha hiṃsatīti paharati. Heṭhetīti akkosati. Kvajja setūti ko ajja sayatu.
atk-s0513a4:4657_0: Taṃ sutvā kūṭajaṭilo nitthunanto uṭṭhāya dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:4659_0: “Tuṭṭhosmi deva tava dassanena, cirassaṃ passāmi taṃ bhūmipāla;
atk-s0513a4:4660_0: Ahiṃsako reṇumanuppavissa, puttena te heṭhayitosmi devā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4664_0: Hantvāna taṃ somanassaṃ kumāraṃ, chetvāna sīsaṃ varamāharantu.
atk-s0513a4:4670_0: Ahampi icchāmi janinda daṭṭhuṃ, jīvaṃ maṃ netvā paṭidassayetha.
atk-s0513a4:4672_0: “Tassa taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā, rañño puttaṃ adassayuṃ;
atk-s0513a4:4675_0: “Āgacchuṃ dovārikā khaggabandhā, kāsāviyā hantu mamaṃ janinda;
atk-s0513a4:4676_0: Akkhāhi me pucchito etamatthaṃ, aparādho ko nidha mamajja atthī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4677_0: Tattha ahiṃsakoti ahaṃ kassaci ahiṃsako sīlācārasampanno.
atk-s0513a4:4677_2: ahaṃ tava puttena mahāparivārena anupavisitvā “are kūṭatāpasa,
atk-s0513a4:4677_3: kasmā tvaṃ idha vasasī”ti vatvā pāsāṇaphalakaṃ khipitvā ghaṭaṃ bhinditvā hatthehi ca pādehi ca koṭṭentena
atk-s0513a4:4677_4: viheṭhitosmīti evaṃ so abhūtameva bhūtaṃ viya katvā rājānaṃ saddahāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:4677_6: “Mama sāmimhi vippaṭipannakālato paṭṭhāya mayipi so na lajjissatī”ti kujjhitvā tassa vadhaṃ āṇāpento evamāha.
atk-s0513a4:4677_8: Tepi pharasuhatthā attano vidhānena gacchantūti vadati.
atk-s0513a4:4677_9: Varanti varaṃ sīsaṃ uttamasīsaṃ chinditvā āharantu.
atk-s0513a4:4678_1: rañño santikā dūtā raññā pesitā vegena gantvā mātarā alaṅkaritvā attano aṅke nisīdāpitaṃ kumāraṃ parivāretvā etadavocuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:4678_5: tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā maraṇabhayatajjito mātu aṅkato uṭṭhāya so rājaputto.
atk-s0513a4:4678_8: te dūtā kumārassa taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā māretuṃ avisahantā goṇaṃ viya naṃ rajjuyā parikaḍḍhantā netvā rañño dassayuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:4678_9: Kumāre pana nīyamāne dāsigaṇaparivutā saddhiṃ orodhehi sudhammāpi devī nāgarāpi “mayaṃ niraparādhaṃ kumāraṃ
atk-s0513a4:4678_10: māretuṃ na dassāmā”ti tena saddhiṃyeva agamaṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:4678_11: Āgacchunti tumhākaṃ āṇāya mama santikaṃ āgamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:4678_13: Ko nīdhāti ko nu idha mama aparādho,
atk-s0513a4:4679_0: Rājā “bhavaggaṃ atinīcaṃ, tava doso atimahanto”ti tassa dosaṃ kathento gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:4681_0: “Sāyañca pāto udakaṃ sajāti, aggiṃ sadā pāricaratappamatto;
atk-s0513a4:4682_0: Taṃ tādisaṃ saṃyataṃ brahmacāriṃ, kasmā tuvaṃ brūsi gahappatī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4683_1: Taṃ tādisanti taṃ tathārūpaṃ mama sāmiṃ dibbacakkhutāpasaṃ kasmā tvaṃ gahapativādena samudācarasīti vadati.
atk-s0513a4:4684_0: Tato kumāro “deva, mayhaṃ gahapatiññeva ‘gahapatī’ti vadantassa ko doso”ti vatvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:4686_0: “Tālā ca mūlā ca phalā ca deva, pariggahā vividhā santimassa;
atk-s0513a4:4687_0: Te rakkhati gopayatappamatto, tasmā ahaṃ brūmi gahappatī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4688_2: Te rakkhati gopayatappamattoti te esa tava kulūpakatāpaso paṇṇikakammaṃ karonto nisīditvā rakkhati,
atk-s0513a4:4688_4: tena kāraṇena so tava brāhmaṇo gahapati nāma hoti.
atk-s0513a4:4689_4: mayaṃ imassa hatthato paṇṇañca phalāphalāni ca kiṇāmā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:4689_6: Paṇṇasālampissa pavisitvā kumārassa purisā paṇṇavikkayaladdhaṃ kahāpaṇamāsakabhaṇḍikaṃ nīharitvā rañño dassesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:4691_0: “Saccaṃ kho etaṃ vadasi kumāra, pariggahā vividhā santimassa;
atk-s0513a4:4692_0: Te rakkhati gopayatappamatto, sa brāhmaṇo gahapati tena hotī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4693_0: Tato mahāsatto cintesi “evarūpassa bālassa rañño santike vāsato himavantaṃ pavisitvā pabbajituṃ varaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:4693_1: parisamajjheyevassa dosaṃ āvikatvā āpucchitvā ajjeva nikkhamitvā pabbajissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4695_0: “Suṇantu mayhaṃ parisā samāgatā, sanegamā jānapadā ca sabbe;
atk-s0513a4:4696_0: Bālāyaṃ bālassa vaco nisamma, ahetunā ghātayate maṃ janindo”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4697_0: Tattha bālāyaṃ bālassāti ayaṃ rājā sayaṃ bālo imassa bālassa kūṭajaṭilassa vacanaṃ sutvā ahetunāva maṃ ghātayateti.
atk-s0513a4:4698_0: Evañca pana vatvā pitaraṃ vanditvā attānaṃ pabbajjāya anujānāpento itaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:4700_0: “Daḷhasmi mūle visaṭe virūḷhe, dunnikkayo veḷu pasākhajāto;
atk-s0513a4:4701_0: Vandāmi pādāni tava janinda, anujāna maṃ pabbajissāmi devā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4702_0: Tattha visaṭeti visāle mahante jāte. Dunnikkayoti dunnikkaḍḍhiyo.
atk-s0513a4:4703_0: Tato parā rañño ca puttassa ca vacanapaṭivacanagāthā honti –
atk-s0513a4:4705_0: “Bhuñjassu bhoge vipule kumāra, sabbañca te issariyaṃ dadāmi;
atk-s0513a4:4706_0: Ajjeva tvaṃ kurūnaṃ hohi rājā, mā pabbajī pabbajjā hi dukkhā.
atk-s0513a4:4708_0: “Kinnūdha deva tavamatthi bhogā, pubbevahaṃ devaloke ramissaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:4709_0: Rūpehi saddehi atho rasehi, gandhehi phassehi manoramehi.
atk-s0513a4:4711_0: “Bhuttā ca me bhogā tidivasmiṃ deva, parivārito accharānaṃ gaṇena;
atk-s0513a4:4712_0: Tuvañca bālaṃ paraneyyaṃ viditvā, na tādise rājakule vaseyyaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:4714_0: “Sacāhaṃ bālo paraneyyo asmi, ekāparādhaṃ khama putta mayhaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:4715_0: Punapi ce edisakaṃ bhaveyya, yathāmatiṃ somanassa karohī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4716_11: Paraneyyanti andhaṃ viya yaṭṭhiyā parena netabbaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:4716_12: Tādiseti tādisassa rañño santike na paṇḍitena vasitabbaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:4716_13: mayā attano ñāṇabalena ajja jīvitaṃ laddhaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:4716_14: nāhaṃ tava santike vasissāmīti ñāpetuṃ evamāha.
atk-s0513a4:4716_15: Yathāmatinti sace puna mayhaṃ evarūpo doso hoti,
atk-s0513a4:4716_16: atha tvaṃ yathāajjhāsayaṃ karohīti puttaṃ khamāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:4717_0: Mahāsatto rājānaṃ ovadanto aṭṭha gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:4725_0: “Alaso gihī kāmabhogī na sādhu, asaññato pabbajito na sādhu;
atk-s0513a4:4726_0: Rājā na sādhu anisammakārī, yo paṇḍito kodhano taṃ na sādhu.
atk-s0513a4:4729_0: Nisammakārino rāja, yaso kitti ca vaḍḍhati.
atk-s0513a4:4731_0: “Nisamma daṇḍaṃ paṇayeyya issaro, vegā kataṃ tappati bhūmipāla;
atk-s0513a4:4732_0: Sammāpaṇīdhī ca narassa atthā, anānutappā te bhavanti pacchā.
atk-s0513a4:4734_0: “Anānutappāni hi ye karonti, vibhajja kammāyatanāni loke;
atk-s0513a4:4737_0: “Āgacchuṃ dovārikā khaggabandhā, kāsāviyā hantu mamaṃ janinda;
atk-s0513a4:4738_0: Mātuñca aṅkasmimahaṃ nisinno, ākaḍḍhito sahasā tehi deva.
atk-s0513a4:4740_0: “Kaṭukañhi sambādhaṃ sukicchaṃ patto, madhurampi yaṃ jīvitaṃ laddha rāja;
atk-s0513a4:4742_1: Anavatthāya cintitanti anavatthapetvā atuletvā atīretvā cintitaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:4742_2: Vipāko hoti pāpakoti tassa hi yathā nāma bhesajjassa vebhaṅgo vipatti,
atk-s0513a4:4742_5: Taṃ na sādhūti taṃ tassa kodhanaṃ na sādhu.
atk-s0513a4:4742_6: Nānisammāti anisāmetvā kiñci kammaṃ na kareyya.
atk-s0513a4:4742_9: Sammāpaṇīdhī cāti yoniso ṭhapitena cittena katā narassa atthā pacchā anānutappā bhavantīti attho.
atk-s0513a4:4743_0: Evaṃ mahāsattena dhamme desite rājā deviṃ āmantetvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:4745_0: “Putto tavāyaṃ taruṇo sudhamme, anukampako somanasso kumāro;
