atk-s0513a4:4746_0: Taṃ yācamāno na labhāmi svajja, arahasi naṃ yācitave tuvampī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4751_0: Sabbesu bhūtesu nidhāya daṇḍaṃ, anindito brahmamupeti ṭhāna”nti.
atk-s0513a4:4752_0: Tattha nisammāti pabbajanto ca nisāmetvā micchādiṭṭhikānaṃ pabbajjaṃ pahāya sammādiṭṭhiyuttaṃ niyyānikapabbajjaṃ pabbaja.
atk-s0513a4:4755_0: “Accherarūpaṃ vata yādisañca, dukkhitaṃ maṃ dukkhāpayase sudhamme;
atk-s0513a4:4756_0: Yācassu puttaṃ iti vuccamānā, bhiyyova ussāhayase kumāra”nti.
atk-s0513a4:4757_0: Tattha yādisañcāti yādisaṃ idaṃ tvaṃ vadesi,
atk-s0513a4:4757_2: Dukkhitanti pakatiyāpi maṃ dukkhitaṃ bhiyyo dukkhāpayasi.
atk-s0513a4:4761_0: Tamariyamaggaṃ paṭipajjamānaṃ, na ussahe vārayituṃ kumāra”nti.
atk-s0513a4:4762_2: Tamariyamagganti taṃ tesaṃ buddhādīnaṃ ariyānaṃ santakaṃ maggaṃ paṭipajjamānaṃ mama puttaṃ vāretuṃ na ussahāmi devāti.
atk-s0513a4:4765_0: “Addhā have sevitabbā sapaññā, bahussutā ye bahuṭhānacintino;
atk-s0513a4:4766_0: Yesāyaṃ sutvāna subhāsitāni, appossukkā vītasokā sudhammā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4767_2: Somanassakumārasseva hi sā subhāsitaṃ sutvā appossukkā jātā,
atk-s0513a4:4768_0: Mahāsatto mātāpitaro vanditvā “sace mayhaṃ doso atthi,
atk-s0513a4:4768_1: khamathā”ti mahājanassa añjaliṃ katvā himavantābhimukho gantvā manussesu nivattesu manussavaṇṇenāgantvā
atk-s0513a4:4768_2: devatāhi satta pabbatarājiyo atikkamitvā himavantaṃ nīto vissakammunā nimmitāya paṇṇasālāya isipabbajjaṃ pabbaji.
atk-s0513a4:4768_3: Taṃ tattha yāva soḷasavassakālā rājakulaparicārikavesena devatāyeva upaṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:4769_2: pubbepesa mayhaṃ vadhāya parisakkiyevā”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a4:4773_0: Kā nu vijjurivābhāsīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto uposathakammaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:4773_1: Tadā hi satthā “sādhu vo kataṃ upāsakā uposathavāsaṃ vasantehi,
atk-s0513a4:4773_2: porāṇakapaṇḍitā nāgasampattiṃ pahāya uposathavāsaṃ vasiṃsuyevā”ti vatvā tehi yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:4774_0: Atīte aṅgaraṭṭhe aṅge ca magadharaṭṭhe magadhe ca rajjaṃ kārente aṅgamagadharaṭṭhānaṃ antare campā nāma nadī,
atk-s0513a4:4774_5: Athekadivasaṃ magadharājā aṅgena saddhiṃ yujjhitvā yuddhaparājito assaṃ āruyha palāyanto aṅgarañño yodhehi
atk-s0513a4:4774_6: anubaddho puṇṇaṃ campānadiṃ patvā “parahatthe maraṇato nadiṃ pavisitvā mataṃ seyyo”ti asseneva saddhiṃ
atk-s0513a4:4774_8: Tadā campeyyo nāgarājā antodake ratanamaṇḍapaṃ nimminitvā mahāparivāro mahāpānaṃ pivati.
atk-s0513a4:4774_9: Asso raññā saddhiṃ udake nimujjitvā nāgarañño purato otari.
atk-s0513a4:4774_10: Nāgarājā alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ rājānaṃ disvā sinehaṃ uppādetvā āsanā uṭṭhāya “mā bhāyi,
atk-s0513a4:4774_11: mahārājā”ti rājānaṃ attano pallaṅke nisīdāpetvā udake nimuggakāraṇaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0513a4:4774_14: ahaṃ taṃ dvinnaṃ raṭṭhānaṃ sāmikaṃ karissāmī”ti assāsetvā sattāhaṃ mahantaṃ yasaṃ anubhavitvā sattame
atk-s0513a4:4774_16: Magadharājā nāgarājassānubhāvena aṅgarājānaṃ gahetvā jīvitā voropetvā dvīsu raṭṭhesu rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a4:4774_17: Tato paṭṭhāya rañño ca nāgarājassa ca vissāso thiro ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:4774_18: Rājā anusaṃvaccharaṃ campānadītīre ratanamaṇḍapaṃ kāretvā mahantena pariccāgena nāgarañño balikammaṃ karoti.
atk-s0513a4:4774_19: Sopi mahantena parivārena nāgabhavanā nikkhamitvā balikammaṃ sampaṭicchati.
atk-s0513a4:4775_0: Tadā bodhisatto daliddakule nibbatto rājaparisāya saddhiṃ nadītīraṃ gantvā taṃ nāgarājassa sampattiṃ
atk-s0513a4:4775_1: disvā lobhaṃ uppādetvā taṃ patthayamāno dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ rakkhitvā campeyyanāgarājassa kālakiriyato
atk-s0513a4:4775_2: sattame divase cavitvā tassa vasanapāsāde sirigabbhe sirisayanapiṭṭhe nibbatti.
atk-s0513a4:4775_4: So taṃ disvā vippaṭisārī hutvā “mayā katakusalanissandena chasu kāmasaggesu issariyaṃ koṭṭhe paṭisāmitaṃ dhaññaṃ viya ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:4775_6: kiṃ me jīvitenā”ti maraṇāya cittaṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0513a4:4775_7: Atha naṃ sumanā nāma nāgamāṇavikā disvā “mahānubhāvo satto nibbatto bhavissatī”ti sesanāgamāṇavikānaṃ saññaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0513a4:4775_8: sabbā nānātūriyahatthā āgantvā tassa upahāraṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:4775_9: Tassa taṃ nāgabhavanaṃ sakkabhavanaṃ viya ahosi,
atk-s0513a4:4775_12: Athassa tato paṭṭhāya yaso mahā ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:4776_0: So tattha nāgarajjaṃ kārento aparabhāge vippaṭisārī hutvā “kiṃ me imāya tiracchānayoniyā,
atk-s0513a4:4776_1: uposathavāsaṃ vasitvā ito muccitvā manussapathaṃ gantvā saccāni paṭivijjhitvā dukkhassantaṃ karissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a4:4776_2: cintetvā tato paṭṭhāya tasmiṃyeva pāsāde uposathakammaṃ karoti.
atk-s0513a4:4776_5: So tato paṭṭhāya pāsādā nikkhamitvā uyyānaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0513a4:4776_8: So cintesi “mayā ito nāgabhavanā nikkhamitvā manussalokaṃ gantvā uposathavāsaṃ vasituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4776_9: So tato paṭṭhāya uposathadivasesu nāgabhavanā nikkhamitvā ekassa paccantagāmassa avidūre mahāmaggasamīpe
atk-s0513a4:4776_11: maṃ kīḷāsappaṃ vā kātukāmā karontū”ti sarīraṃ dānamukhe vissajjetvā bhoge ābhujitvā nipanno uposathavāsaṃ vasati.
atk-s0513a4:4776_12: Mahāmaggena gacchantā ca āgacchantā ca taṃ disvā gandhādīhi pūjetvā pakkamanti.
atk-s0513a4:4776_13: Paccantagāmavāsino gantvā “mahānubhāvo nāgarājā”ti tassa upari maṇḍapaṃ karitvā samantā vālukaṃ okiritvā gandhādīhi pūjayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:4776_14: Tato paṭṭhāya manussā mahāsatte pasīditvā pūjaṃ katvā puttaṃ patthenti,
atk-s0513a4:4777_0: Mahāsattopi uposathakammaṃ karonto cātuddasīpannarasīsu vammikamatthake nipajjitvā pāṭipade nāgabhavanaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0513a4:4777_8: Atha naṃ mahāsatto maṅgalapokkharaṇiyā tīraṃ netvā “sace maṃ bhadde,
atk-s0513a4:4777_15: Evaṃ tassā tīṇi nimittāni ācikkhitvā cātuddasīuposathaṃ adhiṭṭhāya nāgabhavanā nikkhamitvā tattha gantvā
atk-s0513a4:4777_17: Sarīrañhissa rajatadāmaṃ viya setaṃ ahosi matthako rattakambalageṇḍuko viya.
atk-s0513a4:4777_18: Imasmiṃ pana jātake bodhisattassa sarīraṃ naṅgalasīsapamāṇaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0513a4:4778_0: Tadā eko bārāṇasivāsī māṇavo takkasilaṃ gantvā disāpāmokkhassa ācariyassa santike alampāyanamantaṃ uggaṇhitvā
atk-s0513a4:4778_1: tena maggena attano gehaṃ gacchanto mahāsattaṃ disvā “imaṃ sappaṃ gahetvā gāmanigamarājadhānīsu kīḷāpento
atk-s0513a4:4778_2: dhanaṃ uppādessāmī”ti cintetvā dibbosadhāni gahetvā dibbamantaṃ parivattetvā tassa santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:4778_3: Dibbamantasutakālato paṭṭhāya mahāsattassa kaṇṇesu ayasalākapavesanakālo viya jāto,
atk-s0513a4:4778_5: So “ko nu kho eso”ti bhogantarato sīsaṃ ukkhipitvā olokento ahituṇḍikaṃ disvā cintesi “mama visaṃ mahantaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:4778_10: So akkhīni nimmīletvā sīsaṃ bhogantare ṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a4:4779_0: Ahituṇḍiko brāhmaṇo osadhaṃ khāditvā mantaṃ parivattetvā kheḷaṃ mahāsattassa sarīre opi,
atk-s0513a4:4779_1: osadhānañca mantassa cānubhāvena kheḷena phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāne phoṭānaṃ uṭṭhānakālo viya jāto.
atk-s0513a4:4779_2: Atha naṃ so naṅguṭṭhe gahetvā kaḍḍhitvā dīghaso nipajjāpetvā ajapadena daṇḍena uppīḷento dubbalaṃ katvā sīsaṃ daḷhaṃ gahetvā nippīḷi,
atk-s0513a4:4779_4: Athassa mukhe kheḷaṃ opitvā osadhamantaṃ katvā dante bhindi,
atk-s0513a4:4779_6: Mahāsatto attano sīlabhedabhayena evarūpaṃ dukkhaṃ adhivāsento akkhīni ummīletvā olokanamattampi nākari.
atk-s0513a4:4779_7: Sopi “nāgarājānaṃ dubbalaṃ karissāmī”ti naṅguṭṭhato paṭṭhāyassa aṭṭhīni cuṇṇayamāno viya sakalasarīraṃ madditvā paṭṭakaveṭhanaṃ nāma veṭhesi,
atk-s0513a4:4780_0: Athassa dubbalabhāvaṃ ñatvā vallīhi peḷaṃ karitvā tattha naṃ pakkhipitvā paccantagāmaṃ netvā mahājanamajjhe kīḷāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:4780_1: Nīlādīsu vaṇṇesu vaṭṭacaturassādīsu saṇṭhānesu aṇuṃthūlādīsu pamāṇesu yaṃ yaṃ brāhmaṇo icchati,
atk-s0513a4:4780_5: Ekadivasameva kahāpaṇasahassañceva sahassagghanake ca parikkhāre labhi.
atk-s0513a4:4780_7: taṃ pana dhanaṃ labhitvā “paccantagāmeyeva tāva me ettakaṃ dhanaṃ laddhaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:4780_8: rājarājamahāmaccānaṃ santike bahuṃ dhanaṃ labhissāmī”ti sakaṭañca sukhayānakañca gahetvā sakaṭe parikkhāre
atk-s0513a4:4780_9: ṭhapetvā sukhayānake nisinno mahantena parivārena mahāsattaṃ gāmanigamādīsu kīḷāpento “bārāṇasiyaṃ uggasenarañño
atk-s0513a4:4780_12: Nāgarājā “punappunaṃ esa maṃ nissāya māressatī”ti na khādati.
atk-s0513a4:4780_15: antopeḷāya eva maraṇaṃ bhavissatī”ti tepi na khādati.
atk-s0513a4:4780_16: Brāhmaṇo māsamattena bārāṇasiṃ patvā dvāragāmesu kīḷāpento bahuṃ dhanaṃ labhi.
atk-s0513a4:4781_0: Rājāpi naṃ pakkosāpetvā “amhākaṃ kīḷāpehī”ti āha. “Sādhu, deva,
atk-s0513a4:4781_3: mahājano sannipatitvā passatū”ti bheriṃ carāpetvā punadivase rājaṅgaṇaṃ alaṅkārāpetvā brāhmaṇaṃ pakkosāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:4781_4: So ratanapeḷāya mahāsattaṃ netvā vicittatthare peḷaṃ ṭhapetvā nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:4781_5: Rājāpi pāsādā oruyha mahājanaparivuto rājāsane nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:4781_7: Mahājano sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ asakkonto celukkhepasahassaṃ pavatteti.
atk-s0513a4:4781_13: kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti gantvā pokkharaṇiṃ olokentī lohitavaṇṇaṃ udakaṃ disvā “ahituṇḍikena gahito bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0513a4:4781_14: ñatvā nāgabhavanā nikkhamitvā vammikasantikaṃ gantvā mahāsattassa gahitaṭṭhānañca kilamitaṭṭhānañca disvā
atk-s0513a4:4781_15: roditvā kanditvā paccantagāmaṃ gantvā pucchitvā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā bārāṇasiṃ gantvā rājaṅgaṇe parisamajjhe
atk-s0513a4:4781_17: Mahāsatto naccantova ākāsaṃ oloketvā taṃ disvā lajjito peḷaṃ pavisitvā nipajji.
atk-s0513a4:4781_18: Rājā tassa peḷaṃ paviṭṭhakāle “kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti ito cito ca olokento taṃ ākāse ṭhitaṃ disvā paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:4784_0: Devatā nusi gandhabbī, na taṃ maññāmī mānusi”nti.
atk-s0513a4:4785_0: Tattha na taṃ maññāmi mānusinti ahaṃ taṃ mānusīti na maññāmi,
atk-s0513a4:4785_1: tayā ekāya devatāya gandhabbiyā vā bhavituṃ vaṭṭatīti vadati.
atk-s0513a4:4788_0: “Namhi devī na gandhabbī, na mahārāja mānusī;
atk-s0513a4:4792_0: Kiṃ te naṭṭhaṃ kiṃ pana patthayānā, idhāgatā nāri tadiṅgha brūhi.
atk-s0513a4:4794_0: “Yamuggatejo uragoti cāhu, nāgoti naṃ āhu janā janinda;
atk-s0513a4:4795_0: Tamaggahī puriso jīvikattho, taṃ bandhanā muñca patī mameso.
atk-s0513a4:4798_0: Akkhāhi me nāgakaññe tamatthaṃ, kathaṃ vijānemu gahītanāgaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:4800_0: “Nagarampi nāgo bhasmaṃ kareyya, tathā hi so balaviriyūpapanno;
atk-s0513a4:4801_0: Dhammañca nāgo apacāyamāno, tasmā parakkamma tapo karotī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4802_0: Tattha atthenamhīti ahaṃ ekaṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicca idhāgatā.
atk-s0513a4:4802_3: Uragoti cāhūti uragoti cāyaṃ mahājano kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:4802_4: Tamaggahī purisoti ayaṃ puriso taṃ nāgarājānaṃ jīvikatthāya aggahesi.
atk-s0513a4:4802_5: Vanibbakassāti imassa vanibbakassa kathaṃ nu esa mahānubhāvo samāno hatthattaṃ āgatoti pucchati.
atk-s0513a4:4802_6: Dhammañcāti pañcasīladhammaṃ uposathavāsadhammañca garuṃ karonto viharati,
atk-s0513a4:4802_7: tasmā iminā purisena gahitopi “sacāhaṃ imassa upari nāsavātaṃ vissajjessāmi,
atk-s0513a4:4802_9: evaṃ me sīlaṃ bhijjissatī”ti sīlabhedabhayā parakkamma taṃ dukkhaṃ adhivāsetvā tapo karoti,
atk-s0513a4:4803_0: Rājā “kahaṃ paneso iminā gahito”ti pucchi. Athassa sā ācikkhantī gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:4806_0: Tamaggahī puriso jīvikattho, taṃ bandhanā muñca patī mameso”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4807_0: Tattha catuppatheti catukkamaggassa āsannaṭṭhāne ekasmiṃ vammike caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0513a4:4807_2: Taṃ bandhanāti taṃ evaṃ dhammikaṃ guṇavantaṃ nāgarājānaṃ etassa dhanaṃ datvā peḷabandhanā pamuñca.
atk-s0513a4:4808_0: Evañca pana vatvā punapi taṃ yācantī dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:4811_0: Vārigehasayā nārī, tāpi taṃ saraṇaṃ gatā.
atk-s0513a4:4813_0: “Dhammena mocehi asāhasena, gāmena nikkhena gavaṃ satena;
atk-s0513a4:4814_0: Ossaṭṭhakāyo urago carātu, puññatthiko muñcatu bandhanasmā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4815_0: Tattha soḷasitthisahassānīti mā tvaṃ esa yo vā so vā daliddanāgoti maññittha.
atk-s0513a4:4815_3: Vārigehasayāti udakacchadanaṃ udakagabbhaṃ katvā tattha sayanasīlā.
atk-s0513a4:4816_0: Atha naṃ rājā tisso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:4818_0: “Dhammena mocemi asāhasena, gāmena nikkhena gavaṃ satena;
atk-s0513a4:4819_0: Ossaṭṭhakāyo urago carātu, puññatthiko muñcatu bandhanasmā.
atk-s0513a4:4824_0: “Dve ca sādisiyo bhariyā, usabhañca gavaṃ sataṃ;
atk-s0513a4:4825_0: Ossaṭṭhakāyo urago carātu, puññatthiko muñcatu bandhanasmā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4826_0: Tattha luddāti rājā uragaṃ mocetuṃ ahituṇḍikaṃ āmantetvā tassa dātabbaṃ deyyadhammaṃ dassento evamāha.
atk-s0513a4:4829_0: “Vināpi dānā tava vacanaṃ janinda, muñcemu naṃ uragaṃ bandhanasmā;
atk-s0513a4:4830_0: Ossaṭṭhakāyo urago carātu, puññatthiko muñcatu bandhanasmā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4831_1: vināpi dānena tava vacanameva amhākaṃ garu.
atk-s0513a4:4832_0: Evañca pana vatvā mahāsattaṃ peḷato nīhari.
atk-s0513a4:4832_1: Nāgarājā nikkhamitvā pupphantaraṃ pavisitvā taṃ attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā māṇavakavaṇṇena alaṅkatasarīro hutvā pathaviṃ bhindanto viya nikkhanto aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:4832_2: Sumanā ākāsato otaritvā tassa santike ṭhitā.
atk-s0513a4:4832_3: Nāgarājā añjaliṃ paggayha rājānaṃ namassamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:4832_4: Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:4835_0: Namo te kāsirājatthu, namo te kāsivaḍḍhana;
atk-s0513a4:4836_0: Añjaliṃ te paggaṇhāmi, passeyyaṃ me nivesanaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:4838_0: “Addhā hi dubbissasametamāhu, yaṃ mānuso vissase amānusamhi;
atk-s0513a4:4839_0: Sace ca maṃ yācasi etamatthaṃ, dakkhemu te nāga nivesanānī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4840_0: Tattha passeyyaṃ me nivesananti mama nivesanaṃ campeyyanāgabhavanaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ passitabbayuttakaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:4840_7: api ca kho pana taṃ na saddahāmīti vadati.
atk-s0513a4:4841_0: Atha naṃ saddahāpetuṃ sapathaṃ karonto mahāsatto dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:4843_0: “Sacepi vāto girimāvaheyya, cando ca suriyo ca chamā pateyyuṃ;
atk-s0513a4:4844_0: Sabbā ca najjo paṭisotaṃ vajeyyuṃ, na tvevahaṃ rāja musā bhaṇeyyaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:4846_0: “Nabhaṃ phaleyya udadhīpi susse, saṃvaṭṭaye bhūtadharā vasundharā;
atk-s0513a4:4847_0: Siluccayo meru samūlamuppate, na tvevahaṃ rāja musā bhaṇeyya”nti.
atk-s0513a4:4848_0: Tattha saṃvaṭṭaye bhūtadharā vasundharāti ayaṃ bhūtadharāti ca vasundharāti ca saṅkhaṃ gatā mahāpathavī kilañjaṃ viya saṃvaṭṭeyya.
atk-s0513a4:4848_1: Samūlamuppateti evaṃ mahāsinerupabbato samūlo uṭṭhāya purāṇapaṇṇaṃ viya ākāse pakkhandeyya.
atk-s0513a4:4851_0: “Addhā hi dubbissasametamāhu, yaṃ mānuso vissase amānusamhi;
atk-s0513a4:4852_0: Sace ca maṃ yācasi etamatthaṃ, dakkhemu te nāga nivesanānī”ti. –
atk-s0513a4:4853_0: Punapi tameva gāthaṃ vatvā “tvaṃ mayā kataguṇaṃ jānituṃ arahasi,
atk-s0513a4:4853_1: saddahituṃ pana yuttabhāvaṃ vā ayuttabhāvaṃ vā ahaṃ jānissāmī”ti pakāsento itaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:4855_0: “Tumhe khottha ghoravisā uḷārā, mahātejā khippakopī ca hotha;
atk-s0513a4:4856_0: Maṃkāraṇā bandhanasmā pamutto, arahasi no jānituye katānī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4858_0: Atha naṃ saddahāpetuṃ puna sapathaṃ karonto mahāsatto gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:4860_0: “So paccataṃ niraye ghorarūpe, mā kāyikaṃ sātamalattha kiñci;
atk-s0513a4:4861_0: Peḷāya baddho maraṇaṃ upetu, yo tādisaṃ kammakataṃ na jāne”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4862_1: Kammakatanti katakammaṃ evaṃ guṇakārakaṃ tumhādisaṃ yo na jānāti,
atk-s0513a4:4863_0: Athassa rājā saddahitvā thutiṃ karonto gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:4865_0: “Saccappaṭiññā tava mesa hotu, akkodhano hohi anupanāhī;
atk-s0513a4:4866_0: Sabbañca te nāgakulaṃ supaṇṇā, aggiṃva gimhesu vivajjayantū”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4867_0: Tattha tava mesa hotūti tava esā paṭiññā saccā hotu.
atk-s0513a4:4867_1: Aggiṃva gimhesu vivajjayantūti yathā manussā gimhakāle santāpaṃ anicchantā jalamānaṃ aggiṃ vivajjenti,
atk-s0513a4:4868_0: Mahāsattopi rañño thutiṃ karonto itaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:4870_0: “Anukampasī nāgakulaṃ janinda, mātā yathā suppiyaṃ ekaputtaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:4871_0: Ahañca te nāgakulena saddhiṃ, kāhāmi veyyāvaṭikaṃ uḷāra”nti.
atk-s0513a4:4872_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā nāgabhavanaṃ gantukāmo senaṃ gamanasajjaṃ kātuṃ āṇāpento gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:4874_0: “Yojentu ve rājarathe sucitte, kambojake assatare sudante;
atk-s0513a4:4875_0: Nāge ca yojentu suvaṇṇakappane, dakkhemu nāgassa nivesanānī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4876_0: Tattha kambojake assatare sudanteti susikkhite kambojaraṭṭhasambhave assatare yojentu.
atk-s0513a4:4879_0: “Bherī mudiṅgā paṇavā ca saṅkhā, avajjayiṃsu uggasenassa rañño;
atk-s0513a4:4880_0: Pāyāsi rājā bahu sobhamāno, purakkhato nārigaṇassa majjhe”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4881_1: bārāṇasirājā soḷasahi nārīsahassehi purakkhato parivārito tassa nārīgaṇassa majjhe bārāṇasito nāgabhavanaṃ gacchanto ativiya sobhamāno pāyāsi.
atk-s0513a4:4882_0: Tassa nagarā nikkhantakāleyeva mahāsatto attano ānubhāvena nāgabhavanaṃ sabbaratanamayaṃ pākārañca dvāraṭṭālake
atk-s0513a4:4882_1: ca dissamānarūpe katvā nāgabhavanagāmiṃ maggaṃ alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ māpesi.
atk-s0513a4:4882_2: Rājā sapariso tena maggena nāgabhavanaṃ pavisitvā ramaṇīyaṃ bhūmibhāgañca pāsāde ca addasa.
atk-s0513a4:4894_0: Dibbā tūriyā pavajjiṃsu, nāgakaññā ca naccisuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:4896_0: “Taṃ nāgakaññā caritaṃ gaṇena, anvāruhī kāsirājā pasanno;
atk-s0513a4:4898_2: Campeyyassāti nāgabhavanaṃ pavisitvā campeyyanāgarājassa nivesanaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a4:4898_5: Caritaṃ gaṇenāti taṃ nivesanaṃ nāgakaññāgaṇena caritaṃ anusañcaritaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:4899_2: So sattāhamattaṃ sapariso dibbannapānādīni paribhuñjitvā dibbehi kāmaguṇehi abhiramitvā sukhasayane nisinno mahāsattassa yasaṃ vaṇṇetvā “nāgarāja,
atk-s0513a4:4899_3: tvaṃ evarūpaṃ sampattiṃ pahāya manussaloke vammikamatthake nipajjitvā kasmā uposathavāsaṃ vasī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0513a4:4901_0: “So tattha bhutvā ca atho ramitvā, campeyyakaṃ kāsirājā avoca;
atk-s0513a4:4903_0: Netādisaṃ atthi manussaloke, kiṃ patthayaṃ nāga tapo karosi.
atk-s0513a4:4906_0: Paggayha pāyenti anomavaṇṇā, netādisaṃ atthi manussaloke;
atk-s0513a4:4910_0: Netādisaṃ atthi manussaloke, kiṃ patthayaṃ nāga tapo karosi.
atk-s0513a4:4912_0: “Koñcā mayūrā diviyā ca haṃsā, vaggussarā kokilā sampatanti;
atk-s0513a4:4913_0: Netādisaṃ atthi manussaloke, kiṃ patthayaṃ nāga tapo karosi.
atk-s0513a4:4915_0: “Ambā ca sālā tilakā ca jambuyo, uddālakā pāṭaliyo ca phullā;
atk-s0513a4:4916_0: Netādisaṃ atthi manussaloke, kiṃ patthayaṃ nāga tapo karosi.
atk-s0513a4:4918_0: “Imā ca te pokkharañño samantato, dibbā ca gandhā satataṃ pavāyanti;
atk-s0513a4:4919_0: Netādisaṃ atthi manussaloke, kiṃ patthayaṃ nāga tapo karosi.
atk-s0513a4:4921_0: “Na puttahetu na dhanassa hetu, na āyuno cāpi janinda hetu;
atk-s0513a4:4922_0: Manussayoniṃ abhipatthayāno, tasmā parakkamma tapo karomī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4923_9: Sampatantīti manuññaravaṃ ravantā rukkhato rukkhaṃ sampatanti.
atk-s0513a4:4923_10: Dibbā ca gandhāti tāsu pokkharaṇīsu satataṃ dibbagandhā vāyanti.
atk-s0513a4:4923_12: Tasmāti tena kāraṇena parakkamma vīriyaṃ paggahetvā tapo karomi,
atk-s0513a4:4930_0: Pucchāmi taṃ nāgarājetamatthaṃ, seyyo ito kena manussaloko”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4934_0: “Janinda nāññatra manussalokā, suddhīva saṃvijjati saṃyamo vā;
atk-s0513a4:4935_0: Ahañca laddhāna manussayoniṃ, kāhāmi jātimaraṇassa anta”nti.
atk-s0513a4:4936_1: aññatra manussalokā amatamahānibbānasaṅkhātā suddhi vā sīlasaṃyamo vā natthi.
atk-s0513a4:4936_2: Antanti manussayoniṃ laddhā jātimaraṇassa antaṃ karissāmīti tapo karomīti.
atk-s0513a4:4939_0: “Addhā have sevitabbā sapaññā, bahussutā ye bahuṭhānacintino;
atk-s0513a4:4940_0: Nāriyo ca disvāna tuvañca nāga, kāhāmi puññāni anappakānī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4941_0: Tattha nāriyo cāti imā tava nāgakaññāyo ca tuvañca disvā bahūni puññāni karissāmīti vadati.
atk-s0513a4:4944_0: “Addhā have sevitabbā sapaññā, bahussutā ye bahuṭhānacintino;
atk-s0513a4:4945_0: Nāriyo ca disvāna mamañca rāja, karohi puññāni anappakānī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4947_4: yāvadicchakaṃ dhanaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti dhanaṃ dassento āha –
atk-s0513a4:4949_0: “Idañca me jātarūpaṃ pahūtaṃ, rāsī suvaṇṇassa ca tālamattā;
atk-s0513a4:4950_0: Ito haritvāna suvaṇṇagharāni, karassu rūpiyapākāraṃ karontu.
atk-s0513a4:4952_0: “Muttā ca vāhasahassāni pañca, veḷuriyamissāni ito haritvā;
atk-s0513a4:4953_0: Antepure bhūmiyaṃ santharantu, nikkaddamā hehiti nīrajā ca.
atk-s0513a4:4956_0: Bārāṇasiṃ nagaraṃ iddhaṃ phītaṃ, rajjañca kārehi anomapaññā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4957_0: Tattha rāsīti tesu tesu ṭhānesu tālapamāṇā rāsiyo.
atk-s0513a4:4957_2: Nikkaddamāti evaṃ te antepure bhūmi nikkaddamā ca nirajā ca bhavissati.
atk-s0513a4:4958_1: Atha mahāsatto nāgabhavane bheriṃ carāpesi “sabbā rājaparisā yāvadicchakaṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇādikaṃ dhanaṃ gaṇhantū”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4958_2: Rañño ca anekehi sakaṭasatehi dhanaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0513a4:4958_3: Rājā mahantena yasena nāgabhavanā nikkhamitvā bārāṇasimeva gato.
atk-s0513a4:4958_4: Tato paṭṭhāya kira jambudīpatalaṃ sahiraññaṃ jātaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:4959_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “evaṃ porāṇakapaṇḍitā nāgasampattiṃ pahāya uposathavāsaṃ vasiṃsū”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a4:4963_0: Brahmalokā cavitvānāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto visuddhasaṃkilesaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:4963_2: Idha pana satthā “bhikkhu mātugāmo nāmesa visuddhasattepi saṃkiliṭṭhe karotī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:4964_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyanti cūḷapalobhane vuttanayeneva atītavatthu vitthāritabbaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:4964_1: Tadā pana mahāsatto brahmalokā cavitvā kāsirañño putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0513a4:4964_7: Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā catasso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:4969_0: “Kāmā vā kāmasaññā vā, brahmaloke na vijjati;
atk-s0513a4:4973_0: So tattha paṭisallīno, eko rahasi jhāyatha.
atk-s0513a4:4976_0: Ekaputto cayaṃ mayhaṃ, na ca kāmāni bhuñjatī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4977_0: Tattha sabbakāmasamiddhisūti sabbakāmānaṃ samiddhīsu sampattīsu ṭhitassa rañño putto hutvā eko devaputto nibbatti.
atk-s0513a4:4977_2: Tāyevāti tāya brahmaloke nibbattitāya jhānasaññāya eva.
atk-s0513a4:4977_3: Sumāpitanti pitarā suṭṭhu manāpaṃ katvā māpitaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:4980_0: “Ko nu khvettha upāyo so, ko vā jānāti kiñcanaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:4981_0: Yo me puttaṃ palobheyya, yathā kāmāni patthaye”ti.
atk-s0513a4:4982_0: Tattha ko nu khvettha upāyoti ko nu kho ettha etassa kāmānaṃ bhuñjanaupāyo.
atk-s0513a4:4982_2: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “ko nu kho etaṃ upavasitvā upalāpanakāraṇaṃ jānātī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:4982_3: Ko vā jānāti kiñcananti ko vā etassa palibodhakāraṇaṃ jānātīti attho.
atk-s0513a4:4989_1: tattheva antepure cūḷanāṭakānaṃ antare ekā taruṇakumārikā ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:4990_0: “Ahaṃ kho naṃ palobheyyaṃ, sace bhattā bhavissatī”ti. –
atk-s0513a4:4992_0: Tattha sace bhattāti sace esa mayhaṃ pati bhavissatīti.
atk-s0513a4:4995_0: Tvaññeva naṃ palobhehi, tava bhattā bhavissatīti.
atk-s0513a4:4996_0: Tattha tava bhattāti tavesa pati bhavissati,
atk-s0513a4:4997_0: Evaṃ vatvā rājā “imissā kira okāsaṃ karontū”ti kumārassa upaṭṭhākānaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0513a4:4997_1: Sā paccūsakāle vīṇaṃ ādāya gantvā kumārassa sayanagabbhassa bahi avidūre ṭhatvā agganakhehi vīṇaṃ vādentī madhurasarena gāyitvā taṃ palobhesi.
atk-s0513a4:5005_0: “Kasseso saddo ko vā so, bhaṇati uccāvacaṃ bahuṃ;
atk-s0513a4:5008_0: “Esā kho pamadā deva, khiḍḍā esā anappikā;
atk-s0513a4:5009_0: Sace tvaṃ kāme bhuñjeyya, bhiyyo bhiyyo chādeyyu taṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5018_0: ‘Ahameva kāme bhuñjeyyaṃ, mā añño puriso ahu’.
atk-s0513a4:5021_0: Ahameveko bhuñjissaṃ, mā añño puriso siyā.
atk-s0513a4:5026_0: “Tañca rājā vivāhesi, samhā raṭṭhā ca khattiyo;
atk-s0513a4:5027_0: Yāvatā vijitaṃ mayhaṃ, na te vatthabba tāvade.
atk-s0513a4:5033_0: So tassa gehaṃ pāvekkhi, bhattakāle upaṭṭhite.
atk-s0513a4:5056_0: “Yaṃ etā upasevanti, chandasā vā dhanena vā;
atk-s0513a4:5057_0: Jātavedova saṃ ṭhānaṃ, khippaṃ anudahanti taṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5060_0: Laddhā porāṇakaṃ maggaṃ, gacchate so vihāyasaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5067_7: Chādeyyu tanti ete kāmā nāma tava rucceyyuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5067_10: Evaṃ kumāro paṭibaddhacitto hutvā tassā āgamanaṃ rocento paricārike āmantetvā “iṅghā”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0513a4:5068_1: Mā aññoti añño kāme paribhuñjanto puriso nāma mā siyā.
atk-s0513a4:5068_2: Hantuṃ upakkamīti antaravīthiṃ otaritvā māretuṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0513a4:5068_3: Vikandiṃsūti kumārena katipayesu purisesu pahatesu purisā palāyitvā gehāni pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:5068_8: Rājā upāyena kumāraṃ gaṇhāpetvā “imassa kiṃ kattabba”nti pucchi. “Deva,
atk-s0513a4:5068_10: imaṃ pana kumāraṃ tāya kumārikāya saddhiṃ raṭṭhā pabbājetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vutte tathā akāsi.
atk-s0513a4:5068_13: Na te vatthabba tāvadeti yattakaṃ mayhaṃ vijitaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:5069_0: Tasmiṃ pana vanaṃ paviṭṭhe itarā yaṃ tattha pacitabbayuttakaṃ atthi,
atk-s0513a4:5069_1: taṃ pacitvā tassāgamanaṃ olokentī paṇṇasāladvāre nisīdati.
atk-s0513a4:5069_2: Evaṃ kāle gacchante ekadivasaṃ antaradīpakavāsī eko iddhimantatāpaso assamapadato nikkhamitvā maṇiphalakaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5069_3: viya udakaṃ maddamānova ākāse uppatitvā bhikkhācāraṃ gacchanto paṇṇasālāya uparibhāgaṃ patvā dhūmaṃ disvā
atk-s0513a4:5069_4: “imasmiṃ ṭhāne manussā vasanti maññe”ti paṇṇasāladvāre otari.
atk-s0513a4:5069_5: Sā taṃ disvā nisīdāpetvā paṭibaddhacittā hutvā itthikuttaṃ dassetvā tena saddhiṃ anācāraṃ acari.
atk-s0513a4:5069_11: tāya kumārikāya yāva sudāruṇaṃ kammaṃ katanti attho.
atk-s0513a4:5070_1: Disvāti taṃ vijahituṃ asakkonto sakaladivasaṃ tattheva hutvā sāyanhasamaye rājaputtaṃ āgataṃ disvā palāyituṃ
atk-s0513a4:5070_2: “vehāyasaṃ gamissa”nti uppatanākāraṃ karonto patitvā mahaṇṇave sīdati.
atk-s0513a4:5070_7: tasmā samudde patitopi uppatanākārameva karotīti anukampaṃ uppādetvā tasseva anukampāya abhāsatha.
atk-s0513a4:5070_8: Tāsaṃ pana gāthānaṃ attho tikanipāte vuttoyeva.
atk-s0513a4:5070_11: Pabbajitvānāti taṃ itthiṃ manussāvāsaṃ netvā nivattitvā araññe isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā kāmarāgaṃ virājayi,
atk-s0513a4:5071_2: mātugāmaṃ paṭicca visuddhasattāpi saṃkilissantī”ti vatvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a4:5079_0: Cirassaṃ vata passāmāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto mahābhinikkhamanaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:5079_3: pubbepi tathāgato mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhantoyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:5080_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ esukārī nāma rājā ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:5080_3: Te ekadivasaṃ sukhasayane nisinnā mantayiṃsu “amhākaṃ issariyaṃ mahantaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:5081_0: Athekadivasaṃ purohito bhogagāmaṃ gantvā āgamanakāle dakkhiṇadvārena nagaraṃ pavisanto bahinagare ekaṃ bahuputtikaṃ nāma duggatitthiṃ passi.
atk-s0513a4:5081_13: Sā aññaṃ gahaṇaṃ apassantī nagaradvāre ṭhitaṃ nigrodharukkhaṃ dassetvā “sāmi etasmiṃ nigrodhe adhivatthāya devatāya santike patthetvā labhiṃ,
atk-s0513a4:5081_15: Purohito “tena hi gaccha tva”nti rathā oruyha nigrodhamūlaṃ gantvā sākhāya gahetvā cāletvā “ambho devate,
atk-s0513a4:5081_16: tvaṃ rañño santikā kiṃ nāma na labhasi,
atk-s0513a4:5081_17: rājā te anusaṃvaccharaṃ sahassaṃ vissajjetvā balikammaṃ karoti,
atk-s0513a4:5081_19: etāya duggatitthiyā tava ko upakāro kato,
atk-s0513a4:5081_21: Sace amhākaṃ rañño puttaṃ na desi,
atk-s0513a4:5081_22: ito taṃ sattame divase samūlaṃ chindāpetvā khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ kāressāmī”ti rukkhadevataṃ tajjetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a4:5081_23: So etena niyāmeneva punadivasepīti paṭipāṭiyā cha divase kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:5081_24: Chaṭṭhe pana divase sākhāya gahetvā “rukkhadevate ajjekarattimattakameva sesaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:5081_25: sace me rañño puttaṃ na desi,
atk-s0513a4:5082_0: Rukkhadevatā āvajjetvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ tathato ñatvā “ayaṃ brāhmaṇo puttaṃ alabhanto mama vimānaṃ nāsessati,
atk-s0513a4:5082_1: kena nu kho upāyena tassa puttaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti catunnaṃ mahārājānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā tamatthaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0513a4:5082_2: Te “mayaṃ tassa puttaṃ dātuṃ na sakkhissāmā”ti vadiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:5082_6: Sopi “labhissati nu kho rājā anucchavike putte,
atk-s0513a4:5082_7: udāhu no”ti upadhārento puññavante cattāro devaputte passi.
atk-s0513a4:5082_8: Te kira purimabhave bārāṇasiyaṃ pesakārā hutvā tena kammena laddhakaṃ pañcakoṭṭhāsaṃ katvā cattāro koṭṭhāse paribhuñjiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:5082_11: tato yāmabhavaneti evaṃ anulomapaṭilomaṃ chasu devalokesu sampattiṃ anubhavantā vicaranti.
atk-s0513a4:5082_12: Tadā pana nesaṃ tāvatiṃsabhavanato cavitvā yāmabhavanaṃ gamanavāro hoti.
atk-s0513a4:5082_19: purohitassa gehe nibbattitvā daharakāleyeva kāme pahāya pabbajissāmā”ti vadiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:5082_20: Sakko “sādhū”ti tesaṃ paṭiññaṃ gahetvā āgantvā rukkhadevatāya tamatthaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0513a4:5082_21: Sā tuṭṭhamānasā sakkaṃ vanditvā attano vimānameva gatā.
atk-s0513a4:5083_0: Purohitopi punadivase balavapurise sannipātāpetvā vāsipharasuādīni gāhāpetvā rukkhamūlaṃ gantvā rukkhasākhāya gahetvā “ambho devate,
atk-s0513a4:5083_1: ajja mayhaṃ taṃ yācantassa sattamo divaso,
atk-s0513a4:5083_3: Tato rukkhadevatā mahantenānubhāvena khandhavivarato nikkhamitvā madhurasarena taṃ āmantetvā ‘brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0513a4:5083_17: Sā tassa puttavaraṃ datvā attano bhavanaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a4:5083_18: Tato paṭṭhāya devatāya sakkāro mahā ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:5084_0: Jeṭṭhakadevaputto cavitvā purohitassa brāhmaṇiyā kucchimhi nibbatti.
atk-s0513a4:5084_1: Tassa nāmaggahaṇadivase “hatthipālo”ti nāmaṃ katvā apabbajanatthāya hatthigopake paṭicchāpesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5084_3: Tassa padasā gamanakāle dutiyo cavitvā assā kucchimhi nibbatti,
atk-s0513a4:5085_0: Atha nesaṃ pabbajitabhayena rañño vijitā pabbajite nīhariṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:5085_5: Hatthipālassa soḷasavassakāle kāyasampattiṃ disvā rājā ca purohito ca “kumārā mahallakā jātā,
atk-s0513a4:5085_7: tesaṃ kiṃ nu kho kātabba”nti mantetvā “ete abhisittakālato paṭṭhāya atissarā bhavissanti,
atk-s0513a4:5085_12: pacchā abhisiñcissāmā”ti cintetvā ubhopi isivesaṃ gahetvā bhikkhaṃ carantā hatthipālassa kumārassa nivesanadvāraṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:5085_13: Kumāro te disvāva tuṭṭho pasanno upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā tisso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:5094_0: Agghe bhavantaṃ pucchāma, agghaṃ kurutu no bhava”nti.
atk-s0513a4:5095_1: Devavaṇṇinanti seṭṭhavaṇṇinaṃ ghoratapaṃ paramatikkhindriyaṃ pabbajitabhāvaṃ upagatanti attho.
atk-s0513a4:5095_5: “Āsana”nti idaṃ tesaṃ nisīdanatthāya āsanaṃ paññapetvā gandhodakañca pādabbhañjanañca upanetvā āha.
atk-s0513a4:5095_6: Aggheti ime sabbepi āsanādayo agghe bhavantaṃ pucchāma.
atk-s0513a4:5095_7: Kurutu noti ime no agghe bhavaṃ paṭiggaṇhatūti.
atk-s0513a4:5096_2: “tāta hatthipāla tvaṃ amhe ‘ke ime’ti maññamāno evaṃ kathesī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5096_15: nāyaṃ kālo pabbajjāyā”ti vatvā yathājjhāsayaṃ anusāsanto catutthagāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:5098_0: “Adhicca vede pariyesa vittaṃ, putte gehe tāta patiṭṭhapetvā;
atk-s0513a4:5099_0: Gandhe rase paccanubhuyya sabbaṃ, araññaṃ sādhu muni so pasattho”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5100_1: Putteti chattaṃ ussāpetvā nāṭake vārena upaṭṭhāpetvā puttadhītāhi vaḍḍhitvā te putte gehe patiṭṭhāpetvāti attho.
atk-s0513a4:5100_2: Sabbanti ete ca gandharase sesañca sabbaṃ vatthukāmaṃ anubhavitvā.
atk-s0513a4:5100_3: Araññaṃ sādhu muni so pasatthoti pacchā mahallakakāle pabbajitassa araññaṃ sādhu laddhakaṃ hoti.
atk-s0513a4:5100_5: so muni buddhādīhi ariyehi pasatthoti vadati.
atk-s0513a4:5103_0: “Vedā na saccā na ca vittalābho, na puttalābhena jaraṃ vihanti;
atk-s0513a4:5104_0: Gandhe rase muccanamāhu santo, sakammunā hoti phalūpapattī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5105_0: Tattha na saccāti yaṃ saggañca maggañca vadanti,
atk-s0513a4:5105_3: Na ca vittalābhoti dhanalābhopi pañcasādhāraṇattā sabbo ekasabhāvo na hoti.
atk-s0513a4:5105_5: jaraṃ vā byādhimaraṇaṃ vā na koci puttalābhena paṭibāhituṃ samattho nāma atthi.
atk-s0513a4:5105_7: Gandhe raseti gandhe ca rase ca sesesu ārammaṇesu ca muccanaṃ muttimeva buddhādayo paṇḍitā kathenti.
atk-s0513a4:5105_8: Sakammunāti attanā katakammeneva sattānaṃ phalūpapatti phalanipphatti hoti.
atk-s0513a4:5108_0: “Addhā hi saccaṃ vacanaṃ tavetaṃ, sakammunā hoti phalūpapatti;
atk-s0513a4:5109_0: Jiṇṇā ca mātāpitaro tavīme, passeyyuṃ taṃ vassasataṃ aroga”nti.
atk-s0513a4:5110_0: Tattha vassasataṃ aroganti ete vassasataṃ arogaṃ taṃ passeyyuṃ,
atk-s0513a4:5110_1: tvampi vassasataṃ jīvanto mātāpitaro posassūti vadati.
atk-s0513a4:5111_0: Taṃ sutvā kumāro “deva, tvaṃ kiṃ nāmetaṃ vadasī”ti vatvā dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:5113_0: “Yassassa sakkhī maraṇena rāja, jarāya mettī naravīraseṭṭha;
atk-s0513a4:5114_0: Yo cāpi jaññā na marissaṃ kadāci, passeyyuṃ taṃ vassasataṃ arogaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5116_0: “Yathāpi nāvaṃ puriso dakamhi, ereti ce naṃ upaneti tīraṃ;
atk-s0513a4:5117_0: Evampi byādhī satataṃ jarā ca, upaneti maccaṃ vasamantakassā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5118_1: Maraṇenāti datto mato mitto matoti sammutimaraṇena.
atk-s0513a4:5118_2: Jarāyāti pākaṭajarāya vā saddhiṃ yassa mettī bhaveyya,
atk-s0513a4:5118_3: yassetaṃ maraṇañca jarā ca mittabhāvena nāgaccheyyāti attho.
atk-s0513a4:5118_5: yathā nāma puriso nadītitthe udakamhi nāvaṃ ṭhapetvā paratīragāmiṃ janaṃ āropetvā sace arittena uppīḷento phiyena kaḍḍhanto cāleti ghaṭṭeti,
atk-s0513a4:5118_7: Evaṃ byādhi jarā ca niccaṃ antakassa maccuno vasaṃ upanetiyevāti.
atk-s0513a4:5119_0: Evaṃ imesaṃ sattānaṃ jīvitasaṅkhārassa parittabhāvaṃ dassetvā “mahārāja,
atk-s0513a4:5119_2: tumhehi saddhiṃ kathayantameva maṃ byādhijarāmaraṇāni upagacchanti,
atk-s0513a4:5119_3: appamattā hothā”ti ovādaṃ datvā rājānañca pitarañca vanditvā attano paricārake gahetvā bārāṇasiyaṃ rajjaṃ pahāya “pabbajissāmī”ti nagarato nikkhami.
atk-s0513a4:5119_4: “Pabbajjā nāmesā sobhanā bhavissatī”ti hatthipālakumārena saddhiṃ mahājano nikkhami.
atk-s0513a4:5119_6: So tāya parisāya saddhiṃ gaṅgāya tīraṃ patvā gaṅgāya udakaṃ oloketvā kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā jhānāni nibbattetvā
atk-s0513a4:5119_8: mama tayo kaniṭṭhabhātaro mātāpitaro rājā devīti sabbe saparisā pabbajissanti,
atk-s0513a4:5119_11: So tattheva mahājanassa ovādaṃ dento nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:5120_0: Punadivase rājā ca purohito ca cintayiṃsu “hatthipālakumāro tāva ‘rajjaṃ pahāya mahājanaṃ ādāya pabbajissāmī’ti gantvā gaṅgātīre nisinno,
atk-s0513a4:5120_3: Sopi te disvā pasannamānaso upasaṅkamitvā “cirassaṃ vata passāmā”tiādīni vadanto tatheva paṭipajji.
atk-s0513a4:5120_4: Tepi taṃ tatheva vatvā attano āgatakāraṇaṃ kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:5120_5: So “mama bhātike hatthipālakumāre sante kathaṃ paṭhamataraṃ mayhameva setacchattaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti pucchitvā “tāta, bhātā,
atk-s0513a4:5120_7: pabbajissāmī’ti vatvā nikkhanto”ti vutte “kahaṃ paneso idānī”ti vatvā “gaṅgātīre nisinno”ti vutte “tāta,
atk-s0513a4:5120_9: bālā hi parittakapaññā sattā etaṃ kilesaṃ jahituṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0513a4:5120_10: ahaṃ pana jahissāmī”ti rañño ca pitu ca dhammaṃ desento dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:5122_0: “Paṅko ca kāmā palipo ca kāmā, manoharā duttarā maccudheyyā;
atk-s0513a4:5123_0: Etasmiṃ paṅke palipe byasannā, hīnattarūpā na taranti pāraṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5125_0: “Ayaṃ pure luddamakāsi kammaṃ, svāyaṃ gahīto na hi mokkhito me;
atk-s0513a4:5126_0: Orundhiyā naṃ parirakkhissāmi, māyaṃ puna luddamakāsi kamma”nti.
atk-s0513a4:5127_6: Etesu hi laggā ceva anupaviṭṭhā ca sattā uttarituṃ asakkontā dukkhakkhandhapariyāye vuttappakāraṃ dukkhañceva maraṇañca pāpuṇanti. Tenāha –
atk-s0513a4:5127_7: “etasmiṃ paṅke palipe byasannā hīnattarūpā na taranti pāra”nti.
atk-s0513a4:5127_12: Na taranti pāranti nibbānapāraṃ gantuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0513a4:5128_1: ayaṃ mamattabhāvo pubbe assagopakehi saddhiṃ vaḍḍhanto mahājanassa vilumpanaviheṭhanādivasena bahuṃ luddaṃ sāhasikakammaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a4:5128_2: Svāyaṃ gahītoti so ayaṃ tassa kammassa vipāko mayā gahito.
atk-s0513a4:5128_3: Na hi mokkhito meti saṃsāravaṭṭe sati na hi mokkho ito akusalaphalato mama atthi.
atk-s0513a4:5128_4: Orundhiyā naṃ parirakkhissāmīti idāni naṃ kāyavacīmanodvārāni pidahanto orundhitvā parirakkhissāmi.
atk-s0513a4:5128_7: Ahañhi ito paṭṭhāya pāpaṃ akatvā kalyāṇameva karissāmi.
atk-s0513a4:5129_0: Evaṃ assapālakumāro dvīhi gāthāhi dhammaṃ desetvā “tiṭṭhatha tumhe,
atk-s0513a4:5129_1: tumhehi saddhiṃ kathentameva maṃ byādhijarāmaraṇāni upagacchantī”ti ovādaṃ datvā yojanikaṃ parisaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0513a4:5129_3: So tassa ākāse nisīditvā dhammaṃ desetvā “bhātika,
atk-s0513a4:5129_7: Punadivase rājā ca purohito ca tenevupāyena gopālakumārassa nivesanaṃ gantvā tenapi tatheva paṭinanditvā attano āgamanakāraṇaṃ ācikkhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:5129_8: Sopi assapālakumāro viya paṭikkhipitvā “ahaṃ cirato paṭṭhāya pabbajitukāmo vane naṭṭhagoṇaṃ viya pabbajjaṃ upadhārento vicarāmi,
atk-s0513a4:5129_9: tena me naṭṭhagoṇassa padaṃ viya bhātikānaṃ gatamaggo diṭṭho,
atk-s0513a4:5129_10: svāhaṃ teneva maggena gamissāmī”ti vatvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:5131_0: “Gavaṃva naṭṭhaṃ puriso yathā vane, anvesatī rāja apassamāno;
atk-s0513a4:5132_0: Evaṃ naṭṭho esukārī mamattho, sohaṃ kathaṃ na gaveseyyaṃ rājā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5133_1: Mamatthoti vane goṇo viya mama pabbajjāsaṅkhāto attho naṭṭho.
atk-s0513a4:5133_2: Sohanti so ahaṃ ajja pabbajitānaṃ maggaṃ disvā kathaṃ pabbajjaṃ na gaveseyyaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:5134_5: kalyāṇakammaṃ nāma ajjeva kattabba”nti vatvā itaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:5137_0: Anāgataṃ netamatthīti ñatvā, uppannachandaṃ ko panudeyya dhīro”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5138_5: sve kattabbaṃ kammaṃ ‘pare’ti vatvā na karoti,
atk-s0513a4:5138_11: taṃ “netaṃ atthī”ti ñatvā uppannaṃ kusalacchandaṃ ko paṇḍito panudeyya hareyya.
atk-s0513a4:5139_0: Evaṃ gopālakumāro dvīhi gāthāhi dhammaṃ desetvā “tiṭṭhatha tumhe,
atk-s0513a4:5139_1: tumhehi saddhiṃ kathentameva maṃ byādhijarāmaraṇāni upagacchantī”ti yojanikaṃ parisaṃ gahetvā nikkhamitvā dvinnaṃ bhātikānaṃ santikaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a4:5139_3: Punadivase rājā ca purohito ca tenevupāyena ajapālakumārassa nivesanaṃ gantvā tenapi tatheva paṭinanditvā
atk-s0513a4:5139_4: attano āgamanakāraṇaṃ ācikkhitvā “chattaṃ te ussāpessāmā”ti vadiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:5139_7: Te “amhākaṃ rajjenattho natthī”ti setacchattaṃ pahāya tiyojanikaṃ parisaṃ gahetvā nikkhamitvā gaṅgātīre nisinnāti.
atk-s0513a4:5139_8: Nāhaṃ mama bhātikehi chaḍḍitakheḷaṃ sīsenādāya vicarissāmi,
atk-s0513a4:5139_14: nanu ime sattā daharakālepi mahallakakālepi marantiyeva,
atk-s0513a4:5139_16: ayaṃ mahallakakāle’ti kassaci hatthe vā pāde vā nimittaṃ natthi,
atk-s0513a4:5139_18: tasmā idāneva pabbajissāmī”ti vatvā dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:5142_0: Abhuttabhoge paṭhame vayasmiṃ, ādāya maccu vajate kumāriṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5145_0: Hitvāna kāme paṭikacca gehaṃ, anujāna maṃ pabbajissāmi devā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5146_4: Abhuttabhogeti evaṃ uttamarūpadharaṃ kumāriṃ paṭhamavaye vattamānaṃ abhuttabhogameva mātāpitūnaṃ upari
atk-s0513a4:5146_5: mahantaṃ sokaṃ pātetvā maccu gahetvāva gacchati.
atk-s0513a4:5146_12: Tathāvidhampi hi sineruṃ uppātento viya nikkaruṇo maccu ādāya gacchatīti dasseti.
atk-s0513a4:5146_15: puttadārabandhanasmiñhi uppanne taṃ bandhanaṃ ducchedanīyaṃ hoti,
atk-s0513a4:5146_16: tenāhaṃ puretaraññeva kāme ca gehañca hitvā idāneva pabbajissāmi, anujāna, manti.
atk-s0513a4:5147_1: tumhehi saddhiṃ kathentameva maṃ byādhijarāmaraṇāni upagacchantī”ti te ubhopi vanditvā yojanikaṃ parisaṃ gahetvā nikkhamitvā gaṅgātīrameva agamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:5147_2: Hatthipālo tassapi ākāse nisīditvā dhammaṃ desetvā “samāgamo mahā bhavissatī”ti tattheva nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:5147_3: Punadivase purohito pallaṅkavaramajjhagato nisīditvā cintesi “mama puttā pabbajitā,
atk-s0513a4:5149_0: “Sākhāhi rukkho labhate samaññaṃ, pahīnasākhaṃ pana khāṇumāhu;
atk-s0513a4:5150_0: Pahīnaputtassa mamajja bhoti, vāseṭṭhi bhikkhācariyāya kālo”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5151_0: Tattha labhate samaññanti rukkhoti vohāraṃ labhati.
atk-s0513a4:5152_7: So asītikoṭidhanaṃ brāhmaṇiyā niyyādetvā yojanikaṃ brāhmaṇaparisaṃ ādāya nikkhamitvā puttānaṃ santikaññeva gato.
atk-s0513a4:5152_8: Hatthipālo tāyapi parisāya ākāse ṭhatvā dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0513a4:5152_9: Punadivase brāhmaṇī cintesi “mama cattāro puttā setacchattaṃ pahāya ‘pabbajissāmā’ti gatā,
atk-s0513a4:5152_10: brāhmaṇopi purohitaṭṭhānena saddhiṃ asītikoṭidhanaṃ chaḍḍetvā puttānaññeva santikaṃ gato,
atk-s0513a4:5154_0: “Aghasmi koñcāva yathā himaccaye, katāni jālāni padāliya haṃsā;
atk-s0513a4:5155_0: Gacchanti puttā ca patī ca mayhaṃ, sāhaṃ kathaṃ nānuvaje pajāna”nti.
atk-s0513a4:5156_0: Tattha aghasmi koñcāva yathāti yatheva ākāse koñcasakuṇā asajjamānā gacchanti.
atk-s0513a4:5156_2: Katāni jālāni padāliya haṃsāti atīte kira channavutisahassā suvaṇṇahaṃsāvassārattapahonakaṃ sāliṃ kañcanaguhāyaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5156_3: nikkhipitvā vassabhayena bahi anikkhamitvā catumāsaṃ tattha vasanti.
atk-s0513a4:5156_4: Atha nesaṃ uṇṇanābhi nāma makkaṭako guhādvāre jālaṃ bandhati.
atk-s0513a4:5156_5: Haṃsā dvinnaṃ taruṇahaṃsānaṃ dviguṇaṃ vaṭṭaṃ denti.
atk-s0513a4:5156_6: Te thāmasampannatāya taṃ jālaṃ chinditvā purato gacchanti,
atk-s0513a4:5156_11: tathā himaccaye vassānātikkame dve taruṇahaṃsā katāni jālāni padāletvā gacchanti,
atk-s0513a4:5156_13: Idāni pana mama puttā taruṇahaṃsā jālaṃ viya kāmajālaṃ chinditvā gatā,
atk-s0513a4:5156_14: mayāpi tesaṃ gatamaggena gantabbanti iminādhippāyena “gacchanti puttā ca patī ca mayhaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:5157_0: Iti sā “kathaṃ ahaṃ evaṃ pajānantī na pabbajissāmi,
atk-s0513a4:5157_1: pabbajissāmi yevā”ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā brāhmaṇiyo pakkosāpetvā evamāha “tumhe kiṃ karissathā”ti?
atk-s0513a4:5157_5: Sā taṃ vibhavaṃ chaḍḍetvā yojanikaṃ parisaṃ gahetvā puttānaṃ santikameva gatā.
atk-s0513a4:5157_6: Hatthipālo tāyapi parisāya ākāse nisīditvā dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0513a4:5157_8: purohito ca brāhmaṇī ca sabbaṃ dhanaṃ chaḍḍetvā dviyojanikaṃ parisaṃ gahetvā puttānaṃ santikaṃ gatā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5157_9: Rājā “asāmikaṃ dhanaṃ amhākaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti tassa gehato dhanaṃ āharāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:5157_10: Athassa aggamahesī “rājā kiṃ karotī”ti pucchitvā “purohitassa gehato dhanaṃ āharāpetī”ti vutte “purohito
atk-s0513a4:5157_11: kuhi”nti vatvā “sapajāpatiko pabbajjatthāya nikkhanto”ti sutvā “ayaṃ rājā brāhmaṇena ca brāhmaṇiyā ca
atk-s0513a4:5157_12: catūhi puttehi ca jahitaṃ ukkāraṃ mohena mūḷho attano gharaṃ āharāpeti,
atk-s0513a4:5157_13: upamāya naṃ bodhessāmī”ti sūnato maṃsaṃ āharāpetvā rājaṅgaṇe rāsiṃ kāretvā ujumaggaṃ vissajjetvā jālaṃ parikkhipāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:5157_15: Tattha sappaññā jālaṃ pasāritaṃ ñatvā atibhārikā hutvā “ujukaṃ uppatituṃ na sakkhissāmā”ti attanā khāditamaṃsaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5157_16: chaḍḍetvā vamitvā jālaṃ anallīyitvā ujukameva uppatitvā gamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:5157_17: Andhabālā pana tehi chaḍḍitaṃ vamitaṃ khāditvā bhāriyā hutvā ujukaṃ uppatituṃ asakkontā āgantvā jāle bajjhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:5157_19: Sā taṃ ādāya rañño santikaṃ gantvā “etha tāva, mahārāja,
atk-s0513a4:5157_20: rājaṅgaṇe ekaṃ kiriyaṃ passissāmā”ti sīhapañjaraṃ vivaritvā “ime gijjhe olokehi mahārājā”ti vatvā dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:5160_0: Ye ca bhutvā na vamiṃsu, te me hatthattamāgatā.
atk-s0513a4:5163_0: Vantādo puriso rāja, na so hoti pasaṃsiyo”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5164_0: Tattha bhutvā vamitvā cāti maṃsaṃ khāditvā vamitvā ca.
atk-s0513a4:5164_3: Na pasaṃsiyoti so taṇhāvasiko bālo buddhādīhi paṇḍitehi pasaṃsitabbo na hoti.
atk-s0513a4:5165_2: So “ajjeva rajjaṃ pahāya mama pabbajituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti uppannasaṃvego deviyā thutiṃ karonto gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:5167_0: “Paṅke ca posaṃ palipe byasannaṃ, balī yathā dubbalamuddhareyya;
atk-s0513a4:5168_0: Evampi maṃ tvaṃ udatāri bhoti, pañcāli gāthāhi subhāsitāhī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5169_2: Uddhareyyāti kesesu vā hatthesu vā gahetvā ukkhipitvā thale ṭhapeyya.
atk-s0513a4:5170_0: Evañca pana vatvā taṅkhaṇaññeva pabbajitukāmo hutvā amacce pakkosāpetvā āha –
atk-s0513a4:5170_4: Rājā dvādasayojanike bārāṇasinagare rajjaṃ chaḍḍetvā “atthikā setacchattaṃ ussāpentū”ti amaccaparivuto
atk-s0513a4:5170_5: tiyojanikaṃ parisaṃ gahetvā kumārasseva santikaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a4:5170_6: Hatthipālo tassāpi parisāya ākāse nisinno dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0513a4:5173_0: Raṭṭhaṃ hitvāna pabbaji, nāgo chetvāva bandhana”nti.
atk-s0513a4:5174_0: Punadivase nagare ohīnajano sannipatitvā rājadvāraṃ gantvā deviyā ārocetvā nivesanaṃ pavisitvā deviṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito gāthamāha.
atk-s0513a4:5177_0: Tuvampi no hohi yatheva rājā, amhehi guttā anusāsa rajja”nti.
atk-s0513a4:5178_0: Tattha anusāsāti amhehi guttā hutvā dhammena rajjaṃ kārehi.
atk-s0513a4:5179_0: Sā mahājanassa kathaṃ sutvā sesagāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:5182_0: Ahampi ekā carissāmi loke, hitvāna kāmāni manoramāni.
atk-s0513a4:5185_0: Ahampi ekā carissāmi loke, hitvāna kāmāni yathodhikāni.
atk-s0513a4:5187_0: “Accenti kālā tarayanti rattiyo, vayoguṇā anupubbaṃ jahanti;
atk-s0513a4:5188_0: Ahampi ekā carissāmi loke, hitvāna kāmāni manoramāni.
atk-s0513a4:5190_0: “Accenti kālā tarayanti rattiyo, vayoguṇā anupubbaṃ jahanti;
atk-s0513a4:5191_0: Ahampi ekā carissāmi loke, hitvāna kāmāni yathodhikāni.
atk-s0513a4:5193_0: “Accenti kālā tarayanti rattiyo, vayoguṇā anupubbaṃ jahanti;
atk-s0513a4:5194_0: Ahampi ekā carissāmi loke, sītibhūtā sabbamaticca saṅga”nti.
atk-s0513a4:5195_0: Tattha ekāti puttadhītukilesasambādhehi muccitvā imasmiṃ loke ekikāva carissāmi.
atk-s0513a4:5195_6: Tarayantīti atucchā hutvā āyusaṅkhāraṃ khepayamānā khādayamānā gacchanti.
atk-s0513a4:5195_9: Anupubbaṃ jahantīti uparūparikoṭṭhāsaṃ appatvā tattha tattheva nirujjhanti.
atk-s0513a4:5195_10: Sītibhūtāti uṇhakārake uṇhasabhāve kilese pahāya sītalā hutvā.
atk-s0513a4:5195_11: Sabbamaticca saṅganti rāgasaṅgādikaṃ sabbasaṅgaṃ atikkamitvā ekā carissāmi,
atk-s0513a4:5196_0: Iti sā imāhi gāthāhi mahājanassa dhammaṃ desetvā amaccabhariyāyo pakkosāpetvā āha –
atk-s0513a4:5196_4: Sā “sādhū”ti rājanivesane suvaṇṇakoṭṭhāgārādīni vivarāpetvā “asukaṭṭhāne ca asukaṭṭhāne ca mahānidhi
atk-s0513a4:5196_6: atthikā harantū”ti vatvā suvaṇṇapaṭṭaṃ mahātale thambhe bandhāpetvā nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā mahāsampattiṃ chaḍḍetvā nagarā nikkhami.
atk-s0513a4:5196_8: “Rājā ca kira devī ca rajjaṃ pahāya ‘pabbajissāmā’ti nikkhamanti,
atk-s0513a4:5196_9: mayaṃ idha kiṃ karissāmā”ti tato tato manussā yathāpūritāneva gehāni chaḍḍetvā putte hatthesu gahetvā nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:5196_13: devīpi tiyojanikaṃ parisaṃ gahetvā tattheva gatā.
atk-s0513a4:5196_14: Hatthipālo tassāpi parisāya ākāse nisinno dhammaṃ desetvā dvādasayojanikaṃ parisaṃ gahetvā himavantābhimukho pāyāsi.
atk-s0513a4:5196_15: “Hatthipālakumāro kira dvādasayojanikaṃ bārāṇasiṃ tucchaṃ katvā ‘pabbajissāmī’ti mahājanaṃ ādāya himavantaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0513a4:5196_18: so tāya parisāya saddhiṃ himavantaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a4:5197_0: Sakko āvajjento taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā “hatthipālakumāro mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhanto,
atk-s0513a4:5197_4: vitthārato pannarasayojanaṃ assamaṃ māpetvā pabbajitaparikkhāre sampādehī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5197_5: So “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā gaṅgātīre ramaṇīye bhūmibhāge vuttappamāṇaṃ assamapadaṃ māpetvā paṇṇasālāsu
atk-s0513a4:5197_7: Ekekissā paṇṇasālāya dvāre ekeko caṅkamo rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānaparicchinno katasudhāparikammo ālambanaphalako,
atk-s0513a4:5197_9: ekekassa caṅkamassa koṭiyaṃ ekeko udakabharito kūpo,
atk-s0513a4:5197_13: Vissakammo assamapadaṃ māpetvā paṇṇasālāsu pabbajitaparikkhāre ṭhapetvā “ye keci pabbajitukāmā ime parikkhāre
atk-s0513a4:5197_14: gaṇhantū”ti jātihiṅgulakena bhittiyā akkharāni likhitvā attano ānubhāvena bheravasadde migapakkhī duddasike
atk-s0513a4:5198_0: Hatthipālakumāro ekapadikamaggena sakkadattiyaṃ assamaṃ pavisitvā akkharāni disvā “sakkena mama mahābhinikkhamanaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5198_1: nikkhantabhāvo ñāto bhavissatī”ti dvāraṃ vivaritvā paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā isipabbajjaliṅgaṃ gahetvā nikkhamitvā
atk-s0513a4:5198_2: caṅkamaṃ otaritvā katipaye vāre aparāparaṃ caṅkamitvā sesajanakāyaṃ pabbājetvā assamapadaṃ vicārento
atk-s0513a4:5198_7: Atheko rājā “bārāṇasiyaṃ kira rājā natthī”ti āgantvā alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ nagaraṃ oloketvā rājanivesanaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5198_8: āruyha tattha tattha ratanarāsiṃ disvā “evarūpaṃ nagaraṃ pahāya pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya pabbajjā nāmesā
atk-s0513a4:5198_9: uḷārā bhavissatī”ti surāsoṇḍe maggaṃ pucchitvā hatthipālassa santikaṃ pāyāsi.
atk-s0513a4:5198_10: Hatthipālo tassa vanantaraṃ āgatabhāvaṃ ñatvā paṭimaggaṃ gantvā ākāse nisinno parisāya dhammaṃ desetvā assamapadaṃ netvā sabbaparisaṃ pabbājesi.
atk-s0513a4:5198_15: mahāpuriso tassa dhammaṃ desetvā brahmavihārabhāvanañceva kasiṇabhāvanañca ācikkhati.
atk-s0513a4:5198_16: Te yebhuyyena jhānābhiññā nibbattetvā tīsu koṭṭhāsesu dve koṭṭhāsā brahmaloke nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:5198_17: Tatiyakoṭṭhāsaṃ tidhā katvā eko koṭṭhāso brahmaloke nibbatti,
atk-s0513a4:5198_19: eko isīnaṃ pāricariyaṃ katvā manussaloke tīsu kulasampattīsu nibbatti.
atk-s0513a4:5199_6: kāḷavallimaṇḍapavāsī mahānāgatthero kuddālasamāgame mūgapakkhasamāgame cūḷasutasomasamāgame ayogharapaṇḍitasamāgame
atk-s0513a4:5201_0: Dandhañhi karoto puññaṃ, pāpasmiṃ ramate mano”ti. ;
atk-s0513a4:5203_2: pubbepi tathāgato mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhantoyevā”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a4:5207_0: Yamekarattiṃ paṭhamanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto mahābhinikkhamanaññeva ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:5207_3: pubbepi tathāgato mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhantoyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:5208_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente brahmadattassa rañño aggamahesī gabbhaṃ paṭilabhitvā laddhagabbhaparihārā
atk-s0513a4:5208_2: Tassā purimattabhāve ekā sapattikā “tava jātaṃ jātaṃ pajaṃ khādituṃ labhissāmī”ti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a4:5208_3: Sā kira sayaṃ vañjhā hutvā puttamātukodhena taṃ patthanaṃ katvā yakkhayoniyaṃ nibbatti.
atk-s0513a4:5208_4: Itarā rañño aggamahesī hutvā imaṃ puttaṃ vijāyi.
atk-s0513a4:5208_5: Sā yakkhinī tadā okāsaṃ labhitvā deviyā passantiyāva bībhaccharūpā hutvā āgantvā taṃ dārakaṃ gahetvā palāyi.
atk-s0513a4:5208_6: Devī “yakkhinī me puttaṃ gahetvā palāyī”ti mahāsaddena viravi.
atk-s0513a4:5208_7: Itarāpi dārakaṃ mūlakandaṃ viya muruṃ muruṃ karontī khāditvā deviyā hatthavikārādīhi bheravaṃ pakāsetvā tajjetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a4:5208_8: Rājā taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā “kiṃ sakkā yakkhiniyā kātu”nti tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:5208_12: Tatiyavāre tassā kucchiyaṃ mahāsatto paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a4:5208_13: Rājā mahājanaṃ sannipātetvā “deviyā jātaṃ jātaṃ pajaṃ ekā yakkhinī khādati,
atk-s0513a4:5208_16: deviyā hatthapādesu tālapaṇṇaṃ bandhituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:5208_19: Rājā “sādhū”ti attano vijite kammāre sannipātetvā “ayogharaṃ karothā”ti āṇāpetvā āyuttake adāsi.
atk-s0513a4:5208_21: thambhe ādiṃ katvā sabbagehasambhārā ayomayāva ahesuṃ,
atk-s0513a4:5208_22: navahi māsehi ayomayaṃ mahantaṃ caturassasālaṃ niṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:5209_0: Rājā deviyā gabbhaparipākaṃ ñatvā ayogharaṃ alaṅkārāpetvā taṃ ādāya ayogharaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a4:5209_3: Taṃ dhātīnaṃ datvā mahantaṃ ārakkhaṃ saṃvidahitvā rājā deviṃ ādāya nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā alaṅkatapāsādatalameva abhiruhi.
atk-s0513a4:5209_4: Yakkhinīpi udakavāraṃ gantvā vessavaṇassa udakaṃ vahantī jīvitakkhayaṃ pattā.
atk-s0513a4:5209_5: Mahāsatto ayoghareyeva vaḍḍhitvā viññutaṃ patto tattheva sabbasippāni uggaṇhi.
atk-s0513a4:5209_6: Rājā “ko me puttassa vayappadeso”ti amacce pucchitvā “soḷasavasso, deva,
atk-s0513a4:5209_7: sūro thāmasampanno yakkhasahassampi paṭibāhituṃ samattho”ti sutvā “rajjamassa dassāmi,
atk-s0513a4:5209_8: sakalanagaraṃ alaṅkaritvā ayogharato taṃ nīharitvā ānethā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:5209_10: devā”ti dvādasayojanikaṃ bārāṇasiṃ alaṅkaritvā sabbālaṅkāravibhūsitaṃ maṅgalavāraṇaṃ ādāya tattha gantvā
atk-s0513a4:5209_12: kulasantakaṃ alaṅkatanagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pitaraṃ kāsirājānaṃ vandatha,
atk-s0513a4:5210_1: disvā cintesi “mama pitā maṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ bandhanāgāre vasāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:5210_3: ko nu kho mayhaṃ doso”ti amacce pucchi. “Deva,
atk-s0513a4:5210_5: tumhākaṃ pana dvebhātike ekā yakkhinī khādi,
atk-s0513a4:5210_8: So tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā cintesi “ahaṃ dasa māse lohakumbhiniraye viya ca gūthaniraye viya ca mātukucchimhi
atk-s0513a4:5210_9: vasitvā mātukucchito nikkhantakālato paṭṭhāya soḷasa vassāni etasmiṃ bandhanāgāre vasiṃ,
atk-s0513a4:5210_12: yakkhiniyā hatthato muttopi panāhaṃ neva ajaro,
atk-s0513a4:5210_16: ajjeva mama pitaraṃ pabbajjaṃ anujānāpetvā himavantaṃ pavisitvā pabbajissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5210_17: So nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā rājakulaṃ pavisitvā rājānaṃ vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:5211_0: Rājā tassa sarīrasobhaṃ oloketvā balavasinehena amacce olokesi.
atk-s0513a4:5211_3: Puttaṃ me ratanarāsimhi ṭhapetvā tīhi saṅkhehi abhisiñcitvā kañcanamālaṃ setacchattaṃ ussāpethāti.
atk-s0513a4:5211_8: “Deva ahaṃ mātukucchimhi dasa māse gūthaniraye viya vasitvā mātukucchito nikkhanto yakkhinibhayena soḷasa
atk-s0513a4:5211_9: vassāni bandhanāgāre vasanto bahi oloketumpi na alabhiṃ,
atk-s0513a4:5211_11: yakkhiniyā hatthato muttomhītipi ajaro amaro na homi.
atk-s0513a4:5211_12: Maccu nāmesa na sakkā kenaci jinituṃ,
atk-s0513a4:5211_18: devā”ti vatvā pitu dhammaṃ desento āha –
atk-s0513a4:5214_0: Abbhuṭṭhitova so yāti, sa gacchaṃ na nivattati.
atk-s0513a4:5216_0: “Na yujjhamānā na balenavassitā, narā na jīranti na cāpi mīyare;
atk-s0513a4:5217_0: Sabbaṃ hidaṃ jātijarāyupaddutaṃ, taṃ me matī hoti carāmi dhammaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5220_0: Na maccuno jayitumussahanti, taṃ me matī hoti carāmi dhammaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5222_0: “Hatthīhi assehi rathehi pattibhi, parivāritā muccare ekacceyyā;
atk-s0513a4:5223_0: Na maccuno muccitumussahanti, taṃ me matī hoti carāmi dhammaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5225_0: “Hatthīhi assehi rathehi pattibhi, sūrā pabhañjanti padhaṃsayanti;
atk-s0513a4:5226_0: Na maccuno bhañjitumussahanti, taṃ me matī hoti carāmi dhammaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5228_0: “Mattā gajā bhinnagaḷā pabhinnā, nagarāni maddanti janaṃ hananti;
atk-s0513a4:5229_0: Na maccuno madditumussahanti, taṃ me matī hoti carāmi dhammaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5232_0: Na maccuno vijjhitumussahanti, taṃ me matī hoti carāmi dhammaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5234_0: “Sarāni khīyanti saselakānanā, sabbaṃ hidaṃ khīyati dīghamantaraṃ;
atk-s0513a4:5235_0: Sabbaṃ hidaṃ bhañjare kālapariyāyaṃ, taṃ me matī hoti carāmi dhammaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5238_0: Paṭova dhuttassa, dumova kūlajo, taṃ me matī hoti carāmi dhammaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5240_0: “Dumapphalāneva patanti māṇavā, daharā ca vuddhā ca sarīrabhedā;
atk-s0513a4:5241_0: Nāriyo narā majjhimaporisā ca, taṃ me matī hoti carāmi dhammaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5243_0: “Nāyaṃ vayo tārakarājasannibho, yadabbhatītaṃ gatameva dāni taṃ;
atk-s0513a4:5244_0: Jiṇṇassa hī natthi ratī kuto sukhaṃ, taṃ me matī hoti carāmi dhammaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5246_0: “Yakkhā pisācā athavāpi petā, kupitā te assasanti manusse;
atk-s0513a4:5247_0: Na maccuno assasitussahanti, taṃ me matī hoti carāmi dhammaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5249_0: “Yakkhe pisāce athavāpi pete, kupitepi te nijjhapanaṃ karonti;
atk-s0513a4:5250_0: Na maccuno nijjhapanaṃ karonti, taṃ me matī hoti carāmi dhammaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5252_0: “Aparādhake dūsake heṭhake ca, rājāno daṇḍenti viditvāna dosaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:5253_0: Na maccuno daṇḍayitussahanti, taṃ me matī hoti carāmi dhammaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5255_0: “Aparādhakā dūsakā heṭhakā ca, labhanti te rājino nijjhapetuṃ;
atk-s0513a4:5256_0: Na maccuno nijjhapanaṃ karonti, taṃ me matī hoti carāmi dhammaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5258_0: “Na khattiyoti na ca brāhmaṇoti, na aḍḍhakā balavā tejavāpi;
atk-s0513a4:5259_0: Na maccurājassa apekkhamatthi, taṃ me matī hoti carāmi dhammaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5261_0: “Sīhā ca byagghā ca athopi dīpiyo, pasayha khādanti vipphandamānaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:5262_0: Na maccuno khāditumussahanti, taṃ me matī hoti carāmi dhammaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5264_0: “Māyākārā raṅgamajjhe karontā, mohenti cakkhūni janassa tāvade;
atk-s0513a4:5265_0: Na maccuno mohayitussahanti, taṃ me matī hoti carāmi dhammaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5267_0: “Āsīvisā kupitā uggatejā, ḍaṃsanti mārentipi te manusse;
atk-s0513a4:5268_0: Na maccuno ḍaṃsitumussahanti, taṃ me matī hoti carāmi dhammaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5270_0: “Āsīvisā kupitā yaṃ ḍaṃsanti, tikicchakā tesa visaṃ hananti;
atk-s0513a4:5271_0: Na maccuno daṭṭhavisaṃ hananti, taṃ me matī hoti carāmi dhammaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5273_0: “Dhammantarī vettaraṇī ca bhojo, visāni hantvāna bhujaṅgamānaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:5274_0: Suyyanti te kālakatā tatheva, taṃ me matī hoti carāmi dhammaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5277_0: Na maccurājassa vajantadassanaṃ, taṃ me matī hoti carāmi dhammaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5279_0: “Dhammo have rakkhati dhammacāriṃ, dhammo suciṇṇo sukhamāvahāti;
atk-s0513a4:5280_0: Esānisaṃso dhamme suciṇṇe, na duggatiṃ gacchati dhammacārī.
atk-s0513a4:5282_0: “Na hi dhammo adhammo ca, ubho samavipākino;
atk-s0513a4:5283_0: Adhammo nirayaṃ neti, dhammo pāpeti suggati”nti.
atk-s0513a4:5284_0: Tattha yamekarattinti yebhuyyena sattā mātukucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhantā rattiyaṃyeva gaṇhanti,
atk-s0513a4:5284_3: yaṃ ekarattiṃ vā divā vā paṭhamameva paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhitvā mātukucchisaṅkhāte gabbhe vasati.
atk-s0513a4:5284_5: Abbhuṭṭhitova so yātīti so māṇavo yathā nāma valāhakasaṅkhāto abbho uṭṭhito nibbatto vāyuvegāhato paṭigacchati, tatheva –
atk-s0513a4:5286_0: Abbudā jāyate pesi, pesi nibbattatī ghano;
atk-s0513a4:5287_0: Ghanā pasākhā jāyanti, kesā lomā nakhāpi ca.
atk-s0513a4:5289_0: Tena so tattha yāpeti, mātukucchigato naroti. ;
atk-s0513a4:5290_1: mātukucchito ca nikkhanto mandadasakādibhāvaṃ āpajjamāno satataṃ samitaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0513a4:5290_2: Sa gacchaṃ na nivattatīti sacāyaṃ evaṃ gacchanto puna abbudato kalalabhāvaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:5290_5: vaṇṇadasakādito vā khiḍḍādasakādibhāvaṃ pāpuṇituṃ na nivattati.
atk-s0513a4:5290_6: Yathā pana so valāhako vātavegena saṃcuṇṇiyamāno “ahaṃ asukaṭṭhāne nāma uṭṭhito puna nivattitvā tattheva gantvā pakatibhāvena ṭhassāmī”ti na labhati,
atk-s0513a4:5290_12: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ koṭṭhāse saṅkhārā purimānaṃ purimānaṃ paccayā hutvā pacchato anivattitvā tattha tattheva bhijjanti,
atk-s0513a4:5290_13: jarākāle saṅkhārā “amhehi esa pubbe yuvā thāmasampanno kato,
atk-s0513a4:5290_14: puna naṃ nivattitvā tattheva karissāmā”ti na labhanti,
atk-s0513a4:5291_0: Na yujjhamānāti ubhato byūḷhe saṅgāme yujjhantā.
atk-s0513a4:5291_1: Na balenavassitāti na kāyabalena vā yodhabalena vā upagatā samannāgatā.
atk-s0513a4:5291_3: kāraṃ āharitvā evarūpāpi narā na jīranti na cāpi na mīyareti attho veditabbo.
atk-s0513a4:5291_5: sabbameva idaṃ pāṇamaṇḍalaṃ mahāyantena pīḷiyamānā ucchughaṭikā viya jātiyā ca jarāya ca upaddutaṃ niccaṃ pīḷitaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5291_6: Taṃ me matī hotīti tena kāraṇena mama “pabbajitvā dhammaṃ carāmī”ti mati hoti cittaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0513a4:5292_2: Jayantīti kadāci ekacce rājāno attano senāya jayanti.
atk-s0513a4:5292_3: Na maccunoti tepi rājāno mahāsenassa maccuno senaṃ jayituṃ na ussahanti,
atk-s0513a4:5292_5: Muccare ekacceyyāti etehi hatthiādīhi parivāritā ekacce paccāmittānaṃ hatthato muccanti,
atk-s0513a4:5292_6: maccuno pana santikā muccituṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0513a4:5292_7: Pabhañjantīti etehi hatthiādīhi paccatthikarājūnaṃ nagarāni pabhañjanti.
atk-s0513a4:5292_8: Padhaṃsayantīti mahājanaṃ dhaṃsentā padhaṃsentā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpenti.
atk-s0513a4:5292_9: Na maccunoti tepi maraṇakāle patte maccuno bhañjituṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0513a4:5293_0: Bhinnagaḷā pabhinnāti tīsu ṭhānesu pabhinnā hutvā madaṃ gaḷantā,
atk-s0513a4:5293_2: Na maccunoti tepi mahāmaccuṃ maddituṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0513a4:5293_10: Sabbaṃ hidanti sabbamidaṃ saṅkhāragataṃ dīghamantaraṃ ṭhatvā khīyateva.
atk-s0513a4:5293_11: Kappuṭṭhānaggiṃ patvā mahāsinerupi aggimukhe madhusitthakaṃ viya vilīyateva,
atk-s0513a4:5293_13: Kālapariyāyanti kālapariyāyaṃ nassanakālavāraṃ patvā sabbaṃ bhañjare,
atk-s0513a4:5294_0: Calācalanti cañcalaṃ sakabhāvena ṭhātuṃ asamatthaṃ nānābhāvavinābhāvasabhāvameva.
atk-s0513a4:5294_1: Pāṇabhunodha jīvitanti idha loke imesaṃ pāṇabhūtānaṃ jīvitaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5294_3: dumova kūlajoti suradhutto hi suraṃ disvāva udare baddhaṃ sāṭakaṃ datvā pivateva,
atk-s0513a4:5294_5: yathā esa paṭo ca dumo ca cañcalo,
atk-s0513a4:5294_7: Dumapphalānevāti yathā pakkāni phalāni vātāhatāni dumaggato bhūmiyaṃ patanti,
atk-s0513a4:5294_8: tathevime māṇavā jarāvātāhatā jīvitā gaḷitvā maraṇapathaviyaṃ patanti.
atk-s0513a4:5295_6: Kuto sukhanti jarājiṇṇassa kāmaguṇesu ratipi natthi,
atk-s0513a4:5295_13: Na maccunoti maccuṃ pana tepi assāsena upahanituṃ vā āvisituṃ vā na sakkonti.
atk-s0513a4:5295_19: Viditvāna dosanti dosaṃ jānitvā yathānurūpena daṇḍena daṇḍentīti attho.
atk-s0513a4:5295_20: Na maccunoti tepi maccuṃ daṇḍayituṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0513a4:5296_0: Nijjhapetunti sakkhīhi attano niraparādhabhāvaṃ pakāsetvā pasādetuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5296_3: ayaṃ tejavā”ti evampi na paccurājassa apekkhaṃ atthi,
atk-s0513a4:5296_4: ekasmimpi satte apekkhaṃ pemaṃ sineho natthi,
atk-s0513a4:5296_7: Na maccunoti tepi maccuṃ khādituṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0513a4:5296_9: Mohentīti abhūtaṃ bhūtaṃ katvā dassentā mohenti.
atk-s0513a4:5296_12: Dhammantarī vettaraṇī ca bhojoti ete evaṃnāmakā vejjā.
atk-s0513a4:5296_14: Osadhehīti ghoraṃ vā gandhāriṃ vā vijjaṃ sāvetvā osadhaṃ ādāya tehi osadhehi paccatthikānaṃ adassanaṃ vajanti.
atk-s0513a4:5298_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto catuvīsatiyā gāthāhi pitu dhammaṃ desetvā “mahārāja,
atk-s0513a4:5298_3: tumhehi pana saddhiṃ kathentameva maṃ byādhijarāmaraṇāni upagacchanti,
atk-s0513a4:5298_5: tumhe”ti vatvā ayadāmaṃ chinditvā mattahatthī viya kañcanapañjaraṃ chinditvā sīhapotako viya kāme pahāya mātāpitaro vanditvā nikkhami.
atk-s0513a4:5298_6: Athassa pitā “mamapi rajjenattho natthī”ti rajjaṃ pahāya tena saddhiññeva nikkhami,
atk-s0513a4:5298_7: tasmiṃ nikkhante devīpi amaccāpi brāhmaṇagahapatikādayopīti sakalanagaravāsino gehāni chaḍḍetvā nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:5298_11: Sakko tassa nikkhantabhāvaṃ ñatvā vissakammaṃ pesetvā dvādasayojanāyāmaṃ sattayojanavitthāraṃ assamapadaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a4:5298_13: Ito paraṃ mahāsattassa pabbajjā ca ovādadānañca brahmalokaparāyaṇatā ca parisāya anapāyagamanīyatā ca sabbā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-s0513a4:5299_2: pubbepi tathāgato mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhantoyevā”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a4:5302_0: Mātaṅgo cittasambhūto, sivi sirī ca rohaṇaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:5315_0: Kiṃchando kimadhippāyoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto uposathakammaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:5315_1: Ekadivasañhi satthā bahū upāsake ca upāsikāyo ca uposathike dhammassavanatthāya āgantvā dhammasabhāyaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5315_3: bhante”ti vutte “sādhu vo kataṃ uposathaṃ karontehi,
atk-s0513a4:5315_4: porāṇakā upaḍḍhūposathakammassa nissandena mahantaṃ yasaṃ paṭilabhiṃsū”ti vatvā tehi yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:5316_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatto dhammena rajjaṃ kārento saddho ahosi dānasīlauposathakammesu appamatto.
atk-s0513a4:5316_2: Purohito panassa parapiṭṭhimaṃsiko lañjakhādako kūṭavinicchayiko ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:5316_3: Rājā uposathadivase amaccādayo pakkosāpetvā “uposathikā hothā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:5316_5: Atha naṃ divā lañjaṃ gahetvā kūṭaḍḍaṃ katvā upaṭṭhānaṃ āgataṃ rājā “tumhe uposathikā”ti amacce pucchanto “tvampi ācariya uposathiko”ti pucchi.
atk-s0513a4:5316_7: Atha naṃ eko amacco “nanu tumhe na uposathikā”ti codesi. So āha –
atk-s0513a4:5316_9: gehaṃ pana gantvā mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā uposathaṃ adhiṭṭhāya sāyaṃ na bhuñjissāmi,
atk-s0513a4:5316_14: Punekadivasaṃ tasmiṃ vinicchaye nisinne aññatarā sīlavatī itthī aḍḍaṃ karontī gharaṃ gantuṃ alabhamānā
atk-s0513a4:5316_15: “uposathakammaṃ nātikkamissāmī”ti upakaṭṭhe kāle mukhaṃ vikkhāletuṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0513a4:5316_16: Tasmiṃ khaṇe brāhmaṇassa supakkānaṃ ambaphalānaṃ ambapiṇḍi āhariyittha.
atk-s0513a4:5316_17: So tassā uposathikabhāvaṃ ñatvā “imāni khāditvā uposathikā hohī”ti adāsi.
atk-s0513a4:5317_0: So aparabhāge kālaṃ katvā himavantapadese kosikigaṅgāya tīre tiyojanike ambavane ramaṇīye bhūmibhāge
atk-s0513a4:5317_1: sobhaggappatte kanakavimāne alaṅkatasirisayane suttappabuddho viya nibbatti alaṅkatapaṭiyatto uttamarūpadharo
atk-s0513a4:5317_12: Tehi nakhehi attano piṭṭhimaṃsaṃ phāletvā uppāṭetvā khādanto vedanāppatto mahāravaṃ ravanto dukkhaṃ anubhoti.
atk-s0513a4:5317_16: So mahāsampattiṃ anubhavanto ramaṇīye ambavane dibbapāsādaṃ abhiruhati.
atk-s0513a4:5317_17: Iti so uposathikāya itthiyā ambaphaladānassa nissandena tiyojanikaṃ ambavanaṃ paṭilabhati,
atk-s0513a4:5317_18: lañjaṃ gahetvā kūṭaḍḍakaraṇanissandena pana piṭṭhimaṃsaṃ uppāṭetvā khādati,
atk-s0513a4:5318_0: Tasmiṃ kāle bārāṇasirājā kāmesu dosaṃ disvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā adhogaṅgāya ramaṇīye bhūmipadese paṇṇasālaṃ kāretvā uñchācariyāya yāpento vihāsi.
atk-s0513a4:5318_1: Athekadivasaṃ tamhā ambavanā mahāghaṭappamāṇaṃ ambapakkaṃ gaṅgāya patitvā sotena vuyhamānaṃ tassa tāpasassa paribhogatitthābhimukhaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:5318_2: So mukhaṃ dhovanto taṃ majjhe nadiyā āgacchantaṃ disvā udakaṃ taranto gantvā ādāya assamapadaṃ āharitvā
atk-s0513a4:5318_3: agyāgāre ṭhapetvā satthakena phāletvā yāpanamattaṃ khāditvā sesaṃ kadalipaṇṇehi paṭicchādetvā punappunaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5318_5: Tasmiṃ pana khīṇe aññaṃ phalāphalaṃ khādituṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0513a4:5318_6: rasataṇhāya bajjhitvā “tameva ambapakkaṃ khādissāmī”ti nadītīraṃ gantvā nadiṃ olokento “ambaṃ alabhitvā na uṭṭhahissāmī”ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:5318_7: So tattha nirāhāro ekampi divasaṃ, dvepi, tīṇi, catu, pañca,
atk-s0513a4:5318_8: cha divasāni vātātapena parisussanto ambaṃ olokento nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:5318_9: Atha sattame divase nadīdevatā āvajjamānā taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā “ayaṃ tāpaso taṇhāvasiko hutvā sattāhaṃ nirāhāro gaṅgaṃ olokento nisīdi,
atk-s0513a4:5318_12: dassāmi tassā”ti āgantvā gaṅgāya upari ākāse ṭhatvā tena saddhiṃ sallapantī paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:5321_0: Kiṃpatthayāno kiṃ esaṃ, kena atthena brāhmaṇā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5322_7: tvaṃ kiṃ adhippāyo kiṃ cintento kiṃ patthento kiṃ gavesanto kenatthena imasmiṃ gaṅgātīre gaṅgaṃ olokento nisinnoti.
atk-s0513a4:5323_0: Taṃ sutvā tāpaso nava gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:5332_0: Satthena naṃ vikappetvā, khuppipāsaṃ ahāsi me.
atk-s0513a4:5338_0: Ambaṃ yassa phalaṃ sādu, madhuraggaṃ manoramaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:5345_0: Kā vā tvamasi kalyāṇi, kissa vā tvaṃ sumajjhime.
atk-s0513a4:5348_0: Yā santi nāriyo devesu, devānaṃ paricārikā.
atk-s0513a4:5351_0: Rūpena te sadisī natthi, devesu gandhabbamanussaloke;
atk-s0513a4:5352_0: Puṭṭhāsi me cārupubbaṅgi, brūhi nāmañca bandhave”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5353_11: Ahāsi meti taṃ jivhagge ṭhapitamattameva satta rasaharaṇisahassāni pharitvā mama khudañca pipāsañca hari.
atk-s0513a4:5353_13: Sudhābhojanaṃ bhuttassa viya hi tassa sabbadarathaṃ apahari.
atk-s0513a4:5353_16: Dukhakkhamoti dukkhena asātena kāyakkhamena ceva cittakkhamena ca samannāgato.
atk-s0513a4:5353_17: Aññesu pana kadalipanasādīsu phalesu parittakampi assādaṃ nādhigacchāmi,
atk-s0513a4:5353_18: sabbāni me jivhāya ṭhapitamattāni tittakāneva sampajjantīti dīpeti.
atk-s0513a4:5354_6: yamahaṃ gambhīre puthulaudakakkhandhasaṅkhāte mahaṇṇave vuyhamānaṃ tato udadhismā uddhariṃ,
atk-s0513a4:5354_7: taṃ ambaṃ mama maraṇaṃ āvahissatīti maññāmi,
atk-s0513a4:5354_10: Rammaṃ pati nisinnosmīti ramaṇīyaṃ nadiṃ pati ahaṃ nisinno.
atk-s0513a4:5354_11: Puthulomāyutā puthūti ayaṃ nadī puthulomehi macchehi āyutā puthu vipulā,
atk-s0513a4:5354_12: api nāma me ito sotthi bhaveyyāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0513a4:5354_13: Apalāyinīti apalāyitvā mama sammukhe ṭhiteti taṃ devataṃ ālapati.
atk-s0513a4:5354_16: Kissa vāti kissa vā kāraṇā idhāgatāsīti pucchati.
atk-s0513a4:5355_3: Yā ca manussalokasminti yā ca manussaloke.
atk-s0513a4:5355_4: Rūpenānvāgatitthiyoti rūpena anvāgatā itthiyo natthīti attano sambhāvanāya evamāha.
atk-s0513a4:5355_5: Tava rūpasadisāya nāma na bhavitabbanti hissa adhippāyo.
atk-s0513a4:5355_6: Gandhabbamanussaloketi mūlagandhādinissitesu gandhabbesu ca manussaloke ca.
atk-s0513a4:5355_8: Nāmañca bandhaveti attano nāmagottañca bandhave ca mayhaṃ akkhāhīti vadati.
atk-s0513a4:5358_0: “Yaṃ tvaṃ pati nisinnosi, rammaṃ brāhmaṇa kosikiṃ;
atk-s0513a4:5370_0: “Yaṃ kiñci ubhato tīre, phalaṃ patati ambuni;
atk-s0513a4:5371_0: Asaṃsayaṃ taṃ sotassa, phalaṃ hoti vasānugaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5376_0: “Na vāhaṃ vaḍḍhavaṃ maññe, yaṃ tvaṃ raṭṭhābhivaḍḍhana;
atk-s0513a4:5380_0: Ye cāpi isayo loke, saññatattā tapassino;
atk-s0513a4:5382_2: Bhusālayāvutthāti bhuse caṇḍasote ālayo yassa vimānassa,
atk-s0513a4:5382_6: Pamukhāti tā vuttappakārā girikandarā maṃ pamukhaṃ karonti,
atk-s0513a4:5382_9: tato tato āgantvā maṃ kosikigaṅgaṃ pavisantīti attho.
atk-s0513a4:5382_11: atha kho bahū vanatodā tamhā tamhā vanamhā udakānipi maṃ bahūni pavisanti.
atk-s0513a4:5382_12: Nīlavārivahindharāti maṇivaṇṇena nīlavārinā yutte udakakkhandhasaṅkhāte vahe dhārayantiyo.
atk-s0513a4:5382_13: Nāgavittodāti nāgānaṃ vittikārena dhanasaṅkhātena vā udakena samannāgatā.
atk-s0513a4:5382_14: Vārināti evarūpā hi bahū nadiyo maṃ vārināva abhisandanti pūrentīti dasseti.
atk-s0513a4:5383_4: Āvahantīti imāni ambādīni tā nadiyo āgacchanti,
atk-s0513a4:5383_6: evaṃ upagatāni pana mama sotaṃ pavisantīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0513a4:5383_7: Sotassāti yaṃ ubhato tīre jātarukkhehi phalaṃ mama ambuni patati,
atk-s0513a4:5383_8: sabbaṃ taṃ mama sotasseva vasānugaṃ hoti.
atk-s0513a4:5383_9: Natthettha saṃsayoti evaṃ ambapakkassa nadīsotena āgamanakāraṇaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:5384_1: Mā rocayāti evaṃ taṇhābhisaṅgaṃ mā rocaya.
atk-s0513a4:5384_9: yaṃ tvaṃ nirāhāratāya sussamāno taruṇova samāno ambalobhena maraṇaṃ abhikaṅkhasi,
atk-s0513a4:5384_10: na ve ahaṃ tava imaṃ paṇḍitabhāvaṃ maññāmīti.
atk-s0513a4:5385_1: tassa taṇhāvasikabhāvaṃ “pitaro”ti saṅkhaṃ gatā brahmāno ca saddhiṃ kāmāvacaradevehi gandhabbā ca vuttappakārā
atk-s0513a4:5385_6: Puna tesaṃ bhāsamānānaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā yepi tesaṃ paṭṭhabhūtā yasassino paricārakā,
atk-s0513a4:5385_8: Pāpakammaṃ karontassa hi raho nāma natthīti tāpasassa saṃvegaṃ uppādentī evamāha.
atk-s0513a4:5388_0: “Evaṃ viditvā vidū sabbadhammaṃ, viddhaṃsanaṃ cavanaṃ jīvitassa;
atk-s0513a4:5389_0: Na cīyatī tassa narassa pāpaṃ, sace na ceteti vadhāya tassa.
atk-s0513a4:5395_0: Asaṃsayaṃ taṃ asiloko, mayi pete āgamissati.
atk-s0513a4:5398_0: Mā taṃ sabbo jano pacchā, pakuṭṭhāyi mayi mate”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5399_0: Tattha evaṃ viditvāti yathā ahaṃ sīlañca aniccatañca jānāmi,
atk-s0513a4:5399_9: evaṃ viditvā ṭhitassa paṇḍitassa sabbaṃ sucaritadhammaṃ jīvitassa ca aniccataṃ jānantassa evarūpassa narassa pāpaṃ na cīyati na vaḍḍhati.
atk-s0513a4:5399_10: Sace na ceteti vadhāya tassāti tassa saṅkhaṃ gatassa parapuggalassa vadhāya na ceteti na pakappeti,
atk-s0513a4:5399_13: ahañca kassaci vadhāya acetetvā kevalaṃ ambapakke āsaṅgaṃ katvā gaṅgaṃ olokento nisinno,
atk-s0513a4:5399_14: tvaṃ mayhaṃ kiṃ nāma akusalaṃ passasīti.
atk-s0513a4:5400_0: Isipūgasamaññāteti isigaṇena suṭṭhu aññāte isīnaṃ sammate.
atk-s0513a4:5400_1: Evaṃ lokyāti tvaṃ nāma pāpapavāhanena lokassa hitāti evaṃ viditā.
atk-s0513a4:5400_3: Anariyaparisambhāseti “tassa jānanti pitaro”tiādikāya asundarāya paribhāsāya samannāgate.
atk-s0513a4:5400_4: Jigīsasīti mayi pāpe asaṃvijjantepi maṃ evaṃ paribhāsantī ca paramaraṇaṃ ajjhupekkhantī ca attano pāpakammaṃ gavesasi uppādesi.
atk-s0513a4:5401_0: Taṃ sutvā devadhītā pañca gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:5404_0: Yo dubbaje kāmaguṇe pahāya, santiñca dhammañca adhiṭṭhitosi.
atk-s0513a4:5418_0: Tattha aññātametanti “garahā te bhavissatīti vadanto ambapakkatthāya vadasī”ti etaṃ kāraṇaṃ mayā aññātaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5418_3: Attānanti taṃ āliṅgitvā ambavanaṃ nayantī attānañca te dadāmi tañca ambaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5418_5: Santiñca dhammañcāti dussīlyavūpasamena santisaṅkhātaṃ sīlañceva sucaritadhammañca.
atk-s0513a4:5418_6: Adhiṭṭhitosīti yo tvaṃ ime guṇe upagato,
atk-s0513a4:5419_3: ambho tāpasa yo mahantaṃ rajjasirivibhavaṃ pahāya ambapakkamatte rasataṇhāya bajjhitvā vātātapaṃ agaṇetvā nadītīre sussamāno nisīdati,
atk-s0513a4:5420_0: Kāmaṃ appossuko bhavāti ekaṃseneva ambapakke nirālayo hohi.
atk-s0513a4:5420_2: Tanti evaṃ vadamānāva devatā tāpasaṃ āliṅgitvā ure nipajjāpetvā ākāse pakkhantā tiyojanikaṃ dibbaambavanaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5420_3: disvā sakuṇasaddañca sutvā tāpasassa ācikkhantī “ta”nti evamāha.
atk-s0513a4:5420_8: Kolaṭṭhimadhusāḷikāti kolaṭṭhisakuṇā ca nāma suvaṇṇasāḷikā sakuṇā ca.
atk-s0513a4:5420_11: Kokilettha pabodhareti ettha ambavane kokilā vassantiyo attānaṃ pabodhenti ñāpenti.
atk-s0513a4:5420_16: Evarūpā rukkhā ca ettha atthīti ambavanaṃ vaṇṇeti.
atk-s0513a4:5421_0: Vaṇṇayitvā ca pana tāpasaṃ tattha otāretvā “imasmiṃ ambavane ambāni khādanto attano taṇhaṃ pūrehī”ti vatvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a4:5421_1: Tāpaso ambāni khāditvā taṇhaṃ pūretvā vissamitvā ambavane vicaranto taṃ petaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavantaṃ disvā kiñci vattuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0513a4:5421_2: Sūriye pana atthaṅgate taṃ nāṭakitthiparivāritaṃ dibbasampattiṃ anubhavamānaṃ disvā tisso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:5424_0: Rattiṃ tvaṃ paricāresi, divā vedesi vedanaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5431_13: Manussesūti yaṃ manussaloke katvā idāni attano piṭṭhimaṃsāni khādasīti pucchati.
atk-s0513a4:5432_0: Peto taṃ sañjānitvā “tumhe maṃ na sañjānātha,
atk-s0513a4:5432_2: idaṃ me rattiṃ sukhānubhavanaṃ tumhe nissāya katassa upaḍḍhūposathassa nissandena laddhaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:5432_3: divā dukkhānubhavanaṃ pana mayā pakatassa pāpasseva nissandena.
atk-s0513a4:5432_4: Ahañhi tumhehi vinicchaye ṭhapito kūṭaḍḍaṃ karitvā lañjaṃ gahetvā parapiṭṭhimaṃsiko hutvā tassa divā
atk-s0513a4:5432_5: katassa kammassa nissandena idaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavāmī”ti vatvā gāthādvayamāha –
atk-s0513a4:5439_4: Yo piṭṭhimaṃsikoti yo puggalo paresaṃ piṭṭhimaṃsakhādako pisuṇo hoti.
atk-s0513a4:5440_9: ahaṃ vo nibaddhaṃ ambapakkena upaṭṭhahissāmī”ti vatvā attano ānubhāvena assamapadeyeva otāretvā “anukkaṇṭhā idheva vasathā”ti paṭiññaṃ gahetvā gato.
atk-s0513a4:5440_11: Tāpaso taṃ paribhuñjanto kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā jhānābhiññā nibbattetvā brahmalokaparāyaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:5441_0: Satthā upāsakānaṃ imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a4:5445_0: Ko pāturāsīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto visākhāya sahāyikā surāpītā pañcasatā itthiyo ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:5445_1: Sāvatthiyaṃ kira surāchaṇe saṅghuṭṭhe tā pañcasatā itthiyo sāmikānaṃ chaṇe kīḷamānānaṃ tikkhasuraṃ paṭiyādetvā
atk-s0513a4:5445_2: “chaṇaṃ kīḷissāmā”ti sabbāpi visākhāya santikaṃ gantvā “sahāyike chaṇaṃ kīḷissāmā”ti vatvā “ayaṃ surāchaṇo,
atk-s0513a4:5445_6: Sā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā tā uyyojetvā satthāraṃ nimantāpetvā mahādānaṃ pavattetvā bahuṃ gandhamālaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5445_7: ādāya sāyanhasamaye dhammakathaṃ sotuṃ tāhi parivutā jetavanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:5445_8: Tā panitthiyo suraṃ pivamānāva tāya saddhiṃ gantvā dvārakoṭṭhake ṭhatvā suraṃ pivitvāva tāya saddhiṃ satthu santikaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:5446_0: Satthā tāsaṃ saṃvegajananatthāya bhamukalomato raṃsī vissajjesi,
atk-s0513a4:5446_4: Satthā nisinnapallaṅke antarahito sinerumuddhani ṭhatvā uṇṇalomato raṃsī vissajjesi,
atk-s0513a4:5447_0: “Ko nu hāso kimānando, niccaṃ pajjalite sati;
atk-s0513a4:5449_4: idaṃ hirottappabhedakaṃ surāpānaṃ nāma kadā uppanna”nti pucchi.
atk-s0513a4:5450_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente eko kāsiraṭṭhavāsī suro nāma vanacarako bhaṇḍapariyesanatthāya himavantaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:5450_1: Tattheko rukkho uggantvā porisamatte ṭhāne tidhākappo ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:5450_2: Tassa tiṇṇaṃ kappānaṃ antare cāṭippamāṇo āvāṭo ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:5450_4: taṃ parivāretvā harītakī āmalakī maricagaccho ca ahosi,
atk-s0513a4:5450_5: tesaṃ pakkāni phalāni chijjitvā tattha patanti.
atk-s0513a4:5450_7: tato suvakā sālisīsāni āharitvā tasmiṃ rukkhe nisīditvā khādanti.
atk-s0513a4:5450_8: Tesaṃ khādamānānaṃ sālīpi taṇḍulāpi tattha patanti.
atk-s0513a4:5450_9: Iti taṃ udakaṃ sūriyasantāpena paccamānaṃ rasaṃ lohitavaṇṇaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:5450_10: Nidāghasamaye pipāsitā sakuṇagaṇā āgantvā taṃ pivitvā mattā parivattitvā rukkhamūle patiṃsu,
atk-s0513a4:5450_13: Vanacarako taṃ disvā “sace idaṃ visaṃ bhaveyya,
atk-s0513a4:5450_15: ime pana thokaṃ niddāyitvā yathāsukhaṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0513a4:5450_16: nayidaṃ visa”nti sayaṃ pivitvā matto hutvā maṃsaṃ khāditukāmo ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:5450_17: Tato aggiṃ katvā rukkhamūle patite tittirakukkuṭādayo māretvā maṃsaṃ aṅgāre pacitvā ekena hatthena naccanto
atk-s0513a4:5450_18: ekena maṃsaṃ khādanto ekāhadvīhaṃ tattheva ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:5451_0: Tato pana avidūre eko varuṇo nāma tāpaso vasati.
atk-s0513a4:5451_4: So ekaṃ veḷunāḷikaṃ pūretvā pakkamaṃsena saddhiṃ āharitvā paṇṇasālaṃ gantvā, “bhante,
atk-s0513a4:5451_5: imaṃ pivathā”ti vatvā ubhopi maṃsaṃ khādantā piviṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:5451_6: Iti surena ca varuṇena ca diṭṭhattā tassa pānassa “surā”ti ca “varuṇā”ti ca nāmaṃ jātaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5451_7: Te ubhopi “attheso upāyo”ti veḷunāḷiyo pūretvā kājenādāya paccantanagaraṃ gantvā “pānakārakā nāma āgatā”ti rañño ārocāpesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5451_10: Rājā dve tayo vāre pivitvā majji,
atk-s0513a4:5451_16: Te gantvā ekadve vāre ānetvā “nibaddhaṃ gantuṃ na sakkhissāmā”ti sambhāre sallakkhetvā tassa rukkhassa
atk-s0513a4:5451_17: tacaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbasambhāre pakkhipitvā nagare suraṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:5451_18: Nāgarā suraṃ pivitvā pamādaṃ āpannā duggatā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0513a4:5451_20: tena pānakārakā tato palāyitvā bārāṇasiṃ gantvā “pānakārakā āgatā”ti rañño ārocāpesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5452_0: Tadā sāvatthiyaṃ sabbamitto nāma rājā ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:5452_1: So tesaṃ saṅgahaṃ katvā “kena vo attho”ti pucchitvā “sambhāramūlena ceva sālipiṭṭhena ca pañcahi cāṭisatehi cā”ti vutte sabbaṃ dāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:5452_2: Te pañcasu cāṭisatesu suraṃ saṇṭhāpetvā mūsikabhayena cāṭirakkhaṇatthāya ekekāya cāṭiyā santike ekekaṃ biḷāraṃ bandhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:5452_3: Te paccitvā uttaraṇakāle cāṭikucchīsu paggharantaṃ suraṃ pivitvā mattā niddāyiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:5452_4: Mūsikā āgantvā tesaṃ kaṇṇanāsikadāṭhikanaṅguṭṭhe khāditvā agamaṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:5452_5: “Biḷārā suraṃ pivitvā matā”ti āyuttakapurisā rañño ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5452_6: Rājā “visakārakā ete bhavissantī”ti tesaṃ dvinnampi janānaṃ sīsāni chindāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:5452_10: Biḷārāpi surāya jiṇṇāya uṭṭhahitvā kīḷantā vicariṃsu,
atk-s0513a4:5452_15: pivissāmi na”nti nagaraṃ alaṅkārāpetvā rājaṅgaṇe maṇḍapaṃ kārāpetvā alaṅkatamaṇḍape samussitasetacchatte
atk-s0513a4:5452_16: rājapallaṅke nisīditvā amaccagaṇaparivuto suraṃ pātuṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0513a4:5453_0: Tadā sakko devarājā “ke nu kho mātupaṭṭhānādīsu appamattā tīṇi sucaritāni pūrentī”ti lokaṃ volokento
atk-s0513a4:5453_1: taṃ rājānaṃ suraṃ pātuṃ nisinnaṃ disvā “sacāyaṃ suraṃ pivissati,
atk-s0513a4:5453_4: tathā naṃ karissāmī”ti ekaṃ surāpuṇṇaṃ kumbhaṃ hatthatale ṭhapetvā brāhmaṇavesenāgantvā rañño sammukhaṭṭhāne ākāse ṭhatvā “imaṃ kumbhaṃ kiṇātha,
atk-s0513a4:5453_6: Sabbamittarājā taṃ tathā vadantaṃ ākāse ṭhitaṃ disvā “kuto nu kho brāhmaṇo āgacchatī”ti tena saddhiṃ sallapanto tisso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:5455_0: “Ko pāturāsī tidivā nabhamhi, obhāsayaṃ saṃvariṃ candimāva;
atk-s0513a4:5456_0: Gattehi te rasmiyo niccharanti, sateratā vijjurivantalikkhe.
atk-s0513a4:5458_0: “So chinnavātaṃ kamasī aghamhi, vehāyasaṃ gacchasi tiṭṭhasī ca;
atk-s0513a4:5459_0: Iddhī nu te vatthukatā subhāvitā, anaddhagūnaṃ api devatānaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5462_0: Ko vā tuvaṃ kissa vā tāya kumbho, akkhāhi me brāhmaṇa etamattha”nti.
atk-s0513a4:5463_2: Tidivā nabhamhīti kiṃ tāvatiṃsabhavanā āgantvā idha nabhamhi ākāse pākaṭo jātosīti pucchati.
atk-s0513a4:5463_11: Vatthukatāti vatthu viya patiṭṭhā viya katā.
atk-s0513a4:5463_12: Anaddhagūnaṃ api devatānanti yā padasā addhānaṃ agamanena anaddhagūnaṃ devatānaṃ iddhi,
atk-s0513a4:5463_14: Vehāyasaṃ gammamāgammāti ākāse pavattaṃ padavītihāraṃ paṭicca nissāya.
atk-s0513a4:5463_16: evaṃ tiṭṭhamāno ko vā tvanti attho.
atk-s0513a4:5463_20: kissa vā te ayaṃ kumbhoti attho.
atk-s0513a4:5464_0: Tato sakko “tena hi suṇāhī”ti vatvā surāya dose dassento āha –
atk-s0513a4:5466_0: “Na sappikumbho napi telakumbho, na phāṇitassa na madhussa kumbho;
atk-s0513a4:5467_0: Kumbhassa vajjāni anappakāni, dose bahū kumbhagate suṇātha.
atk-s0513a4:5469_0: “Gaḷeyya yaṃ pitvā pate papātaṃ, sobbhaṃ guhaṃ candaniyoḷigallaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:5470_0: Bahumpi bhuñjeyya abhojaneyyaṃ, tassā puṇṇaṃ kumbhamimaṃ kiṇātha.
atk-s0513a4:5472_0: “Yaṃ pitvā cittasmiṃ anesamāno, āhiṇḍatī goriva bhakkhasādī;
atk-s0513a4:5473_0: Anāthamāno upagāyati naccati ca, tassā puṇṇaṃ kumbhamimaṃ kiṇātha.
atk-s0513a4:5475_0: “Yaṃ ve pivitvā acelova naggo, careyya gāme visikhantarāni;
atk-s0513a4:5476_0: Sammūḷhacitto ativelasāyī, tassā puṇṇaṃ kumbhamimaṃ kiṇātha.
atk-s0513a4:5478_0: “Yaṃ pitvā uṭṭhāya pavedhamāno, sīsañca bāhuñca pacālayanto;
atk-s0513a4:5479_0: So naccatī dārukaṭallakova, tassā puṇṇaṃ kumbhamimaṃ kiṇātha.
atk-s0513a4:5481_0: “Yaṃ ve pivitvā aggidaḍḍhā sayanti, atho sigālehipi khāditāse;
atk-s0513a4:5482_0: Bandhaṃ vadhaṃ bhogajāniñcupenti, tassā puṇṇaṃ kumbhamimaṃ kiṇātha.
atk-s0513a4:5485_0: Sammakkhito vantagato byasanno, tassā puṇṇaṃ kumbhamimaṃ kiṇātha.
atk-s0513a4:5487_0: “Yaṃ ve pivitvā ukkaṭṭho āvilakkho, mameva sabbapathavīti maññe;
atk-s0513a4:5488_0: Na me samo cāturantopi rājā, tassā puṇṇaṃ kumbhamimaṃ kiṇātha.
atk-s0513a4:5491_0: Corāna dhuttāna gatī niketo, tassā puṇṇaṃ kumbhamimaṃ kiṇātha.
atk-s0513a4:5496_0: “Dhaññaṃ dhanaṃ rajataṃ jātarūpaṃ, khettaṃ gavaṃ yattha vināsayanti;
atk-s0513a4:5497_0: Ucchedanī vittagataṃ kulānaṃ, tassā puṇṇaṃ kumbhamimaṃ kiṇātha.
atk-s0513a4:5499_0: “Yaṃ ve pitvā dittarūpova poso, akkosati mātaraṃ pitarañca;
atk-s0513a4:5500_0: Sassumpi gaṇheyya athopi suṇhaṃ, tassā puṇṇaṃ kumbhamimaṃ kiṇātha.
atk-s0513a4:5502_0: “Yaṃ ve pitvā dittarūpāva nārī, akkosatī sassuraṃ sāmikañca;
atk-s0513a4:5503_0: Dāsampi gaṇhe paricārikampi, tassā puṇṇaṃ kumbhamimaṃ kiṇātha.
atk-s0513a4:5505_0: “Yaṃ ve pivitvāna haneyya poso, dhamme ṭhitaṃ samaṇaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vā;
atk-s0513a4:5506_0: Gacche apāyampi tatonidānaṃ, tassā puṇṇaṃ kumbhamimaṃ kiṇātha.
atk-s0513a4:5508_0: “Yaṃ ve pivitvā duccaritaṃ caranti, kāyena vācāya ca cetasā ca;
