atk-s0513a4:5509_0: Nirayaṃ vajanti duccaritaṃ caritvā, tassā puṇṇaṃ kumbhamimaṃ kiṇātha.
atk-s0513a4:5511_0: “Yaṃ yācamānā na labhanti pubbe, bahuṃ hiraññampi pariccajantā;
atk-s0513a4:5512_0: So taṃ pivitvā alikaṃ bhaṇāti, tassā puṇṇaṃ kumbhamimaṃ kiṇātha.
atk-s0513a4:5514_0: “Yaṃ ve pitvā pesane pesiyanto, accāyike karaṇīyamhi jāte;
atk-s0513a4:5515_0: Atthampi so nappajānāti vutto, tassā puṇṇaṃ kumbhamimaṃ kiṇātha.
atk-s0513a4:5518_0: Dhīrāpi santā bahukaṃ bhaṇanti, tassā puṇṇaṃ kumbhamimaṃ kiṇātha.
atk-s0513a4:5520_0: “Yaṃ ve pitvā ekathūpā sayanti, anāsakā thaṇḍiladukkhaseyyaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:5521_0: Dubbaṇṇiyaṃ āyasakyañcupenti, tassā puṇṇaṃ kumbhamimaṃ kiṇātha.
atk-s0513a4:5523_0: “Yaṃ ve pitvā pattakhandhā sayanti, gāvo kūṭahatāva na hi vāruṇiyā;
atk-s0513a4:5524_0: Vego narena susahoriva, tassā puṇṇaṃ kumbhamimaṃ kiṇātha.
atk-s0513a4:5527_0: Taṃ loke visasamānaṃ, ko naro pātumarahati.
atk-s0513a4:5530_0: Upakkamuṃ musalebhi aññamaññaṃ, tassā puṇṇaṃ kumbhamimaṃ kiṇātha.
atk-s0513a4:5532_0: “Yaṃ ve pitvā pubbadevā pamattā, tidivā cutā sassatiyā samāyā;
atk-s0513a4:5533_0: Taṃ tādisaṃ majjamimaṃ niratthakaṃ, jānaṃ mahārāja kathaṃ piveyya.
atk-s0513a4:5535_0: “Nayimasmiṃ kumbhasmiṃ dadhi vā madhu vā, evaṃ abhiññāya kiṇāhi rāja;
atk-s0513a4:5536_0: Evañhimaṃ kumbhagatā mayā te, akkhātarūpaṃ tava sabbamittā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5537_2: Yaṃ pitvā pateti yaṃ pivitvā pateyya.
atk-s0513a4:5537_9: yathā so tattha tattha bhakkhasaṃ pariyesanto āhiṇḍati,
atk-s0513a4:5537_12: Upagāyatīti aññaṃ gāyantaṃ disvā upagantvā gāyati.
atk-s0513a4:5538_2: pāṇātipātādīni katvā daṇḍapīḷitā dhanajāniñca aññañca vadhabandhanādidukkhaṃ pāpuṇantīti attho.
atk-s0513a4:5538_8: ko mayā sadiso atthīti evaṃ ukkaṃsagato hutvā.
atk-s0513a4:5538_22: Yattha vināsayantīti yaṃ nissāya yattha patiṭṭhitā,
atk-s0513a4:5539_2: Dāsampi gaṇheti attano dāsampi kilesavasena “sāmiko me”ti gaṇheyya.
atk-s0513a4:5539_4: Duccaritaṃ caritvāti evaṃ tīhi dvārehi dasavidhampi akusalaṃ katvā.
atk-s0513a4:5539_5: Yaṃ yācamānāti yaṃ purisaṃ pubbe suraṃ apivantaṃ bahuṃ hiraññaṃ pariccajantā musāvādaṃ karohīti yācamānā na labhanti.
atk-s0513a4:5539_7: Nappajānāti vuttoti “kenaṭṭhena āgatosī”ti vutto sāsanassa duggahitattā taṃ atthaṃ na jānāti.
atk-s0513a4:5539_9: Ekathūpāti sūkarapotakā viya hīnajaccehipi saddhiṃ ekarāsī hutvā.
atk-s0513a4:5540_1: Kūṭahatāvāti gīvāya baddhena kūṭena hatā gāvo viya,
atk-s0513a4:5540_2: yathā tā tiṇaṃ akhādantiyo pānīyaṃ apivantiyo sayanti,
atk-s0513a4:5540_13: Jānanti evaṃ “niratthakaṃ eta”nti jānanto tumhādiso paṇḍito puriso kathaṃ piveyya.
atk-s0513a4:5541_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā surāya ādīnavaṃ ñatvā tuṭṭho sakkassa thutiṃ karonto dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:5543_0: “Na me pitā vā athavāpi mātā, etādisā yādisako tuvaṃsi;
atk-s0513a4:5544_0: Hitānukampī paramatthakāmo, sohaṃ karissaṃ vacanaṃ tavajja.
atk-s0513a4:5546_0: “Dadāmi te gāmavarāni pañca, dāsīsataṃ satta gavaṃsatāni;
atk-s0513a4:5547_0: Ājaññayutte ca rathe dasa ime, ācariyo hosi mamatthakāmo”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5548_2: saṃvacchare saṃvacchare satasahassuṭṭhānake tuyhaṃ pañca gāme dadāmīti vadati.
atk-s0513a4:5548_3: Dasa imeti ime dasa purato ṭhite kañcanavicitte rathe dassento evamāha.
atk-s0513a4:5549_0: Taṃ sutvā sakko devattabhāvaṃ dassetvā attānaṃ jānāpento ākāse ṭhatvā dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:5551_0: “Taveva dāsīsatamatthu rāja, gāmā ca gāvo ca taveva hontu;
atk-s0513a4:5552_0: Ājaññayuttā ca rathā taveva, sakkohamasmī tidasānamindo.
atk-s0513a4:5554_0: “Maṃsodanaṃ sappipāyāsaṃ bhuñja, khādassu ca tvaṃ madhumāsapūve;
atk-s0513a4:5555_0: Evaṃ tuvaṃ dhammarato janinda, anindito saggamupehi ṭhāna”nti.
atk-s0513a4:5556_0: Tattha evaṃ tuvaṃ dhammaratoti evaṃ tvaṃ nānaggarasabhojanaṃ bhuñjanto surāpānā virato tīṇi duccaritāni
atk-s0513a4:5556_1: pahāya tividhasucaritadhammarato hutvā kenaci anindito saggaṭṭhānaṃ upehīti.
atk-s0513a4:5557_0: Iti sakko tassa ovādaṃ datvā sakaṭṭhānameva gato.
atk-s0513a4:5557_1: Sopi suraṃ apivitvā surābhājanāni bhindāpetvā sīlaṃ samādāya dānaṃ datvā saggaparāyaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:5558_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a4:5562_0: Cirassaṃ vata meti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ mātuposakabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:5562_2: Tadā pana satthā “porāṇakapaṇḍitā kañcanamālaṃ setacchattaṃ pahāya mātāpitaro posesu”nti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:5563_0: Atīte kapilaraṭṭhe uttarapañcālanagare pañcālo nāma rājā ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:5563_1: Tassa aggamahesī gabbhaṃ paṭilabhitvā puttaṃ vijāyi.
atk-s0513a4:5563_2: Tassā purimabhave ekā sapattikā kujjhitvā “tuyhaṃ jātaṃ jātaṃ pajaṃ khādituṃ samatthā bhavissāmī”ti patthanaṃ ṭhapetvā yakkhinī ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:5563_3: Sā tadā okāsaṃ labhitvā tassā passantiyāva taṃ allamaṃsapesivaṇṇaṃ kumārakaṃ gahetvā murumurāyantī khāditvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a4:5563_5: Tatiyavāre pana tassā pasūtigharaṃ paviṭṭhakāle gehaṃ parivāretvā gāḷhaṃ ārakkhaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:5563_6: Vijātadivase yakkhinī āgantvā puna dārakaṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0513a4:5563_8: Āvudhahatthā purisā āgantvā deviyā dinnasaññāya yakkhiniṃ anubandhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:5563_9: Sā khādituṃ okāsaṃ alabhantī tato palāyitvā udakaniddhamanaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a4:5563_10: Dārako mātusaññāya tassā thanaṃ mukhena gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a4:5563_11: Sā puttasinehaṃ uppādetvā tato palāyitvā susānaṃ gantvā dārakaṃ pāsāṇaleṇe ṭhapetvā paṭijaggi.
atk-s0513a4:5563_12: Athassa anukkamena vaḍḍhamānassa manussamaṃsaṃ āharitvā adāsi.
atk-s0513a4:5563_14: Dārako attano manussabhāvaṃ na jānāti “yakkhiniputtosmī”ti saññāya.
atk-s0513a4:5563_15: So attabhāvaṃ jahitvā antaradhāyituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0513a4:5563_16: Athassa sā antaradhānatthāya ekaṃ mūlaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a4:5563_17: So mūlānubhāvena antaradhāyitvā manussamaṃsaṃ khādanto vicarati.
atk-s0513a4:5563_18: Yakkhinī vessavaṇassa mahārājassa veyyāvaccatthāya gatā tattheva kālamakāsi.
atk-s0513a4:5563_21: Paccāmittaṃ yakkhiniṃ jinitvā jātattā “jayaddisakumāro”tissa nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:5563_22: So vayappatto sabbasippesu nipphattiṃ patvā chattaṃ ussāpetvā rajjamanusāsi.
atk-s0513a4:5564_0: Tadā bodhisatto tassa aggamahesiyā kucchimhi nibbatti,
atk-s0513a4:5564_3: Sopi yakkhiniputto aparabhāge pamādena taṃ mūlaṃ nāsetvā antaradhāyituṃ asakkonto dissamānarūpova susāne manussamaṃsaṃ khādi.
atk-s0513a4:5564_4: Manussā taṃ disvā bhītā āgantvā rañño upakkosiṃsu “deva eko yakkho dissamānarūpo susāne manussamaṃsaṃ khādati,
atk-s0513a4:5564_5: so anukkamena nagaraṃ pavisitvā manusse māretvā khādissati,
atk-s0513a4:5564_9: Yakkhiniputto naggo ubbiggarūpo maraṇabhayabhīto viravanto manussānaṃ antaraṃ pakkhandi.
atk-s0513a4:5564_13: So ekaṃ mahāvattaniaṭaviṃ nissāya maggapaṭipannesu manussesu ekekaṃ gahetvā araññaṃ pavisitvā māretvā khādanto ekasmiṃ nigrodhamūle vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0513a4:5565_0: Atheko satthavāhabrāhmaṇo aṭavipālānaṃ sahassaṃ datvā pañcahi sakaṭasatehi taṃ maggaṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0513a4:5565_3: So brāhmaṇaṃ gahetvā palāyanto khāṇunā pāde viddho aṭavipālesu anubandhantesu brāhmaṇaṃ chaḍḍetvā attano vasanaṭṭhānarukkhamūle nipajji.
atk-s0513a4:5565_4: Tassa tattha nipannassa sattame divase jayaddisarājā migavadhaṃ āṇāpetvā nagarā nikkhami.
atk-s0513a4:5565_5: Taṃ nagarā nikkhantamattameva takkasilavāsī nando nāma mātuposakabrāhmaṇo catasso satārahagāthāyo ādāya āgantvā rājānaṃ addasa.
atk-s0513a4:5565_6: Rājā “nivattitvā suṇissāmī”ti tassa nivāsagehaṃ dāpetvā migavaṃ gantvā “yassa passena migo palāyati,
atk-s0513a4:5565_8: Atheko pasadamigo uṭṭhahitvā rañño abhimukho gantvā palāyi.
atk-s0513a4:5565_10: Rājā khaggaṃ gahetvā taṃ anubandhitvā tiyojanamatthake patvā khaggena paharitvā dve khaṇḍāni karitvā
atk-s0513a4:5565_11: kājenādāya āgacchanto manussayakkhassa nipannaṭṭhānaṃ patvā dabbatiṇesu nisīditvā thokaṃ vissamitvā gantuṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0513a4:5565_12: Atha naṃ so uṭṭhāya “tiṭṭha kuhiṃ gacchasi,
atk-s0513a4:5565_13: bhakkhosi me”ti hatthe gahetvā paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:5567_0: “Cirassaṃ vata me udapādi ajja, bhakkho mahā sattamibhattakāle;
atk-s0513a4:5568_0: Kutosi kovāsi tadiṅgha brūhi, ācikkha jātiṃ vidito yathāsī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5569_1: Sattamibhattakāleti pāṭipadato paṭṭhāya nirāhārassa sattamiyaṃ bhattakāle.
atk-s0513a4:5570_0: Rājā yakkhaṃ disvā bhīto ūrutthambhaṃ patvā palāyituṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0513a4:5572_0: “Pañcālarājā migavaṃ paviṭṭho, jayaddiso nāma yadissuto te;
atk-s0513a4:5573_0: Carāmi kacchāni vanāni cāhaṃ, pasadaṃ imaṃ khāda mamajja muñcā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5574_0: Tattha migavaṃ paviṭṭhoti migavadhāya raṭṭhā nikkhanto.
atk-s0513a4:5577_0: “Seneva tvaṃ paṇasi sassamāno, mamesa bhakkho pasado yaṃ vadesi;
atk-s0513a4:5578_0: Taṃ khādiyāna pasadaṃ jighaññaṃ, khādissaṃ pacchā na vilāpakālo”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5580_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā nandabrāhmaṇaṃ saritvā catutthaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:5582_0: “Na catthi mokkho mama nikkayena, gantvāna pacchāgamanāya paṇhe;
atk-s0513a4:5584_0: Tattha na catthīti na ce mayhaṃ nikkayena vimokkho atthi.
atk-s0513a4:5584_1: Gantvānāti evaṃ sante ajja imaṃ migamaṃsaṃ khāditvā mama nagaraṃ gantvā.
atk-s0513a4:5584_3: sveva pātarāsakāle paccāgamanatthāya paṭiññaṃ gaṇhāhīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0513a4:5584_4: Taṃ saṅgaranti mayā “dhanaṃ te dassāmī”ti brāhmaṇassa saṅgaro kato,
atk-s0513a4:5584_5: taṃ tassa datvā imaṃ mayā vuttaṃ saccaṃ anurakkhanto ahaṃ puna āgamissāmīti attho.
atk-s0513a4:5587_0: “Kiṃ kammajātaṃ anutappate tvaṃ, pattaṃ samīpaṃ maraṇassa rāja;
atk-s0513a4:5588_0: Ācikkha me taṃ api sakkuṇemu, anujānituṃ āgamanāya paṇhe”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5589_3: Api sakkuṇemūti api nāma taṃ tava sokakāraṇaṃ sutvā pātova āgamanāya taṃ anujānituṃ sakkuṇeyyāmāti attho.
atk-s0513a4:5590_0: Rājā taṃ kāraṇaṃ kathento chaṭṭhaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:5592_0: “Katā mayā brāhmaṇassa dhanāsā, taṃ saṅgaraṃ paṭimukkaṃ na muttaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:5594_0: Tattha paṭimukkaṃ na muttanti catasso satārahā gāthā sutvā “dhanaṃ te dassāmī”ti paṭiññāya mayā attani paṭimuñcitvā ṭhapitaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:5594_1: na pana taṃ muttaṃ dhanassa adinnattā.
atk-s0513a4:5597_0: “Yā te katā brāhmaṇassa dhanāsā, taṃ saṅgaraṃ paṭimukkaṃ na muttaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:5600_2: ahaṃ pātova āgamissāmī”ti vatvā magganimittāni sallakkhento attano balakāyaṃ upagantvā balakāyaparivuto
atk-s0513a4:5600_3: nagaraṃ pavisitvā nandabrāhmaṇaṃ pakkosāpetvā mahārahe āsane nisīdāpetvā tā gāthā sutvā cattāri sahassāni
atk-s0513a4:5600_4: datvā yānaṃ āropetvā “imaṃ takkasilameva nethā”ti manusse datvā brāhmaṇaṃ uyyojetvā dutiyadivase paṭigantukāmo
atk-s0513a4:5600_6: Tamatthaṃ dīpento satthā dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:5602_0: “Muttoca so porisādassa hatthā, gantvā sakaṃ mandiraṃ kāmakāmī;
atk-s0513a4:5605_0: “Ajjeva rajjaṃ abhisiñcayassu, dhammaṃ cara sesu paresu cāpi;
atk-s0513a4:5606_0: Adhammakāro ca te māhu raṭṭhe, gacchāmahaṃ porisādassa ñatte”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5607_2: Ajjeva rajjanti putta rajjaṃ te dammi,
atk-s0513a4:5610_0: “Kiṃ kamma krubbaṃ tava deva pāva, nārādhayī taṃ tadicchāmi sotuṃ;
atk-s0513a4:5611_0: Yamajja rajjamhi udassaye tuvaṃ, rajjampi niccheyyaṃ, tayā vināha”nti.
atk-s0513a4:5612_1: Yamajjāti yena anārādhakammena ajja maṃ rajjamhi tvaṃ udassaye ussāpesi patiṭṭhāpesi,
atk-s0513a4:5612_3: ahañhi tayā vinā rajjampi na icchāmīti attho.
atk-s0513a4:5615_0: “Na kammunā vā vacasāva tāta, aparādhitohaṃ tuviyaṃ sarāmi;
atk-s0513a4:5616_0: Sandhiñca katvā purisādakena, saccānurakkhī punāhaṃ gamissa”nti.
atk-s0513a4:5617_3: ahaṃ ito tava kammato vā tava vacanato vā kiñci mama appiyaṃ aparādhaṃ na sarāmīti.
atk-s0513a4:5617_4: Sandhiñca katvāti maṃ pana migavaṃ gataṃ eko yakkho “khādissāmī”ti gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a4:5617_5: Athāhaṃ brāhmaṇassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā tassa sakkāraṃ katvā “sve tava pātarāsakāle āgamissāmī”ti tena purisādakena sandhiṃ saccaṃ katvā āgato,
atk-s0513a4:5617_6: tasmā taṃ saccaṃ anurakkhanto puna tattha gamissāmi,
atk-s0513a4:5620_0: “Ahaṃ gamissāmi idheva hohi, natthi tato jīvato vippamokkho;
atk-s0513a4:5621_0: Sace tuvaṃ gacchasiyeva rāja, ahampi gacchāmi ubho na homā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5622_1: Tatoti tassa santikā jīvantassa mokkho nāma natthi.
atk-s0513a4:5622_2: Ubhoti evaṃ sante ubhopi na bhavissāma.
atk-s0513a4:5625_0: “Addhā hi tāta satānesa dhammo, maraṇā ca me dukkhataraṃ tadassa;
atk-s0513a4:5626_0: Kammāsapādo taṃ yadā pacitvā, pasayha khāde bhidā rukkhasūle”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5627_4: api ca kho pana mayhaṃ maraṇatopetaṃ dukkhataraṃ assa,
atk-s0513a4:5627_6: Bhidā rukkhasūleti tikhiṇarukkhasūle bhitvā pacitvā pasayha balakkārena khādeyyāti.
atk-s0513a4:5630_0: “Pāṇena te pāṇamahaṃ nimissaṃ, mā tvaṃ agā porisādassa ñatte;
atk-s0513a4:5631_0: Evañca te pāṇamahaṃ nimissaṃ, tasmā mataṃ jīvitassa vaṇṇemī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5632_0: Tattha nimissanti ahaṃ idheva tava pāṇena mama pāṇaṃ parivattessaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5632_1: Tasmāti yasmā etaṃ pāṇaṃ tava pāṇenāhaṃ nimissaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:5632_2: tasmā tava jīvitassatthāya mama maraṇaṃ vaṇṇemi maraṇameva varemi,
atk-s0513a4:5633_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā puttassa balaṃ jānanto “sādhu tāta,
atk-s0513a4:5635_0: “Tato have dhitimā rājaputto, vanditvā mātu ca pitu ca pāde”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5636_0: Tattha pādeti pāde vanditvā nikkhantoti attho;
atk-s0513a4:5637_0: Athassa mātāpitaropi bhaginīpi bhariyāpi amaccaparijanehi saddhiṃyeva nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:5637_1: So nagarā nikkhamitvā pitaraṃ maggaṃ pucchitvā suṭṭhu vavatthapetvā mātāpitaro vanditvā sesānaṃ ovādaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5637_2: datvā acchambhito kesarasīho viya maggaṃ āruyha yakkhāvāsaṃ pāyāsi.
atk-s0513a4:5637_3: Taṃ gacchantaṃ disvā mātā sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ asakkontī pathaviyaṃ pati.
atk-s0513a4:5637_4: Pitā bāhā paggayha mahantena saddena kandi.
atk-s0513a4:5638_0: “Dukhinissa mātā nipatā pathabyā, pitāssa paggayha bhujāni kandatī”ti. –
atk-s0513a4:5639_0: Upaḍḍhagāthaṃ vatvā tassa pitarā payuttaṃ āsīsavādaṃ abhivādanavādaṃ mātarā bhaginībhariyāhi ca kataṃ
atk-s0513a4:5639_1: saccakiriyaṃ pakāsento aparāpi catasso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:5641_0: “Taṃ gacchantaṃ tāva pitā viditvā, parammukho vandati pañjalīko;
atk-s0513a4:5642_0: Somo ca rājā varuṇo ca rājā, pajāpatī candimā sūriyo ca;
atk-s0513a4:5643_0: Etehi gutto purisādakamhā, anuññāto sotthi paccehi tāta.
atk-s0513a4:5645_0: “Yaṃ daṇḍakirañño gatassa mātā, rāmassakāsi sotthānaṃ suguttā;
atk-s0513a4:5646_0: Taṃ te ahaṃ sotthānaṃ karomi, etena saccena sarantu devā;
atk-s0513a4:5649_0: “Āvī raho vāpi manopadosaṃ, nāhaṃ sare jātu malīnasatte;
atk-s0513a4:5650_0: Etena saccena sarantu devā, anuññāto sotthi paccehi bhātika.
atk-s0513a4:5652_0: “Yasmā ca me anadhimanosi sāmi, na cāpi me manasā appiyosi;
atk-s0513a4:5653_0: Etena saccena sarantu devā, anuññāto sotthi paccehi sāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5654_0: Tattha parammukhoti ayaṃ me putto parammukho mātāpitaro vanditvā gacchati,
atk-s0513a4:5654_1: iti etaṃ parammukhaṃ gacchantaṃ disvā viditvā.
atk-s0513a4:5654_2: Pañjalīkoti tasmiṃ kāle sirasi añjaliṃ ṭhapetvā vandati devatā namassati.
atk-s0513a4:5654_3: Purisādakamhāti purisādassa santikā tena anuññāto sotthinā paccehi.
atk-s0513a4:5655_1: Eko kira bārāṇasivāsī rāmo nāma mātuposako mātāpitaro paṭijagganto vohāratthāya gato daṇḍakirañño vijite
atk-s0513a4:5655_2: kumbhavatīnagaraṃ gantvā navavidhena vassena sakalaraṭṭhe vināsiyamāne mātāpitūnaṃ guṇaṃ sari.
atk-s0513a4:5655_3: Atha naṃ mātupaṭṭhānakammassa phalena devatā sotthinā ānayitvā mātu adaṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:5655_7: mātupaṭṭhānaṃ nissāya nibbattattā pana mātā akāsīti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5655_8: Taṃ te ahanti ahampi te tameva sotthānaṃ karomi,
atk-s0513a4:5655_9: maṃ nissāya tatheva tava sotthibhāvo hotūti attho.
atk-s0513a4:5655_11: Etena saccenāti sace devatāhi tassa sotthinā ānītabhāvo sacco,
atk-s0513a4:5655_12: etena saccena mamapi puttaṃ sarantu devā,
atk-s0513a4:5655_13: rāmaṃ viya tampi āharitvā mama dassantūti attho.
atk-s0513a4:5655_14: Anuññātoti porisādena “gacchā”ti anuññāto devatānaṃ ānubhāvena sotthi paṭiāgaccha puttāti vadati.
atk-s0513a4:5656_0: Jātu malīnasatteti jātu ekaṃsena alīnasatte mama bhātike ahaṃ sammukhā vā parammukhā vā manopadosaṃ na sarāmi,
atk-s0513a4:5656_1: na mayā tamhi manopadoso katapubboti evamassa kaniṭṭhā saccamakāsi.
atk-s0513a4:5656_5: maṃ abhibhavitvā atikkamitvā aññaṃ manena na patthesi.
atk-s0513a4:5656_6: Na cāpi me manasā appiyosīti mayhampi ca manasā tvaṃ appiyo na hosi,
atk-s0513a4:5656_7: aññamaññaṃ piyasaṃvāsāva mayanti evamassa aggamahesī saccamakāsi.
atk-s0513a4:5657_3: kiṃ bhavissatī”ti rukkhaṃ abhiruhitvā rañño āgamanaṃ olokento nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:5657_4: So kumāraṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā “pitaraṃ nivattetvā putto āgato bhavissati,
atk-s0513a4:5657_5: natthi me bhaya”nti otaritvā tassa piṭṭhiṃ dassento nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:5659_0: “Brahā ujū cārumukho kutosi, na maṃ pajānāsi vane vasantaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:5661_0: Tattha ko sotthimājānamidhāvajeyyāti kumāra ko nāma puriso attano sotthibhāvaṃ jānanto icchanto idhāgaccheyya,
atk-s0513a4:5664_0: “Jānāmi ludda purisādako tvaṃ, na taṃ na jānāmi vane vasantaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:5665_0: Ahañca puttosmi jayaddisassa, mamajja khāda pituno pamokkhā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5666_0: Tattha pamokkhāti pamokkhahetu ahaṃ pitu jīvitaṃ datvā idhāgato,
atk-s0513a4:5669_0: “Jānāmi puttoti jayaddisassa, tathā hi vo mukhavaṇṇo ubhinnaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:5670_0: Sudukkaraññeva kataṃ tavedaṃ, yo mattumicche pituno pamokkhā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5671_0: Tattha tathā hi voti tādiso vo tumhākaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5671_2: Kataṃ tavedanti idaṃ tava kammaṃ sudukkaraṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5674_0: “Na dukkaraṃ kiñci mahettha maññe, yo mattumicche pituno pamokkhā;
atk-s0513a4:5675_0: Mātu ca hetu paraloka gantvā, sukhena saggena ca sampayutto”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5676_0: Tattha kiñci mahettha maññeti kiñci ahaṃ ettha na maññāmi.
atk-s0513a4:5676_2: yakkha yo puggalo pitu vā pamokkhatthāya mātu vā hetu paralokaṃ gantvā sukhena sagge nibbattanakasukhena
atk-s0513a4:5676_4: tasmā ahaṃ ettha mātāpitūnaṃ atthāya jīvitapariccāge kiñci dukkaraṃ na maññāmīti.
atk-s0513a4:5677_3: So tassa kathento dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:5679_0: “Ahañca kho attano pāpakiriyaṃ, āvī raho vāpi sare na jātu;
atk-s0513a4:5680_0: Saṅkhātajātīmaraṇohamasmi, yatheva me idha tathā parattha.
atk-s0513a4:5682_0: “Khādajja maṃ dāni mahānubhāva, karassu kiccāni imaṃ sarīraṃ;
atk-s0513a4:5683_0: Rukkhassa vā te papatāmi aggā, chādayamāno mayhaṃ tvamadesi maṃsa”nti.
atk-s0513a4:5684_0: Tattha sare na jātūti ekaṃseneva na sarāmi.
atk-s0513a4:5684_3: Yatheva me idhāti yatheva mama idha,
atk-s0513a4:5684_6: tathā idhāpi maraṇato mutti nāma natthīti idampi mama ñāṇena suparicchinnaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5684_7: Karassu kiccānīti iminā sarīrena kattabbakiccāni kara,
atk-s0513a4:5684_9: Chādayamāno mayhaṃ tvamadesi maṃsanti mayi rukkhaggā patitvā mate mama sarīrato tvaṃ chādayamāno rocayamāno yaṃ yaṃ icchasi,
atk-s0513a4:5685_0: Yakkho tassa vacanaṃ sutvā bhīto hutvā “na sakkā imassa maṃsaṃ khādituṃ,
atk-s0513a4:5685_1: upāyena naṃ palāpessāmī”ti cintetvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:5687_0: “Idañca te ruccati rājaputta, cajesi pāṇaṃ pituno pamokkhā;
atk-s0513a4:5688_0: Tasmā hi so tvaṃ taramānarūpo, sambhañja kaṭṭhāni jalehi aggi”nti.
atk-s0513a4:5689_0: Tattha jalehīti araññaṃ pavisitvā sāradārūni āharitvā aggiṃ jāletvā niddhūme aṅgāre kara,
atk-s0513a4:5689_1: tattha te maṃsaṃ pacitvā khādissāmīti dīpeti.
atk-s0513a4:5690_0: So tathā katvā tassa santikaṃ agamāsi. Taṃ kāraṇaṃ pakāsento satthā itaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:5692_0: “Tato have dhitimā rājaputto, dāruṃ samāharitvā mahantamaggiṃ;
atk-s0513a4:5694_0: Yakkho aggiṃ katvā āgataṃ kumāraṃ oloketvā “ayaṃ purisasīho,
atk-s0513a4:5694_2: mayā ettakaṃ kālaṃ evaṃ nibbhayo nāma na diṭṭhapubbo”ti lomahaṃsajāto kumāraṃ punappunaṃ olokento nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:5696_0: “Khādajja maṃ dāni pasayhakāri, kiṃ maṃ muhuṃ pekkhasi haṭṭhalomo;
atk-s0513a4:5697_0: Tathā tathā tuyhamahaṃ karomi, yathā yathā maṃ chādayamāno adesī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5698_1: Tathā tathā tuyhamahanti ahaṃ tuyhaṃ tathā tathā vacanaṃ karomi,
atk-s0513a4:5698_3: yathā yathā maṃ chādayamāno rocayamāno adesi khādissasi,
atk-s0513a4:5701_0: “Ko tādisaṃ arahati khāditāye, dhamme ṭhitaṃ saccavādiṃ vadaññuṃ;
atk-s0513a4:5702_0: Muddhāpi tassa viphaleyya sattadhā, yo tādisaṃ saccavādiṃ adeyyā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5703_0: Taṃ sutvā kumāro “sace maṃ na khāditukāmosi,
atk-s0513a4:5703_1: atha kasmā dārūni bhañjāpetvā aggiṃ kāresī”ti vatvā “palāyissati nu kho,
atk-s0513a4:5703_2: noti tava pariggaṇhanatthāyā”ti vutte “tvaṃ idāni maṃ kathaṃ pariggaṇhissasi,
atk-s0513a4:5703_3: yohaṃ tiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbatto sakkassa devarañño attānaṃ pariggaṇhituṃ nādāsi”nti vatvā āha –
atk-s0513a4:5705_0: “Idañhi so brāhmaṇaṃ maññamāno, saso avāsesi sake sarīre;
atk-s0513a4:5706_0: Teneva so candimā devaputto, sasatthuto kāmaduhajja yakkhā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5707_1: idañhi so sasapaṇḍito “brāhmaṇo eso”ti brāhmaṇaṃ maññamāno “ajja imaṃ sarīraṃ khāditvā idheva vasā”ti evaṃ sake sarīre attano sarīraṃ dātuṃ avāsesi,
atk-s0513a4:5707_4: Sakko pabbatarasaṃ pīḷetvā ādāya candamaṇḍale sasalakkhaṇaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a4:5707_5: Tato paṭṭhāya teneva sasalakkhaṇena so candimā devaputto “sasī sasī”ti evaṃ sasatthuto lokassa kāmaduho pemavaḍḍhano ajja yakkha virocati.
atk-s0513a4:5708_0: Taṃ sutvā yakkho kumāraṃ vissajjento gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:5710_0: “Cando yathā rāhumukhā pamutto, virocate pannaraseva bhāṇumā;
atk-s0513a4:5711_0: Evaṃ tuvaṃ porisādā pamutto, viroca kappile mahānubhāva;
atk-s0513a4:5712_0: Āmodayaṃ pitaraṃ mātarañca, sabbo ca te nandatu ñātipakkho”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5713_2: yathā pannarase rāhumukhā mutto cando vā bhāṇumā vā virocati,
atk-s0513a4:5713_3: evaṃ tvampi mama santikā mutto kapilaraṭṭhe viroca mahānubhāvāti.
atk-s0513a4:5714_1: Sopi taṃ nibbisevanaṃ katvā pañca sīlāni datvā “yakkho nu kho esa,
atk-s0513a4:5714_2: no”ti pariggaṇhanto “yakkhānaṃ akkhīni rattāni honti animmisāni ca,
atk-s0513a4:5714_7: Mayhaṃ pitu kira tayo bhātaro yakkhiniyā gahitā.
atk-s0513a4:5714_11: imaṃ netvā mayhaṃ pitu ācikkhitvā rajje patiṭṭhāpessāmī”ti cintetvā “ehi ambho,
atk-s0513a4:5714_14: ehi mayā saddhiṃ gantvā kulasantake rajje chattaṃ ussāpehī”ti vatvā itarena “nāhaṃ manusso”ti vutte “na tvaṃ mayhaṃ saddahasi,
atk-s0513a4:5714_16: yassa saddahasī”ti pucchitvā “atthi asukaṭṭhāne dibbacakkhukatāpaso”ti vutte taṃ ādāya tattha agamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:5714_17: Tāpaso te disvāva “kiṃ karontā pitāputtā araññe carathā”ti vatvā tesaṃ ñātibhāvaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:5714_23: Atha naṃ kumāro vanditvā nagaraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:5716_0: “Tato have dhitimā rājaputto, katañjalī pariyāya porisādaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:5717_0: Anuññāto sotthi sukhī arogo, paccāgamā kapilamalīnasattā”ti. –
atk-s0513a4:5718_0: Gāthaṃ vatvā tassa nagaraṃ gatassa negamādīhi katakiriyaṃ dassento osānagāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:5720_0: “Taṃ negamā jānapadā ca sabbe, hatthārohā rathikā pattikā ca;
atk-s0513a4:5721_0: Namassamānā pañjalikā upāgamuṃ, namatthu te dukkarakārakosī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5722_0: Rājā “kumāro kira āgato”ti sutvā paccuggamanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a4:5722_6: esa mayhaṃ petteyyo”ti sabbaṃ pavattiṃ ārocetvā “tumhehi mama petteyyaṃ daṭṭhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:5722_7: Rājā taṅkhaṇaññeva bheriṃ carāpetvā mahantena parivārena tāpasānaṃ santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:5722_8: Mahātāpaso tassa yakkhiniyā ānetvā akhāditvā positakāraṇañca yakkhābhāvakāraṇañca tesaṃ ñātibhāvañca sabbaṃ vitthārato kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:5722_15: Rājā tesaṃ assamapadato avidūre ekaṃ pabbatantaraṃ bandhitvā mahantaṃ taḷākaṃ kāretvā kedāre sampādetvā
atk-s0513a4:5722_16: mahaḍḍhakulasahassaṃ ānetvā mahāgāmaṃ nivāsetvā tāpasānaṃ bhikkhācāraṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a4:5722_18: Sutasomamahāsattena porisādassa damitapadeso pana mahākammāsadammanigamoti veditabbo.
atk-s0513a4:5723_0: Satthā idaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a4:5727_0: Kiṃ nu socasīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ daharabhikkhuniṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:5727_1: Sā kira sāvatthiyaṃ kuladhītā gharāvāse ādīnavaṃ disvā sāsane pabbajitvā ekadivasaṃ bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ
atk-s0513a4:5727_2: dhammasavanāya gantvā alaṅkatadhammāsane nisīditvā dhammaṃ desentassa dasabalassa aparimāṇapuññapabhāvābhinibbattaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5727_3: uttamarūpasampattiyuttaṃ attabhāvaṃ oloketvā “pariciṇṇapubbā nu kho me bhavasmiṃ vicarantiyā imassa mahāpurisassa
atk-s0513a4:5727_8: Sā pītivegena mahāhasitaṃ hasitvā puna cintesi –
atk-s0513a4:5727_11: hitajjhāsayā nu kho ahaṃ imassa mahāpurisassa ahosiṃ,
atk-s0513a4:5727_13: Sā anussaramānā “ahaṃ appamattakaṃ dosaṃ hadaye ṭhapetvā vīsaratanasatikaṃ chaddantamahāgajissaraṃ sonuttaraṃ
atk-s0513a4:5727_14: nāma nesādaṃ pesetvā visapītasallena vijjhāpetvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpesi”nti addasa.
atk-s0513a4:5727_17: sokaṃ sandhāretuṃ asakkontī assasitvā passasitvā mahāsaddena parodi.
atk-s0513a4:5727_18: Taṃ disvā satthā sitaṃ pātu karitvā “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu,
atk-s0513a4:5727_19: ko paccayo sitassa pātukammāyā”ti bhikkhusaṅghena puṭṭho “bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a4:5727_20: ayaṃ daharabhikkhunī pubbe mayi kataṃ aparādhaṃ saritvā rodatī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:5728_0: Atīte himavantapadese chaddantadahaṃ upanissāya aṭṭhasahassā hatthināgā vasiṃsu iddhimantā vehāsaṅgamā.
atk-s0513a4:5728_1: Tadā bodhisatto jeṭṭhakavāraṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0513a4:5728_3: So aparabhāge vuddhippatto aṭṭhāsītihatthubbedho ahosi vīsaratanasatāyāmo.
atk-s0513a4:5728_5: Dantā panassa parikkhepato pannarasahatthā ahesuṃ dīghato tiṃsahatthā chabbaṇṇaraṃsīhi samannāgatā.
atk-s0513a4:5728_12: So pana chaddantadaho āyāmato ca vitthārato ca paṇṇāsayojano hoti.
atk-s0513a4:5728_13: Tassa majjhe dvādasayojanappamāṇe ṭhāne sevālo vā paṇakaṃ vā natthi,
atk-s0513a4:5728_17: tadanantaraṃ yojanavitthatameva suddhaṃ nīluppalavanaṃ taṃ parikkhipitvā ṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:5728_18: tato yojanayojanavitthatāneva rattuppalasetuppalarattapadumasetapadumakumudavanāni purimaṃ purimaṃ parikkhipitvā ṭhitāni.
atk-s0513a4:5728_19: Imesaṃ pana sattannaṃ vanānaṃ anantaraṃ sabbesampi tesaṃ kallahārādivanānaṃ vasena omissakavanaṃ yojanavitthatameva tāni parikkhipitvā ṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5728_20: Tadanantaraṃ nāgānaṃ kaṭippamāṇe udake yojanavitthatameva rattasālivanaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:5729_0: Veḷuvanaṃ pana parikkhipitvā satta pabbatā ṭhitā.
atk-s0513a4:5729_1: Tesaṃ bāhirantato paṭṭhāya paṭhamo cūḷakāḷapabbato nāma,
atk-s0513a4:5729_8: So ubbedhato sattayojaniko chaddantadahaṃ parikkhipitvā pattassa mukhavaṭṭi viya ṭhito.
atk-s0513a4:5729_10: tato nikkhantena obhāsena chaddantadaho samuggatabālasūriyo viya hoti.
atk-s0513a4:5729_13: eko cattāri, eko tīṇi, eko dve,
atk-s0513a4:5729_15: evaṃ sattapabbataparikkhittassa pana tassa dahassa pubbuttarakaṇṇe udakavātappaharaṇokāse mahānigrodharukkho atthi.
atk-s0513a4:5729_20: iti so mūlato paṭṭhāya ubbedhena terasayojaniko,
atk-s0513a4:5729_22: aṭṭhahi pārohasahassehi paṭimaṇḍito muṇḍamaṇipabbato viya vilāsamāno tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0513a4:5729_23: Chaddantadahassa pana pacchimadisābhāge suvaṇṇapassapabbate dvādasayojanikā kañcanaguhā tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0513a4:5729_24: Chaddanto nāma nāgarājā vassāratte hemante aṭṭhasahassanāgaparivuto kañcanaguhāyaṃ vasati.
atk-s0513a4:5729_25: Gimhakāle udakavātaṃ sampaṭicchamāno mahānigrodhamūle pārohantare tiṭṭhatī.
atk-s0513a4:5730_0: Athassa ekadivasaṃ “mahāsālavanaṃ pupphita”nti taruṇanāgā āgantvā ārocayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:5730_1: So saparivāro “sālakīḷaṃ kīḷissāmī”ti sālavanaṃ gantvā ekaṃ supupphitaṃ sālarukkhaṃ kumbhena pahari.
atk-s0513a4:5730_3: tassā sarīre sukkhadaṇḍakamissakāni purāṇapaṇṇāni ceva tambakipillikāni ca patiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:5730_6: Cūḷasubhaddā “ayaṃ nāgarājā attano piyabhariyāya upari pupphareṇukiñjakkhapattāni pātesi,
atk-s0513a4:5730_7: mama sarīre sukkhadaṇḍakamissāni purāṇapaṇṇāni ceva tambakipillikāni ca pātesi, hotu,
atk-s0513a4:5731_0: Aparampi divasaṃ nāgarājā saparivāro nhānatthāya chaddantadahaṃ otari.
atk-s0513a4:5731_1: Atha dve taruṇanāgā soṇḍāhi usirakalāpe gahetvā kelāsakūṭaṃ majjantā viya nhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5731_2: Tasmiṃ nhatvā uttiṇṇe dve kareṇuyo nhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5731_4: Tato aṭṭhasahassanāgāsaraṃ otaritvā udakakīḷaṃ kīḷitvā sarato nānāpupphāni āharitvā rajatathūpaṃ alaṅkarontā
atk-s0513a4:5731_5: viya mahāsattaṃ alaṅkaritvā pacchā dve kareṇuyo alaṅkariṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:5731_6: Atheko hatthī sare vicaranto sattuddayaṃ nāma mahāpadumaṃ labhitvā āharitvā mahāsattassa adāsi.
atk-s0513a4:5731_7: So taṃ soṇḍāya gahetvā reṇuṃ kumbhe okiritvā jeṭṭhakāya mahāsubhaddāya adāsi.
atk-s0513a4:5731_8: Taṃ disvā itarā “idampi sattuddayaṃ mahāpadumaṃ attano piyabhariyāya eva adāsi,
atk-s0513a4:5731_9: na mayha”nti punapi tasmiṃ veraṃ bandhi.
atk-s0513a4:5732_0: Athekadivasaṃ bodhisatte madhuraphalāni ceva bhisamuḷālāni ca pokkharamadhunā yojetvā pañcasate paccekabuddhe
atk-s0513a4:5732_1: bhojente cūḷasubhaddā attanā laddhaphalāphalaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ datvā “bhante,
atk-s0513a4:5732_2: ito cavitvā maddarājakule nibbattitvā subhaddā nāma rājakaññā hutvā vayappattā bārāṇasirañño aggamahesibhāvaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5732_3: patvā tassa piyā manāpā taṃ attano ruciṃ kāretuṃ samatthā hutvā tassa ācikkhitvā ekaṃ luddakaṃ pesetvā
atk-s0513a4:5732_4: imaṃ hatthiṃ visapītena sallena vijjhāpetvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpetvā chabbaṇṇaraṃsiṃ vissajjente yamakadante
atk-s0513a4:5732_6: Sā tato paṭṭhāya gocaraṃ aggahetvā sussitvā nacirasseva kālaṃ katvā maddaraṭṭhe rājaaggamahesiyā kucchimhi nibbatti,
atk-s0513a4:5732_10: soḷasannaṃ itthisahassānaṃ jeṭṭhikā hutvā jātissarañāṇañca paṭilabhi.
atk-s0513a4:5732_14: Tato sarīraṃ telena makkhetvā kiliṭṭhavatthaṃ nivāsetvā gilānākāraṃ dassetvā sirigabbhaṃ pavisitvā mañcake nipajji.
atk-s0513a4:5732_15: Rājā “kuhiṃ subhaddā”ti vatvā “gilānā”ti sutvā sirigabbhaṃ pavisitvā mañcake nisīditvā tassā piṭṭhiṃ parimajjanto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:5736_0: Tattha anuccaṅgīti kañcanasannibhasarīre. Mālāva parimadditāti hatthehi parimadditā padumamālā viya.
atk-s0513a4:5740_0: Na so sulabharūpova, yādiso mama dohaḷo”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5741_0: Tattha na soti yādiso mama supinantenupajjhagā supine passantiyā mayā diṭṭho dohaḷo,
atk-s0513a4:5741_3: mayhaṃ pana taṃ alabhantiyā jīvitaṃ natthīti avaca.
atk-s0513a4:5744_0: “Ye keci mānusā kāmā, idha lokamhi nandane;
atk-s0513a4:5745_0: Sabbe te pacurā mayhaṃ, ahaṃ te dammi dohaḷa”nti.
atk-s0513a4:5747_6: tesaṃ majjhe kathessāmī”ti dīpentī anantaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:5749_0: “Luddā deva samāyantu, ye keci vijite tava;
atk-s0513a4:5751_0: Rājā “sādhū”ti sirigabbhā nikkhamitvā “yāvatikā tiyojanasatike kāsikaraṭṭhe luddā,
atk-s0513a4:5751_1: tesaṃ sannipātatthāya bheriṃ carāpethā”ti amacce āṇāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:5751_3: Nacirasseva kāsiraṭṭhavāsino luddā yathābalaṃ paṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā āgantvā āgatabhāvaṃ rañño ārocāpesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5751_5: Rājā tesaṃ āgatabhāvaṃ ñatvā vātapāne ṭhito hatthaṃ pasāretvā tesaṃ āgatabhāvaṃ deviyā kathento āha –
atk-s0513a4:5754_0: Vanaññū ca migaññū ca, mamatthe cattajīvitā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5755_0: Tattha ime teti ye tvaṃ sannipātāpesi, ime te.
atk-s0513a4:5755_3: Vanaññū ca migaññū cāti vanāni ca mige ca jānanti.
atk-s0513a4:5756_0: Taṃ sutvā devī te āmantetvā itaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:5759_0: Chabbisāṇaṃ gajaṃ setaṃ, addasaṃ supine ahaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:5760_0: Tassa dantehi me attho, alābhe natthi jīvita”nti.
atk-s0513a4:5764_0: “Na no pitūnaṃ na pitāmahānaṃ, diṭṭho suto kuñjaro chabbisāṇo;
atk-s0513a4:5765_0: Yamaddasā supine rājaputtī, akkhāhi no yādiso hatthināgo”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5769_0: “Disā catasso vidisā catasso, uddhaṃ adho dasa disā imāyo;
atk-s0513a4:5770_0: Katamaṃ disaṃ tiṭṭhati nāgarājā, yamaddasā supine chabbisāṇa”nti.
atk-s0513a4:5771_0: Tattha disāti disāsu. Katamanti etāsu disāsu katamāya disāyāti.
atk-s0513a4:5772_0: Evaṃ vutte subhaddā sabbe ludde oloketvā tesaṃ antare patthaṭapādaṃ bhattapuṭasadisajaṅghaṃ mahājāṇukaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5772_1: mahāphāsukaṃ bahalamassutambadāṭhikaṃ nibbiddhapiṅgalaṃ dussaṇṭhānaṃ bībhacchaṃ sabbesaṃ matthakamatthakena
atk-s0513a4:5772_2: paññāyamānaṃ mahāsattassa pubbaveriṃ sonuttaraṃ nāma nesādaṃ disvā “esa mama vacanaṃ kātuṃ sakkhissatī”ti
atk-s0513a4:5772_3: rājānaṃ anujānāpetvā taṃ ādāya sattabhūmikapāsādassa uparimatalaṃ āruyha uttarasīhapañjaraṃ vivaritvā
atk-s0513a4:5772_4: uttarahimavantābhimukhaṃ hatthaṃ pasāretvā catasso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:5774_0: “Ito ujuṃ uttariyaṃ disāyaṃ, atikkamma so satta girī brahmante;
atk-s0513a4:5775_0: Suvaṇṇapasso nāma girī uḷāro, supupphito kimpurisānuciṇṇo.
atk-s0513a4:5783_0: “Tiṭṭhanti te tumūlaṃ passasantā, kuppanti vātassapi eritassa;
atk-s0513a4:5784_0: Manussabhūtaṃ pana tattha disvā, bhasmaṃ kareyyuṃ nāssa rajopi tassā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5785_2: Uḷāroti mahā itarehi chahi pabbatehi uccataro.
atk-s0513a4:5785_4: Tatthacchatīti tasmiṃ nigrodhamūle gimhasamaye udakavātaṃ sampaṭicchanto tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0513a4:5785_5: Duppasahoti aññe taṃ upagantvā pasayhakāraṃ kātuṃ samatthā nāma natthīti duppasaho parebhi.
atk-s0513a4:5785_7: Vātajavappahārinoti vātajavena gantvā paccāmitte paharaṇasīlā evarūpā aṭṭhasahassanāgā nāgarājānaṃ rakkhanti.
atk-s0513a4:5785_8: Tumūlanti bhiṃsanakaṃ mahāsaddānubandhaṃ assāsaṃ muñcantā tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0513a4:5785_9: Eritassāti vātapaharitassa yaṃ saddānubandhaṃ eritaṃ calanaṃ kampanaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:5785_12: Nāssāti tassa nāsavātena viddhaṃsetvā bhasmaṃ katassa tassa rajopi na bhaveyyāti.
atk-s0513a4:5788_0: “Bahū hime rājakulamhi santi, piḷandhanā jātarūpassa devi;
atk-s0513a4:5789_0: Muttā maṇī veḷuriyāmayā ca, kiṃ kāhasi dantapiḷandhanena;
atk-s0513a4:5790_0: Māretukāmā kuñjaraṃ chabbisāṇaṃ, udāhu ghātessasi luddaputte”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5791_2: Ghātessasīti udāhu piḷandhanāpadesena luddaputte ghātāpetukāmāsīti pucchati.
atk-s0513a4:5794_0: “Sā issitā dukkhitā casmi ludda, uddhañca sussāmi anussarantī;
atk-s0513a4:5795_0: Karohi me luddaka etamatthaṃ, dassāmi te gāmavarāni pañcā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5796_1: Anussarantīti tena vāraṇena pure mayi kataṃ veraṃ anussaramānā.
atk-s0513a4:5796_2: Dassāmi teti etasmiṃ te atthe nipphādite saṃvacchare satasahassuṭṭhānake pañca gāmavare dadāmīti.
atk-s0513a4:5797_0: Evañca pana vatvā “samma luddaputta ahaṃ ‘etaṃ chaddantahatthiṃ mārāpetvā yamakadante āharāpetuṃ samatthā
atk-s0513a4:5797_1: homī’ti pubbe paccekabuddhānaṃ dānaṃ datvā patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesiṃ,
atk-s0513a4:5797_4: tvaṃ gacchanto mā bhāyī”ti taṃ samassāsetvā pesesi.
atk-s0513a4:5797_6: ayye”ti tassā vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā “tena hi me pākaṭaṃ katvā tassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ kathehī”ti pucchanto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:5799_0: “Katthacchatī kattha mupeti ṭhānaṃ, vīthissa kā nhānagatassa hoti;
atk-s0513a4:5800_0: Kathañhi so nhāyati nāgarājā, kathaṃ vijānemu gatiṃ gajassā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5801_3: Vīthissa kāti tassa nhānagatassa kā vīthi hoti,
atk-s0513a4:5801_5: Kathaṃ vijānemu gatinti tayā akathite mayaṃ kathaṃ tassa nāgarājassa gatiṃ vijānissāma,
atk-s0513a4:5802_0: Tato sā jātissarañāṇena paccakkhato diṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ tassa ācikkhantī dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:5804_0: “Tattheva sā pokkharaṇī adūre, rammā sutitthā ca mahodikā ca;
atk-s0513a4:5805_0: Sampupphitā bhamaragaṇānuciṇṇā, ettha hi so nhāyati nāgarājā.
atk-s0513a4:5808_0: Āmodamāno gacchati sanniketaṃ, purakkhatvā mahesiṃ sabbabhadda”nti.
atk-s0513a4:5809_2: Sampupphitāti duvidhehi kumudehi tividhehi uppalehi pañcavaṇṇehi ca padumehi samantato pupphitā.
atk-s0513a4:5809_3: Ettha hi soti so nāgarājā ettha chaddantadahe nhāyati.
atk-s0513a4:5809_4: Uppalamālabhārīti uppalādīnaṃ jalajathalajānaṃ pupphānaṃ mālaṃ dhārento.
atk-s0513a4:5809_8: Purakkhatvāti sabbabhaddaṃ nāma mahesiṃ purato katvā aṭṭhahi nāgasahassehi parivuto attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gacchatīti.
atk-s0513a4:5810_1: ahaṃ taṃ vāraṇaṃ māretvā tassa dante āharissāmī”ti sampaṭicchi.
atk-s0513a4:5810_2: Athassa sā tuṭṭhā sahassaṃ datvā “gehaṃ tāva gaccha,
atk-s0513a4:5810_3: ito sattāhaccayena tattha gamissasī”ti taṃ uyyojetvā kammāre pakkosāpetvā “tātā amhākaṃ vāsipharasu- kuddāla-
atk-s0513a4:5810_9: sabbaṃ sīghaṃ katvā āharathā”ti āṇāpetvā cammakāre pakkosāpetvā “tātā amhākaṃ kumbhabhāragāhitaṃ cammabhastaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0513a4:5810_12: Te ubhopi sabbāni tāni sīghaṃ katvā āharitvā adaṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:5810_13: Sā tassa pātheyyaṃ saṃvidahitvā araṇisahitaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbaṃ upakaraṇañca baddhasattumādiṃ katvā pātheyyañca cammabhastāyaṃ pakkhipi,
atk-s0513a4:5811_0: Sonuttaropi attano parivacchaṃ katvā sattame divase āgantvā deviṃ vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:5811_1: Atha naṃ sā “niṭṭhitaṃ te samma sabbūpakaraṇaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:5811_3: So pana mahāthāmo pañcannaṃ hatthīnaṃ balaṃ dhāreti,
atk-s0513a4:5811_4: tasmā tambūlapasibbakaṃ viya ukkhipitvā upakacchantare ṭhapetvā rittahattho viya aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:5811_5: Subhaddā luddassa puttadārānaṃ paribbayaṃ datvā rañño ācikkhitvā sonuttaraṃ uyyojesi.
atk-s0513a4:5811_6: Sopi rājānañca deviñca vanditvā rājanivesanā oruyha rathe ṭhatvā mahantena parivārena nagarā nikkhamitvā
atk-s0513a4:5811_7: gāmanigamajanapadaparamparāya paccantaṃ patvā jānapade nivattetvā paccantavāsīhi saddhiṃ araññaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0513a4:5811_8: manussapathaṃ atikkamma paccantavāsinopi nivattetvā ekakova gacchanto tiṃsayojanaṃ patvā paṭhamaṃ dabbagahanaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5811_9: kāsagahanaṃ tiṇagahanaṃ tulasigahanaṃ saragahanaṃ tirivacchagahananti cha gahanāni,
atk-s0513a4:5811_10: kaṇṭakaveḷugumbagahanāni vettagahanaṃ omissakagahanaṃ naḷagahanaṃ saragahanasadisaṃ uragenapi dubbinivijjhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5811_11: ghanavanagahanaṃ rukkhagahanaṃ veḷugahanaṃ aparampi veḷugumbagahanaṃ kalalagahanaṃ udakagahanaṃ pabbatagahananti
atk-s0513a4:5811_12: aṭṭhārasa gahanāni paṭipāṭiyā patvā dabbagahanādīni asitena lāyitvā tulasigahanādīni veḷugumbacchedanasatthena
atk-s0513a4:5811_13: chinditvā rukkhe pharasunā koṭṭetvā atimahante rukkhe nikhādanena vijjhitvā maggaṃ karonto veḷuvane nisseṇiṃ
atk-s0513a4:5811_14: katvā veḷugumbaṃ āruyha veḷuṃ chinditvā aparassa veḷugumbassa upari pātetvā veḷugumbamatthakena gantvā
atk-s0513a4:5811_15: kalalagahane sukkharukkhapadaraṃ attharitvā tena gantvā aparaṃ attharitvā itaraṃ ukkhipitvā puna purato
atk-s0513a4:5811_16: attharanto taṃ atikkamitvā udakagahane doṇiṃ katvā tāya udakagahanaṃ taritvā pabbatapāde ṭhatvā ayasiṅghāṭakaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5811_17: yottena bandhitvā uddhaṃ khipitvā pabbate laggāpetvā yottenāruyha vajiraggena lohadaṇḍena pabbataṃ vijjhitvā
atk-s0513a4:5811_18: khāṇukaṃ koṭṭetvā tattha ṭhatvā siṅghāṭakaṃ ākaḍḍhitvā puna upari laggāpetvā tattha ṭhito cammayottaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5811_19: olambetvā taṃ ādāya otaritvā heṭṭhimakhāṇuke bandhitvā vāmahatthena yottaṃ gahetvā dakkhiṇahatthena muggaraṃ
atk-s0513a4:5811_20: ādāya yottaṃ paharitvā khāṇukaṃ nīharitvā puna abhiruhati.
atk-s0513a4:5811_21: Etenupāyena pabbatamatthakaṃ abhiruyha parato otaranto purimanayeneva paṭhamaṃ pabbatamatthake khāṇukaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5811_22: koṭṭetvā cammapasibbake yottaṃ bandhitvā khāṇuke veṭhetvā sayaṃ antopasibbake nisīditvā makkaṭakānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5811_24: Cammachattena vātaṃ gāhāpetvā sakuṇo viya otaratītipi vadantiyeva.
atk-s0513a4:5812_0: Evaṃ tassa subhaddāya vacanaṃ ādāya nagarā nikkhamitvā sattarasa gahanāni atikkamitvā pabbatagahanaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5812_1: patvā tatrāpi cha pabbate atikkamitvā suvaṇṇapassapabbatamatthakaṃ āruḷhabhāvaṃ āvikaronto satthā āha –
atk-s0513a4:5814_0: “Tattheva so uggahetvāna vākyaṃ, ādāya tūṇiñca dhanuñca luddo;
atk-s0513a4:5815_0: Vituriyati satta girī brahante, suvaṇṇapassaṃ nāma giriṃ uḷāraṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5824_0: Sampupphitaṃ bhamaragaṇānuciṇṇaṃ, yattha hi so nhāyati nāgarājā.
atk-s0513a4:5826_0: “Disvāna nāgassa gatiṃ ṭhitiñca, vīthissayā nhānagatassa hoti;
atk-s0513a4:5828_2: so luddo tattheva sattabhūmikapāsādatale ṭhitāya tassā subhaddāya vacanaṃ uggahetvā saratūṇiñca mahādhanuñca
atk-s0513a4:5828_3: ādāya pabbatagahanaṃ patvā “kataro nu kho suvaṇṇapassapabbato nāmā”ti satta mahāpabbate vituriyati,
atk-s0513a4:5828_5: So evaṃ tīrento suvaṇṇapassaṃ nāma giriṃ uḷāraṃ disvā “ayaṃ so bhavissatī”ti cintesi.
atk-s0513a4:5828_6: Olokayīti taṃ kinnarānaṃ bhavanabhūtaṃ pabbataṃ āruyha subhaddāya dinnasaññāvasena heṭṭhā olokesi.
atk-s0513a4:5828_7: Tatthāti tasmiṃ pabbatapādamūle avidūreyeva taṃ nigrodhaṃ addasa.
atk-s0513a4:5829_1: Tatthāti tattheva antopabbate tassa nigrodhassāvidūre yattha so nhāyati,
atk-s0513a4:5829_3: Disvānāti suvaṇṇapassapabbatā oruyha hatthīnaṃ gatakāle hatthipādaupāhanaṃ āruyha tassa nāgarañño gataṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5829_7: idha tiṭṭhatī”ti sabbaṃ disvā ahirikabhāvena anariyarūpo tāya cittavasānugāya payojito,
atk-s0513a4:5830_1: “so kira mahāsattassa vasanokāsaṃ sattamāsādhikehi sattahi saṃvaccharehi sattahi ca divasehi patvā vuttanayeneva
atk-s0513a4:5830_2: tassa vasanokāsaṃ sallakkhetvā “idha āvāṭaṃ khaṇitvā tasmiṃ ṭhito vāraṇādhipatiṃ visapītena sallena vijjhitvā
atk-s0513a4:5830_3: jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpessāmī”ti vavatthapetvā araññaṃ pavisitvā thambhādīnaṃ atthāya rukkhe chinditvā dabbasambhāre
atk-s0513a4:5830_4: sajjetvā hatthīsu nhānatthāya gatesu tassa vasanokāse mahākuddālena caturassaṃ āvāṭaṃ khaṇitvā uddhatapaṃsuṃ
atk-s0513a4:5830_5: bījaṃ vapanto viya udakena vikiritvā udukkhalapāsāṇānaṃ upari thambhe patiṭṭhapetvā tulā ca kāje ca datvā
atk-s0513a4:5830_6: padarāni attharitvā kaṇḍappamāṇaṃ chiddaṃ katvā upari paṃsuñca kacavarañca pakkhipitvā ekena passena
atk-s0513a4:5830_7: attano pavisanaṭṭhānaṃ katvā evaṃ niṭṭhite āvāṭe paccūsakāleyeva patisīsakaṃ paṭimuñcitvā kāsāyāni paridahitvā
atk-s0513a4:5830_8: saddhiṃ visapītena sallena dhanuṃ ādāya āvāṭaṃ otaritvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:5832_0: “Khaṇitvāna kāsuṃ phalakehi chādayi, attānamodhāya dhanuñca luddo;
atk-s0513a4:5835_0: “Viddho ca nāgo koñcamanādi ghoraṃ, sabbe ca nāgā ninnaduṃ ghorarūpaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:5836_0: Tiṇañca kaṭṭhañca raṇaṃ karontā, dhāviṃsu te aṭṭha disā samantato.
atk-s0513a4:5839_0: Dukkhena phuṭṭhassudapādi saññā, arahaddhajo sabbhi avajjharūpo”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5840_2: So kira dutiyadivase āgantvā nhatvā uttiṇṇo tasmiṃ mahāvisālamālake nāma padese aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:5840_3: Athassa sarīrato udakaṃ nābhipadesena ogalitvā tena chiddena luddassa sarīre pati.
atk-s0513a4:5840_4: Tāya saññāya so mahāsattassa āgantvā ṭhitabhāvaṃ ñatvā taṃ passāgataṃ puthunā sallena samappayi vijjhi.
atk-s0513a4:5840_5: Dukkaṭakammakārīti tassa mahāsattassa kāyikacetasikassa dukkhassa uppādanena dukkaṭassa kammassa kārako.
atk-s0513a4:5841_1: Tassa kira taṃ sallaṃ nābhiyaṃ pavisitvā pihakādīni sañcuṇṇetvā antāni chinditvā piṭṭhibhāgaṃ pharasunā padālentaṃ viya uggantvā ākāse pakkhandi.
atk-s0513a4:5841_2: Bhinnarajatakumbhato rajanaṃ viya pahāramukhena lohitaṃ pagghari,
atk-s0513a4:5841_4: So vedanaṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto vedanāppatto sakalapabbataṃ ekaninnādaṃ karonto tikkhattuṃ mahantaṃ koñcanādaṃ nadi.
atk-s0513a4:5841_5: Sabbe cāti tepi sabbe aṭṭhasahassanāgā taṃ saddaṃ sutvā maraṇabhayabhītā ghorarūpaṃ ninnaduṃ anuravaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:5841_6: Raṇaṃ karontāti tena saddena gantvā chaddantavāraṇaṃ vedanāppattaṃ disvā “paccāmittaṃ gaṇhissāmā”ti tiṇañca
atk-s0513a4:5842_1: so chaddantavāraṇo disā pakkantesu nāgesu subhaddāya kareṇuyā passe ṭhatvā sandhāretvā samassāsayamānāya
atk-s0513a4:5842_2: vedanaṃ adhivāsetvā kaṇḍassa āgataṭṭhānaṃ sallakkhento ‘sace idaṃ puratthimadisādīhi āgataṃ abhavissa,
atk-s0513a4:5842_4: idaṃ pana nābhiyā pavisitvā ākāsaṃ pakkhandi,
atk-s0513a4:5842_5: tasmā pathaviyaṃ ṭhitena vissaṭṭhaṃ bhavissatī’ti upadhāretvā ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ upaparikkhitukāmo “ko jānāti,
atk-s0513a4:5842_8: aṭṭhasahassanāgā mama paccāmittaṃ pariyesantā disā pakkhandā,
atk-s0513a4:5842_11: khamatha me”ti tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā catūsu ṭhānesu vanditvā tāya ākāsaṃ pakkhandāya nāgarājā bhūmiṃ pādanakhena pahari,
atk-s0513a4:5842_13: So chiddena olokento sonuttaraṃ disvā “vadhissāmi na”nti cittaṃ uppādetvā rajatadāmavaṇṇasoṇḍaṃ pavesetvā
atk-s0513a4:5842_14: parāmasanto buddhānaṃ isīnaṃ dhajaṃ kāsāvaṃ addakkhi.
atk-s0513a4:5842_17: Athassa tena tathārūpenapi dukkhena phuṭṭhassa “arahaddhajo nāma sabbhi paṇḍitehi avajjharūpo,
atk-s0513a4:5842_18: aññadatthu sakkātabbo garukātabboyevā”ti ayaṃ saññā udapādi.
atk-s0513a4:5850_1: samma luddaputta yo puriso rāgādīhi kasāvehi anikkasāvo indriyadamena ceva vacīsaccena ca apeto anupagato
atk-s0513a4:5850_5: Yo pana tesaṃ kasāvānaṃ vantattā vantakasāvo assa sīlesu susamāhito supatiṭṭhito paripuṇṇasīlācāro,
atk-s0513a4:5851_0: Evaṃ vatvā mahāsatto tasmiṃ cittaṃ nibbāpetvā “samma kimatthaṃ tvaṃ maṃ vijjhasi,
atk-s0513a4:5854_0: Kimatthayaṃ kissa vā samma hetu, mamaṃ vadhī kassa vāyaṃ payogo”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5855_1: Kissa vāti kissa hetu kena kāraṇena,
atk-s0513a4:5855_2: kiṃ nāma tava mayā saddhiṃ veranti adhippāyo.
atk-s0513a4:5855_3: Kassa vāti kassa vā aññassa ayaṃ payogo,
atk-s0513a4:5858_0: “Kāsissa rañño mahesī bhadante, sā pūjitā rājakule subhaddā;
atk-s0513a4:5859_0: Taṃ addasā sā ca mamaṃ asaṃsi, dantehi atthoti ca maṃ avocā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5860_1: Addasāti sā kira taṃ supinante addasa.
atk-s0513a4:5860_2: Asaṃsīti sā ca mama sakkāraṃ kāretvā “himavantapadese evarūpo nāma nāgo asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne vasatī”ti mamaṃ ācikkhi.
atk-s0513a4:5861_0: Taṃ sutvā “idaṃ cūḷasubhaddāya kamma”nti ñatvā mahāsatto vedanaṃ adhivāsetvā “tassā mama dantehi attho natthi,
atk-s0513a4:5861_1: maṃ māretukāmatāya pana pahiṇī”ti dīpento gāthādvayamāha –
atk-s0513a4:5863_0: “Bahū hime dantayugā uḷārā, ye me pitūnañca pitāmahānaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:5864_0: Jānāti sā kodhanā rājaputtī, vadhatthikā veramakāsi bālā.
atk-s0513a4:5866_0: “Uṭṭhehi tvaṃ ludda kharaṃ gahetvā, dante ime chinda purā marāmi;
atk-s0513a4:5867_0: Vajjāsi taṃ kodhanaṃ rājaputtiṃ, nāgo hato handa imassa dantā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5868_0: Tattha imeti tassa kira pitu pitāmahānaṃ dantā mā vinassantūti guhāyaṃ sannicitā,
atk-s0513a4:5868_2: Jānātīti bahūnaṃ vāraṇānaṃ idha sannicihe dante jānāti.
atk-s0513a4:5868_3: Vadhatthikāti kevalaṃ pana sā maṃ māretukāmā appamattakaṃ dosaṃ hadaye ṭhapetvā attano veraṃ akāsi,
atk-s0513a4:5868_8: Handa imassa dantāti hato so mayā nāgo,
atk-s0513a4:5869_0: So tassa vacanaṃ sutvā nisīdanaṭṭhānā vuṭṭhāya kakacaṃ ādāya “dante chindissāmī”ti tassa santikaṃ upagato.
atk-s0513a4:5869_1: So pana ubbedhato aṭṭhāsītihattho rajatapabbato viya ṭhito,
atk-s0513a4:5869_3: Atha mahāsatto kāyaṃ upanāmento heṭṭhāsīsako nipajji.
atk-s0513a4:5869_4: Tadā nesādo mahāsattassa rajatadāmasadisaṃ soṇḍaṃ maddanto abhiruhitvā kelāsakūṭe viya kumbhe ṭhatvā
atk-s0513a4:5869_5: mukhakoṭimaṃsaṃ dhanukena paharitvā anto pakkhipitvā kumbhato oruyha kakacaṃ antomukhe pavesesi,
atk-s0513a4:5869_9: Nesādo ito cito ca sañcārento kakacena chindituṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0513a4:5869_10: Atha naṃ mahāsatto mukhato lohitaṃ chaḍḍetvā vedanaṃ adhivāsetvā “kiṃ samma chindituṃ na sakkosī”ti pucchi. “Āma, sāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5869_11: Mahāsatto satiṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā “tena hi samma mama soṇḍaṃ ukkhipitvā kakacakoṭiṃ gaṇhāpehi,
atk-s0513a4:5869_12: mama sayaṃ soṇḍaṃ ukkhipituṃ balaṃ natthī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:5870_0: Mahāsatto soṇḍāya kakacaṃ gahetvā aparāparaṃ cāresi,
atk-s0513a4:5870_2: Atha naṃ te āharāpetvā gaṇhitvā “samma luddaputta ahaṃ ime dante tuyhaṃ dadamāno neva ‘mayhaṃ appiyā’ti dammi,
atk-s0513a4:5870_4: imehi pana me dantehi sataguṇena sahassaguṇena satasahassaguṇena sabbaññutaññāṇadantāva piyatarā,
atk-s0513a4:5870_5: sabbaññutaññāṇappaṭivedhāya me idaṃ puññaṃ paccayo hotū”ti dante datvā “samma idaṃ ṭhānaṃ kittakena kālena
atk-s0513a4:5870_7: “gaccha imesaṃ dantānaṃ ānubhāvena sattadivasabbhantareyeva bārāṇasiṃ pāpuṇissasī”ti vatvā tassa parittaṃ katvā taṃ uyyojesi.
atk-s0513a4:5870_8: Uyyojetvā ca pana anāgatesuyeva tesu nāgesu subhaddāya ca anāgatāya kālamakāsi.
atk-s0513a4:5872_0: “Uṭṭhāya so luddo kharaṃ gahetvā, chetvāna dantāni gajuttamassa;
atk-s0513a4:5873_0: Vaggū subhe appaṭime pathabyā, ādāya pakkāmi tato hi khippa”nti.
atk-s0513a4:5874_0: Tattha vaggūti vilāsavante. Subheti sundare. Appaṭimeti imissaṃ pathaviyaṃ aññehi dantehi asadiseti.
atk-s0513a4:5875_0: Tasmiṃ pakkante te nāgā paccāmittaṃ adisvā āgamiṃsu. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0513a4:5877_0: “Bhayaṭṭitā nāgavadhena aṭṭā, ye te nāgā aṭṭha disā vidhāvuṃ;
atk-s0513a4:5878_0: Adisvāna posaṃ gajapaccamittaṃ, paccāgamuṃ yena so nāgarājā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5879_3: Yena soti yattha visālamālake so nāgarājā kālaṃ katvā kelāsapabbato viya patito,
atk-s0513a4:5880_1: Te sabbepi aṭṭhasahassanāgā tattha roditvā kanditvā mahāsattassa kulupakānaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā, “bhante,
atk-s0513a4:5880_2: tumhākaṃ paccayadāyako visapītena sallena viddho kālakato,
atk-s0513a4:5880_5: Tasmiṃ khaṇe dve taruṇanāgā nāgarañño sarīraṃ dantehi ukkhipitvā paccekabuddhe vandāpetvā citakaṃ āropetvā jhāpayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:5880_7: Aṭṭhasahassanāgā āḷāhanaṃ nibbāpetvā vanditvā nhatvā mahāsubhaddaṃ purato katvā attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:5882_0: “Te tattha kanditvā roditvāna nāgā, sīse sake paṃsukaṃ okiritvā;
atk-s0513a4:5883_0: Agamaṃsu te sabbe sakaṃ niketaṃ, purakkhatvā mahesiṃ sabbabhadda”nti.
atk-s0513a4:5885_0: Sonuttaropi appatteyeva sattame divase dante ādāya bārāṇasiṃ sampāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a4:5887_0: “Ādāya dantāni gajuttamassa, vaggū subhe appaṭime pathabyā;
atk-s0513a4:5888_0: Suvaṇṇarājīhi samantamodare, so luddako kāsipuraṃ upāgami;
atk-s0513a4:5889_0: Upanesi so rājakaññāya dante, nāgo hato handa imassa dantā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5890_1: Samantamodareti samantato obhāsante sakalavanasaṇḍaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ viya karonte.
atk-s0513a4:5890_2: Upanesīti ahaṃ chaddantavāraṇassa chabbaṇṇaraṃsivissajjane yamakadante ādāya āgacchāmi,
atk-s0513a4:5890_3: nagaraṃ alaṅkārāpethāti deviyā sāsanaṃ pesetvā tāya rañño ārocāpetvā devanagaraṃ viya nagare alaṅkārāpite
atk-s0513a4:5890_4: sonuttaropi nagaraṃ pavisitvā pāsādaṃ āruhitvā dante upanesi,
atk-s0513a4:5890_6: yassa kira tumhe appamattakaṃ dosaṃ hadaye karittha,
atk-s0513a4:5891_0: Sā mahāsattassa chabbaṇṇaraṃsivicittadante maṇitālavaṇṭena gahetvā ūrūsu ṭhapetvā purimabhave attano
atk-s0513a4:5891_1: pirasāmikassa dante olokentī “evarūpaṃ sobhaggappattaṃ vāraṇaṃ visapītena sallena jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpetvā
atk-s0513a4:5891_2: ime dante chinditvā sonuttaro āgato”ti mahāsattaṃ anussarantī sokaṃ uppādetvā adhivāsetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0513a4:5894_0: Tattheva tassā hadayaṃ aphāli, teneva sā kālamakāsi bālā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5896_0: “Sambodhipatto sa mahānubhāvo, sitaṃ akāsī parisāya majjhe;
atk-s0513a4:5897_0: Pucchiṃsu bhikkhū suvimuttacittā, nākāraṇe pātukaronti buddhā.
atk-s0513a4:5900_0: Sā kho tadā rājakaññā ahosi, ahaṃ tadā nāgarājā ahosiṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5902_0: “Ādāya dantāni gajuttamassa, vaggū subhe appaṭime pathabyā;
atk-s0513a4:5903_0: Yo luddako kāsipuraṃ upāgami, so kho tadā devadatto ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:5906_0: Vītaddaro vītasoko visallo, sayaṃ abhiññāya abhāsi buddho.
atk-s0513a4:5908_0: “Ahaṃ vo tena kālena, ahosiṃ tattha bhikkhavo;
atk-s0513a4:5909_0: Nāgarājā tadā homi, evaṃ dhāretha jātaka”nti. –
atk-s0513a4:5910_0: Imā gāthā dasabalassa guṇe vaṇṇentehi dhammasaṅgāhakattherehi ṭhapitā.
atk-s0513a4:5911_0: Tattha sitaṃ akāsīti so sambodhippatto satthā mahānubhāvo alaṅkatadhammasabhāyaṃ alaṅkatadhammāsane parisamajjhe nisinno ekadivasaṃ sitaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a4:5911_2: buddhā nāma akāraṇe sitaṃ na karonti,
atk-s0513a4:5911_4: kena nu kho kāraṇena sitaṃ kata”nti mahākhīṇāsavā bhikkhū pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:5911_6: satthā attano sitakāraṇaṃ ācikkhanto ekaṃ daharabhikkhuniṃ dassetvā evamāha –
atk-s0513a4:5911_8: yaṃ ekaṃ daharaṃ yobbanappattaṃ kumāriṃ kāsāyavatthaṃ anagāriyaṃ upetaṃ pabbajitvā imasmiṃ sāsane carantiṃ addasātha passatha,
atk-s0513a4:5911_9: sā tadā ‘visapītena sallena nāgarājaṃ vijjhitvā vadhehī”’ti sonuttarassa pesetā rājakaññā ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:5911_10: Tena gantvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpito ahaṃ tadā so nāgarājā ahosinti attho.
atk-s0513a4:5911_13: idāni devadatto tadā so luddako ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:5912_2: Cirarattasaṃsitanti ito ciraratte anekavassakoṭimatthake saṃsitaṃ saṃsaritaṃ anuciṇṇaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5912_4: ito anekavassakoṭimatthake saṃsaritampi pubbaṇhe kataṃ taṃ divasameva sāyanhe saranto viya attano caritavasena
atk-s0513a4:5912_5: uccattā tāya rājadhītāya ca sonuttarassa ca caritavasena nīcattā uccānīcaṃ caritaṃ idaṃ purāṇaṃ rāgādīnaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5912_8: rāgasallādīnaṃ vigatattā visallo attanāva jānitvā buddho abhāsīti.
atk-s0513a4:5912_11: ahaṃ tena kālena tattha chaddantadahe ahosinti attho.
atk-s0513a4:5912_12: Nāgarājāti honto ca pana na añño koci tadā homi,
atk-s0513a4:5912_14: Evaṃ cārethāti tumhe taṃ jātakaṃ evaṃ dhāretha uggaṇhātha pariyāpuṇāthāti.
atk-s0513a4:5913_0: Imañca pana dhammadesanaṃ sutvā bahū sotāpannādayo ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:5913_1: Sā pana bhikkhunī pacchā vipassitvā arahattaṃ pattāti.
atk-s0513a4:5917_0: Rajjañca paṭipannāsmāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto paññāpāramiṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:5918_0: Atīte pana kururaṭṭhe indapatthanagare dhanañcayakorabyo nāma rājā rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a4:5918_1: Tassa sucirato nāma brāhmaṇo purohito atthadhammānusāsako ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:5918_2: Rājā dānādīni puññāni karonto dhammena rajjamanusāsi.
atk-s0513a4:5918_3: So ekadivasaṃ dhammayāgaṃ nāma pañhaṃ abhisaṅkharitvā sucirataṃ nāma brāhmaṇaṃ purohitaṃ āsane nisīdāpetvā
atk-s0513a4:5918_4: sakkāraṃ katvā pañhaṃ pucchanto catasso gāthāyo abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:5923_0: “Dhammena no adhammena, adhammo me na ruccati;
atk-s0513a4:5924_0: Kiccova dhammo carito, rañño hoti sucīrata.
atk-s0513a4:5930_0: Taṃ tvaṃ atthañca dhammañca, brāhmaṇakkhāhi pucchito”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5931_5: Pattumicchāmi vijetunti imaṃ pathaviṃ dhammena abhibhavituṃ ajjhottharituṃ icchāmi.
atk-s0513a4:5931_6: Kiccovāti avasesajanehi rañño carito dhammo kicco karaṇīyataro.
atk-s0513a4:5931_8: so tasmiṃ dhammike sabbopi dhammiko hoti.
atk-s0513a4:5931_9: Tasmā esa dhammo nāma raññova kiccoti.
atk-s0513a4:5932_0: Idha cevāninditāti yena mayaṃ idhaloke paraloke ca aninditā.
atk-s0513a4:5932_1: Yena pappomūti yena mayaṃ nirayādīsu anibbattitvā devesu ca manussesu ca yasaṃ issariyaṃ sobhaggaṃ pāpuṇeyyāma,
atk-s0513a4:5932_2: taṃ no kāraṇaṃ kathehīti. Yohanti, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0513a4:5932_3: yo ahaṃ phalavipākasaṅkhātaṃ atthañca tassa atthassa hetubhūtaṃ dhammañca kattuṃ samādāya vattituṃ uppādetuñca icchāmi.
atk-s0513a4:5932_4: Taṃ tvanti tassa mayhaṃ tvaṃ sukheneva nibbānagāmimaggaṃ āruyha apaṭisandhikabhāvaṃ patthentassa taṃ atthañca dhammañca pucchito akkhāhi,
atk-s0513a4:5932_5: pākaṭaṃ katvā kathehīti brāhmaṇaṃ dhammayāgapañhaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0513a4:5933_3: Sucirato pana attano abodhisattatāya pañhaṃ kathetuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0513a4:5933_4: asakkonto ca paṇḍitamānaṃ akatvā attano asamatthabhāvaṃ kathento gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:5936_0: Yaṃ tvaṃ atthañca dhammañca, kattumicchasi khattiyā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5937_6: Bārāṇasirañño pana purohito vidhuro nāma brāhmaṇo atthi,
atk-s0513a4:5937_8: taṃ ṭhapetvā yaṃ tvaṃ atthañca dhammañca kattumicchasi,
atk-s0513a4:5938_0: Rājā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “tena hi, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0513a4:5938_1: khippaṃ tassa santikaṃ gacchāhī”ti paṇṇākāraṃ datvā taṃ pesetukāmo hutvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:5943_2: Ayaṃ pana rattasuvaṇṇassa nikkhasahassaṃ datvā evamāha.
atk-s0513a4:5943_3: Imaṃ dajjāti tena imasmiṃ dhammayāgapañhe kathite tassa atthadhammānusiṭṭhiyā abhihārapūjaṃ karonto imaṃ nikkhasahassaṃ dadeyyāsīti.
atk-s0513a4:5944_0: Evañca pana vatvā pañhavissajjanassa likhanatthāya satasahassagghanakaṃ suvaṇṇapaṭṭañca gamanatthāya yānaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:5944_3: So pana indapatthanagarā nikkhamitvā ujukameva bārāṇasiṃ agantvā yattha yattha paṇḍitā vasanti,
atk-s0513a4:5944_4: sabbāni tāni ṭhānāni upasaṅkamitvā sakalajambudīpe pañhassa vissajjetāraṃ alabhitvā anupubbena bārāṇasiṃ
atk-s0513a4:5944_5: patvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne nivāsaṃ gahetvā katipayehi janehi saddhiṃ pātarāsabhuñjanavelāya vidhurassa nivesanaṃ
atk-s0513a4:5944_6: gantvā āgatabhāvaṃ ārocāpetvā tena pakkosāpito taṃ sake ghare bhuñjamānaṃ addasa.
atk-s0513a4:5948_0: Tattha svādhippāgāti so bhāradvājagotto sucirato adhippāgā,
atk-s0513a4:5949_0: So pana tassa bālasahāyako ekācariyakule uggahitasippo,
atk-s0513a4:5949_1: tasmā tena saddhiṃ ekato bhuñjitvā bhattakiccapariyosāne sukhanisinno “samma kimatthaṃ āgatosī”ti puṭṭho
atk-s0513a4:5953_0: Taṃ tvaṃ atthañca dhammañca, vidhurakkhāhi pucchito”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5954_0: Tattha raññohanti ahaṃ rañño korabyassa yasassino dūto.
atk-s0513a4:5954_2: Pucchesīti so yudhiṭṭhilagotto dhanañcayarājā maṃ dhammayāgapañhaṃ nāma pucchi,
atk-s0513a4:5954_3: ahaṃ kathetuṃ asakkonto “tvaṃ sakkhissasī”ti ñatvā tassa ārocesiṃ,
atk-s0513a4:5954_4: so ca paṇṇākāraṃ datvā pañhapucchanatthāya maṃ tava santikaṃ pesento “vidhurassa santikaṃ gantvā imassa
atk-s0513a4:5955_0: Tadā pana so brāhmaṇo “mahājanassa cittaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti gaṅgaṃ pidahanto viya vinicchayaṃ vicāreti.
atk-s0513a4:5957_0: “Gaṅgaṃ me pidahissanti, na taṃ sakkomi brāhmaṇa;
atk-s0513a4:5958_0: Apidhetuṃ mahāsindhuṃ, taṃ kathaṃ so bhavissati;
atk-s0513a4:5959_0: Na te sakkomi akkhātuṃ, atthaṃ dhammañca pucchito”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5960_1: mayhaṃ “mahājanassa nānācittagatisaṅkhātaṃ gaṅgaṃ pidahissa”nti byāpāro uppanno,
atk-s0513a4:5960_5: Iti cittekaggatañceva okāsañca alabhanto na te sakkomi akkhātuṃ atthaṃ dhammañca pucchitoti.
atk-s0513a4:5961_0: Evañca pana vatvā “putto me paṇḍito mayā ñāṇavantataro,
atk-s0513a4:5961_2: tassa santikaṃ gacchāhī”ti vatvā dasamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:5963_0: “Bhadrakāro ca me putto, oraso mama atrajo;
atk-s0513a4:5964_0: Taṃ tvaṃ atthañca dhammañca, gantvā pucchassu brāhmaṇā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5965_0: Tattha orasoti ure saṃvaḍḍho. Atrajoti attanā jātoti.
atk-s0513a4:5966_0: Taṃ sutvā sucirato vidhurassa gharā nikkhamitvā bhadrakārassa bhuttapātarāsassa attano parisamajjhe nisinnakāle nivesanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:5971_0: So tattha gantvā bhadrakāramāṇavena katāsanābhihārasakkāro nisīditvā āgamanakāraṇaṃ puṭṭho dvādasamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:5975_0: Taṃ tvaṃ atthañca dhammañca, bhadrakāra pabrūhi me”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5976_4: mayhaṃ pana kaniṭṭho sañcayakumāro nāma mayā ativiya ñāṇavantataro,
atk-s0513a4:5976_6: so te pañhaṃ vissajjessatī”ti tassa santikaṃ pesento dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:5979_0: Na te sakkomi akkhātuṃ, atthaṃ dhammañca pucchito.
atk-s0513a4:5981_0: “Sañcayo nāma me bhātā, kaniṭṭho me sucīrata;
atk-s0513a4:5982_0: Taṃ tvaṃ atthañca dhammañca, gantvā pucchassu brāhmaṇā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5983_0: Tattha maṃsakājanti yathā nāma puriso thūlamigamaṃsaṃ kājenādāya gacchanto antarāmagge godhapotakaṃ disvā maṃsakājaṃ chaḍḍetvā taṃ anubandheyya,
atk-s0513a4:5983_1: evameva attano ghare vasavattiniṃ bhariyaṃ chaḍḍetvā parassa rakkhitagopitaṃ itthiṃ anubandhanto homīti dīpento evamāhāti.
atk-s0513a4:5984_0: So tasmiṃ khaṇe sañcayassa nivesanaṃ gantvā tena katasakkāro āgamanakāraṇaṃ puṭṭho ācikkhi.
atk-s0513a4:5984_1: Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:5991_0: Taṃ tvaṃ atthañca dhammañca, sañcayakkhāhi pucchito”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5992_3: sevanto ca pana gaṅgaṃ otaritvā paratīraṃ gacchāmi,
atk-s0513a4:5992_4: taṃ maṃ sāyañca pāto ca nadiṃ tarantaṃ maccu gilati nāma,
atk-s0513a4:5992_7: kaniṭṭho pana me sambhavakumāro nāma atthi jātiyā sattavassiko,
atk-s0513a4:5992_11: Imamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:5994_0: “Sadā maṃ gilate maccu, sāyaṃ pāto sucīrata;
atk-s0513a4:5995_0: Na te sakkomi akkhātuṃ, atthaṃ dhammañca pucchito.
atk-s0513a4:5997_0: “Sambhavo nāma me bhātā, kaniṭṭho me sucīrata;
atk-s0513a4:5998_0: Taṃ tvaṃ atthañca dhammañca, gantvā pucchassu brāhmaṇā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:5999_0: Taṃ sutvā sucirato “ayaṃ pañho imasmiṃ loke abbhuto bhavissati,
atk-s0513a4:5999_1: imaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjetuṃ samattho nāma natthi maññe”ti cintetvā dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:6001_0: “Abbhuto vata bho dhammo, nāyaṃ asmāka ruccati;
atk-s0513a4:6002_0: Tayo janā pitāputtā, te su paññāya no vidū.
atk-s0513a4:6004_0: “Na taṃ sakkotha akkhātuṃ, atthaṃ dhammañca pucchitā;
atk-s0513a4:6005_0: Kathaṃ nu daharo jaññā, atthaṃ dhammañca pucchito”ti.
atk-s0513a4:6006_1: imaṃ kathetuṃ samatthena nāma na bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:6006_7: puttā bhadrakāro sañcayo cāti tepi tayo pitāputtā paññāya imaṃ dhammaṃ no vidū,
atk-s0513a4:6006_10: Na tanti tumhe tayo janā pucchitā etaṃ akkhātuṃ na sakkotha,
atk-s0513a4:6006_11: daharo sattavassiko kumāro pucchito kathaṃ nu jaññā,
atk-s0513a4:6007_3: gaccha naṃ pucchā”ti atthadīpanāhi upamāhi kumārassa vaṇṇaṃ pakāsento dvādasa gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:6010_0: Pucchitvā sambhavaṃ jaññā, atthaṃ dhammañca brāhmaṇa.
atk-s0513a4:6016_0: Mā naṃ daharoti uññāsi, apucchitvāna sambhavaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:6017_0: Pucchitvā sambhavaṃ jaññā, atthaṃ dhammañca brāhmaṇa.
atk-s0513a4:6023_0: Mā naṃ daharoti uññāsi, apucchitvāna sambhavaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:6024_0: Pucchitvā sambhavaṃ jaññā, atthaṃ dhammañca brāhmaṇa.
atk-s0513a4:6028_0: Osadhehi ca dibbehi, disā bhāti pavāti ca.
atk-s0513a4:6031_0: Mā naṃ daharoti uññāsi, apucchitvāna sambhavaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:6032_0: Pucchitvā sambhavaṃ jaññā, atthaṃ dhammañca brāhmaṇa.
atk-s0513a4:6041_0: Mā naṃ daharoti uññāsi, apucchitvāna sambhavaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:6042_0: Pucchitvā sambhavaṃ jaññā, atthaṃ dhammañca brāhmaṇa.
atk-s0513a4:6048_0: Mā naṃ daharoti uññāsi, apucchitvāna sambhavaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:6049_0: Pucchitvā sambhavaṃ jaññā, atthaṃ dhammañca brāhmaṇā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:6050_3: Evampi daharūpetoti evaṃ sambhavakumāro daharabhāvena upetopi paññāyogena sakalajambudīpatale avasese paṇḍite atikkamitvā virocati.
atk-s0513a4:6050_11: Disā bhātīti sabbadisā ekobhāsā viya karoti.
atk-s0513a4:6050_13: Evanti evaṃ sambhavopi paññāyogena sabbadisā bhāti ceva pavāti ca.
atk-s0513a4:6051_2: Jalamāno vane gaccheti gacchasaṅkhāte mahāvane jalanto carati.
atk-s0513a4:6051_5: Yaññe āhutivasena āhutaṃ ghataṃ asnātīti ghatāsano.
atk-s0513a4:6051_13: Evanti evaṃ mama kaniṭṭho sambhavakumāro daharopi paññāyogena virocati.
atk-s0513a4:6051_16: Vāhiyeti vahitabbabhāre sati bhāravahatāya “ahaṃ uttamo”ti balibaddaṃ jānanti.
atk-s0513a4:6052_0: Sucirato evaṃ tasmiṃ sambhavaṃ vaṇṇente “pañhaṃ pucchitvā jānissāmī”ti “kahaṃ pana te kumāra kaniṭṭho”ti pucchi.
atk-s0513a4:6052_1: Athassa so sīhapañjaraṃ vivaritvā hatthaṃ pasāretvā “yo esa pāsādadvāre antaravīthiyā kumārakehi saddhiṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇo kīḷati,
atk-s0513a4:6052_5: Sucirato tassa vacanaṃ sutvā pāsādā oruyha kumārassa santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a4:6052_7: Kumārassa nivatthasāṭakaṃ mocetvā khandhe khipitvā ubhohi hatthehi paṃsuṃ gahetvā ṭhitavelāya.
atk-s0513a4:6057_0: Mahāsattopi brāhmaṇaṃ āgantvā purato ṭhitaṃ disvā “tāta,
atk-s0513a4:6057_2: kumāra ahaṃ jambudīpatale āhiṇḍanto mayā pucchitaṃ pañhaṃ kathetuṃ samatthaṃ alabhitvā tava santikaṃ
atk-s0513a4:6057_3: āgatomhī”ti vutte “sakalajambudīpe kira avinicchito pañho mama santikaṃ āgato,
atk-s0513a4:6057_4: ahaṃ ñāṇena mahallako”ti hirottappaṃ paṭilabhitvā hatthagataṃ paṃsuṃ chaḍḍetvā khandhato sāṭakaṃ ādāya nivāsetvā “puccha, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0513a4:6061_0: Taṃ tvaṃ atthañca dhammañca, sambhavakkhāhi pucchito”ti. –
atk-s0513a4:6063_0: Tassa attho sambhavapaṇḍitassa gaganamajjhe puṇṇacando viya pākaṭo ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:6064_0: Atha naṃ “tena hi suṇohī”ti vatvā dhammayāgapañhaṃ vissajjento gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:6067_0: Rājā ca kho taṃ jānāti, yadi kāhati vā na vā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:6068_0: Tassa antaravīthiyaṃ ṭhatvā madhurassarena dhammaṃ desentassa saddo dvādasayojanikaṃ sakalabārāṇasinagaraṃ avatthari.
atk-s0513a4:6068_1: Atha rājā ca uparājādayo ca sabbe sannipatiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:6069_1: Yathāpi kusaloti yathā atikusalo sabbaññubuddho ācikkhati,
atk-s0513a4:6069_3: Rājā ca kho tanti ahaṃ taṃ pañhaṃ yathā tumhākaṃ rājā jānituṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0513a4:6069_5: Tato uttari rājā eva taṃ jānāti,
atk-s0513a4:6069_6: yadi karissati vā na vā karissati,
atk-s0513a4:6069_7: karontassa vā akarontassa vā tassevetaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0513a4:6070_0: Evaṃ imāya gāthāya pañhakathanaṃ paṭijānitvā idāni dhammayāgapañhaṃ kathento āha –
atk-s0513a4:6073_0: Mā katvā avasī rājā, atthe jāte yudhiṭṭhilo.
atk-s0513a4:6076_0: Kummaggaṃ na niveseyya, yathā mūḷho acetaso.
atk-s0513a4:6079_0: Atitthe nappatāreyya, anatthe na yuto siyā.
atk-s0513a4:6081_0: “Yo ca etāni ṭhānāni, kattuṃ jānāti khattiyo;
atk-s0513a4:6082_0: Sadā so vaḍḍhate rājā, sukkapakkheva candimā.
atk-s0513a4:6085_0: Kāyassa bhedā sappañño, saggaṃ so upapajjatī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:6086_2: sucirata sace tumhākaṃ raññā “ajja dānaṃ dema,
atk-s0513a4:6086_9: kusalaṃ pana karissāma suve”ti rañño katheyya,
atk-s0513a4:6086_10: tassa atimahantassapi amaccassa vacanaṃ katvā tumhākaṃ rājā yudhiṭṭhilagotto tathārūpe atthe jāte taṃ divasaṃ pamādena vītināmento mā avasi,
atk-s0513a4:6086_11: tassa vacanaṃ akatvā uppannaṃ kusalacittaṃ aparihāpetvā kusalapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ kammaṃ karotuyeva,
atk-s0513a4:6091_1: sucirata sambhavapaṇḍito tayā dhammayāgapañhe pucchite kiṃ kathesīti raññā puṭṭho samāno tumhākaṃ rañño ajjhattaññeva saṃseyya,
atk-s0513a4:6091_2: niyakajjhattasaṅkhātaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ hutvā abhāvato aniccanti katheyyāsi.
atk-s0513a4:6095_1: yathā mūḷho acetano andhabālaputhujjano dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhigatasaṅkhātaṃ kummaggaṃ sevati,
atk-s0513a4:6095_2: evaṃ tava rājā taṃ kummaggaṃ na seveyya,
atk-s0513a4:6096_0: Attānanti imaṃ sugatiyaṃ ṭhitaṃ attabhāvaṃ nātivatteyya,
atk-s0513a4:6096_1: yena kammena tisso kusalasampattiyo sabbakāmasagge atikkamitvā apāye nibbattanti,
atk-s0513a4:6096_4: Atittheti dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhisaṅkhāte atitthe nappatāreyya na otāreyya.
atk-s0513a4:6096_8: Na yutoti yuttapayutto na siyā. Brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0513a4:6096_10: “imasmiṃ ovāde vattatū”ti tassa katheyyāsīti ayamettha adhippāyo.
atk-s0513a4:6097_3: so rājā sukkapakkhe cando viya sadā vaḍḍhatī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:6097_4: Virocatīti mittāmaccānaṃ majjhe attano sīlācārañāṇādīhi guṇehi sobhati virocatīti.
atk-s0513a4:6098_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto gaganatale candaṃ uṭṭhāpento viya buddhalīḷāya brāhmaṇassa pañhaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:6098_1: Mahājano nadanto selento apphoṭento sādhukārasahassāni adāsi,
atk-s0513a4:6098_6: Suciratopi nikkhasahassena pūjaṃ katvā suvaṇṇapaṭṭe jātihiṅgulakena pañhavissajjanaṃ likhitvā indapatthanagaraṃ gantvā rañño dhammayāgapañhaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:6098_7: Rājā tasmiṃ dhamme vattitvā saggapuraṃ pūresi.
atk-s0513a4:6099_2: pubbepi tathāgato mahāpaññoyevā”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā dhanañcayarājā ānando ahosi,
atk-s0513a4:6103_0: Bārāṇasyaṃ ahū rājāti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto devadattassa silāpavijjhanaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:6103_1: Tena hi dhanuggahe payojetvā aparabhāge silāya paviddhāya bhikkhūhi devadattassa avaṇṇe kathite satthā “na,
atk-s0513a4:6103_3: pubbepi devadatto mayhaṃ silaṃ pavijjhiyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:6104_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente kāsikagāmake eko kassakabrāhmaṇo khettaṃ kasitvā goṇe vissajjetvā kuddālakammaṃ kātuṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0513a4:6104_1: Goṇā ekasmiṃ gacche paṇṇāni khādantā anukkamena aṭaviṃ pavisitvā palāyiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:6104_2: So velaṃ sallakkhetvā kuddālaṃ ṭhapetvā goṇe olokento adisvā domanassappatto te pariyesanto antoaṭaviṃ pavisitvā āhiṇḍanto himavantaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a4:6104_3: So tattha disāmūḷho hutvā sattāhaṃ nirāhāro vicaranto ekaṃ tindukarukkhaṃ disvā abhiruyha phalāni khādanto
atk-s0513a4:6104_6: Tadā bodhisatto kapiyoniyaṃ nibbattitvā phalāphalāni khādanto taṃ purisaṃ disvā silāya yoggaṃ katvā taṃ
atk-s0513a4:6104_7: purisaṃ uddharitvā silāya matthake nisīdāpetvā evamāha –
atk-s0513a4:6104_12: So tassa niddāyantassa silāya matthakaṃ padālesi.
atk-s0513a4:6104_13: Mahāsatto tassa taṃ kammaṃ ñatvā uppatitvā sākhāya nisīditvā “bho purisa,
atk-s0513a4:6104_15: ahaṃ sākhaggena tuyhaṃ maggaṃ ācikkhanto gamissāmī”ti taṃ purisaṃ araññato nīharitvā magge ṭhapetvā pabbatapādameva pāvisi.
atk-s0513a4:6104_16: So puriso mahāsatte aparajjhitvā kuṭṭhī hutvā diṭṭhadhammeyeva manussapeto ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:6105_0: So satta vassāni dukkhapīḷito vicaranto bārāṇasiyaṃ migājinaṃ nāma uyyānaṃ pavisitvā pākārantare kadalipaṇṇaṃ attharitvā vedanāppatto nipajji.
atk-s0513a4:6105_1: Tadā bārāṇasirājā uyyānaṃ gantvā tattha vicaranto taṃ disvā “kosi tvaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:6105_2: kiṃ vā katvā imaṃ dukkhaṃ patto”ti pucchi.
atk-s0513a4:6114_0: Avaca byamhito rājā, yakkhānaṃ katamo nusi.
atk-s0513a4:6116_0: “Hatthapādā ca te setā, tato setataraṃ siro;
atk-s0513a4:6120_0: Kāḷapabbāva te aṅgā, nāññaṃ passāmi edisaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:6126_0: Janetti yāpi te mātā, na taṃ iccheyya passituṃ.
atk-s0513a4:6129_0: Kibbisaṃ yaṃ karitvāna, idaṃ dukkhaṃ upāgamī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:6130_1: Mittāmaccaparibyūḷhoti mittehi ca daḷhabhattīhi amaccehi ca parivuto.
atk-s0513a4:6130_3: Setanti setakuṭṭhena setaṃ kabarakuṭṭhena vicitraṃ paribhinnena kaṇḍūyanakilāsakuṭṭhena kilāsinaṃ vedanāppattaṃ kadalipaṇṇe nipannaṃ addasa.
atk-s0513a4:6130_4: Viddhastaṃ koviḷāraṃvāti vaṇamukhehi paggharantena maṃsena viddhastaṃ pupphitakoviḷārasadisaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:6130_7: Yakkhānanti yakkhānaṃ antare tvaṃ katarayakkho nāmāsi.
atk-s0513a4:6130_10: Nāññanti aññaṃ purisaṃ edisaṃ na passāmi.
atk-s0513a4:6130_16: Kiṃ kammamakaranti ito pubbe kiṃ kammaṃ akaraṃ,
atk-s0513a4:6149_0: Tato sā bhañjatha sākhā, chinnā pharasunā viya.
atk-s0513a4:6154_0: “Yasmā ca vāri gambhīraṃ, tasmā na samapajjisaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:6155_0: Tattha sesiṃ nirānando, anūnā dasa rattiyo.
atk-s0513a4:6160_0: “So maṃ disvā kisaṃ paṇḍuṃ, kāruññamakaraṃ mayi;
atk-s0513a4:6161_0: Ambho ko nāma so ettha, evaṃ dukkhena aṭṭito.
atk-s0513a4:6166_0: “Manussohaṃ byasampatto, sā me natthi ito gati;
atk-s0513a4:6167_0: Taṃ vo vadāmi bhaddaṃ vo, tvañca me saraṇaṃ bhava.
atk-s0513a4:6178_0: “So maṃ tato samuṭṭhāsi, tejassī balavā kapi;
atk-s0513a4:6182_0: Iṅgha maṃ samma rakkhassu, pasupissaṃ muhuttakaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:6185_0: Te maṃ pamattaṃ hiṃseyyuṃ, te tvaṃ disvā nivāraya.
atk-s0513a4:6190_0: “Bhakkho ayaṃ manussānaṃ, yathā caññe vane migā;
atk-s0513a4:6191_0: Yaṃ nūnimaṃ vadhitvāna, chāto khādeyya vānaraṃ.
atk-s0513a4:6202_0: “Māyyo maṃ kari bhaddante, tvañca nāmedisaṃ kari;
atk-s0513a4:6203_0: Tvañca kho nāma dīghāvu, aññe vāretumarahasi.
atk-s0513a4:6206_0: Edisā visamā duggā, papātā uddhato mayā.
atk-s0513a4:6209_0: Taṃ tena pāpakammena, pāpaṃ pāpena cintitaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:6211_0: “Mā heva tvaṃ adhammaṭṭha, vedanaṃ kaṭukaṃ phusi;
atk-s0513a4:6212_0: Mā heva pāpakammaṃ taṃ, phalaṃ veḷuṃva taṃ vadhi.
atk-s0513a4:6215_0: Ehi me piṭṭhito gaccha, dissamānova santike.
atk-s0513a4:6218_0: Esa maggo adhammaṭṭha, tena gaccha yathāsukhaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:6233_0: Yena yeneva gacchāmi, gāmesu nigamesu ca.
atk-s0513a4:6238_0: “Etādisaṃ idaṃ dukkhaṃ, satta vassāni dāni me;
atk-s0513a4:6242_0: Māssu mittāna dubbhittho, mittadubbho hi pāpako.
atk-s0513a4:6246_0: Tattha kusaloti yathā cheko kusalo katheti,
atk-s0513a4:6246_12: Tattha hessāmīti tasmiṃ rukkhe suhito bhavissāmīti āruḷhomhi.
atk-s0513a4:6246_13: Tato sā bhañjatha sākhāti tassa abhipatthitassa atthāya hatthe pasārite sā mayā abhiruḷhā sākhā pharasunā chinnā viya abhañjatha.
atk-s0513a4:6247_4: Akaraṃ mayīti akarā mayi. Ambhoti, mahārāja,
atk-s0513a4:6247_5: so kapirājā tasmiṃ narakapapāte mama udakapothanasaddaṃ sutvā maṃ “ambho”ti ālapitvā “ko nāmeso”ti pucchi.
atk-s0513a4:6247_11: so kapirājā mayā evaṃ vutte “mā bhāyī”ti maṃ assāsetvā paṭhamaṃ tāva garuṃ silaṃ gahetvā yoggaṃ karonto pabbate vicari.
atk-s0513a4:6247_12: Nisabhoti purisanisabho uttamavānarindo pabbatapapāte ṭhatvā maṃ etadabravīti.
atk-s0513a4:6248_0: Bāhubhīti dvīhi bāhāhi mama gīvaṃ suggahitaṃ gaṇha.
atk-s0513a4:6248_3: Aggahinti saṭṭhihatthaṃ narakapapātaṃ vātavegena otaritvā udakapiṭṭhe ṭhitassa ahaṃ vegena piṭṭhimabhiruhitvā ubhohi bāhāhi gīvaṃ aggahesiṃ.
atk-s0513a4:6248_8: Rakkhassūti ahaṃ taṃ uddharanto kilanto muhuttaṃ vissamanto pasupissaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:6248_10: Yathā caññe vane migāti sīhādīhi aññepi ye imasmiṃ vane vāḷamigā.
atk-s0513a4:6248_13: evaṃ so kapirājā maṃ attano parittāṇaṃ katvā muhuttaṃ pasupi.
atk-s0513a4:6248_18: Matthakaṃ sannitāḷayinti tassa vānarindassa matthakaṃ pahariṃ.
atk-s0513a4:6249_2: Māyyoti tena mittadubbhipurisena silāya paviddhāya mahācammaṃ chinditvā olambi,
atk-s0513a4:6249_6: idaṃ bhayaṃ imaṃ purisaṃ nissāya uppanna”nti.
atk-s0513a4:6249_7: So maraṇabhayabhīto olambantaṃ cammabandhaṃ hatthena gahetvā uppatitvā sākhaṃ abhiruyha tena pāpapurisena saddhiṃ sallapanto “māyyo ma”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0513a4:6249_8: Tattha māyyo maṃ kari bhaddanteti mā akari ayyo maṃ bhaddanteti taṃ nivāreti.
atk-s0513a4:6249_9: Tvañca kho nāmāti tvaṃ nāma evaṃ mayā papātā uddhaṭo edisaṃ pharusakammaṃ mayi kari,
atk-s0513a4:6249_15: Vedanaṃ kaṭukanti evaṃ santepi tvaṃ adhammaṭṭha yādisaṃ vedanaṃ ahaṃ phusāmi,
atk-s0513a4:6249_17: taṃ pāpakammaṃ phalaṃ veḷuṃva taṃ mā vadhi. Iti maṃ, mahārāja,
atk-s0513a4:6250_1: mayā kataṃ dosaṃ hadaye mā kari,
atk-s0513a4:6250_2: mā maṃ asappurisaṃ evarūpe araññe nāsaya,
atk-s0513a4:6250_7: Evaṃ vutte so mayā saddhiṃ sallapanto “tayi me natthi vissāso”ti ādimāha.
atk-s0513a4:6250_8: Tattha tayīti ito paṭṭhāya mayhaṃ tayi vissāso natthi. Ehīti,
atk-s0513a4:6250_10: ahaṃ tayā saddhiṃ maggena na gamissāmi,
atk-s0513a4:6250_11: tvaṃ pana ehi mama piṭṭhito avidūre dissamānasarīrova gaccha,
atk-s0513a4:6250_17: Pattosi mānusiṃ padanti manussūpacāraṃ patto āgatosi,
atk-s0513a4:6251_11: So kira pipāsaṃ sandhāretuṃ asakkonto udakañjaliṃ ukkhipitvā thokaṃ pivitvā sesaṃ sarīre siñci.
atk-s0513a4:6251_12: Athassa tāvadeva udakabindugaṇanāya aḍḍhabeluvapakkappamāṇā gaṇḍā uṭṭhahiṃsu,
atk-s0513a4:6251_14: Pabhinnāti te gaṇḍā taṃ divasameva bhijjitvā kuṇapā pūtigandhikā hutvā pubbalohitāni pagghariṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:6251_17: Māssu orena āgamāti duṭṭhasatta orena māssu āgamā,
atk-s0513a4:6251_18: amhākaṃ santikaṃ mā āgamīti evaṃ vadantā maṃ nivārentīti attho.
atk-s0513a4:6251_20: tato paṭṭhāya idāni satta vassāni mama ettakaṃ kālaṃ sakaṃ kammaṃ anubhomi.
atk-s0513a4:6252_2: maññeva oloketvā evarūpaṃ kammaṃ na kenaci kattabba”nti vatvā “taṃ vo”tiādimāha.
atk-s0513a4:6256_0: Ayaṃ abhisambuddhagāthā. Bhikkhave, yo idha loke mittāni dubbhati hiṃsati, so evarūpo hotīti attho.
atk-s0513a4:6257_0: Tassapi purisassa raññā saddhiṃ kathentasseva pathavī vivaraṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a4:6257_2: Rājā tasmiṃ pathaviṃ paviṭṭhe uyyānā nikkhamitvā nagaraṃ paviṭṭho.
atk-s0513a4:6258_2: pubbepi devadatto mayhaṃ silaṃ paṭivijjhiyevā”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a4:6262_0: 224-257. Sace vo vuyhamānānanti dakarakkhasajātakaṃ. Taṃ sabbaṃ mahāumaṅgajātake āvi bhavissatīti.
atk-s0513a4:6266_0: Vikiṇṇavācanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto musāvādaṃ katvā devadattassa pathavippavesanaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:6266_1: Tadā hi satthā bhikkhūhi tassa avaṇṇe kathite “na,
atk-s0513a4:6266_3: pubbepi devadatto musāvādaṃ katvā pathaviṃ paviṭṭhoyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:6267_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente pañcasatavāṇijā nāvāya samuddaṃ pakkhanditvā sattame divase
atk-s0513a4:6267_1: atīradassaniyā nāvāya samuddapiṭṭhe bhinnāya ṭhapetvā ekaṃ avasesā macchakacchapabhakkhā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0513a4:6267_2: eko pana vātavegena karampiyapaṭṭanaṃ nāma pāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a4:6267_3: So samuddato uttaritvā naggabhogo tasmiṃ paṭṭaneyeva bhikkhāya cari.
atk-s0513a4:6267_4: Tamenaṃ manussā “ayaṃ samaṇo appiccho santuṭṭho”ti sambhāvetvā sakkāraṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:6267_5: So “laddho me jīvikūpāyo”ti tesu nivāsanapārupanaṃ dentesupi na icchi.
atk-s0513a4:6267_6: Te “natthi ito uttari appiccho samaṇo”ti bhiyyo bhiyyo pasīditvā tassa assamapadaṃ katvā tattha naṃ nivāsāpesuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:6268_0: Eko nāgarājāpissa supaṇṇarājā ca upaṭṭhānaṃ āgacchanti.
atk-s0513a4:6268_2: Athekadivasaṃ supaṇṇarājā tassa santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno evamāha – “bhante,
atk-s0513a4:6268_3: amhākaṃ ñātakā nāge gaṇhantā bahū vinassanti,
atk-s0513a4:6268_4: etesaṃ nāgānaṃ gahaṇaniyāmaṃ mayaṃ na jānāma,
atk-s0513a4:6268_6: sakkuṇeyyātha nu kho tumhe ete piyāyamānā viya taṃ kāraṇaṃ pucchitu”nti.
atk-s0513a4:6268_7: So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā supaṇṇarāje vanditvā pakkante nāgarājassa āgatakāle vanditvā nisinnaṃ nāgarājānaṃ pucchi –
atk-s0513a4:6268_9: supaṇṇā kira tumhe gaṇhantā bahū vinassanti,
atk-s0513a4:6268_10: tumhe gaṇhantā kathaṃ gaṇhituṃ na sakkontī”ti. Bhante,
atk-s0513a4:6268_12: mayā imaṃ kathentena ñātisaṅghassa maraṇaṃ āhaṭaṃ hotīti.
atk-s0513a4:6268_17: tvaṃ mayhaṃ saddahitvā nibbhayo hutvā kathehīti.
atk-s0513a4:6269_3: mama pucchantassa kimatthaṃ na kathesī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a4:6269_8: mayaṃ mahante mahante pāsāṇe gilitvā bhāriyā hutvā nipajjitvā supaṇṇānaṃ āgamanakāle mukhaṃ nibbāhetvā dante vivaritvā supaṇṇe ḍaṃsituṃ acchāma,
atk-s0513a4:6269_10: tesaṃ amhe garubhāre hutvā nipanne uddharituṃ vāyamantānaññeva udakaṃ ottharati.
atk-s0513a4:6269_13: tesaṃ amhe gaṇhantānaṃ kiṃ sīsena gahitena,
atk-s0513a4:6269_14: bālā naṅguṭṭhe gahetvā amhe heṭṭhāsīsake katvā gahitaṃ gocaraṃ mukhena chaḍḍāpetvā lahuke katvā gantuṃ
atk-s0513a4:6269_15: sakkontī”ti so attano rahassakāraṇaṃ tassa dussīlassa kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:6270_0: Atha tasmiṃ pakkante supaṇṇarājā āgantvā karampiyaacelaṃ vanditvā “kiṃ, bhante,
atk-s0513a4:6270_2: So “āmāvuso”ti vatvā sabbaṃ tena kathitaniyāmeneva kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:6270_4: ñātīnaṃ nāma nassananiyāmo parassa na kathetabbo, hotu,
atk-s0513a4:6270_5: ajjeva mayā supaṇṇavātaṃ katvā paṭhamaṃ etameva gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti supaṇṇavātaṃ katvā paṇḍaranāgarājānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:6270_6: naṅguṭṭhe gahetvā heṭṭhāsīsaṃ katvā gahitagocaraṃ chaḍḍāpetvā uppatitvā ākāsaṃ pakkhandi.
atk-s0513a4:6270_7: Paṇḍaro ākāse heṭṭhāsīsakaṃ olambanto “mayāva mama dukkhaṃ ābhata”nti paridevanto āha –
atk-s0513a4:6273_0: Bhayaṃ tamanveti sayaṃ abodhaṃ, nāgaṃ yathā paṇḍarakaṃ supaṇṇo.
atk-s0513a4:6275_0: “Yo guyhamantaṃ parirakkhaṇeyyaṃ, mohā naro saṃsati hāsamāno;
atk-s0513a4:6276_0: Taṃ bhinnamantaṃ bhayamanveti khippaṃ, nāgaṃ yathā paṇḍarakaṃ supaṇṇo.
atk-s0513a4:6279_0: Sumitto ca asambuddhaṃ, sambuddhaṃ vā anatthavā.
atk-s0513a4:6282_0: Tassāhamakkhiṃ vivariṃ guyhamatthaṃ, atītamattho kapaṇaṃ rudāmi.
atk-s0513a4:6284_0: “Tassāhaṃ paramaṃ brahme guyhaṃ, vācaṃ himaṃ nāsakkhiṃ saṃyametuṃ;
atk-s0513a4:6285_0: Tappakkhato hi bhayamāgataṃ mamaṃ, atītamattho kapaṇaṃ rudāmi.
atk-s0513a4:6287_0: “Yo ve naro suhadaṃ maññamāno, guyhamatthaṃ saṃsati dukkulīne;
atk-s0513a4:6288_0: Dosā bhayā athavā rāgarattā, pallatthito bālo asaṃsayaṃ so.
atk-s0513a4:6290_0: “Tirokkhavāco asataṃ paviṭṭho, yo saṅgatīsu mudīreti vākyaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:6291_0: Āsīviso dummukhotyāhu taṃ naraṃ, ārā ārā saṃyame tādisamhā.
atk-s0513a4:6294_0: Ohāya gacchāmase sabbakāme, supaṇṇa pāṇūpagatāva tyamhā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:6295_4: na sakkhissatī”ti puggalaṃ oloketuṃ upaparikkhituṃ asakkontaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:6295_5: Bhayaṃ tamanvetīti taṃ imehi catūhi aṅgehi samannāgataṃ abodhaṃ duppaññaṃ puggalaṃ sayaṃkatameva bhayaṃ anveti,
atk-s0513a4:6295_7: Saṃsati hāsamānoti rakkhituṃ asamatthassa pāpapurisassa hāsamāno katheti.
atk-s0513a4:6295_10: so guyhaṃ atthaṃ jānituṃ nārahatīti paridevati.
atk-s0513a4:6295_16: “yopi suhadayo mitto vā amitto vā appañño sappaññopi vā yo anatthavā anatthacaro,
atk-s0513a4:6296_0: Samaṇo ayanti ayaṃ samaṇoti ca lokasammatoti ca bhāvitattoti ca maññamāno ahaṃ etasmiṃ vissāsamāpajjiṃ.
atk-s0513a4:6296_3: atikkantattho hutvā idāni kapaṇaṃ rudāmīti paridevati.
atk-s0513a4:6296_6: Saṃyametunti imaṃ guyhavācaṃ rahassakāraṇaṃ rakkhituṃ nāsakkhiṃ.
atk-s0513a4:6296_7: Tappakkhato hīti idāni idaṃ bhayaṃ mama tassa acelakassa pakkhato koṭṭhāsato santikā āgataṃ,
atk-s0513a4:6296_11: Dosāti etehi dosādīhi kāraṇehi yo evarūpaṃ guyhaṃ saṃsati,
atk-s0513a4:6296_12: so bālo asaṃsayaṃ pallatthito parivattetvā pāpito,
atk-s0513a4:6297_2: Asataṃ paviṭṭhoti asappurisānaṃ antaraṃ paviṭṭho asappurisesu pariyāpanno.
atk-s0513a4:6297_3: Saṅgatīsu mudīretīti yo evarūpo paresaṃ rahassaṃ sutvāva parisamajjhesu “asukena asukaṃ nāma kataṃ vā vuttaṃ vā”ti vākyaṃ udīreti,
atk-s0513a4:6297_9: Ohāyāti ete dibbaannādayo sabbakāme ajja mayaṃ ohāya chaḍḍetvā gamissāma. Supaṇṇa,
atk-s0513a4:6298_0: Evaṃ paṇḍarako ākāse heṭṭhāsīsako olambanto aṭṭhahi gāthāhi paridevi.
atk-s0513a4:6298_2: “nāgarāja attano rahassaṃ acelakassa kathetvā idāni kimatthaṃ paridevasī”ti taṃ garahitvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:6300_0: “Ko nīdha tiṇṇaṃ garahaṃ upeti, asmiṃdha loke pāṇabhū nāgarāja;
atk-s0513a4:6301_0: Samaṇo supaṇṇo athavā tvameva, kiṃkāraṇā paṇḍarakaggahīto”ti.
atk-s0513a4:6302_0: Tattha ko nīdhāti idha amhesu tīsu janesu ko nu.
atk-s0513a4:6302_6: so hi upāyena taṃ rahassaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0513a4:6302_11: “ahaṃ kiṃkāraṇā supaṇṇena gahito”ti cintetvā ca pana attānameva garaha,
atk-s0513a4:6302_12: tayā hi rahassaṃ kathentena attanāva attano anattho katoti ayamettha adhippāyo.
atk-s0513a4:6305_0: “Samaṇoti me sammatatto ahosi, piyo ca me manasā bhāvitatto;
atk-s0513a4:6306_0: Tassāhamakkhiṃ vivariṃ guyhamatthaṃ, atītamattho kapaṇaṃ rudāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:6307_0: Tattha sammatattoti so samaṇo mayhaṃ “sappuriso aya”nti sammatabhāvo ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:6310_0: “Na catthi satto amaro pathabyā, paññāvidhā natthi na ninditabbā;
atk-s0513a4:6311_0: Saccena dhammena dhitiyā damena, alabbhamabyāharatī naro idha.
atk-s0513a4:6313_0: “Mātā pitā paramā bandhavānaṃ, nāssa tatiyo anukampakatthi;
atk-s0513a4:6314_0: Tesampi guyhaṃ paramaṃ na saṃse, mantassa bhedaṃ parisaṅkamāno.
