atk-s0513a4:6316_0: “Mātā pitā bhaginī bhātaro ca, sahāyā vā yassa honti sapakkhā;
atk-s0513a4:6317_0: Tesampi guyhaṃ paramaṃ na saṃse, mantassa bhedaṃ parisaṅkamāno.
atk-s0513a4:6321_0: Tassāpi guyhaṃ paramaṃ na saṃse, mantassa bhedaṃ parisaṅkamāno”ti.
atk-s0513a4:6322_0: Tattha amaroti amaraṇasabhāvo satto nāma natthi.
atk-s0513a4:6322_7: sā aññesaṃ paññākoṭṭhāsasaṅkhātā paññāvidhā attano jīvitahetu na ninditabbāti.
atk-s0513a4:6322_8: Atha vā paññāvidhāti paññāsadisā na ninditabbā nāma aññā dhammajāti natthi,
atk-s0513a4:6322_12: Saccenātiādīsu vacīsaccena ca sucaritadhammena ca paññāsaṅkhātāya dhitiyā ca indriyadamena ca alabbhaṃ
atk-s0513a4:6322_13: dullabhaṃ aṭṭhasamāpattimaggaphalanibbānasaṅkhātampi visesaṃ abyāharati āvahati taṃ nipphādeti naro idha,
atk-s0513a4:6322_16: Acelena hi attano paññavantatāya upāyakusalatāya ca vañcetvā tvaṃ rahassaṃ guyhaṃ mantaṃ pucchitoti attho.
atk-s0513a4:6323_0: Paramāti ete ubho bandhavānaṃ uttamabandhavā nāma.
atk-s0513a4:6323_1: Nāssa tatiyoti assa puggalassa mātāpitūhi añño tatiyo satto anukampako nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a4:6323_2: mantassa bhedaṃ parisaṅkamāno paṇḍito tesaṃ mātāpitūnampi paramaṃ guyhaṃ na saṃseyya,
atk-s0513a4:6323_3: tvaṃ pana mātāpitūnampi akathetabbaṃ acelakassa kathesīti attho.
atk-s0513a4:6323_9: Bhariyā ceti komārī piyabhāṇinī puttehi ca rūpena ca yasena ca upetā evarūpā bhariyāpi ce “ācikkhāhi me tava guyha”nti vadeyya,
atk-s0513a4:6326_0: “Na guyhamatthaṃ vivareyya, rakkheyya naṃ yathā nidhiṃ;
atk-s0513a4:6327_0: Na hi pātukato sādhu, guyho attho pajānatā.
atk-s0513a4:6329_0: “Thiyā guyhaṃ na saṃseyya, amittassa ca paṇḍito;
atk-s0513a4:6330_0: Yo cāmisena saṃhīro, hadayattheno ca yo naro.
atk-s0513a4:6336_0: Tāvanto tassa ubbegā, tasmā guyhaṃ na vissaje;
atk-s0513a4:6338_0: “Vivicca bhāseyya divā rahassaṃ, rattiṃ giraṃ nātivelaṃ pamuñce;
atk-s0513a4:6339_0: Upassutikā hi suṇanti mantaṃ, tasmā manto khippamupeti bheda”nti. –
atk-s0513a4:6340_0: Pañca gāthā umaṅgajātake pañcapaṇḍitapañhe āvi bhavissanti.
atk-s0513a4:6343_0: “Yathāpi assa nagaraṃ mahantaṃ, advārakaṃ āyasaṃ bhaddasālaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:6344_0: Samantakhātāparikhāupetaṃ, evampi me te idha guyhamantā.
atk-s0513a4:6346_0: “Ye guyhamantā avikiṇṇavācā, daḷhā sadatthesu narā dujivha;
atk-s0513a4:6347_0: Ārā amittā byavajanti tehi, āsīvisā vā riva sattusaṅghā”ti. –
atk-s0513a4:6348_0: Dvīsu gāthāsu bhaddasālanti āpaṇādīhi sālāhi sampannaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:6348_2: Evampi meti evampi mayhaṃ te purisā khāyanti. Katare?
atk-s0513a4:6348_5: yathā advārakassa ayomayanagarassa manussānaṃ upabhogaparibhogo antova hoti,
atk-s0513a4:6348_15: Āsīvisā vā riva sattusaṅghāti ettha vāti nipātamattaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:6348_17: Yathā āsīvisato sattusaṅghā jīvitukāmā manussā ārā paṭikkamanti,
atk-s0513a4:6348_18: evaṃ tehi guyhamantehi narehi ārā amittā paṭikkamanti,
atk-s0513a4:6348_19: upagantuṃ okāsaṃ na labhantīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0513a4:6349_0: Evaṃ supaṇṇena dhamme kathite paṇḍarako āha –
atk-s0513a4:6351_0: “Hitvā gharaṃ pabbajito acelo, naggo muṇḍo carati ghāsahetu;
atk-s0513a4:6352_0: Tamhi nu kho vivariṃ guyhamatthaṃ, atthā ca dhammā ca apaggatāmhā.
atk-s0513a4:6354_0: “Kathaṃkaro hoti supaṇṇarāja, kiṃsīlo kena vatena vattaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:6355_0: Samaṇo caraṃ hitvā mamāyitāni, kathaṃkaro saggamupeti ṭhāna”nti.
atk-s0513a4:6356_0: Tattha ghāsahetūti nissiriko kucchipūraṇatthāya khādanīyabhojanīye pariyesanto carati.
atk-s0513a4:6356_2: Kathaṃkaroti idaṃ nāgarājā tassa naggassa samaṇabhāvaṃ ñatvā samaṇapaṭipattiṃ pucchanto āha.
atk-s0513a4:6356_5: Samaṇo caranti pabbajjāya caranto taṇhāmamāyitāni hitvā kathaṃ samitapāpasamaṇo nāma hoti.
atk-s0513a4:6356_6: Sagganti kathaṃ karonto ca suṭṭhu aggaṃ devanagaraṃ so samaṇo upetīti.
atk-s0513a4:6360_0: Samaṇo caraṃ hitvā mamāyitāni, evaṃkaro saggamupeti ṭhāna”nti.
atk-s0513a4:6361_2: ajjhattabahiddhāsamuṭṭhānehi hirottappehi titikkhāsaṅkhātāya adhivāsanakhantiyā indriyadamena ca upeto
atk-s0513a4:6361_3: akujjhanasīlo pisuṇavācaṃ pahāya taṇhāmamāyitāni ca hitvā pabbajjāya caranto samaṇo nāma hoti,
atk-s0513a4:6361_4: evaṃkaroyeva ca etāni hirīādīni kusalāni karonto saggamupeti ṭhānanti.
atk-s0513a4:6362_0: Idaṃ supaṇṇarājassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā paṇḍarako jīvitaṃ yācanto gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:6364_0: “Mātāva puttaṃ taruṇaṃ tanujjaṃ, samphassatā sabbagattaṃ phareti;
atk-s0513a4:6365_0: Evampi me tvaṃ pāturahu dijinda, mātāva puttaṃ anukampamāno”ti.
atk-s0513a4:6366_1: yathā mātā tanujaṃ attano sarīrajātaṃ taruṇaṃ puttaṃ samphassataṃ disvā taṃ ure nipajjāpetvā thaññaṃ
atk-s0513a4:6366_2: pāyentī puttasamphassena sabbaṃ attano gattaṃ phareti,
atk-s0513a4:6366_3: napi mātā puttato bhāyati napi putto mātito,
atk-s0513a4:6366_4: evampi me tvaṃ pāturahu pātubhūto dijinda dijarāja,
atk-s0513a4:6366_5: tasmā mātāva puttaṃ mudukena hadayena anukampamāno maṃ passa,
atk-s0513a4:6367_0: Athassa supaṇṇo jīvitaṃ dento itaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:6369_0: “Handajja tvaṃ muñca vadhā dujivha, tayo hi puttā na hi añño atthi;
atk-s0513a4:6370_0: Antevāsī dinnako atrajo ca, rajjassu puttaññataro me ahosī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:6371_3: Aññoti añño catuttho putto nāma natthi.
atk-s0513a4:6371_4: Antevāsīti sippaṃ vā uggaṇhamāno pañhaṃ vā suṇanto santike nivuttho.
atk-s0513a4:6371_5: Dinnakoti “ayaṃ te putto hotū”ti parehi dinno.
atk-s0513a4:6371_7: Aññataroti tīsu puttesu aññataro antevāsī putto me tvaṃ jātoti dīpeti.
atk-s0513a4:6372_0: Evañca pana vatvā ākāsā otaritvā taṃ bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0513a4:6372_1: Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:6374_0: “Icceva vākyaṃ visajjī supaṇṇo, bhumyaṃ patiṭṭhāya dijo dujivhaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:6375_0: Muttajja tvaṃ sabbabhayātivatto, thalūdake hohi mayābhigutto.
atk-s0513a4:6377_0: “Ātaṅkinaṃ yathā kusalo bhisakko, pipāsitānaṃ rahadova sīto;
atk-s0513a4:6378_0: Vesmaṃ yathā himasītaṭṭitānaṃ, evampi te saraṇamahaṃ bhavāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:6379_0: Tattha icceva vākyanti iti evaṃ vacanaṃ vatvā taṃ nāgarājaṃ vissajji.
atk-s0513a4:6379_1: Bhumyanti so sayampi bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhāya dijo taṃ dujivhaṃ samassāsento mutto ajja tvaṃ ito paṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a4:6379_2: sabbabhayāni ativatto thale ca udake ca mayā abhigutto rakkhito hohīti āha.
atk-s0513a4:6379_4: Evampi teti evaṃ ahaṃ tava saraṇaṃ bhavāmi.
atk-s0513a4:6380_2: Itaropi supaṇṇabhavanaṃ gantvā “mayā paṇḍarakanāgo sapathaṃ katvā saddahāpetvā vissajjito,
atk-s0513a4:6380_3: kīdisaṃ nu kho mayi tassa hadayaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:6380_4: vīmaṃsissāmi na”nti nāgabhavanaṃ gantvā supaṇṇavātaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a4:6380_5: Taṃ disvā nāgo “supaṇṇarājā maṃ gahetuṃ āgato bhavissatī”ti maññamāno byāmasahassamattaṃ attabhāvaṃ māpetvā
atk-s0513a4:6380_6: pāsāṇe ca vālukañca gilitvā bhāriyo hutvā naṅguṭṭhaṃ heṭṭhākatvā bhogamatthake phaṇaṃ dhārayamāno nipajjitvā
atk-s0513a4:6383_0: Vivariya dāṭhaṃ sesi, kuto taṃ bhayamāgata”nti.
atk-s0513a4:6384_0: Taṃ sutvā nāgarājā tisso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:6389_0: “Kathaṃ nu vissase tyamhi, yenāsi kalaho kato;
atk-s0513a4:6390_0: Niccayattena ṭhātabbaṃ, so disabbhi na rajjati.
atk-s0513a4:6392_0: “Vissāsaye na ca taṃ vissayeyya, asaṅkito saṅkito ca bhaveyya;
atk-s0513a4:6393_0: Tathā tathā viññū parakkameyya, yathā yathā bhāvaṃ paro na jaññā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:6394_0: Tattha abhayāti abhayaṭṭhānabhūtā mittamhā bhayaṃ uppannaṃ jīvitasaṅkhātāni mūlāneva kantati.
atk-s0513a4:6394_2: Yenāsīti yena saddhiṃ kalaho kato ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:6394_4: So disabbhi na rajjatīti yo niccayattena abhitiṭṭhati,
atk-s0513a4:6394_5: so attano sattūhi saddhiṃ vissāsavasena na rajjati,
atk-s0513a4:6394_6: tato tesaṃ yathākāmakaraṇīyo na hotīti attho.
atk-s0513a4:6394_9: Parena asaṅkito attanā ca so saṅkito bhaveyya.
atk-s0513a4:6394_10: Bhāvaṃ paroti yathā yathā paṇḍito parakkamati,
atk-s0513a4:6394_11: tathā tathā tassa paro bhāvaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0513a4:6395_0: Iti te aññamaññaṃ sallapitvā samaggā sammodamānā ubhopi acelakassa assamaṃ agamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:6397_0: “Te devavaṇṇā sukhumālarūpā, ubho samā sujayā puññakhandhā;
atk-s0513a4:6398_0: Upāgamuṃ karampiyaṃ acelaṃ, missībhūtā assavāhāva nāgā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:6399_4: Missībhūtāti hatthena hatthaṃ gahetvā kāyamissībhāvaṃ upagatā.
atk-s0513a4:6399_5: Assavāhāva nāgāti dhure yuttakā rathavāhā dve assā viya purisanāgā tassa assamaṃ agamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:6400_3: So bahi ṭhatvā nāgarājānameva tassa santikaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0513a4:6402_0: “Tato have paṇḍarako acelaṃ, sayamevupāgamma idaṃ avoca;
atk-s0513a4:6403_0: Muttajjahaṃ sabbabhayātivatto, na hi nūna tuyhaṃ manaso piyamhā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:6404_0: Tattha piyamhāti dussīlanaggabhoggamusāvādi nūna mayaṃ tava manaso na piyā ahumhāti paribhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:6407_0: “Piyo hi me āsi supaṇṇarājā, asaṃsayaṃ paṇḍarakena saccaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:6408_0: So rāgarattova akāsimetaṃ, pāpakammaṃ sampajāno na mohā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:6409_0: Tattha paṇḍarakenāti tayā paṇḍarakena so mama piyataro ahosi,
atk-s0513a4:6409_2: Soti so ahaṃ tasmiṃ supaṇṇe rāgena ratto hutvā etaṃ pāpakammaṃ jānantova akāsiṃ,
atk-s0513a4:6410_0: Taṃ sutvā nāgarājā dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:6412_0: “Na me piyaṃ appiyaṃ vāpi hoti, sampassato lokamimaṃ parañca;
atk-s0513a4:6416_0: Kaṇhābhijātikosi anariyarūpo, pāpaṃ bahuṃ duccaritaṃ acārī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:6417_0: Tattha na meti ambho dussīlanaggamusāvādi pabbajitassa hi imañca parañca lokaṃ sampassato piyaṃ vā me appiyaṃ vāpi meti na hoti,
atk-s0513a4:6417_1: tvaṃ pana susaññatānaṃ sīlavantānaṃ byañjanena pabbajitaliṅgena asaññato hutvā imaṃ lokaṃ vañcento carasi.
atk-s0513a4:6418_0: Iti taṃ garahitvā idāni abhisapanto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:6420_0: “Aduṭṭhassa tuvaṃ dubbhi, dubbhī ca pisuṇo casi;
atk-s0513a4:6421_0: Etena saccavajjena, muddhā te phalatu sattadhā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:6422_1: ambho dubbhi tvaṃ aduṭṭhassa mittassa dubbhī cāsi,
atk-s0513a4:6422_3: etena saccavajjena muddhā te sattadhā phalatūti.
atk-s0513a4:6423_0: Iti nāgarājassa sapantasseva acelakassa sīsaṃ sattadhā phali.
atk-s0513a4:6423_4: Satthā tassa pathaviṃ paviṭṭhabhāvaṃ pakāsento osānagāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:6425_0: “Tasmā hi mittānaṃ na dubbhitabbaṃ, mittadubbhā pāpiyo natthi añño;
atk-s0513a4:6426_0: Āsittasatto nihato pathabyā, indassa vākyena hi saṃvaro hato”ti.
atk-s0513a4:6427_0: Tattha tasmāti yasmā mittadubbhikammassa pharuso vipāko, tasmā.
atk-s0513a4:6427_3: Saṃvaroti “ahaṃ saṃvare ṭhitosmī”ti paṭiññāya evaṃ paññāto ājīvako hatoti.
atk-s0513a4:6428_2: pubbepi devadatto musāvādaṃ katvā pathaviṃ paviṭṭhoyevā”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a4:6432_0: Kā vedhamānāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto mallikaṃ deviṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:6432_2: Sā pana tathāgatassa tiṇṇaṃ kummāsapiṇḍikānaṃ dānānubhāvena taṃ divasaññeva rañño aggamahesibhāvaṃ patvā
atk-s0513a4:6432_3: pubbuṭṭhāyitādīhi pañcahi kalyāṇadhammehi samannāgatā ñāṇasampannā buddhupaṭṭhāyikā patidevatā ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:6432_6: mallikā devī kira vattasampannā ñāṇasampannā patidevatā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:6432_9: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a4:6432_11: pubbepesā vattasampannā patidevatāyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a4:6433_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadattassa rañño sotthiseno nāma putto ahosi.
atk-s0513a4:6433_2: sambulā nāmassa aggamahesī ahosi uttamarūpadharā sarīrappabhāsampannā,
atk-s0513a4:6433_6: So bhijjamāne kuṭṭhe paṭikūlo hutvā vippaṭisāraṃ patvā “ko me rajjena attho,
atk-s0513a4:6433_7: araññe anāthamaraṇaṃ marissāmī”ti rañño ārocāpetvā itthāgāraṃ chaḍḍetvā nikkhami.
atk-s0513a4:6433_8: Sambulā bahūhi upāyehi nivattiyamānāpi anivattitvāva “ahaṃ taṃ sāmikaṃ araññe paṭijaggissāmī”ti vatvā saddhiññeva nikkhami.
atk-s0513a4:6433_9: So araññaṃ pavisitvā sulabhamūlaphalāphale chāyūdakasampanne padese paṇṇasālaṃ katvā vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0513a4:6433_11: Sā hi pāto vuṭṭhāya assamapadaṃ sammajjitvā pānīyaparibhojanīyaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā dantakaṭṭhañca mukhadhovanañca
atk-s0513a4:6433_12: upanāmetvā mukhe dhote nānāosadhāni pisitvā tassa vaṇe makkhetvā madhuramadhurāni phalāphalāni khādāpetvā
atk-s0513a4:6433_13: mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā hatthesu dhotesu “appamatto hohi devā”ti vatvā vanditvā pacchikhaṇittiaṅkusake ādāya
atk-s0513a4:6433_14: phalāphalatthāya araññaṃ pavisitvā phalāphalāni āharitvā ekamante ṭhapetvā ghaṭena udakaṃ āharitvā nānācuṇṇehi
atk-s0513a4:6433_15: ca mattikāhi ca sotthisenaṃ nhāpetvā puna madhuraphalāphalāni upanāmeti.
atk-s0513a4:6433_16: Paribhogāvasāne vāsitapānīyaṃ upanetvā sayaṃ phalāphalāni paribhuñjitvā padarasantharaṃ saṃvidahitvā
atk-s0513a4:6433_17: tasmiṃ tattha nipanne tassa pāde dhovitvā sīsaparikammapiṭṭhiparikammapādaparikammāni katvā sayanapassaṃ
atk-s0513a4:6434_0: Sā ekadivasaṃ araññe phalāphalaṃ āharantī ekaṃ girikandaraṃ disvā sīsato pacchiṃ otāretvā kandaratīre
atk-s0513a4:6434_1: ṭhapetvā “nhāyissāmī”ti otaritvā haliddāya sarīraṃ ubbaṭṭetvā nhatvā sudhotasarīrā uttaritvā vākacīraṃ
atk-s0513a4:6434_4: Tasmiṃ khaṇe eko dānavo gocaratthāya caranto taṃ disvā paṭibaddhacitto hutvā gāthādvayaṃ āha –
atk-s0513a4:6436_0: “Kā vedhamānā girikandarāyaṃ, ekā tuvaṃ tiṭṭhasi saṃhitūru;
atk-s0513a4:6437_0: Puṭṭhāsi me pāṇipameyyamajjhe, akkhāhi me nāmañca bandhave ca.
atk-s0513a4:6440_0: Kā vā tvamasi kalyāṇi, kassa vā tvaṃ sumajjhime;
atk-s0513a4:6441_0: Abhivādemi taṃ bhadde, dānavāhaṃ namatthu te”ti.
atk-s0513a4:6442_0: Tattha kā vedhamānāti nhānamattatāya sītabhāvena kampamānā.
atk-s0513a4:6442_3: Kā vā tvanti kā nāma vā tvaṃ bhavasi.
atk-s0513a4:6443_0: Sā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā tisso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:6446_0: Tassāhaṃ sambulā bhariyā, evaṃ jānāhi dānava;
atk-s0513a4:6447_0: Abhivādemi taṃ bhante, sambulāhaṃ namatthu te.
atk-s0513a4:6453_0: Yadāharāmi taṃ bhakkho, tassa nūnajja nādhatī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:6454_5: Madhumaṃsanti nimmakkhikaṃ madhuñca migābilamaṃsañca sīhabyagghamigehi khāditamaṃsato atirittakoṭṭhāsaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:6454_8: Tassa nūnajjāti tassa maññe ajja āhāraṃ alabhamānassa sarīraṃ ātape pakkhittapadumaṃ viya nādhati upatappati milāyati.
atk-s0513a4:6455_0: Tato paraṃ dānavassa ca tassā ca vacanapaṭivacanagāthāyo honti –
atk-s0513a4:6458_0: Sambule pariciṇṇena, ahaṃ bhattā bhavāmi te.
atk-s0513a4:6467_0: Sabbaṃ taṃ pacuraṃ mayhaṃ, ramassvajja mayā saha.
atk-s0513a4:6470_0: Alaṃ tvaṃ pātarāsāya, paṇhe bhakkhā bhavissasi.
atk-s0513a4:6473_0: Vane nāthaṃ apassantiṃ, sambulaṃ aggahī bhuje.
atk-s0513a4:6478_0: “Na me idaṃ tathā dukkhaṃ, yaṃ maṃ khādeyya rakkhaso;
atk-s0513a4:6479_0: Yañca me ayyaputtassa, mano hessati aññathā.
atk-s0513a4:6481_0: “Na santi devā pavasanti nūna, na hi nūna santi idha lokapālā;
atk-s0513a4:6482_0: Sahasā karontānamasaññatānaṃ, na hi nūna santi paṭisedhitāro”ti.
atk-s0513a4:6483_0: Tattha pariciṇṇenāti tena āturena pariciṇṇena kiṃ karissasi.
atk-s0513a4:6483_8: Catussatāti tasmiṃ me vimāne aparāpi catussatā bhariyāyo atthi.
atk-s0513a4:6483_9: Sabbaṃ tanti yaṃ kiñci upabhogaparibhogavatthābharaṇādikaṃ icchasi,
atk-s0513a4:6483_10: sabbaṃ taṃ nūna mayhaṃ pacuraṃ bahuṃ sulabhaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:6484_1: sambule no ce me tvaṃ mahesibhāvaṃ kāressasi,
atk-s0513a4:6484_4: tatra maṃ asaṅgaṇhantī mama sve pātova bhakkhā bhavissasī”ti evaṃ vatvā so sattahi jaṭāhi samannāgato
atk-s0513a4:6484_5: luddako dāruṇo nikkhantadanto taṃ tasmiṃ vane kiñci attano nāthaṃ apassantiṃ sambulaṃ bhuje aggahesi.
atk-s0513a4:6484_9: Mano hessatīti maṃ cirāyantiṃ viditvā aññathā cittaṃ bhavissati.
atk-s0513a4:6484_10: Na santi devāti idaṃ sā dānavena bhuje gahitā devatujjhāpanaṃ karontī āha.
atk-s0513a4:6484_11: Lokapālāti evarūpānaṃ sīlavantīnaṃ patidevatānaṃ pālakā lokapālā nūna idha loke na santīti paridevati.
atk-s0513a4:6485_2: Sakko āvajjento taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā vajiraṃ ādāya vegena gantvā dānavassa matthake ṭhatvā itaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:6488_0: Tañce tuvaṃ rakkhasādesi kaññaṃ, muddhā ca hi sattadhā te phaleyya;
atk-s0513a4:6490_4: Phaleyyāti iminā me indavajirena paharitvā muddhā bhijjetha.
atk-s0513a4:6490_5: Mā tvaṃ dahīti tvaṃ imaṃ patibbataṃ mā tāpeyyāsīti.
atk-s0513a4:6491_1: Sakko “punapi esa evarūpaṃ kareyyā”ti cintetvā dānavaṃ devasaṅkhalikāya bandhitvā puna anāgamanāya tatiye pabbatantare vissajjesi,
atk-s0513a4:6491_3: Rājadhītāpi atthaṅgate sūriye candālokena assamaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a4:6491_4: Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā aṭṭha gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:6502_0: “Vande sīhe ca byagghe ca, ye ca aññe vane migā;
atk-s0513a4:6516_0: Tattha nīḷaṃ paḷinaṃ sakuṇīvāti yathā sakuṇikā mukhatuṇḍakena gocaraṃ gahetvā kenaci upaddavena sakuṇapotakānaṃ
atk-s0513a4:6516_2: yathā vā gatasiṅgaṃ nikkhantavacchakaṃ ālayaṃ suññaṃ vacchakasālaṃ vacchagiddhinī dhenu āgaccheyya,
atk-s0513a4:6516_4: Tadā hi sotthiseno sambulāya ciramānāya “itthiyo nāma lolā,
atk-s0513a4:6516_5: paccāmittampi me gahetvā āgaccheyyā”ti parisaṅkanto paṇṇasālato nikkhamitvā gacchantaraṃ pavisitvā nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:6516_8: Apassantīti tasmiṃ vane nāthaṃ attano patiṃ apassantī ito cito ca sandhāvamānā paridevesi.
atk-s0513a4:6517_0: Tattha samaṇe brāhmaṇeti samitapāpabāhitapāpe samaṇe brāhmaṇe.
atk-s0513a4:6517_1: Sampannacaraṇeti saha sīlena aṭṭhannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ vasena ca sampannacaraṇe ise vandeti evaṃ vatvā rājaputtaṃ apassantī tumhākaṃ saraṇaṃ gatā amhi.
atk-s0513a4:6517_5: Tiṇā latāni osajhoti antopheggubahisāratiṇāni ca latāni ca antosāraosadhiyo ca.
atk-s0513a4:6517_9: Tumhaṃmhīti rattiṃ sandhāya tampi amhīti āha.
atk-s0513a4:6518_0: Taṃ evaṃ paridevamānaṃ disvā sotthiseno cintesi –
atk-s0513a4:6518_5: pariggaṇhissāmi tāva na”nti gantvā paṇṇasāladvāre nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:6518_6: Sāpi paridevamānāva paṇṇasāladvāraṃ gantvā tassa pāde vanditvā “kuhiṃ gatosi,
atk-s0513a4:6518_9: tvaṃ aññesu divasesu na imāya velāya āgacchasi,
atk-s0513a4:6521_0: Kena nujja samāgacchi, ko te piyataro mayā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:6522_2: phalāphalāni ādāya āgacchantī ekaṃ dānavaṃ passiṃ,
atk-s0513a4:6522_3: so mayi paṭibaddhacitto hutvā maṃ hatthe gaṇhitvā ‘sace mama vacanaṃ na karosi,
atk-s0513a4:6522_5: ahaṃ tāya velāya taññeva anusocantī evaṃ paridevi”nti vatvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:6525_0: Na me idaṃ tathā dukkhaṃ, yaṃ maṃ khādeyya rakkhaso;
atk-s0513a4:6526_0: Yañca me ayyaputtassa, mano hessati aññathā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:6527_0: Athassa sesampi pavattiṃ ārocentī “tena panāhaṃ, deva,
atk-s0513a4:6527_1: dānavena gahitā attānaṃ vissajjāpetuṃ asakkontī devatujjhāpanakammaṃ akāsiṃ,
atk-s0513a4:6527_2: atha sakko vajirahattho āgantvā ākāse ṭhito dānavaṃ santajjetvā maṃ vissajjāpetvā taṃ devasaṅkhalikāya
atk-s0513a4:6527_4: evāhaṃ sakkaṃ nissāya jīvitaṃ labhi”nti āha.
atk-s0513a4:6531_2: ahaṃ taṃ asaddahantaṃ mama saccabaleneva tikicchissāmī”ti udakassa kalasaṃ pūretvā saccakiriyaṃ katvā tassa sīse udakaṃ āsiñcantī gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:6533_0: “Tathā maṃ saccaṃ pāletu, pālayissati ce mamaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:6536_8: Potthakesu pana “tathā maṃ saccaṃ pāletī”ti likhitaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:6537_0: Evaṃ tāya saccakiriyaṃ katvā udake āsittamatteyeva sotthisenassa kuṭṭhaṃ ambilena dhotaṃ viya tambamalaṃ tāvadeva apagacchi.
atk-s0513a4:6537_1: Te katipāhaṃ tattha vasitvā araññā nikkhamma bārāṇasiṃ patvā uyyānaṃ pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:6537_2: Rājā tesaṃ āgatabhāvaṃ ñatvā uyyānaṃ gantvā tattheva sotthisenassa chattaṃ ussāpetvā sambulaṃ aggamahesiṭṭhāne
atk-s0513a4:6537_3: abhisiñcāpetvā nagaraṃ pavesetvā sayaṃ isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā uyyāne vāsaṃ kappesi,
atk-s0513a4:6537_9: Sambulā sapattidosavasena kisā ahosi upaṇḍupaṇḍukajātā dhamanīsanthatagattā.
atk-s0513a4:6537_10: Sā ekadivasaṃ sokavinodanatthaṃ bhuñjituṃ āgatassa sasuratāpasassa santikaṃ gantvā taṃ katabhattakiccaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0513a4:6540_0: Dhanuggahānañca satāni soḷasa, kathaṃvidhe passasi bhadde sattavo”ti.
atk-s0513a4:6541_3: aparāni ca soḷasadhanuggahasatāni rattindivaṃ bārāṇasiṃ rakkhanti.
atk-s0513a4:6541_4: Evaṃ surakkhite nagare kathaṃvidhe tvaṃ sattavo passasi. Bhadde,
atk-s0513a4:6541_5: yassā tava sāsaṅkā sappaṭibhayā araññā āgatakālepi pabhāsampannaṃ sarīraṃ,
atk-s0513a4:6541_6: idāni pana milātā paṇḍupalāsavaṇṇā ativiya kilantindriyāsi,
atk-s0513a4:6542_0: Sā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “putto te, deva, mayi na purimasadiso”ti vatvā pañca gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:6545_0: Tāsaṃ suṇitvā mitagītavāditaṃ, na dāni me tāta tathā yathā pure.
atk-s0513a4:6548_0: Senopiyā tāta aninditaṅgiyo, khattiyakaññā paṭilobhayanti naṃ.
atk-s0513a4:6550_0: “Sace ahaṃ tāta tathā yathā pure, patiṃ tamuñchāya punā vane bhare;
atk-s0513a4:6551_0: Sammānaye maṃ na ca maṃ vimānaye, itopi me tāta tato varaṃ siyā.
atk-s0513a4:6554_0: Sabbaṅgupetā patino ca appiyā, abajjha tassā maraṇaṃ tato varaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:6556_0: “Api ce daliddā kapaṇā anāḷhiyā, kaṭādutīyā patino ca sā piyā;
atk-s0513a4:6557_0: Sabbaṅgupetāyapi appiyāya, ayameva seyyā kapaṇāpi yā piyā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:6558_4: Haṃsagaggarāti evarūpā haṃsā viya madhurassarā nāriyo passati.
atk-s0513a4:6558_5: Tāsanti so tava putto tāsaṃ nārīnaṃ mitagītavāditādīni suṇitvā idāni me, tāta,
atk-s0513a4:6558_12: Paṭilobhayanti nanti naṃ tava puttaṃ paṭilobhayanti.
atk-s0513a4:6559_1: yathā pure sace ahaṃ punapi taṃ patiṃ tatheva kuṭṭharogena vanaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ uñchāya tasmiṃ vane bhareyyaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:6559_2: punapi maṃ so sammāneyya na vimāneyya,
atk-s0513a4:6559_3: tato me itopi bārāṇasirajjato taṃ araññameva varaṃ siyā sapattidosena sussantiyāti dīpeti.
atk-s0513a4:6559_8: yā nārī vipulannapāne ghare ekikāva asapatti samānā vimaṭṭhābharaṇā nānālaṅkārehi alaṅkatā sabbehi guṇaṅgehi upetā patino ca appiyā hoti,
atk-s0513a4:6559_9: abajjha gīvāya valliyā vā rajjuyā vā bandhitvā tassā tato gharāvāsato maraṇameva varataranti.
atk-s0513a4:6559_12: Seyyāti kapaṇāpi samānā yā patino piyā,
atk-s0513a4:6560_0: Evaṃ tāya attano parisussanakāraṇe tāpasassa kathite tāpaso rājānaṃ pakkosāpetvā “tāta,
atk-s0513a4:6560_1: sotthisena tayi kuṭṭharogābhibhūte araññaṃ pavisante tayā saddhiṃ pavisitvā taṃ upaṭṭhahantī attano saccabalena
atk-s0513a4:6560_2: tava rogaṃ vūpasametvā yā te rajje patiṭṭhānakāraṇamakāsi,
atk-s0513a4:6560_6: mittadubbhikammaṃ nāmetaṃ pāpaka”nti vatvā puttaṃ ovadanto gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:6562_0: “Sudullabhitthī purisassa yā hitā, bhattitthiyā dullabho yo hito ca;
atk-s0513a4:6563_0: Hitā ca te sīlavatī ca bhariyā, janinda dhammaṃ cara sambulāyā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:6564_1: yā purisassa hitā muducittā anukampikā itthī,
atk-s0513a4:6564_2: yo ca bhattā itthiyā hito kataguṇaṃ jānāti,
atk-s0513a4:6564_4: Ayañca sambulā tuyhaṃ hitā ceva sīlasampannā ca,
atk-s0513a4:6565_0: Evaṃ so puttassa ovādaṃ datvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a4:6565_2: ettakaṃ kālaṃ mayā kataṃ dosaṃ khama,
atk-s0513a4:6565_3: ito paṭṭhāya sabbissariyaṃ tuyhameva dammī”ti vatvā osānagāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:6567_0: “Sace tuvaṃ vipule laddhabhoge, issāvatiṇṇā maraṇaṃ upesi;
atk-s0513a4:6568_0: Ahañca te bhadde imā rājakaññā, sabbe te vacanakarā bhavāmā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:6569_1: sambule sace tvaṃ ratanarāsimhi ṭhapetvā abhisittā aggamahesiṭṭhānavasena vipule bhoge labhitvāpi issāya otiṇṇā maraṇaṃ upesi,
atk-s0513a4:6569_2: ahañca imā ca rājakaññā sabbe tava vacanakarā bhavāma,
atk-s0513a4:6569_3: tvaṃ yathādhippāyaṃ imaṃ rajjaṃ vicārehīti sabbissariyaṃ tassā adāsi.
atk-s0513a4:6570_0: Tato paṭṭhāya ubho samaggavāsaṃ vasantā dānādīni puññāni karitvā yathākammaṃ gamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:6571_2: pubbepi mallikā patidevatāyevā”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā sambulā mallikā ahosi,
atk-s0513a4:6575_0: Appamādoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto rājovādaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a4:6575_2: Atīte pana kapilaraṭṭhe uttarapañcālanagare pañcālo nāma rājā agatigamane ṭhito adhammena pamatto rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a4:6575_4: Balipīḷitā raṭṭhavāsino puttadāre ādāya araññe migā viya cariṃsu,
atk-s0513a4:6575_6: Manussā rājapurisānaṃ bhayena divā gehe vasituṃ asakkontā gehāni kaṇṭakasākhāhi parikkhipitvā gehe rattiṃ
atk-s0513a4:6575_10: Tadā bodhisatto bahinagare gandhatindukarukkhe devatā hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0513a4:6575_11: anusaṃvaccharaṃ rañño santikā sahassagghanakaṃ balikammaṃ labhati.
atk-s0513a4:6575_15: ṭhapetvā maṃ añño rājānaṃ patirūpe nivesetuṃ samattho nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a4:6575_16: upakārako cāpi me anusaṃvaccharaṃ sahassagghanakabalinā pūjeti,
atk-s0513a4:6576_0: So rattibhāge rañño sirigabbhaṃ pavisitvā ussīsakapasse ṭhatvā obhāsaṃ vissajjetvā ākāse aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a4:6576_1: Rājā taṃ bālasūriyaṃ viya jalamānaṃ disvā “kosi tvaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:6576_7: “Kiṃ nāma ovādaṃ dassasī”ti evaṃ vutte mahāsatto,
atk-s0513a4:6576_10: tena te sakalaraṭṭhaṃ hataviluttaṃ viya vinaṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:6576_11: rājāno nāma pamādena rajjaṃ kārentā sakalaraṭṭhassa sāmino na honti,
atk-s0513a4:6576_12: diṭṭheva dhamme vināsaṃ patvā samparāye puna mahāniraye nibbattanti.
atk-s0513a4:6576_13: Tesu ca pamādaṃ āpannesu antojanā bahijanāpissa pamattāva honti,
atk-s0513a4:6576_14: tasmā raññā atirekena appamattena bhavitabba”nti vatvā dhammadesanaṃ paṭṭhapento imā ekādasa gāthā āha –
atk-s0513a4:6579_0: Appamattā na mīyanti, ye pamattā yathā matā.
atk-s0513a4:6582_0: Khayā padosā jāyanti, mā mado bharatūsabha.
atk-s0513a4:6584_0: “Bahū hi khattiyā jīnā, atthaṃ raṭṭhaṃ pamādino;
atk-s0513a4:6588_0: Sabbe bhogā vinassanti, rañño taṃ vuccate aghaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:6591_0: Iddhaṃ phītaṃ janapadaṃ, corā viddhaṃsayanti naṃ.
atk-s0513a4:6593_0: “Na te puttā bhavissanti, na hiraññaṃ na dhāniyaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:6597_0: Ñātimittā suhajjā ca, na taṃ maññanti māniyaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:6603_0: Sirī jahati dummedhaṃ, jiṇṇaṃva urago tacaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:6609_0: Tattha disvā ca sutvā ca, tato taṃ paṭipajjasī”ti.
atk-s0513a4:6610_3: Pamattā hi vipassanaṃ avaḍḍhetvā appaṭisandhikabhāvaṃ pattuṃ asakkontā punappunaṃ saṃsāre jāyanti ceva mīyanti ca,
atk-s0513a4:6610_5: Na mīyantīti vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā appaṭisandhikabhāvaṃ pattā puna saṃsāre anibbattattā na mīyanti nāma.
atk-s0513a4:6610_14: kalyāṇakammaṃ pūressāmī”ti ābhogo vā patthanā vā pariyuṭṭhānaṃ vā natthi apagataviññāṇattā,
atk-s0513a4:6611_1: ārogyayobbanajīvitamadasaṅkhātā tividhā madā pamādo nāma jāyati.
atk-s0513a4:6611_2: So madappatto pamādāpanno pāṇātipātādīni pāpakammāni karoti.
atk-s0513a4:6611_3: Atha naṃ rājāno chindāpenti vā hanāpenti vā,
atk-s0513a4:6611_6: Puna so dhanakkhayaṃ vā yasakkhayaṃ vā patto jīvituṃ asakkonto jīvitavuttatthāya kāyaduccaritādīni karoti,
atk-s0513a4:6611_8: tena taṃ vadāmi mā mado bharatūsabhāti,
atk-s0513a4:6611_10: Atthaṃ raṭṭhanti janapadavāsīnaṃ vuddhiñceva sakalaraṭṭhañca bahū pamādino jīnā.
atk-s0513a4:6611_16: Gāminoti gāmabhojakāpi te gāmāpi bahū pamādadosena jīnā parihīnā vinaṭṭhā.
atk-s0513a4:6611_18: gihīpi gharāvāsato ceva dhanadhaññādīhi ca bahū jīnā parihīnāti vadati.
atk-s0513a4:6612_2: Iddhaṃ phītanti annapānādinā samiddhaṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇādinā phītaṃ pupphitaṃ.
atk-s0513a4:6612_7: nāssa chattaṃ dassāmā”ti chattaṃ na denti.
atk-s0513a4:6612_8: Evametesaṃ paveṇipālakā puttā na honti nāma.
atk-s0513a4:6612_10: Rājānaṃ vāpīti sacepi so rājā hoti,
atk-s0513a4:6612_12: Māniyanti “ayaṃ rājā”ti garucittena sammānetabbaṃ katvā na maññanti.
atk-s0513a4:6612_13: Upajīvantāti upanissāya jīvantāpi ete ettakā janā garucittena maññitabbaṃ na maññanti.
atk-s0513a4:6613_1: Tacanti yathā urago jiṇṇatacaṃ jigucchanto jahati,
atk-s0513a4:6613_7: Appamattassa hi sausabhajeṭṭhako gogaṇo viya bhogā vaḍḍhanti.
atk-s0513a4:6613_8: Upassutinti janapadacārittasavanāya cārikaṃ attano sakalaraṭṭhe ca janapade ca cara.
atk-s0513a4:6613_9: Tatthāti tasmiṃ raṭṭhe caranto daṭṭhabbaṃ disvā sotabbaṃ sutvā attano guṇāguṇaṃ paccakkhaṃ katvā tato attano hitapaṭipattiṃ paṭipajjissasīti.
atk-s0513a4:6614_0: Iti mahāsatto ekādasahi gāthāhi rājānaṃ ovaditvā “gaccha papañcaṃ akatvā pariggaṇha raṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0513a4:6614_2: Rājāpi tassa vacanaṃ sutvā saṃvegappatto punadivase rajjaṃ amacce paṭicchāpetvā purohitena saddhiṃ kālasseva
atk-s0513a4:6614_4: Tattheko gāmavāsī mahallako aṭavito kaṇṭakasākhaṃ āharitvā gehadvāraṃ parikkhipitvā pidahitvā puttadāraṃ
atk-s0513a4:6614_5: ādāya araññaṃ pavisitvā sāyaṃ rājapurisesu pakkantesu attano gharaṃ āgacchanto gehadvāre pāde kaṇṭakena
atk-s0513a4:6618_3: Tasmiṃ pana samaye rājā ca purohito ca aññātakavesena tassa santikeva aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:6618_4: Athassa vacanaṃ sutvā purohito itaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:6621_0: Kiṃ tattha brahmadattassa, yaṃ taṃ maggeyya kaṇṭako”ti.
atk-s0513a4:6622_2: yadi tvaṃ attano abyattatāya kaṇṭakena viddho,
atk-s0513a4:6622_5: kiṃ te raññā kaṇṭako oloketvāva ācikkhitabboti.
atk-s0513a4:6623_0: Taṃ sutvā mahallako tisso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:6633_3: tvaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ rañño dosena mama sakaṇṭake magge vicaraṇabhāvaṃ na jānāsi.
atk-s0513a4:6633_13: Vane āhatva kaṇṭakanti kaṇṭakaṃ āharitvā dvārāni pidahitvā gharaṃ chaḍḍetvā puttadāraṃ ādāya vanaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0513a4:6634_5: Bodhisatto purohitassa sarīre adhimuccitvā purato gantvā “pariggaṇhissāma tāva,
atk-s0513a4:6634_7: Te tamhā gāmā aññaṃ gāmaṃ gacchantā antarāmagge ekissā mahallikāya saddaṃ assosuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:6634_8: Sā kirekā dalidditthī dve dhītaro vayappattā rakkhamānā tāsaṃ araññaṃ gantuṃ na deti.
atk-s0513a4:6634_9: Sayaṃ araññato dārūni ceva sākañca āharitvā dhītaro paṭijaggati.
atk-s0513a4:6634_10: Sā taṃ divasaṃ ekaṃ gumbaṃ āruyha sākaṃ gaṇhantī pavaṭṭamānā bhūmiyaṃ patitvā rājānaṃ maraṇena akkosantī gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:6638_3: Pāparañño pana rajje ahaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhomi,
atk-s0513a4:6639_0: Evaṃ bodhisattānubhāveneva sā akkosi. Atha naṃ purohito paṭisedhento gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:6643_0: Taṃ sutvā mahallikā dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:6650_0: Dujjīve dubbhare dāre, kuto bhattā kumāriyo”ti.
atk-s0513a4:6651_0: Tattha kovidatthapadāti ahaṃ atthapade kāraṇapade kovidā chekā,
atk-s0513a4:6651_2: Dujjīveti dujjīve raṭṭhe dubbhare dāre jāte manussesu bhītatasitesu araññe vasantesu kuto bhattā kumāriyo,
atk-s0513a4:6652_0: Te tassā vacanaṃ sutvā “yuttaṃ sā kathetī”ti tato paraṃ gacchantā ekassa kassakassa saddaṃ assosuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:6652_1: Tassa kira kasantassa sāliyo nāma balibaddo phālena pahaṭo sayi.
atk-s0513a4:6655_0: Yathāyaṃ kapaṇo seti, hato phālena sāliyo”ti.
atk-s0513a4:6656_0: Tattha yathāti yathā ayaṃ vedanāppatto sāliyabalibaddo seti, evaṃ sayatūti attho.
atk-s0513a4:6660_0: Yo tvaṃ sapasi rājānaṃ, aparajjhitvāna attano”ti.
atk-s0513a4:6662_0: Taṃ sutvā so tisso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:6670_0: “Sā nūna puna re pakkā, vikāle bhattamāhari;
atk-s0513a4:6672_4: sā bhattahārikā itthī pātova mama bhattaṃ pacitvā āharantī adhammabalisādhakehi brahmadattassa dāsehi palibuddhā bhavissati,
atk-s0513a4:6672_5: te parivisitvā puna mayhaṃ bhattaṃ pakkaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0513a4:6672_7: “ajja vikāle bhattaṃ āharī”ti cintetvā chātajjhatto ahaṃ taṃ bhattahāriṃ olokento goṇaṃ aṭṭhāne patodena vijjhiṃ,
atk-s0513a4:6672_8: tenesa pādaṃ ukkhipitvā phālaṃ paharanto hato phālena sāliyo.
atk-s0513a4:6672_9: Tasmā “esa mayā hato”ti saññaṃ mā kari,
atk-s0513a4:6673_0: Te purato gantvā ekasmiṃ gāme vasiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:6673_1: Punadivase pātova ekā kūṭadhenu godohakaṃ pādena paharitvā saddhiṃ khīrena pavaṭṭesi.
atk-s0513a4:6680_0: Kiṃ tattha brahmadattassa, yaṃ no garahate bhava”nti.
atk-s0513a4:6681_0: Brāhmaṇena gāthāya vuttāya puna so tisso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:6689_0: “Caṇḍā aṭanakā gāvī, yaṃ pure na duhāmase;
atk-s0513a4:6691_2: Khīrakāmehīti adhammikarañño purisehi bahuṃ khīraṃ āharāpentehi upaddutā duhāma.
atk-s0513a4:6691_3: Sace hi so dhammena rajjaṃ kāreyya,
atk-s0513a4:6692_0: Te “so yuttaṃ kathetī”ti tamhā gāmā nikkhamma mahāmaggaṃ āruyha nagarābhimukhā gamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:6692_1: Ekasmiñca gāme balisādhakā asikosatthāya ekaṃ taruṇaṃ kabaravacchakaṃ māretvā cammaṃ gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:6692_2: Vacchakamātā dhenu puttasokena tiṇaṃ na khādati pānīyaṃ na pivati,
atk-s0513a4:6692_4: Taṃ disvā gāmadārakā rājānaṃ akkosantā gāthamāhaṃsu –
atk-s0513a4:6701_0: Tattha sambhameyya raveyya vāti bhameyya vā viraveyya vā.
atk-s0513a4:6701_2: pasu nāma pasupālassa rakkhantasseva dhāvatipi viravatipi,
atk-s0513a4:6701_3: tiṇampi na khādati pānīyampi na pivati,
atk-s0513a4:6709_0: Kathaṃ no asikosatthā, khīrapā haññate pajā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:6710_2: Kathaṃ noti kathaṃ nu kena nāma kāraṇena.
atk-s0513a4:6710_3: Khīrapā haññate pajāti pāparājassa sevakehi khīrapako vacchako haññati,
atk-s0513a4:6710_5: sopi rājā ayaṃ dhenu viya paridevatūti rājānaṃ akkosiṃsuyeva.
atk-s0513a4:6711_0: Te “sādhu vo kāraṇaṃ vadathā”ti vatvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:6711_1: Athantarāmagge ekissā sukkhapokkharaṇiyā kākā tuṇḍehi vijjhitvā maṇḍūke khādanti.
atk-s0513a4:6711_2: Bodhisatto tesu taṃ ṭhānaṃ sampattesu attano ānubhāvena maṇḍūkena –
atk-s0513a4:6717_0: Taṃ sutvā purohito maṇḍūkena saddhiṃ sallapanto gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a4:6719_0: “Na sabbabhūtesu vidhenti rakkhaṃ, rājāno maṇḍūka manussaloke;
atk-s0513a4:6720_0: Nettāvatā rājā adhammacārī, yaṃ tādisaṃ jīvamadeyyu dhaṅkā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:6721_3: Ettāvatā rājā adhammiko nāma na hoti,
atk-s0513a4:6721_4: kiṃ sakkā araññaṃ pavisitvā raññā taṃ rakkhantena caritunti.
atk-s0513a4:6722_0: Taṃ sutvā maṇḍūko dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a4:6727_0: “Sace idaṃ brahme surajjakaṃ siyā, phītaṃ raṭṭhaṃ muditaṃ vippasannaṃ;
atk-s0513a4:6728_0: Bhutvā baliṃ aggapiṇḍañca kākā, na mādisaṃ jīvamadeyyu dhaṅkā”ti.
atk-s0513a4:6729_6: Surajjakanti chandādivasena agantvā dasa rājadhamme akopentena appamattena raññā rakkhiyamānaṃ sace idaṃ surajjakaṃ bhaveyya.
atk-s0513a4:6729_8: Na mādisanti evaṃ sante mādisaṃ jīvamānaññeva kākā na khādeyyuṃ.
atk-s0513a4:6730_0: Evaṃ chasupi ṭhānesu akkosanaṃ bodhisattasseva ānubhāvena ahosi;
atk-s0513a4:6731_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā ca purohito ca “araññavāsiṃ tiracchānagataṃ maṇḍūkaṃ upādāya sabbe amheyeva akkosantī”ti
atk-s0513a4:6731_1: vatvā tato nagaraṃ gantvā dhammena rajjaṃ kāretvā mahāsattassovāde ṭhitā dānādīni puññāni kariṃsu.
atk-s0513a4:6732_2: raññā nāma agatigamanaṃ pahāya dhammena rajjaṃ kāretabba”nti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā gandhatindukadevatā ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a4:6735_0: Kiṃchanda kumbha jayaddisa chaddanta, atha paṇḍitasambhava sirakapi;
